name: In the middle of it all - with a view!
summary: Mitt boende passar par, kompisar och ensamäventyrare.
space: A cozy three room flat with great personality. You will live in the red room, the biggest, and can choose if you would like to stay in two single beds or one double. Its up to you. You have full access to the whole flat and all the amenities, kitchen, washing machine, living room with a flat screen and a balcony with a hammock. Its your home away from home.  All rooms have a beautiful view of Stockholms rooftops.  The place is located close to Mariatorget, with lot´s of cafe's, bars, restaurants, shopping ands supermarkets close by. It is kids and family friendly. Buses and subway just a few steps away and only a 15 min walk to Gamla Stan and the city. If you want to have a swim there is also beaches just minutes away.  This is the place where you have everything close by - city life, tourist attractions and beach life. II will give you all the info you need about where to go and what to see. This is my city and I love it. Here’s some great guides to my parts of Stockholm:  (Website hi

neighborhood_overview: The flat is in the area of Södermalm, the young, vibrant part of Stockholm with lots of restaurants, cafés and shopping. My house is situated in a more quiet residentual area with all the restaurants and street life just a block away.
transit: My flat is close to all the major sights. The best way to get around is - to walk! Its a 15 min walk from here to the old city, the royal castle and the museums. The neigbourhood is also the hoods of the author Stig Larsson (Millennium). His coffea shop as described in the books is just a few blocks away. And if you walk to Gamla stan (the old city), you can hop on the ferry from there to Djurgården where you find the fun fair and more museums like the ABBA museum.
access: You can stay in either a room with two single beds or a room with a double bed. Just let me know. You also have full access to the kitchen, bathroom, living room and balcony.
interaction: Just ask me everything you want to know of where to go and what to see.
house_rules: No smoking inside, but the balcony is ok.
host_about: Hi, I'm Kim, a dedicated journalist and tv-producer and loving mom of two young adults and songwriters. Airbnb is great for travelling.

name: Stockholm, new spacoius villa
summary: Convenient and spacy home full of positive energy! The large windows from floor to roof gives you a vibrant light. Perfect location; easy access downtown 15 minutes by car or 30 minutes by public transportation. Relaxing nature just around the corner.
space: ABOUT THE HOUSE: Modern villa built in 2010. Luxurious and stylish furnished. The house has two bedrooms for total 4 people - one with a  bed 160 cm and the other with a bed 90 cm. Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with hot tub. Access to wireless highspeed internet, big flatscreen TV, sourroundsystem, washing machine and dry tumbler. We also have a nice garden and a big terrrace with both a lounge area and a dining group for four people. Garage and parking on the property. There is a guest house with a bed 120 cm, which can be possible to rent. ABOUT THE AREA: The house is situated in a calm familyfriendly area very close to the nature, a national park, swimming lakes and a big forest. It's a good area for sport activities. Only 5 minutes by walk to the bus stop and the local mall with restaurants, café, library, food shop and pharmacy. 10 minutes downtown by car. 15 minutes to city by bus and metrosystem. WELCOME!

host_about:
I work with human resources and I live in Stockholm, Sweden, with my family.

I am a globetrotter who loves to travel myself! To see new countries and experience different cultures. So if you ever come to Stockholm, I would love to welcome you to my house! And don't hesitate to ask me for tips and advice about this wonderful city!

Hope to see you soon!

name: Hornstull with water view!
summary: This apartment is located in the center of funky Hornstull. It has great public transport access including direct bus line from the airport. Apartment is clean and has all the facilities you need for a great stay in Stockholm.
space: 46 sqm apartment in Hornstulls, Södermalm Stockholm. Nice apartment with open solution. The apartment consist of one larger room with fully equipped kitchen, there are also one bedroom and bathroom as well. Air BnB guests are quite often optimistic about the decoration in the apartment, it´s a mix of minimalism and etno elements.  The apartment has a great urban view and open water outside the window. Hornstull is a nice upcoming area on Södermalm, it is very close to nature, parks, night lifé, cafes, restaurants and more. The apartment is a great basecamp for exploring Stockholm. It takes you only 12 minutes to get in to the city center (with the subway), you can walk to old town on 35 min or take a bike, it will only take aprox. 15 min.  There are many alternatives of public transport from here, subway and busses are only two minutes away from the entrance. The bus to and from Arlanda airport stops just 100 meters away from entrance (Liljeholmsbron 10). That is quite comfortable and

name: Double room in central Stockholm with Wi-Fi
summary: I am renting out a nice double room on the top floor in a large duplex apartment in the center of Stockholm at Södermalm. Close to metro and bus and walking distance to most of the sights.
space: ROOM: The room has a twin/double bed (2x90x200cm, in the US it is usually called King Size), table, wardrobe and bookshelves. The bed linen and towels are included.  The room is located on the top floor in the apartment, where the guests share a large TV-room. In the TV-room you can also find a micro, a fridge and a water kettle to make coffee and tea.  There is one bathroom shared between the bedrooms on the upper floor.  SÖDERMALM: Södermalm has a lot of nice restaurants, pubs, cinema and shopping. name: Petit Charm Rooftop next to heaven
space: Welcome to this beautiful, small, and charming flat in one of the coolest areas in Stockholm. The house is situated in the western part of Södermalm. It is very close to cafés, restaurants, bars and also to the beach. It is walking distance to pretty much everywhere, but if you still want to take the tube, it is only 4 minutes by walk to the station "Hornstull T-bana".  There is only one room in the apartment, but with two beds where 3 people can sleep. It is a perfect place if you are a couple or a small family! The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, refrigerator and dishwasher. The bathroom has a bath tub. There is also a 7 meters terass with a beatiful view (top floor), where you can enjoy the sun during the summer.  Unfortunately there is no internet in the apartment. But I can really recommend all the nice cafés below where they have free Wifi.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Like to share our apartment with people who are visiting Stockholm

You are so Welcome!

name: Doubleroom at Södermalm &trendySofo
space: The region is situated at one of Stockholms most popular areas, called "Sofo", only three stops from the Central station. The apartment is 96 m2. The house is from 1912. Ouside is a long nice allé with beautiful trees and the apartment is high up at the fourth floor. There are plenty of restaurants nearby, coffeeshops, theaters, museums, art galleries and of course shoping centers. It.s only about 10-15  minutes walk to The Old Town and the inner city. The apartment has a big kitchen with a nice balcony.  If you like you can use the microwave and you can also get some space in the fridge. name: Central apartment perfect for two
summary: My apartment is located in Vasastan, a beautiful part of central Stockholm with a lot of bars and restaurants and a park nearby. Subway and buses are within 200 meters. The apartment itself is very charming with high ceilings and parquet.
space: 38 sqm apartment in a charming building built 1929. When you walk into the apartment you have a hallway for shoes and clothes. On your left is a bathroom with toilet and shower. After the hallway comes a fully equipped kitchen and next to it is a combined living room and bedroom.
description: My apartment is located in Vasastan, a beautiful part of central Stockholm with a lot of bars and restaurants and a park nearby. Subway and buses are within 200 meters. The apartment itself is very charming with high ceilings and parquet. 38 sqm apartment in a charming building built 1929. When you walk into the apartment you have a hallway for shoes and clothes. On your left is a bathroom with toilet and shower. After the hallway comes a fully equipped kitchen and next to it is a combined living room and bedroom. As a guest you will have access to everything in the apartment. I'm happy to provide my guests with tips about things to do in Stockholm or answer any questions they might have during their stay. They can always reach me on mobile or email. The apartment is located in Vasastan, a very beautiful part of central Stockholm with old unique buildings. Rörstrandsgatan located 50 m from the apartment offer many bars and restaurants. You also have a park very close, Vasaparken, with
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Vasastan, a very beautiful part of central Stockholm with old unique buildings. Rörstrandsgatan located 50 m from the apartment offer many bars and restaurants. You also have a park very close, Vasaparken, with two cafés and a restaurant. There you can also have a picninc/barbecue or play some football. Additional to all bars and restaurants there is also a lot of small stores and boutiques in the area which makes it very nice to have a walk around the neighbourhood. A grocery store is located 50 m from the apartment and although quite small it has everything you need.
notes: The apartment windows are facing Sankt Eriksgatan which is a very busy street. During summer time when you might want to open the windows the traffic can become quite loud. I myself enjoy the sound of traffic but for those who prefer a very quiet location this is not the place. The area itself is however very peaceful and safe.
transit: Subway station (the green line) and two of the main bus lines (bus 3 and 4) is within 100 m from the apartment. If you're arriving at Arlanda airport there is a bus stop for the airport coaches (called Flygbussarna) just 200 m from the apartment.
access: As a guest you will have access to everything in the apartment.
interaction: I'm happy to provide my guests with tips about things to do in Stockholm or answer any questions they might have during their stay. They can always reach me on mobile or email.
house_rules: I trust my guests to leave the apartment in the same status as when they arrived. The common house rules ask everyone to keep the volume down between 10pm - 9am.
host_about:
Want to enjoy the best things in life in the most beautiful places.

Love skiing, food, animals, nature, rooftops, movies, football, road trips and so much more.

Like to keep things clean and tidy and take good care of everything around me.

Living in apartment buildings presents many opportunities for fellowship and enjoyment. But it also requires us to live there that do not interfere with each other and to be patient with each other's way of life. It is the Rent Act that determine what applies to living in a rented apartment: tenant must maintain "health, order and good condition" in the property. In order to clarify the text, we have developed a range of points of order and comfort. You as the tenant is also responsible for other family members and guests follow the rules. host_about:
Hi! 
I am an IT-entrepreneur who lives in Stockholm, the beauty capital of Sweden, Scandinavia. I live in a fine, new build apartment in Kista, north of Stockholm. Father to 3 children and they live most of the time with the mother.  I like to meet people from all over the world and to learn more about other cultures and places.
I like to hang out with my friends and dance salsa or to do sports like, skiing and ice skating in winter and cycling, do roller-skate and swim in the summer. I work a lot with my projects in my firm in Sweden and in Spain.
Hope you see you soon and I promise that you will enjoy staying in my home.
Welcome!

name: Penthouse in central Stockholm
space: This is a unique penthouse in the modern central located area of Söder in Stockholm, Hammarbysjöstad. The apartment has a terrace of 65 m2 were you can enjoy both beautiful views of the Sickla canal and warm summer days. The apartment is fully furnished in a modern contemporary stile. From the apartment you can walk to the natural park Nacka Reservatet but you can also take the boat to the many shops and restaurant's in Söder. There are many options for public transport, walking distance from our apartment. The apartment is located  approximately 10-15 minutes by subway from T-centralen. From T-centralen buses and trains depart to Arlanda airport. The apartment is fully equipped , including washing machine, espresso machine, etc. Bedclothes, towels are included in the price.  There is an elevator. About the area: The area were the apartment is situated is Hammarbysjöstad which is part of  the area of Södermalm. You can walk from our apartment to Hammarbybacken. Hammarbybacken is a land

name: Designer apartment innercity Sthlm
space: Hej and welcome! This beautiful, cosy and comfortable three bedroom apartment on the fourth floor, has an open plan kitchen and living room with a balcony, overlooking the old Sofia Church. The house, from 1928, is located in a nice and quiet neighbourhood in the middle of a popular area of Södermalm, central Stockholm, rich on boutiques, cafés, bars, culture and nightlife.  The whole apartment has just been newly renovated in a modern Scandinavian design style. - Bedroom 1, 1 double bed 180 cm - Bedroom 2, 1 bed 120 cm - Bedroom 3, 2 single beds 90 cm each - Bathroom with bathtub and toilet - Laundry, well equiped with two big washing machines, dryers in the bottom floor of the building. - Beautiful backyard with barbeque and garden furnitures and a small playground, sandbox and lots of toys. You will have access to wireless internet in the apartment, appel TV and TV. Bedsheets and towels are provided. It is only 15 minutes walking distance to Slussen and the Old Town, one of the larg
description: Hej and welcome! This beautiful, cosy and comfortable three bedroom apartment on the fourth floor, has an open plan kitchen and living room with a balcony, overlooking the old Sofia Church. The house, from 1928, is located in a nice and quiet neighbourhood in the middle of a popular area of Södermalm, central Stockholm, rich on boutiques, cafés, bars, culture and nightlife.  The whole apartment has just been newly renovated in a modern Scandinavian design style. - Bedroom 1, 1 double bed 180 cm - Bedroom 2, 1 bed 120 cm - Bedroom 3, 2 single beds 90 cm each - Bathroom with bathtub and toilet - Laundry, well equiped with two big washing machines, dryers in the bottom floor of the building. - Beautiful backyard with barbeque and garden furnitures and a small playground, sandbox and lots of toys. You will have access to wireless internet in the apartment, appel TV and TV. Bedsheets and towels are provided. It is only 15 minutes walking distance to Slussen and the Old Town, one of the larg
neighborhood_overview: A quiet neighbourhood and very close to restaurants, shopping and parklands with childrens playground and nice walkways along the seaside. Walking distance to the Old Town and ferries that takes you to Djurgården. Nytorget and along Skånegatan is a no car street during summer and the restaurants have tables all over the street. The area is warmly recommended with trendy shops and great restaurants, my favourite restaurant is Gossip on Skånegatan 71, Bengal food, Salmon with mango or the meatballs are a must. Great price during lunch hour between 11:00-16:00. Urban Deli on the corner of Skånegatan and Nytorgsgatan is always great as well. Nytorget on a sunny day is where a lot of people hang out for picnic and also have a great playground.  On my street you can find Ai Ramen who has great Ramen. There is also a Thai Kiosk for take away.  Walk up to Sofia Church and you will have a beautiful view over Södermalm and Stockholm. Fjällgatan and Katarinavägen are also a must with great views
notes: Check-in time is from 14:00 and check-out 11:00. If you let me know your  approx. time for arrival and check-out, I can plan ahead and be more flexible.
transit: Bus: Just outside my building you can catch bus no 2 that takes you down town, via Slussen and no 66 that takes you around Södermalm.  Walking: Two blocks down on Folkunggatan bus 53 takes you to Stadshuset, Kungsholm and Odenplan. It takes 15 minutes to walk to the nearest Metro station Medborgarplatsen or take the beautiful scenic walk, 20 minutes down to Slussen station down Erstagatan, along Fjällgatan and Katarinavägen .  Ferry: It's a really nice and quiet 10 minute walk down through parkland to the ferry at Barnängen jetty that takes you to Djurgården and the city. Tickets can be bought on the ferry. Please check the timetable and find more info regarding the ferry:   (Website hidden by Airbnb)
interaction: You can always reach me via sms, mail or mobile, whenever you have questions.
host_about: Hi, this is my place on earth, where I live with my three kids and our dog Nitza. I work as an Art Director. Love to travel myself and spends a lot of my time swimming, bicycling, cross-country skiing or chasing my kids.

name: Entire apt (some weeks this summer)
summary: When we will be away in the summer it's possible to rent the entire space. So the description  is valid until the end of August.
space: This awesome place where I'm living is great for people that like to stay at a calm place where nature is near. Communications are good, so you can reach central Stockholm in less than half an hour from the apartment (more detailed directions will be e-mailed to you once you're booking has been confirmed). I'm totally in love with the lake Magelungen outside of the door where you can take long beautiful walks, run or swim (up for a winter bath?;)).  About Stockholm: It is an amazing city and has so much to offer besides all the classical touristy sights. I'm good at finding both amazing places in nature and in the city that are a little unknown to others. I will happily share my favourites with you. To best enjoy the city, rent a bike when the weather allows or purchase either the Stockholm tourist card (where entrances to museums etc are included) or get a traveling-card via SL, that you can top up with an amount of money or have an unlimited number of trips if you buy a 24 hr, 48hr,

neighborhood_overview: I love the lake, the activity around the lake. I love the area where you can barbecue in the summer. I love the closeness to the nature's reserve and that there is a conveniences within walking distance.
transit: I love the public transport here since we have both buses and metro (tunnelbana), so there is always a way to get to where you want to go. With the metro it's about a 22 min ride to the central station. (Add about 5-10 mins of waling time from the apartment.)
access: The entire apt, two rooms, a kitchen, bathroom and balcony.
interaction: I won't be around, just to let you in.
house_rules: If you'd like to use the kitchen, you're more than welcome, provided that you keep it tidy and clean and make sure to close the door to the kitchen when you cook so the smell doesn't fill the whole flat. :-) Same with the bathroom, I'm really grateful if it is kept tidy and clean and hairs etc are removed after showers and shavings etc. It's important for everyone's comfort and enjoyment in living together. My water machine is a top medical device and it needs special attention and care. Please use it cautiously and make sure the pressure is not too high or that there's hot water in the tap before you flush it through the machine. Please also feel like home, take the space you require and don't hesitate to ask me about anything.
host_about:
Playful, fun-loving girl who loves adventures, dancing, nature, languages, meeting with interesting people, health and wellbeing. 
I can't live without moving my body around, preferebly to music, but loooong walks are also nice. I wouldn't want to be without the forest and the sea and all lovely nature and its beauty.
Welcome to try out really fun and delicious groove classes (the easiest dance class in the world) while you're here! First time is for free. It's easy and fun to have me as a host. And I enjoy sharing my time with other people who also likes beautiful and joyful experiences. 
Now I am a mother of a lovely little boy so lots of kid-stuff around the house. :)

Akalla Village is an old village with historical origins dating back to the Bronze Age era.  remnants as sacrificial stone, holy well, the Viking graves and others   is something that speaks their language.  In 1636 designed the first map of Akalla By.  time there were three farms in the village . interaction: we ask few questions to know the guest preference in food and other needs and if Guest would like to interact with us, we are available most of the time.
house_rules: •VEGETARIAN FOOD PREFERRED TO BE COOKED IN KITCHEN.. •Treat others the way you wish to be treated yourself. •Please treat the apartment as if it's your home, not a hotel. To make sharing comfortable for everyone, clean up after yourself, empty the trash if it's full and don't leave dishes in the sink :-)  •Please bring your own toiletries. (Bed linens, towels, toilet paper and hand soap will be provided) Keep the kitchen & bathroom clean & tidy. We love it when our kitchen shines. Take good care of your room as we take care of you. Clean before moving out. •Please let me know if you break or stain anything, so it can be replaced in time for the following guests.  •No-Smoking, No parties, It is important to have respect to the neighbours’ in terms of noise level especially in the evenings after 22 00. •In the case of alcoholic beverages, to drink socially and normal in your room. host_location: Stockholm, Stockholm County, Kingdom of Sweden
host_about:
Hi..I am Vidhatri,  You can call me as Vidhi:)

I am Receptive, Worked with multi national organisations, Certified Yoga teacher, Intrested in Travel and meeting new people.  

To me Airbnb is a way of travelling through inviting the world into my house. It is a great joy for me and my family to host you when you are visiting Stockholm.

I love cooking, dance, music, reading books. We are vegetarian by nature and we cook traditional Indian fresh Vegetarian food of different recipes. Always interested in learning new things. 

I am married, living with my husband and with one daughter.

I'm a dedicated host with a white, bright and clean home inspired by scandinavian design and style.

name: Cosy apartment central at Sodermalm
summary: Very centrally located small apartment at Slussen subway station. Apartment with bed space for four people, balcony with evening sun in summer. Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with tub and shower, TV and fast WIFI. Note that check in is after 18.00 (6 PM) on weekdays and most weekend. Beacuse I work daytime. In summer time (mid july -- mid augusti) I can be more flexible. But I try also to be flexibel during other times also. Floors are clean but in bad shape. You need to clean after stay.
space: An small apartment with one bed and one bed sofa. A beautiful 140-centimeter bed for two people, plus a bed sofa that is 140 cm wide, where two people can sleep. Note that the beds in the same room. The apartment are only 29 square meters. Its not an big apartment!! I also have privat stuff in apartment.  Notice: The floors are in bad shape. So they look dirty. I hope to replace kitchen floor soon.  Large TV with cable channels and WIFI. Small dining area with table. Balcony with table and chairs so you can sit outside and eat in the summer. Fine evening sun. Well equipped kitchen with two hotplates (electric), oven and microwave (in living room) fridge and freezer (living room). Plates, cutlery, glasses and anything else to prepare food there. You can use my oil, pepper, salt and spices. (Rest is privat) Note that the gasstove is not working, but you have an electric stow to cook on.  WC / bathroom with shower and bath and toilet. I do not live in the apartment when I rent out. Howeve

neighborhood_overview: Södermalm, often shortened to "Söder", is a district in central Stockholm. It covers the large island of the same name (formerly called "Åsön"). With a population of 99,685 (December 2008) it is one of the most densely populated districts of Scandinavia. Although Södermalm usually is considered an island, water to both its north and south does not flow freely but passes through locks. My apartment is next to Slussen subway and from here you can easy access hole Stockholm with public transport.  Gamla Stan (old town) is just 3-5 min walk from my door, its a must for first visit to Stockholm. In Gamla Stan you find the Royal Palace, just around 5-6 min walk from my door.  The area around Slussen (Götgatan, Götstreet) have many cool bars, café and good shopping.  Just 2-3 min from my apartment you find a nice park (Mariatorget) that is fantastic a nice summer day. Several other parks is reach easy with walking.
notes: Keys Leave the keys in the mailbox at the front door when you check out.
transit: The subway is just around the corner, 1 min from my house, the busstation is not much longer away. If you walk 5-7 min you can also get to the commuter train station (Stockholm Södra), this line takes you to Arlanda Airport. You can also take subway to Stockholm Centralstation and take train, fast train, bus or taxi to Arlanda.  How to get from Arlanda Airport Fast train You can take the fast train "ARLANDA EXPRESS" to Stockholm Central. From there you take the subway two stations to Slussen Subway Station. And from there walk to my apartment around 1 min. Commute Train Take the commute train to station "Stockholm Södra" Or Central Station. (Se above for directions from Central Station). If you go to "Stockholm Södra" its a walk about 5-10 min to get to my apartment. Best and most easy is to take the exit "Swedenborgsgatan" and walk towards "Mariatorget" Next to Mariatorget you find my street: Sankt Paulsgatan, I live on number 3. Bus Take the bus from Arlanda to City Terminal (Central
access: Hole apartment with kitchen and bathroom (shower and tube) WIFI (high speed) TV with mostly Swedish channels Spices for cooking Towels  Bedlinen  Toilet paper Shampoo and showercreme
interaction: I interact with guest before coming, how to access apartment, how to get from airport fastest, cheapest and so on.  I meet guest in apartment and show them how to use kitchen etc.
house_rules: Keys Leave the keys in the mailbox at the front door when you check out. Check-in and out Check-in time is 18:00 and check out is before 12:00. The check-in time can be earlier or later, but normaly i work to 17.00 so just communicate with me about it. I try to work it out. But I cant promise more early than 18.00 if you book directly.  Flowers on the balcony Water balcony flowers once per day at sunny weather in the summer, or every other day. No water during okt--may is needed. Common areas in the house Use of communal laundry room / roof is not permitted. Kitchen and food Gas cooker must not be used! (outcoupled). Salt, pepper, spices is ok to use when cooking. Other food items are private and may not be used. Fire Hazard No live candles or other flammable light sources should not be used. There is a fire extinguisher and a fire blanket in the kitchen. No grilling on the balcony. Do not use the gas stove! Noise Residential as normal residents allowed, no disturbing party after 22.00

host_about: I am a teacher and interested in travelling abroad to Spain/Germany/Switzerland etc ad speak foreign languages. I have room for up to five people in my house, the smallest room costs less, the bigger ones more. I have had Spanish, German, English and Japanese even Finnish guests and many more =). I enjoy my life in Sweden in the winter by dancing rock´nd roll, skiing in the north, hiking in the surroundings and athletics. I can always introduce my guests to my gym, one time Free!  I go to gardening fairs in Scania, love cooking and do it together my guests as well. I enjoy films (have you seen W.E?) or the Swedish "Sunes sommar"not to talk about Bergman´s Fanny and Alexander or Stieg Larssons trilogy, comedies and music- at the moment the becoming European contest, My interest in shopping is focused on vintage. I prefer jogging and nature, riding is for my daughter, climbing for my son and design and museums, cafés are on my list and I would like to show you Stockholm if you are looking for a guide or perhaps just company during your visit to our beautiful Old Town. My life motto is everything is possible. I welcome you to join to stay in our house! It is a great pleasure for me!

name: Spacious, bright, unique apartment
summary: This unique apartment is situated in Vasastan, with great restaurants, trendy bars and coffee shops just outside the door. Built in 1915, the apartment has an open architecture, with a modern interior design and inspiring art and paintings.
space: The apartment is located in a prestigious building from 1915 in the heart of Stockholm. It is a 6 room apartment with one Master Bedroom and, smaller bedroom, a living room with a nice bay window, a spacious dining room for up to 16 guests, a Swedish library and a nice round lounge hall with a welcoming fireplace.  The apartment has a modern interior design and a comfortable atmosphere. A sunny brightness comes from the large and many windows, the high ceiling and the broad opening between the three rooms in line (dining room, living room and library)  Staying there is almost to be in the city center, it only takes you some minutes to walk down town. In the close area you have everything you need for your stay, a bank, a grocery store, a drugstore, a dry cleaner, a liquor store, gift shops, interior design boutiques, a tailor and much more. The area is also filled with nice cafes, restaurant, and bars and it is really a place to enjoy the easy living in Stockholm. If you are interested

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a lively vibrant area with a lot of restaurants, cafes and bars. It is one of the most trendy and popular places when you are looking for a nice meal or just a cup of coffee or drink. Outside the building you have many buses taking you all over the city, the metro is only three blocks away that means that you have an easy access to all different places in Stockholm.  If you long for the nature you have Brunnsviken and Hagaparken in walking distance. There you have lovely parks and the sea with the beginning of the archipelago. Hagaparken is where the prinsess Victoria and prince Daniel live. You also have the beach where you can go swimming. If you feel you want to relax and leave the city life you have the nature just round the corner.
transit: Busstation with tStockholms main buss tours just outside the building 2 metro station Odenplan and Tekniska Högskolan in 5-10 minutes walk distance
access: You will have acces to the whole appartment except one room where we keep our own things.  That renting includes ; 2 regular bedrooms (one with a King size bed one with two regular beds that could make a dubbelbed) 1 library (offen used as a third Bedroom)  1 living room 1 dinning room 1 big round entrance hall with an open fireplace and small balcony 1 kitchen 1 bathroom with shower/bathtube and WC 1 extra WC  1 workingroom/hall with washmashine, tumbledryer, irontable etc If needed there is a possibility to rent the fourth Bedroom for an extra cost
interaction: Ii you have problem I will always be able to help you my self or through my three sons that lives close by.
house_rules: No smoking. No pets allowed. Quiet time after 11 pm.
host_location: Stockholm, Stockholm County, Kingdom of Sweden
host_about: I am described as an enthusiastic person with many interest and friends. Indian philosophy, yoga, film and travelling are some of the highly scored.  My husband and our three grown up sons are the most important in my life. One hobby we have together is interior design and for some years ago we rebuilt an old ban to a cool summerhouse at Gotland. I work with great colleges and clients and have a lot of fun with interesting projects concerning research and brand developing.

name: Design, style & vintage by Odenplan

You can stay here up to 3 persons in one real double bed (160 cm wide) and one comfortable bed sofa. Linen and towels for all 3 guests are of course included. house_rules: We love to welcome people into our home and except that you will respect and take care of our place and belongings. There is two real double beds in the apartment, both 160 cm wide. One is in a bedroom with a door to close, the other one is in the living room where we made like a second bedroom with the help of a curtain that can be closed for more privacy. We provide with clean sheets for both beds. Note that there is a fee for extra persons if you are more than 2 persons, and that we need to know before how many you are.  Please take note of our house rules:  - Smoking is not allowed in the apartment, only on the courtyard or on the street. Never in the windows.  - No excessive noise. No unregistered night guests. name: Excellent location in the city center
summary: Trendy Vasastan in the city center. Walking distance to all sights and nice bars, restaurants and funky shops in the area. Subway, train and buses 1 min away. This is one of the most popular areas among the locals of Stockholm! Elevator in the building. No kids as guests. Ultra fast internet connection, 250 mbit/s.
space: Just by the Odenplan plaza in the heart of Vasastan in Stockholm city center.  In the living room there is a large comfy sofa, a table to eat and the exit to the terrace. There is also a working fireplace, a big screen TV including many international channels and Netflix. Chromecast to watch online material.  The kitchen is very well equipped with the best kitchenware. Coffee machine, grinder, mixer, microwave, gas stove and electric oven. There is an ice machine and a large dishwasher. The bathroom has a washing machine and a WC/shower. I also provide a hair dryer. The view is stunning from this penthouse. Especially from the large terrace with an outdoor bed and a grill.

neighborhood_overview: Vasastan (Vasastaden) is a trendy area of Stockholm, it´s very popular with locals opposed to the old city which very touristic.  Here you can visit a lot of different restaurants and cafés. You find some of the best bar life in this area. And for nightclubs is 20 minutes away by walk, 7 minutes by bus/metro or around 100 SEK for Uber. You can also rent bikes cheap at Odenplan. This apartment fits both night-owls as well as those who like to go to bed early and do not wish to be disturbed by any noise.  If you would like to do some shopping during your stay in Stockholm, you can visit the big shopping mall NK, which is by most people considered the best shopping mall in Sweden. NK is located only fifteen minutes walk  from the apartment, alternatively 5 minutes by taxi or two stops with the metro/underground. Around NK you can find other malls like Gallerian and Mood Gallerian, which are two other shopping malls located just across the street from NK. Another popular mall, Sturegalleri
notes: No kids allowed.
transit: Walking distance to all major tourist areas and other interesting parts of the city. Very frequent public transport just outside the door. Its easy to get to Karolinska institute, KTH and the University. Easy access to Friends Arena by taxi or subway and 15 minutes direct line to Tele2 Arena and Globen (Globe). Check in and out times can be agreed upon.
access: Smoking only allowed at the terrace.
house_rules: No loud music or other disturbances after 10 pm at night. No smoking inside. No guests or visitors if not agreed with me.

name: Apartment in the heart of Stockholm
space: Beautiful and cosy 38 m2 apartment with separate kitchen, dining area, a combined bedroom/livingroom  and a balcony. Located like a smalloasis in the centre of Stockholm next to posh Karlaplan. Its a quiet and posh neighborhood right next to the big green areas of Djurgården with only a 15 minute walk to the business, nightlife and shopping area at Stureplan. The apartment has a queensize bed, couch, WiFi 50mb and bathroom with shower and bathtub.

name: Modern central 1 bedroom flat
space: Fine cosy 1 bedroom flat on the first floor in a quiet surrounding very close to Stockholm City. The bed is 1.4 m. The livingroom has a 2 seat sofa (not a bed sofa), TV and WiFi connection, balcony, bathroom with bathtub and shower, fully equipped kitchen with gas stove and oven, fridge, freezer and microwave oven. TRANSPORTATIONS / SURROUNDINGS:  Subway and buses only a few minutes away. Close by you have Västermalmsgallerian, a shopping centre where you can find everything you need, grocery shops and pharmacy. You also have a big variety of pubs, cafeés and restaurants. Within 15 minutes walk you find a lovely park by the waterside called Norr Mälarstrand, perfect for chilled out walks or running. STAY INCLUDES:  Towels and bedlinen  WiFi  Tourist brochures

name: CENTRAL, COSY AND SPACIOUS
space: Este apartamento está situado en Södermalm, la parte más creativa y vibrante de Estocolmo. Mi apartamento es en total 57 metros cuadrados.   - Dos dormitorios, uno con una cama de 180 cm de ancho y otro con una cama de 140 cm de ancho   - Sala de estar con TV y una gran mesa de comedor   - Wi-Fi gratis   - Abran fuego   - Cocina totalmente equipada de los años 50   - Renovado, sobre todas las paredes blancas y muy fresco   - Cuarto de baño con ducha y lavadora   ADEMÁS   - El precio incluye ropa de cama   ACERCA DE LA ZONA Usted está justo en el corazón de la moda Södermalm, el corazón creativo de Estocolmo con miles de pequeñas boutiques, galerías de arte, museos y cafés, bares y restaurantes. Todo está en tu puerta. Hay varios supermercados alrededor. Puedes caminar a Gamla Stan y la ciudad en 10 minutos o tomar el metro que está a sólo 5 minutos del apartamento. Realmente sé acerca del entorno así que pregúntame todo lo que quieras saber: comer, ir de compras, salir de fiesta o algu

name: Gorgeous sunny apt with sea views
summary: This is a spacious and sunny flat on the fifth floor (elevator) with sea views in a 1920s building. The flat got totally refurbished in 2011 and then the bathroom in 2013. It's very conveniently located with a short stroll to the subway or bus. It can sleep 5 adults comfortably in full size beds or mattresses.
space: Welcome to a spacious apartment in Stockholm! The apartment is located on the top floor of a beautiful building from 1910 offering exquisite views. It has 2 bedrooms, a white modern fully equipped kitchen, a living room with a fire place and a flat screen TV, 1 bath with a bath tub and 2 toilets. Washer and dryer is available in the apartment as is WiFi.  The apartment is totally refurbished in 2011. It offers Sea views of Riddarfjärden, a few steps away from Långholmen, Rejemersholme and Hornstull Subway station. The apartment is really bright and and sunny, being on the top floor. Still curtains in the bedrooms makes it dark at night offering a good nights sleep.  Some points of interest and things to do in Stockholm are: Skansen with Midsummer's  Eve celebration, The Sky view, 'The National Museum' Sweden's largest art museum, take a boat tour under the bridges of Stockholm and discover Scandinavia's Venice, 'Vasa Museum' which is Scandinavia's most visited museum, the 800 year old

neighborhood_overview: Hornstull is listed as one of the trendiest neighborhoods in the World! It's super close to the water and bathing possibilities but at the same time has a urban vibe with cool bars and trendy restaurants.
transit: Getting to the Hornstull subway station is 5 min walk, through well lit, super safe streets. A bus stop is literally right outside the doorstep taking you across Södermalm to SOFO another trendy district with lots of clothing stores, cafees and restaurants.
interaction: I will be happy to offer any recommendations of things to see and fun things to do.

name: charming spot at famous Södermalm
summary: This cozy two bedroom apartment is located in the heart of the trendy Södermalm. Close proximity to public transport (0-5 minute walk to both metro and commuter train), nice restaurants, bars and shopping.
space: This two bedroom apartment is located in the heart of the trendy Södermalm. The neighborhood itself is quiet calm but the vibrant areas with nice restaurants, bars and shopping is just a short walk away. Close proximity to public transport (0-5 minute walk to both metro and commuter train) and to beautiful walking paths along the water. The apartment is on the 6th floor with a great view. All windows, and the balcony is facing a park. It has an open and spacious layout with combined kitchen and living room, two bedrooms and one bathroom.

name: Terrace house in Stockholm, Farsta
summary: One of the finest architectural  houses from the sixties in Sthlm suburb-Farsta. 17 minutes from Stockholm center. Big house, 130 m2. Terrace, balcony and a small garden. Situated with nice wiews to the park, and road further away. There is a highway 500 meters away, so if you are searching for totally quietness Farsta is not the place. 7 minutes walk to beach and near to fantastic nature, 2km to Farstanäset; nature reserve. And nice walks by the lake. Wifi 100/100mbit.
space: Fantastic house. Architectural must see from the 60-ies in fantastic suburb Farsta. The house is not new, and we have done everything we can to preserve the old details and charm. We are eco friendly, our furnitures are vintage and we do not prefer new things.

The house is not new, and we have done everything we can to preserve the old details and charm. We are eco friendly, our furnitures are vintage and we do not prefer new things. The whole house. When arriving and leaving. Farsta is fantastic, specially with kids. Cars and pedastrians are totally separated. You can walk to the center of this suburb without crossing any road. We live next to a field/park, and 2 min from kids playground. big

name: Bunk bed close by Alvsjo Exhibition
space: One bunk bed (IKEA style) 80 by 200 cm, in my office room in my house. Are you working or visiting at the Alvsjo Exhibition Fair in Stockholm?  Then this place is the perfect place!  I live only 20 minute walk from the fair! 10 minute walk to the subway (Green Line 19) and two grocery stores and about 22 min into Central Stockholm by Subway.  You can use the fully equipped kitchen to cook for breakfast and dinner (has electric stove, oven and microwave), and then there´s the livingroom you can be in with a comfortable couch and big screen TV for relaxation!  For houserules and directions please see my other listing or contact me. Please no smokers and since I have children in the house, no drinking in the house, no guests allowed and not so loud after 8 PM.

name: Modern single room in Stockholm with Wi-fi
summary: Single room in a modern and bright apartment in Stockholm with free WiFi access in a calm and green area. Located just 5-10 mins from the city center by metro. Easy access by public transport to all the cities sightseeing spots (Old Town, Vasa museum, the City Hall, Södermalm, Stockholmmässan, Globen, etc).  Almost door-to-door access from Arlanda airport with direct bus (flygbussarna) to Liljeholmen stopping 30 meters from my building.

transit: There is public transport just in front of the buildning, metro, bus and tram as well as direct bus to the Arlanda airport. Metro station is called Liljeholmen on the red line, which is 5 stops away from the Old Town of Stockholm, where most of the tourist attractions can be found.
access: The guest has its own bedroom. The bathroom, living room and kitchen are shared with me.
house_rules: Here comes some points that I would appreciate that you follow: - You can come and go as you wish as long as you do it in a quiet way. - Remove your shoes and leave them in the hallway. - Turn off the lights when leaving the room/flat. - Always lock the door both when you get home and when you leave. - You can use the kitchen for smaller food preparation, microwave and get a small place in the fridge, but warm cooking is NOT allowed. - Wash the dishes after use and put them back where you found them. - Don't play load music or make a lot of noise. - Smoking is strictly forbidden both in the flat and on the balcony. - You are not allowed to bring any other friends/people over to the flat.
host_about: I am working and living in Stockholm. I enjoy traveling, sports, nature, photography, meet with international people and learn new languages.

name: Studio Apartment
summary: Stylish New furniture  Centrum located Safely
space: Hello and welcome to my modern studio  apartment.  Design with guest comfort and convenience in mind, this old building has been newly refurbished ( 2013) to an excellent standard of modern living.  The apartment has a great central location. Just one minute walk to Rådmansgatan metro station and Stockholm biggest street Sveavägen. It take just a 5 minutes walk to fancy Stureplan and in close proximity to Stockholm City Library, Stockholm Observatory, Bonniers konsthall, Jewish Museum,Sven-Harrys konstmuseum and beautiful Italian Baroque church of Gustav Vasa Kyrka. There are also many buses in the local area. This building and studio apartment has been refurbished, and finished to a standard one would expect in a boutique hotel. Features include: -Satellite 40"Full HD LED 3D TV,  -Wireless internet and cable broadband Ethernet,  -Private 'Square' communal garden (perfect for BBQ's) -In house 2 wash/dry laundry facilities -Dishwasher  -Hairdryer -Electronic door-entry system -Ice makin

name: Spacious house in Stockholm
summary: Well designed and cosy place close to city. Very calm and has only good reviews.
space: The house is open planned so there is a large livingroom combined with the kitchen. It is very light since there are many large windows. In the kitchen you will find everything you need like dishwasher, stove, espressomachine etc. The livingroom has a large TV, DVD player, Wireless Internet. And a balcony facing southwest. On the same floor, there are three bedrooms, two bedrooms with single beds and one bedroom with a large doublebed. Furthermore, there is one bathroom with bathtub and toilet. In the basement there is a large room with a large double bed for two persons.  The house is very calm and well designed, and it is located just 8km (5 miles) from the citycenter of Stockholm. You just take the tube 5 stops and you are downtown. There is a large grocery store next to Svedmyra tube station.  And when you come home you can spend time in the garden, barbecuing or just being lazy.

name: Bright Apartment in Stockholm
space: This is a lovely apartment located one min away from the metro station Hornstull in Stockholm, only ten minutes with the metro from the central station. The apartment with it´s big windows, smart plan and comfortable furnishing creates a personal feeling in the trendy area of Hornstull. The apartment has fully equiped basic kitchen, (oven, stove, fridge, refrigerator etc.) wireless internet and TV. There is one big bed 160cm in the bedroom, a single bed in the living room, sofa and dining table for four people in the living room. A small bathroom with shower. There is a big green park just beside the house and there is also a small beach by the water next to the park. There are also many cozy reaturants and cafés in the neighbourhoud.  There is a bar two floors down which can be a bit noisy during the weekends. It closes at 1pm. Usually I´m not disturbed by it feels good to give a warning if you are sensetive. Also there are traffic outside the house so you might want to bring earplugs

name: Lovely big apt in SOFO  balcony
space: Welcome to our lovely big apartment in SoFo Stockholm. The apartment is located in a old fashionable building in a great location in the nice neighborhood, Södermalm. The apartment is located on the fourth floor with an elevator. It has three bedrooms. One with a double bed and two with single beds, two bathrooms; one with a shower and the second bathroom with a bath tub, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with a wide screen TV and two balconies,  It's a spacious and luminous apartment.   There is WiFi access and all mod cons, washing machine, tumble dryer, dishwasher etc.  The area offers a variety of restaurants, coffee shops and shops. To reach Gamla Stan (old town) and other attractions, it's a ten minutes walk and you reach the central train station with public transportation in only eight minutes.  From the central train station you reach Arlanda Airport in 20 minutes with the Arlanda Express train or by airport coach in 40 minutes.  There are as well airport coaches to Brom

name: • ARTISTIC PENTHOUSE NEAR CITY/long & short term •
summary: Don´t look for premiums or discounts when it comes to this highly original apartment, as the unique charm prohibits the use of them.    Individualism, art, top view, space, light  -  no need to look further. Here it is.     Lots of exciting objects on display from extensive travels.    The whole apartment is for you - two bathrooms + two balconies included.   Situated between two subway lines, with a busstop just across the street and friendly neighbours - it all adds up to a comfy & cozy stay.
space: Top floor - top views, two bathrooms, two large balconies for sunset martinis, artistic interior design, lots of sun & air from all direcitions, charming, 80 sq m, fully equipped w fiber wifi, TV, free towels & linen, gym, tempurmattresses in large king size bed, close to trendy Telefonplan w Royal College of Arts and Restaurant Landet with clubevenings, live bands & dj's (closing early so then head for the Southern part of the city) - and an excellent cuisine. neighborhood_overview: Hipster-area, gentrification, expanding, some old ladies still live here. Nice people. Close to nature. Soft & chill.
notes: Life is great, especially in Stockholm! Have fun! If you want to party in the summertime, "Trädgården Under bron" below the Skanstull bridge is the place to be. And keep track on social media for open-air events and raves during the summer. If you´re in for more traditional culture, I supply you with broschures about galleries and museums.  Södermalm is by far the nicest area in central Stockholm. Take a walk to Nytorget, quite a few restaurants & a good area for strolling and shopping.
transit: Yes. Bus 147 outside the main door, across the street,  takes you directly to Liljefolmen subway, or you walk 5 min to each of two subwaystations that are close to me
access: The whole apartment. Washingmachine and tumbler in the basement. If you need a coat or a sweater because of the temperature, borrow one from the closet.
interaction: Up to you, if you want info, I give you as much information as you want. Just ask & I´ll try to help you. Often I´m in the city, so just text or call me.

Working as a yoga teacher & w moving images (TV, commercial, documentaries), also a writer. 58 yrs old, have three kids, 27, 24 and 18. None of them live at my place.
I love film and movement in life.
Run my own company (Website hidden by Airbnb) as well as (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
Yoga puts everything in place.

name: Central Stockholm, 5th floor 102 m2
space: Our great apartment in central Stockholm is a walk away from a national royal park (Hagaparken), which has a beautiful bay (Brunnsviken), cultural sites, great big lawns for picnics, woods for hiking, cafes, restaurants and museums). We are also a walk away from major shopping streets, subway and great dining. The apartment is on the 5th floor, with elevator. The views are outstanding. Lots of sky, lots of green, and rooftops. And privacy! The apartment is very well planned. The room layout is:  - A master bedroom  - 2nd bedroom (used by a child)  - 3rd bedroom that we use as an office/TV room, with a bed that we use for guests  - Huge living room with windows to the north-east  - The kitchen is the "center" of the apartment, it has access to the hallway, the living room, the master bedroom and the 2nd bedroom.  - The balcony, with entrances to the master bedroom and the kitchen. The balcony faces south-west. Table and chairs are perfect for eating any meal outside.  - Two separate bat

It would be greatly appreciated if you could leave the apartment neat, and vacuumed (there is a vacuum in the hallway closet).

name: Big Private Bedroom w/ Bathroom & Terrace View
summary: You get your own private bedroom with your own toilet and shower and your own terrace with view of the lake.  Public transportation is all right in front of building or across the street.  And it's right in Stockholm city, not suburbs. You can pay 2x or 3x more for hotel or motel with a small room and no views.  This is a great deal. .   Also, you will be on a separate floor from the host.   Elevator building.  Your Big Private Bedroom is in a beautiful Stockholm Duplex (2 floors) Penthouse.
space: You get your own Private Master Bedroom (big) with a luxurious master bed with all the trimmings and your bedroom walks out to your own terrace with a view of the waters. It's impossible to get this  price from any nearby hotel or motel. big space (83 sqm duplex apartment including 2 terraces) with a luxurious master bed walking out to your own terrace in any nearby hotel or motel for this price. Or on other AirBnB offerings. this quality (beautiful wooden floors, tall ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows which capture sunlight, great views) in any hotel or motel in Hammarby Sjostad, an expensive and prestigious neighborhood in Stockholm.   this Stockholm Duplex Penthouse with water and ski-mountain views.  Master Bedroom plus Smaller open bedroom and a huge expensive sofa bed as good as any bed.  2 Toilets and 2 Showers (1 with big bathtub). Bathrooms are large. No one has to wait for the bathroom. Fully equipped spacious modern Kitchen.  Perfect for the chef in you. Views on every corn

neighborhood_overview: Hammarby Sjöstad is the "greenest" neighborhood in Stockholm. Recognized by the U.N. as one of the two models for sustainable urban renewal and living.  Outside my apartment building are the channel waters, the public park and terrace for sunbathing/picnic, and the boardwalks for walking or jogging. Private Boats are parked nearby.
notes: Note: There is only one entrance to and out of duplex. If one is on the second floor, one needs to walk down the staircase and across the kitchen to exit the apartment.  If one is one the first floor, one can exit the apartment directly as the entrance and exit door to apartment is on the first floor of this duplex.
transit: Yes there's a Tram (Tvarbanan) across the street which takes you to the Subway (SL) in a few minutes. The Subway takes you to all parts of the city and suburbs. Buses also a few meters away to Sluseen, Mariatorget and Shopping Malls.  (Buses substitute for tram temporarily.)
access: In addition to your own floor with your own bathroom and shower/bathtub, you get access to KITCHEN, LIVING ROOM, DINING ROOM TABLE.  Kitchen is modern, spacious and well-equipped.  It has bar table where one can eat informal meals or snacks or have drinks. It has view of the only ski slope in Stockholm.  Living room has big sofa (which in evening turns into a big nd comfortable sofa bed).
house_rules: Enjoy your time in my apartment! No smoking inside apartment. You can smoke outside. No pets. No guests or parties.  Please be considerate and not disturb the neighbors. Use common sense.  Treat my home as I would treat yours. And have a great stay!
host_about:
I like to travel, live in different places, and meet new interesting people.  Speak and write English.  Friendly and responsible. 
Respectful of people's apartments as I would my own apartment. 
 I judge people based on my experience of them. I try to do as I promise, and expect others to do as they promise. 
I am open-minded and tolerant.
 I know what is reasonable or not reasonable to expect in lodgings on AirBnB.  
I understand it's not a 5-star hotel, it's someone's home. I hope you do too.
So far, I've had mostly good experiences.

name: Room  with Forrest view
space: The room is a private room with a closet, bedside tables, a desk and a door leading out to the balcony.  If you are in three, I will provide you with the double bedroom and the single room. In addition to the room you will also have a private bathroom and shower. We share the kitchen and the living room.  Wi-Fi access in the apartment and you are close to the center of Sköndal which has bus stops, pizza place, restaurant/bar and very good grocery. The area is nice and green and if you are lucky you can even see Deers walking by the window.  There is very convenient  connection by bus, which is very close by.  You reach the central train station of Stockholm in less than 20-30 minutes by buss & metro.  In order to reach Stockholm, you will have to change means of transportation, once. From there you have trains and busses to the three major Airports: Arlanda, Bromma and Skavsta. Welcome!

name: Family friendly in central location
summary: This is a very central yet secluded location perfect for families or someone looking to explore by day and enjoy relative calm at night. On a cul-de-sac with very little traffic.
space: Two bedroom apartment located in central Stockholm. Total area is 102 sq.m (1122 sq. feet) with a large master bedroom, a smaller bedroom suitable for children, two separate bathrooms and ability to comfortably seat six people. The house was built in 1936 and completely refitted in 2009.  The kitchen has a gas stove with electrical oven which is great for cooking as well as baking/roasting. There is also a dishwasher and a small laundry machine for when you just have to wash something.  The Gärdet area in Stockholm is unique in it's location close to vast park areas but still allowing you to walk to the city. The neighborhood is quiet and the building itself located on a cul-de-sac so there's very little traffic. You can get sushi and pizza within walking distance and there's a grocery store on the corner which is open 7am-11pm every day.  There's an elevator leading directly to the Gärdet metro station less than 150m away.  This place is perfect for kids!

name: Unique loft apartment
summary: My place is close to My place is a 5 minute subway ride (or 10 minute bike ride) from Södermalm. It's set in a family area with beautiful surroundings, especially during summer. It's a beautiful, unique flat, it's especially great for groups if you want to have dinner and spend a lot of time together in the big living room. The place is also good for couples, families (with or without kids).
space: Located just south of Södermalm (10 min from city) lies the picturesque Enskede, a place popular among artists, writers and culture workers. You rent our apartment, refurbished and decorated by us. We have two smaller bedrooms and one big living room with an open kitchen. Since we don't all love Pikachu, Jesus on the cross or old cuckoo clocks, we don't expect this apartment to be for everyone. But if you appreciate it's uniqueness we know you will have a fantastic time here, we take pride in it. The flat is 74 square meters

name: Studio apartment right in the city
summary: A modern, light, clean apartment with a great kitchen, located in the very heart of Stockholms most vibrant city area. This apartment has among Stockholm's highest AirBnB rating for a good reason!
space: The very city of Stockholm consists of several islands. This beautiful studio apartment is located on the southern one (Södermalm), seconds from clubs, restaurants, bars, cafés and (unfortunately) hipsters. It's a minute from the subway station should you want to leave the action. A large spacious kitchen with all modern appliances you can imagine, including induction cooktop, hot air oven and a microwave oven. There's a hallway with plenty of space for your baggage, coats and what else you might have brought to the capital of Scandinavia. The apartment is 376 sq ft with big windows. The bed is 47", great for one guest and good for two guests. Extra mattresses (with extra covers and pillows) are available at no additional charge. You're welcome to use the broadband connected computer for free. If you bring your own computer, high speed WiFi is available free of charge. Nobody wants to throw away valuable time on waiting for subways and busses hence this is the place for you! The house

This apartment has among Stockholm's highest AirBnB rating for a good reason! The very city of Stockholm consists of several islands. You're welcome to use the broadband connected computer for free
notes: Make yourself at home. Use anything you need.  Keep in mind that in Sweden, virtually all apartments are part of an equivalence to the American “home owners associations” (HOA). It is very rare to be allowed to rent out your apartment e.g through Airbnb. My apartment is an exception. It is rented out in accordance to our HOA’s statute, so you don’t have to hide from your neighbors.
access: Two free to use laundry rooms on the ground floor. They are equipped with modern washing machines, dryers and drying cabinets.
interaction: I’ll be available for any questions you might have, whenever you have them. Call me, text me or e-mail me.
house_rules: * Be quiet when entering and exiting the apartment. * You have free access to the laundry room on the ground floor, but do not use it outside the hours 08:00 - 22:00, it will disturb the neighbours. * Do not use the Internet connection for illegal activities. * Be careful with the interior, use it like if it was your own. * Remember to lock the door using both keys, every time you leave the apartment! * Do not smoke indoors, there are smoking balconies on every floor. If you for some reason really need to smoke in my apartment, open the windows widely and smoke by them. * Do not wash the chef knifes in the dish washer. * Have a great time in Stockholm!
host_about: I'm a Swedish writer. Non-smoking. Talkative, but will shut up if asked to. :-) Born and raised in Sweden, but given a name by my Italian dad. I like socializing, I'm interested in economy, politics and - of course - my work.

name: Charming flat in Södermalm
space: Welcome to a very light and sunny 2.5 rooms flat in Södermalm. The flat is located on the fifth floor of a 1930's charming building with elevator and has a bedroom with a double bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a separate dining area, a living room, a bath room with a bath-tub, an open fire place and two balconies. WiFi access It is situated right in the center of Södermalm, Stockholm, with lots of restaurants, bars, cafés, in the area. You will also find banks, all forms of shops, grocery stores and the public metro within walking distance.  The area offers great walking, nice parks and you are 10 minutes walk from the Old Town, 'Gamla Stan'. It takes 15 minutes to reach the central station and to continue to Arlanda Airport with Arlanda Express train, you arrive in 20 minutes. You also have the option of taking the airport coach, which takes 40 minutes. Airport coaches to Bromma Airport and Skavsta, stop at the central station as well. Welcome to a central location.

name: Nice, central 1-room studio flat
summary: Practical and cute studio flat in central Stockholm. Located in a calm street with walking distance to Djurgården island where famous museums like Wasa museum, Skansken, Nordic museum, Junibacken etc are situated. From the flat it takes two minutes to walk to the Karlaplan metro station where two stops take you to T-centralen, the Central train and bus station, within 4 minutes.
space: Located in the nice and calm area of Karlaplan, Östermalm, this fully furnished one-room studio apartment is situated within walking distance from most touristic sights such Historical Museum, Djurgården with the Wasa, Nordic and Skansen Museums, Astrid Lindgren's World etc.  Two minutes walk to Karlaplan metro station and 4 minutes with the metro to Central Bus & Train Station (T-Centralen).  Also busses go 24/7 from just around the corner, bus lines 1 and 4 (91 and 94 night time). A big shopping mall, Fältöversten is five minutes walk from the flat. There you have all kinds of stores, for clothing, food, spirits and wine, and so on. Also banks, pharmacies, and a library. The flat provides everything needed for a short stay such as clean towels, bed linens, soap, shampoo etc. The bed is an ergonomic Tempur bed (120cm). There is also an extra 90 cm IKEA-mattress in the flat. The kitchenette is fully equipped and you can use spices, olive oli, coffee, tea etc.  Last but not the least, t
description: Located in the nice and calm area of Karlaplan, Östermalm, this fully furnished one-room studio apartment is situated within walking distance from most touristic sights such Historical Museum, Djurgården with the Wasa, Nordic and Skansen Museums, Astrid Lindgren's World etc.  Two minutes walk to Karlaplan metro station and 4 minutes with the metro to Central Bus & Train Station (T-Centralen).  Also busses go 24/7 from just around the corner, bus lines 1 and 4 (91 and 94 night time). A big shopping mall, Fältöversten is five minutes walk from the flat. There you have all kinds of stores, for clothing, food, spirits and wine, and so on. Also banks, pharmacies, and a library. The flat provides everything needed for a short stay such as clean towels, bed linens, soap, shampoo etc. The bed is an ergonomic Tempur bed (120cm). There is also an extra 90 cm IKEA-mattress in the flat. The kitchenette is fully equipped and you can use spices, olive oli, coffee, tea etc.  Last but not the least, t
neighborhood_overview: A big shopping mall, Fältöversten is five minutes walk from the flat. There you have all kinds of stores, for clothing, food, spirits and wine, and so on. Also banks, pharmacies, and a library.
transit: Accessing the flat is very easy. It is situated 2 minutes walk from Karlaplan metro station. Also bus 1 and 4 stop three minutes away.
interaction: I’m reachable on phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) . If there is time and ingerest l’d be glad to make a short presentation of the neighbourhood.
house_rules: Leave the place like it was when you first saw it.
host_about:
Born and raised in Sweden.
I like travelling, socialicing & meeting new people. Maybe not very unusual interests for a member of Airbnb ;=)

Respect, openmindedness, cleanness and flexibility is my motto.

For me it is very important that my guests have a pleasant stay, which you will see if you decide to spend some days or longer at my place.

name: 1 room studioflat, Hornstull, STHLM
summary: Cozy apartment in the best part of Stockholm - Södermalm. Close to everything: restaurants, bars, coffee shops, grocery stores, boutiques, vintage stores, parks, water etc. Located in the Hornstull area. Hornstull is a cool hipster area.
space: Cozy apartment in the best part of Stockholm - Södermalm. Close to everything: restaurants, bars, coffee shops, grocery stores, boutiques, vintage stores, parks, water etc. Located in the Hornstull area. Hornstull is a cool hipster area. There is a beautiful walking path to Långholmen and Reimersholme. Really close to the beach and the waterside of Långholmen. A magnificent sea view walk to Gamla Stan (old town). The subway station Hornstull is just round the corner conveniently takes you anywhere in town. The #4 Bus is just outside the door. The apartment is on the second floor with elevator. 27 square meter. Gas stove + freezer + fridge, a small shower, two couple beds (120x200cm). Windows from apartment in the direction of Långholmsgatan. ENJOY!

name: Cozy studio 5 minutes from Central Station
summary: Cozy studio close to city and nature!
space: Cozy, artsy studio only 5 minutes busride or 10 minutes walk from Central Station.  This studio is perfect for couples or friends who wants to come to Stockholm for a weekend or a couple of days. The location is perfect because its in the middle of the city and yet close to nature.  It's a very safe and nice area.  It's a small studio, but super cozy and has everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The studio has a loftbed that is suitable for two people. An extra air mattress can also be arranged. There's full-speed internet, wi-fi. There is laundry in the basement if needed. No need to pre-book. There are also two shared balconys on every floor! There are Gyms, Cafées, Reataurants, Green areas, Shopping and everything you need all around the corner! We can also assist you with touring etc if you are interested!

host_about: Hi! We are two free spirits who dance, play music, do yoga and meditate. We love to travel and explore the world with all its diversity. We are clean and easy going. We would love to host people who wants  to see Stockholm and would like to stay in an artsy, boheme flat. We would also love to help you find what you're looking for in this city. Come here with a set plan or just go with the flow!

name: Great 2 bedroom apartment Stockholm
summary: Newly renovated 2 bedroom apartment in great shape. Master bedroom with double bed (160 cm wide). Second bedroom with single bed. There is also an extra-bed and a baby-bed.  New kitchen and new bathroom.
space: Welcome to a two bedroom apartment in Stockholm.  Nicely renovated and furnished apartment. The apartment has space for up to six people. A Master bedroom with a double bed and a secondsmaller  bedroom with two single beds. The living room has a daybed plus an extra bed available, as well as a baby cot. More to it, you have a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with a TV, closets in the hallway, Internet access and a bathroom with a shower. Its location is close to central Stockholm, with excellent public transportation, a few steps away. You are as well close to a medical care centre, a pharmacy, a smaller convenient store and some smaller restaurants. There is also a shopping mall just a few minutes walk away. You are only 15 minutes away from the Central station, where you can make use of public transportation's such as: trains, buses and metro. name: Savor Sea Views at a Sweet Retreat with Heaving Bookshelves
summary: Stroll to hip Södermalm, then sip cooling drinks in the garden at a charming residence surrounded by lakes and trees. Flooded with light, this elegant space combines a soft, neutral color palette with pops of warm coral and patterned wallpaper.
space: Velcome to our beautiful romantic house with a lush enclosed garden and sea view! This 160 square meter private house is situated in the area Gröndal, on walking distance to hip Södermalm and close to city center. The house has three big bedrooms, all with a sea view; One master bedroom with a queen size bed, balcony and private bathroom. The other two bedrooms have one and two beds each. There is a big kitchen with all facilities and a sunny dining room, two living rooms with comfortable couches, one with a big screen TV, DVD and Apple TV. There is one more bathroom in the house equipped with a romantic bathtub.  The house has a private parking space and free WiFi. In the garden there is several seating areas for bbq, dining and relaxing. If it is a hot summer day, and you care for a swim, the big lake Mälaren is only 200 m away. The small lake Trekanten with a nice beach for the kids is also very close. The area Gröndal have fantastic parks, cafés and green areas for picnic, and outd
description: Stroll to hip Södermalm, then sip cooling drinks in the garden at a charming residence surrounded by lakes and trees. Flooded with light, this elegant space combines a soft, neutral color palette with pops of warm coral and patterned wallpaper.
neighborhood_overview: The house is nestled in greenery and water, yet Gröndal is just a short tram ride from the city center. The area is home to great parks, cafes, and green spaces for picnics and outdoor activities and there's a popular bakery a few minutes' walk away.
transit: 5 minutes walk to the trams and buses. 10 minutes from the house to shopping mall Liljeholmen, 20 minutes to Stockholm city center. You can also rent bikes in the area.
access: During your stay you will have acess to the complete house except the basement. You will have the garden on your own.
house_rules: Smoking and animals are not allowed in the house.
host_about:
I work as a researcher at the Physics Department at Stockholm University. A couple of years ago me and my family bought this fantastic house in Stockholm, located within a walking distance from popular Södermalm in Stockholm City. I love spending time with my family in our amazing garden, go for a swim in the nearby lake or take a bike ride to one of the lovely garden cafes nearby. Another of my main intrests is to take care and refine our house. Me and my family now want to give you the oppertunity to stay in our dream house. I can't think of a better way to experience the beautiful capital of Sweden. Staying in our house means that you will live in a calm and green part of Stockholm but at the same time you are just a few minutes away from Stockholm City with all it has to offer.
Looking forward to hosting you

name: Junior 1 bedroom Apartment Stockholm 2
summary: Great 1 Junior bedroom apartment (larger than a studio, smaller than a proper 1 bedroom). Newly renovated and in great location, very centrally and convenient in Stockholm. Quiet and the apartment faces out to a private park.
space: Junior 1 bedroom apartment on Kungsholmen in central Stockholm. Nice charming building with newly renovated apartment with nice furnishing. Bigger than a studio, but smaller than a proper 1 bedroom apartment, this Junior 1 bedroom apartment gives you the best of two worlds. Charming apartment with high ceilings, wooden floors and french windows. Bright and nice apartment. Fully equipped kitchen, bed area with 120 cm wide bed. Sofa-bed in livingroom. Extra-bed available. Living room with sofa, dining table, TV, Internet access and closet. Great bathroom with shower, sink and toilet. Hallway with storage unit. Nice apartment with great location in central Stockholm. Plenty of service in the area: shops, restaurants, cafes, Supermarkets and all service you can imagine. And one of Stockholm's best publich transport points: 5 of 7 underground lines passes by, so excellent public transport! A 10 minute walk across the bridge you will also find the commuter train station.

name: Quiet room in a big central flat, private bathroom
summary: This quiet room is located in the heart of Stockholm in cozy Södermalm with restaurants, shops and bars. The room has a big sofa bed, comfortable but still a sofa bed, and private bathroom. 3 minutes from the commuter train and 5 minutes from the scenic waterfront.
space: ROOM: Double sofa bed, desk, wardrobe. The bed linen and towels are included.  Private bathroom.
description: This quiet room is located in the heart of Stockholm in cozy Södermalm with restaurants, shops and bars. The room has a big sofa bed, comfortable but still a sofa bed, and private bathroom. 3 minutes from the commuter train and 5 minutes from the scenic waterfront. ROOM: Double sofa bed, desk, wardrobe. The bed linen and towels are included.  Private bathroom. The guests have private bathroom and access to the balcony, the living room and the big kitchen (fridge and pantry space but no cooking). Access to wireless broadband and Internet. SÖDERMALM: Södermalm has a lot of nice restaurants, pubs, cinemas and shopping. From the apartment it takes a few mins walk to the trendy area of SOFO and 15 mins walk to the Old town (Gamla Stan). PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: - 7 mins walk to underground Mariatorget (red line) or Medborgarplatsen (green line) and it takes then around 5 mins to get to T-centralen (central train station) - 2 mins walk to the commuter train (Stockholm Södra) and it takes then
neighborhood_overview: SÖDERMALM: Södermalm has a lot of nice restaurants, pubs, cinemas and shopping. From the apartment it takes a few mins walk to the trendy area of SOFO and 15 mins walk to the Old town (Gamla Stan).
notes: We are working weekdays. The check in must therefore be flexible. Please let us know your time of arrival so that we can plan ahead and work something out.
transit: PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: - 7 mins walk to underground Mariatorget (red line) or Medborgarplatsen (green line) and it takes then around 5 mins to get to T-centralen (central train station) - 2 mins walk to the commuter train (Stockholm Södra) and it takes then around 2 mins to get to the T-centralen (central train station) - Very convenient if you going to the Stockholm fair (Stockholmsmässan) in Älvsjö, which is located only two commuter train stops away from Södra Station. You can get the commuter train from the airport directly to Stockholm Södra which is the closest station.
access: The guests have private bathroom and access to the balcony, the living room and the big kitchen (fridge and pantry space but no cooking). Access to wireless broadband and Internet.
house_rules: *Please respect my belongings and clean up after yourself.  *No smoking inside the apartment and no pets! *In Sweden you take off your shoes inside, that rule apply in my apartment too. So leave the shoes in the hallway, please.  *No outside guests allowed.
