name: Cozy & quiet studio in a superb city location
summary: This quiet & fully furnished private studio with private facilities and necessary amenities, is part of a beautiful, historical building from the 1880s. It benefits of its own direct, private entrance. This safe and absolutely superb city centre location gives you easy access to a vast range of local restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets, pubs, museums, boutiques & Stockholm’s major department stores. My popular Airbnb has generated coverage by TimeOut in 2019 and other media publications.
space: Your private studio is on the 3rd floor, easily accessible via lift or stairs. Your studio benefits of its own direct, private entrance and it is an independent part and originally a room of my larger apartment. Facing a light and very quiet backyard, you will enjoy a quiet stay, considering this city center location. Your studio has its own, private WC and the wet room is equipped with relatively basic shower facilities, a basic water fence and shower curtain. The studio also benefits of a small kitchenette, equipped with a fridge, a microwave oven and tea- & coffee making facilities; ideal for preparing a light breakfast, heating or cooking a basic, ready meal in the microwave oven. However there are no cooking facilities such as a hob and the kitchenette is not suitable for cooking other meals than microwave oven meals. Additionally your kitchenette also includes a hanging space with hangers, an iron and ironing board, as well as a hair dryer. You will enjoy the comfort of a double
description: This quiet & fully furnished private studio with private facilities and necessary amenities, is part of a beautiful, historical building from the 1880s. It benefits of its own direct, private entrance. This safe and absolutely superb city centre location gives you easy access to a vast range of local restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets, pubs, museums, boutiques & Stockholm’s major department stores. My popular Airbnb has generated coverage by TimeOut in 2019 and other media publications. Your private studio is on the 3rd floor, easily accessible via lift or stairs. Your studio benefits of its own direct, private entrance and it is an independent part and originally a room of my larger apartment. Facing a light and very quiet backyard, you will enjoy a quiet stay, considering this city center location. Your studio has its own, private WC and the wet room is equipped with relatively basic shower facilities, a basic water fence and shower curtain. The studio also benefits of a small k
neighborhood_overview: Your private studio is located in the city area of Stockholm, also called Norrmalm. This neighbourhood is the place for affordable shopping, food and entertainment. Just a few mins away is the street Drottninggatan which offers a wide range of restaurants, boutiques, bars, cafes, pubs and department stores. Supermarkets, grocery stores and convenience shops are very nearby and just minutes away.  Approx 5 mins walk away is Hötorgshallen food hall and the colorful market on the adjacent square. Approx 10 mins walk away is NK (Nordiska kompaniet), on Hamngatan, which is a national institution when it comes to fashion & design, and the nearby MOOD Stockholm is a new mall with shopping, food, and service.  For a break from the hustle and bustle of the city center and approx 15 mins walk away from your private studio, you´ll find that Kungsträdgården is perfect for ice cream and people-watching; during spring thousands of pink cherry blossoms light up the park and when winter comes, the ice
notes: I am a retired teacher and I manage this Airbnb with help from my son Gabriel, after my late husband Karl & I used to run this private studio together. I live in the larger apartment, which your private studio is an independent part of. As your studio originally is a room of my larger apartment, you may hear me occasionally through the locked, interconnecting doors. Please remember that you’re staying in a residential house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, I will do my best to take action ASAP, but I may not be on site 24/7.
transit: This absolutely superb location is on convenient walking distance to most things to do and explore in central Stockholm and the city’s many tourist attractions. If you prefer public transport, the nearest underground station is called Rådmansgatan and it is only 2 blocks away, approx 5 mins walk from your private studio. Rådmansgatan underground station is just 2 stops away from T-Centralen (approx 4 mins underground journey), which is the main hub of the extensive public transport (SL) in Stockholm, airport coaches and Swedens national rail (SJ). As Stockholm might be a new and big city for you to get around, I will be pleased to help you find your way around and feel safe.  For an easy-to-use public transit app and mapping service, I recommend to download and use the free mobile app Citymapper.
access: You have complete access to your private studio, consisting of the main room, WC/shower as well as the kitchenette.  There is a general laundry room easily accessible on the backyard of the building, providing general communal laundry facilities for the residents. You may use this self-service, available upon request and at no extra charge. The general laundry room is equipped with washing machines, tumble dryer and a drying cabinet, detergent is provided. Booking the general laundry room in advance is required and availability is only on request basis.
interaction: As your private studio is a self contained place, you will have full privacy once you’ve checked in. I give my guests space but I am available to contact when needed, I’m only a phone call/message away. You will be able to self check-out upon your departure.
host_about: I am a retired teacher and I manage this Airbnb with help from my son Gabriel, after my late husband Karl & I used to run this private studio together. I've lived and worked in Stockholm my entire life and I love this city.

name: Beautiful central apt for 2 persons
space: We are renting out our nice one bedroom apartment on the 5th floor (has elevator) in the center of Södermalm, Stockholm. APARTMENT The room has a loft bed that fits 2 persons (120cm wide). The bed sheets and towels are included. Access to wireless broadband and Internet exist, so make sure to bring your personal computer. The kitchen is well equiped with dish-washer, fridge and freezer, microwave, waterboiler and so on. Newley renovated bathroom with small bathtub. Extra mattress can be arranged. The apartment is totally renovated in 2011 so you won't be disapointed. SÖDERMALM:  Södermalm has everything you can wich for. Nice restaurants, pubs, cinema and shopping. From the apartment it takes a few mins walk to the trendy area of SOFO and 25 mins walk to the Old town (Gamla Stan). Södra station is located four minutes from the flat and it's one stop from the Central train station. APARTMENT The room has a loft bed that fits 2 persons (120cm wide). The bed sheets and towels are included. Access to wireless broadband and Internet exist, so make sure to bring your personal computer. The kitchen is well equiped with dish-washer, fridge and freezer, microwave, waterboiler and so on. Newley renovated bathroom with small bathtub. Extra mattress can be arranged. The apartment is totally renovated in 2011 so you won't be disapointed. SÖDERMALM:  Södermalm has everything you can wich for. Nice restaurants, pubs, cinema and shopping. name: Artistic bright apt, great location
summary: This is a very light, sunny and cosy apartment in a very nice part of Södermalm. Super close to trendy shops bars and restaurants, yet on a very quiet street with a great view over riddarfjärden.
space: This is a very light, sunny and cosy apartment in a very nice part of Södermalm. Super close to trendy shops bars and restaurants, yet on a very quiet street with a great view over riddarfjärden.  The apartment has 1 bedroom with a 160cm bed, 1 kitchen that seats 3 (has dishwasher) and a living room with 2 sofas and a dining table seating 8 or functions as a great work space. There is hi speed WiFi. The apartment is in an area called Mariaberget, on Södermalm. We love living in this neighbourhood! It is close to bars and restaurants, as well as to good clothing, interior design and antique shops. The area is architecturally a kind of extension of the Old Town, "Gamla Stan", but without all the tourists. It is less homogeneous than the Old Town, with a mixture of old and new buildings representing the whole range of styles from the sixteenth to the twentieth century.  Subway is 3 min walk from the flat. Several bus lines equally as close. 2 good supermarket 3 min away that are open quit

We love living in södermalm and can give you good recomendations to food, art, music and bars! Our flat is full of stuff we love and If you work in the design field i think you could find this to be an inspiring home to live in for your stay.

name: Green & Spacious 10 min from centre
summary: A large and spacious two-room apartment located only 10 min south of central Stockholm by local commute train, comfortably near the train station and Stockholm International Fair. The apartment has 4 adult size beds, 1 smaller bed and a baby cot.
space: A large and spacious two-room apartment plus kitchen, located 10 min south of central Stockholm by local commute train and within walking distance of the Stockholm International Fair. The apartment is fully equipped for a comfortable vacation stay, including sheets and towels, a hairdryer and ironing equipment.  The kitchen seats up to 8 persons and contains a kitchen cooker, microwave and all appliances and utensils. The kitchen cabinets are stocked with all basic cooking necessities like coffee, tea, cooking oil, salt and spices.  There is a 160x200 cm double bed in the bedroom and a 90x200 cm single bed plus a sofa bed measuring 85x190 cm in the living room. An additional guest bed measuring 80x180 cm can be set up in the living room or kitchen, if separate sleeping areas are preferred. For rainy days you have cable TV and a DVD-player with a modest movie collection, plus a baby grand piano for music soirées.   The bathroom holds a full size bathtub with shower. All rooms and the pa

neighborhood_overview: Älvsjö is an old residetial area with lots of beautiful nature areas preserved, within only 10 minutes reach of the city centre by commute train. In recent years the centre of Älvsjö has started developing towards a more urban atmosphere, with many new services adding to the previous suburban small-town ones. I love having the quiet and closeness to nature, waking up to blue skies and birds' singing and going for an afternoon stroll in the woods, while still having near access to all modern services and being in swift and easy reach of the more busy and vibrant city centre!
transit: The apartment is situated within a five minute walk to Älvsjö Station, from where the local commute trains run very frequently into the centre. The travel time from Älvsjö to the South Station is 6 minutes and to the Central Station 10 minutes. Twice an hour runs a commute train from Älvsjö going all the way to Uppsala, via Arlanda Airport. Last but not least Älvsjö Station is a hub for a number of buses to the surrounding southern areas, including the red underground line trafficing Telefonplan/Fruängen and the green line trafficing Högdalen/Hagsätra.
house_rules: 1. You are NOT allowed to smoke in the apartment. There are sheltered spots both at the front and on the patio where you can smoke (if needed). 2. You MUST check that the patio door is both closed and locked. We have had cases where the door has been left open. This is a must as we value both the flat and the contents, and do not expect people to leave their front/back doors open in their own residence.
host_about:
Hi there, 

Together with my partner Keith I've had the privilege to host many wonderful travellers as well as a few chances to be a visitor myself through AirBnB. Before joining AriBnB we both used to host - and on a few occasions surf - within the nonprofit organisation Couchsurfing. 

If freely given a choice I most like playing volleyball or beach volleyball, watching films or reading books, crafting - presently I've caught the knitting bug - or making up songs to sing and play on the piano. Before moving to Peterborough, England, I've lived in various villages, towns and cities in Sweden (Luleå, Uppsala, Stockholm and Linköping), in Dublin, Ireland and in New York, USA.

name: Wonderful apt in trendy Hornstull!
summary: The perfect place for families and couples (max. two adults). Spacious and light apartment with high standard, wifi, tv, washing machine, dishwasher etc. The area is great for exploring Stockholm as well as for relaxing. Close to communications.
space: Light, spacious apartment in the best area of urban Stockholm. Very good atmosphere! 93 m2, two bedrooms and a large livingroom and kitchen. Five minutes walk to swimming, metro, buses, bars & restaurants, shops, running tracks, old cinema, cosy coffee shops, restaurants by the water, second hand shops etc.  Ecological mini-shop just outside the door, quiet street, childrens park around the corner, Italian coffee shop, brunch places and Stockholms best Indian restaurant on the street. Just a minute away from the island Långholmen, with swimming, sun bathing, nice walks and much more. You will love it! Take a walk (or the tube a few stops) and you're at the heart of Stockholm! It is not more than twenty-five minutes walking to the Royal castle and the Old town. Close by there are boats if you want to experience Stockholm from the waterside, or go to the green island of Djurgården, where you'll find The Wasa museum, Skansen, the Nordic museum and amusement park Gröna Lund. We're a family

name: Bright & cosy home. South of city.
space: Welcome to my cosy and bright home! It's a cute and clean apartment on the top floor with lots of light. Wifi. A fully equipped kitchen. A big front room with a flat screen TV and a DVD player. The bed room has a comfortable kingsize bed. And a fresh standard bathroom w. shower. My home is located in the area Telefonplan/Hökmossen, south of the city. Witn public transport (a 2 min. bus ride to the tube station Telefonplan. Then a few stops on the red line) it will take you about 20-25 min to town or 15 min to the hipp and cool area of Södermalm. If you fancy a night out in my neighborhood I highly recommend the great and cool resturant/bar Landet, situated within a 10 min walk. Free parking. Washing machin and dryer can be booked.

name: Bedroom in 1900-century apartment
summary: Välkommen till mitt hem i hjärtat av det centrala området i Stockholm som kallas "Sibirien". Jag bor här med min sambo och två barn varannan vecka. Det är i sonens rum som du kommer att bo. Lägenheten har tre sovrum och ett stort vardagsrum med öppen planlösning mot köket. Vi kommer att dela vardagsrum och toalett när du är här. Det är en väldigt mysig lägenhet med balkong och öppen spis som jag använder då och då. Fråga gärna om du undrar över något!
space: the room has a 120cm bed and is situated towards a calm patio. If you are two renting the room you sleep in the same bed. There is also a small desk and a little space for personal belongings during your stay.

name: Beautiful quiet apartment the heart of Sodermalm
space: Very beautiful flat in an old building in a calm street in the center of Södermalm.  The flat has two large rooms. A double bed in the bedroom, and a sofa bed in the living room for one (or two persons on request). Large bath tub with shower and washing mashine in the bathroom.  Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and table for four. Larger dining table in the living room.
description: Very beautiful flat in an old building in a calm street in the center of Södermalm.  The flat has two large rooms. A double bed in the bedroom, and a sofa bed in the living room for one (or two persons on request). Large bath tub with shower and washing mashine in the bathroom.  Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and table for four. Larger dining table in the living room. I will probably be travelling myself during your stay, but will be reachable at all times for questions, arrangements and support over mail, sms and What's App. Theaters, cinemas, many nice restaurants and lots of nice and original boutiques in the neighbourhood.  Several parks for strolling and relaxing and even waterfront with beach in walking distance. Closest subway station Mariatorget and train station Sodra station. Both just around the corner. Good parking opportunities in the street.

host_about:
I'm an interior architect and a designer. I have been working in the field of Architecture and design (fashion, furniture, glassware, home accessories, graphics...) all my life before going for a life change some years ago. 

I now record audio books in a studio. I also work as as an Hawaiian massage therapist and sometimes I´m designing web-sites or graphic material.

I sing, dance and perform theatre on my free time. I love going out for dinner, dancing or just meeting people. I´m happy to live in one of Stockholm's best surrondings when it comes to culture and open minded people.

name: Large and beautiful bedroom in central Södermalm.
summary: This is one of the absolute best places to stay in Stockholm!  The room is large and beautifully decorated and the building is situated in a quiet street in the busy center of Södermalm with lots of nice boutiques, restaurants and cafées just around the corner. Only ten minutes walking distance to Old Town and there is even a nice beach by the sea front just 20 minutes walk away for summer visitors.
space: Large and quiet room with double bed for two. From May 2018, there is a large balcony in the bedroom, facing the yard. Location in calm street close to the lovely park Mariatorget, in the center of Södermalm. Restaurants, cafés, and lots of nice boutiques in the neighbourhood. Parks and water front with beach in walking distance. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and dining table. Bathroom with shower.

Bathroom with shower. I'm often renting out when travelling myself. This means that even if you are just renting the bedroom, you might be private in the apartment at all times, with access to the living room
neighborhood_overview: Location in calm street close to Mariatorget, the center of Södermalm.  Many nice restaurants and lots of shopping options in the neighbourhood. Walkong distance to Old Town, Sofo, museums, piers for boat rides to the archipelago and much more... Parks and water front with great beach in 15 min walking distance.
notes: In case I'm not on a journey at the time of your booking, I will be staying in the living room (behind a screen wall at nights for privacy). It is also possible that my two sweet indoor cats will be at home if I am. Ramses will probably say "hello" and show you around, and then not bother you more, unless you invite him. Siri is the smaller cat, more shy than him.
transit: City bikes for rent five minutes away. Subway and train station just around the corner. Closest subway station is Mariatorget and nearest train station Sodra station.  Good parking opportunities in the street.
access: I'm often renting out when travelling myself. This means that even if you are just renting the bedroom, you might be private in the apartment at all times, with access to the living room and also kitchen facilities. I usually don't offer the kitchen for cooking if I am at home, unless agreed upon beforehand, but there will always be a space in the fridge for you. You will also have a tea kettle, cups and water glasses in your room.
interaction: I'm always happy to help you with tips on what to visit, how to travel, nice restaurants, what to do etc. - anything you need or wish to know during your stay.  Depending on your time of arrival, I'll be either welcoming you myself or hand you information on where to find the key to let yourselves in. You can always leave your luggage to collect later if you have a late flight home, or are arriving before check-in is possible.

name: Modern flat Urban development area
space: Our apartment is modern and spacious at the same time with a homely feeling. It has a combined living and dining area (50 sqm) (with a table for 6 people, we love to cook and host our friends. Perfect for social life and relaxing,cooking and watching tv together. In the master bedroom we have a large double bed and computer area, hi speed internet in the apartment. The childrens bedroom are devided into two sections with room for two people and a big balcony. We have two balconys, one of them is a terrace. The bathroom is spacious witha bath and washingmachine. The apartment was built in 2010 and we are the only ones that has lived here so far. Our home is beautiful and we love modern danish and Swedish design furniture at the same time we think our home is for living in not a museum, so feel at home! Welcome to Stockholm, one of the worlds most beautiful capitals. Built on 14 islands around one of Europe's largest and best-preserved medieval city centres, the Swedish capital is superb

space: Confortable home, fresh with a single but confortable bed, with big wardrobe and extra mattress on the floor if are 2 or 3 persons. Fresh home, peace and silence room with big windows than you can open, sun in the morning, Wi-Fi and good access to toileter and kitchen. Toileter is big, and the kitchen have all you need for your breakfast before you explore the city . Takes 5 minutes walk to the subway. If you plan to rest, or to party here it's your perfect choise , welcome.

notes: No smoke ! No shoes ! Clean every single thing you use in the kitchen and peek up your hair in the shower floor after .

As any other object than you used inside the house . And in check in I'll take a picture of your passport for my security , in check out I delete the picture .
interaction: Feel open for any question, I'll feel happy to help  your trip to be a grate one .
house_rules: not so many restrictions... If you are smoker...have varanda and back garden for do that. I work in the week and will sleep in the living room. i ask for not do much moviment in the living room after 22:00pm. Weekend,,,,no problems. wish for honest people and i have no preference. i also can sleep in the bedroom and rent out the rest of the house, with TV plasma 42", computer, music, play station, kitcken and all.
host_about:
Hi, the price is for rent the room but you have risk to  have the house totally private for you.... Probably I'll not be there !!
I`m fron Brasilian, live by my self enjoy the freedom and the good party of the life.
I have my son with 8 years old with me every second weekend.
I work in the week in Brasilian Ambassy and weekends i have my funny job, play music.
I play drums and vocal and make that become my second job.
I´m happy person, dont have much restrictions, just wish for nice and honest persons.
Not matters what reason you wanna come to Stockholm, in my place you will get what you want.
Peace for sleep, silence, party, its up to you.
If you are turist...will be pleasure to show around here...takes 25 minuter to the Bohemia island of Södermalm and 20 minutes to the Central station.
I have new address and don't live in pilvingegatan as the announce shows, I've tried to update location but it's not possible, I need open a new account and loose all my commentary from guests as reference to new people to stay here.
It's in oest of town, blue line of subway, Rinkeby station.
The apartment takes 5 minutes to the station and 2 minutes to night and day bus stop to central station.
It's a universal area and the most of people are from other country, that's brings small butiks with food from diferent part of the world with very ship price .
I'll try to let you feel in your home... welcome .

name: Studio in the center of Stockholm
summary: Balkong(Balconies) mot Park
space: Welcome to a centrally located studio in central Stockholm. This bright studio has space for up to two people and consist of a 120 cm wide double bed, a comfortable sofa with digital TV and WiFi Internet, a small coffee table, a kitchenette with a fridge and small stove. It also has a bathroom with shower. Plenty of space to store your clothes. More to it. It has a great view from the balcony towards 'Vanadisparken'.  Parking space is available outside. I live right next door where I have my apartment + my dogs and cats, but they won't disturb you, as the studio is private.    The location is perfect as you are within easy reach of buses, the subway, train. The Airport Shuttle leaves two blocks away.  The area has a huge selection of Restaurants, food shops and pharmacies. Stockholm School of Economics, Hard Rock Cafe, The public library, are all within walking distance.  Welcome to a clean and quiet studio in the centre of Stockholm. Addendum to my profil (ads) A newly renovated outdo

name: Cosy apt close to nature and city
summary: Cosy three room apartment in Björkhagen. We have nice furniture and a welcoming atmosphere at home. It will take you 8 min by the subway to cut center (Södermalm), yet the nature reserve of Stockholm is right outside the door.
space: Apartment for Rent in Björkhagen southern Stockhom från 1 nov 2016 - 23 jan 2017  We are going to travel and sublet our apartment during the period we are away. The apartment is located in Björkhagen and is 73 square meters spread over three rooms + kitchen and balcony. It is newly renovated and very nice.  Apartment is furnished and fully equipped. There is a washing machine and dishwasher in the kitchen. The area is very nice and family friendly. Around the corner is Nytorps Gärde with lovely walks, a out door pool, out door gym gym and direct connection to Nackareservatet. If its snows you can ski from the door straight into the woods ; )  On 15 minutes, takes you on a bike to Södermalm. (You can borrow our bike/s). With the subway, located only five minutes away, it takes 15 minutes to the Central Station. The price per month is 1600 US$ including television, broadband (wify) and electricity

name: Lovely Apt-central, calm, nice area
summary: Up to 4 weeks bookings is available for the period June-Sep, and in January.
space: A beautiful 2-room apt with a big balcony in the heart of Stockholm in the fancy area Östermalm. Close to everything you need including many of the most popular attractions. It’s furnished in a nice, coozy and modern way with newly polished wooden floor in the living-room and hallways.  BATH ROOM is newly renovated as of 24th of March 2016.   LIVING ROOM has a big dinner table (which can be extended), sofa and sofa table.   The KITCHEN was renovated 2014 and has plenty of space for cooking, and it has a open wall with a worktop facing the living room, like a ”bar”. The BED ROOM has a very comfortable bed suitable for 1-2 people. I also have a BED SOFA in the living room (see the last 2 pictures), which can be turned into a very nice and comfortable double bed for 2 people. Only 10-12 min walk to the beautiful island Djurgården where you can escape from the city and ENJOY NATURE AND THE SEA. It's also very easy to get around in Stockholm by bus, subway or by boat and they run often. Sto

notes: Note: "Check out" is most often at 11.00 at the latest, sometimes later. I have set the check-out at 10.00 in case a new guest arrive the same day as a guest check out. If laundry is needed my cleaners need to start 10.00. But this happens rarely.
transit: There is subway, buses and boats close by, so you can easily get around anywhere in Stockholm. There are also several public bicycle stations in different spots around the city which you can rent.
access: FREE INTERNET ACCESS is available in my apartment by using a portable modem. You need to bring YOUR OWN COMPUTER (laptop) and it needs to have a USB-connection.  LAUNDRY SPACE Down in the cellar. Do NOT use the laundry space if someone else is using it. Look at the sign-up list and write down your name at a time that is vacant.
interaction: Most often at arrival, and sometimes when leaving. Sometimes not at all if I'm out of town. On some rare occasions, when there is a mutual interest to hang out, I'd be happy to do that.
house_rules: HOUSE RULES CLEANING I always leave my apartment very clean for my guests. So even though I have a cleaning fee, you need to do some basic cleaning and leave the apartment in a good shape. That means: Bathroom Swipe off the worst dirt from the toilet. Kitchen Clean up all your dishes. Swipe off stains on the surfaces where you have cooked or prepared food. Garbage Throw away all your garbage outside my door through the grey round opening on the wall.    *If you want to be environmental friendly - throw away recycling garbage in  the different containers/bags under the sink - and then go around the block to the parallel street NYBROGATAN and through it away at the recycling station next to MORNINGTON HOTEL, only 4 minutes walk. Floor Swipe off spots on the floor if you have left stains on it, but you don't need to vacuum clean.  Other Swipe off possible stains from the dinner table and sofa table.   Throw all your linen and towels in the washing basket, which is inside the white, middle
host_about:
Hello dear traveller!

My name is Mathias. I'm a well-educated, curious and open minded person with a broad work history. 

I work part-time as a singer/actor at The Royal Dramatic Theater of Sweden.  
I also work with marketing for Better Globe, which offers an ethical, sustainable and lucrative investment opportunity. 

I've trained yoga for 17 years and taught for 7 years. I love to travel and meeting new people and experiencing new cultures. Besides living in Sweden, I've lived in the US (New York and LA) for 7 years and in Spain for 5 months. 

I will do my best to help you get a great stay in Stockholm. Don't hesitate to ask me if you have any questions or concerns about Stockholm or my apartment. 

All the best,
/Mathias

Ps. 
If you are interested in making your money increase with about 13%  per year in average, while at the same time making a positive impact on the world, let me know and I'll invite you to a free webinar-presentation.

name: Stockholm City- Centrally Located
summary: My cozy apartment is the perfect place while visiting our gorgeous city. It´s centrally located in a very popular area in Södermalm.  Parks, cafés and restaurants are just around the corner.  You are just a 20 minute walk away from the downtown area, the Old Town with the Royal Castle and ferry over to Djurgården where you can visit the famous Wasa Ship. You can easily connect with any area in or around Stockholm by bus or subway.  Boats for the archipelago are within walking/bus distance.
space: A bright and cozy one room apartment with bedroom/living room, kitchen and bath with a bath tub. The house is from the 40s and is neat and well kept.  Expect a nice, clean, neat and quiet place.  The flat is located in a very popular area in the southern part of downtown Stockholm. Plenty of restaurants, cafées, restaurant and bars. Cool shopping retro style and a cinema a couple of blocks down the street. A great park with outdoor theater in the summer time and our wonderful Sofia church.  5 minutes to the subway, buses around the corner and the the commuter train a 10 minute walk away.  You´ll be living in a great part of town. A 20 minute walk will take you through a shopping district down to the Old Town and the Royal Castle.  Nice walks and near to the water.

access: Since this is a small apartment you will of course have the place to yourselves.
host_about: I´m a Swedish Globetrotter from Stockholm, Sweden. How fortunate that I live in one of the most beautiful cities in the world! I love traveling and my favorite spot on earth is Bali where I´ve spent a lot of time throughout the years. I work with counseling, coaching & internet marketing. I`m realizing a vision of total freedom, where I have my office in my bag and can work any from anywhere I like. My family has a summer place in the northern archipelago of Stockholm and I spend a lot of time there. I´m blessed with two gorgeous children & two supercute grandchildren! One lives in Sydney, Australia and one lives here in Stockholm. More, I have one set of parents, still going strong at 91 and one darling little sister with family in the city of Uppsala.

name: Gorgeous apartment in 1885 building
summary: Gorgeous 3-room apartment in 1885 building. 72 sq. meters. Just a block from Katarina church and Mosebacke. Loads of restaurants and pubs nearby!
space: Gorgeous 3-room apartment in 1885 building. 72 sq. meters. Apartment is located in a great location in Södermalm, just a block to Mosebacke and Katarina church. 2 bedrooms 1 bath, huge kitchen, comfy living room. Located on the third floor (2 Tr) with a view of the building's courtyard. Very quiet location in the back 'guard' house. Light and bright apartment in an excellent location in Södermalm. Near Katarina, Mosebacke, and Götgotsbacken. 8 sets of windows! Functioning kakelugn (fireplace) in the living room.  Newly renovated bathroom with heated floors. 50" plasma television, AppleTV, Netflix, wireless internet (50 mb). Near the Medborgarplatsen (Green line) and Slussen (Green and Red lines) subway stations, as well as bus stops (Östgötagatan). Free Washer/Dryer access in the basement. Just bring some soap! 120 cm wide bed in the small bedroom. 2 x 90cm wide double bed in the large bedroom. Sofa is large enough for an adult to sleep on as well if needed. Kitchen has Nespresso machi

neighborhood_overview: Near Mosebacke and Katarina church. Also near Medborgarplatsen.
transit: Subway (Tunnelbana) stations are 100m from the apartment (Slussen and Medborgarplatsen). Bus stop (Östgötagatan) is two blocks away.
access: Apartment and laundry room in the basement across the courtyard. To book laundry use the Yellow #1 key and choose a date and time on the peg board. The peg is # 1 for the apartment.
house_rules: No pets. No smoking. Thanks!  Also, since the wood floors are painted white, it'd be great if you can remove your shoes. Swedish custom! :) Please eat at the walnut dining table for 4 (an extension under the table expands it to 6) and NOT on the white leather sofa and chairs. It is easy to stain or damage the white leather. Thanks! Garbage should be left in the green garbage bins in the building entryway. While recycling is directly across the street for cardboard, newspaper, plastics, and glass. Return your aluminum cans and plastic bottles for the pant refund at the ICA nearby. The heat is electric, so please keep consumption down by setting the thermostats to 22 C. The environment thanks you! Laundry is by reservation on the peg board. Please put away laundry baskets and clean tops of washing machine of any stray detergent when finished. Thanks!
host_about: I'm an American ex-pat living in Stockholm, Sweden the last four years. Originally from Seattle. Getting to know the birthplace of my grandmother. :-)

name: NICE ROOM ON CENTRAL SÖDERMALM
summary: My flat is perfect for couples and friends wanting to explore the city of Stockholm. Enjoy the Mariatorget Park and the views from Mariaberget. Within minutes you will find all the city has to offer; museums, shops, restaurants, bars, cafés and more.
space: Nice room in big flat located centrally on Södermalm by Mariatorget.  5 minutes walk from the Old town / Gamla stan and Slussen. The flat has a double bed and shares access to kitchen, bathroom and shower room.  Nice and airy, very centrally located. Vibrant neighborhood with lots of bars, restaurants and cafés. Near parks and within easy access to the old town and Slussen. Good area for shopping. Close to public transports, 1 minute to busses and the metro.  Modern flat with all amenities and nice and friedly host! :)
description: Nice room in big flat located centrally on Södermalm by Mariatorget.  5 minutes walk from the Old town / Gamla stan and Slussen. The flat has a double bed and shares access to kitchen, bathroom and shower room.  Nice and airy, very centrally located. Vibrant neighborhood with lots of bars, restaurants and cafés. Near parks and within easy access to the old town and Slussen. Good area for shopping. Close to public transports, 1 minute to busses and the metro.  Modern flat with all amenities and nice and friedly host! :)
notes: Hi, (INSTRUCTION MANUAL FOR GUESTS)  I look forward to meeting you in Stockholm. Upon your arrival I will be waiting for you, please send me an email with information about your arrival time at the flat.  Please send me a text message when you are close to my flat and I can come down and open the front door for you. What to when you arrive in Stockholm: From Skavsta airport take the airport coach, Flygbussarna, to the Central Station.  From Arlanda airport take the Arlanda Express train to the Central Station, alternatively you can take the airport coach to Central Station if you prefer. When you arrive at the Central Station you take a taxi to the address (please use Taxi Stockholm or Taxi Kurir, as other taxi companies will rip you off). The taxi ride is 5-10 minutes. If you prefer you can also take the red line tube to Mariatorget station (Southbound). The flat is a 5 minute walk from either exit.  Address of flat: Hornsgatan 66. 6th floor. Note: In order to get into the building yo
transit: The best transport here is always by foot. You can walk to any part of town. If you don't like walking you can take the metro (tunnelbana) or bus. Both of these options are located within 2 minutes walk from the flat.  Other options include renting a bicycle.
access: Hello, to anyone who is looking here to find an accommodation during your short trip to Stockholm.  I would like to inform you that with us you live comfortably and pleasantly, you can make morning coffee for yourselves, eat sandwiches in the kitchen, just put your things in the refrigerator and feel at home! The flat is close to most things.  I would be very grateful if you could describe yourselves a little in connection with your booking. A little info about the purpose of your trip, who you are and if you have any preferences at all. All information is helpful to make your stay in Sweden an experience worth remembering! :-)
host_about:

name: Cozy flat in central Stockholm
space: A welcoming and a comfortable design flat, within walking distance of just about all the sights in Stockholm, including The Old Town, and a short stroll from the green and tree-filled expanse of Royal Haga Park.  This cozy flat from 1883 is located in the heart of the Vasastan neighborhood, one of the city’s more pleasant enclaves. Just around the corner is Odenplan, a Stockholm hotspot for great cafes, bars and restaurants like Tranan (Traditional Swedish), Tennstopet (Traditional Swedish) and Panamé (gorgeous, easy-going French bistro).  At Odenplan you will also find the nearest subway stop and buses. Despite its central location, the area is safe, peaceful and quiet. The flat has two bedrooms: one with a queen size bed and balcony, and one with two single beds. An extra bed can be arranged. Both bedrooms face a small park. In the welcoming studio-room there is a fully equipped, modern kitchen with a dining area seating five, which leads into a relaxing and welcoming living room. Th

host_about:
I’m a positive and curious person that loves to travel and meet new people. I love spending time with my friends eating good food, talking and having fun. I work in a content agency as Business Director.

Casa Nostra - our little dream house is located just in the center of Marina di Pisa. Only 150 meters to the sea. Very quiet and secluded, but close to everything in the village. I spend my summers and holidays here with my partner Melker and all our children of 19, 16, 15, 12 and 11. 

Cozy flat - My home is centrally located in Stockholm. Just around the corner is Odenplan, a hotspot for great cafes, bars and restaurants. At Odenplan you find the nearest subway stop and buses. In summer it is easy to rent bikes there as well. Despite its central location, the area is safe, peaceful and quiet. I live here with my two sons of 15 and 12 years.

name: Old town flat with a fantastic view
summary: Welcome to our unique, bright apartment at the top of a 1600th century house in the Old Town. Here you truly stay in the middle of the history. The apartment has a stunning view, even more beautiful in real life than in the pictures. A lovely place!
space: Welcome to our unique, bright 2 room apartment at the top of a 1600th century house in the Old Town - the heart of Stockholm. You will have lots of cozy cafés, nice restaurants and small scale shopping just around the corner and other downtown parts of Stockholm you will have on walking distance. The historical centre is pedestrianized and offers very quiet surroundings. The livingroom as well as the bedroom has a stunning view over the rooftops all the way to the hills of Södermalm. Almost all summer there are bright nights where you can see the silouette of the churches and the City hall from dusk to dawn. The apartment has a small but well equipped kitchen, with all your need for cooking a nice meal, which you can enjoy at the table looking out over Stockholm. The bathroom has WC and shower with a small window facing the courtyard. The apartment is perfect for couples, two friends or a small family. The place is located 3 minutes walk from metro station Gamla stan (Old Town) or 12 m

space: This is a top quality opportunity! 100 kvm penthouse/loft, all alone on the top floor, VERY PRIVATE and quiet location with terrace, windows facing the sky including from the jacuzzi.  Spacious and open apartment with large kitchen and living room. Calm and quiet separate bedroom with double bed (Hästen Continental 180 cm). The esthetics in the apartment is a matter of the heart for me, therefor I only welcome guests with a truly gentle touch. Beauty needs to be cared for. Fully equipped machinery in all respects. An extremely bright and beautiful apartment with lots of windows, wooden floors, original beams and brick walls. Cleaning is available.

name: Lux penthouse stay: shopping, nightlife & old town
summary: Enjoy your own private room and private-use bathroom in an exclusively designed luxury penthouse apartment with us. Nice sky view from window. Easy access to shopping, cafe, nightlife, great restaurants in Götgatan Slussen, and meet trendsetters and hipsters on the Södermalm island. Exclusive recently renovated penthouse with sky view. 2 minute to subway, 5 minutes to central station, and 10 minutes to Stureplan. Walking distance to Old Town Gamla Stan, Mariatorget, Medborgarplatsen and SOFO.
space: The penthouse is located in the best location next to the famous shopping and dining street while it is quiet and with a great sky view. In the private guest room the guest can enjoy TV, laptop friendly table, multi-use designer sofa bed, and has sky view window. There is a private guest bathroom with shower and toilet. In the breakfast area the guest can enjoy nice rooftop view and access to kitchen for simple use.
description: Enjoy your own private room and private-use bathroom in an exclusively designed luxury penthouse apartment with us. Nice sky view from window. Easy access to shopping, cafe, nightlife, great restaurants in Götgatan Slussen, and meet trendsetters and hipsters on the Södermalm island. Exclusive recently renovated penthouse with sky view. 2 minute to subway, 5 minutes to central station, and 10 minutes to Stureplan. Walking distance to Old Town Gamla Stan, Mariatorget, Medborgarplatsen and SOFO. The penthouse is located in the best location next to the famous shopping and dining street while it is quiet and with a great sky view. In the private guest room the guest can enjoy TV, laptop friendly table, multi-use designer sofa bed, and has sky view window. There is a private guest bathroom with shower and toilet. In the breakfast area the guest can enjoy nice rooftop view and access to kitchen for simple use. The guests are welcome in the private room, the private use guest bathroom, and to
neighborhood_overview: Södermalm is Stockholm’s hip southern island and Götgatan is Stocholm's most pupular shopping and dining street for trendsetters and hipsters. The penthouse is located right next to Götgatan and on top of Stockholm's famous pub Oliver Twist. The old town Gamla Stan, Slussen and Mariatorget are within walking distance, Hornsgatan has more than 20 Cafés within 800 meters. Stockholm really embraces trends. Probably the coolest city in all of Scandinavia, Stockholm seems to get all the latest trends while the news is still hot in Brooklyn. All types of trends. Food, fashion—even music! This is a city of trendsetters which means it’s a city you could easily spend more than just a weekend.
notes: This is a vegetarian cooking kitchen no cooking meat in the apartment.
transit: Walking distance to Old Town, Mariatorget, Slussen, and many nice locations in Stockholm. For public transportation, subway is the most convenient. The penthouse is closely located to Slussen station and within 2 minutes you can go to the Götgatan entrance in Slussen Subway station. 5 minutes to Stockholm central station.
access: The guests are welcome in the private room, the private use guest bathroom, and to use breakfast area. Hallway is also public. Simple use of kitchen is ok.
interaction: Most of the time there will be someone available to assist guest, telephone available.
host_about:
We are a couple had lived abroad in USA and love travelling around the world meeting new friends. Being a business consultant and a system architect ourselves, we had lived in many luxury hotels before and want to offer our guests a private room inside a modern, stylish penthouse for a nice stay feel like in a lux hotel. 

We are
Swedish vikings
Entrepreneurial doers
Business aficionado
Vegetarian / herbivores
Movie potatos

name: Lovely stay in Stockholm Sodermalm
space: Welcome to our cozy apartment on lovely Södermalm in Stockholm. The apartment is located in the trendy SoFo area (South of Folkungagatan) wich means you have great shopping, nice restaurants, cafes and pubs just around the corner.  Our apartment is on the 4th floor of a beautiful house built in the 1920's overlooking rooftops and the tower of the Sofia church. We have two spacious rooms: a kitchen/dining area + a living room/bedroom. The newly renovated kitchen is equipped with all necessary utensils, if you like to cook we have just about everything including a dishwasher. There are bus stops just outside the building and only 500 meters to skanstull subway station.  The old town is a 25 minute walk away and another ten minutes takes you to the city centre and central station We provide towels and linen if needed as well as free wi-fi. When we meet to hand over the keys we gladly help you with questions about your stay in Stockholm. If you’re going to celebrate New Year’s Eve in the c

host_about:
I am 35 years old and I work as a pre school teacher. I enjoy a good book and I love all kinds of music.
Vietnam is one of my favourite destinations. In Europe I would have to say Paris.
I share the apartment with my girlfriend Minna.

Welcome to Sweden, Stockholm and our home.

//Sincerely Calle and Minna

name: Apartment for six with a terrace!
summary: Cozy three room apartment with terrace on fine Hägerstensåsen; an idyllic, up and coming area south of central Stockholm. 2 bedrooms space for a party of six. 3 minutes walk to the subway and a 15 minutes ride to the center.
space: Cozy two bedroom apartment with a terrace in fine Hägerstensåsen; an idyllic, up and coming area south of central Stockholm. The apartment, has 2 bedrooms, can take as many as six people and still be comfortable. It has a large social kitchen, with a table that easily fits 6 people. The bathroom has a tub and washing machine. The larger bedroom has a 160 cm bed and one smaller has a 120 cm bed. There are also two sleeping arrangements in the living room. One person can sleep in the very comfortable sofa and one person will dwell in an as comfortable folded bed (which is 85 cm wide). Thus, the apartment can hold 6 people only if two people share each of the bedrooms. Nice and cozy :) I will gladly give tips on things to do both in Stockholm and in the area around Hägersten.
description: Cozy three room apartment with terrace on fine Hägerstensåsen; an idyllic, up and coming area south of central Stockholm. 2 bedrooms space for a party of six. 3 minutes walk to the subway and a 15 minutes ride to the center. neighborhood_overview: The area offers lots of cozy cafes, restaurants and vintage shops around Telefonplan (just 7 min away by foot), where the College of Arts is located. The grocery store is just 150 m away and it is open 9 am to 9 pm every day of the week.
notes: Are you arriving to Arlanda Airport?  From Arlanda airport you have two options. Pricy and fast:  You either take the express train. The prices depends on if you buy one or two ways, but they have good deals during the weekends and if you travel in a group. (20 minutes) (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Cheaper and slower:  Or the buses (105 SEK and 45 minutes) (Website hidden by Airbnb)  When you get to the center yake the red subway line south, towards Fruängen. Get off at Hägerstensåsen, which is 9 stops from the T-Centralen station (the very center of Stockholm).  Get off the platform at the back of the train. When you exit the station building, take a right and go up a few stairs, which are just 10 m away. Go up the stairs and take a left. You are now standing on Sedelvägen, walk straight ahead for about 3 minutes to the number 14. On your way there you should pass a café on your left and cross a street called Sparbanksvägen.
transit: Its location is only a 3 minuts walk from the subway (T-Hägerstensåsen), which in only 7 minutes takes you to the nicest part of Stockholm - Södermalm. Another 6 minutes and you are at the Central Station. The area is very child friendly with a play yard just outside the door, and the building is on a dead end street.  Plan your trip with public transportation: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  The parking on the street is free 24/7 and the area is quite and safe to leave the car on the street.
access: Internet: Moas internet Password: welcome to stockholm  (Please note that there is spaces between the words in the password.)
interaction: I am always available during the stay for questions and I am happy to give my best Stockholm tips!
house_rules: Please leave the place as you wish to find it, think of it as you're staying at an acquaintance's place.  Please, no smoking indoors. And please respect the neighbors - no loud music or partying in the apartment or outside on the terrace. The area is full of families with small children. Also, no pets please. The garbage can be thrown at number 18 in the same yard, on the wall there is a round hatch to throw the garbage bag in.
host_about:
Hi!
My name is Moa and live in Stockholm with my daughter Samira, 11 years old and my son Lou, 4 years old. I enjoy dancing and have been doing that for almost all my life. I prefer salsa and house, but pretty much anything goes, give me a rhythm and I'll move. I spend my days as digital project manager at a Swedish retail company.

summary: This apartment is part of our Hostel property.Please note that we have two six-bedded apartments (subect to availability at the time) - each apartment has comfy bunk beds, lockers, kitchen,private (Website hidden by Airbnb) short, a perfect choice for a family or a bunch of friends.Please ask at the time of booking which apartment is available. (*You can see the photos of both apartments). Bed-linen and towels are not included in the accommodation price. You  can hire bedlinen for 25kr/ towels 10kr per person.
space: The six bedded apartment have comfy bunk beds fully equipped kitchen, private bathroom, laundry room, and even a private sauna. In short, a perfect choice for the family or a group of friends, and want to cut costs by cooking your own meals. High speed wifi is also included in the price. Bed linen is not included in the price. It is obligatory to borrow from us. Costs 25 SEK per person (one time cost for the whole duration of stay). Possible to borrow towel too. Combo price with bed linen is 35 SEK per person.  Please note - Smoking is not permitted in the apartment building.

access: High speed wifi is also included in the price. There is a café that serves breakfast next to the apartment.
interaction: If you need help with anything, you can always contact me.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment. Please make sure you have taken away the rubbish when you check out. Check out is at 10am on the day that you are leaving. I have a luggage room where you could store your travel bags if you are catching a flight/train at a later time the same day.
amenities: {Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Heating,"Family/kid friendly","Smoke detector"}

name: Room near forest park, 300 meter from the subway!
summary: 1 room in a friendly, 3 rooms apartment. 200 meters from Sätra nature park and 500 m to the sandy beach of Mälarhöjdens bad. 400 m to Bredäng metro station. 18 min to City center. I am regularly renting out two rooms.  We'd love to host you here.
space: A furnished room for rent in Bredäng available to friendly non-smokers. The photos of the rooms are slightly outdated (awaiting AirBnB photographer any day now).  We had to change the rooms because of the popular demand for having two single beds that can be put together or separated at will. Quiet area near Bredäng (Broad Meadow) camping and hostel. Just opposite the nature reserve and the Mälarhöjden beach. 3 minutes walking distance to Bredängs metro. Access to bathroom and kitchen and laundry.  Wi-Fi Internet in the room. (even our laptop can be borrowed sometimes). Nature-gym, sandy beach, the lake and mini-golf at 5 minutes walking distance. From the beach take the boat straight to the City Hall and the Royal Palace or Drottingholm. Two bicycles are included in the rent. Parking nearby. Call Michael on: + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

notes: Me and my friendly wife live in our room. In the third room lives my long term tenant, a kind, well educated and well brought up young person.

access: Room, Kitchen, bathroom, WC, laundry room.
interaction: Not much, depending on needs.

host_about: My husband and I are a very down to the ground hosts. We expect agreements to be respected and we do our utmost to respect them. We know that well-being of our guests is essential for our well being in our 3 room apartment, and in our other listings, so we try our best to make all of us feel good and at home here.

name: Best apartment Odenplan
space: Great 1-bedroom apartment right in the center of the beautiful Vasastan neighborhood. Walking distance to the center of town, close to both subway and Airport coaches, and to top it of you'll get two cards for the Stockholm Citybikes bicycle service Two blocks from Odenplan subway station. Airport bus from Stockholm Arlanda stops less than 3 minute walk, from there 40 mins to the airport. Central train station is 20 minute walk away as well (25 if snowing :)). Very central location, but not too central ;) Walking distance to just about any sight in Stockholm. Two supermarkets and a 7-eleven within two blocks. --- It has --- • 37 sq m  • Sleeping corner separated by curtains • Big living room with a big sofa and a huge 46" flatscreen TV • Fully equipped kitchen, including dishwasher and microwave • Balcony (for having an outdoors drink, relaxing, smoking, etc) • Bathroom with heated floors. Hair dryer (no need to bring!) • 100 Mbit WiFi • Extra electric heater for the really cold winter
description: Great 1-bedroom apartment right in the center of the beautiful Vasastan neighborhood. Walking distance to the center of town, close to both subway and Airport coaches, and to top it of you'll get two cards for the Stockholm Citybikes bicycle service Two blocks from Odenplan subway station. Airport bus from Stockholm Arlanda stops less than 3 minute walk, from there 40 mins to the airport. Central train station is 20 minute walk away as well (25 if snowing :)). Very central location, but not too central ;) Walking distance to just about any sight in Stockholm. Hair dryer (no need to bring!) • 100 Mbit WiFi • Extra electric heater for the really cold winter
house_rules: Please leave the apartment in the same condition as you found it! I'm not charging you a cleaning fee, but rather expect people to clean up a little bit after themselves (just common sense stuff). No smoking and pets indoors please (the spacious balcony is great for smoking) No children. Consider neighbors regarding music volume and noise, especially on sundays and week-days after 10 pm. No parties and excessive drinking. You are of course welcome to invite 1-2 friends over for dinner or a casual glass of wine Greatly appreciated - please remove your shoes at the entrance before entering the apartment, especially in the winter - this is standard procedure in Sweden
host_about:
Web type guy, currently working hard on a new startup.

Like to travel and to meet people. 

As a host I generally get out of your way as much as possible, but if you want suggestions about Stockholm sweet spots I'm sure I could recommend some nice places. 

When I travel myself I prefer to see not the equivalent of old buildings and statues and eiffel towers, but rather some nice bars or cafés or just plain nice neighborhoods to walk around in and explore.

name: Villa in quiet green neighborhood close to city
summary: 15 minutes to Stockholm city by metro. Modern fully equipped house in exclusive area close to the Mälaren sea. Walking distance 800m to Metro and 1000m to lake Mälaren. Grocery stores 600m walk. Free parking outside the house. 200m to a large playground for kids including a soccer field and basket court and various slides etc very popular with kids in the area.
space: The 100 square meter villa is situated close to the sea and only a 15 minutes ride by subway (800m from the villa) to Stockholm city center. The villa has 3 bathrooms, wifi, flatscreen 42" tv, fully equipped laundry room, 2 terraces and a big green garden and car parking. On walking distance there are local grocery stores, bank, pharmacy etc. There are several local beaches for swimming, ability to jump aboard the waxholms boat ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) to either Stockholm city or the royal summer residence of the king and queen at Drottningholm (Website hidden by Airbnb)  My wife speak spanish if you want to contact us.
description: 15 minutes to Stockholm city by metro. Modern fully equipped house in exclusive area close to the Mälaren sea. Walking distance 800m to Metro and 1000m to lake Mälaren. Grocery stores 600m walk. Free parking outside the house. 200m to a large playground for kids including a soccer field and basket court and various slides etc very popular with kids in the area. The 100 square meter villa is situated close to the sea and only a 15 minutes ride by subway (800m from the villa) to Stockholm city center. The villa has 3 bathrooms, wifi, flatscreen 42" tv, fully equipped laundry room, 2 terraces and a big green garden and car parking. On walking distance there are local grocery stores, bank, pharmacy etc. There are several local beaches for swimming, ability to jump aboard the waxholms boat ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) to either Stockholm city or the royal summer residence of the king and queen at Drottningholm (Website hidden by Airbnb)  My wife speak spanish if you want to contact us. Sono
neighborhood_overview: Its close to the city but very green quiet area close to water and outdoor activities. The area is serviced by tube and boat if you want to go in to Stockholm City
notes: Take the boat to Birka, go to the city, go shopping at Kungens kurva, walk to the sea front and have a coffee at any of the seafront cafes, go for a jog by the sea, do some exercise at any of the several outdoor gyms, go for a swim,  relax at on of the several beaches at walking distance
transit: Metro 800m, Commuter boats to city 1000m, Busses 600m, walking by the sea to city 10k, car to city 10 minutes
access: Sonos stereo, WIFI, Washing machine, Dryer, Xbox, TV,  dish washer etc
interaction: Im available on phone and email 24/7
house_rules: We do only rent out to 100% verified guests with multiple positive previous AIRBNB referrals. No pets and no smoking allowed. If you use any vine or borrow any other groceries please feel free but please replace it before you check out.
host_about: Jag kommer ifrån Stockholm, jag gillar skidåkning och friluftsliv. Jag umgås mycket med min familj och åker gärna motorcykel på min fritid. Jag arbetar som säljchef på ett stort internationellt konsultbolag.

name: Central studio apartment top floor
space: A small and convenient apartment in the very centre of the city. Close to everything, Metro and several buses across the street. Plenty of shops and restaurants in the neighbourhood. The apartment is ideal for one person but if you’re comfortable in a 1.40 bed it will also work for two persons. The kitchen has a fridge, refrigerator, dish washer, stove but no microwave. There is a TV and there’s wifi. There’s no washing machine in the apartment but it’s available in the property. You will be close to everything during your stay on the roof tops of Stockholm!
description: A small and convenient apartment in the very centre of the city. Close to everything, Metro and several buses across the street. Plenty of shops and restaurants in the neighbourhood. The apartment is ideal for one person but if you’re comfortable in a 1.40 bed it will also work for two persons. The kitchen has a fridge, refrigerator, dish washer, stove but no microwave. There is a TV and there’s wifi. There’s no washing machine in the apartment but it’s available in the property. You will be close to everything during your stay on the roof tops of Stockholm!
host_about:
Mitt hem är en perfekt utgångspunkt för att jag ska kunna resa mycket och ofta. Det ligger nära alla slags transporter och där finns det som är nödvändigt för mig; ett generöst bord, en full bokhylla, en skön säng och ett minikök som har allt som behövs för att kunna göra en vegetarisk måltid.

Jag har varit på många platser i världen men numera reser jag ofta till Sydafrika på lite längre tid eller till storstäderna i Europa på kortare tid. Det var alltför länge sedan jag var i Nordamerika och Japan har jag fortfarande kvar att upptäcka.

name: Cozy Apartment Near Södermalm/Globe
summary: This is a very cozy one bedrooms apartment with two beds. It's 35m2 and has a full kitchen. It's about 5 min walk to the huge Globe of Stockholm. And also 5 min to the metrostation Gullmarsplan or Globen.  When you reach this apartment you will have all you need infront of you! You are welcome to ask any questions :)

Leave the apartment as it was when you arrived.

name: Nice room close to Stockholm Fair & Center
summary: Nice couch in friendly neighborhood. Closeby to Stockholms Mässan/Stockholm fair, commuter trains to Arlanda and trains to Stockholm City.  If I am free I can show you Stockholm trough a Swedes eyes.
space: 25min to T-centralen with Metro where you can find anything your looking for, from shopping, sightseeing to good food places. 300 meters from the apartment it is the center of Hagsätra where you have the subway, cheap grossary stores, A Sushi, Pharmacy, Postoffice, Burgerplace, Restaurant and a café.. Last minute guests welcome, no hidden costs. Immediate response on requests.  THE APARTMENT (shared) Livingroom with sofa (where you’ll be sleeping) Kitchen with a kitchentable with 2 seats. Bathroom. Small Toilett room.  INCLUDED Towels and bed linen. Ironing board Hairdryer, Flat iron Wireless internet high speed connection. (Password will be given on arrival) Kitchen/fridge accessible with own shelfs. (I can cook If I am home). Kids of all ages welcome Washer & dryer (subject to booking). Outdoor public swimming pool (Only in the summer) 5-10 min walk. The apartment is total 83 sm. PARKING Parking in the area are free on some days, if you come by car, please check all the signs.
description: Nice couch in friendly neighborhood. Closeby to Stockholms Mässan/Stockholm fair, commuter trains to Arlanda and trains to Stockholm City.  If I am free I can show you Stockholm trough a Swedes eyes. 25min to T-centralen with Metro where you can find anything your looking for, from shopping, sightseeing to good food places. 300 meters from the apartment it is the center of Hagsätra where you have the subway, cheap grossary stores, A Sushi, Pharmacy, Postoffice, Burgerplace, Restaurant and a café.. Last minute guests welcome, no hidden costs. Immediate response on requests.  THE APARTMENT (shared) Livingroom with sofa (where you’ll be sleeping) Kitchen with a kitchentable with 2 seats. Bathroom. Small Toilett room.  INCLUDED Towels and bed linen. Ironing board Hairdryer, Flat iron Wireless internet high speed connection. (Password will be given on arrival) Kitchen/fridge accessible with own shelfs. (I can cook If I am home). Kids of all ages welcome Washer & dryer (subject to booking).
neighborhood_overview: The atmosphere with the people who lives there. During the summer the whole area bloms and people hang by the pool. Hagsätra is located 25 minutes by metro from the City center of Stockholm.
transit: 5-10 min walk (depending how fast or slow you walk) to the Center of Hagsätra where you have the subway. Hagsätra is located 25 minutes by metro from the City center of Stockholm.
access: You will have shared access to the livingroom, kitchen, toilet and bathroom and your bedroom.
interaction: I usually invite my guest's to all the event's I'm either hosting or attending. So if it's your first time in Stockholm, Sweden, I would love to host you and tell you all you need to see and know :)
house_rules: The room should be as clean as when you came.  No stuff left behind.  If you stay a long period then the household will be cleaned together. As this is a household there should not be loud sounds after 22:00 (10pm), this also includes taking long showers.
host_about:
I'm a really nice person and as my airbnbguest who all of them has become friends of mine say, I should open an full time hostel because of my hospitality. 

I love to travel and to get to know new people but right now I focus on my startup YouViaMe. So Airbnb is the perfect match, because I get to hear amazing travelstories and get to know amazing people in my own apartment. 

Would love to host you as well. :)

name: Super centric attic at Stureplan
summary: Top notch apartment on top floor in the middle of the business district, literally a stone's throw from Stureplan, close to a great amount of restaurants, shops, bars, clubs and whatnot and yet almost soundproof due to lying on a side street. Not suitable for kids/babies.
space: Elegant apartment in top of building, in the middle of the business district, literally a stone's throw from Stureplan, close to a great amount of restaurants, shops, bars, clubs and whatnot and yet almost soundproof due to being situated on a side street. It is tastefully furnished, attic level, studio style with lot's of free space, newly built, 40 sqm in the hot spot of the city. The apartment is situated perfectly, less than 100 meters from Stureplan with easy access to the subway, buses, boats, parks (Djurgården & Humlegården), 24/7 supermarkets, cafés, take-away food places, shopping, restaurants, bars and night clubs. You can't live more centric than this! It's the perfect place for you who want to live close to the venues. And if you don't like to party -don't worry, the apartment is high up and the windows are well insulated so you won't hear a thing from the people on the street at night. The bed has been replaced with IKEAs "Friheten" -a spacious, easy-to-use and comfy corne

neighborhood_overview: It's casually posh. Good taste all over the place. For those of you who seek quality in…well, everything.
notes: I am pretty sure that you can't be better centered in Stockholm than this.
transit: Everywhere.
access: Everything that isn't stowed away :)
house_rules: No kids, no pets. If you smoke in the apartment, keep both windows wide open until the smell is gone. On Friday+Saturday it's ok to play music loud until midnight, on other days until 10PM. It's a deal I made with my neighbor after he had tolerated 7 months of nightly, loud, long DJ-sessions. Until he showed up at my doorstep, I was convinced that I was the only one living here. So, let's give the guy a break :) What else? Have super-fun, don't break anything and leave the apartment as you found it.
host_about: I have an endless love for the good life and I live it almost everyday. Good music, good thinking, good vibes.

name: Charming, rural apt near Södermalm
summary: NB. Not for people with cat allergies. At least one person must be of 25 years of age.  Make sure you understand the Airbnb concept before you book. Cosy and quiet area with good communications. Direct bus line, Flygbussarna, from Arlanda to Liljeholmen which is the closest connection point. No hassle around the central station to find right metro line when you arrive is needed. You have everything you need in the apartment and about 15 minutes walk to a nice bathing spot in the lake Mälaren.
space: * Look out for great last minute deals * Close to communications but not in the middle of "the busy city boiling pot" * Grove as your nearest neighbor, no transparency * Porch * Nice and clean * I sometimes take care of my neighbors cat so I can guarantee that all the hairs are gone. But its not a "hairy" place, its clean! This apartment has a sofa which you can easy sleep two persons, 160cm, its even possible to sleep two in the bed (120cm) it depends on how much comfort you need.  To stay at my apartment means that you will have a rural feeling but still be very close to the city center. Stockholm is a city with lots of parks and green areas and you only have to ride the metro 15 minutes from the city centre and you're at my lovely place. If you're lucky, you'll spot the deers wandering around in the small grove just outside the window!  The building is from 1942 and my apartment is cosy decorated in a mix of new and classic vintage swedish style. Hardwood floors, spacious kitchen an

notes: In Sweden its perfectly safe to drink the tap water. Its clean and taste good! My neighbors cat sometimes visits so if you're allergic my place is probably not a good idea for your stay. I put my time and honor in making your stay as good as possible. When you write me I will answer you as soon as I can, and I expect the same from you. Its my dear home your'e staying in and communication is the key, it feels more safe and good for us both! Its better if you write me several times than keep all of your questions until the last minute. The preparations often takes time and I usually start days before you arrive.
transit: The apartment is situated in Hägersten, with both Metro and busses near by. You have two options, two Metro stations (Telefonplan and Örnsberg) about 5 minutes walk. The bus stop is just across the street. As I mentioned, 15 minutes to Stockholm City and only 7 minutes to the cosy area Södermalm which is an area quite popular among creative people where restaurants, cafes, bars and vintage shops.
access: Size: 1.5 room, 38 sqm plus an 18 sqm porch.  Internet: Yes (100 mbps, wireless)  Beds: One 120cm bed and a sofa suitable for 2 persons.  Bed linens, pillows and blankets: Yes. Towels: Yes Full kitchen, gas stove, dishwasher, microwave, Sodastream, espresso machine ect. Feel free to use what you need.
interaction: Always connected online. Ask me anything and I'll try to help.
house_rules: - No smoking in the apartment please! Use the porch or courtyard if you want to smoke. - After you visited my apartment, please make sure that you leave the place in the same condition as it were when you arrived. - You may use the kitchen to cook in and store your own food in the fridge. - Do not use shoes indoor. - Keep your voice/music down between 11pm-07am every day. - No animals allowed in the apartment. - Please water my plants
host_about:
Im a 37 year old swedish woman from Piteå in the north of Sweden. I have lived in Oslo, Paris and Los Angeles but now I'm back in my home country. I'm all about honesty, respect and cleanliness. You will find my apartment nice and fresh and I want you to take care of it while you're staying there. I will also help you with where to go, what to see and eat here in Stockholm, if you need advice of course. 
Im interested in culture, I love going to concerts, shows, exhibitions and so on.
My profession is a TV post production editor and I work freelance. Sometimes I'm also on the road shooting TV-series or documentaries. I'm very interested in photography and real stories from people all around the world. So at my place, despite religion or color, every friendly soul is welcome!

Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. I'm a social media "junkie" so it won't take long for you to get a reply.

All the best!

/Viveka

name: Stockholm 2 bedrooms 52 sqm
summary: Charming and bright apartment in the heart of Södermalm with a balcony from where you can enjoy the sunset. Cosy and comfortable with walking distance to all the best places in Stockholm. The subway is only a few minutes away and the are is great for walking and biking as well.
space: THE APARTMENT  The apartment in old style buildt in 1930 is 52 squarmeters in a calm area. The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 livingroom, a kitchen and one bathroom with shower and a nice balcony with afternoon and evening sun. The apartment is on Södermalm, in the central of Stockholm close to public transportations and shopping. There is one bedroom with a dubble bed and a singel bed (sofa) in the living room suitable for one person. You have WIFI, TV and hifi system. In the kitchen there is a dishwasher.  Towels and bedsheets are included.  PUBLIC TRANSPORT  It's easy to get to the apartment: it's a 4 min walk to the subway Skanstull but there is also a bus thats takes a minute or two. Or take a 7 min walk to the Commuting train station Stockholm Södra Station, one stop from the Central Station, south of the city center. THE AREA  The town is surrounded by water and you can easily travel around the city with buss, metro and boats. Södermalm is a vibrant part of Stockholm and one of many

name: Studio in city center
summary: I only invite guests on airbnb when I travel myself. This means this listing is an actual home and not the typical Airbnb skeletton. My ambition is that my guests can bring as little luggage as possible and for that reason the apartment is well equipped, se list below.
space: The apartment has  2 bikes that you can borrow for free 10 MB broadband and WiFi electricity,  heating and warm water included 50 inch TV,  stereo, 140-cm bed,  a big sofa (perfect to sleep on), fully equipped kitchen. bathroom with shower, toilet and zink. Free access to laundry room in the basement.  Hair dryer Tops for ears  Top pads for make up removal  Ear plugs You do not hear the neighbours. The apartment is 7 min walk from metro (red line), 5 min from bus (blue line no 4, goes across the city). The street is slipgatan, area is Hornstull, which is in Söder (South), which is the young and hipster part of Stockholm. Very gay friendly area. Quiet street (no traffic), close to water (where you can do cajak, swim) and to the very popular bar street "Strand" (many cool Berlin-like bars). There is a cafe in the same building with good prices. There is a small supermarket just across the street and a big one that is cheap 10 minutes walk.

name: Great location 5 minutes to city center
summary: Fully equipt apartment in a very nice neighbourhood 5 minutes to city center with world class shopping, restaurants, clubs. Also a short walk away from Kungliga Djurgården national park, breathtaking nature.
space: Welcome to a central located 40 square meter studio apartment with a combined living room/bed room, kitchen and bathroom. Sleep comfortably in the king size bed suitable for 2 people. In case of a rainy day, there's a big TV and sofa in the living room. Fully equipped kitchen with stove, oven, microwave. Bathroom with shower and bath. The surrounding area offers restaurants, gym, shopping mall Fältöversten within a few minutes walk. If you want to go for a walk, I highly recommend beautiful Stockholm's national park Djurgården which is close nearby. Subway Stadion and Karlaplan and buses 1 and 4 are only a few minutes walk from the apartment. Famous Stureplan with high class shopping and restaurants is within walking distance. Stockholm Central is 5 minutes away by 2 stops with the subway. This apartment is good if you are looking for a quiet place close to nature and at the same time be within walking distance to central Stockholm with everything this great city has to offer.

name: 19th century apt w/patio Stockholm
summary: A charming 3 room apartment with its own patio in Kungsholmen a few minutes walk away from the downtown of Stockholm, Sweden. You will love this oasis in the middle of Stockholm!
space: A charming 3 room apartment with its own patio in Kungsholmen a few minutes walk away from the downtown of Stockholm, Sweden. At Fridhemsplan, right by the Kronoberg's park and a stone's throw away from Västermalmsgallerian shopping center and the romantic beach walk on Norrmälarstrand by Lake Mälaren, this fantastic apartment is found on a quiet cul-de-sac. The apartment has three rooms and a kitchen. The nice quiet bedroom, the cosy living room and the smaller home office all have big windows and hardwood floors.  The well equipped kitchen opens up into a lush private patio in the back of the building. A large fridge/freezer, a stove with a multifunctional oven and a ceramic stove top, two different espresso machines, a couple of food processors and many other kitchen things will make it a culinary stay. The bedroom has a new king size bed and ample closet space, the bathroom has a standing shower and a heated floor. The living room has a large sofa, where one person can sleep and a
