access: You will have access to a nice and cosy patio where you can BBQ and enjoy a nice meal.  A fully equiped kitchen. A state of the art entertainment center. One king size bed and two fold out beds.
interaction: We are probably out of town travelling our selves but when staying at our place you can get a hold of us at any time. And we will be happy to help you and recommend everything that Stockholm has to offer.
house_rules: We would like you to not smoke in our apartment, but you can of course smoke on the patio as long as it won't disturb the neighbors.  It would also be appreciated if you didn't let your pet stay here.  We would be very thankful if you would be careful with the hardwood floors.  There are two entrances to the building and you can use both, but please see to it that they close and lock when you are entering or leaving. If using the bicycle please make sure to put it back in the stall.
host_location: Stockholm, Stockholm County, Kingdom of Sweden
host_about:
We are a couple in the mid-40's that recently bought a miniture dachshund. We have a background in the entertainment industry and we love to travel a lot. On our trips around the world we have often used Airbnb and have been very pleased every time. Now we thought that we would try to rent our wonderful apartment to people who would like to get the know Stockholm, Sweden. 
We can help you with tips and ideas for your stay in this lovely city, the Venice of the North, called Stockholm.
Don't hesitate to contact us for inquires, dates or anything else that you might have questions about.

We know you will like Stockholm and we can guarantee that you will love our apartment!

Suzanne & Ollie

neighborhood_overview: Great neighborhood with lots of history and old buildings. Some great locations nearby is Hagaparken which is a vast and popular nature area, with large parks, lakes, woods and gardens. Within the park is Haga Palace, where Crown Princess Victoria reside. Other great areas is Rörstrandsgatan with many restaurants and bars, the street is closed off for cars during summer making it even more cozy.
notes: No use of outdoor shoes in the apartment. No smoking inside the apartment
transit: Quiet street but still close to everything, and it is easy to get around Stockholm with either subway or by bus. - Buses around the corner - Short walk to St:Eriksplan subway station - Airport bus around the corner
access: Entire apartment is accessible. Storage areas and wardrobe is occupied with my stuff, I have lots of books, read one! Large TV and great audio system for use, possible to connect computer with HDMI cable.
interaction: Since I am mostly abroad a friend of mine is available for keys, questions and information about the apartment upon arrival. This will be coordinated and outlined before arrival to fit with your travel plans.
house_rules: No special rules only common sense.
host_about:
Hi there, 

My name is Alexander Darin Mattsson. I'm letting my apartment when I travel. The reason I'm doing it is because I like to book through Airbnb myself and I thought I should return the favor. 

I'm working as a researcher at Karolinska Institutet (a Swedish medical university) and many of my travels are work related. However, I also enjoy travelling on my spare time. Since I'm only letting my apartment when I'm travelling I will not meet you in person, most often it is my good friend and colleagueJohan that will meet you. 

Feel free to ask anything. I hope i will hear from you and I'm sure you will enyoj staying at my place.

Best wishes, 
Alex

name: Cosy home 15 min from Stockholm C
summary: Welcome to this nice and cosy, fully equipped, apartment in Hägerstensåsen, just south of Stockholm! Only 2 min walk to the metro station. 15 min on the metro and you are in central Stockholm. Nice surroundings and 10 min walk to lake Mälaren.
space: Nice, clean, light and cosy apartment south of Stockholm City with space enough for 3 persons.  53 sqm - two rooms, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with shower and bath tub. Balcony with a nice view.
description: Welcome to this nice and cosy, fully equipped, apartment in Hägerstensåsen, just south of Stockholm! Only 2 min walk to the metro station. 15 min on the metro and you are in central Stockholm. Nice surroundings and 10 min walk to lake Mälaren. Nice, clean, light and cosy apartment south of Stockholm City with space enough for 3 persons.  53 sqm - two rooms, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with shower and bath tub. Balcony with a nice view. You will have full access to the apartment.  Free wi-fi, TV, blender, food processor, dishwasher, coffee maker, hair-dryer, micro-wave oven, iron etc. Comfortable double bed (140 cm) and if needed, an extra mattress to put on the floor.  If you tell me in advance, there is a common laundry room that you can book and use, situated in the same building. The laundry room has washing machines, tumble dryer and drying cupboard. This is my home and I rent it only when I'm away on business or holiday, so you will have the place all by yourself if you st
neighborhood_overview: A quiet and nice neighborhood with close access to the city.  Nature is just around the corner - if you walk 10 min you reach the beautiful area of Vinterviken, by lake Mälaren.  There is a nice grocery store in 5 min walking distance. There are some restaurants (greek food, indian food, thai food, pizza, café) within walking distance from the apartment. Close you'll also find a public baths, with swimming pool, sauna and gym.
notes: Bed linen and towels are provided. Breakfast is not included.  For a short stay, I will not take away any of my personal stuff nor empty the closets etc.
transit: 2 min walk to the metro station Hägerstensåsen. 15 min travel with metro to Stockholm Central.
access: You will have full access to the apartment.  Free wi-fi, TV, blender, food processor, dishwasher, coffee maker, hair-dryer, micro-wave oven, iron etc. Comfortable double bed (140 cm) and if needed, an extra mattress to put on the floor.  If you tell me in advance, there is a common laundry room that you can book and use, situated in the same building. The laundry room has washing machines, tumble dryer and drying cupboard.
interaction: This is my home and I rent it only when I'm away on business or holiday, so you will have the place all by yourself if you stay here.
house_rules: I expect you to treat my home with respect and care.  When you leave the apartment, please put the beddings and towels in a pile on the floor.  I don’t charge extra for cleaning, so please leave the place as you found it. If you prefer not doing the vacuum-cleaning etc, you can pay 200 SEK in cash and leave it upon departure. In any case, please do the dishes and take out the trash as a minimum. Bins for garbage are placed outside the building.  When you leave, please lock the apartment door and throw the keys through the postbox in the door.
host_about: Hi, I am Christina! I am a musician, artisan, project manager, florist and life explorer who loves to spend time in nature and travel the world. I appreciate beauty, deep friendship and a nice cup of coffee with oat milk. Fireplaces makes my happy, as do my woodcarving tools, hiking, skinny dipping in wintertime and really good music.

name: Cozy 2 room apt in trendy Södermalm
space: Cozy apartment of 54 sq.m. (581 sq.ft) consisting of kitchen, bedroom and living room. The building dates from the early 1900s and has a beautiful staircase. The ceiling height in the apartment is just over three meters (10 ft). The kitchen has full facilities for cooking. Stove / oven, fridge / freezer, espresso machine, dishwasher, microwave, and everything else needed in the kitchen. There is room for three at the table. The bedroom has a comfortable 160 cm wide bed (3 inches wider than a Queen Size) and lovely bay windows facing the street. The curtains can be customized according to the season and preferences. The living room has a dining table for 4-5 persons at the bright window. It also fits a sofa + coffee table and flat-screen TV with cable. Wireless internet with good download speed (24 mb/s) is available. The sofa can be used as a third bed. The shower is separate from the toilet. The location is fantastic: a 2 minute walk from Medborgarplatsen which is the very heart of tr

The location is fantastic: a 2 minute walk from Medborgarplatsen which is the very heart of tr
house_rules: Please take off shoes in the hall. Other than that - no rules, just common sense!
host_about:
I was born in 1975 and I grew up in a smaller town about an hour away from Stockholm. I've been living in the city for ten years now, since me and my wife Johanna first got together.

Things we love include: red wine, Marion Cotillard, cats, Magic Johnson, Buenos Aires, Paul Auster & Siri Hustvedt, french bistro food, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Feist and capers.

Most often we travel to European destinations, and a few years ago we were in Argentina for 20 months, a great experience. We have also been to North America a few times, but we have very little experience of Asia and Africa.

As guests we are respectful, and easy to get along with. As hosts I guess we expect the same from others!

name: Central city studio in Stockholm
summary: If you are looking for a very central and comfortable place to stay in Stockholm and want to be flexible with extra beds and privacy, this is it. We have a guest apartment with a good bathroom and kitchenette on the central island "Kungsholmen". The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there's an elevator/lift.
space: The apartment is appr. 25 square meters in size, fully furnished and has a one-door French balcony. The Queen sized bed (140 x 200 cm) is very comfortable and at least one additional person can sleep in the bed sofa (140 x 200 cm).
description: If you are looking for a very central and comfortable place to stay in Stockholm and want to be flexible with extra beds and privacy, this is it. We have a guest apartment with a good bathroom and kitchenette on the central island "Kungsholmen". The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there's an elevator/lift. The apartment is appr. 25 square meters in size, fully furnished and has a one-door French balcony. The Queen sized bed (140 x 200 cm) is very comfortable and at least one additional person can sleep in the bed sofa (140 x 200 cm). The mini-kitchen has a small fridge with a freezing area, hot plates, microwave etc. It is equipped with basic cooking utilities, pod coffee machine, toaster and water boiler – and if you need anything else we are happy to provide it to you. Note that there is no fan so it's not possible to do some heavy cooking. The bathroom is fresh with a very nice shower, lovely floor heating and other utensils. We have wifi access (250 Mbit/s) so that you easily can
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is just around the corner of the popular shopping mall “Västermalmsgallerian” and the area hosts a number of big grocery stores as well as restaurants if you want to eat out. The area is called “Fridhemsplan” on the Stockholm island “Kungsholmen” and it is a center point for public transportation such as the subway/underground as well as buses in all directions.  Walking to the city takes about 15-20 minutes and there are lovely walking or jogging areas along the shores of our island “Kungsholmen”. In the summer you can walk to the beach in 10 minutes and have a bath in the lake of Mälaren.
notes: We do have an iron + board if you want to look extra sharp...
transit: Travelling from the Arlanda airport is easy. You either take a taxi or go directly by train to the central station and then the subway or bus from there. Or jump off the airport shuttle bus close to the apartment and then walk three or ten minutes. After booking, you'll get a more detailed instruction via e-mail.  Our apartment is just three stops away on the underground from the Stockholm School of Economics ("Handelshögskolan"), one of Europe's leading business schools. And appr. six kilometers from the University of Stockholm.
access: The mini-kitchen has a small fridge with a freezing area, hot plates, microwave etc. It is equipped with basic cooking utilities, pod coffee machine, toaster and water boiler – and if you need anything else we are happy to provide it to you. Note that there is no fan so it's not possible to do some heavy cooking. The bathroom is fresh with a very nice shower, lovely floor heating and other utensils. We have wifi access (250 Mbit/s) so that you easily can get connected and stay in touch with your friends and family. Towels and linen are all included - and we’re just next door if you need anything else. There are also a laundry with three washing machines in the basement of the house, as well as a gym.
interaction: We want to give you the choice to be all for yourself and still be able to knock on our door if you need anything - or want to have a tip about the best place to eat or great places to visit.
house_rules: Smoking is not permitted and we can't unfortunately host any pets for possible allergy reasons among our guests (we love pets ourselves!). The mini kitchen is perfect for breakfasts and lighter cooking. Please note that there's no oven and no fan over the stove - and therefore it is not possible to make advanced cooking. Before arrival, we sill also send a separate document with information and tips that will make the stay here easier - but in the end, it's all down to common sense and to ask if you have any questions :)
host_about:
I am a communicator and has worked for many years as a PR consultant, corporate spokesperson, coach, teacher and journalist. 

I live with my wife Anna-Karin in the city of Stockholm - and we also share our day-to-day work at our agency.

We have a lot of international contacts and love to travel ourselves. English is my cup of tea and Anna-Karin also speaks Italian fluently and gets around OK with French and German.

Our kids have moved out and we have now put a lot of focus on our new guest apartment. We really look forward to see a lot of you guys here!

name: Turn of the century - Vasastan
summary: Apartment decorated in Scandinavian classic design with a touch of luxury. Great for families! Located in the popular part of Stockholm 'Vasastan'. Near metro, bus and the city's best restaurants and parks.  Stockholm is a wonderful vacation city!
space: We provide our apartment – our home –  decorated in classic scandinavian design with a tough of luxury, for short visits.  BOTTOM FLOOR APARTMENT The apartment is located on a tiny, cute street just off Odenplan. It's quiet around the clock, but very close to the center (with bars, shopping...). Buses and the subway is just around the corner. Please note that the apartment is on the bottom floor, from the street half a floor up but at even level with the garden. It provides proximity to the lush green garden with a patio and barbecue.  Read about the space below, and for extra info see floor plan picture.  BEFORE BOOKING: please get in touch and describe your visit, who you are and what you want from Stockholm. We prefer if you have airbnb- references and Id-varification before booking. Welcome to come and enjoy Stockholm and Vasastan in our modern/turn of the century apartment! We can help you prepare for your visit and we will be happy with suggestions on what you don't want to miss.

neighborhood_overview: Vasastan and Odenplan is very lively yet laid back neighborhood with lots of families and young couples. Great parks, pretty buildings, good but unpretentious restaurants, shops and cute cafés. If you like vintage, antiques, retro design or old records this is the place to be! Many of Stockholm’s second hand record shops are clustered in the area between Odenplan and St Eriksplan.  Also near by: Stockholm Public Library,  Stockholm Observatory, Bonniers konsthall, Sven-Harrys Art Museum. And several trendsetting galleries for contemporary art have opened around Hudiksvallsgatan in Vasastan (T St Eriksplan).
transit: The area is well served by public transport.
access: SLEEPS (4 +baby): 1st/Main Bedroom with double bed Bedroom with comfy Carpe Diem bed for 2 people. Hangers/hooks for clothes (no closet). 2nd Bedroom has a double fold out futon for 1-2 persons (very comfy and more like a real bed than a sofa bed). This room has space for an extra bed or a children's traveling bed (provided upon request). The bed is 140cm (a little smaller than "Queen").  Hangers/hooks for clothes (no closet). CHRILDREN: We welcome families and children of all ages! Please read the below for pricing. 3rd Bebdroom/Baby's room We also have a small babyroom, decorated for a baby under 6 months which will be provided upon request and charged seperately.    We have a traveling baby bed and baby chair for children up to approx 3 years. Upon request and without extra charge up to 2 years, in line with Airbnb policy. Children over 2 years will be considered, and counted, as regular guests. Summary 4 adults can fit comfortably in two real beds. (The one bed is probably more sui
interaction: You have the apartment for your self and we are just a text-message or phone call away.
host_about:
When we travel we prefer to stay in a home. Where we can live, cook & meet the locals... And we love that we can share our place with people who love the same. 

We have so far met some truly great people!
 
Would love to hear from you!

name: Central & Trendy Big Room + Balcony
summary: Welcome to a cozy, trendy and bright apartment in the heart of the very trendy and central Södermalm. The apartment is trendy, bright and Scandinavian.  The subway station 3 minutes away from the apartment that takes you to the central station in 7 minutes.
space: Cozy and nice apartment in the heart of trendy and central Södermalm. The apartment is a 1.5 room apartment with possibilities for 3 people to stay. It´s a lovely apartment with a balcony and the subway station Mariatorget 2 minutes away. A 43 sqm (although it feels bigger) light apartment in the heart of Södermalm right next to Mariatorget and Zinkensdamm. The apartment is on the 2.5 floor in a building built in the 1927 which means high ceiling and large windows. Perfect for a couple. Amenities  Bedroom with 180cm wide bed. Large sofa that can also work as a spare bed. Fast internet (wifi). Fully equipped kitchen. Bathroom with shower. Neighborhood  The flat is located in the heart of Södermalm, close to Mariatorget (but not directly at it). It is a wonderful area of central Stockholm with a young population and lots of things to do during both the day and night. Stockholm city is small so you can basically walk anywhere within 30 minutes. There is also a subway station (Mariatorget)

Hello, I´m working as a Film Director and visual artist. I´m educated at Hyper Island and Central Saint Martins in London.

I have a big beuateful room with balcony  in my apartment at Södermalm in Stockholm.

name: 3 room apt in Södermalm, Stockholm
summary: Light and spacious apartment in vibrant Södermalm. Just minutes away from several nice parks, bars and restaurants. 2 min walk to underground station and city buses. Nice and central yet calm and quiet!
space: The apartment is situated in "Södermalm" in central Stockholm. 2/3 bedrooms, kitchen and living room, bath. The apartment: * One big room separated into two rooms with sliding doors. On one side: LEGO-heaven, on the other side a bedroom with two single beds (which can be pushed together to make a king size bed). * One big room separated with a wall. One side has one single bed, the other a smaller bed suitable for kids 3-7 y/o. Here you also can find toys suitable for kids 3-10, a TV, a DVD and a sofa. A kids hangout! * Kitchen with gas stove and dishwasher * Livingroom with TV, Apple-TV, sitting area and a dining table * Bathroom with toilet, shower and bathtub High speed wi-fi  Shared with neighbors: Sauna (basement) Washing machines (basement) Gym (basement) Small paved courtyard with BBQ

neighborhood_overview: Södermalm is a trendy but relaxed area. Situated in central Stockholm there is a lot to chose from. In the streets surrounding our apartment there are a lot of great restaurants and small shops. Walking distance to movie complex and fine food market. Lovely walks by the sea and a miniature beach just 5 min walk from home. Great parks for kids and picnics.
notes: We have one cat and a couple of guineapigs living here. They will be moved away during your stay but just as you know if you are very allergic to fury creatures.
transit: Stockholm is easy to travel around with underground and buses. Easy access to boats that will take you far out in the archipelago or just to Skansen and/or Gröna Lund Tivoli.

interaction: Host available via mail and phone

name: Clean apartment near city central
summary: This apartment is located in Fredhäll at the island Kungsholmen. The apartment is equipped with a really nice balcony with afternoon sun. On top of this, Riddarfjärden is just short walk away which is a popular swimming site. Also in the apartment building at the bottom floor there is a nice indian restaurant. The following public transportation possibilities are located within a ten minute walk, metro Kristineberg and various bus stops from Västerbroplan.
space: This apartment is located in Fredhäll at the island Kungsholmen. The apartment is equipped with a really nice balcony with afternoon sun. The following public transportation possibilities are located within a ten minute walk. Metro Kristineberg and various bus stops from Västerbroplan. The location offers easy access to the popular hip districts at Södermalm as well as the Central station area. The bed is 120 cm and works for couples if not picky. The following public transportation possibilities are located within a ten minute walk, metro Kristineberg and various bus stops from Västerbroplan. name: Artistic & quiet city apt.
summary: Mainly looking for long term tenants.
space: This unique space in safe area, Kungsholmen, offers a wide range of possibilities. Close to the surrounding waters for cooling swims in the summer and occassional BBQ with friends. Metro lies only two minutes away and buses departs 100 metres from the apartment.  The apartment itself has a small bedroom and a small kitchen. The living room is fully furnished with dining table, sofa & tv as well as piano. The apartment also has a spacious balcony with a nice view.  Wifi Bathroom with shower Fully equipped kitchen Balcony TV with Apple TV Piano Will not be present during my guest's stay.

Magazine editor gone student. This year I left my job at one of Sweden's most renowned fashion magazines to go back to the university. I'm now studying national economics and need some extra cash for the rent.

name: Aspudden Close to the city.
space: Dishwasher  Linens, towels and WiFi included. In Aspudden you are both very close to the city centre (a direct subway to the trendy SOFO area takes 8 minutes and to the central station 12 minutes) as well as to beautiful nature, running trails and the sea. Aspudden has a small-town atmosphere and you can find necessities here such as small shops, cosy cafés with excellent coffee, restaurants, library, a local books store, pharmacy, supermarket and bakery. The apartment is very close to the metro station, Aspudden, and into the city center it takes about 8-10 minutes.  One bathroom with a shower/bathtub The neighborhood is very family friendly, with parks, playgrounds and greenery nearby.  Restaurants shops, supermarket just around the corner Located in Stockholm's south side and near to the metro station you have only a few minutes of traveling to most sites in stockholm .  There are a lot of cafés, restaurants and second hand stores in the area

name: Charming & bohemic 1 bedroom flat
summary: Welcome to my home!  Light and quiet flat with bathtub and balcony. A personal appartment with good energy and a clean space. Close to tube station Gullmarsplan and just two stops away from trendy Södermalm. Very Welcome !
space: Light, quiet and cleen appartement, with balcony and bathtub, without insight and on top floor. 7 min walk from tube station Gullmarsplan or Skärmarbrink and walking distans to hip Södermalm, and with a food store just across the street. The appartement has a personal touch - everything is carfully choosen - with dark wooden floor and oriental furniture and pillows.  It is well taken care of and has really good energy - you will enjoy it!  I will supply you with bed linnen and towels, and the kitchen is fully equipped to cook food.  The bed is a futon on the floor. It is quite hard but fantastic for your back, its 140 cm wide. And just a note that in this apartment you sitt on the floor on big pillows ... I have proper chairs but the kitchen table is suited for pillow sitting ...  And there is wi-fi of course ; )  You are so welcome to stay here! Best,  Annika

You see a little car park and food store "Tempo". Thats the start of my street, Kalmgatan. I live on no 11, top floor.  At Gullparsplan  you can also rent a bicycles. Talk to the information center inside the tube station.

name: Lovely apartment with amazing view!
summary: Welcome to my cozy apartment just outside the city center. Enjoy your breakfast or evening drink at my balcony with an amazing view over the south of Stockholm. Or take the metro to trendy Södermalm for bars and shopping, only 5 minutes away!
space: Welcome to my bright, cozy 2 room apartment with a lovely balcony only 5 minutes from trendy Södermalm and 10 minutes from Stockholm city center. Situated in Telefonplan/Aspudden, this is the perfect place to stay if you want to experience Stockholms water and nature but still be close to the city pulse. The area is an artistic neighborhood with lots of small cafes and bars and the contemporary school of art close by. It's also only a 5 minutes walk to the water with swimming opportunities. The apartment is located 5 minutes from two different subway stations and only 2 stops away are hipster area Hornstull with lots of bars and nightclubs.     The flat is fully equipped with all mod cons including a well equipped kitchen, wireless internet and modern bathroom. There is one double bed and spear sofa or madrass. The apartment is suitable for 3 people.  The balcony is a lovely place to have breakfast, lunch and dinner, having sun all day long!  You will have the apartment all by yourself

You can also reach Arlanda Airport from Liljeholmen which i one metro stop away from my neighborhood.

name: Spacious safe scenic near Stockholm
summary: Spacious, renovated, safe and beautiful surroundings near Stockholm and lake.
space: A large, Three room apartment, fully renovated apartment in a modern style and a separate entrance to the villa.  Only 10 minutes by car or 25 minutes by public transport to Stockholm City. Just a three minute walk to the nearest bus stop. Tenant disposes whole lower floor in a three-storey building. The apartment has two bedrooms and a large living room/kitchen where you also can sleep. The entire apartment has underfloor heating. Very quiet, safe and truly beautiful villa area (Herrängen) 100 meters from a lake that you can swim and fish in or skate/ski in the Winter.  Fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, terrace and bathroom with whirlpool tub. Tenniscourt, soccer field and a very good playground are nearby. Ability to  borrow grill. Possibility to get help with transport from host at a cost. Bonus! In the neighbour house, Aviciis video of famous hit "Waiting for love" was recorded in 2015.

neighborhood_overview: Calm, safe and scenic environment characterized by the beautiful lake. A must: 50 meters to the old mansion "Herrängens Gård". Top class Restaurant  "Långbro Värdshus" 10 -15 minutes walk.
notes: The  apartment has four beds, two extra beds and a couch that you also can sleep in.
transit: Public transport in Stockholm is very good. Only 10 minutes by car or 25 minutes by public transport to Stockholm City. It is a three minute walk to the nearest bus stop.  Taxi: we recommend Taxi Stockholm + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or Uber.
access: Guests have the apartment for them selves. No sharing and private entrance
interaction: We live above the apartment and are glad to answer any questions. We are determined to make your stay really good!
house_rules: Please register the correct number of persons staying in the apartment when you send in the request.  No loud parties at night, be careful to the apartment. Parking lot. Space for one car is included in the rent. Smoking. Smoking is not allowed inside the house or outside on the grounds. Pets. Pets are not allowed due to allergy. Recycling. Food waste is placed in the brown paper bags and then put in the brown bin by the road. Only a minute's walk away there is a recycling center where you sort newspapers, glass metal, cardboard/corrugated cardboard and plastic.  If the guest excludes cleaning from the reservation, a very good and ambitious cleaning of the whole apartment must be done before departure.
host_about:
Hej! Vi är en familj med Pappa Thomas 48 år, Mamma Madeleine 38 år, och två pojkar. Laban, 11 år och Love 9 år. 

Thomas är chef på ett mediaföretag och Madeleine är egen företagare inom lampor och design. Förutom våra jobb ägnar vi mycket tid åt att renovera vårt hem, åt barnens aktiviteter, att träffa släkt och vänner samt att vara på vårt landställe. 

Varmt välkomna att hyra av oss!

name: Charming flat in the Garden-suburb
space: Charming apartment in a small House from 1912 in the garden suburb, not far from the city. 2 rooms with one sofa two beds in the living-room and 1 wide single-bed in the other room. Nearest subway is Sandsborg (4 minutes  from the flat) and 13 minutes/every 10 minutes to the city. nearby a wellknown café with their  own bakery and in the same house under the flat a nice local restaurant.

name: Top floor flat in trendy Hornstull
summary: This fully equipped flat with stunning views over the waters and the city caters up to 3 adults. Enjoy a stay in Södermalm a diverse and colorful area, with a wide range of bars and restaurants, know as home of bohemia, and alternative culture.
space: This fully equipped flat caters up to 3 adults wishing to discover the city of Stockholm and perhaps the surrounding archipelago with its beautiful islands. Enjoy a stay in trendy Södermalm, the residential island directly south of Gamla Stan (Old town) in the centre of Stockholm.  Södermalm The area is diverse and colorful, with a wide range of bars, restaurants, cafés and know as home of bohemia, alternative culture and a broad range of cultural amenities. It's considered a fashionable place to live or go to, and it boats prominent shopping districts that offers a diversity of the new and unexpected, as well as top-class vintage merchandise. There's plenty of lush parks in this hilly area that gives you beautiful views of the city as well as the opportunity to cool down in the lake after a stroll around the city. The flat - Big living room with sofa, flat screen TV and a amazing view over the lakes. The living room also has a sleeping area that accommodates one person. - Spacious bed

There's plenty of lush parks in this hilly area that gives you beautiful views of the city as well as t
house_rules: No smoking, no parties, no pets.  Keep the front door locked at all times - both when you are in the apartment and, of course, when you are not.  In Sweden, it is common courtesy not to wear outdoor shoes indoors. We keep them in the entrance hall.  Also, be considerate of the environment by shutting off all lights when you leave the apartment, remove battery chargers from the outlets when not in use and turn off the bathroom towel dryer.  The windows must be locked when you're not at home.  Have a great stay!
host_about:
Travel light and travel often
Bring nothing but memories
Leave nothing but foot prints

name: CozyBagarmossen - close to nature and the city
summary: The apartment is nice and spacious and has the feel of a small house due to it's location on the ground floor.  It's a 1 bedroom apartment (65 sqm/700sqf), only a few miles south of the city center. Interior design is a mix of old swedish countryside charm and colorful inspirations from India.  The apartment is located in a calm and cozy part of Bohemian Bagarmossen with a big nature reserve a few steps from the front door.
space: The bedroom has one Queen size bed and tasteful furniture, a mix of heirlooms and vintage finds, with a serene feel, perfect for dream time. Right outside the bedroom there is a closet for you to use. The living room has a big couch to disappear in and if you're 3 people, the 3rd person will camp out on a mattress in the living room. An out-of-tune acoustic piano and a balcony. This room is inspired by the rich and warm colors of India and "Arabian Nights".  The kitchen is fairly spacious and has a table that fits 4 people. From the window you can see the forest, a natural reserve, and more often than not there will be deer and hare going about their business right outside the house.  The bathroom has a great bathtub that is perfect for long soaks. If you like nature: this is perfect.  The Nacka Natural Reserve, Nackareservatet, is located right outside the house. Lots of trails for running/walking and it's a 10 min walk to a beautiful lake. If you like to do some off-trail exploring,

It's a 1 bedroom apartment (65 sqm/700sqf), only a few miles south of the city center. Interior design is a mix of old swedish countryside charm and colorful inspirations from India.  The apartment is located in a calm and cozy part of Bohemian Bagarmossen with a big nature reserve a few steps from the front door. The bedroom has one Queen size bed and tasteful furniture, a mix of heirlooms and vintage finds, with a serene feel, perfect for dream time. An out-of-tune acoustic piano and a balcony. This room is inspired by the rich and warm colors of India and "Arabian Nights".  The kitchen is fairly spacious and has a table that fits 4 people. From the window you can see the forest, a
neighborhood_overview: Bagarmossen is a cozy and vibrant suburb to Stockholm,  that's had a revival the past years.  The creatives, artists and musicians that once inhabited the hip island of Södermalm, have left the staggering prices of the inner city for a more community focused life in Bagarmossen. It's a very active part of Stockholm where a lot of things are going on; urban gardening projects, one of the biggest outdoor 2nd hand markets happens here once a year, a one-man made Zen Garden, bee hives, and a supermarket cashier that's known all over town - there's even a book about her!
notes: Wifi available. Sheets and towels included.
transit: Bagarmossen subway station is an 8 minutes walk away,  Kärrtorp subway station 10 minutes by foot.  The subway takes 8-22 minutes into the city,  depending on where you want to go! (Skanstull: 8 min, Central Station: 15 min, Fridhemsplan: 22 min) There's also a bus stop 2 minutes from the front door,  the bus takes only 5 minutes to Skogskyrkogården,  a World Heritage Site,  which also has it's own subway stop.
interaction: I'll be available for support if needed, via email or text.
house_rules: - No smoking. If absolutely necessary, take a walk into the forest. - No alcohol or other intoxicants - No parties - Bedding/sheets included - Please refrain from loud noises/music  before 9am/9.00 and after 10pm/22.00 - Recycling is mandatory. There are special bins for: compost, hard plastic, metal, paper, cardboard, lightbulbs, batteries and hazardous waste. - This is a vegetarian household (pots, pans, cooking utensils), so if you want to eat meat, you'll need to buy it cooked and ready to eat as is. - Enjoy your stay
host_about:
Free-spirited nature loving homebody with wanderlust 

Singer/Songwriter, Kundalini Yoga Teacher, Student of Shamanism, Retired Vegetarian Chef.

My soul needs both the beauty of nature and the buzz of the city. 

Favorites:

Books: Song of the Deer, Outlander-series, everything by Kylie Fitzpatrick and Tracy Chevalier, Harry Potter...

Movies: Dirty Dancing, The Peaceful Warrior, Star Wars, Indiana Jones, Lord of the Rings etc etc etc

Food: everything spinach, vegan GF burgers with sweet potato fries, mexican, indian, thai food... fresh spring rolls with peanut sauce!

Music: too much to list! My heart beats a little bit stronger for sweet soul and everything that makes my hips sway... I love me some great house and EDM, but Joni Mitchell is my ultimate music guru.
 
Destinations: I have a deep love for the American West. I lived 2 years in Los Angeles and I'm in love with California. The Red Rocks of Arizona, Utah, New Mexico and Colorado also have a special place in my heart.
India is an amazing place that leaves no one untouched. 
My native land of Sweden is tremendously beautiful and I adore the North, wild free filled with trees.

Places I HAVEN'T been but would to go: Australia, New Zealand, West Africa, Kenya, South Africa, Egypt, Afghanistan, Peru, Brazil, Mexico, Costa Rica, Antarctica... 
A dream trip is to travel on the Trans Siberian Railway from Moscow to Beijing!
Also to visit the ancient temples and monasteries in Tibet.

Life Motto: 
Be Bold. Stay Humble. Be the change you want to see.

name: Cosy apartment in central Stockholm
summary: Apartment on small island in central Stockholm. Living room with sofa and stereo. View over the lake from the window. Bed for two. Extra bed available. In kitchen you'll find stove, oven, sink, kitchen table. Bathroom.  Bus takes 15 minutes to central station. Supermarket and restaurants around the corner.
description: Apartment on small island in central Stockholm. Living room with sofa and stereo. View over the lake from the window. Bed for two. Extra bed available. host_about:
Hey there! I'm born in Stockholm and been living here for most of my life, except a year in California and half a year in Scotland. 

Like music, reading, traveling etc, which reflects in the interior of the apartment.

Glad to let people stay in my home while I'm away.

name: Bedroom in big apartement in SoFo
summary: Comfortable and quiet in Stockholms best location. The bedroom has 2 comfortable beds and a bathroom just outside. You share kitchen bathroom and livingroom with the hostess. Theres cable TV and lots of space. Neighbourhood with lots of cosy cafées
space: Large comfortable and perfectly placed home with 2 bedrooms a big livingroom and spatious kitchen. Perferct location in Södermalm the funkiest neighborhood in Stockholm. One of the more quiet blocks but nextdoor to all the nice resturants and cafées. Next to the beautiful and forrest like park Vitabergsparken where there is outdoor theater and dance performances during summer. Accomodates 4 in the bedrooms and the big sofa can make place for one more person. One bedroom has a kingsize bed. The other bedroom has 2 separate beds that can also be placed next to each other. Toilet with bathtub comfortly placed between the 2 equally big bedrooms. WiFi, cableTV and fully equipped kitchen. Elevator. Bus 2, 3 59  66 and 76 around the corner.  Closest subway is Medborgarplatsen.

If you use something in the kitchen  put it back where you took it. Use ovenwere if you heat bred or pizza in the oven. Melted cheese and breadcrums burn get stuck smell and is hard to clean. Food preferably eaten at kitchen or dining table not in the sofa. No music after 10pm If you are the last one in remember to lock the entrance door from inside orherwise anyone can enter the apartement at night. Otherwise just general cleanness and good communication is appreciated.

name: Bright and comfy apt, Hornstull
summary: A perfect spot for an exploring stay i Stockholm. The apartment is very comfortable and quite, a place to return to after full days and nights in the city. Great for lazy mornings and breakfast at the sunny balcony.
space: Welcome to stay in my bright and comfy apartment with a big sunny balcony. The apartment is in a quit street of busy and beautiful Södermalm. It has a full and separate kitchen, a nice bathroom with full tub and a combined bed- and living room. There is one 120cm bed and one 90 cm bed that can be pulled out from under the bigger one. There's also an extra bed on the sofa if you would need it. The place is 34 well planned square meter, and have everything you need for a nice and comfortable stay in Stockholm. I really love the area in summer time, and I  hope you will enjoy it too!
description: A perfect spot for an exploring stay i Stockholm. The apartment is very comfortable and quite, a place to return to after full days and nights in the city. Great for lazy mornings and breakfast at the sunny balcony. Welcome to stay in my bright and comfy apartment with a big sunny balcony. The apartment is in a quit street of busy and beautiful Södermalm. It has a full and separate kitchen, a nice bathroom with full tub and a combined bed- and living room. There is one 120cm bed and one 90 cm bed that can be pulled out from under the bigger one. There's also an extra bed on the sofa if you would need it. The place is 34 well planned square meter, and have everything you need for a nice and comfortable stay in Stockholm. I really love the area in summer time, and I  hope you will enjoy it too! Full access to all of the apartment. I will be available by phone or mail during your stay. There are plenty of nice cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood, and five you reach the green island
neighborhood_overview: There are plenty of nice cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood, and five you reach the green island Långholmen in five min were you can enjoy beach and a park life, have pick-nicks or rent kaiaks. For warm summer nights there are lots of bars, restaurants and some of Stockholms most popular clubs just around the corner.
notes: If the weather is warm and sunny I'd really appreciate if guest can look after the plants in the balcony and give them water.
transit: The metro is five minutes walk away and is located in the newly renovated Hornstull Center, were you also find a new galleria, cafés and restaurants. It's less than ten minuets to the city center by metro. An other popular option is to walk along the water side to Old Town or the shopping around Slussen. From the apartment you reach Old Town in about 30 min by foot.
access: Full access to all of the apartment.
interaction: I will be available by phone or mail during your stay.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apt No loud music after 23.00 (at least not with balcony doors open :)
host_about: Jag är Stockholmare sedan sex år tillbaka och stortrivs i den här staden. Jag jobbar med sociala förändringsfrågor och engagerar mig i övrigt främst i mina vänner. Jag gillar att traska runt i Stockholm och i andra städer i världen. Det bästa med Heleneborgsgatan på sommaren är att ett nattbad aldrig är långt borta!

name: Two rooms with balcony in Sofo
summary: Lovely atelier apartment right in the middle of the popular Sofo area. Close to everything yet calm at night. Business ready, fully equipped with 100 Mbit wifi.
space: Close to Nytorget, in the popular area Sofo, I have my wonderful appartment in a building from the late 20's. The flat is well planned, has a harmonious feel and many crafty details and parquet flooring. Spacious, light and very quiet bedroom with balcony facing south. 180 cm double bed. Big hall with a fire place. Bathroom with tub. Atelier towards the street with library and a desk for working. Cosy kitchen for breakfasts and dinners. A shared service for washing and drying clothes in the basement. A note on the photos, they're three years old and I need to update them. The place is the same but I've moved around things plus I've been working full time in the atelier so there are much more books, paint and paintings in there.

neighborhood_overview: A calm little street leading out to Nytorget with its plethora of cafés, restaurants and boutiques. A few minutes walk there is the beautiful park Vitabergsparken with the Sofia church and a view over all of Stockholm. Deli open untill 11 at night across the street. A short walk in almost any direction will take you to the waterside, a bit further you have beaches, bars and more places to eat.
notes: Professional cleaning can be arranged at an extra fee.
transit: 0 min walk to buss 59 to Central station, Hötorget, etc. 3 min to buss 66 to Hornstull. 4 min to buss 3 and 76. 7 min to subway Skanstull and buss 2 at Tjärhovsplan. 10 min to subway Medborgarplatsen and buss 4 at Skanstull.
access: The guest has access to the entire appartment but for a wardrobe where I store private things. It is not allowed to use the fireplace.
interaction: I answer all questions as quickly as possible and is available over phone, sms or e-mail. I urge the guests to contact me with any questions and I usually get back after a day or so to check that all is as it should. The guest has the entire place for her-/himself. I receive the guests if I'm in town.
house_rules: Double check the gas stove to be OFF when leaving. No parties. No guests. Take off shoes. Do not use fireplace. Close balcony door when leaving. Leave the place as you found it.
host_about:
Artist, designer, entrepreneur with too many interests. I've done a bit of traveling but it turns out the Stockholm archipelago is my favorite place.

I aim for my tenants to feel welcome, safe and comfortable. If you have photo, description, verified ID, phone, e-mail, some social network and a positive recommendation, then I have very few questions and can make a quick decision. Welcome!

name: Big & modern with unbeatable location in SoFo/City
summary: Charming and still modern & elegant 3-bedroom apartment with lots of space. Bright corner living room, a kitchen incl dining table for 6 persons, two proper bathrooms and plenty of cupboards and wardrobes.  Includes dishwasher, microwave, radio, 3 TVs, 100 Mbit wi-fi, elevator, small staircase balcony with table & two chairs, nice yard. Very central location in the heart of SoFo (the hip part of Stockholm), with culture, fashion, shopping, cafes, pubs/bars, cinemas and dining around the corner.
space: Modern and bright 3-bedroom apartment (127 sq. meters) from 1927 with lots of space and 2,8 m to ceiling. Plenty of social area with a big living room and a kitchen with dining table for 6 persons. Two proper bathrooms and plenty of cupboards and wardrobes.  HALL: Bright and welcoming hall with a big wardrobe. BEDROOM 1: Large bedroom with a double bed. Lots of storage for clothes etc. TV and full-sized mirror. BEDROOM 2: Bedroom with normal size bed and large wardrobe.  BEDROOM 3: Bedroom with normal size bed, wardrobe and flat screen TV.  KITCHEN:  Big kitchen with dining table for 6 persons. neighborhood_overview: Very central location in the heart of SoFo (the hip part of Stockholm), with culture, fashion, shopping, cafes, pubs/bars, cinemas and dining around the corner. Very close to all possible shops, food courts, transportation, sightseeing, nightlife, parks, museums, water, old parts of Stockholm. Convenient store is 50 meters away in the same building. Park and playground is only 250 meters away.
notes: - Bedlinen and towels are included.  - A maximum of five guests.  - No smoking in the apartment. However smoking is allowed in the yard.  - No pets allowed. - We ask you not to use outdoor shoes in the apartment.  - It is an old building and sound can travel between apartments, so please be quiet after 10 pm on weekdays.  - Garbage is left in the garbage room, to be found left of the building entrance at Bondegatan 12, the code 7271 is used to open the door.  - Final cleaning is paid for separately 500 sek.  - Paid car parking is possible directly in the street.
transit: Easy access to city buses (300 meters), Subway (400 meters), commuter trains (900 meters), ferries, motorway and cruise lines. City bikes and car parking directly in the street. Close to popular Nytorget (square), Vitabergsparken (park, church etc) and Medborgarplatsen (large square with restaurants, shopping etc). Within walking distance to interesting areas like Hammarby Sjöstad, Slussen, Mosebacke, Mariatorget, Tanto, Shopping centers (Skrapan, Ringen, Bruno), food courts Ringen and Söderhallarna as well as Götgatsbacken and the old cultural parts of Södermalm. Only 1 km to Old Town, 1,5 km to the Royal Castle, 2 km to the Globe Arenas & Shopping and 2,4 km to Sergels Torg, Central station, Airport train, Airport buses, NK Department store etc.
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment except one closet.
interaction: Guests can reach us on Telephone during their stay. We have people helping us with the administration of the apartment.
house_rules: ENGLISH: - A maximum of five guests.  - No smoking in the apartment. However smoking is allowed in the yard.  - No pets allowed. - We ask you not to use outdoor shoes in the apartment.  - It is an old building and sound can travel between apartments, so please be quiet after 10 pm on weekdays.  - Garbage is left in the garbage room, to be found left of the building entrance at Bondegatan 12, the code 7271 is used to open the door.  - Final cleaning is paid for separately 500 sek.  SWEDISH: - Max 5 övernattande gäster.  - Rökning är inte tillåtet i lägenheten. Rökning är dock tillåten på gården där även askkoppar finns. - Husdjur är inte tillåtna i lägenheten. - Använd inte utomhusskor i lägenheten. - Det är en gammal och något lyhörd byggnad, så tystnad uppskattas efter kl. 22 på vardagar. - Avfall lämnas i soprummet som finns vänster om husets port på Bondegatan 12. Koden till dörren är 7271. - Slutrengöring betalas separat med 500 sek.
host_about:
Vår familj är globetrotters och vi älskar att resa! Min man och jag är egenföretagare inom hälsovård. På helgerna brukar vi ta bilen och åka ut till olika slott och parker och ha picknick där. Det tycker barnen om!

My family and I love to travel. In the summers we normally travel around Europe and explore new cities. I love being a mum to my two wonderful children. When I have the time I very much enjoy reading books.

name: Bright apartment, popular Södermalm
space: THE APARTMENT Well planned, newly refurbished, bright apartment with balcony and windows fronting two directions in the popular and trendy district of western Sodermalm.   The apartment is suitable especially for couples and families with babies. Large, well equipped kitchen with dishwasher and microwave oven among other things. Bathroom with clinker, shower and bathtub. The bedroom has a large double bed and a French balcony. A cot, nursing table, and a baby bathtub is available. The balcony is equipped with garden furniture and a parasol. Possibility to barbecue on the patio. Located on the 3:rd floor out of 6. Elevator. AREA & COMMUNICATIONS Great communications with less than a five minutes stroll to Zinkensdamm and Mariatorget subway stations, as well as local buses. Barely 10 minutes walk to South Station (Södra Station). Approximately 4 to 6 minutes by subway to the Central Station (T-Centralen), and the airport coaches. Proximity to excellent grocery stores, delis and shopping

neighborhood_overview: Proximity to excellent grocery stores, delis and shopping areas. Bysis Square and Hornsgatan's popular restaurants, bars and cafes are just around the corner from the apartment. A nice walk along the southern shore of Lake Mälaren to Slussen, Gamla Stan (Old Town), or Hornstull/Långholmen's bathing and walking areas is highly recommended.
transit: Great communications with less than a five minutes stroll to Zinkensdamm and Mariatorget subway stations, as well as local buses. Barely 10 minutes walk to South Station (Södra Station). Approximately 4 to 6 minutes by subway to the Central Station (T-Centralen), and the airport coaches.
access: Large, well equipped kitchen with dishwasher and microwave oven among other things. Bathroom with clinker, shower and bathtub. The bedroom has a large double bed and a French balcony. The balcony is equipped with garden furniture and a parasol during the summer. Possibility to barbecue on the patio. High speed internet. Towels, sheets and linen. Toiletries.
interaction: Most of the time we will be available for help and assistance during the stay. We respect the privacy of our guests, and will only contact them by phone or internet in the rare case of needing access to the apartment.
house_rules: GENERAL INFORMATION Dear guests, welcome to our home! Please respect the following rules when you stay in our apartment:  - Smoking is strictly prohibited in the apartment! If you need to smoke, please use the balcony (not the windows or the French balcony), using an ashtray. - Please take off your shoes in the hallway when you spend time in the apartment.  -The heating is controlled by the caretaker, so please don't try to regulate the radiators etc. -Noisy, late night activity which might disturb the neighbours is not accepted.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Jon, and I live in Stockholm, Sweden with my girlfriend Susann, and our daughter Sima. I work as a translator/interpreter, and also within the travel industry. My interests include film, art, design, cooking, surfing and travelling. I've been to more than 40 countries. Both rural tranquility and urban pulse attracts me. 

I'm a very clean and tidy person, but I'm also quite flexible during my travels. I don't mind staying at anything from a chateau to a simple bungalow on the beach depending on the mood and the trip.

name: Cosy rooftop apartment, Södermalm
summary: Spacious 2-storey attic apt in Södermalm with immediate access to restaurants, shopping and parks. Nice balcony for coffee in the morning sun and a big terrace facing west (sunset). Close to the waterfront and 1 minute to the metro station Skanstull.
space: The apartment is located on the top floor (4 stairs, no elevator) in an old beautiful house in a quiet street in central Stockholm. It comfortably fits 2-5 people. One queen size bed in the master bedroom, two children's beds (up to about 10 yrs), a loft with mattresses and a comfortable sofa are available.  The kitchen is fully equipped and has got a big dining table (fits 8). The balcony is perfect for a morning coffee in the sun. Upstairs are two bedrooms, a loft, a lounge area, bathroom and a big terrace with evening sun.
description: Spacious 2-storey attic apt in Södermalm with immediate access to restaurants, shopping and parks. Nice balcony for coffee in the morning sun and a big terrace facing west (sunset). Close to the waterfront and 1 minute to the metro station Skanstull. The apartment is located on the top floor (4 stairs, no elevator) in an old beautiful house in a quiet street in central Stockholm. It comfortably fits 2-5 people. One queen size bed in the master bedroom, two children's beds (up to about 10 yrs), a loft with mattresses and a comfortable sofa are available.  The kitchen is fully equipped and has got a big dining table (fits 8). The balcony is perfect for a morning coffee in the sun. Upstairs are two bedrooms, a loft, a lounge area, bathroom and a big terrace with evening sun. We will not be present during the guests stay. The area around our apartmet is full of nice restaurants, cafés and small designer shops. About 1 minute walk to the metro station Skanstull. Several buses leave from the

transit: About 1 minute walk to the metro station Skanstull. Several buses leave from the same station.
interaction: We will not be present during the guests stay.
house_rules: No smoking inside.
host_about: Home is wherever I lay my hat and I take every opportunity to travel. Anything from a weekend in Paris to a few days in the Swedish countryside or three months on the road in South America suits me. I work as a freelance art director, and even though I really like my job I try not to work too much. The idea is to have plenty of spare time to hang out with family and friends, to cook, to climb and practice yoga. And of course, to travel.

name: Lovely Apartment Central Stockholm
summary: You will absolutely Not feel  your   on top of one and other in this Spacious Lovely Apartment Accommodates five  with Ease very Spacious and bright.

name: New flat by marina close to city
summary: 3 bedroom flat which can accommodate 7 people, in a nice area 10 minutes from central Stockholm and 10 minutes from a national park. Fully equipped kitchen, wi-fi, cable tv and access to washing maschines + parking garage for extra fee.
space: We can offer a flat built in 2012 in Hammarby Sjöstad – a part of central Stockholm built on the waterfront, with world renown for its architecture. Staying here you are close to everything – the water (around the corner), city nightlife, shopping, culture and nature. The flat is just by a marina called Henrikdalshamnen, with a row of designer cafés, a bakery and restaurants. A two minute walk from our door there is a small ferry that in 2 minutes, free of charge, takes you to the trendy parts of "SoFo" in the Södermalm section of the city.  Another ferry takes you in 10 minutes to the beautiful royal park Djurgården, with Stockholm's most beautiful walking paths and a large part of the city's museums and galleries.  A five minute walk from our house, buses and trains take you to the heart of Stockholm in five minutes. If you on the other hand want to experience the outdoors, one of Stockholm's largest National Parks is just a 10 minute walk away. There are lots of options to rent boat

neighborhood_overview: The Hammarby Sjöstad neighbourhood was developed in the late 1990's. It used to be an abandoned harbour and industrial area but it was turned into a residential area. it was supposed to host the athletes village when Stockholm bid to host the Olympic Games in 2004, but the bid failed and tenants could move in earlier. It is built on the waterfront so water is all around. Which gives it a spacious and marine feeling.
transit: There are several local trains, ferries and commuter buses that takes you in to central Stockholm - the Gamla Stan section of the city - in 10 minutes.
access: THE STAY INCLUDES: – One master bedroom with 1 double bed (for 2 people), one bedroom with 2 large bunk beds and one bedroom with 1 large single bed (where 2 adults or 2 kids can sleep) and a bunk bed on top of that – Access to a fully equipped laundry room (shared with other tenants) in the building where you can use washing machines – Fully equipped kitchen – One bathroom (with a bathtub/shower and toilet) - One additional toilet - Wi-fi internet access included - Cable television included – An indoor parking space for an additional fee (please inquire about that). – Spacious elevator
interaction: We will welcome you when you arrive but we will be away during your visit. You can of course call us any time with questions.
house_rules: - Just leave the flat the way you found it. - No pets allowed, no smoking indoors or on the balcony. Please smoke outside the house. - This is a family-oriented neighbourhood so it's probably not the best place for a party.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Jenny, I'm 44 years old and try to balance working full time as a journalist with being a mom to three wonderful kids - Henry (age 7) and twins Edvin and Ruben (age 7). I'm married to Mikael (age 45) and we both work as journalists in Stockholm.

As a family we enjoy outdoor activities such as alpine skiing, horse back riding, sailing and just spending time outdoors. We like to travel and usually spend summers on the west coast of Sweden, near or on the ocean.

We spend most of our family time with the kids, but Mikael and I also share the love of books, a good movie and dinner with friends.

name: Centralt läge på Kungsholmen 4tr
space: Välkommen till vår fantastiska sekelskiftslägenhet i hjärtat av populära Kungsholmen. Lägenheten ligger på fjärde våningen och har balkong i oslagbart läge med sol eftermiddagen och kvällen. Passar bäst till 2 vuxna och 2 barn, men även 4 vuxna om man kan tänka sig att dela sovrum 3 + 1. Lägenheten Lägenheten är 70 kvm (sqm) och inkluderar alla tänkbara bekvämligheter och charmiga sekelskiftsdetaljer. Köket är fullt utrustat med kyl, diskmaskin, spishäll och ugn, kaffebryggare, vattenkokare, brödrost samt glas, bestick och porslin till 4 personer. Stor och ljus matplats med god plats för 4 personer i öppen planlösning med vardagsrum med soffa och tv. Ett mindre sovrum och ett mycket rymligt med kingsize säng, samt två extrasängar.  (English: Two bedroom, one is bigger with kingzise bed and space for one extra bed. The small bedroom is about 7 sqm and fits one bed.) Fräscht helkaklat badrum med dusch och golvvärme.  Tvättmaskin finns.  Läget/0mrådet Läget är perfekt med gångavstånd till

name: Quiet Oasis Near Central Stockholm
summary: Welcome to our spacious home in the beautiful leafy suburb of Mälarhöjden in Stockholm! A roomy 4 bedroom house located in a very child friendly neighborhood, just 20 minutes by Metro to the city center, and very close to Stockholmsmässan (Stockholm Fair Älvsjö)
space: Welcome to our spacious 2 story house in the beautiful leafy suburb of Mälarhöjden in Stockholm! Our roomy 4 bedroom house is located in a very child friendly neighborhood and just a mere 20 minutes with Metro away from the city center. From our house you can either walk 10mins to our nearest Metro station or just catch a bus there first. A well designed and comfortable home offers you and your guests both indoor and outdoor eating opportunities via our extensive wooden sundeck featuring deckchairs, parasols and of course a large charcoal BBQ, just perfect for when the sun is out and shining.  Back inside you’ll find that our house has two large living rooms. The upstairs open planned lounge is equipped with a large flat screen TV/DVD with an Apple TV (NetFlix included), you’ll also find a Nintendo Wii with plenty of games. And the house and gardens features access to high-speed fibre WiFi internet for your use. The upstairs bathroom infuses the modern warmth of Nordic design with the

A roomy 4 bedroom house located in a very child friendly neighborhood, just 20 minutes by Metro to the city center, and very close to Stockholmsmässan (Stockholm Fair Älvsjö) Welcome to our spacious 2 story house in the beautiful leafy suburb of Mälarhöjden in Stockholm! Back inside you’ll find that our house has two large living rooms. The upstairs open planned lounge is equipped with a large flat screen
neighborhood_overview: 1500 meters away:  • Shops  • Restaurants (Sushi, Thai, Chinese, Pizza etc)  • Pubs  • Supermarkets  • Bus Station  • Metro station We're located close to Lake Mälaren where you’ll find some wonderful natural surroundings, plenty of walking, cycling paths and good swimming opportunities. An enjoyable 15 minute walk can take you to a child friendly beach where you can also catch a steam boat to either the city or out to The Royal Palace of Drottningholm. Here you'll also find one of Sweden oldest café's 'Cafe Lyran' which is an ideal place to spend an afternoon relaxing and enjoying a good old fashioned 'fika'
transit: Our house is just a mere 20 minutes with Metro away from the city center. From our house you can either walk 10mins to our nearest Metro station or just catch a bus there first.
access: • 4 Bedroom House – Accommodates 9  • 2 King Size Beds, 1 Single bed (80x200cm), 2 Single Beds which both can be transformed into double beds. • Child crib + highchair are available just ask! • Linens & Towels  • Large upstairs bathroom + laundry facilities • Separate downstairs WC  • Separate downstairs Shower Room  • 2 Spacious Living Rooms • Fully equipped Kitchen including: Fridge Freezer, Dishwasher, Microwave, Kettle, Toaster • Large and child friendly garden • Spacious sundeck, deckchairs, large parasol with generous dining area • Charcoal BBQ • TV via AppleTV - includes NetFlix, SVTPlay, TV4Play, ViaPlay, TEDtalks and more + DVD Player and many films on DVD • Nintendo Wii • High Speed Fibre Wi-Fi Internet  • Laundry Facilities – Washing Machine and Tumble Dryer • Parking possible in our drive.
interaction: We offer our guests inside local knowledge to our part of Stockholm and are always happy to help with suggestions of ideas, tips and thoughts of what to see and do during your time here in Stockholm.  If you'd like some ideas, have questions or looking for some inspiration then please just ask away!
house_rules: No parties or excessive loud noise please.
host_about:
Originally I'm from Wales in the UK and have lived in Stockholm with my wife and two children for over fifteen years. I work as a travel writer and I've been lucky enough to travel the world quite a bit myself.

As a family we've used AirBnB several times and loved the whole experience so much so that we decided to open our home so you can enjoy another way of travelling as well.

Välkommen till Stockholm!

name: Central apartement in Stockholm!
space: This small 2 room apartment has a open kitchen integrated in the livingroom.  Like a mini suite with a separate bed room with a lovely french balcony facing a nice wiew of a green quiet yard! There is a separate shower and a separate wc. Position is excellent, close to the University as well as KTH and KI (Technology and medicine). It is within walking distance to city center and also within easy reach of big parks and walks along the water. as well as restaurants. Public transportation within 4 min walk and you have 2 underground stations closeby.: Tekniska Högskolan (red line) and Rådmansgatan (green line). Grocery shopping is across the street and also ATM machine, Pharmacy, Shopping, resturants etc.  A perfect place for a city week-end in Stockholm!!! Second floor - please note there is no elevator. The apartment availble for  4 to 5 persons! Bedsituation: 1 x 120.. one sofa bed (sleeps 2) and one sofa chair - sleeps one.

name: amazing apartment with big balcony!
summary: This lovely big & cosy apartment is perfectly located in a nice neighbourhood where you can enjoy a calm, harmonious time but at the same time have the opportunity to get into the big city fast!
space: This is the perfect apartment for a couple/single or two friends in Högdalen, Stockholm. The apartment is well planned, 38 sqm and has a lovely fully equipped kitchen with a small dinner-area, bathroom with a bathtube/shower (always including fresh towels and toilet paper) a big livingroom/bedroom (including bed linens), smart TV (with access to netflix, spotify and so on), WIFI, video games if you would get bored or just love to play and a BIG cosy balcony overlooking the beautiful and calm yard.  The apartment is located 7 minutes walking distance to the center of Högdalen which has EVERYTHING you can possible need, pharmacys, supermarkets (I highly recommend MATDAX because they have cheap groceries), shops, a liquorstore, a big selection of restaurants, a lot of different bus lines and of course the subway taking you to the city center in less than 15 minutes!   There is a lot of nice parks around the area and within 5 minutes by car or 20 minutes of walking you will reach a big poo

neighborhood_overview: What I love the most about my neighbourhood is that it's very calm, cozy, well taken care of and close to everything one would need (especially the public transportation).
transit: Parking is free and is outside the building!  Its a 7 minutes walk to the subway/bus depending how fast/slow one walks! From both Arlanda and Skavsta you can take the bus to the central station and from there you change to the subway! you can also take the arlanda express train!
access: *All of the apartment, of course *Free parking *Laundryroom (tell me in advance if you want to use it, so I can show you how it works when you arrive) *Garbageroom.
interaction: I like to interact with my guests so if there would be anything - I'm always close and one can always reach me by phone, or email! My father is also always available by phone!
house_rules: *Smoking is only allowed outside at the balcony and NOT inside the apartment. *According to our house-rules you have to show consideration to the neighbours after a certain time in the evening (23:00). (So no crazy loud music after that time, thank you!)
host_about:
I'm a 29 year old girl from Stockholm, Sweden.
I'm a dancer and I work as a dance teacher, as a sales advisor at Lindex. I also study computer science.
I love to travel and I love to meet new people! I've been a host on airbnb since 2012.

name: House with garden close to city
space: In the middle of picturesque Stureby, close to Globen, Stockholm city fair (Älvsjömässan) and just 20 minutes south of Stockholm city centre we rent out our stylish house. All modern conveniences, a sunny terrace and patio looking over fruit garden. Trampoline and lawn, perfect for families.   The house, which is in two levels, is built 1950 and carefully refurbished 2012/2013 and 2016. Fully equipped newly renovated kitchen, living room with fireplace, three bed rooms and bathroom on upper floor. Downstairs living room with fireplace and bathroom on entrance floor. Cable tv and wireless broadband. Sleeping arrangements  Bedroom 1: Double bed.  Bedroom 2: One bunk bed, big enough for two adults.  Bedroom 3: One single bed big enough for one adult.  Ground floor: Sofa bed for two adults. Extra bed available. The neighborhood  Picturesque residential area, listed by Stockholm City Museum. Within walking distance: grocery store, café, pizzeria, sushi, Thai restaurants and several playgrou

name: A Studio at Mariaberget
space: The holiday apartment is built similar to a studio. It has a kitchenette as well as toilet and shower. You will also find here a terrace with glass doors, which can be completely opended. Five dormer windows generate a very open and bright atmosphere. Early sun, so bring sleep masks. The holiday apartment is upstairs at your landlord and it has an own entrance. The apartment is located in the Southern part of the center of Stockholm, Södermalm. By underground 4 minutes from the Central Station to station Mariaberget. From there walk 5 minutes. Sweden, Stockholm,  It is located in an attractive cultural environment at the Mariaberg at Södermalm. The apartment has a peaceful location with a very nice open view. On the other hand you are here also close to many restaurants, cafés and shops. Also the famous 'Gamla Stan' of Stockholm and the Mariatorget can be conveniently reached by foot.

name: Room in flat close to the City
summary: Mitt ställe ligger nära Söder (Soho) (3 stationer med tunnelbanan), Globen (gångavstånd 15 min), Nytorpsbadet (2 min), Ica (5 min), Handlarn (5 min). Du kommer att älska mitt ställe på grund av hemtrevligt. Mitt boende passar studerande/resande.
space: Jag arbetar 8-17 nästan varje dag, men är ofta hemma på kvällarna. Jag bor i lägenheten tillsammans med min son som är 15 år. Du kan använda kryddor och vissa basvaror som du behöver.

Du kommer att älska mitt ställe på grund av hemtrevligt. Mitt boende passar studerande/resande. Jag arbetar 8-17 nästan varje dag, men är ofta hemma på kvällarna. Jag bor i lägenheten tillsammans med min son som är 15 år. Du kan använda kryddor och vissa basvaror som du behöver. Du har tillgång till kök och bad/toalett. Det finns affärer, bibliotek, simhall (inomhus året runt) på 5 min gångavstånd. På sommaren kan man bada i Nytorpsbadet, en utomhusbassäng, som ligger 5 min gångavstånd från huset. Perfekt för barnfamiljer! Precis utanför huset finns ett grönområde som är anslutet till Nackareservatet. Där kan man jogga, promenera, bada och spela golf. Det tar 7 min att gå till tunnelbanorna Blåsut eller Sandsborg. Det finns buss till Gullmarsplan direkt utanför huset.

name: Great attic quiet apt in SthlmCity
summary: Peaceful but centrally located in the city's most popular area. Room for 5 p well planed with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, fresh linen, towels, and toiletries, sunny balcony and roof terrace. Welcome!
space: The apartment / attic is approx 115 sqm on 2 floors etage. Attic characteristic property built 1906 and refurbished 2013 situated in the center of Stockholm, within walking distance from both the city center, old town and large green parks such as Haga Park, home of the Princess Royal with the family. The flat is located in the heart of the Vasastan neighborhood, one of the city’s more pleasant enclaves. Just around the corner is Vasaparken, a Stockholm hotspot for youth and families with great cafes, bars and restaurants like Vasahof (easy-going french bistro), Tennstopet (traditional swedish), Sven Harrys art museum, Bonniers art gallery and Mellqvist (great coffee shop).  The apt has three bedrooms all with blinds two upstairs and one queen size downstairs. Furnished in modern style at top floor and more old-fashioned downstairs. Fully equipped kitchen and 2 bathrooms. The apartment is on the fourth and last floor without elevator. Spacious 115 sqm additional 22 sqm floor area with
description: Peaceful but centrally located in the city's most popular area. Room for 5 p well planed with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, fresh linen, towels, and toiletries, sunny balcony and roof terrace. Welcome! The apartment / attic is approx 115 sqm on 2 floors etage. Attic characteristic property built 1906 and refurbished 2013 situated in the center of Stockholm, within walking distance from both the city center, old town and large green parks such as Haga Park, home of the Princess Royal with the family. The flat is located in the heart of the Vasastan neighborhood, one of the city’s more pleasant enclaves. Just around the corner is Vasaparken, a Stockholm hotspot for youth and families with great cafes, bars and restaurants like Vasahof (easy-going french bistro), Tennstopet (traditional swedish), Sven Harrys art museum, Bonniers art gallery and Mellqvist (great coffee shop).  The apt has three bedrooms all with blinds two upstairs and one queen size downstairs. Furnished in modern style at
neighborhood_overview: Friendly, safe and quiet neighborhood with restaurants, shops, leisure activities and Karlberg Castle. The closest supermarket is 100 meters away. A lot of art galleries nearby and kid-friendly "Vasaparken" within 5 min walk. Easy access to public transport e.g. subway S:t Eriksplan, shuttle station Karlberg and good parking conditions. Use Stockholm Public Transport (Website hidden by Airbnb) You can go by buss 69 to the Royal Djurgården and visit a lot of museums as The Vasa Museum, ABBA the museum, Skansen open-air museum or just stroll around (Website hidden by Airbnb) Stroll down to Kulturhuset or Old town for a guided tour. Check the Guidebook and hopefully you will find some useful information.
notes: I wonder if there is a more priceworthy, comfortable, pleasant offer? Please give me some feedback when you stayed here.
transit: You have easy access to public transportation in the neighborhood.Use a period card during your stay. Do not pay travel by travel (very expensive!!). Use a period card during your stay. Getting around can't be easier. Many places are walking distance away from the apartment. We also offer to lend 4 bikes(April-October) during your stay to discover our home city:-) Closest metro is "S:t Eriksplan", green line (6 min walking). Closest train station is "Karlberg station" (1 min walking). Bus 42, 72 and 507 stop just across the street. From the airport a taxi will cost you around 500 SEK(40min). The airport coach(40min) is a favorite though. A ticket is 120 SEK, get off at S:t Eriksplan, which is only 10 min walking to the apartment. In only 20 minutes, Arlanda Express will take you to Central Station, from where you can catch the train to Karlberg Station, one stop away. A one way ride with Arlanda Express is 240 SEK. If you would like to park your car you have to pay a fee during daytime
access: You have access to our present home and we would like you to take care and respect it as it would be your own home. We take for granted that you follow our house rules such as smoking outside, no events and party.
interaction: I may be available for a quick introduction to the apartment and neighborhood, but otherwise will not be present during your stay. If you wonder anything don´t hesitate to contact me.
house_rules: • Please respect the general Swedish house rule of quiet in the house between 10 pm and 6 am. •  No events and party. •  No pets are allowed due to allergies.    • Never let anyone through the main entrance if that person does not have a code. If they ask you to open for them just say they have to call the person they are to visit/work for. There should be no workers coming into this flat unless you have been informed so by us. • The door and must be locked and windows closed at all times whenever guests are not present. Losing the keys is not an option. • No smoking indoors. No throwing of cigarette waste out of balcony. • The balcony is a nice spot in the summer and serves as an “extra room” from early in the morning. If you find flowers dry, we appreciate if you give them some water. • When you leave the flat make sure that windows are closed (it is easy to forget roof windows, and if so you might come into a swimming pool when back). • Don’t leave the textiles and cushions on balco
host_about:
Family father with two kids and a lovely wife. We work as metal designer and graphic designer. I like to learn new things, travel to Italy, listen at Daft Punk, play with my kids, and hunt for mushrooms in an endless forest. Straightforward and present. Here and now. If there is a problem it is to be solved. Use your gut feeling and brain.
Greetings,
Christian

name: Nice, large room in great location!
summary: This large, cosy and comfortable room is located in the best and the most lively and genuine parts of Stockholm - the South! Lot’s of restaurants, shops and clubs. Walking distance to the Old town and subway and parking around the corner.
space: Welcome to a large, comfortable room in the heart of Stockholms attractive southern district. From here you are overlooking Medborgarplatsen, right in the middle of Stockholm's most popular district with lots of cafés, restaurants, bars, clubs, shops and green areas. Walking distance to the Old town, the City center and ferries to Djurgården and the archipelago.  Metro and suburban trains around the corner. 24 hour parking next to the building. The room is equipped with a new comfortable double bed, dining table/desk with two nice chairs, wardrobe, tv/dvd, radio/cd and wifi. The bathroom, with bathtub and shower, is shared with the host.  Rent minimum 3 nights. Bedlinen and towels included. This is the place for those who want to get to know the nice and friendly Stockholm!
