name: Room in Gärdet for 1-2 people
summary: Rummet är ljust med ett stort fönster ut mot Värtahanmnen och Frihamnen. Det finns gott om hyllor i rummet för dina saker, en mindre hängare med galgar och tre stolar och ett litet bord. Rummet har en säng (105 x 200 cm) till 1 person.
space: My apartment is recently renovated and modern with 2 bedrooms, a living room and kitchen in Gärdet in Stockholm with a fantastic view over Värtahamnen, Frihamnen and Lidingö (the water, ferry ports and one of the bigger islands of the archipelago surrounding Stockholm). The apartment is on the 4th floor and the building has two elevators. It is a bright apartment with a balcony and it has a dishwasher, washing machine and tumble dryer. Free/full access to kitchen and bathroom as well as free Wifi.  The apartment is situated close to the large fields and beautiful surroundings of Gärdet and Djurgården for walks or jogging rounds. Kampementsbadet (communal swimming pool and play ground) is within a 5 minute walk and food shop (open 7am-11pm) is less than 2 minutes walk.  Parking is easy to find nearby.  To get to central Stockholm bus number 1 is 3-4 minutes walk and takes about 10 minutes, the underground is 5 minutes away and takes about 5 minutes to get to central Stockholm. It takes

summary: Modern studio/apartment in Södermalm, Sofo, hotspot. Ideal for week-ends and up to two weeks' accommodation in Stockholm. Close to everything Stockholm has to offer. In the middle of Stockholms hip neighborhood.
space: Large modern studio apartment in one of Södermalms (area of stockholm inner city) popular addresses. Cozy and hip neighborhood. Trendy square "nytorget" around the corner, great variety of restaurants, bars, cafeterias and other nightlife, Södermalms greenery and parks right next door. Walking distance to two metro stations, inner city buses right outside the gate. Only two metro stations from "Old Town" and Stockholm Central station. Supermarket, pharmacy and other necessities in the neighborhood. Only two blocks away from the best viewpoint in Stockholm at "Fjällgatan".The apartment is 46 square meters with a combined bedroom / living room with a smart solution for bed(140cm wide). Separate, fully equipped kitchen with a dining area for four people. Large hall with good storage for clothes. Bathroom with toilet and bath. Large windows in two directions. WiFi is available if desired. The apartment is non-smoking and no pets. There is room for more people in the apartment where the sof

host_about: I am 23 years old and have lived in Stockholm all my life. I travel a lot and appreciate other good hosts and consider myself to be both a good host and guest. When I travel, I prefer apartment rentals by others. And I'm therefore careful how I take care of my apartment and guests. I work at a restaurant and playing football semi professionally. And with that, I'm often on the move. I'm pretty pedantic and must have it clean and nice in my home. I like meeting new people and I'm happy to help others explore Stockholm.

name: Cozy room on Kungsholmen
space: A cozy room in 3 room apartment on Kungsholmen.  Beautifully located in an area surrounded by parks,  boardwalks, waterfront, restaurants and shopping mall.  Walk to Metro station: 5 - 8 minutes.  Plus around 11 min. to Stockholm Central station,   12 to Gamla Stan (Old town). Attractive area. Around 2-4 minutes walking to the waterfront,  possible to swim, sunbath  do picnics & bbq on the rocks nearby,  canoeing, do the sup, biking Feel at home, be free to use what you need;  hairdryer in the room,  soaps, shampoos, skin lotions.  Coffee, tea, spices, olive oil, salt, sugar.  Cook, heat in microwave or oven. We share the common surfaces.  May be guest in the other room.  Always worked well so far. Big grocery store nearby,  open 7 am to 10 pm. every day. Included in the rent: high speed Wi-Fi  linens & towels cleaning at your departure Comfortable bed, 120 x 200.  My cat Sammy is friendly and used to people.  Born Feb 2016, mixed breed, long hair. We will agree on a check-in time.  Us

name: Södermalm - outstanding view
summary: 2 bedroom flat by the water with balcony and panoramic views of Södermalm. Centrally located, close to transport and great variety of restaurants, culture and shopping, yet in a quiet and beautiful green area next to Årstaviken. Perfect for families.
space: 2 bedroom flat with balcony and panoramic views on Södermalm.
description: 2 bedroom flat by the water with balcony and panoramic views of Södermalm. Centrally located, close to transport and great variety of restaurants, culture and shopping, yet in a quiet and beautiful green area next to Årstaviken. Perfect for families. 2 bedroom flat with balcony and panoramic views on Södermalm. Bedroom 1 with queen size bed (140x200), bedroom 2 with bed (90x200) in sofa combination (other part is 80x150), TV and desk. Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, freezer and dishwasher. Large living room with dinner table for 3-6 people, sofa, panoramic windows facing south and balcony. Newly renovated bathroom with bathtub. Free Wi-Fi. Usually we meet up guests at the apartment at arrival, to welcome and hand over keys. If we are out of town we send a nice friend instead. We are always available on email. This beautyful hide-away in the center of Stockholm is situated right by the water and a park, a swim platform by the lake just a short walk away and several nice playgrounds.
neighborhood_overview: This beautyful hide-away in the center of Stockholm is situated right by the water and a park, a swim platform by the lake just a short walk away and several nice playgrounds. Outstanding panoramic views of the water and the southern Stockholm from the cozy balcony facing south. 500 meters walk to the new local public beach. Perfect for work or vacation, the smaller the group, couple or family with children.
transit: Great walks just around the neighbourhood, and in 15 minutes by foot you reach Skanstull, Hornstull, Medborgarplatsen and Slussen with all the city you need. In 5 minutes you get to transportation by bus that takes you there even faster, public station for bike rentals, and comuting train that takes you to Stockholm Central Station in 4 minutes.
access: Bedroom 1 with queen size bed (140x200), bedroom 2 with bed (90x200) in sofa combination (other part is 80x150), TV and desk. Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, freezer and dishwasher. Large living room with dinner table for 3-6 people, sofa, panoramic windows facing south and balcony. Newly renovated bathroom with bathtub. Free Wi-Fi.
interaction: Usually we meet up guests at the apartment at arrival, to welcome and hand over keys. If we are out of town we send a nice friend instead. We are always available on email.
house_rules: We hope you will enjoy your stay in our home and take care of it as if it were your own! Some storage space in the apartment will be marked as private which we kindly ask the tenant to respect, but we leave plenty of space in the pantry, fridge/freezer, closets and bathrooms for you to dispose. Sheets and towels are available to borrow if needed, but if you can bring your own, it is preferred. Final cleaning is the tenants responsability.
host_about:
Hi! 

I am a 41 years old project manager in arts/technique and also gardener/landscape designer. My 10-year old and I love our home but also to travel and discover new things and places. 

Having travelled a lot we know how great it is to stay in nice home-like places, and we hope we can provide such an experience to others. 

Hope to hear from you soon!

name: Room for rental in Stockholm
space: Fresh cozy room in my 2-room apartment (54 m)  perfect for 1 or 2 persons. 2 beds made into 1 big double-bed, but can be separated. Calm and green area just south of Stockholm, transportation to the City is really easy: subway 20 minutes and you are there. You get a full use of the kitchen, sunny balcony, wi-fi, TV, usually easy to find parking place near the house. Food is not included, but I love good breakfasts and you are more than welcome to grab anything you find in my fridge and start your day with a great breakfast at the sunny balcony, that is if the weather allows. I can provide you some easy guidance in Stockholm for sightseeing, shopping and night life. Welcome!
description: Fresh cozy room in my 2-room apartment (54 m)  perfect for 1 or 2 persons. 2 beds made into 1 big double-bed, but can be separated. Calm and green area just south of Stockholm, transportation to the City is really easy: subway 20 minutes and you are there. You get a full use of the kitchen, sunny balcony, wi-fi, TV, usually easy to find parking place near the house. Food is not included, but I love good breakfasts and you are more than welcome to grab anything you find in my fridge and start your day with a great breakfast at the sunny balcony, that is if the weather allows. I can provide you some easy guidance in Stockholm for sightseeing, shopping and night life. Welcome! The house has an inner garden with a lawn and summer tables, so during summer you can eat outside, have a picnic or bbq. The area is calm and friendly, very close to nature: 5-10 minutes of walking will bring you to a forest with walking/running paths, lakes and picnic places. So if you come to Stockholm for several
neighborhood_overview: The area is calm and friendly, very close to nature: 5-10 minutes of walking will bring you to a forest with walking/running paths, lakes and picnic places. So if you come to Stockholm for several days and get tired of the big city, you can have a day just chilling somewhere with a picnic basket nearby a lake.
transit: From Stockholm city (T-centralen) you go by the subway green line nr.17  to the south, direction Skarpnäck. My station is Bagarmossen, which is next to the last station of the line. Travel time from city center is about 18 min. My place is 5 min walking from the subway station.
access: The house has an inner garden with a lawn and summer tables, so during summer you can eat outside, have a picnic or bbq.
house_rules: I welcome you to stay at my place for 2 nights minimum. If you book 2 or more nights at first and wish to check out after only 1 night,  you will still be charged for 2 nights. No smoking inside, only on the balcony. No drugs. You go out and come late? It is OK. But no bringing other people, only pre-booked guests. I keep my home clean and tidy, and expect you to treat it that way.
host_about:
Yo to you bothers and sister!
I am an average guy just a bit over 30 living, working and having fun in Stockholm. Work out a lot and party a lot, music is on all day long in my house, I even play it sometimes on my guitar, ha! 
Peace to everybody!

name: Charming top floor ap with balcony
summary: Top floor appartment with tilted windows and new balcony on the green center island Kungsholmen. Multiple buslines, subways and trains just around the corner. The appartment is situated at the corner of the green and hilly park, Kronobergsparken.
space: A welcoming and a comfortable top floor flat within walking distance of just about all the sights in Stockholm, including The Old Town, and the City Hall (Stadshuset).  It is located at the heart of one of the main Stockholm islands, Kungsholmen, one of the city’s more pleasant enclaves with a hilly park just in front and water 2 minutes away in two directions. With it’s total perimeter of 9 km, the island is ideal for morning joggings. Kungsholmen together with neighbouring Vasastan, is a hotspot for great cafés, bars and restaurants like: Allmänna Galleriet (famous meet restaurant), Restaurang Kungsholmen (Fusion) and Orangeriet (fantastic water front bar), Mäster Anders (Traditional Swedish),  Tranan (Traditional Swedish), Tennstopet (Traditional Swedish), Petit France (best french bakery/café) and Panamé (gorgeous, easy-going French bistro).  The flat is situated on a calm street just behind Fridhemsplan which is a center point for communications to all over the city (2 subway line

The appartment is situated at the corner of the green and hilly park, Kronobergsparken. A welcoming and a comfortable top floor flat within walking distance of just about all the sights in Stockholm, including The Old Town, and the City Hall (Stadshuset).  It is located at the heart of one of the main Stockholm islands, Kungsholmen, one of the city’s more pleasant enclaves with a hilly park just in front and water 2 minutes away in two directions. With it’s total perimeter of 9 km, the island is ideal for morning joggings. Kungsholmen together with neighbouring Vasastan, is a hotspot for great cafés, bars and restaurants like: Allmänna Galleriet (famous meet restaurant), Restaurang Kungsholmen (Fusion) and Orangeriet (fantastic water front bar), Mäster Anders (Traditional Swedish),  Tranan (Traditional Swedish), Tennstopet (Tradi
neighborhood_overview: There is a lovely park just outside where you can have pic-nic. There is also a courtyard in the buildning with table and benches and a barbeque where you can have dinner
transit: Extremely close to several metro lines and different buses that takes you to the city center in just 5-10 minutes (just around the corner).
access: All appartment, including balcony
house_rules: First of all that you enjoy your stay in my appartment! If you want to smoke, please do it at the balcony. Pets are allowed! just note that I'm very found of beutiful carpets so your pet must be able to "treat them well" Guests are responsable for any damages or losses during the stay, any breakages or complaints should be reported asap. Remember that you are in my home, please treat it with respect.
host_about: Stockholmie globtrotter recently moved back from France. Love cooking, photography and plants/flowers.

Sunny garden with trampolin. Superfast Wifi. A warm welcome i look forward to host you :)

neighborhood_overview: I love thats it´s totally quiet here. Also very green and leafy. There is deer and rabbits in the garden very often. Friendly neighbours and a very safe area. The proximity to the citycenter is also a big advantage. Nearby there is Thai restaurants, pizza places and a great grocery store with a large deli.
transit: Only 3min walk to the metro which is running 24/7 and takes you to the citycenter in 15min. Also very easy to get hold of Uber cars.  Free parking for two cars next to the house. 2min by car to Globe/Tele2 Arena.
access: You will have access to the entire house. I will not be present during your stay but i can be reached anytime on my cellphone in case you have questions or if you need any help.
interaction: I love to help my guests with timetables, tips on restaurants etc etc. I am always available on mail, cellphone or text  and i always respond within minutes. I want my guests to have a wonderful time in Stockholm! :)
house_rules: Pls give me all your flightdetails. No smoking inside or outside the house. Always take off your shoes when entering my house. Please pick up the mail everyday. Always activate the alarm when leaving the house. Absolutely no partys or overnight guests. Daytime or dinner guests has to be approved beforehand. Please clean the house and leave towels and bedlinen in the lower bathroom when checking out. All children over 2 years of age will be charged full price. Welcome to Stockholm! Kindly Jacob
host_about: Hi i am a Swedish guy 50 yrs old living with my two kids Ida 13 and Walter 11  in Stockholm just outside the citycenter. I work as a freelance lighting designer. I love biking and i know every single street in the Stockholm area. I am also an avid amateur chef and just love cooking!. besides that i like Thaiboxing, hiking and going to restaurants. I do look forward to welcoming you in my house and i since i know my city so well i look forward to help you out with rekommendations on what to see. where to eat and so on. Welcome!

name: 1700-century apartment södermalm
summary: On Mariaberget, between Maria Church and Maria Square lies this stunning 3 bedroom apartment built in 1769. Lots of cafes , restaurants, galleries and shops on the doorstep. 3 min to the subway. 7 min to Old Town.
space: At Mariaberget is this nice apartment with 3 rooms on 86 kvm built in 1769 by Mariatorget,close to everything. Dishwasher,bath,dining for 8 personer.En double bed160cm,a single bed90cm,a childbed and a sofa bed 120cm.The apartment has free internet. the apartment has a unique location,adjacent to the old town as you can walk to in 5 minutes and with everything you wish outside the gate.Shops,restaurants,museums,parks,cafes and Stockholms most beatuful vantage point around the corner.A few minutes walk to Slussen with it's range of all Stockholm subway lines and buses and boats.Or 2 min to Mariatorget Metro station. It is walking distance whereever you want to go in town./Annika

host_about:
Jag heter Annika och har två vuxna döttrar och en sjuåring. Jag älskar att resa, träffa vänner , laga mat,hålla på med keramik,odla och mitt arbete. Jag är frilansande kulturarbetare.
Jag tycker det är viktigt att det är rent och trivsamt och att jag finns för alla slags frågor under hela vistelsen. Jag bemöter mina gäster så som jag själv skulle vilja bli bemött som gäst.
Jag storm trivs i min lägenhet- hyr den gärna./allt gott Annika

name: Single bed at the lock of Stockholm
summary: You have probably never seen a better looking chandelier, ever. Period.
space: Get a homely stay in Stockholm at a unique central location with all amenities within a stone-throws distance, wether it's entertainment, shopping, museums, club-life, cafés, restaurants or sight-seing you have in mind. Slussen is the connection point between all sorts of public transport plus you have access to boats into the archipelago in the near vicinity. There is a detached shared bathroom down the hall. If you like old architecture and high ceilings in a central but quiet location, this is the place for you! Welcome! Nic & Usha
description: You have probably never seen a better looking chandelier, ever. Period. OK, there’s one option - the HILTON Hotel guest parking right next door, but you’ll
transit: Coming to Sthlm by car? Then we recommend you leave it in a nearby town and use public transport the last stretch here. Seriously. Parking in this neighborhood is not a joke and you’ll save valuable time keeping your vehicle in i longtime parking rather to find accommodation for it anywhere near here. OK, there’s one option - the HILTON Hotel guest parking right next door, but you’ll end up paying close as much for the spot as for your bed.
house_rules: No shoes, No smoking, No pets.
host_about:
Just like you, we love to travel, and when we do, we have but only one rule - learn how to say "wine and bread" in the language of the country that we're visiting.
In that way we can share a meal with new found friends - anywhere.

Home cooked food is one of our passions. While there, in our kitchen, we can circle the globe, at least once a week, and if on the road, a gas-fueld camping kitchen and our Indian spices will keep us going for months.

We tend to travel budget style, but never cheap. And we've discovered that hospitality never can be taken for granted, so we take part in chores if we are allowed. That could be anything from moving the lawn, do the laundry, paint a fence or any other household stuff.
You can say that we are kinda practical personalities by nature.

We seldom invest in guide-books but trust any locals to make sure we get introduced to their hidden treasures. We figure it's all about people and that it's supposedly easier to meet them if you aint buried your nose in a book. And many are the times when we've cut through a corner, just to explore the most unexpected things.

Summa summarum.
Live happily - Die Happier!

name: Idyllic apartment in central Stockh
space: This cosy one bedroom apartment accommodates three to four people. French balconies face the idyllic and quiet Danderydsgatan with its characteristic houses. The apartment is light and has a spacious feel to it. There is a fully equipped kitchen and tiled bathroom with a shower. There is one double bed and an additional sofa bed in the living room. There’s a subway station just down the street and bus stops within a block. The apartment is a block away from the park, Humlegården, and strolling through it you’ll be down in the shopping district in no time. Minimum stay is three nights.

summary: The appartment is comfortable, surrounded by nature and situated in a safe area. Its close to shops and restaurant and at 10 minutes walk to the inner city.  There is a balcony to relax and a beach 10 min.walk. Subway and train station are near.
space: The apartment is located in a calm and family oriented area.   It is surrounded by trees, flowers and parks.  There is 1 master bed room and a large leaving room where its possible for 2 childrens to share the big sofa.  In the appartment there is a balcony, tv, wifi high speed internet connection and everything you need to cook meals in the kitchen, the toilet room is equiped with bath and shower.  A laudry room is annexed to the appartment.  There is possibility to use the indoor parking for your car. The apartment is situated at 5 minutes walk from KTH Campus, 10 minutes bike ride from Stockholm University, 5 minutes walk from Tekniska Högskolan subway station on the red line, 10 minutes walk from Ostra station (train), 10-15 minutes walk to the city center, 5 minutes walk to Odengatan a street where you will find restaurant, pubs and shopping and you can get a swim in the Baltic at about 10 minutes walk. neighborhood_overview: The Ruddammen area is north of Stockholm.  The area is surrounded with parks at 5 minutes to the east,  sand beach at 10 minutes walk to the north.  The Royal Institute of Technology is a few steps.  Walking down the road to the south you have a subway station that will lead you to town in 5 minutes.  By walk, you will cross Odengatan a street with many coffee, shop,restaurant and Stockholm public library.  If  you continue further south west  you will be in Stureplan in 10 minutes and Central station in 15 minutes walk.
notes: We have 2 bicycle to your disposal.
transit: Subway, Bus to Tanto and Bus to Djurgarden, walking and bicycle is the most convenient!
access: The guest has accesss to the appartment, to the interior parking area and to the laudry room that belong to the appartment society.
interaction: We will make sure to meet you to give you the keys, the introduction to the appartment.  If we are not available , a member of our family will do so as we have 6 members of our family living in the same area.
house_rules: Quiet after 23.00 No smoking inside The Guest must clean before departure and leave the appartment as they found it on arrival.
host_about: I’m an artist from Québec Canada- I live in Stockholm and I'm a PhD candidate in performative and mediated pracices in circus choreography at Stockholm University of the Arts. I have been the head of the bachelor program in circus at the school of dance and circus in Stockholm for the last 10 years. I conduct artistic research, I’m a teacher and a circus director. I enjoy sailing in the Baltic Sea!

name: Unique VIlla "in the city"
space: This exclusive Villa from the mid 50´s is situated on Stora Essingen, in an exceptional calm and green area only 15 min with the local bus to Stockholm City. You can also make a nice walk during the water all the way in to the center of Stockholm along Norr Mälarstrand where the City Hall is located. The house has a balcony and a nice terrace with outdoor jacuzzi and gasbarbeque. For those of you traveling with children, there are playgrounds and a small beach nearby. It´s almost no traffic in the area.

APARTMENT: 41 sqm 1,5 room on second floor in a classic 100-year-old building (from 1910) in a quiet street of Hornstull in Sodermalm. name: Sunny Södermalm - central family apartment!
summary: There are two bedrooms,  combined livingroom / kitchen and a balcony. Location in the middle of Stockholm Södermalm, very near public transportation.  A great space for families - a car-free zone with a big public playing ground and small football field right outside. Furniture mix of vintage and new - Alvar Aalto, danish kitchen design Uniform from the sixties, 4m long sofa plenty of space for the whole family. No luxury, but coziness and sun. Linen, towels are provided. Wi-Fi - of course!
space: A compact yet spatious apartment of 60 Sqmtrs. Big bathroom with tub, two bedrooms Queen sized double beds. Sofas can sleep two, preferably kids.  Perfect for a family - sitting on the balcony you can watch the kids play in the park downstairs, shouting them in for dinner.
description: There are two bedrooms,  combined livingroom / kitchen and a balcony. Location in the middle of Stockholm Södermalm, very near public transportation.  A great space for families - a car-free zone with a big public playing ground and small football field right outside. Apartment, and courtyard with space for barbecue and private playing ground. I’m always available per Airbnb texts or telephone. At check-in, either me or a friend will welcome you. Or I provide independant check-in in accordance
neighborhood_overview: This is the best part of Södermalm - you can reach most anything within just a block or a few - shopping at Götgatan or Hornsgatan, restaurants and cafés at Swedenborgsgatan and Mariatorget,  vintage shops are sprinkled throughout the area, several large parks to choose from. Why not start the day with a swim in Årstaviken, in the park of Tanto?   Sofo starts a few blocks away, another area of Södermalm which is just as lively and cozy as our area around Mariatorget and Hornsgatan. Old town/Gamla stan is walking distance. To get to Djurgården and all the main attractions there, take the boat from Södermalm Slussen. Be sure to check out my Airbnb guidebook focusing on Södermalm - my best tips on where to get traditional swedish food or where to find punkish fine dining!
notes: No parties are aIlowed, no disturbing noice and no loud music aft (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) at nights).  Should the apartment be used for any purposes not agreed upon and in violation of swedish law I will not hesitate to act legally through authorities such as the police.
transit: The location gives you plenty of choice of public transportation - subway, commutertrain or bus. Not to speak of the best way to get around, renting a bike. Or walking.  Subway red line from Mariatorget  or green line from Medborgarplatsen six blocks away. Commutertrain one block away and by far the fastest to get around if the stops suit your route. For example Odenplan in three minutes. Bus 55 down at Magnus Ladulåsgatan is just around the corner and takes you right down to the City - the Kings castle, Nationalmuseum, Kungsträdgården, Stureplan. Parking on Magnus Ladulåsgatan is better than in most streets. You need to pay the parking fee to Stockholms stad. The app EasyPark is useful. Note - cleaning night between Monday and tuesday. If you want free parking, go to the quiet suburbian area Svedmyra and catch the subway to Medborgarplatsen right back.
access: Apartment, and courtyard with space for barbecue and private playing ground.
interaction: I’m always available per Airbnb texts or telephone. At check-in, either me or a friend will welcome you. Or I provide independant check-in in accordance with info prior to stay.
house_rules: We do have a pet ourselves - a small hamster, but since we have relatives who are allergic to for example cats, pets are not (Website hidden by Airbnb) smoking inside, quietness that is no partying or other behaviour which could be of disturbance.  So far all guests have been wonderfully nice and considerate, which we do highly appreciate this being our home. I would not hesitate though taking actions would it become apparent the flat is used for anything else than what is agreed - that is spending a nice holiday in Stockholm.  So I welcome any considerate and merry person/party  to book, and I do appreciate a personal mail prior to booking. i`m happy to answer any questions.
host_about: I´m a professional artist living in Stockholm with my 14-year old daughter. We appreciate living in the midst of Stockholm and Södermalm - being able to go swimming and skating since water is present all around us.  Usually we spend most of our vacations and weekends in our summerhouse, an old chapel,  north of Stockholm.  Besides swedish, I speak english and german, but I do understand also French. Might answer in English though.

name: Artists loft with amazing park view
summary: Welcome to my beautiful loft in the heart of Stockholm! You will be staying in a quiet, unique, comfortable apartment with an amazing park view, around the corner from some of the cities best sights and only 15 minute walk from the central station.
space: This space is quite unique, in a 100 year old building with an incredible view. The ceiling is high and the apartment is very spacious, light and has a ton of character. It is arranged for one person or a couple and has everything you need to be comfortable.
description: Welcome to my beautiful loft in the heart of Stockholm! You will be staying in a quiet, unique, comfortable apartment with an amazing park view, around the corner from some of the cities best sights and only 15 minute walk from the central station.  This space is quite unique, in a 100 year old building with an incredible view. The ceiling is high and the apartment is very spacious, light and has a ton of character. It is arranged for one person or a couple and has everything you need to be comfortable.  In my apartment, I want you to feel like home! I am a photographer so the apartment if full of photos, paintings, magazines and things I find beautiful.. as long as you are respectful you are free to use whatever you like!  The two large wardrobes in the hall will be locked and are private. Towels, linnenes etc will of course be provided for you! I have lived in Stockholm for a long time and will do my best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. I am happy to recommend some wonder
neighborhood_overview: The location is great for me who is always late, the apartment is on a quiet street but around the corner is Stockholms third largest communications hub, you can anywhere from here, fast! Also the central station is only 15 minute walk away so getting here from the airport is super easy by foot, or cheap by cab. There are many shops, and wonderful cafés and restaurant, this area is the more quiet, sombre area of stockholm where many actors, lawyers, doctors etc live. 5 minutes walk away from the apartment is the famous beach walk along Norr Mälarstrand that goes all the way to city hall. There are also plenty of bike stations for renting city bikes, food courts and pretty much anything you might need. For me it is the ideal place to be in Stockholm.

The two large wardrobes in the hall will be locked and are private. Towels, linnenes etc will of course be provided for you!
interaction: I have lived in Stockholm for a long time and will do my best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. I am happy to recommend some wonderful resturants, clubs, bars, sights.. You can call me at any time and I will be glad to help you out, but of course you get the apartment to yourself during your stay!
host_about:
Hello!
. 
My name is Sima, I am a long-time resident of Stockholm and (like most people on Airbnb) love to travel. I've lived on a few different continents, but Stockholm is my home. My biggest interests are photography, history books, nightlife, food and cycling.

Send me a message and I'll answer all your questions about Stockholm!

name: Townhouse near Stockholm city
summary: The area is of high interest for architectures and for people who like beautiful things. It´s almost country side, almost down town. Metro: 15 minutes from the Central station, by car: 10 minutes, by bike: 20 minutes. Welcome!
space: We have a beautiful charmy townhouse in a suburb close to the centre of Stockholm. The house itself is, just like the area as such, a cultural piece of art. The garden is quite big and the area is very nice for children.  The house consists of three floors. The three bedrooms are located in the basement and on the first florr. When you enter the house, constructed in 1909, you face the kitchen, to the left you have a small bathroom. To the right the livingroom is located. Upstairs you have two beautiful bedrooms.  It´s easy to go down town by metro (about ten minutes) or by bike or by car (5 minutes). We do not have a car and even though we have two small kids (1 and 3 years old) we manage just fine going back and forth to the city. The surrounding suburbs are worth exploring, and the famous graveyard, Skogsjyrkogården is close to us as well as the quite oasis, Margaretaparken and if you want to go swiming there is a huge swimingpool a few stops away and a beach Farsta Strandbad also q

neighborhood_overview: Det är väldigt vänliga och snälla grannar. Men husen ligger tätt, det är viktigt att viss hänsyn särskilt i trädgården. Tiden man kan vistas och ha det härligt i sin trädgård är ju tyvärr kort i Sverige så det är viktigt att tänka på att alla runt omkring ska kunna njuta av det i lugn och ro. Man tar det lite lugnt i trädgården.
notes: Vårt hus är något av ett hus på landet fast det är i stan. Vi har exempelvis ingen diskmaskin utan diskar för hand.  Huset är över hundra år gammalt och kräver att man är lite försiktig med det, med golv, fönster osv. Det har ju stått sig länge men man får, som med gamla människor, behandla det med respekt. Det finns i dagsläget en fungerande toalett. Är man känslig för ljus får man sova i gästrummet i källaren där det är lite mörkare.  Vi lämnar kvar torrvaror etcetera och det är förstås bara att ta av mat som man behöver.  Det finns två mackar i närheten som har öppet dygnet runt (ligger vid Globen) där kan man också handla basvaror om man kommer fram sent.  Även Coop i närheten, på Sockenplan, har generösa öppettider. Det är ungefär tre kilometer att gå till Södermalm och drygt 6 kilometer till centrala Stockholm.
transit: Gamla Enskede är ett anrikt villaområde nära stan. Det är lätt att ta sig till oss med tunnelbana men det är en liten bit att gå till och från tunnelbanan. Cirka 800 meter.  Kollektivtrafik rullar hela tiden.  Finns två olika gröna linjer att åka med: en mot Farsta strand (avstigning Sandsborg) och en mot Hagsätra (avstigning Sockenplan).  Bil fungerar också bra!  Vi parkerar vår bil på uppfarten till huset men det är en trottoarkant så inget att rekommendera för låg bil och var försiktig när ni backar ut från uppfarten för det bor många små barn i området och sikten är dålig.  Rekommenderar att gå!  Det är cirka tre kilometer till Södermalm, en kilometer (knappt) till Globen, Tele 2 Arena med nöje och lite shopping samt aktivitetcentret Tolv som har bowling, drejning osv. Det är runt 6 kilometer till centrala Stockholm (city). Jag promenerar ofta till jobbet i långsam takt, det ligger vid t-centralen och det tar cirka en timme.
access: Hela huset med källare samt trädgården utanför med en liten grill och trevlig uteplats. Området är ganska lugnt, husen ligger tätt så man måste visa hänsyn till grannar som också vistas i sina mysiga trädgårdar.
interaction: Jag är tillgänglig via mejl och sms samt telefon - om det är några funderingar, frågor eller tips på aktiviteter.
house_rules: Please pay respect to the house as it is an old house and pay respect to our neighbours. Our garden is quite big but being a townhouse and a quiet neighbourhood, the neighbours do hear everything in the garden. They are very friendly so please pay respect to them and dont listen to music outside.
host_about: I work with media and my husband is an art teacher. We like to travel, read, good food and to meet new people from all over the world.

name: Trendy and stylish Södermalm
summary: Close to everything and in the relaxed and trendy part of Stockholm. Spacious apartment with all the things you will need. I will also try to do our best to make your visit match your expectations.
space: Dear visitor, Welcome to the page of my home. It's a lovely apartement right close to the city center and on Mariatorget at Södermalm. Close to all the fine restaurants as well as famous bars, parks och city beaches. Here you find on of Europes best bars such as Bar Hommage, or the old prison Häktet that is now a great restaurant and bar which is the talk of the town. Or how about uber trendy Paradiso, which is one of Swedens best restaurants - all this within a minute walk from the apartment. The apartement has 85 square meters. There are 2 large bedrooms with lots of space. In these there are 1 double beds, king size US, each so there is room. You´ll have one of these rooms for your own since. I could maybe arrange another staying for my self but I cant make any promises. The apartment has brightness and is stylisch decorated. You'll find a laundry room in the basement where you easily find time to do laundry. I keep it neat and tidy and hope you respect that. Kindly, // André

name: Cozy apt in central Stockholm
summary: There's a 140cm wide bed for 2 ppl and a couch for 1 person in this cozy apartment in Södermalm, Stockholm. The apartment was renovated in 2010 except bathroom which was renovated in 2015.
space: Apartment is located in wonderful Södermalm. It was renovated in 2010 with new wooden floor, wallpapers, oven and dishwasher. The balcony is facing south meaning sun from morning until late afternoon. There is one big bed for 2 people and a couch for 1 person. Treat our home as you would like us to treat yours! When leaving the apartment, always lock the door. No smoking indoors. Please don't use outdoor shoes indoors as the floors are delicate.  The subway is just a 5min walk away and it takes you to the central station in 6min. There are lots of restaurants in the area and lots of things to see in Stockholm.

neighborhood_overview: A few blocks away is the lake Årstaviken which is beautiful to walk along both in winter and in summer. In summer you can go swimming there. There are lots of restaurants just within a few blocks. You can find sushi, indian, italian, Swedish and lots of other food. The Ringen shopping center (ringencentrum dot se), isn't huge but has around 20 stores and is just a 5min walk away. For bigger shopping areas you just need to travel downtown in 6min using subway, or taking a nice 30min walk over Slussen and Gamla Stan (old town).
transit: 5 min walk to Skanstull subway station.
interaction: I will be travelling but can be contacted via e-mail or phone and try to respond as quickly as possible.
house_rules: Treat our home as you would like us to treat yours! When leaving the apartment, always lock the door. No smoking indoors. Please don't use outdoor shoes indoors as the floors are delicate.
host_about: I am a software developer living in Stockholm.

name: Topmodern apartment in trendy Söder
space: A warm welcome to this top modern three bedroom (92 sqm/990 sqfeet), apartment suitable for a large group or a big family on a perfect location in one of the most cosy neighbourhoods! Suitable for up to five persons. Situated on the southern island of central Stockholm, "Södermalm". The subway is within a three minute walk, accessing the central station in eight minutes, as is the supermarket and, another few minutes are a newly built shopping mall with stores, restaurants, grocery stores, café, weekend markets etc. A hundred meters in the other direction you can go for a stroll next to the water or walk out on Långholmen or Reimersholme, two beautiful green and peaceful islands in the heart of Stockholm, perfect for a picnic or for a dip in the water.  From the apartment you will reach the archipelago-bound boats in a matter of minutes, and the subway will bring you to museums, concerts, bars and nature, all within 30 minutes. The apartment are also suitable for children with a playgr

house_rules: Here are some simple house rules that we would like you to follow; 1. Don't damage the property. ( if it happens, let us know and if repairs are needed) 2. Don't disturb the neighbors. They are friendly and we hope that they will stay that way. (no loud music late at night and so on...) 3. Leave the place clean.  - Please undo the beds and throw the washing in front of the washing machine. - Empty the garbage and throw it in the garbage room under the apartment (see info  in the apartment manual on the dining table) - Do not leave any food in the refrigerator 4. Animals and smoking is absolutely forbidden.  Thank you, here is your deposit back.
host_about: Hello, we are a Stockholmcouple consisting of PO, a 38 year old naprapath and Madeleine (36) a public health planner. We have three kids, one 6-year old and twin girls, 3 years old. We enjoy beeing outdoors, running, travelling and spending time with our family and friends. Our home is perfect and has everything you need, so a warm welcome to our apartment!

name: Nice townhouse close to Stockholm C
space: Our townhouse close to Stockholm city only 14 minutes to T-centralen with underground. The house is in Mälarhöjden a very nice area south of the city and very close to the lake Mälaren.  You can walk to the underground from the house it only takes 5 minutes. We have 4 bedrooms in our house. Two with double beds. We got two bathrooms one with shower and one with bath. The kitchen is full of nessary equipment.  The center were you can do some shopping is only 5 minutes away. There are also a few restaurants.  We have a really nice backyard with a big wooden veranda where you can sit and eat and it's really green and nice outside. We usually have barbecues and sit down and eat together with friends and family. You can park for free on the street outside the house. If you want a holiday in a nice area close to beaches and nearby activities like kayaking, fishing and sailing and also close to the city center with more than 1000 pubs and restaurants you should choose our house. From Arlanda

name: Studio in the heart of Stockholm!
space: A charming and comfortable one bedroom apartment with the best location in Stockholm city you ask for. Centrally located in trendy Vasastan near Odenplan and right next to the City centre with it's shopping streets and nightlife. The apartment is within walking distance to all the cityparts and is the perfect starting point for your holiday in Stockholm. The apartment is bright and is located on the 4th floor in a 1800th century building. It has old wooden floors and fine details that make it extra charming. Bathroom with bathtub and a kitchenette with stove and oven. For travellers this is the perfect apartment with 3 minutes walking distance to Arlanda Express (that takes you to/from the airport). Nearest metro is Hötorget, Rådmansgatan, or the Central Station. Close to many bus lines. Very close to fantastic parks and beautiful water where you can swim in the summer. Perfect apartment that makes your holiday a charming and trendy Stockholm expercience!

space: The location at Fridhemsplan is perfect with the city pulse right outside the house. There is an Arlanda airport shuttle bus service directly to my home. name: Charming, elegant condo in downtown Stockholm city
summary: Imagine yourself being a local in downtown Stockholm for your vacation or job in Sweden. You get to be in the heart of Stockholm and experience the urban lifestyle in this top modern Studio apartment. You will be close to everything, including only a 10 min taxi ride from "Stureplan" where many restaurants bars and clubs are located. Just book now and have an awesome stay:).
space: My apartment is located in the heart of Stockholm (Vasastaden). Its 50 meters from two big supermarkets. Right next to me are many great restaurants including the famous "Döden i grytan" which is a well known Italian restaurant. Also within 5 min walk to the metro/trainstation (Odenplan) and the bus station is just around the corner. There are also shops, bakery and a park right next to me with a lot of green areas.  The apartment is a studio with a small but fully equipped custom built kitchen, It has oven, micro, induction cooker, dishwasher and so on. And in the kitchen is a table thats big enough for two persons to enjoy food plus a Nespresso machine:). There is s small bathroom with a nice zink and a separate Italian mosaic rainbow shower with a glass door and dimmable spotlights. Also dimmable spotlights in the kitchen plus floor heating. name: 90 m2 family flat mid Södermalm
summary: Very central located apartment in the best part of Stockholm (Södermalm). The apartment is spacious, very family friendly and caters all your needs. Welcome!
space: A very family friendly apartment on the 5th floor located in the absolute center of Södermalm. But still a very quiet area. The apartment has an open planning with a spacious living room. The apartment has an open planning with a spacious living room and a big kitchen leading out to the very big balcony (sun between 14-19 p.m.). On the balcony you have sunchairs, 2 sofas and a table, and it´s also possible to sit here when it's raining. In the kitchen you easily sit 6 people and it is equipped with dishwasher, microwave and everything you need to cook.  Master bedroom has a king size bed (180 cm) and a crib, the second bedroom has a queen size bed (105 cm) and in the third bedroom there is a 90 cm bed. Mattrasses for two additional guests can be arranged.  There are two bathrooms, whereas in the big one there is a tub, shower, washing machine, toilet, sink and space possible to use as a baby dressing table. The small bathroom has a toilet and a sink. name: Flat in central Stockholm Södermalm
summary: Cozy and comfortable 3 room apartment in the lovely and loved area of Södermalm. Minutes away from the best shops, cafes, bars, parks and attractions of Södermalm - this is were it's happening!
space: Located in the middle of the area with great access to both sides: south and north Södermalm. Walking distance to all the best places, close to buses and tube that quickly takes you to the rest of Stockholm and its attractions. Minutes away from Tanto and Årstaviken were you can hang out during spring and summer days - picknick in the grass, minigolf, conserts, strolling beside the water, having a beer, laying on the beach or swimming! Nice house built 1938. Wifi-acess. Towels and linnen provided. Possibility to ask the hostess during the whole stay by text or by phone.

name: Centralt på Södermalm
space: Charmig lägenhet med öppen planlösning på två rum och kök fem trappor upp i ett hus från 1993. Mycket centralt läge nära pendeltågsstationen, en hållplats från Centralen. Buss 57 går till NK och Kungsträdgården. Fem minuters promenad till Mariatorget  (T-bana) och Medborgarplatsen (T-bana) och tio minuter till Mosebacke och Sofo.  På 20 minuter går du till Gamla stan och Djugårdsfärjan.  Inglasad balkong, ljust och härligt. TV finns, 40", använder min mobil för internetuppkoppling, finns trådlöst på kaféet på Swedenborgsgatan.  Gott om alla sorters ställen att hänga på, från små indier till Ramblas & tapas och Björn & Bennys pratvänliga Rival, Johan & Nyström, Morfar Ginko, Harrys, Shanti. Vintgageshopping i Sofo, Vitabergsparken, Tanto.  Det bästa med lägenheten, förutom att den är ljus och solig, är att det går att sova med öppet fönster och bara lyssna till fåglarna och slippa alla trafikljud.

name: Apt. with balcony in the center
space: Welcome to a unique apartment in central Stockholm. In three minutes with train from Central Station (T-centralen) and a five minutes walk you are at the appartement. The apartment is on the fifth flor and has a wonderful wiew over a park at one side and a green back yard with a playground at the other. It is light and sunny and very quiet. The area is in the center of Södermalm but still you can reach a big green area (Tantolunden) in one minute. Here you can walk, run, play, and even go swimming on the beach.  There is also a minigolf course and a big playground by the beach. If you walk in the other direction from the apartment you will reach a lot of restaurants, bars, boutiques and galleries. The subway and busses are close and will easily take you around to other parts of Stockholm. Stand for City-bikes (20€ for three days) are a minute away from the apartment door. You can reach most places of interest in the city with bike.  The apartment contains of a modern kitchen (renovated

You can reach most places of interest in the city with bike.  The apartment contains of a modern kitchen (renovat
transit: Från lägenheten kan man ta sig runt på många sätt. Till fots är att rekommendera men ska du längre bort finns både buss, t-bana eller pendeltåg på bara några minuters avstånd. Hyrcyklar finns utanför på trotoaren.
access: Här bor man bekvämt och bilfritt. Ens sidan av lägenheten har man utsikt över trätopparna i en park och på andra sidan vetter balkongen ut mot den gröna innergården med lekplatser och många platser att sitta på. Här finns också ett pingisbord som är fritt fram att använda. 10 minuters promenad tar dig ner till stranden där det finns badbryggor, trampolin och klättervägg. Här finns också café, lekplats och minigolfbana.
interaction: Jag bor i mitt sommarhus utanför Stockholm men finns tillgänglig på telefon eller mail om det skulle vara något.
house_rules: Ingen rökning inomhus. På balkongen går det bra om dörren är stängd.  Inget festande i lägenheten och jag vill att ni tar hänsyn till grannar. Som i alla lägenheter ska det vara någorlunda tyst efter kl 10 på kvällen.  Ta hand om min lägenhet och sakerna som finns där. No smoking inside - but it´s ok on the balcony. No partying and late nights, it´s a quiet home for people that is enjoying a calm life. No washing or loud sounds after 10 in the evening. Treat the appartment and things in it with care.
host_about:
Eftersom jag själv uppskattar alternativa boenden när jag reser utomlands blev jag väldigt glad när jag upptäckte Airbnb. När jag började fundera så kom jag fram till att även jag kan hyra ut min lägenhet eftersom den står tom många helger och hela sommaren. Att få ta emot människor i mitt hem känns som ett sätt att bjuda tillbaka på den gästfrihet som andra människor har visat mig på mina resor under åren. 

Since I appreciate alternative accommodation when I travel abroad, I was very happy when I discovered Airbnb. When I began to think I came to the conclusion that even I can rent out my apartment because it is empty many weekends and throughout the summer. To let people stay in my home feels in some way like giving back a little bit of the hospitality that other people have shown me on my travels over the years.

name: Adorable house- near nature & city
summary: This house is ideal if you are looking to experience the beautiful nature of Stockholm. Depending on our family's travel plans our house will be available in July/early Aug. minimum stay is six nights. Feel free to drop us a line to check availability.
space: This house is ideal if you are looking to experience the beautiful nature of Stockholm as well as Stockholm city center. This beautiful house comfortably fits up to 6 people and with its beautiful surroundings and  easy access to the city center (30-45 min), this will be your perfect vacation rental.  The house has a front and back veranda, BBQ, two big screen TVs, and wireless 100Mbps network. The sofa in the living room is a comfortable sofa bed where 2 grown-ups can sleep. The childrens' rooms offers two single beds and the master bedroom has a double bed.  You can reach us by phone or email and we will get back to you quickly!  We have great neighbors who will help you with what ever you may need. The neighborhood is safe and quiet and perfect for a family with children.  The house is located in a quiet family neighborhood and 30-45 min away from Stockholm city center with public transportation (bus, train and subway). There are a few different options to get to and from the house.

neighborhood_overview: We have great neighbors who will help you with what ever you may need. The neighborhood is safe and quiet and perfect for a family with children.
notes: If you need any additional services like extra house cleaning during your stay or tour trips, please contact us. Baby friendly You may also request, in advance a baby chair.
transit: The house is located in a quiet family neighborhood and 30-45 min away from Stockholm city center with public transportation (bus, train and subway). There are a few different options to get to and from the house. I prefer to take the bus (located just near the house) to Spanga Station (takes about 5 min) and then I jump on the train for 15 min to Stockholm city center. Alternatively, you can walk 10 min to a subway station named Johannelund and be in Stockholm city center in 30 min.
access: You are welcome to access any part of the house, including the back and front terrace which both have tables and chairs for 4-6 people. The backyard also has a barbecue.
interaction: Feel free to contact me at anytime! I usually respond rather quickly depending on the timezone I'm in.
house_rules: No smoking allowed. No pets allowed. Please turn off all lights and all electrical appliances when you leave the house. Please do not waste water. Our planet thanks you! Guests of guests You are more than welcomed to bring your friends and relatives in as long as the total number sleeping is still within the maximum allowed. Furniture We would really appreciate not to move the furniture around, since we must always keep things as they were for our next guests.  Items in the apartment Small or big, all items in the apartment are not to be taken away. Quiet times We all like to chat and party. But we never now if your neighbors are up to it. So bear in mind that the night rest period starts from 10:00 pm. Please enjoy your stay!!!
host_about: We love to travel and believe in sharing

name: Designer home w. view - 3 bedrooms
summary: Our cool and spacious home is perfect for a city weekend w. easy access to all major sights, shopping and restaurants! It has an eclectic and fun feel with a large kitchen, generous dining area, big living room, two balconies and lots of light.
space: Welcome to our home in the middle of Stockholm. The building is from 1907 and has all the period details with high ceilings, large windows and large rooms.  The apartment is located on the 5th floor with southern and western aspects and spectacular views.  The apartment is 140 square meters in total, has 3 bedrooms, a spacious kitchen, a living room with balcony and a large entry hall.  The kitchen and the bath is to modern standard. Large windows and two balconies provide lots of natural light.  The apartments layout: Living room with balcony and fireplace Bedroom #1  w. with balcony and one queen size bed sleeps 2 people Bedroom #2  with 2 beds sleeps 2 people  Bedroom #3 / study w. generous desk and one twin bed sleeps 1 person Fully stocked eat in kitchen with all tools and appliances needed for cooking and a table that easily seats 10 people.  Spacious hall way with a library and a selection of dvd:s.  Powder room  Bath room with a claw foot tub and subway tiles.  All rooms have h
description: Our cool and spacious home is perfect for a city weekend w. easy access to all major sights, shopping and restaurants! It has an eclectic and fun feel with a large kitchen, generous dining area, big living room, two balconies and lots of light. Welcome to our home in the middle of Stockholm. The building is from 1907 and has all the period details with high ceilings, large windows and large rooms.  The apartment is located on the 5th floor with southern and western aspects and spectacular views.  The apartment is 140 square meters in total, has 3 bedrooms, a spacious kitchen, a living room with balcony and a large entry hall.  The kitchen and the bath is to modern standard. Large windows and two balconies provide lots of natural light.  The apartments layout: Living room with balcony and fireplace Bedroom #1  w. with balcony and one queen size bed sleeps 2 people Bedroom #2  with 2 beds sleeps 2 people  Bedroom #3 / study w. generous desk and one twin bed sleeps 1 person Fully stocked
neighborhood_overview: Unique location in one of Stockholm's inner-city boroughs and close to many of the major sights, restaurants and shops.  Within a 5 minute walk you will reach one of Stockholm's largest parks – a perfect spot for a picnic and a swim during summer. Adjacent to the park there is a tranquil promenade along the water edge perfect for a walk or a morning run. Easy access to subway and all the major bus lines as well as Airport Coach. The apartment is literally one minute from the subway and a major transportation hub. You can walk to the city center in approximately 20 minutes.
notes: Please note that this is a central city location and there is traffic and occasional sounds from the many restaurants in the area. Due to the southern aspect the apartment can get hot during the warmer parts of summer. The bathroom has a tub with a handheld shower head only. The building is old with a lot of character and the apartment is an actual home with some wear and beautiful, rickety old floors. If you are looking for a spotless hotel experience this is not for you, but if you enjoy living as a local welcome to our home!
transit: Easy access to subway and all the major bus lines as well as Airport Coach. The apartment is literally one minute from the subway and a major transportation hub. You can walk to the city center in approximately 20 minutes.
access: You will have access to all rooms.
interaction: As a guest you will have access to the whole apartment. Our house manager will check you in and will be at hand during your stay.
house_rules: * Quiet time from 9.00 pm till 9.00 am as a courtesy to our neighbours.  * This apartment is non-smoking.  * No parties are allowed.  * Please remove your shoes when you are inside the apartment. Take good care of our home and it will take good care of you!
host_about: We are a swedish couple who divide our time between Los Angeles, Stockholm and our summerhouse in Gotland. Both designers with grown up kids. We are curious travelers, readers and movie buffs. And we love to cook. When you stay with us you will be staying in our actual home in our absence. It is "like staying at a friend's place" as one of our guests put it. Our homes are eclectic and lived in.

The apartment is fully renovated and located on the top floor (6th) with elevator. This is our personal apartment so some of our things will be in the drawers and closets.

name: Quiet peaceful apt at Mariatorget
summary: Peaceful, cozy two room apartment in a 19th century building with a beautiful quiet backyard. Central location near Mariatorget at the heart of Södermalm.
space: Two room apartment for 1 to 2 persons: - Fully furnished, with a fully equipped kitchen. - Large living room with a logfire and two beautiful windows towards the street.  - Bed room towards a quiet backyard, with a double bed (120 cm). - Free wireless internet and TV.  -  Small bathroom with shower.  - Clean linens & towels provided.  Neighborhood  The flat is located in the heart of Södermalm on a quiet side street, yet VERY close to some of Stockholms best coffee shops, bars, restaurants and shopping. Stockholm City is small so you can basically walk anywhere within 30 minutes. Subway station (Mariatorget) and commuter train on a three-minute walking distance as well as buses and rental bikes. Walking distance to:  Medborgarplatsen (5 min)  Slussen (5 min)  Old Town (10 min)  City center / Sergels Torg (20 min)

name: Stockholm, Östermalm w yard & hen!
summary: Beautiful and comfortable apartment in a very nice area of Stockholm, 7 mins from the Central Station, yet with a beautiful garden, and free ranging hen in the yard!  Comfortable beds that sleep 5 people. A double bed in the master bedroom, a smaller double bed in the second bedroom, and two separate beds; a wide single bed in the third bedroom. Welcome to an oasis in the midst of Stockholm. Here you´re within 7 minutes from T-Centralen, w a subway station and a bus stop outside the door.
space: Beautiful and comfortable apartment in a very nice area of Stockholm, 7 mins from the Central Station, yet with a beautiful garden, and free ranging hen in the yard!  Comfortable beds that sleep 5 people. A double bed in the master bedroom, a smaller double bed in the second bedroom, and two separate beds; a wide single bed, in the third bedroom.  High speed wifi access, nice kitchen with new fridge/freezer, dishwasher, induction stove and microwave. Bathroom with rain shower & bath tub, W/D, subway and bus stop right outside the door. Welcome to an oasis in the midst of Stockholm. Here you are within 7 minutes from T-Centralen (the Central train station and the airport buses), Old Town, Östermalmstorg, or Stureplan (the trendy/posh part of town). At the same time, you´ll leave the bustle of the city streets and arrive to our yard with ecological gardens and free ranging hens - so you get the best of both worlds!  Our apartment building turned 105 years old this year - it´s a gorgeous

neighborhood_overview: Like a small town within the city of Stockholm.
notes: No elevator.
transit: The subway is right outside the door (7 mins to the Central station, 8 mins to Old Town, 5 mins to Östermalm (posh part of town), as is a bus stop that will take you all over the city with a nice view! There is plenty of street parking right outside (parking fees apply M-F 9-17)
access: The whole house
interaction: You´ll be able to reach me with any questions that you may have about your stay, or about Stockholm :-)
house_rules: • No smoking • In Sweden, it is common courtesy not to wear outdoor shoes indoors. We keep them in the entrance hall. • Only renting guests allowed in the apartment. No visitors please. • Please leave everything the way you found it! Thank you.
host_about:
I´m born and raised in Stockholm, but have lived most of my adult life in the US (have dual citizenship and am both Swedish and American) - I lived in Los Angeles to be more precise. I have also lived in London and in Madrid and when I did photography exhibits my work took me around the world. 
I currently work as a Political Advisor, my field of expertise is gender equality, as well as international affairs. I studied International Development Studies at UCLA. 
I live with my two children, a 10-year old boy and an 8-year old girl. (And our part-time fostercat that we are watching since her owner passed away. We say foster cat because sometimes the cat goes to stay with the children from her first family.) 
We lead a rather busy life, with full time work, the children go to an international school nearby, and we all take lots of classes ranging from Chinese, piano, cello, ballet, aikido, scouts, choir and yoga. We also tend to travel a lot - thus our trying out airbnb! This summer we will be traveling to Capri, Italy. In the fall we´re going to Shanghai, and for Christmas, Los Angeles.
My favorite movie is Frank Capra´s "It´s a Wonderful Life" and my favorite song is Louis Armstrong´s "It´s a Wonderful World." If I include the kids, our favorite movie would be "Horton Hears a Who!" and our favorite song might be something from Ella Fitzgerald that our neighbour plays on her old grammophone player outdoors. We all love Japanese food and chocolate cakes. I also love coffee ;-). When it comes to a life motto, I think mine is "It always seems impossible - until it´s done!" (Nelson Mandela).
We´re very friendly people and hope that you will enjoy staying in our home!

No parking is included in the space but usually finding a parking spot outside or close is not an issue.

name: Top floor central Stockholm, 2 BALC
summary: A wonderful apartment of 94 sg.m, 4 rooms with an open planning and 2 bedrooms, top floor, no insight and a stunning view. Centrally located on Söder, close to everything but quiet area. 2 private balconies and a roof terrace. Good communications.
space: Welcome to this wonderful  apartment of 94 sq.m, located at the top floor. The apartment is renovated and architect designed in an effort to keep the original Swedish functionalist style. The house is from 1938 and drawn by architect Albin Stark. No insight and with a stunning view over Stockholm (Skansen, Gröna Lund amusement park etc.). The apartment has four rooms with open planning and two bedrooms. Fully equipped kitchen with underfloor heating, as in bathroom. One bedroom with a double bed, 180 cm wide Dux bed. The second bedroom has a 120 cm bed and a 90 mattress. You can also sleep well on the sofa in the living room. There is also a 140 cm wide inflatable bed. The apartment is bright with fireplace, large windows with views of Skansen and Gröna Lund. There are two balconies to the east (sun from early morning until 13 o'clock), with a hammock and a dining area, infra red heating and awning. In addition, there is a roof terrace facing west. Peaceful location next to a park. Ame
description: A wonderful apartment of 94 sg.m, 4 rooms with an open planning and 2 bedrooms, top floor, no insight and a stunning view. Centrally located on Söder, close to everything but quiet area. 2 private balconies and a roof terrace. Good communications. Welcome to this wonderful  apartment of 94 sq.m, located at the top floor. The apartment is renovated and architect designed in an effort to keep the original Swedish functionalist style. The house is from 1938 and drawn by architect Albin Stark. No insight and with a stunning view over Stockholm (Skansen, Gröna Lund amusement park etc.). The apartment has four rooms with open planning and two bedrooms. Fully equipped kitchen with underfloor heating, as in bathroom. One bedroom with a double bed, 180 cm wide Dux bed. The second bedroom has a 120 cm bed and a 90 mattress. You can also sleep well on the sofa in the living room. There is also a 140 cm wide inflatable bed. The apartment is bright with fireplace, large windows with views of Skanse
neighborhood_overview: We love the proximity and tranquility in the town center.  Situated in a lovely, peaceful area full of trees and parks. But only 2 min walk from the bars and restaurants around the popular Nytorget square and Götgatsbacken/Medborgarplatsen. The area SOFO is home to a multitude of unusual, interesting and contemporary boutiques for fashion, design, interior décor, vintage merchandise. The flat also makes an ideal base from which to visit Gamla stan (old town 5 min walk), take the ferry from slussen (5 min walk) to Djurgården and Skansen Zoo, Gröna Lund amusement park, Wasa museum, Astrid Lindgrens Junibacken, ABBA museum etc. Photographic museum (Fotografiska) is just around the corner, down the stairs to the harbour. (3-4 min walk). Close to both bus and subway. No problem with parking on the streets below. We will gladly help you to find what you want, restaurants, excursions etc. And we've even made a map with some of our favorite places.
notes: During July and August and Christmas / New Year period we only rent out the apartment five (5) nights or longer. The rest of the year we rent out two to three (2-3) nights.
transit: Approximately 200 meters to the bus stop with several lines. 500 meters to the subway. Green line. Indoor garage with gate for the car a block away, if we agree on it before (free of charge). Parking is on the street outside.  We can help you to determine the best travel options from the airport to the apartment. Arlanda Express and metro / bus or taxi. We can also help you to book.
access: You will have full access to the apartment apart from a closed small studio behind the kitchen. Amenities such as wifi, imac, washer, dryer, dishwasher and a fully equipped kitchen. Travel cot for toddlers available if we agree on it before. Smoking is allowed outdoors or on the balconies.
interaction: We are normally out of town the entire stay, but we can of course get together if you wish so. But we are always available by phone and email.
house_rules: Smoking takes place outdoors on the balconies or the roof terrace.

name: Gem at Östermalm,heart of Stockholm
summary: A spacious 46m2 gem in a calm neighbourhood but in the heart of Stockholms pulse with a gorgeous little garden. Good for 1-2 people. 7 min walking distance to Stureplan (shopping, restaurants etc.) 4 min walking to Djurgården (The royal garden).
space: Supercozy big studio of 46 m2 in perfectly situated in the heart of Stockholm 7 minutes walking from Stureplan and its nighlife, shopping etc and 4 min walking to Djurgården (The royal park) and the sea. There is also a little garden just outside of the apartment with a little fountain and greeneries where in the summer there s space for sitting outside in the sun.  The apartment and clean and spaceous and perfect for 1-2 people.  46 square meter of apartment, small kitchen with all necessities. One wardrobe to use. Forbidden to smoke inside apartment.  The whole apartment will be rented. I´m very willing to give advise on where to go and what to see!   The big park (Djurgården) with its canal running through it is great for a walk. Vasamuseet is a must do if you like history and museums. Gröna Lund (in Djurgården for amusement park). Stureplan for shopping, restaurants and clubs. Grand hôtel for an afternoon tea and then a stroll to The old city (Gamla Stan) for some history and sight

Gröna Lund (in Djurgården for amusement park). Stureplan for shopping, restaurants and clubs. I love where my apartment is situated because it´s close to all this (walking) and its in a calm block even though its close to all the action!
notes: Only max 2 ppl.
transit: Closest metro is Karlaplan (app.100meters). Closest bus stop is Grevgatan. From the airport you can take the Airport coaches (Flygbussarna) to Cityterminalen then bus 56 goes from just a few meters away (across the street) directly to Grevgatan. Otherwise its 2 stops with metro/underground to Karlaplan. No parking included.

summary: In the east Sofo, a calm and cosy area close to a more vibrant area. Close to lakes and beautiful nature as well as a good location if you want to explore Södermalm and Stockholm.
space: Close to Pom & Flora, best breakfast in Södermalm and Ai Ramen, delicious noodle place and cosy bar as well.
description: In the east Sofo, a calm and cosy area close to a more vibrant area. Close to lakes and beautiful nature as well as a good location if you want to explore Södermalm and Stockholm. Close to Pom & Flora, best breakfast in Södermalm and Ai Ramen, delicious noodle place and cosy bar as well. I'll stay with my boyfriend during the renting. If you want I'll take my cat with me, no problem. Short walk to metro Slussen, Medborgarplatsen and Skanstull. City buses are just around the corner.
neighborhood_overview: Cosy neighbourhood and friendly neighbours. Great bakery, art gallery, Coop supermarket, noodle resturant, Lokes bar which offers a genuine feeling of the neighbourhood.  I enjoy having a glass of wine at Folii Wine bar or visit the Vitabergsparken just a 2 minute walk, a beautiful park with a spectacular view over Södermalm.
notes: I have a cat but it stays with me at a different location.
transit: Short walk to metro Slussen, Medborgarplatsen and Skanstull. City buses are just around the corner.
access: Easy access to house laundry in the cellar.
interaction: I'll stay with my boyfriend during the renting. If you want I'll take my cat with me, no problem.
host_about: I'm a 35 year old speech and language pathologist, working mainly with speech and voice therapy. I love discovering old and new music, reading, listening to podcasts, running, dancing and hanging out with friends. Originally from Gothenburg and I used to live in Paris and Helsinki but my heart belongs in Stockholm, where I've lived for 15 years.

host_about:
Im working with theatre, producing, directing and performing  And Im travelling a lot with my work. My apartment is in an old house in the middle of the city, with only 7 other neighbours. 
I lived in this apartment for over 30 years. It is more than 3 meters to the ceiling , old wooden floor. I also have a lovely terass where you can grill or just sit and join the view over Stockholm. The bathrom is the old kitchen and therefore very big and with a great view over Stockholm. 
THe location cant be better since its right in the center just by the old town, at SLUSSEN. Its walking distance to the south part, sofo of Stockholm and buses and subway are just 2 min from apartment. Götgatan which is the mainstreet nearest , have a lot of good Cafez, shops and bars. But its still calm and nice inside. I live here with my son. It is a uniq and great house and place close by the water in the middle of beautiful Stockholm. Welcome.

name: Clean and comfortable with a view!
summary: Cosy, airy and quiet guest room in family apartment. You will get your own private space, still being able to enjoy the company of a typical Stockholm family if you wish. The room faces north with a beautiful view of the water and Kungsholmen
space: An nice, clean and bright room in a calm family apartment! Our family with two adults and two children live here permanently. Pure cotton sheets and towels, down duvets and cushions. Basic breakfast included.
description: Cosy, airy and quiet guest room in family apartment. You will get your own private space, still being able to enjoy the company of a typical Stockholm family if you wish. The room faces north with a beautiful view of the water and Kungsholmen An nice, clean and bright room in a calm family apartment! Our family with two adults and two children live here permanently. Pure cotton sheets and towels, down duvets and cushions. Basic breakfast included. You get your own bedroom with a comfortable bed with down pillows and duvet, extra duvets provided should you need some. We set the bed with clean cotton sheets and towels before your arrival and will provide clean set for you every 7 days.  Shared bath/shower and a separate guest toilet.    Wi-fi.  Guests have access to all shared/social parts of the apartment: kitchen, living room, dining area, bath room and guest toilet. Access to living room and access to use of kitchen with some space in our fridge and if needed also in the freezer. We a
neighborhood_overview: The island of Lilla Essingen is a beautiful area to stroll around. You can take a swim in the summer or even take a walk on the ice in the winter. Several restaurants and cafés and also as well equipped little grocery store and a pharmacy are on the island. Lilla Essingen is away from the city, yet with city burst easily reachable and within bus distance.
notes: The elevator starts one floor up from street level. There are 15 steps up to where the elevator starts. Elevator is small (2-3 people) and will most likely not fit a stroller. From time to time a very nice litte dog called Sally is a part of our family.
transit: Bus number 1 will take you directly from Lilla Essingen to Stockholm inner city in about half an hour., even less to metro station Fridhemsplan.  Bus runs from our closest bus stop "Lilla Essingen" only one block away from the apartment every ten minutes.  Metro station "Thorildsplan" is also about ten minutes walk from the apartment. City bikes has got a parking space on the island. Car parking is allowed on the street. Parking cost is about 15-20 sek per hour on weekdays 7am - 7pm. Evenings, nights and weekends parking is free. Please be careful to not park on non-allowed areas, as this can be really expensive. Toll is extra cost for entering and leaving the city, but Lilla Essingen is considered a part of the inner city and therefore no extra toll-cost will apply for driving within city area.
access: You get your own bedroom with a comfortable bed with down pillows and duvet, extra duvets provided should you need some. We set the bed with clean cotton sheets and towels before your arrival and will provide clean set for you every 7 days.  Shared bath/shower and a separate guest toilet.    Wi-fi.  Guests have access to all shared/social parts of the apartment: kitchen, living room, dining area, bath room and guest toilet. Access to living room and access to use of kitchen with some space in our fridge and if needed also in the freezer. We are vegetarians and would like you to not cook meat in our home.    Wi-fi.
interaction: We let the guest room for rent because we love meeting with new people from all over the world but cannot find possibility in our own life at the moment for constant traveling.  If we are at home and if you want to interact, we're here! If you want privacy, we will of cause respect that and leave you alone. Me and my husband and our two children 7 and 16 yrs live here and whenever we are at home we are available for a chat, if we are not at home you can always reach us byt text or call.
house_rules: Keep clean and tidy. No smoking in the building. No excess drinking. No extra guest without ok from us. No animals allowed. No outdoor shoes in the apartment.
host_about:
Hej!

We are a travel loving family of four who set up two airbnb guest rooms in our apartment so that we can meet people from all around the world. Our aim is to give our guests a possibility to see life in Sweden from the inside. Do not hesitate asking us for advice on what to see and do during your stay in Stockholm. Yoga studios and running trails, we know them all! When we are at home you are welcome to spend time with us if you like. If you want privacy and are just looking for a place to stay, that's of cause fine too.

The adults and 16 year old door daughter all speak swedish, english and german. Our 7 year old son mainly speaks swedish but is  learning both german and english.  

Our family loves traveling and we are becoming quite experienced airbnb-guests. When we are not at home working in Stockholm or travelling the world we love to spend our free time in our little summer cottage on an island an hour away from Stockholm. That means we sometimes spend the night away but we'll always be just one call or text message away for our guests, day and night!

Welcome home!

name: Modern apartment in SOFO, Södermalm
summary: Nice apartment close to bars, restaurant, shops and communications (Subway stop Skanstull).
space: This well planed apartment have everything you need. Bed is 120cm (47 inches). If 3 persons in your party, one could sleep on the couch in the livingroom or extra madrass (pull out back of the kitchen couch).
description: Nice apartment close to bars, restaurant, shops and communications (Subway stop Skanstull). This well planed apartment have everything you need. Bed is 120cm (47 inches). If 3 persons in your party, one could sleep on the couch in the livingroom or extra madrass (pull out back of the kitchen couch). You will have the apartment on your own as I'm traveling. Hopefully I see you at arrival or departure or you will see one of my lovely friends. Please advice estimated time of arrival at time of booking request. I live in central Stockholm. Culture, shopping, work out and cooking are things I enjoy in my spare time.
I have done quite some traveling and enjoy meeting new people and see new things.
