name: Fantastic House South of the South
summary: Söder om söder, ligger denna radhusidyll, huset är ett 50tals radhus på ca: 100kvm. Det är fullutrustat med allt man behöver och lite till. Det tillhör även en parkeringsplats. Det är gång/cykelavstånd till 4H-gård, Dreviken med bad och utegym.
description: Söder om söder, ligger denna radhusidyll, huset är ett 50tals radhus på ca: 100kvm. Det är fullutrustat med allt man behöver och lite till. Det tillhör även en parkeringsplats. Det är gång/cykelavstånd till 4H-gård, Dreviken med bad och utegym. Alla delar i boendet Ingen hjälp finns att tillgå I vårt område som totalt har ca: 150st hus myllrar det av barn, vi har flera egna lekparker och har en 4H gård alldeles runt hörnet. Det är gång/cykelavstånd till Drevviken där det finns fina badmöjligheter. Det tillhör en egen parkering till huset samt att tre cyklar ingår i hyran. Tunnelbanan ligger ca: 8min gångavstånd från huset, det tar ca: 20min till Stockholm centralstation.

name: A unique eco townhouse in Stockholm
space: The ecological village in Björkhagen is a unique place. It is built according to ecological principles, on a hill in the forest, still just outside the center of Stockholm. Since we spend a lot of time in the archipelago we rent out our house for long weekends. As a resident of our house you can expect a bright home with large windows. It is like living in the forest, but only ten minutes from Södermalm with Subway. There is plenty of room for many people to live here. You can grill in the garden and eat at one of the two porches. There is always a place in the sun when it is out. . We have a one-year daughter and both our home and the area is ideal for children. The forest begins to twenty metres from the front door. Great for walks in the summer or skiing in winter. Also, just below the eco village is a sports ground with tennis courts, an athletics track and a skating rink in the winter. The home is equipped with a completely new stove, refrigerator, freezer and dishwasher. For slee

name: Newly renovated 2 bedroom appartment
summary: Det som utmärker lägenhet är den öppna och luftiga planlösningen med ett nyrenoverat kök, närheten till tunnelbanan och såklart den trevliga och bekväma hemmiljön.
space: It’s a 80 m2 , 2 bedroom apartment. The kitchen is newly renovated and well equipped. The spacious bathroom is equipped with a tub, washer and dryer. The bedroom you will be staying in is furnished with two single beds, wardrobe and desk. You'll have acceess to 100 mbit internet connection with wifi.  You will be sharing the apartment with me but I’m rarely home because of work. Living room, kitchen and bathroom are shared areas that you may use. In my home you will have a peaceful and safe home environment where I want you to feel comfortable during your stay in Stockholm.   There are two restaurants within a 200 meter radius from the apartment. The area also has three grocery stores, library, pharmacy and ATM. All within 500 m radius. The area has many fine walking trails running through the forest and nature reserve that surrounds the area. The metro station is barely 100 m away from the apartment. The metro will take you to the central of Stockholm in just 15 minutes. The metro has

The metro will take you to the central of Stockholm in just 15 minutes. The metro has
transit: Super close to metrostation. Just across the park from flat.
house_rules: - The kitchen and bathroom are shared areas, The only rule I have is that you clean up after you.  - You will be given a clean room. Make sure you leave the room the same way you found it. No vacuming or washing is needed, just tidy up.  To me it's common sense to be considerate to the people you live with and will of course show the same consideration that I ask of you.
host_about:
I'm an open person. I think living in two pararell cultures ( Swedish and Eritrean) makes you understand that no idea is law. People have their different ways and I really enjoy learning about them. That also makes me flexible around people. I usually find a way to connect with people and make them feel comfortable in my company. 

Living in Sweden of course the sun is always a destination. To me it’s not so much the destination but more the person I'm experiencing it with. So basically, if the company is good anywhere in the sun will do. 

The things i enjoy most is my writing, friends, good food, swedish summer (It is truly paradise) and any sport with a ball. 

Consideration and respect is something I value. That’s how I want to treat people. That’s the mark I want to leave.

name: Private room with a single bed.
space: We are a couple that are renting out one room in a three room apartment in Liljeholmen, Stockholm. Its really close to the metro station and a big galleria where all kind of shops are located. The room has a single bed 120cm x 200cm. It has a desk and a balcony. You can use the bathroom, kitchen and our living room. LIVINGROOM:  There is a livingroom with sofa, table and tv shared between us and the guest. Stunning view from the livingroom. BATHROOM:  There is one bathroom with toalett, shower and bathtube shared between us and the guest. Washing machine is available in the bathroom. KITCHEN:  There is a kitchen where you can prepare food, store some food in the fridge as well as use the microwave and kettle. The coffee and tea is on the house! :-) We have a dishwasher INTERNET:  Free internet is included  Breakfast is included. name: Huge and Beautiful 3BR, Center of Stockholm
summary: Right in Stockholm's Vasastan neighborhood, 20m from the metro, or walk to the center of town in 20 minutes. The building is from 1910 and the space was recently remodeled . It is a 6 room apartment, 136 m2.
space: This is a very large apartment by Stockholm standards. It is situated amongst some of Stockholm's best parks and hippest neighborhoods, including Vasaparken and Birkastan. There are 21 windows and lots of light. Very important in Stockholm! The kitchen has great appliances including a Miele dishwasher that automatically opens when the dishes are done. My favorite!
description: Right in Stockholm's Vasastan neighborhood, 20m from the metro, or walk to the center of town in 20 minutes. The building is from 1910 and the space was recently remodeled . It is a 6 room apartment, 136 m2. This is a very large apartment by Stockholm standards. It is situated amongst some of Stockholm's best parks and hippest neighborhoods, including Vasaparken and Birkastan. There are 21 windows and lots of light. Very important in Stockholm! The kitchen has great appliances including a Miele dishwasher that automatically opens when the dishes are done. My favorite! You can use the whole apartment except for one bedroom. Kitchen, dining room, living room, three bedrooms and water closet. I may be available for a quick introduction to the apartment and neighborhood, but otherwise will not be present during your stay. Vasastan is my favorite of the four boroughs in Stockholm. It feels like a neighborhood, but has tons of interesting shops and great nightlife. We frequently walk to the
neighborhood_overview: Vasastan is my favorite of the four boroughs in Stockholm. It feels like a neighborhood, but has tons of interesting shops and great nightlife. We frequently walk to the center from home.
notes: Free wifi. Supermarket across the street. Several cafés and restaurants on the block. The bars in Birkastan start about a block away. Photo gallery specializing in surf photography half a block away. Theatre half a block away. Spotify connected to Sonos in the kitchen and living room.
transit: Subway is half a block away. You also get a Stockholm City Bikes card until the end of October. Airport bus is 2 blocks away and leaves at least every 15 minutes. Kids under 16 are free.
access: You can use the whole apartment except for one bedroom. Kitchen, dining room, living room, three bedrooms and water closet.
interaction: I may be available for a quick introduction to the apartment and neighborhood, but otherwise will not be present during your stay.
house_rules: This is a very quiet building, so please, no parties. No smoking. And don't spill anything on my new furniture!
host_about: Easy going, creative type. I like cooking, entertaining, local, organic food, yoga,  wine, lots of good music, art, film, nature, the ocean, traveling, and reading Lionel Shriver, and the family life! I like to have fun and not take life too seriously. I enjoy hosting and meeting new friends from all cultures and backgrounds, and I don't really follow the mainstream of American or Swedish culture much at all. I am a techy, and still love my work well into a long career in video games. I feel that relaxed travel is easier when you have a good base in which to recuperate, and I try to be as accommodating as possible.

name: Beautiful and cozy 2 bedroom flat
summary: Welcome to our newly renovated 3 room apartment with balcony and fireplace in one of Stockholm's nicest suburbs. Perfect for couples, friends and families. Close to shops, restaurants, cafes and the metro which takes 15min to the city center.
space: The house we live in was built in 1939 and has a characteristic functional style with parquet floors in almost all rooms and a fireplace in the living room. We have renovated the entire apartment except the kitchen that still has retained its charm from the early 40s. Our balcony is nice to sit at and enjoy breakfasts, read the paper or just enjoy the chirping of birds and nature outside.  The apartment is 80sqm and it fits easily 5 persons and the apartment consists 2 bedrooms (located at opposite ends of the apartment) and a large living room at 24sqm.  One bedroom is furnished with a 160cm bed and the other with a 120cm bed and also a sofa bed 120cm which easily folds out to a comfy extra bed. The living room's large sofa, retro armchairs and poufs invites for great socializing or relaxation in front of the TV. There is also a sound system where you easily can plug in your Iphone or music device.  The kitchen has all the equipment you could possibly need to cook good dinners. And a
description: Welcome to our newly renovated 3 room apartment with balcony and fireplace in one of Stockholm's nicest suburbs. Perfect for couples, friends and families. Close to shops, restaurants, cafes and the metro which takes 15min to the city center. The house we live in was built in 1939 and has a characteristic functional style with parquet floors in almost all rooms and a fireplace in the living room. We have renovated the entire apartment except the kitchen that still has retained its charm from the early 40s. Our balcony is nice to sit at and enjoy breakfasts, read the paper or just enjoy the chirping of birds and nature outside.  The apartment is 80sqm and it fits easily 5 persons and the apartment consists 2 bedrooms (located at opposite ends of the apartment) and a large living room at 24sqm.  One bedroom is furnished with a 160cm bed and the other with a 120cm bed and also a sofa bed 120cm which easily folds out to a comfy extra bed. The living room's large sofa, retro armchairs and p
notes: We do have a little cat called Pricken. He is very tidy and clean but if you have cat allergies our flat might not be an option for you. We keep our house very clean but I can not guarantee that there will be no hair left from the cat somewhere in the house.
transit: From our place there is a short walk for about 3-4minutes down to our metro station. From Abrahamsberg with the green line it takes around 15minutes to the city center and from there you'll have walking distance to almost everything. If you continue with the green line and hop off at Slussen station you are at one of our favorite parts of Stockholm, the hip and cultural part, Södermalm. Here you'll find a lot of interesting restaurants, independent shops, art galleries, nice cafés, clubs, bars and more.
access: As a guest at our place you have access to everything except personal belongings such as clothes in the closets, etc..  Free access to sheets and towels available on site upon arrival. In the basement there is a laundry room booked in our name if necessary during your stay. Our guests can freely dispose the households spices, groceries in the pantry, etc.  All smoking is prohibited indoors and takes place on the balcony.  Outside the house there are trash cans where all household garbage is thrown. A little further up on our street there is a recycling center for glass bottles, newspapers, plastic, cans etc.  The tenant is responsible for that the rules we set up is followed. After 23:00 on weekends it should preferably be quiet (no music) and after 22:00 on weekdays.
interaction: We will meet up to handover the keys or we will agree on a place where the keys can be picked up if desired.  Do you want tips on attractions, restaurants, clubs, cafes, museums, shopping, places for taking a swim? Let us know and we will be more than happy to help you out.  We like to hang out with our friends and socialize in Stockholm's nightlife, cultural scenes and has several tips on good restaurants and what's happening in Stockholm during your stay.
house_rules: Please mind our neighbors so after 01.00 we would appreciate if you don't play any music. No smoking inside the apartment please use the balcony. No shoes inside the apartment and no sleeping on the couch in the living room.
host_about:
My name is Hanna and I live in Stockholm, Sweden.
I enjoy all the nice things in life such as my family, friends, interior design, art, music, good clubs, food, fleamarkets, travelling, meeting new people, our country house, skiing, training and much more.
I'm work as an interior consultant and I help both small and large companies with interior design solutions. I've been doing that for some years and I really enjoy what I do. I live together with my husband and two cats in a very nice area just 20 min from Stockholm's inner city. 
We're looking forward to join airbnb with new meetings in new cities all over the world.
/ Hanna with family

name: Nice large apartment in a popular area!
summary: Rymlig lägenhet från slutet av 1800-talet, ligger högt upp i huset. Fönster åt två håll. Sovrum kan delas upp till separata rum. Härligt arbetsrum med stort bord och ergonomiskt anpassad stol. Generöst kök. Stort badrum, lång stor hall. Speciell flyttbar garderobshängare som gör det lätt för resenären att hänga upp sina kläder, under sin vistelse.
space: Vid T bana, bussar, båtar, gamla stan & slussen.Vacker lägenhet från sent 1800 tal, beläget högt med fönster mot känd gata och lugn gård.Inredningen är inspirerad av modernt och sekelskiftes stil. Skönt, stort och bekvämt! Sovrum med dubbelsäng! Rymlig och charmig våning med tre rum i fil, bekväm känsla i vardagsrum, sovrum & kök. Sovrum med stor dubbelsäng. Vardagsrum med generös soffa som också fungerar som en extra säng. Badrum med dusch och tvättmaskin. Generös hall. Köket fullt utrustat, ny spis, mikro, kyl och frys. Stort bord med två sköna korgstolar, och extra stolar. Här finns det man önskar sig för ett dukat bord, i form av tallrikar, glas, koppar m.m Det finns möjlighet att hyra extra utrustning, även internet. Lakan och handdukar ingår. I köket ingår nya torkhanddukar. Gäster som lämnar efter sig kryddor med mera kan användas av er och ni som gäst kan lämna kvar det som är lämpligt att kunna använda vidare. Det finns en extra nyckel till soprummet, där man ska kasta sina so

neighborhood_overview: Här finns allt, restauranger, kaféer och gångavstånd till city.
transit: All kommunikation som består av bussar, tunnelbana, uthyrning av cyklar, båtar till olika delar av Stockholm och skärgården.
access: Handdukar och lakan. Del av stor lägenhet. Vissa delar där vi har privat är i utrymmen som är tillstängda. Ytan som gästerna får vistas på är generöst med ett par stora rum, kök och wc/dusch/tvättmaskin
interaction: Jag finns i närheten, och tillgänglig på mobil och mejl.
house_rules: Rökfritt, inga husdjur! Ta hand om sopor och vädra då och då, samt vid längre vistelse önskas vattning av blommor. Sen är det trevligt att hålla det ganska tyst, inte för hög musik, och särskilt inte efter 10 på kvällen.
host_about: Jag är från Värmland, bor numera i Stockholm. Arbetar som fotograf och är en stor fan av fotokonst, och njuter av vackra miljöer.

name: Townhouse in beautiful Stockholm
summary: Welcome to green Skärholmen. The house is 3 min from the metro, 20 minutes from central Stockholm and with a walking distance to the lake and to beautiful nature, as well as to the biggest mall in Stockholm. It has everything you need for your visit!
space: This is the perfect place to stay if you would like to experience both the city and the nature of Stockholm!   The house is 100 kvm. There is also a small garden with a patio in the front and in the back yard. In the livingroom there´s a projector if you would like to watch a movie. If you´re travelling with small children, let us know, since we also have a crib, toys and some other things that will make your stay even more comfortable.

There is also a small garden with a patio in the front and in the back yard. In the livingroom there´s a projector if you would like to watch a movie. You´ll have access to the whole house and the yard (except for a little walk-in wardrobe) during your stay. You´ll have your own key and come and go as you wish. We´ll be available by phone, and perhaps also at your arrival. If not, we have really nice neighbours that will help you with everything you might
neighborhood_overview: Vårberg/Skärholmen is a green suburb of Stockholm to love. It is a beautiful place, close to Stockholm City but also nearby beautiful beaches and there are playgrounds and food stores close by.
notes: We have a piano!
transit: The house is just 3 minutes walk from the metro and you can easily take the metro everywhere in the city. It runs all night all days of the week. It is also easy to find a cheap parking place nearby our house.
access: You´ll have access to the whole house and the yard (except for a little walk-in wardrobe) during your stay. You´ll have your own key and come and go as you wish.
interaction: We´ll be available by phone, and perhaps also at your arrival. If not, we have really nice neighbours that will help you with everything you might need.
house_rules: Leave the house in the same shape as you found it, please :-)
host_about:
We are a small family living in the beautiful part of Stockholm that is called Skärholmen. Me and my husband have travelled a lot and met a lot of people through different networks. We have been hosts on Airbnb many times in our old apartment. Now we´ve just moved to this cosy townhouse in the same area and we are eager to start hosting again! We love the idea of Airbnb! 

I´m a psychologist and my husband is a PhD and a teacher at the University of Stockholm.

name: 1909's charming house with garden
summary: Situated 13 min with metro to central Stockholm, old town. A bakery and antique shops next door.  Metro, pharmacy, supermarket and restaurants within 3 min walking distance. Welcome!
space: Charmigt hus med trädgård och litet växthus 15 minuters cykelavstånd till Södermalm och Gamla stan i Stockholm.
description: Situated 13 min with metro to central Stockholm, old town. A bakery and antique shops next door.  Metro, pharmacy, supermarket and restaurants within 3 min walking distance. Welcome! We have bikes you can rent, Stockholm old town is only 15 min away.
neighborhood_overview: Vi bor mitt i den pittoreska trädgårdsstaden Gamla Enskede. De flesta villor är byggda 1909 och i området finns gott om lekplatser, vår kvartersrestaurang Matboden med fantastisk uteservering i kvällsolen ligger snett över gatan.  Närmsta grannen är det lokala bageriet, perfekt att hämta nybakat surdegsbröd till frukosten i vårt lilla växthus.  Mitt emot Delselius Bageri ligger Cocktailbaren Le Garage med fantastiska gindrinkar och Matateljén med närodlade smårätter, ost och vin eller färdigpackade delikatesspåsar att ta med hem till trädgården tvärs över gatan. Vi har tre antikaffärer i kvarteret och det brukar alltid gå att hitta någon loppis i området. 10 minuters promenad genom villakvarteren ligger värdsarvet Skogskyrkogården eller lika långt i motsatt riktning in mot Söder finns Slakthusområdet med Nöjescentrat Tolv, perfekt för barn med bowling, drejning, karaoke och minigolf. Eller kolla om det är någon spelning på Slakthuskyrkan eller Kraken.
notes: Mono vår katt tycker om att umgås med våra gäster, men vid allergi ordnar vi kattvakt.
transit: We have bikes you can rent, Stockholm old town is only 15 min away.
access: Full tillgång till vårt parhus med egen trädgård.
interaction: Vi hyr ut huset när vi själva är ute och reser eller är på vårt sommartorp men hjälper gärna till med tips och är alltid tillgängliga via mobil.
host_about:
Vi är en familj som själva tycker om att resa och bo på Air bnb. 
Det bästa sättet att lära känna nya resmål på en mer personlig nivå samtidigt som vi får möjlighet att dela med oss av vårt hörn av världen genom att hyra ut vårt hem.

Välkomna!

name: Cosy apartment in city center
space: Sleeping Arrangement: There is is one 140 cm wide bed that can contain two persons in the bedroom and in the living room there is a sofa bed, so the bed is 140 cm and can contain two persons.  I’ll clean and change the sheets and tower once a week and that is included in the price.  The apartment: The apartment is in a beautiful building from 1882 you will find this fully equipped, clean and charming modern flat. This is my home that I rent out so it is very homey with many personal belongings. Feel free to take advantage of my book collection, cooking condiments. There will always be coffee and tea available for you, and hopefully some fresh milk in the fridge as well. There is free WiFi, and microwave to use. A bathroom with shower and I will provided sheets and towels for you.  Other information: Please send me a message and tell me a bit about yourself before you make your reservation it would make me feel better and safer.

A bathroom with shower and I will provided sheets and towels for you. neighborhood_overview: The Area: The apartment is located in the city Centre of Stockholm; you have for example one of the biggest and most popular shopping streets just around the corner, Drottinggatan (Queens street). The apartment is also next to the city district that’s named Vasastan. The district - Vasastan is a vibrant, trendy and relaxed part of Stockholm, with lots of green areas, hip bars and cafés.  There also a small park, Tegnerlunden just 2 min away form the apartment. Or if you walk fore a few more minutes you can go to a bigger park, Vasaparken. You can walk along the water, for example at Kungsholmsstrand (Kings boardwalk), witch is my favourite mooring spot to walk.   Drottninggatan is lined with stores for shopping. At Hötorget, witch is just 5 min walk you have a market with flowers, vegetables and fruits. Inside there is a meet and fiche-market and also a big cinema. I love to eat breakfast out and there are many good ones in the aria.  Three of my favourites are just 1-2 min walk away.
transit: The Central station is just 10 min walk away. The apartment is also next to the city district that’s named Vasastan. If you want to go to Old Town, the best way is to walk the Queens street down and you will pas the shops, the Swedish parliament that is next to the water and then you will enter in to the wonderful Old Town and the royal castle. As you can see this apartment has a great location, you can easy go where ever you like by foot or by the public communications from the central station or the metro station, Rådmansgatan, located just 5 min from the apartment.
access: There is a backyard but it's pretty boring so I usually get up and put me in a small park, Tegnerlunden which is 1-2 minutes away. If you need laundry, there is a communal laundry room on the entry floor (need to book in advance).
interaction: I will be living at my parents or friends in Stockholm, while you rent my apartment. If you can call of email me if you have any questions during your stay.
house_rules: This is my home that I rent out so it is very homey with many personal belongings. I want you to treat it with the same respect as if it was your one home. In Sweden we don't were shoes inside so please respect that. This is an apartment so there is a neighbors that you have to respect so don't play to loud music after 10 pm. You are therefore not allowed to have a party in my apartment. I'll clean and change the sheets and tower after your. I will also clean the apartment and the price is 100 kr as you can see in the add. But I want you to wash your own dishes and leave the apartment as it look like when you first arrived. So if you moved things around, put them back and so on.

name: Stockholm's brightest apartment
summary: Charming and bright top floor apartment in classical 1940s stone house in trendy neighborhood of Aspudden. Close to coffee shops, delis and bookstores. 10 minutes to the Old City and Central Station, 5 minutes to Lake Mälaren waterfront.
space: Charming and light 1.5 room apartment for 3 people just by the metro in the trendy neighborhood of Aspudden. Spaceous living room with bed alcove, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bathtub. High-speed wifi.  The apartment is located on the top floor of a classic 1940s stone house with windows facing south – VERY much light all day (and evening) long.  - Spacious and luminious livingroom with beautiful wooden floor, huge windows facing a park, and a home-crafted sofa table. A big and comfortable couch perfect for sleeping. - Sleeping alcove with comfortable queen-sized bed. - Bathroom with bathtub.  - Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, freezer, gas stove, oven, French coffee press, microwave, and soda streamer. space: Hela Stockholm ligger serverat utanför fönstret. Ta en promenad till Söder och gå på en mysig restaurang. Packa picknick-korgen och besök någon av de närliggande parkerna. name: Cozy flat - view/rooftop terrace
summary: This is a unique flat, in the very heart of Södermalm. Everything is right on your doorstep, but in a little quiet alley. Gamla stan is just a short stroll away, with all its uniqe history. Are you going to Eurovision? It's only two metro stops away.
space: 38 sqm flat in a very popular area. Don't miss this chance to live like a true Swede for a weekend. We'll show you everything you need and give you the best advice on what to do.  We have a huge TV with Apple TV and Netflix if you want to relax after a long day of walking around Södermalm, Gamla stan or the city centre. If there is anything else you need, don't hesitate to ask!

Gamla stan is just a short stroll away, with all its uniqe history. Are you going to Eurovision? It's only two metro stops away. 38 sqm flat in a very popular area. Don't miss this chance to live like a true Swede for a weekend. We'll show you everything you need and give you the best advice on what to do.  We have a huge TV with Apple TV and Netflix if you want to relax after a long day of walking around Södermalm, Gamla stan or the city centre. If there is anything else you need, don't hesitate to ask! The entire flat will be yours (except for a closet). The rooftop terrace is shared with the neighbors, but it's more or less always available. We will welcome you to our apartment and show you everything that you need to know about the place. You'll get our phone numbers and we'll be available all throughout the visit. This neighborhood is the best - without a doubt
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is the best - without a doubt! Within 30 seconds you have the entire Södermalm area at your feet. Do you want the best view? Take a 5 minute stroll to Fjällgatan. Do you want some nice bars? Just go outside and find a nice place. Shopping - 1 minute away. Buses, subway, trams or commuter trains? It's all within a couple of minutes of walking.
transit: Everything is nearby - no worries! We'll leave you with a map if you need one and we will show your where the nearest stations are.
access: The entire flat will be yours (except for a closet). The rooftop terrace is shared with the neighbors, but it's more or less always available.
interaction: We will welcome you to our apartment and show you everything that you need to know about the place. You'll get our phone numbers and we'll be available all throughout the visit.
house_rules: We expect you to treat our apartment like you're visiting someone that you love. We will do everything to keep you happy and we wish that you do the same.  No pets allowed and if you want to smoke, go up to the terrace. No smoking indoors.
host_about:
What would our world be without traveling? How would I be able to live my life without experiencing new cultures in, for me, unexplored continents? The simple answer is: my life would be very boring and our world would be at a stand still. 

Me and my boyfriend love to travel, and both of us have lived abroad for many years (mostly in Asia). We stumbled upon CouchSurfing in Hong Kong, where a lovely local opened up his home to us when we were lost on an island.

We believe that the travel experience will be immensly greater if you see it through the eyes of a local, or in this case - through the apartment of a local.

What is it like having us as guests? 
Easy! We have our affairs in order (i.e. we would never go crazy or ruin anything), we feel passionate about travelling.

name: Relaxing family house in Stockholm
summary: Our newly renovated house is located in the heart of the very charming area of "Gamla Enskede". The house has 6 beds, a sauna and fully equipped kitchen. Our garden is lovely with a small green house, a hammok, grill and late evening sun. The location is very good if you visit Stockholm just 5 min walk to the Metro (Sockenplan), Globen Arenas is about a 10 min walk. We also hava a 2 direct busses towards Stockholm Fairs and its takes about 20 min to get there. We also have a few bikes.
space: We accomodate 6 people with own beds and more with lower standard. We have one double bed (master bedrooms) we also have 2 beds (120 cm) wide in 2 separate rooms (could possible be shared). In the basement we have 2 beds, used as sofas (great for older kids).  We also have 2 madrasses and a sofa that could be used if you are more people and can accept a bit lower standard.  Our house is carefully renovated and we have the most wonderful garden. We are food lovers, so the kitchen is well equipped and in the garden we have 3 grills and a smoker if you are into more advanced cooking.  We have 2 bathrooms, a sauna and tub in the basement.  For kids: We have a tramoline and a soccer goal in the garden, there is also a separate TV with a Playstation and Wii attached to it in the basement bedroom.  We have a MacBook and an iMac that can be used, the house also has a high bandwith internet connection.

We are food lovers, so the kitchen is well equipped and in t
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is very charming and houses are built around 1910 or 1930(our house). The area is very attractive for families with children, very safe and secure. Thera are playgrounds, parks, nearby there are a few resturants, 2 great bakeries and some food stores.  About 1 km away you have the Globe and Tele2 ((website hidden)) arenas with shopping, events and resturants. Its about a 10-15 min walk from the house and with the bikes about 5 minutes. To Södermalm it's about 3 km and bike roads all The way, it takes 10-15 minutes to get there (depending on you speed).
notes: We have a cat living in our house (not while you are there), so if you are sensetive to cats this can be an issue.
transit: There is a subway stop within an 8 minute walk. It takes 15 min to the central station and 7 minutes to Södermalm. We have 4 bikes (2 adult, 1 teen and 1 smaller childbikes that you can use. Its only about 3 km into Södermalm and great bicycle roads all the way.  We have a parking spot on the property and there is also free parking in the street. Just keep an eye on when they clean the street (signs on the road), so that you avoid getting a ticket. Getting around Stockholm by car during summer is pretty easy, if you avoid the old-town and Djurgården. Parking in the streets of stockhom, usually works fine and you can use the app "Betala P" to pay, directly through your phone.
access: You have access to the full house and the garden. We have a garage and a shed in the garden that will be locked with some of our private stuff.  We have a small Green house, flowerbeds with herbs etc that are fine to use for cooking.
interaction: We are avalible over phone, mail, (website hidden), (website hidden) Hangouts when needed to answer questions.
house_rules: No smoking is allowed indoors, but out doors it's fine. Just make sure to pick up all waste. We do not allow pets. We do not allow loud parties in the house.
host_about: Im a Digitalist with an Open mind.

name: New renovated old town apartment
summary: A unique living in the most beautifully and historical part of Stockholm. 50 square meter light design apartment located in the hart of Old Town. Renovated 2016 on the 3rd floor with a beautiful view. A walking distance to everything Stockholm has to offer.
space: 5 minutes walk to one of the main shopping streets called Götgatan, Södermalm.  2 Minutes from the subway. Easy to access all the tourists attractions like the famous royal castle. The double bed is located in a separate room, and you have a complete kitchen with dishwasher, fridge and oven.  Bathroom has a bathtub and washing machine .  The sofa can be turned into a queen size bed. An amazing view of the church and across the river, the beautiful heights of Mariaberget.  In the building you have one of Swedens best restaurants and across the street the cozy corner club. The vibe in oldtown is really something special.  There is no better place to stay if you want to get the most out of your trip to Stockholm. Note.  No smoking. 12% tax included in the price.

name: Stockholm city cosy small apartment
summary: Perfect place in trendy Vasastan for 2 persons. Downtown or recreational Hagaparken 10-17 minutes, supermarket, cafées, and restaurants 120 m, buses, Hard Rock Cafe 250 m. All of the city within reach by bike, buss, metro or simply walking - your choice!   Closest subways are Rådmansgatan, Odenplan (green line) or Tekniska Högskolan (red line). Welcome to Vasastan, Stockholm :-)
space: Small 2-room apartment with a kitchen and anything you would need to cook a proper meal.  Old fashioned style, with a high ceiling, in a building from 1904. The shower is small and old fashioned, as the picture indicates, or "a nordic style" as some of my guests would call it. Bed also somewhat smaller than the regular size, but perfectly wide enough for two persons.
description: Perfect place in trendy Vasastan for 2 persons. Downtown or recreational Hagaparken 10-17 minutes, supermarket, cafées, and restaurants 120 m, buses, Hard Rock Cafe 250 m. All of the city within reach by bike, buss, metro or simply walking - your choice!   Closest subways are Rådmansgatan, Odenplan (green line) or Tekniska Högskolan (red line). Welcome to Vasastan, Stockholm :-) Small 2-room apartment with a kitchen and anything you would need to cook a proper meal.  Old fashioned style, with a high ceiling, in a building from 1904. The shower is small and old fashioned, as the picture indicates, or "a nordic style" as some of my guests would call it. Bed also somewhat smaller than the regular size, but perfectly wide enough for two persons. Bed linens and towels included. One bathroom with shower (old fashioned), and one separate toilet. TV  and WiFi included. Microwave oven/ toaster/ coffee machine. Washing machine and dryer requires a reservation but is free of charge. Please ask me
neighborhood_overview: Cool, charming and lively Vasastan gives you the opportunity of trying some of the nice cafés, bars or restaurants in the area, unless you want to head down town. Dining at Tranan is something always to recommend as it has the true Swedish heritage, if you like fish a must is their fried herring with mashed potatoes, a classic! Reserve your table though as it might be full, Adress: Karlbergsgatan 14. Non Solo Café serves a great brunch or regular "fika" - Swedish for having a coffée and perhaps something to go with that. Seats both inside and outside. You find the cafe on Odengatan, just take a left and it´s there on the left hand side about 40 meters down. Adress:  Odengatan 34. Storstad - best bar close by, 150 meter from the apartment, depending on day the average age might differ a bit, but always nice hanging at the bar for a glass of wine or a beer. Adress: Odengatan 41. Two supermarkets within reach of three minutes walking, of which on has a postal service (the one on Sveavägen
notes: Recreational area and Royal Hagaparken with the water front provides nice trails for jogging, renting a kayak, power walking or maybe just a stroll is a short walk away. Now a days the park hosts the Royal Princess Victoria and Prince Daniel, as they restored the old castle and moved in a couple of years back.
transit: Distance 150 meters supermarket, bar, café, bakery, restaurants. 250 meters buses 275 meters pharmacy 600 meters subway 1.5 km city center/down town 2,2 km central station 42km Arlanda airport 100km Skavsta airport Subway and buses are the way to get around in Stockholm, and 3 stops are close to the apartment: Rådmansgatan or Odenplan (green line), and Tekniska Högskolan (red line). No cash payments allowed on public transportation, you will need to buy a ticket forehand at: SL Centers or newsagent kiosks, such as PRESSBYRÅN or via SMS Prices:  24h-115Skr 72h-230Skr 7 days-300Skr A trip on the number 69 bus or number 7 tram is a superb way to discover Stockholm. The lines go out to Djurgården and major attractions like Skansen and the Vasa Museum (which is really cool by the way, don´t miss out on the film that guides you through the history and the moment they found Vasa and brought her back up to the surface).
access: Bed linens and towels included. One bathroom with shower (old fashioned), and one separate toilet. TV  and WiFi included. Microwave oven/ toaster/ coffee machine. Washing machine and dryer requires a reservation but is free of charge. Please ask me about the details if you intend to use the facilities, located in the basement.
interaction: I am always available if there is a need to ask me questions, get directions or any other inquiries. I will do my very best to guide or give information or help in sorting out whatever turns up. Rather have you call me ten times than none :-) And I will always try to meet you at your arrival, though sometimes work or travel will make it impossible though.
house_rules: Welcome to my apartment! I have tried to organize everything so that you will have a pleasant stay here. As you might notice, this is my permanent home. I have opted to leave my personal belongings also for you to enjoy, so please do! I trust that you are careful... The rules of the house stipulates quietness after 22.00 pm.  No smoking is accepted in the Property.  It is a normal procedure in Sweden NOT to walk indoors with shoes.  It is not permitted to have guests or social gatherings in the Property  (unless specifically agreed).  You cannot allow more people to stay in the Property than expressly authorized, nor can you change the makeup of the party during your stay in the Property, nor can you take your pet into the Property unless it has been agreed. If you do so, we can refuse to hand over the Property to you, or can require you to leave it. We will treat any of these circumstances as a cancellation of the booking by you. You agree to keep and leave the Property in good condit
host_about: My name is Marie, currently living in Spain, co-hosting the apartment in Fuengirola, as the owner is abroad.  Best regards, Marie

name: Incredible view from apartment!
summary: Our modern loft with 4 bedrooms located on Götgatsbacken next to Slussen. The area is one of Stockholm's trendiest bursting with cafés, restaurants, shopping and nightlife. Enjoy the magnificent views or take a walk down to the Old Town.
space: Our loft has a wonderful location right in the heart of Södermalm overlooking the city . There are two wonderful balconies to enjoy. the apartment has a modern kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave and a separate toilet and a bathroom with shower. The apartment has a fully equipped children's room loaded with toys, movies, books and everything a small child could wish to occupy themselves with . In there is a bed suited for children up to 6 years old. There are high chairs and also cot for smaller children. Wireless internet , cable tv, dvd 's and iPhone compatible speakers . Nearby public transportation makes the apartment a perfect place to start and plan day trips. Södermalms nightlife is right outside the door, if you want to try it and would you rather go down to Stureplan and sample the nightlife and restaurants there is only 6 minutes away by subway . Same with shopping, there are plenty of shops , pharmacies , cinemas , cafes , playgrounds or supermarkets 1-7 minutes walking

The apartment has a fully equipped children's room loaded with toys, movies, books and everything a small child could wish to occupy themselves with . Nearby public transportation makes the apartment a perfect place to start and plan day trips. Södermalms nightlife is right outside the door, if you want to try it and would you
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on a pedestrian street where there is a large variety of shops, cafés, restaurants and bars. In summer also countless outdoor cafés. There is also a wide selection of grocery stores and a market hall within 1-7min walk. Here on Södermalm there are many playgrounds and small parks to choose from as well as outdoor pools and bathhouses. The proximity to the Old Town and the City means that there are lots of Attractions within a short distance.
transit: From Slussen is easy to get around. It is close to public transport. The apartment is steps away from the subway and buses. It takes 5 minutes to the City with the subway and about. 10 min by bus. In nice weather, I recommend a walk along the waterfront or through the Old Town to make it down to the City. From Södra Station you can also take the commuter train to the suburbs and into the city. At Slussen, summertime, there are also renta bikes to borrow and also ferries all year round to Djurgården and its Attractions such as Skansen Zoo, Gröna Lund, etc. It is also close to the "hop on hop of" tourist boats.
house_rules: Det är inte tillåtet att röka i lägenheten eller på balkongerna ej heller i trappuppgången.  Det är inte heller tillåtet att ta med husdjur. Dörrar och fönster skall låsas och stängas då gästen ej befinner sig i lägenheten. Gästen får inte beträda taket och det är viktigt att inte lämna barn utan uppsikt då de befinner sig på balkonger eller vid öppna fönster. Det är förväntat av gästen att vara diskret och att det inte förekommer hög musik eller oljud på nätterna. Gästen förväntas sköta sin dagliga disk, tvätt och städning själv. Vill gästen ha housekeeping/städning går detta att ordna.  Det är inte tillåtet att ta med personer in i lägenheten utöver ert sällskap som bor här, ni bär ansvar för de saker/möbler som finns i lägenhet under er vistelse. Det är således ej heller tillåtet att ha fester el liknande tillställningar i lägenheten. Det är inte tillåtet att använda den öppna spisen.

space: The apartment is located 8 minutes from Stockholm center in a very well-communicated area. The train station and bus terminal is only 4 minutes walk from the flat. Direct train from Arlanda Airport Our station Älvsjö We live on the 3rd floor with a nice view from the balcony. Elevator is also available.

Kiana & Johan
host_about:
Hello:)
We are a young couple based in Sweden.
We like to travel and visit different cities and countries, meet new people and make new friends. 
We love to see different cultures and get to know more about how people live in different countries. 
My name is Kiana, I am 25 years old and I work as a  project administrator in a consulting company in Stockholm.
My husband is 35 years old and works as a freelance musician and also with autistic children in Stockholm too.
None of us smoke, we drink ocasionally, though in general we are very calm and responsible.

name: Stay in the unique Old town!
summary: Cosy 48 m² apartment located in Gamla stan, the Old town.
space: Very charming apartment located at Lilla Hoparegränd in a house from the 17th century. Extensively refurbished and renovated in 2013. The original ceiling beams are preserved in the apartment. The total living space is 48 m² and there are two rooms. It's optimal to accommodate two people, but fits up to four if you're comfortable with compact living.  On the ground floor is the living room, with windows facing the quiet alley. The living room is fully furnished with a new, spacious sofa bed (160 cm x 200 cm) that was installed on June 1st 2017. It has an extra mattress and is very comfortable. There is a TV with Chromecast and a DVD player, as well as a Wi-Fi connection. On the ground floor you'll also find the kitchenette and the bathroom.    The bedroom is downstairs, in the medieval valves, with a very comfortable 'Continental' bed (160 cm x 200 cm). The room is furnished with 'Howard 2' sofa set and a large wardrobe with plenty of space for clothes. The bathroom, which also was ren
description: Cosy 48 m² apartment located in Gamla stan, the Old town. Very charming apartment located at Lilla Hoparegränd in a house from the 17th century. Extensively refurbished and renovated in 2013. The original ceiling beams are preserved in the apartment. The total living space is 48 m² and there are two rooms. It's optimal to accommodate two people, but fits up to four if you're comfortable with compact living.  On the ground floor is the living room, with windows facing the quiet alley. The living room is fully furnished with a new, spacious sofa bed (160 cm x 200 cm) that was installed on June 1st 2017. It has an extra mattress and is very comfortable. There is a TV with Chromecast and a DVD player, as well as a Wi-Fi connection. On the ground floor you'll also find the kitchenette and the bathroom.    The bedroom is downstairs, in the medieval valves, with a very comfortable 'Continental' bed (160 cm x 200 cm). The room is furnished with 'Howard 2' sofa set and a large wardrobe with ple
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfectly located in Gamla stan, geographically in the middle of Stockholm, with the Central station just across the bridge northward, and trendy Södermalm across the bridge southward. Gamla stan is the oldest part of Stockholm, dating back to the 13th century. Here you'll find many cosy cafés, restaurants and boutiques. There are two small supermarkets nearby where you can get groceries. A pharmacy is also located close by. From Skeppsbron, five minutes from the apartment, you can take a boat or ferry out to the archipelago, or just to the opposite island Djurgården. There you'll find Skansen, a park with nordic animals as well as old farms and houses transported from all over Sweden and reconstructed in the park. The Tivoli Gröna Lund, Aquarium, Vasa Museum and Junibacken are on the same island.
notes: Under 2013 har det gjorts omfattande renoveringar av lägenheten.
transit: Buses, boats and subway – all public transport available at a very short distance.   Rental bikes available five minutes from the apartment.
access: The stairs down to the bedroom are quite steep and not recommended if you have any trouble walking, balance or small children.
interaction: You will receive all information with directions, door codes and general information through Airbnb message once a booking has been confirmed.
house_rules: - Rökning i lägenheten ej tillåten. - Husdjur är tyvärr inte välkomna.

name: Cosy, comfortable, quiet SoFo apt
summary: Welcome to staying at a warm and central space totaling 46m². Here is your best chance to live right in the heart of Södermalm - the most cultural and beautiful part of Stockholm! *** Interested in longer stays, preferably companies ***
space: Södermalm is one of Stockholms city islands and the location of this studio apartment makes you being just seconds away from all the local & popular shopping and restaurant streets around Götgatan, Folkungagatan, Nytorget and Medborgarplatsen.  There's one large Queen size bed and one foldable bed 80x200cm which is placed in two separate parts in the apartment. This makes this apartment great if you prefer to sleep in two different rooms in your own beds. Regarding the pictures: the flat has been a little redesigned now. More living hallway, curtains in kitchen, new rugs and better lightning.
description: Welcome to staying at a warm and central space totaling 46m². Here is your best chance to live right in the heart of Södermalm - the most cultural and beautiful part of Stockholm! *** Interested in longer stays, preferably companies *** Södermalm is one of Stockholms city islands and the location of this studio apartment makes you being just seconds away from all the local & popular shopping and restaurant streets around Götgatan, Folkungagatan, Nytorget and Medborgarplatsen.  There's one large Queen size bed and one foldable bed 80x200cm which is placed in two separate parts in the apartment. This makes this apartment great if you prefer to sleep in two different rooms in your own beds. Regarding the pictures: the flat has been a little redesigned now. More living hallway, curtains in kitchen, new rugs and better lightning. ￫ Superfast WiFi (100mbit/s down, 50mbit/s up) ￫ Main bed: 140 inch IKEA Sultan bed (new from 2013) - fits 2 ￫ Second bed: 80 inch, fits 1 (see pic) ￫ Professional
neighborhood_overview: ￫ The Old Town (20 min walk) ￫ The Royal Castle (25 min walk) ￫ Skanstull (Tunnelbana) Subway (1 min) ￫ Grocery store, ATM, 7eleven, pharmacy (2 min) ￫ Systembolaget (alcohol store) (3 min) ￫ 2 indoor shopping malls - Skrapan and Ringen (3 min) ￫ Götgatan shopping street (15 secs) ￫ Nytorget - Popular spot with a lot of great coffee shops and places to lunch, Urban Deli and Café String are two of them (5 min) ￫ more...
notes: Getting to the Central Station from Arlanda Airport is easy. You have three options: • Arlanda Express train, ~20 min, 160kr • Flygbussarna bus, ~50 min, 100kr • Fixed price cab to the address, ~40 min, 500kr ... from the central station, you go just a few stations with the subway, green line towards Farsta or Hagsätra.
transit: Exploring SoFo and the city is easiest done by walking or, of course, bicycling. You can buy a 'rent-a-bicycle' card at 7Eleven, and pick-up a bicycle 250m from the flat out of an automated bicycle street stand (this service is open from april to october).
access: ￫ Superfast WiFi (100mbit/s down, 50mbit/s up) ￫ Main bed: 140 inch IKEA Sultan bed (new from 2013) - fits 2 ￫ Second bed: 80 inch, fits 1 (see pic) ￫ Professional cleaning at all times between stays (always cleanly made beds + towels for the full company) ￫ Hairdryer, iron, iron board, mixer, bread toaster, toaster, waffle maker ￫ Full sized & fully equipped kitchen ￫ 50" Samsung LED with Apple TV & Netflix
interaction: You are renting the whole apartment, meaning I will not be present (just to check you in, if possible). However, I'll always be available on the phone and Airbnb for any questions you may have regarding the apartment, city, restaurants - or anything. I can also help you with getting on the guest list to some of Stockholms best night clubs (for free of course).
house_rules: No smoking allowed inside the apartment or from the windows. Be nice to the neighbours. Try to keep the volume down after 22pm. If something expensive would break (a glass or so is not a big problem), the repair cost is on the guest.
host_about: Loves to travel wherever the sun is, tennis and running.

summary: Cozy apartment in a protected "culture" marked building from the 17th century. Located on one of the most centric and charming locations in Stockholm city. Very centric location with bars, cafes, galleries and shopping around the corner but still on a quiet and calm street.
space: Fully equiped spacious kitchen and a bedroom with 160cm bed, extra 90cm matress available on request. Hallway, bathroom and a small balcony.

host_about:
Hey, fellow Airbnb-traveller!

My name is Arthur and I live in Stockholm, more specifically in the area called Södermalm (the urban part of Stockholm). I have lived here my whole life. I study communication and work part-time in a restaurant. 
I love traveling. I alway travel through Airbnb, so I have a lot of experience what it's like to be a guest abroad. I have been an Airbnb-host for almost 3 years now. 

I hope you will get to enjoy Stockholm just as much as I do, and i hope your experience here will be one of the best of your life!

name: 2 Room Strandv-Stureplan-Östermalm
summary: Centrally Located in the heart of Stockholm on chic Östermalm- 2 Room Designer Condo Apartment , less than 5 minutes to some of the most iconic scenes; the Army Museum, Hedvig Eleonora Kyrka, Hallwyl Museum (Hallwylska Museet), Royal King's Palace, Humlegarden, Stureplan, The King's Garden (Kungsträdgården) Djurgården's Zoo & Entertainment Park and well within walking distance to a selection of dining, recreational and shopping options
space: Elegant and highly upgraded Holiday Home, perfect for Young Professionals, small Family or Couple Adventurers on Business, Leisure and vacation trips, approximately 800 sf or 70 m2 with 1 Bedroom and Bath, fully equipped Kitchen with top of the line Appliances Upgraded with Business Travel Ready Amenities: * Essentials (soap, shampoo, towels, linens & pillows) * Self check-in (our home caretaker is ready to help you) * High-speed Wireless Internet * Iron & ironing board * Hair dryer * Hangers * Laptop-friendly work space (laptop provided upon request)
description: Centrally Located in the heart of Stockholm on chic Östermalm- 2 Room Designer Condo Apartment , less than 5 minutes to some of the most iconic scenes; the Army Museum, Hedvig Eleonora Kyrka, Hallwyl Museum (Hallwylska Museet), Royal King's Palace, Humlegarden, Stureplan, The King's Garden (Kungsträdgården) Djurgården's Zoo & Entertainment Park and well within walking distance to a selection of dining, recreational and shopping options Elegant and highly upgraded Holiday Home, perfect for Young Professionals, small Family or Couple Adventurers on Business, Leisure and vacation trips, approximately 800 sf or 70 m2 with 1 Bedroom and Bath, fully equipped Kitchen with top of the line Appliances Upgraded with Business Travel Ready Amenities: * Essentials (soap, shampoo, towels, linens & pillows) * Self check-in (our home caretaker is ready to help you) * High-speed Wireless Internet * Iron & ironing board * Hair dryer * Hangers * Laptop-friendly work space (laptop provided upon request) Pr
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the Capital of Sweden and the #1 best location in Stockholm on 'chic' Östermalm, next to Sweden's most exclusive address: by the Royal Theater on Nybrogatan next to Stureplan and Strandvägen near King’s Palace. 150 yards to Strandvägen and the Ocean with the world-famous archipelago of Stockholm. Östermalm is Stockholm's most exclusive part of town (similar to Soho in New York). This area is known to be home to Swedish Royalty and Movie-stars. Enjoy walking distance to the Royal King's Palace (900m), Stureplan's famous night clubs (200m), Djurgården's Zoo & Entertainment Park (900m), Strandvägen (150m). Within only 350 meters you will also find The King's Garden (Kungsträdgården), The Galleria Mall (500m) and one of Europe's largest shopping store: NK (about the size of New York Macy's), also only within 500 m. Here you have both nature and city pulse within walking distance! Also close to fine restaurants, vibrant nightlife and upscale shopping.
notes: Parking Available There are metered parking outside on the surrounding streets. There is free parking at night-time after 6pm. You do not need a car in Stockholm since the public transportation such as subway and local buses are very affordable and easy to access.  You can walk to most places or pick up a cab. Please let us know if you need any assistance in renting a car.
transit: Walking distance to everything.  Both taxi and public transportation available nearby.
access: Premium Accommodations: 1 Bedroom with 1 King Size Bed, 1 Designer Daybed and 42 Inch Plasma TV  with cable TV, CD/DVD System, 1 Bathroom, 1 Living Room  / convertible 2nd Bedroom with 2 Designer Daybeds with 50 Inch Plasma TV with cable TV, CD/DVD, Kitchen & Bar fully equipped with state of the art appliances ; flat ceramic induction glass cook top with electronic touch pad, oven, fridge, freezer, microwave, coffeemaker, wine glasses, dinnerware, blender, toaster, Nespresso Cappuccino and Latte Maker, Soda stream - Make Your Own Sparkling Water or Soda * Bedroom can be set up with either 1 King-sized Bed or 2 Twin Beds with Down Comforters, Memory Foam, Duvet Sheet Covers and High Thread Count Bed Linen * Full Bathroom with High Thread Count Bath Linen * Games & Video Console: Wii, PlayStation, Xbox FREEBIES: * FREE Phone Calls Worldwide with our VoIP Account * FREE Chrome-cast Internet Entertainment w/ 24/7 free movies on our Netflix account * FREE Tennis/ Complimentary use of Racket
interaction: Your privacy is our utmost priority. But we are there when needed 24/7, do not hesitate to reach out to us even if it’s just to ask where to go in town. It would be our pleasure to share recommendations that would make your vacation an unforgettable one!
house_rules: Treat our home with respect the way you would your own home.
host_about:
We take pride in providing quality accommodation and excellent service. 
After choosing us as your host you will be able to reach us 24/7 and we love to host! :-)

We truly take pride in trying to make your stay as comfortable as possible and also give you tips and recommendations to enhance your destination experience. This is what makes our guests want to return over and over year after year. The thank you notes from guests like you are what drives us and make us love what we do.

We are here to welcome our of town guests and explain how wonderful a stay can be! Feel free to ask us anything about your visit. Meanwhile, let us know and we will give you some great hints for getting around and traveling to your new favorite destination. 

We will be assisting you from the time you make us your host until the time you depart back to your own home. 

Our favorite travel destinations are South Beach Miami, Orlando, Tampa, Palm Beach, Scottsdale/Phoenix, New York, LA, San Francisco, San Diego to name a few in the USA, and internationally we love France, Italy, Hong Kong, and the Philippines. Our future plans are to explore Hawaii, South America, Australia/New Zealand, and South Africa on our journey on this planet.

We love to travel, mix business with pleasure, learn from others, gain new experiences, meet new people, network, and explore more of the world's wonderful "treasures" as long as we live. 

We love the new sharing economy! Let's embrace it :-)

We look forward welcoming you to our home!

name: Great room,very heart of Stockholm!
summary: Nicely furnished room (15 sqm big) with an extremely comfy double bed in one of the top areas in the absolute heart of Stockholm City. (Door-to-door commuter train from Arlanda!) Access to a brand new kitchen and two bathrooms!  Welcome!
space: The location on the 4th floor right at The Southern Station (where you can go directly by commuter train from Arlanda airport) is perfect with the city pulse right outside the house. Nearly everything is within walking distance and practically every means of public transportation can be reached within minutes. The beautiful old town (Gamla Stan) with The Royal Castle is only a short walk away, and there are many cafés, restaurants, shops and inner city green areas surrounding our home.  As Södermalm is one of the islands that make up the absolute heart of Stockholm, the amazing water that the city is famous for is of course only a few minutes walk away from the house.

name: Central apartment in Stockholm
summary: perfect central location, two room apartment, close to all amenities. tube stations 5 mins walk. impossible to live more centrally. courtyard flat with balcony so no passing traffic. simple decor, wooden floors, large tv. bathroom with shower and washing machine.  ideal way to sample the city! Update July 2017 - wifi in the apartment (but not unlimited data so please inquire if you are likely to need a lot of data).
space: Almost impossible to find a more central location, but very quiet also as it faces the courtyard, not the street.

Almost impossible to find a more central location, but very quiet also as it faces the courtyard, not the street.  The flat and the balcony. There is a kind of courtyard also but it's nicer to be on the balcony. If I am here and you need help with something, let me know, otherwise I will stay out of your way. If I am away somewhere on vacation a friend will help you out with the keys etc and he can ring me if there's any problem.  Despite being in the middle of town, the apartment faces the courtyard so there is almost no traffic noise. All amenities are nearby, shops, tran
neighborhood_overview: Despite being in the middle of town, the apartment faces the courtyard so there is almost no traffic noise. All amenities are nearby, shops, transport, bars, restaurants, galleries, etc.
notes: The apartment is on the third floor and there is no lift so it is not so easy for anyone with mobility issues. One review says it is on the 4th floor but this is incorrect. If you are staying any time apart from winter, I would really appreciate it if you could water the plants. No problem if it has been raining but any other time, especially on very warm days. Most of them are food plants so you are welcome to eat any you like!
transit: Nearest station is less than 5 minutes walk from here. Bus stops even closer. Central station 15 minutes walk or one metro stop away.
access: The flat and the balcony. There is a kind of courtyard also but it's nicer to be on the balcony.
interaction: If I am here and you need help with something, let me know, otherwise I will stay out of your way. If I am away somewhere on vacation a friend will help you out with the keys etc and he can ring me if there's any problem.
house_rules: No loud noise after 2200. You can use the washing machine but put the water tube into the WC as it is not connected for water going out otherwise, and the floor gets wet. No smoking inside the house. Please use the balcony and put cigarette ends in the trash, not in the plant boxes.

name: Charming Apmt in the heart of SOFO
summary: Spacious apartment in the heart of Södermalm -large private patio, high ceilings, stucco, large windows and tiled stoves  situated - Surrounded by cafes, restaurants, bars yet nestled on quiet street. 5 mins walk to ocean view at Monteliusvägen.
space: 68sqm newly renovated 1BR apartment in a house built in 1902, with 2 decorative kålkalugn (fire place - not in use anymore), large outdoor private patio. Home for a young creative couple in film & media industry, and only available for rent while they are away on their summer vacation!
description: Spacious apartment in the heart of Södermalm -large private patio, high ceilings, stucco, large windows and tiled stoves  situated - Surrounded by cafes, restaurants, bars yet nestled on quiet street. 5 mins walk to ocean view at Monteliusvägen. 68sqm newly renovated 1BR apartment in a house built in 1902, with 2 decorative kålkalugn (fire place - not in use anymore), large outdoor private patio. Home for a young creative couple in film & media industry, and only available for rent while they are away on their summer vacation! Projector for your use, outdoor patio facing inner yard Minimal. Surrounded by the best cafés (Mellqvist, Drop Coffee, Love Food Cafe, Falelfelbaren), restaurants, bars (Marie Laveau, Häktet, Morfar Ginko, Delikatssen etc.), bookstores (Papercut, Antique bookstore, Photography bookstore,), fashion boutiques (Brandstation, Nitty Gritty, Herr Judith, Our Legacy, Uniforms for the Dedicated etc) and fresh bakeries (Fabrique, Petrus) in Stockholm, you are living right
neighborhood_overview: Surrounded by the best cafés (Mellqvist, Drop Coffee, Love Food Cafe, Falelfelbaren), restaurants, bars (Marie Laveau, Häktet, Morfar Ginko, Delikatssen etc.), bookstores (Papercut, Antique bookstore, Photography bookstore,), fashion boutiques (Brandstation, Nitty Gritty, Herr Judith, Our Legacy, Uniforms for the Dedicated etc) and fresh bakeries (Fabrique, Petrus) in Stockholm, you are living right in the heart of where all the to-go places are pinned by all urban travel guides. With just 1 min walk to supermarket and 3 minutes walk to Mariatorget T-bana station, living here is highly accessible to everything you'll need, yet nestled on the quiet back street - Brännkyrkagatan, one of the oldest street in Södermalm.  With a short stroll towards the back of building, you will find yourself near the backwaters, where you can get a fantastic view of the Old Town (Gamla Stan) / Stockholm City overlooking from Monteliusvägen.
notes: There are more furnishings to the apartment since these photos are taken. We have now wall book shelves & large antique hanging lamp in living room, wall shelf in kitchen, and a TV in the (no cable channels but you can plug in your laptop to use as screen) and a working desk in the bedroom. We are overseas traveling now (always on-the-go for film production) but will update with new photos once we find time when we get home! Since this is our personal home and only rent out during our summer vacation this trip, we would have our personal stuff like books and would keep our clothes in the wardrobe, we seek your understanding and respect to our personal belongings that would share the space with you. Thank you.
transit: 2 mins walk to Mariatorget T-bana, 8 mins walk to Central downtown Slussen & Gamla Stan,  6 mins walk to Södra Station (Pendaltåg) that takes you straight to Arlanda Airport. And having the best view of Stockholm's city skyline overlooking Old Town Gamla Stan is just 5mins walk behind the street at Monteliusvägen or go to a secret hideout on a little hilltop Skinnarviksberget where you can have a breath-taking view of entire ocean view of Stockholm city where you can see Kungsholmen on the other side.
access: Projector for your use, outdoor patio facing inner yard
interaction: Minimal.
house_rules: We love animals so having pets are more than welcome! As long as you do clean after them. No smoking in the apartment, you can do so in the outdoor patio.
host_about: Art/Visual Director from Singapore now living in Stockholm. Frequent traveler.

name: Neat & confy double room Stockholm
summary: Comfortable double room in a modern and spacious apartment situated in Midsommarkransen, a charming neighbourhood just 12 minutes from Stockholm city.
space: Private bedroom with a double bed and window to the garden, Wifi, full access to fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bathtub.  Free parking on the street. Very close to underground/metro station. The apartment is newly built with high ceilings and large windows. It has two bedrooms, a spacious living room, modern kitchen and bathroom.
description: Comfortable double room in a modern and spacious apartment situated in Midsommarkransen, a charming neighbourhood just 12 minutes from Stockholm city. Private bedroom with a double bed and window to the garden, Wifi, full access to fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bathtub.  Free parking on the street. Very close to underground/metro station. The apartment is newly built with high ceilings and large windows. It has two bedrooms, a spacious living room, modern kitchen and bathroom. Modern fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bathtub. We are both very sociable and enjoy making our guests feel welcome! Midsommarkransen is one of Stockholm's most charming and pleasant neighbourhoods, populated by young artists and cosmopolites living close to both the city and nature.  Midsommarkransen was first developed in the 1920s to create affordable housing for the working class. With its authentic architecture and proximity to nature, Midsommarkransen has become a sought-after residential
neighborhood_overview: Midsommarkransen is one of Stockholm's most charming and pleasant neighbourhoods, populated by young artists and cosmopolites living close to both the city and nature.  Midsommarkransen was first developed in the 1920s to create affordable housing for the working class. With its authentic architecture and proximity to nature, Midsommarkransen has become a sought-after residential area, with an artistic air and cultural touch without becoming snobbish or pretentious. Walking through Midsommarkransen you will pass by cafés, vintage and designer shops as well as an authentic cinema from the 1920s. Konstfack, Sweden’s largest university college of arts, crafts and design is situated in the same borough.
notes: There are several restaurants and a few pubs in the neighbourhood, at walking distance from our flat. The local supermarket is open from nine a.m. to eleven p.m. Monday-Sunday.
transit: Connection to central Stockholm via the red underground line (nr 14) direction Fruängen which runs every 5 to 10 minutes. The trip from T-Centralen takes 12 minutes. Our apartment is just 3 minutes' walk from Midsommarkransen underground station.
access: Modern fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bathtub.
interaction: We are both very sociable and enjoy making our guests feel welcome!
house_rules: No shoes indoors.
host_about: We are a Swedish-Brazilian couple, interested in music, sports and cooking. I am originally from Rio de Janeiro and moved to Sweden ten years ago. I play the guitarr and sing in a band on my spare time. Jennie was born in Sweden but has lived many years abroad, mostly in Brazil and Italy. She works for a media and broadcasting company.

name: Spacious flat in central Stockholm
summary: This is a modern, totally renovated duplex apartment on the topflor in trendy Södermalm. It´s a four room apartment that easily locates 4-6 persons. It´s situated close the subway and buses. 3 minutes walk from The Old Town.
space: 4 room apartment with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a well equiped kitchen, a large living room, and a nice balcony. It´s totally about 118 sqm (but one room will not be accesible as it is a lodger and a paying guest setup - in Swedish: ”inneboende”), so it totals 100 sqm. There´s one Master bedroom with a large bed, 160 cm. The bedrooms on the top floor has a bed that is 120 cm in each room. We also provide one extra bed with a mattress, that can placed according to your needs. Smoking in the apartment is not allowed and no loud noise is allowed after 10 o´clock in the evening (above all on the balcony). Excellent shopping, pubs, restaurants and cafés are just around the corner. Despite this, the apartment is situated on the top two floors in the building on a very calm street (facing an inner yard, not a street) so you will not be disturbed by noise from traffic or people being out at night.  If you are a family with small children there is a nice spacious backyard with a lovely playgroun

neighborhood_overview: This part of Stockholm is full of culture and cultural references, like the lovely Italian restaurant Il Tempo situated just around the corner of the flat, where Mikael Blomqvist and Erika Berger met in one of the films based on Stieg Larsson's books.
notes: Closest subway station is Slussen, which is a hub meaning that you can reach all parts of Stockholm from here, but it is also within walking distance from subway station Medborgarplatsen.
transit: Subway and buses are just around the corner.
access: Laundry room with two laundry machines and drying facilities, garage (on some occasions), and a child playground.
interaction: We will be able to recommend and guide our guests for the best possible Stockhom experience!
host_about: Hi, we are Mia and Christer and live in this apartment together with our two children. Mia works as a physiotherapist and Christer within E-commerce. We also run an e-commerce company from home. The whole family love to travel and explore different parts of the world. If you choose to stay in our apartment we will do our best to provide you with valuable information about Stockholm and the surrounding and fascinating neighbourhoods of Södermalm and Old Town.

name: Nice & cosy 2-room apt in Södermalm
summary: A nice 2 room apartment in Södermalm; close to subway Skanstull and the trendy Sofo-area. Quiet place with beautiful green space just outside the window, but still just a minute away from the city pulse.
space: Perfect stay for two persons! Small but supercosy bedroom with a soft 180 cm kingsize bed. If you are three persons the third one will sleep on the sofa in the livlingroom. It's not a bed sofa, but it's soft, wide and okay to sleep on. Free wifi, apple TV, bed linen and towels are included. Perfect location in Södermalm! Short walk from subway Skanstull which will take you to central station T-centralen in 8 minutes. Close to restuarants, bars, shopping and night life.

house_rules: Smoking is not allowed in the apartment, but there is a balcony in the stairwells free for use! The walls are not very soundproof, so please don't be too loud, especially after 10 pm. Neighbours are very calm though, so you don't have to worry about being disturbed yourself:)
host_about: I am 28 years old, living in Stockholm, working as an editor. When not in Stockholm you probably find me visiting friends in Berlin or southern Sweden where I'm from –  or visiting elsewhere! I love travelling and let my own apartment out for rent through Airbnb when I do.

name: Appart moderne sur Södermalm
summary: Complete flat with kitchen, two bedroom and a large sejour. 2min walk to the beach, 5 to either local train or subway. Take a walk along the lake or go directly in the earth of Södermalm in no time. Free wifi.
space: Au centre de Stockholm, à 10min à pied des bars et boutique de Medis, le lac en bas de la rue, un appart lumineux et facile d'accès. Un grand 3 pièce lumineux facilement accessible. Une cuisine avec les utensiles et condiments de base. Cuisine Salle de bains Wifi Interdiction de fumer Je loue mon appart quand je pars en week-end ou en vacances. Situé sur l'île de Södermalm, l'appart est à la fois au coeur de la ville et dans la nature. Une promenade jusqu'à Medis et ses bars, ou un tour au bord de l'eau été comme hiver, les possibilités sont grandes. Pour les familles, il y a de nombreuses aires de jeux à proximité.  A 5min du "pendeltåg" (RER à Stockholm, avec train direct jusqu'à Arlanda), 8min du métro. Parking gratuit dans la rue la nuit et les weekends. Velo ville (city bikes) à 3min.

name: Lovely flat close to Södermalm
summary: Coming to Stockholm for a visit? Welcome to stay in our cosy appartement close to the vibrant city area "Södermalm" and the center or Stockholm. Also balcony for sunny breakfasts and a nice park with installed grills.
space: Coming to Stockholm for a visit? Our cosy and bright appartement is just the perfect place to stay! It is located 5 minutes (by metro) from the vibrant city area Södermalm with its countless cafes, bars, secondhand- & designer shops and restaurants. Also just a 4 min walk from the Globe Arenas. The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a small bath tub. A comfortable 160 cm bed, plus an inflatable double mattress if needed. TV, free wifi and elevator in the house. And not to forget – a lovely balcony for sunny breakfasts with a view from the sixth floor.  I'd love to share some of my favorite spots in town with you. Welcome and hope you'll enjoy your stay! INCLUDED: Towels and sheets Wifi Hairdryer Tourist information CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT: We can usually be flexible with times for check-in and check-out, but preferably not too late or early ☺

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is safe and calm even though it’s so close to everything. Just outside the door you find a cozy park with public grills and hammocks. Within 5 minutes (by metro) you will be in the middle of the vibrant city area Södermalm. Also close is the Old Town (7 min) and inner city (10 min). Just around the corner from the apartment is a small grocery store with the prime necessities, as well as a Chinese restaurant and pizza place. About 5 minutes away in Globen City, you will find a large supermarket and a small shopping center.
transit: Nearest metro station (Skärmarbrink) is a 4-minute walk away from the appartement. From there you have two lines, so there is never a long wait. Both of these lines go directly to the Central Station from where you can change to either train, bus or Arlanda Express if you are going out to the airport Arlanda or Skavsta.
host_about: Jag kommer ursprungligen från ett litet samhälle precis norr om polcirkeln, vid namn Jokkmokk. Numera bor jag sedan fem år tillbaka i Stockholm där jag arbetar med event och tv. Utanför jobbet sysslar jag även med dans, musik, skrivande, design etc. Jag älskar själv att resa och träffa människor, så tycker Airbnb är fantastiskt som koncept. Jag hoppas att du ska känna dig välkommen om du besöker mitt hem, och på samma sätt hoppas jag att du ska tycka att jag är en enkel och fin gäst att få på besök. Hoppas vi ses!

name: Södermalm - Close to everything!
summary: * I've never cancelled a guest so you're in good hands.*  In central Stockholm, at Södermalm (Skanstull). Close to shops, bars/restaurants (5 within a minute), theaters, cinemas, parks etc. 7 min walking distance to subway. Bus stop (bus 57) just outside (to The Old Town and downtown). You can always reach me with any questions and such. I'd love to help out!
space: The apartment (36 square meters) consists of a small hallway, bathroom, kitchen, a small room with a big dining table with 4 chairs and a large main room which contains the king size bed and my son's bed with a small sofa underneath. TV (moveable). There isn't any door seperating the two rooms. My bed is wide (180cm x 210 cm). My son's bed (90 cm x 200cm) with a sofa underneath which I can make a bed out of (135 cm wide and is best suited for kids) I do also have one additional mattress 90 cm × 2 m (Not the best Quality (according to 1 out of 50 guests)) but does work perfectly for a couple of days).  If you are travelling with your infant son or daughter I do also have a crib up on the attic which I can bring down for you if you'd like. Don't hesitate to tell me so.
