If you are travelling with yo
neighborhood_overview: 5 - 7 minute walk to "Götgatan" (One of the  Mainstreets of Södermalm), SOFO, and all the stores, boutiques and such. 5 - 7 minutes to 2 BIG supermarket which is open from 6 AM til 11:47 PM and 2 minutes to 2 supermarkets with open hours til 9 PM and 10 PM. 7-10 minute walk to the train station "Södra station" (Stockholm South station)  5-7 minutes to Skanstull Subwaystation. Less than a 5 minute walk to a huge park called "Rosenlundsparken" to relax in the sun, have fun in the snow or to play with your child. 20-25 minute walk to Slussen 30-35 min to "Old town/Gamla stan" 35-40 min to the Royal Castle  40-45 min to "Kungsträdgården" 50-55 min to Downtown area 50-60 min to the central station
notes: I've written down a guide which I have on the table for you in my apartment with various tips and such. There is also loads of guides to museums and other thing you will appreciate. You can reach me on my phone during daytime and I will usually (if I'm not on a trip) meet up with you and show you around in the apartment.  Otherwise you will get the key through a friend. CHECK IN:  Right now I'm very flexible with check in time.  Check in hours: I'm usually flexible but I prefer between 11 AM and 7 PM/ 11:00 - 19:00 depending on what suits you and me the best. Late and early check in is still possible but I will charge EXTRA for this (See below) in hand or through the Airbnb-page. *** REALLY Really early check in (between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) AM is 700 SEK extra in hand)*** ***Really early check in (between 09:00 - 10:00/9 - 10 AM is 400 SEK extra in hand)*** ***Early check in (between 10:00 - 11:00 /10 - 11 AM is 200 SEK extra in hand)*** ***Late check in (19:00 - 21:30/7 PM
transit: Just outside is bus 57 that will take you to the old town, Kungsträdgården and downtown. Subway (5 -7 minutes walk) and different bus stations within 2 minute walk where you may find the "Blue buses" - city buses number 3 & 4.
access: 46'' TV, plenty of toys for children, first aid kit, iron & board. There is also WiFi. One thing to note is that the laundry room (if needed) is on a different floor and needs to be reserved in advance. I can help you out with booking a slot if you want. Usually there is detergent in the apartment, free of use.

house_rules: Strictly forbidden to smoke inside! Strictly forbidden to have guests over in the apartment without approval from me. Behave like you're at home. Please take your shoes of when your in the apartment. You're welcome to have whatever I have in the the refrigerator, also you will always find coffee, tea, and cereal and such.  Feel free to use all of the other things in the apartment such as TV, iron, and if you have a child with you he/she may of course use my sons toys . And please don't hesitate to tell me if there is anything that you need or if there is anything that I can help you out with.
host_about: I am a outgoing and happy person. I love to meet new people from around the world and to help you out so that you will have a great stay in the wonderful city of Stockholm and especially at Södermalm where my apartment is located.

name: 3 Bedroom in the heart of Stockholm
summary: Beautiful, classic 3+ bedroom Stockholm apartment from 1905, in the heart of town, with kept charm such as fire places, tall ceilings and hardwood floors but fully remodeled with dimmers and heated floors in bathrooms. Can sleep 7 people.
space: The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a large living room, a kitchen, 2 toilets (1 large bathroom), a hall + a changing room.  Seven people staying here would look like this: —2 people in Bedroom 1 (Master bedroom) in the queen sized bed. —2 people in Bedroom 2 (single twin bed becomes double twin bed on the floor). —1 person in Bedroom 3 (with single twin loft bed). This bed needs to be for a person who weighs less than 80kg/170lb. —1 person on the LR sofa (if you are not super tall. I am 176cm/5'9" and I fit no problem). —1 person anywhere you like on the floor on the extra mattress we have. The mattress is not super thick so better suitable for lighter person. Suggestion is to put it where there is a rug. APARTMENT DETAILS Size of the apartment: 1023 square feet / 95 square meters Neighbourhood name: Vasastan Closest subway station: Odenplan Closest Airport bus stop: Norra Stationsgatan Internet: Free and very fast wireless  Laundry: Free to use in the basement The apartment is situated onl

neighborhood_overview: I love my neighborhood because it has lots of parks — three so close with different features. Across the street: great for younger kids and if you want to have a pick nick. To the left: the large Vasa park where you can go running, soccer/iceskating, cafés, boule, playground, skateboard, and more. to the right: larger Haga Park where the Swedish princess Victoria lives. there is a big lake with canoe and swimming/ice skating, nice walks, big lawns, great for running, cafés, nature…my neighborhood is so quiet but so close to downtown: 3 stops on the metro or a 15 minute walk. You can walk to lots of restaurants and movie theaters.
notes: Safe neighborhood.
transit: Easy to get to and from the airport on the airport bus that stops so close. Metro stop nearby and lots of buses.
access: If you need to use the laundromat, let me know, and I will show you how it works.
interaction: I will greet you when you arrive and make you feel comfortable and show you around. You can call me anytime with questions. I am usually staying at my boyfriend's one block away. IF I am away, I will have someone else greet you! :-)
house_rules: • No smoking  • No pets • Do not use the fire places • No shoes inside • In the winter, please keep windows shut since the radiators and heated floors are on and the apartment is very expensive to heat up. • No parties/extra guests are allowed. • Do NOT use the tile ovens in any room. • No loud music after 10pm, weekends 11pm. Always keep the noise down in the master bedroom due to sensitive neighbour above. • Always keep the door locked, whether you are home or not. When nobody is home, make sure to lock the upper lock as well. When you leave, please: • Leave all used sheets and towels on the floor. • Do your dishes. • Make sure you lock both door locks when leaving. • Leave the keys in my mailbox (WILKINSON) situated by the front door. Thank you!
host_about: I am an easy going Franco-Swede who has lived in San Francisco for 25 years. Now, I am back to my home town, Stockholm, where I work as a graphic designer and illustrator. I live part time with my boyfriend, Hans, a block away so I will come and greet you and make sure you are comfortable. I have two daughters and a bonus son! I love my home that is personal, clean, quiet, comfortable, and is in my favourite part of town, in the neighbourhood called Vasastan where you have lots of parks, shops, cafés, great grocery stores and restaurants. You will have a great stay here! :-)

name: Nice studio apartment in Stockholm
summary: 1 room apartment in Stockholm, 10 minutes away from central station by subway. Fresh and cosy with balcony in a calm and safe neighborhood. The building is surrounded by trees on the back where, if you are lucky, you may spot deers walking around.
space: Clean and nice, studio apartment in the Hammarbyhöjden district - just 10 minutes away from central station by subway. The district is just off the island of Södermalm, the trendy part of Stockholm city with great restaurants and bars.  Hammarbyhöjden district is very calm and quiet, despite being close to the city centre. It is almost like living on the country side! It gives you a possibility of relaxation at home from a buzz of a big city.  What makes this apartment the most unique? If you are looking to spend time in beautiful city of Stockholm, this would be a perfect place to stay. It provides you with calm and relaxing atmosphere and yet very close to the city pulse and night life. I am here to help if you have any questions!  Either myself or a friend will be available upon your arrival to hand off the keys and show you have everything works! Just to make sure your stay is as comfortable as possible.

neighborhood_overview: Just 10 minutes away from central station by subway. Hammarbyhöjden district is just off the island of Södermalm, the trendy part of Stockholm city with great restaurants and bars.  15 min walk from apartment will get you to Nacka reservat - a natural reserve that includes small lakes and a natural setting typical of the southern Stockholm area. The area is used for several outdoor activities like walking and jogging, skiiing and ice skating in winter, and summer and winter bathing. A golf course lies close to the district of Björkhagen. Due to its close proximity to the reserve, it is very common to see roe deers walking around residential area without any great fear of people.
transit: 10 min raway from central station by subway 2 min walking distance to subway station. 30 min walk to Medborgarplatsen (centre of island of Södermalm) or 5 min ride with the subway 15 min walk to Nacka nature reserve 10 min walk to Globe arena
access: TV  WiFi Towels and Sheets  Double bed - 120cm x 200cm Fully equipped kitchen
interaction: Depends on the quest
house_rules: No smoking is allowed inside. Enjoy the apartment like yours, their services and elements but also respecting them. This is still a home. :) Respect the other residents of the building. No parties are allowed in the apartment. No shoes indoors.
host_about:
Nice and kind Swedish bloke with mediterranean roots. Living and working in Stockholm and Amsterdam for an IT-company. 

On my spare time I enjoy spending time with friends and family. Gym is not my biggest priority in life, but I do enjoy it at times. I also enjoy good wine and food, books and traveling.

name: Family suite for 4 in SOFO area
summary: Spacy and comfortable family flat with all amenities in a nice area with great restaurants and cafés. Next to a park and a grocery store. The bus to the city stops right outside the door.
space: Spacious and welcoming apartment in the best part of Stockholm - Södermalm. Close to everything; restaurants, bars, grocery stores, boutiques, vintage stores etc. located on the fourth floor in a quiet area on the border of SOFO.  3.5 rooms and one fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, washer, 40" Flatscreen, Wifi, PS3. We have a double bed in the bedroom and a nice expandable double bed in the guest/kids room.  Our kids room also has a small crib and toys, which you (or your kids) are most welcome to use.
description: Spacy and comfortable family flat with all amenities in a nice area with great restaurants and cafés. Next to a park and a grocery store. The bus to the city stops right outside the door. Spacious and welcoming apartment in the best part of Stockholm - Södermalm. Close to everything; restaurants, bars, grocery stores, boutiques, vintage stores etc. located on the fourth floor in a quiet area on the border of SOFO.  3.5 rooms and one fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, washer, 40" Flatscreen, Wifi, PS3. We have a double bed in the bedroom and a nice expandable double bed in the guest/kids room.  Our kids room also has a small crib and toys, which you (or your kids) are most welcome to use. Feel free to use everything you want in the kitchen and look around for what you need. Usually we keep some clothes in the large wardrobe, but provide hangers in the bedroom for your clothes. We do our best to help you out before and during your stay and enjoy giving tips on things to do in Stockholm.
neighborhood_overview: Let us know if you want some pointers on good restaurants, clubs, museums or stuff to do nearby and we'll be happy to share. The neighbourhood (Sofia) is our favourite part of town because it's got a small town vibe, with all the good restaurants and things to do, and close to everything, but it is also quiet.
transit: The #2 Bus goes just around the corner (every 10min) with 5 min to the Old Town/Slussen and 15/20 to city centre. Walking to the Old Town takes about 15 min.  There is also a public bike stand 2 blocks away if you want to move around on bike. I might have access to a free parking space in the neighbourhood, 300m awqy from the apartment, - just ask if you need.
access: Feel free to use everything you want in the kitchen and look around for what you need. Usually we keep some clothes in the large wardrobe, but provide hangers in the bedroom for your clothes.
interaction: We do our best to help you out before and during your stay and enjoy giving tips on things to do in Stockholm. We make an effort to always be available by phone.  Most of the time we are able to welcome guests personally and show around the apartment, but sometimes we are travelling ourselves. If we aren't able to make it when you arrive we can give you access to the apartment with an electronic lock and welcome you by phone.
house_rules: When you leave the apartment please empty the trash, do the dishes, and make sure no windows are open  We include a cleaning fee of approx 40€ on the total. If you prefer cleaning everything yourself, let us know and we'll subtract from your bill. We're good friends with our neighbours so please keep the volume down after 23.00 at night on the TV or music.  No smoking inside, but on the balcony is fine.
host_about:
We love travelling ourselves so giving tips on the best Stockholm has to offer is our pleasure. 

We have a 4 year old son, Adam, and 1 year old baby girl, Astrid. When we do get a minute outside family chores I (Fred) like to fix/build things (cars/boats) in my free time and Ylva reads books and hangs out with friends.
We spend a lot of time outdoors, where Stockholm has a lot to offer.

Ylva is from the South and Fred is from Stockholm, we have lived here together since 2008 and before that in Ghana, South Africa and Lund.

space: A modern social sunny/bright apartment built in 2007 and situated on the 4th floor.  This cozy 76 sqm family-friendly flat has two bedrooms; the first with a large twin bed(180/200), and the second with two beds that are child-friendly - 1) a bunker with actually 2 adult beds; one single(90/200) on top and one small double( 140/200) below/under. 2) And a child-friendly bed(or single adult bed 80/200) modeled as a car. This whole room is child-friendly and has beds suited for children aged 2-15 years. One bathroom, with a shower/ bathtub and washing machine och tumble-dryer. The kitchen and living room are in a open planning next to the terrass/balcony. The apartment has two balconies, both sunny from morning until early evening and 4 people can easily enjoy a meal there. The kitchen has a fridge and freezer, microwave, a stowe and circotherm owen.  I  have lots of toys for kids and a dvd, laptop, cd-player etc. Chairs for children, bathing tub. .................................,.......

neighborhood_overview: Här i Årstadal/Liljeholmskajen bor du med ett perfekt läge i ett område som är i en spännande utvecklingsfas. Caféer, restauranger och butiker har öppnat i kvarteren runt omkring fastigheten och Liljeholmskajen räknas numera till en av Stockholms mest attraktiva stadsdelar.  Liljeholmskajen ett populärt, expansivt, lugnt och sjönära område. Lägenheten är belägen precis intill Årstaviken. Här finns all service man behöver såsom mataffärer, caféer, restauranger, SATS, kemtvätt samt flertalet frisörer. Attraktivt beläget med närhet till storstadens puls bara några minuters promenad bort. Du bor i en stadsmiljö med natur och vatten precis intill, vilket är en oslagbar kombination. Runt knuten finns Årstaskogen med härliga, lummiga grönområden med promenadstråk och motionsspår. 50 meter till bryggan där välbesökta badbryggor finns efter kajen, en minut från lägenheten. Badmöjligheter finns även vid sjön Trekanten som ligger i närheten samt Vintervikens gränsområde med bad och promenadstråk
notes: Detta är ett rök- och djurfri hem med barn boendes varannan vecka och  är själv annars mkt sällan hemma på dom barnfriaveckorna(Jämna veckor).  Rätt kandidat: *Rök- och djurfri *Barnkär person iom att jag har barn som är boendes här varannan vecka (Mån-mån, ojämna veckor).
transit: Söder når du med en kort promenad ca 15 min gångväg till Hornstull, och kommunikationerna till området är oslagbara med bara6min gångväg till Liljeholmen och knappt 2 min till tvärbanan. Från Liljeholmskajen har man det mesta inom promenad- och cykelavstånd. Ett par minuters promenad till Liljeholmens galleria med dess generösa utbud av all möjlig service man kan tänkas behöva.  Detta är ett centralt läge med goda kommunikationer runt hörnet i form av tvärbana(Årstadal 1 min bort) mellan Alvik och Gullmarsplan och 4 min promenad till tunnelbana vid Liljeholmen (röd linje),10 min promenad till pendelstationen Årstaberg, flygbuss till Bromma flygplats och flertalet bussar. Med bil når man E4:an samt Essingeledens pfart med lätthet. Möjlighet att hyra garageplats i området finnes.
access: Detta ingår: * Hyra * Värme, El och Vatten * Internet 100 mbit * Möbler & allt annat som köks redskap: plats i kyl/frys och skafferi, tvättmaskin, diskmaskin osv. * Parking( Obs! Då tillkommer ytterligare 1700:-/mån) *Har städhjälp en gång i veckan.
interaction: Umgänge med gästen beror nog på gästen, dvs personkemi osv..
host_about:
A little about me:
Life loving and ever curious, love to learn new things and always looking for new friends to share and grow knowledge and experience with.
Live and practice a healthy and active lifestyle, right now mostly into road cycling(summer) or the gym(winter) and running.
Love traveling, good food, deep conversations, culture, music & dancing, reading or a great movie, and exploring new/other cultures and meeting new people.

name: Apartment in the heart of hip Hornstull
summary: Our spacious comfortable apartment is located in the bohemian part of Stockholm in Hornstull, close to restaurants, shopping, bakeries, cafés and beautiful nature walks on the island of Långholmen.
space: The apartment is large but is a duplex, so guests will have privacy and can also use the living room upstairs. There is a bathroom as well as a guest toilet, and a spacious fully equipped kitchen. The apartment is well designed and comfortable.  Nearby there are also some good walks, and afterwards you can visit some of the nice cosy cafés by the water for what the Swedes call 'fika', which basically means long moments spent chatting over coffee and pastries in a warm and welcoming setting.
description: Our spacious comfortable apartment is located in the bohemian part of Stockholm in Hornstull, close to restaurants, shopping, bakeries, cafés and beautiful nature walks on the island of Långholmen. notes: We have a cat in the apartment.

summary: This charming apt is located at a quiet court yard in the very popular area Vasastan in Stockholm with grocery stores, restuarants, shops, bars and parks just outside the building.
space: Charming and quiet turn of the century apartment located in the center of Stockholm. The kitchen is fully equipped with a gas stove and everything you might need to prepare your own dinner for a cosy night at home, there is also a coffee machine, a toaster, a juice-extractor etc. In the other room you’ll find a two-seat sofa, bed (120 cm), TV, speaker that you can plug your phone or computer into. There is also a very nice balcony with a table and chairs where you can enjoy your breakfast or dinner in the sun. The balcony is facing the quiet yard.

summary: Our house lies within walking distance from Kista metro station and Kista Galleria shopping mall. We will be happy to help you finding your way in Stockholm and its surroundings. We have a garden and a park outside. There is a playground for children nearby. The following facilities are available: - Shower - Access to kitchen - Washing facilities - Fast broadband with wifi - Quiet neighbourhood - Access to nature nearby
space: The room has a twin bed plus an optional camp bed. There is a working space where you can put up your laptop. The neighbourhood is very quiet so keeping the window open during the night is not a problem. There are also some shelves in the room, containing books in Swedish, English and Russian. If you are looking for something to read during your stay you can find it here.

The area near the house is
neighborhood_overview: We live next to a big nature reserve. There's a small river, open fields and a big forest not far away. Next to the house we have a playground for children.
notes: Kista has a very high service level, comparable to the City centre. Kista Galleria is one of the main shopping malls of the Stockholm region. The opening hours are 10-21, every day of the week. There is a big selection of different restaurants in Kista Galleria. Detailed instructions of how to get to the house will be sent automatically when we confirm your booking.
transit: Transportation from the airport to Kista centrum.  - Airport shuttle bus towards Brommaplan (28 min) Transportation from the central station to Kista. - Blue metro line towards Akalla (17 min) It takes 7 minutes to walk to the house from Kista centrum. There are several walking options, they are all OK. You need to use GPS (mobile phone) to find your way. If you have heavy bags there is bus 517 going from Kista to Arhusgatan. Usually walking is the fastest and easiest though. Kista has extraordinary transport connections. In addition to metro there are several fast bus lines, direct shuttle bus to the airport and commuter trains covering the whole Stockholm region from either Sollentuna or Helenelund stations nearby. There is a car rental firm very close nearby. It operates on weekdays only. To get a car for the weekend you need to pick it up not later than 18.00 on Friday. Finding parking space in the area is not a problem.
access: You have access to the room itself, the kitchen, bathroom/toilet and shower/laundry room.
interaction: We will be happy to help you in finding your way in Stockholm and its surroundings. The area near the house is great for walking.
house_rules: We expect to agree beforehand about the usage of kitchen in the evenings. Cooking late at night is usually not a problem.
host_about:
I am Jens. I live together with Olga,  Sonya and Oliver in Kista. 

I work at Sida, the Swedish Foreign Aid Agency. I have an interest in culture and all things international. I speak Russian and have lived in Belarus. I hope to live  abroad for some years further on.

summary: Located in Hornstull. A five minute walk to the metro and a one minute walk to the water. A great place for a couple or for a work visit. There are great places around and beautiful walks to take along the water. / note: the walls have new beige chalk paint.
space: This is my own apartment where I have lived for the last five years. I kept it very simple and personal. I have gathered some art and collection elements from Russia, Japan and Canada. Enjoy cooking, the quite garden and light up some candles of-course. A healthy surprise - but important to mention - it is on the 4th floor. No elevator. It's ok, but I will definitely help, if you got luggage!

A healthy surprise - but important to mention - it is on the 4th floor. No elevator. It's ok, but I will definitely help, if you got luggage! All the basic needs, plus a bike if it's not too cold. If you're flying to Arlanda – take the Flybussrna towards Lileholmen. The Hornstull stop is a 7 min walk away. The walls are not white anymore =)

name: Apartment with balcony in SoFo
summary: Apartment in sofo, Södermalm  The apartment is located in trendy SoFo on Södermalm, with variety of restaurants, bars, cafeterias, parks and shops around the corner. Walking distance to two metro stations, Medborgarplatsen and Slussen. Inner city buses right around the corner. Supermarket and pharmacy in short walking distance.
space: The apartment consists of one living room with alcove, Bathroom with toilet and shower, fully equipped kitchen with a dining area for four people and a balcony facing the courtyard. A double bed is located in the living room alcove and the sofa is a sofa bed so there is actually room for 3 people in the apartment.

name: 2 rooms, twin balconies waterfront
summary: + 45 min airport direct coach + CENTRAL located: 1 min to bus, 3 min to subway, 10 min to city center. + Waterfront view + 2 Balconies + Studio layout with large, kingsize bed in separate bedroom + Bathtub, shower, washing facilities, amenities
space: Here in Hornstull  Södermalm you find this open 60 square meter studio apartment with a large 16 square meter separate bedroom. The twin balconies facing south and north adds to the space and openess.      Perfectly located in the inner city of Stockholm with transportation such as airport coach, subway and buses just around the corner. - Direct bus 66 to SOFO around the corner - Subway to Central Station and Gamla Stan takes 10 minutes - Walking distance to Gamla Stan is 2 kilometers along the water - Direct bus to and from Airport 5 min walk from the apartment In the apartment you find a fully equipped kitchen and alla amenities that you might need. Shampoo, toiletry, towels, iron, wash machine and hairdryer.  High end TV and surround system, TiVo. I will be available during your stay to answer and assist with any questions you might have. I try to always meet you personally upon arrival. This is my home and I live here so I know the area and can give you advice for activities, resta

neighborhood_overview: Although packed with shops, cafés and restaurants, close to public transport and everything just a short walking distance away - the apartment is surrounded by beautiful nature. Old red country style houses, water, cajak rentals and even an authentic sand beach ( Långholmsbadet ), can be reached in less than 10 minutes. One of Stockholms largest parks , Tantolunden, is also just 8 minutes walk away, and you will be accompanied by small boats and amazing views long the way.
transit: Public transportation that access the entire city, subway, and airport busses are no more than 2 - 8 minutes walking distance. You also have bike rentals just 10 meters from the entrance, visible from the bedroom balcony. Looking forward to welcoming you to my beautiful city of Stockholm. Peter
access: Free washing facilities in the basement. Free storage room for bikes.
interaction: You can reach me through Airbnb, mail and (Hidden by Airbnb) .
house_rules: * NEVER let luggage or clothes used when travelling get anywhere near the bed - bedbugs are not allowed as guests. * Be quiet and respectful to neighbours * NO shoes inside, floors scratch easily . * NO SMOKING - not inside, not on the balconies. Avoid using strong perfumes or scents that might stay after you have left.
host_about:
Welcome to a real home and authentic AirBnB experience which I make available when I travel. I have been living in Stockholm all my life and here in Hornstull, Södermalm for more than 20 years, still enjoying and appreciating all what it has to offer.

I also love travel and photography, composing music and being in nature. Previous career in computer technology. Currently I am studying medicine. Since I'm both a host and guest, I strive to combine these experiences to deliver what I would expect myself.

Thank you for considering my listing and hope to be welcoming you to Stockholm. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

name: Cosy apartment at Kungsholmen
summary: Very central location, a nice neighborhood and most of all, a cosy apartment with all the facilities you need.
space: Cosy apartment situated at the central area Kungsholmen in Stockholm. Five minutes walk from the subway station Fridhemsplan, from where you reach the Central station within 10min.  The apartment has a separate bedroom with a 120cm bed, a nice kitchen and a bathroom with a shower. You will borrow bedclothes and towels and included in the price is also cleaning after departure.
description: Very central location, a nice neighborhood and most of all, a cosy apartment with all the facilities you need. Cosy apartment situated at the central area Kungsholmen in Stockholm. Five minutes walk from the subway station Fridhemsplan, from where you reach the Central station within 10min.  The apartment has a separate bedroom with a 120cm bed, a nice kitchen and a bathroom with a shower. You will borrow bedclothes and towels and included in the price is also cleaning after departure. The apartment is perfect for a weekend exploring the capital of Sweden. The area offers many nice restaurants and cafés and if you would like to eat at home, there are several super markets to choose between in the area. Within walking distance you also reach both the nice areas of Vasastan, Södermalm and Gamla Stan.  If you like walking or running, I recommend you to take a trip around the island of Kungsholm. Stockholm is actually built on many small islands, where Kungsholmen is one of them. Walking (
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfect for a weekend exploring the capital of Sweden. The area offers many nice restaurants and cafés and if you would like to eat at home, there are several super markets to choose between in the area. Within walking distance you also reach both the nice areas of Vasastan, Södermalm and Gamla Stan.  If you like walking or running, I recommend you to take a trip around the island of Kungsholm. Stockholm is actually built on many small islands, where Kungsholmen is one of them. Walking (or running) along the waterfront around Kungsholmen is about 9km and the walk path is really nice.
transit: Five minutes walk from the subway station Fridhemsplan, from where you reach the Central station within 10min. Walking from my apartment to the Central Station takes about 25min.  If you fly to Arlanda Airport you can either take the bus (Flygbussarna) which stops at Sankt Eriksplan or you take the train (Pendeltåget) and get off at Karlberg Station, both stops is about 10min walk from the apartment.
host_about: Född och uppvuxen i Falun, mitt i Dalarna c:a 2,5h norr om Stockholm. Numera sambo i Frösunda, Solna. Dessförinnan bodde jag i en 1,5:a vid Fridhemsplan som jag även hyrde ut ett antal gånger via AirBnB.

name: Spacious apartment, great location.
summary: Welcome to our beautiful and spacious 1 bedroom apartment right in the middle of Stockholms most happening area: Hornstull. Full size kitchen, cozy bedroom with balcony, large living room, and newly renovated bathroom are all yours to enjoy. Located minutes from Subway, buss and plenty of restaurants, bars, and cafes.
space: The bedroom contains a king size bed and has balcony access that faces an inner court so it is nice and quiet.  The living room has dinner seating for up to 7 people and a large couch with room for two extra people to sleep in (upon request). Large tv with surround sound and music via airplay. The full size kitchen has a small table for two, all appliances, including dishwasher.
description: Welcome to our beautiful and spacious 1 bedroom apartment right in the middle of Stockholms most happening area: Hornstull. Full size kitchen, cozy bedroom with balcony, large living room, and newly renovated bathroom are all yours to enjoy. Located minutes from Subway, buss and plenty of restaurants, bars, and cafes. The bedroom contains a king size bed and has balcony access that faces an inner court so it is nice and quiet.  The living room has dinner seating for up to 7 people and a large couch with room for two extra people to sleep in (upon request). Large tv with surround sound and music via airplay. The full size kitchen has a small table for two, all appliances, including dishwasher. Guests have access to bedroom wardrobe and drawers. All bedding, and towels. Kitchen (website hidden) and stereo. When quests are booked we will try to be around at first to hand over keys and show you around, after that we will most likely be away. If we are unavailable we will have someone nearb
neighborhood_overview: Hornstull has quickly grown to be one of Stockholms trendiest areas. Since the massive rebuilding of Hornstull Square, the area has become a hotspot with hip upscale restaurants and excellent bars, alongside cheap streetstyle eats and cofeeshops. We highly recommend Linje Tio on Hornsbruksgatan for great food and fantastic drinks, and the Pizza's at Enzo's (Hornhuset, top floor of mall building) are outstanding. The hornstull mall has pretty much everything you need if you'd rather buy your own food and drinks. A couple of blocks south, By Hornstulls Strand, you will find great Cafe's, more bars and Debaser. This nightclub offers nightly Dj gigs and live concerts from national and international artists. Next to it is excellent mexican food at Calexico. If you're here in the summer you are only a few minutes walk away from Långholmen which is a beautiful island/park where you can picnic, go for a swim and enjoy the sunshine in the grass!
transit: There are bus stops and a subway station just outside the door that connect to all areas. If you need a parking spot we have one nearby. Jus let us know beforehand if you need it.
access: Guests have access to bedroom wardrobe and drawers. All bedding, and towels. Kitchen (website hidden) and stereo.
interaction: When quests are booked we will try to be around at first to hand over keys and show you around, after that we will most likely be away. If we are unavailable we will have someone nearby help you if need be.
house_rules: No smoking insdie and no pets please. Smoking is ok on the balcony. Party with respect,  please don't disturb our neighbours.

name: Quiet room nearby nature and town
summary: Herzlich willkommen im wunderschönen Stockholm! Ich habe eine Menge Tips und Informationen für einen gelungenen Urlaub. Kann Euch individuell ein Programm zusammenstellen damit ihr so viel wie möglich erleben könnt. Mein Haus und der Garten mit den beiden Hühnern sind umweltfreundlich, ruhig und erholsam. Der Mälarsee und das Naturschutzgebiet ist in 10 min zu Fuss zu erreichen und lädt zum baden und relaxen ein. Die U-bahn in der Nähe  15 min im Stadtzentrum. Eigener Fahrradverleih.
space: Newly renovated, private room upstairs in the townhouse inviting for a relaxing holiday in wonderful Stockholm. The room contains two  beds  (one singel and a dubbel), wardrobe, desk with drawers, drawers and bookcase. We share the bathroom, shower room, 2 toilets and kitchen. Of course you are also welcome down to the living room to socialize or watch TV (satellite dish with among other all german programs). There are 2 bikes you can borrow and you may use the washing machine and dryer ( for a small fee ) Free linen and towels. Free WIFI and internet access. Free breakfast until 09.00 . Of course i have plenty of maps, books and other information materials over museums and current events around the whole town and can provide information on local attractions. In 20 minutes the subway takes you to Central Station. The local center, with several grocery stores, post office, hairdressers, medical center, pharmacy, swimming bath, library, restaurants and a super nice pizzeria reached on fo

notes: Eftersom jag har två rum att hyra ut kan det ibland finnas andra gäster samtidigt i huset.

host_about:
Hello, i´m happy to welcome you to beautiful Stockholm.
Ulrike (primary teacher)  loves
travelling, cooking, riding the bicycle, gardening and swimming.
I´m originally from Munich/Germany and moved to Stockholm 30 years ago.
I love meeting new people from all over the world.

space: Newly renoved villa in nice and quiet area near Stockholm city centre.  Easy access to Stockholm airport Arlanda by airport train (20 min to central Stockholm) and metro (15 min). To get to central Stockholm, you can take the metro, which normally leaves every 10 minute and take 15 minutes. 5 km and 10 minute metro ride to Globen and Tele2 arena.

neighborhood_overview: Tallkrogen was built during the 1930's to 1950's by the original owners. Tallkrogen is a protected area with its small cottages and lush gardens. Here you get easy access to central Stockholm and the airport and still get to experience the lazy everyday life of Stockholm residents.
notes: Please note the guidebook here on AirBnB, where you can find some inside tips to the southern area of Stockholm. The house is keyless for extra simple access and security for our guests Villa Forss was built by a family father in 1944 and he and his wife brought up their five children in the house. We moved into the house in 2002 and have been remodeling and expanding the house since that year.
transit: Metro within 5 minutes walk and 15 minute ride to central town. Stockholm Arlanda less than an hour away with just one simple switch of trains in central Stockholm. For the hiker, it's about 9 km to central Stockholm, where you can also rent bikes with simple day passes. The lot has one parking space and parking on the street is free. In the guidebook, you'll find the transportation options

name: Cosy place near nature and town ecofriendly
summary: Best place to discover Stockholm from. Easy to get downtown by metro and with beautiful nature and lake Mälaren around the corner. Back from a busy day you get a good night sleep in a cosy bed in a quiet surrounding. And a really fast internet! There will be another airbnb room to rent beside yours, so there could be another guest. The house is big enough for all don´t worry. From the metro station you have to climb about 30 highmeters. If you need help with the luggage just ask please.
space: My house is situated i a very quiet and absolutly safe area. It´s very spacious and it has a lovely garden where i have 4 hens where two of them lay eggs every day;-).

name: Cozy 1 room Aparment. Södermalm
summary: Mitt i Södermalms hjärta., ett stenkast från Skanstull / Nytorget är den här lägenheten perfekt för ett par eller 3 vänner som besöker Stockholm. En minuts promenad till härliga nytorget, 50 meter till tunnelbanan. Ljus lägenhet med separat kök.
space: På Söder, ett stenkast från Skanstull / Nytorget är den här lägenheten perfekt för ett par eller 3 vänner som besöker Stockholm. En minuts promenad ned till vattnet,  nära promenadstråk och båtar. Härliga Nytorget med många restauranger, caféer, barer och ett par klubbar. 5 minuter från Vita bergen, 10 minuters promenad till Medborgarplatsen.  Lägenheten är rymlig med ett fullt utrustat separat kök som bjuder in till matlagning. Det är en ljus, rymlig lägenhet med många fönster och glasdörrar, och är nyligen renoverad. Naturligtvis finns också wifi, massor av kaffe, och en lummig innegård. Tunnelbanan är 2 minuter bort (därifrån 6 minuter till T-Centralen och 4 min till Slussen) med busstationen runt knuten. Runt hörnet finns en närbutik, en pizzeria, och några av Stockholms trevligaste caféer.

neighborhood_overview: En minuts promenad ned till vattnet,  nära promenadstråk och båtar. Härliga Nytorget med många restauranger, caféer, barer och ett par klubbar. 5 minuter från Vita bergen, 10 minuters promenad till Medborgarplatsen.  Finns möjlighet att ta båt tvärs över viken till Hammarbysjöstad och Nacka.
notes: En taxi till flygplatsen ska aldrig kosta mer än max 600 (60€) från City. Taxi är inte reglerat i Sverige, och många oetablerade chaufförer kör bilar som är lika de kommersiella bolagens. Åk Inte i dessa bilar. De tar ut extrema överpriser.
transit: Knappa 50 meter till närmsta tunnelbanestation, Skanstull. Flera busstationer i anslutning till lägenheten som tar dig till olika delar av Stockholm. Även pendeltåg finns på gångavstånd.  SMSa gärna mig för övriga frågor.
access: WiFi, fina högtalare med möjlighet att koppla in laptop eller telefon. Lummig innergård, lokaltrafik, närhet till parker, city, restauranger och caféer. Tvättstuga kan eventuellt ordnas vid god framförhållning.
interaction: Så mycket / lite som önskas.
house_rules: Please respect the property, it is my home and I love it. And I hope you will too =) Send me and email if your interested to stay at my place and we can work around dates etc. I do charge a cleaning fee, so you don't have to wash the floors and bedding etc. But I do expect to find the place in the same condition as when you arrived, tidy. The deposit fee is for any damage and loss of keys.
host_about:
Arbetar med musik efter två års studier i norra Sverige.
Bor och arbetar i Stockholm.

Jag tycker mycket om att resa, och har bott på soffor över hela europa via couchsurf*ng tidigare.

name: Cozy apt on Södermalm near nature
summary: The apartment is modern spacious 3 room apartment with 1 bathroom and kitchen newly renovated 2015 with a fantastic view located near all the hip bars and restaurants on the south side.
space: The apartment is spacious and has a modern and scandinavian interior, it was remodeled 2015, It has an open floorplan so the kitchen area and the livingroom creates a nice social area. From the balcony you can enjoy our quiet inner yard with a fantastic view over the colony gardens. There is also an inner yard with playground for kids accessable on the same floor as the apartment.  There are two bedrooms. Bedrooms 1 has a kingsize bed, 160 cm. Bedrooms 2 has a single bed 105 cm with extra mattresses in that easily can be converted into an extra bed on the floor. The living room has a couch also very comfortable to sleep in.  My bathroom has a nice hottub. Washer and tumble dryer are located next door and can be pre-booked. There are almost always possibilities to wash your clothes.  I also have Netflixm HBO and a high speed wi-fi internet for rainier days :) Hopefully you will enjoy my home and take good care of it.

The living room has a couch also very comfortable to sleep in.  My bathroom has a nice hottub. Washer and tumble dryer are located next door and can be pre-booked. There are almost always possibilities to wash your clothes.  I also have Netflixm
neighborhood_overview: Södermalm was ranked as the "coolest" neighbourhood in Europe in Vogue magazine earlier this year. Parts of Södermalm is like a small town in the countryside, with small, old wooden houses. There are also some crowded streets like Götgatan and Hornsgatan with restaurants, coffee places and shops. A hipster revolution has turned this once working-class neighborhood, into a hot-spot for artists, musicians, hip designers, bohemian cafés, edgy shops, and funky restaurants. This area is also home to some of the most diverse and sought after addresses in all of Stockholm, from the Art Nouveau apartments on Mariatorget to centuries-old cottages stacked on the cliffs above the sea on Mälarstrand and Fjällgatan.
transit: Memorise the word “Tunnelbana” - which is Stockholm’s subway system - because it is the best and most efficient way of getting aroundtown. Marked with large blue “T” signs, Stockholm’s Tunnelbana (T-bana) network and its impressive cave artwork is also the world’s longest art exhibition at 110 km long.  You will find a T-bana just 5 minutes from the apartment. There are also several buses nearby. Pedestrians rule in Stockholm and the city is also bike-friendly with over 760km of bike paths.
access: You will have the entire apartment to yourself and also access to washing machine and tumble dryer area. There are 2 entrences to the building, one from the gardens and then you take the elevator to the 2nd floor or from the inner yard which is on the ground floor.
interaction: We will be available for any questions you might have and to help you feel comfortable and at home away from home.
house_rules: I expect you to take care of my home as if it was your own and leave it as you found it. Be kind and respectful to my wonderful neighbors. No smoking pets or parties. Smoking is only allowed on the balcony.
host_about: I´m a 37 year old journalist working mostly as tv-producer. I love to travell and meet new people around the world. Other interests are yoga, horsebackriding and long walks in the forrest or on the beach.

name: One room apartment at Södermalm!
summary: One room apartment with a separated bedroom and kitchen recommended for maximum two persons. The neighborhood is quiet but close bars and restaurants.
space: The apartment is small but the 40 square meters in area is well distributed. The big room is a combined living room and bedroom with a 140 cm bed and and a sofa. From the living room you ll reach the sunny balcony. The kitchen is small but well-equiped for cooking.  The bathroom is small. There is a shower cabin and no bath tub as it would not fit the size of a bathroom. The apartment has wifi.  The neighbourhood is quiet even though there is alot af bars and restaurants to choose among. Regarding public transport youll find bus 2 outside my door and the closest metro station, Medborgarplatsen is located 10 min by foot. In 30 minutes its possible to walk to the city central.

name: Cozy apt in center with balcony
summary: Three room apt with two bedrooms, a bright bathroom, balcony and a spacious living room and kitchen. Lots of restaurants/bars in the neighborhood, bus 2 minutes away or 15 walk into central Stockholm.
space: There is a hallway, two bedrooms, one bath room, a spacious combined living room and kitchen and a balcony. The size is 59 square meters plus balcony.
description: Three room apt with two bedrooms, a bright bathroom, balcony and a spacious living room and kitchen. Lots of restaurants/bars in the neighborhood, bus 2 minutes away or 15 walk into central Stockholm. There is a hallway, two bedrooms, one bath room, a spacious combined living room and kitchen and a balcony. The size is 59 square meters plus balcony. The kitchen is fully equipped and also includes a toaster, a microwave oven and Nespresso coffee machine. In the bathroom there is a combined washing machine and tumbler drier. There are several shops, bars, cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood. The park Hagaparken is just 5 minutes away and great for long walks or running. Many different busses are just 2 minutes away. Two different metro lines is available within 10 minutes, Tekniska Högskolan (red line), Odenplan (green line) or Rådmansgatan (green line). 15 minutes walk into Stureplan.

The apartment is located close to the subway, shops and cozy cafes, located in a safe and culturally area only 10 min to the city center. A child-friendly home on the ground floor. A Modern apartment with fully equipped kitchen, new bathroom with a small tub and shower and heated floors. Two bedrooms and a living room with two working fireplaces. The flat is 75 kvm. neighborhood_overview: Friendly small-town feel but close to downtown. Charming selection of cafes, restaurants, boutiques, shops nearby. Family friendly, trendy, vivid, parks for picnics and playgrounds for children.  Perfect if you drive a car, you can park outside the door - but the last year you have to pay around 10 skr per hour between 8-19. During winter, it is nice to go sledding on the small hill that is outside the window.
notes: Just 15-20 min walk to beautiful Vinterviken as in summer offer you swimming and rocks in Lake Mälaren in winter you can go skating or walking on the ice with lots of other strollers.
transit: Two minute walk to the Metro Red Line which will take you to Södermalm in a few minutes and city center in 10 minutes. There are also buses that take you to town or around the southern suburbs. It is close to Stockholm International Fairs. Free parking is available outside on the street.

space: 96 square metres 2 flights of stairs up makes an apartment with air and light, perfect for hanging out, cooking, eating, watching tv and listening to music. description: Big and beautiful apartment at Kungsholmen, Fredhäll. Quiet neighborhood with spectacular sea view only a few minutes by subway from city centre, great shopping and night life. Suited for 2-4 people. Cosy dinners at home or at the local restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Wonderful scenic walks next to the sea, calm and relaxing environment. 5 minute walk to the subway or the bus, that brings you to the city centre within 10 minutes.  Parks, playgrounds, cozy bakeries, cafes just next to the building.
transit: A 5 minutes walk to either subway or bus,  parking in the streets around the house. If you come from the Arlanda airport it's easiest to go to the central station by bus or train and switch to the subway.
access: Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, big tv, fast internet. There's a washing machine, and you may book the washing room in the house for tumble-drying etc.
house_rules: No pets please, due to allergy.  No parties,  and the rules of the entire house are to keep quiet between 10 pm until 10 am. * No outdoor shoes inside  * Lock the door when leaving the flat and when going to bed  * Please leave the flat in the same condition as when you arrived  * No smoking in the flat or on the balcony  And have fun!
host_about: I live in Sweden with my girlfriend and my little son of nine months. I work as a licensed psychologist, and in my sparetime I like to go bikeriding. Looking forward to my parental leave, it will be great!

The Livingroom, bathroom, Kitchen and balcony. You can contact me or my boyfriend at any time. Just 2 min to lovely Årstaviken with a nice view of the water and Södermalm on the other side. At Årsta torg (5 min walk) you also find some restaurants and a food store. 3 min to the bus station Vättersvägen or the bus station Årstaskolan and with bus to Gullmarsplan metro station or Årstaberg commuter train station it takes 5 min. name: bright apartment with view.
summary: Under sommaren när terassdörren står öppen blir inomhus ett med utomhus. Klipptomten med allt som växer fritt och odlat skapar en oas alldeles nära staden. Högt beläget med öppen himmel och fantastisk utsikt. Välkommen att ta av örter och bär.
space: Our 4-room apartment of 110 sqm located on the ground floor with direct access to the natural site. (terasse, grass and rocks) The house is situated high in a landscaped area with a magnificent view over Stockholm. The apartment is bright and open with spacious kitchen and living room as the central part. In addition, three separate bedrooms, bathroom with washing machine and an extra toilet.
description: Our 4-room apartment of 110 sqm located on the ground floor with direct access to the natural site. (terasse, grass and rocks) The house is situated high in a landscaped area with a magnificent view over Stockholm. The apartment is bright and open with spacious kitchen and living room as the central part. In addition, three separate bedrooms, bathroom with washing machine and an extra toilet. You have access to everything in the kitchen, such as a dishwasher. The bathroom has a washing machine. The apartment has wi-fi. Of course, even TV and stereo. Bed linen and towels are available. Utility room with two washing machines, dryers and even a sauna in the neighboring house. These are booked separately. On our patio you are welcome to use our barbecue.  The area is beautifully surrounded by a small wooded area. The residential area consists of both low apartment buildings and townhouses. It is a quiet area, you could say a green oasis. 5 minute walk to the commuter train that takes you t
neighborhood_overview: The area is beautifully surrounded by a small wooded area. The residential area consists of both low apartment buildings and townhouses. It is a quiet area, you could say a green oasis.
notes: In the home there are two nice cats to be taken care of. They're used to being alone and do just fine themselves a couple of days.
transit: 5 minute walk to the commuter train that takes you to downtown and Central Station in approximately 5 minutes. Bus and tram / metro within easy reach.
access: You have access to everything in the kitchen, such as a dishwasher. The bathroom has a washing machine. The apartment has wi-fi. Of course, even TV and stereo. Bed linen and towels are available. Utility room with two washing machines, dryers and even a sauna in the neighboring house. These are booked separately. On our patio you are welcome to use our barbecue.
house_rules: Take care of our home as you would take care of your own. It is close to the terrace, then you want to smoke do it outside.
host_about: We are a couple with two lovely daughters. My wife is from Denmark. We both work as photographers. My wife loves taking care of our little cliff-garden outside our apartment. I really like to travel, especially to different cities around the world. I like to take care of our apartment and we booth like to make it nice and cosy. We like to offer our home to traveling people and to make them feel at home. It is important that our visitors feel free and can relax in their vacation. If there is any problem what so ever our aim is to solve it as quickly as possible.

host_about:
I am a mother of three, retired since 6 years. Have 4 grandchildren who I see very often. My husband is also now retired and we love to do a lot of things together. In the summer we use to play golf, do long biking tours, paddle out with our canots and just enjoy the nature. In wintertime we love to go skiing or skateing. I enjoy to sing and I'm part of a choir in Stockholm.  I love living in the central part of Stockholm and I am lucky to have a summerhouse not far from here. Here in Stockholm it is so much to do, cinemas, theatre, museum. I have lots of friends close to me that also are retired. 
I enjoy very much beeing host, to meet people from all over the world and make it comfortable for them.

name: Lovely loft apartment
summary: Welcome to our lovely apartment in Midsommarkransen, a calm, trendy and family friendly area, just 5-10 minutes on the subway from the inner city of Stockholm.
space: Spacious 5 room apartment, 128 square meters, can accommodate up to 5 (6) people. 4 normal beds and 1 fold out sofa for 2 people.  The apartment is situated in a charmingly renovated old factory building from the early 1900s. It has a great view over Stockholm and the living room has a very high ceiling (over 4 meters) and a big loft with an extra room.  The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a large dinner table that can easily fit six people. It also has 2 toilets and one bathtub with shower.
description: Welcome to our lovely apartment in Midsommarkransen, a calm, trendy and family friendly area, just 5-10 minutes on the subway from the inner city of Stockholm. Spacious 5 room apartment, 128 square meters, can accommodate up to 5 (6) people. 4 normal beds and 1 fold out sofa for 2 people.  The apartment is situated in a charmingly renovated old factory building from the early 1900s. It has a great view over Stockholm and the living room has a very high ceiling (over 4 meters) and a big loft with an extra room.  The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a large dinner table that can easily fit six people. It also has 2 toilets and one bathtub with shower. During your stay you will also have access to: - fresh towels - Dish washer  - Big fridge and freezer - microwave - Coffee maker - Water cooker - Washing machine - Super fast free WIFI - Swedish cable TV - XBOX 360 with Kinect - PS 4 Contact us through Airbnb. If we are not able to welcome you in person to Stockholm, we will arra
neighborhood_overview: Calm and family friendly yet trendy area with nice parks, a few really charming shops, pubs and several good local restaurants. Within a minute from the apartment you can get Sushi, Indian, nice hamburgers, Swedish traditional cuisine, Thai and Pizza.
notes: Feel free to use our olive oil, herbs, salt etc. We also make sure there are tablets for the dishwasher.
transit: Located between the Midsommarkransen and Telefonplan subway stations. Getting to the inner city of Stockholm is a quick 10 minutes ride on the subway. If you arrive by car you can park for free on the surronding streets.
access: During your stay you will also have access to: - fresh towels - Dish washer  - Big fridge and freezer - microwave - Coffee maker - Water cooker - Washing machine - Super fast free WIFI - Swedish cable TV - XBOX 360 with Kinect - PS 4

host_location: Stockholm, Stockholm County, Kingdom of Sweden
host_about: Me and my family live in Stockholm, Sweden. I am a sociologist working within the field of criminality. My husband Mirek works as an interaction designer. Our kids are Polly who is 15 and Tage, 12 years old. We like to hang with friends and people in our lovely neighbourhood. Other interests are music and watching good movies and tv-series. We also enjoy sports, mostly by watching others even though we like skiing ourselves. Another big joy is travelling. In 2012 we tried airbnb for the first time when travelling to Chicago to get to know the city and to watch a few ice hockey games. Since then we have used airbnb in several places  - all with great experience!

summary: This lovely, spacious three-room apartment with an open view is perfectly located on trendy Södermalm:  only a few minutes away from bustling restaurant and shopping areas (e.g. SOFO, Hornstull, Mariatorget) and Åsta Bay, Södermalm's best promenade.  Well connected with public transport. station with direct commuter train to Arlanda airport only 5 min away.  Ideal for 2 couples or a family with small children. Fully equipped: Washing-machine, dishwasher, wireless internet, TV with Netflix...
space: This freshly renovated three-room flat has lots of natural light and a great view. (6th floor) on Södermalm, close to Skanstull, 2 minutes away from Årsta bay, a green promenade along the water perfect for a scenic stroll or running.  The kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster etc.  Spacious and light living room with balcony, dining table for 6 people, 3 people sofa, smart TV with Netflix and HBO accounts, wireless sound system.  The big bedroom has a French balcony and a comfortable double bed. The smaller bedroom has a 120cm bed that two people can sleep in, a desk and a baby bed. The bathroom is newly renovated. Feature a regular and raining shower and a washing machine.

name: Stockholm house close to fair/town
summary: cool retro villa close to town situated quiet and private   suitable for large groups close to Stockholm International Fairs
space: 60s recidence close to fair/town Welcome to an unique residence in Stockholm/Enskede which combines 60s interior design with functionality, comfort and access to nature. The spacious house has a large well equipped kitchen, 6 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, the Penthouse with separate bath and pentry, a porch and a terrace. The large property has a designed garden and space for numerous cars.  The house was built during the 50s/60s by wealthy engineer Lars Berkle who, having a passion for interior design and technical solutions, did not spare any effort to craft every detail of ”Villa Berkle”. As the second owner of the property I have maintained this tradition fascinated by the retro style and choice of materials. The special atmosphere of Villa Berkle has been used for numerous commercial shoots as well as the swedish motion picture Stockholm East(check "Stockholm East" on IMBb)      Even though the property is situated in a quiet part of Stockholm with forest right out the backdoor you will

name: Fantastic apt in rebuilt factory
summary: Great location with seaview in Hammarby Sjöstad close to both Södermalm, Stockholms city and nature.  Newly built apartment in old factory-building with a high ceiling (330 cm), sea view from all windows and a balcony.
space: A modern flat in an old house with character which used to be a factory.  Two bedrooms with king size beds, one bathroom, kitchen, living room and balcony. The apartment was built in 2010 with Scandinavian design and exclusive materials.
description: Great location with seaview in Hammarby Sjöstad close to both Södermalm, Stockholms city and nature.  Newly built apartment in old factory-building with a high ceiling (330 cm), sea view from all windows and a balcony. A modern flat in an old house with character which used to be a factory.  Two bedrooms with king size beds, one bathroom, kitchen, living room and balcony. The apartment was built in 2010 with Scandinavian design and exclusive materials. Två sovrum, det ena med dubbelsäng, det andra med dubbelsäng i loft. Ett badrum med dusch samt tvättmaskin och torktumlare. Kök och vardagsrum i öppen planlösning med köksö, exklusiva materialval och vitvaror (mikro, diskmaskin, två kylar mm) samt I will happily answer any questions about the apartment, about the area Hammarby Sjöstad and Stockholm in general. Hammarby Sjöstad is a newly built area in central Stockholm with great ambitions of being an environmentally friendly and cozy quarter for people living there as well as for visito
neighborhood_overview: Hammarby Sjöstad is a newly built area in central Stockholm with great ambitions of being an environmentally friendly and cozy quarter for people living there as well as for visitors. You can find walking paths at jetties along the seaside. It is also very close to nature with i.e. a downhill skiing facility in walking distance.  In the quarter you find several restaurants, cafés, supermarkets, post office, pharmacies, the Swedish wine- and liquor store "Systembolaget" etc.
notes: Stockholm is a fantastic city to be a tourist in. Here you find something for everyone; culture, sports, nature, water, night life, restaurants, shopping etc. But above all it is an old city founded in 1252 and very well preserved.
transit: You can use both ferry, tram and bus in order to go to other parts of the city. One ferry take you from the dock just outside the door to popular Djurgården and the heart of Stockholms City, in about 30 min. Södermalm is on the other side of the water, you can walk, take the ferry or bus there in 10-20 min. You can park at the streets in the area, it will cost you15 SEK/hour mon-fri 9 am to 5 pm, the rest of the time is free. From Arlanda airport you can take the bus or fast train to the Central Station and from there either take a taxi or subway and tram to Hammarby Sjöstad, station; Luma. Alternatively a taxi from Arlanda to Hammarby Sjöstad cost about 600 SEK, choose a well known company and decide on the price before you go.
access: Två sovrum, det ena med dubbelsäng, det andra med dubbelsäng i loft. Ett badrum med dusch samt tvättmaskin och torktumlare. Kök och vardagsrum i öppen planlösning med köksö, exklusiva materialval och vitvaror (mikro, diskmaskin, två kylar mm) samt
interaction: I will happily answer any questions about the apartment, about the area Hammarby Sjöstad and Stockholm in general.
house_rules: No parties. No loud music after 10 pm since this is a building with several apartments. Common sense in general. No pets. No smoking inside the apartment.
host_about: Hej! Magnus heter jag och bor för det mesta i Stockholm med min fru Linnea och vår dotter Ronja, drygt 2 år. Vi är en aktiv familj som älskar träning, båt och skärgårdsliv. Vi har en tillflyktsort, ett landställe som man säger i Stockholm. Då vi inte alltid är här hyr vi ibland ut vårt nybyggda attefallshus och gäststuga. Vi ser vattnet från huset och har egen brygga med bastu vid vattnet. Välkommen!

name: Trendy, cosy Stockholm: near to all
summary: LONGER STAYS THAN 1 MONTHS ARE WELCOMED. In the heart of Södermalm, squeezed between SOFO and Hornstull, with plenty of nice areas. Also ridiculously easy to travel to all main stations such as: Arlanda/Stockholm Airport, Stockholm Fair, Stockholm City.
space: In the heart of Södermalm, squeezed between SOFO and Hornstull, with plenty of nice areas, it is also amazingly EASY to travel to all main stations such as: Arlanda/Stockholm Airport, Stockholm Fair/ÄLVSJÖ, Stockholm City, etc.  Enjoy central Stockholm at charming Mariatorget, in the very midst of Södermalm! Close to everything! Direct communications to the Arlanda airport and the Stockholm Fair.  A charmingly mixed, open minded, boheme chic and safe neighborhood - a perfect base to experience Stockholm, either for work or pleasure.  LOCATION Situated in the heart of Stockholm, Södermalm, which is one of Stockholms city centers.  Within walking and biking distance to museums, great restaurants, trendy and creative shopping areas and boutiques. Famous traditional tourist attractions all within 15- 25 minutes walking distance: like the Old town, the Royal Castle, Slussen, Djurgården

neighborhood_overview: Supergreat area. Near to nearly everything in the city.
notes: Longer stays are also welcome. NOTE: *Longer stays than 3 months – I will give you ar really good price. So let's talk. Shorter then 3 monhts and longer then 1 month — lets discuss. Price varies during summer and winter season.

access: Full access to kitchen and bathroom and hallway area.  Your room is the master bedroom. I am residing in the living room.
interaction: We share bathroom and kitchen. Since I work from home I often sit in the kitchen working.
house_rules: Note: Only listed guests in the room/apartement.  Please don't leave lamps or electricity burning when going out or leaving a room. Close window when leaving the apartment.  Avoid talking in the stairs. And keep the tone down after 10 pm.  Clean after leaving. Unmake the bed and place the laundry in the laundry bin. Vacuum clean the floor. Recycle garbage.  Leave the room as it looked when you arrived: that is as as nice as possible. Thank you! Between 10 pm till 7 am it must be fairly quite. Also always keep the voice down to a very moderate tone in the apartment hall way/entrance area. In Sweden we take off our shoes in the hallway in private homes. Place the shoes in the hallway, in the apartment.  Do not wear outdoor shoes on your bedroom mat. For your own comfort during winter time - bring your indoor slippers.
host_about:
I am in my mid-forties and work as a pedagogue and learning consultant in the field of interactivity and eLearning. Since I am my own boss I enjoy the luxury of working from other places. During those occasions I sometimes let my home. 

I enjoy yoga, healthy organic RAW food, art, folk music and jazz. :-)

Places i highly recommend in the nearest area is the restaurant Pappa Ray Ray, the Bistro Sud and the coffee shop Johan & Nyström, all at Swedenborgsgatan. There you also find several smaller, nice shops with clothes and organic foods. At St Paulsgatan you must stop for a coffee at "Kaffe" (as did Daniel Craig/Mikael Blomkvist in the Millenium movie "The Girl Who Played with Fire"). You must also see the pottery of Mikaela Willers (Website hidden by Airbnb) At Mariatorget there is also the cosy Abba Hotel Rival, (Website hidden by Airbnb) where you can have a coffe or drink. But most of all, you shouldn´t miss the spectacular view of Stockholm from the Mariaberget (The Maria mountain) at Monteliusvägen: (Website hidden by Airbnb)

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the outskirt of Stockholm inner city. The area is very calm with 300 meters to a beach area where you can take a morning swim or for a run around Kungsholmen( 9,6 km). There is a good foodstore 2 minutes from our house.
notes: Stockholm is at its best during this time of the year and if you have good weather our apartment is just a pearl by the sea.
transit: You can take the bus downtown very close to our house. It is bus nr 1 or 62. Or, if you walk downtown, you walk along the seaside almost the whole way and this will give you a very nice view of Stockholm nicest areas. Along the seasidewalk to downtown Stockholm you will find some really nice restaurant and bars.

summary: Welcome :) A very warm,cozy & trendy apartment in the heart of Stockholm with beautiful trees outside window. The apartment is top modern with everything including WiFi and Balcony. 10min walk to Stureplan in the trendy heart of Vasastan near parks!
space: My apartment is cozy and warm. It has a large comfy sofa. It's right in the middle of trendy "Vasastan" - the part of Stockholm which many people find very nice with lots of restaurants, pubs, green areas and very close to the city centre. You can either walk there in about 10 minutes or there are close by buses and 2 subway stations. (Odenplan & Rådmansgatan)  If you will be traveling by air you will arrive at the T-central station which is close by to the apartment. It will take you 5-10 min walk from T-central to the apartment and you also have busses just outside.

The kitchen have everything you need to cook a nice dinner, and there are room for 6 people around the table. the kitchen sofa is a favourite spot, I recommend sitting at the table watching people go by, very relaxing and inspiring.

name: Bright spacious room with a view
summary: Spacious room (18 m2) in functionalist apt, with large window overlooking beautiful green area, just beside Skinnarviksparken in small street with grand villas. Big bed (160). 5 minutes to metro in Hornstull + Zinkensdamm, 4 stops from city center.
space: Spacious and light room (18 m2) in three room apt (115 m2) from 1930 with large windows overlooking green area, water and city, just beside park (Skinnarviksparken) in small, calm street with marvellous looking villas and three old manors. Own wc, shared bathroom with bathtub/shower. 5 minutes to commercial streets and metro in two directions: Hornstull with many restaurants, pubs and big shopping mall; Zinkensdamm with Hornsgatan, a big commercial street. 4 stops or 30 min walking distance from T-centralen/Stockholm city central. 5 - 10 min (walking distance) from wonderful walks at the island Långholmen and the huge park by the water, Tantolunden. 2 guests/ weekends; 1 guest/ long term stay.

name: Charming flat in central Stockholm
summary: Located on a quiet street in Stockholm city, you find this top-modern and equipped apartment for up to  4 people. With a 5-10 minute walk you reach all that the inner city has to offer. If you prefer going further, the subway is just 150 yards away.
space: Living room with a gorgeous corner sofa, which easily become a sofa bed for two. Handy kitchen with all that you need. Newly renovated toilet and another king size bed will hopefully make your stay enjoyable.
description: Located on a quiet street in Stockholm city, you find this top-modern and equipped apartment for up to  4 people. With a 5-10 minute walk you reach all that the inner city has to offer. If you prefer going further, the subway is just 150 yards away.  Living room with a gorgeous corner sofa, which easily become a sofa bed for two. Handy kitchen with all that you need. Newly renovated toilet and another king size bed will hopefully make your stay enjoyable. Except the fact that the whole flat is at your disposal, you have free access to the 48" flat screen TV and wi-fi, of course! If you need any help or advice, I'm never more than a phone call away:) With close proximity to all that downtown has to offer, it's hard to feel uncomfortable in Vasastan. The district offers cozy neighborhoods and restaurants and also a lot of nice parks within walking distance. From the apartment you have about 150 yards to Rådmansgatans subway station. From there you reach all of Stockholm within 20 minutes
neighborhood_overview: With close proximity to all that downtown has to offer, it's hard to feel uncomfortable in Vasastan. The district offers cozy neighborhoods and restaurants and also a lot of nice parks within walking distance.
notes: Bed sheets and towels are provided as well as a hairdryer. There is a custom fitted mattress to the bed sofa for maximum comfort. You will find all the necessary info such as passwords etc. in a handwritten manual in the apartment. For those who want to be active, I can recommend:  - A walk in the Haga Park  - A bike ride around Kungsholmen  - A swim at Hornsbergs Strand  - A walk to Djurgården and visit the Gröna Lund, Rosendal and Museums In the apartment I have collected a bunch of brochures and maps so you can easily navigate among the attractions. No pets and smoking allowed inside the apartment. It is also prohibited to invite others for parties and similar activities. This is due to allergy and safety reasons.
transit: From the apartment you have about 150 yards to Rådmansgatans subway station. From there you reach all of Stockholm within 20 minutes. If you prefer to stay in the city, you have almost everything within walking distance. How about the following time table:  - 15 min to Central Station  - 8 min to Kungsträdgården - 7 min to Stureplan - 5 min to Odenplan - 1 min to grocery stores (open 7 am to 11 pm) - 1 min to Rådmansgatans subway station  Staying at my place, you will be able to explore Stockholm from the inside.
access: Except the fact that the whole flat is at your disposal, you have free access to the 48" flat screen TV and wi-fi, of course!
interaction: If you need any help or advice, I'm never more than a phone call away:)
house_rules: No pets and smoking allowed inside the apartment. It is also prohibited to invite others for parties and similar activities. This is due to safety reasons.
host_about: I'm a second year bachelor student at Stockholm School of Economics. With loads of experience from traveling as a backpacker as well as a professional golfer, I know the importance of a nice place for recovering. If you need any help or advice, I'm never more than a phone call away. I'll make sure you'll enjoy your stay! Welcome:)

In the very city centre of Stockholm, the most beautiful city in Scandinavia, in the most exciting part and rather sophisticated
neighborhood_overview: In the very city centre of Stockholm, the most beautiful city in Scandinavia, in the most exciting part and rather sophisticated area of the city, you will have a chance to experience culture, shopping, wonderful dining, recreation. Around the corner you can find subway and buses as well as grocery stores, restaurants, night clubs, movie theater, clothing stores, dry cleaner and just about anything. In 5 min walking distance you can access the Royal National City Park; the Haga Park, with lovely walking and running tracks, picnic areas etc.Here you can also go for a swim or just watch the busy boat life. Stockholm is a perfect city to explore on the bicycle. The area is fairly quiet but still close to the most busiest part where many of the hip night clubs and the high street fashion are. The Old Town, the Royal Castle, the Opera house and much more are within walking distance or can easily be reached by bus or underground.  Take a short bus ride (10mins) or walk (20 mins) and you will
notes: Sheets and towels will be provided. Baby crib can be arranged upon request. Master bedroom has a queen size bed, 160 cm. In the second "bed room" the bed sofa measures 140 cm, 2 people can sleep.

summary: Cosy & charming studio with terrace & all facilities! The terrace is a great recreation place & you can use the fireplace during winter just to relax. Really close to old town and just 2 min walk from Mariatorget. Centralstation is 7min with subway.
space: Cosy and charming studio with terrace, during summer the terrace is a fantastic recreation place.  Really close to old town and just 2 minutes walk from Mariatorget. Subway Mariatorget and Slussen very close. 3 stops from Stockholm central station 7minutes ride. Cosy room with tv-set and blue ray dvd-from where you can also connect your phone/computer to listen to your own music. Chillout area and nice bed for two persons-can be arranged down or up. Kitchen is equipped with a water boiler, coffee machine, gas stove, microwave/electrical oven, dish washer and and washing machine-so you can have a comfy stay.  For those who want to train, you can either run in the surroundings or attend to SAGA training facilities just across the Park, open daily from (phone number hidden). neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right next to "Mariatorget" on Södermalm, in the central of Stockholm. The famous hotel Rival ( partly owned by the ABBA-member Benny Andersson) is also located at Mariatorget which is a beautiful square/park to relax in..  Södermalm is a wonderful area if you like artsy cafés, vintage shopping, good restaurants, cool clubs or nice bars. At Montelius vägen ( Montelius road) a wonderful view over Stockholm and the cityhall-is just two minutes away. It only takes a few minutes to walk to Götgatsbacken and Sofo (Södermalms main shopping area for contemporary clothing).  Locations like the Old Town, the Royal Palace and City Hall as well as the Moderna Museet are all just a 10-15 minute walk away.
notes: Oftnen there some beer and wine waiting for u, notice that in Sweden you cant buy alcohol saturday after 15.00 and sunday.

name: Designflat in heart of Sodermalm
summary: Live quietly in the midst of the trendiest part of Stockholm, Hornstull Strand. This newly renovated designflat, in a house built 1930, has a secluded balcony drenched in sunshine until noon.  Close to subway, buses, parks and city swims the area is bustling with hip cafes, boutiques and restaurants.
space: The flat is located high in the corner of the house, overlooking a school. On the undisturbed balcony you can enjoy your breakfast in the sun and get a good view of the quit streets surrounding the area.  Although the quit atmosphere there are only minutes to trendy bars, cafés, restaurants och shops in one of Stockholms most hip spots.  A few minutes away is newly opened Hornshuset, a four floor restaurant with a roofterrace. And a few minutes walk at the other direction will get you to popular city swims and parks.  Within a few hundred meters are public subway or  buses and the center of Stockholm is in walking/cycling distance.

name: Room in cosy apartment - super central location
summary: Perfect for solo travellers. Welcome to stay in my apartment in central Stockholm situated at the top of one of the main shopping streets, yet in a cosy area with lots of cafés and restaurants outside. Walking distance to the Central Station and most parts of Stockholm. A bohemian and clean home. You'll have a small but cosy bedroom with a big comfortable double bed and you'll share the rest of the apartment with me. I usually stay in a smaller bedroom next to the kitchen when I have guests.
space: There's a small equipped kitchen, a big dining table and a nice sofa area. The bedroom has a comfortable double bed.  Walking distance to most places of interest, and has some great restaurants and cafés in the area such as Rolfs kök, il caffe and Tranan to name a few.  Walking distance from the Central Station, the airport coach and airport train Arlanda Express (10 mins walk), closest metro stations are Rådmansgatan, Hötorget and T-Centralen.

Walking distance from the Central Station and Arlanda Express (10 mins), closest metro stations a re Rådmansgatan and Hötorget.
notes: It’s a 65 sqm apartment. I’m staying in a smaller room next to the kitchen, but might be spending a night or a few nights away depending on the period (hiking, at the country house or at a friend’s place)...
interaction: I'm working during the days, and I'm often out and about in the evening and weekends, sometimes also away for a day or two. I'm happy to share tips on where to go, and you might want to join for a concert or art exhibit if that's something you're interested in!
house_rules: No parties and no smoking. And no shoes in the apartment (Swedish style!).
