name: Renovated room in retro apartment near Stockholm
summary: Welcome to our retro apartment 15 min south of central Stockholm. Here you have easy access to the whole city at the same time as you live in a green and calm area. Closest subway station is "Stureby", a short walk from the apartment. Access to gym, sauna (needs to be booked in advance) and  parking spot. The 70 square meter big apartment has 3 rooms and you have access to all common spaces. We are a social couple who can help you with trip recommendations and any questions you may have.

space: The apartment is located in the middle of the city of Stockholm. It's realy close to anything. The room is spacious and the bed is big, 210cm x 240cm! It's well equipated with evreything you may need. I'm sure you gonna like it!

name: Great location in Södermalm!
summary: Light, spacious 1 BR apartment in the middle of Södermalm. Fully equipped and close to everything.
space: Tack vare de stora fönstren och att lägenheten ligger på 5e våning blir det ett stort ljusinsläpp. Här bor man riktigt bekvämt som mindre familj eller resesällskap.
description: Light, spacious 1 BR apartment in the middle of Södermalm. Fully equipped and close to everything. Tack vare de stora fönstren och att lägenheten ligger på 5e våning blir det ett stort ljusinsläpp. Här bor man riktigt bekvämt som mindre familj eller resesällskap. Lägenheten består av ett sovrum, ett vardagsrum, en matsal, kök samt badrum. Sovrummet har en dubbelsäng och garderober (spjälsäng finns att tillgå på begäran). Vardagsrummet har en stor soffa (6 pers), ett skrivbord, väggmonterad platt-TV med utbud från Canal Digital, Playstation3 (DVD+BluRay), stereo med CD-spelare samt SONOS musikanläggning vilket gör att du kan styra musiken med din smartphone och Spotify. Köket är välutrustat och stort med mycket arbetsyta, och med ett litet matbord för 3-4 pers. I matsalen finns plats för ca 6 pers. Badrummet består av badkar med duschdraperi, toalett och handfat. Allt är i mycket fräscht skick. Om så önskas finns även tillgång till skötbord samt leksaker. Vi finns alltid tillgängiga via
neighborhood_overview: Här finns närheten till allt - 3 stora mataffärer (ICA, Hemköp och Paradiset), det mysiga bageriet Petrus (Sveriges Bästa 2016), härliga restaurangen Delikatessen, samt mängder av bra restauranger och barer. En kort promenad tar er till den grönskande Tantolunden med badplatser, idylliska kolonistugor och fina promenadstråk längs Årstaviken.
transit: Ett kvarter bort ligger Mariatorgets tunnelbana (2 min promenad) och i samma kvarter går bla buss 4, 66 och 74. På fem minuter till fots når man Södra Station (pendeltåg) samt fler bussförbindelser, och 15 minuters promenad tar dig till Gamla Stan.
access: Lägenheten består av ett sovrum, ett vardagsrum, en matsal, kök samt badrum. Sovrummet har en dubbelsäng och garderober (spjälsäng finns att tillgå på begäran). Vardagsrummet har en stor soffa (6 pers), ett skrivbord, väggmonterad platt-TV med utbud från Canal Digital, Playstation3 (DVD+BluRay), stereo med CD-spelare samt SONOS musikanläggning vilket gör att du kan styra musiken med din smartphone och Spotify. Köket är välutrustat och stort med mycket arbetsyta, och med ett litet matbord för 3-4 pers. I matsalen finns plats för ca 6 pers. Badrummet består av badkar med duschdraperi, toalett och handfat. Allt är i mycket fräscht skick. Om så önskas finns även tillgång till skötbord samt leksaker.
interaction: Vi finns alltid tillgängiga via telefon och email, och finns även i området men inte i samma byggnad.
house_rules: Please feel like this is a home away from home for you! This also implies that you would treat our home the same way that you want others to treat yours.

name: Exclusive city center apartment!
summary: You can not live more central in Stockholm than this! This is a different designed apartment in the city center with 11 m panorama window facing the back of the Dramatic Theater by the water. Outside the door you have lots of restaurants and high fashion street and also lots of museums and sightseeing.
space: Just feel like home
description: You can not live more central in Stockholm than this! This is a different designed apartment in the city center with 11 m panorama window facing the back of the Dramatic Theater by the water. Outside the door you have lots of restaurants and high fashion street and also lots of museums and sightseeing. Just feel like home You will be provided my guest room, with a single bed facing the quiet backyard. You have full access to the living room, TV, music, kitchen and bathroom. I have my own outdoor backyard accessible for the guest for the morning coffee etc. I will always be accessible on email during your stay and you will be provided with numbers in case of emergency You live just by the water of Nybroplan and Standvägen with boattransportations, buses and tram. Right in the middle of the shopping district Walkable to most museums and attractions Close to fantastic restaurants and cafés. Shopping is around the corner with the big brands and malls. Humlegården is a big park with a big p
neighborhood_overview: You live just by the water of Nybroplan and Standvägen with boattransportations, buses and tram. Right in the middle of the shopping district Walkable to most museums and attractions Close to fantastic restaurants and cafés. Shopping is around the corner with the big brands and malls. Humlegården is a big park with a big playground for kids and bbq on weekends. French bakery in the building around the corner for your fresh breakfast Grocery stores and the big food hall  less than 5 min walk to Östermalmstorg.
notes: You will get sheets towels and there is also shampoo, shower cream, hair dryer etc. Free coffee and the. Also take what you need with spices if you cook You must be aware it is a city home, and it can be a bit noisy nighttime.  Summertime in Sweden is very light and the sun don't go down at all, I have window blinds but bring eye blinds if you struggle sleeping with sun light.
transit: Outside the Theater you can catch the bus, tram or boat, the stop calls Nybroplan. 5 min walk to Metro Östermalmstorg or Kungsträdgården. Tram outside to Djurgården, Skansen, Wasa etc (5min ride or walk by the water) Take a boat to one of the island for a lunch. I can suggest Fjäderholmarna, nice for all ages. You can rent bikes nearby to explore the city and the islands. From Airport to apartment - Express-train 20 min to central station then walk 15 min or take a taxi (100 sek) Bus 45 min to central station (115 sek) - Taxi all the way 35-45 min (550 sek) Parking can be difficult in the city center, try to avoid renting car, you have bus, tram and boat outside the door, 5 min to Metro and 15 walk to central station. If you bring car, I will try to locate a garage
access: You will be provided my guest room, with a single bed facing the quiet backyard. You have full access to the living room, TV, music, kitchen and bathroom. I have my own outdoor backyard accessible for the guest for the morning coffee etc.
interaction: I will always be accessible on email during your stay and you will be provided with numbers in case of emergency
house_rules: No smoking inside, smoking is allowed on my backyard No partys No animals You are free to use whatever in the fridge and also coffee, the, spices etc. Please Tidy up after yourself, cleaning is included in the price. NO shoes inside I love my home, please respect it and all the private items If you break anything its no problem, but please replace it or tell me My plants would be very happy to get some water  sometimes
host_about:
Welcome to my home!
I live here with my 16 year old son. I work as an Event koordinator and travel a lot, thats why its so convenient to rent out a room  to people who want to live like a local and also live more central than any hotel. 

I am very active within flying balloon, skydiving and adventure sport, both as work and pleasure.

I love to rent out my apartment to lovely people and get to know them a little. 
Its very special living in the city center were you have close to everything, it’s lively and a bit noisy. 
My apartment it is an historic place, it use to be the wig factory for the national Theatre. I hope you will enjoy it

name: Charming house 7 min from the Metro
summary: House is in the middle of a classified, piecefull and charming park. You are in the middle of the green but also just by the metro.  The perfect family place to discover Stockholm and enjoy
space: This house is park of this classified park. It is very quiet (no cars allowed), peacefull and charming. The house belong to a residence and it is very well maintained. There are two floors in the house with one small bedroon and a large bathroom downstairs. Upstairs you will find three bedrooms, WC & shower. We have space for 5 persons (all adult beds) and we can also provide you a baby bed if needed. if you need we can also provide mattrasses to add a seventh guest. The terrace is so convinient to chill out under the trees or to enjoy lunches and dinners. The garden give directly in the park (huge green space) The great thing is to live in the green but not being far away from public transportation: 7 min walk to the metro and then 20 min to be in the center of Stockholm.

Feel yourself at home. We
neighborhood_overview: The house is around 7 min walk to the metro. At the metro, you will find around 40 shops (grocery, post, pharmacy,...). There is a delicious bakery 5 min away (Fru Maria Bak), one of the best restaurant in Sweden (Långbro Vårdshus) in the park (fantastic brunches and nice evening terrace). If it is warm, have a walk (15 min) to Långsjö and bath in the lake (see picture).
notes: Je suis francais si vous préfèrez communiquer en francais
transit: By Metro, take the red line until Fruängen, then take the road towards the left until Langbro Park. Cross the park along the lake, pass the huge building (school) and the house is the first one at the corner. By car, take the highway E4 until Fruängen/Älvsjö. There is a parking place (number 12) just behind the house included in the price.
access: Feel yourself at home. We have kids DVD (mostly in Nordic languages or French), Wii, wireless. As we like cooking, you will find many cooking items and appliances. If you feel like watering the flours, we will be extremely gratefull for it.
interaction: If we don't give you the keys ourselves, we have plenty of friends/neighboors who will support you if you have any question. We have a booklet with our suggestion of places in Stockholm (places to visit, restaurants,...) at your disposition. An additional fee will be added for cleaning the house (around 950 SEK)
house_rules: The house belong to a residence, so all the neighboors live their normal lives in their houses. It is expected to not make noise inside (beside normal) or in the garden late in the evening. If a neigboor complains about the noise late in the evening, a fee of 75 euros will be charged from the deposit, being Airbnb the ultimate judge in the question. We don't want to rent the house to host parties as the residence will not tolarate late noise. Please respect this house as if it was your house.
host_about: I'm French, my wife is Swedish and we live in Älvsjö/Stockholm with our two children. We like the lifestyle in Stockholm and the many opportunities that this city offers you. We like cooking (grilling on the terrace!) and travelling.

name: A clean room with everything you need!
summary: A cosy room in my modern bright apartment. Your bedroom comes with a comfy brand new 120 cm bed and big wardrobe. Of course wifi as well. Acess to the kitchen area, balcony, bathroom with bathtub and shower, perfect after a shopping day. Buses and metro in a just a 5 min walking distance. Nightlife, theaters and events just a few metro stations away.
space: You will stay in a private bedrum (15 kvm) perfect spacy, clean room for 1 guest, only girls. The room comes with a 120 cm comfortable, brand new bed. Also, you have a big office desk and a office chair in the room. The room also have a big wardrobe as well, perfect if you for example staying a longer stay. OBS! ONLY GIRLS!
description: A cosy room in my modern bright apartment. Your bedroom comes with a comfy brand new 120 cm bed and big wardrobe. Of course wifi as well. Acess to the kitchen area, balcony, bathroom with bathtub and shower, perfect after a shopping day. Buses and metro in a just a 5 min walking distance. Nightlife, theaters and events just a few metro stations away. You will stay in a private bedrum (15 kvm) perfect spacy, clean room for 1 guest, only girls. The room comes with a 120 cm comfortable, brand new bed. Also, you have a big office desk and a office chair in the room. The room also have a big wardrobe as well, perfect if you for example staying a longer stay. OBS! ONLY GIRLS! Access to the whole apartment, (60 kvm) shared with me. You will have your private room with a door to close. I will use the living room as my private room. Shared design kitchen with a table for 4 persons, big bathroom, white bathtub :) Big sunny balcony ;) Washing machine and dryer located at the first floor,  And, i
neighborhood_overview: Very safe, central and popular area in Stockholm. Close to everything, but yet quiet. Gullmarsplan tubestation is a "meetingpoint" where all the buses and metros goes and take u wherever you want. Also, hipp södermalm "sofo"  is just a tubstation away from here! In that area, i can really recommend the cosy and different coffieplace called "Gilda". In there you can have a seat in the comfy couthes and take a break, sipping your favourite coffy or just relax for a while. I can also recommend the panncakes café, also located in the "sofo" area. Without to much troubble, you can also walk to the city from here or maybe go by bike ? You can easy rent a citybike for a day, a perfect way to explore Sthlm :) The location has everyting you need in a close distance.  Also u can go swimming, so dont forget you swimsuit!  A big outside pool is very close to here. Cheers Maria
notes: You will get an extra key the first thing we do when you arrive. Dont loose it!  :)
transit: Just a few minutes walking (5-6 minutes) to metro station GULLMARSPLAN, From there,  its only one stop (2 minutes) to Södermalm who haves everything, and a few stop (7 min to central station). Very easy to understand the public transportes. I can meet you outside where the busses are stopping, nr 160 to Årstaberg and you will go of at "sköntorpsvägen" one stop from gullmarsplan. Dont hesitate to contact me for futher questions.
access: Access to the whole apartment, (60 kvm) shared with me. You will have your private room with a door to close. I will use the living room as my private room. Shared design kitchen with a table for 4 persons, big bathroom, white bathtub :) Big sunny balcony ;) Washing machine and dryer located at the first floor,  And, i also have a kitten, a small Birma kitten who loves to hang around and say hey to new people :)
interaction: You can do pretty much everything in the flat, just keep it quiet during nights:)  At weekends i like to relax but also to do nice things.  I will be home a lot, working, and i am availibly if you want to ask something, anything. I can give tips about sightseeing, museums, restaurangs and so on ;) Yep, thats pretty much it! Cheers Maria
house_rules: Quit around 23.00 on weekdays, not so strikt at weekends but no party late at night in the flat. No smoking inside, but on the balcony for those who want :) No pets allowed. I´m easygoing and friendly and expect u to be the same :)
host_about:
OBS! Only girls!!!! 

Hi there! I am a  relaxed and friendly girl who live and works in one of the top most wanted area in Stockholm! Its very central, but not noisy- the opposite in fact ! just one stop with Metro to the inner inner puls and popular Södermalm area ” 6 min to city central station with tube- on spot without enoying changes with the Metro. Get, its a very Safe and quiet area, surrounding by nature and water all around! A very green area with trees and Grass one step outside and surrounding the flat! 

Love to travel and explore new cities and cultures. Interested in people in general and think you get so much back from open up my home for a longer period of time. Get to know people from all around the world, learning new and growth- together I also like food and am interested in healthy natural ways of improving your well being with food and supplements :) 

Hope to give my guest a warm welcome to Stockholm, and i am positive to (try to) answer any question the guest may have about tips about Sthlm, top ten must see and so on.. 
yet- i totally understand and welcome the guest to be as privat as they want to! 
Minimum stay here Will be 14 days this summer! Oh- what a summer! you Will be able to stay a couple of month If you wanna and then you Will get a big discount of course! 

I also have a small kitten! She is adorable! She just staying in my room and kitchen, no acess to your bedroom (If u dont want :)  

Its very  easy to find the way to my flat. Take the Flygbuss from arlanda to Sthlm city. From there, take the metro towards högdalen or hagsätra. Gump of at Gullmarsplan, from there u can easy walk to the flat in 7 min! Or, for you convinience, take the bus nr 160, one stop  and voila, you are there! 
i will be waiting for you at home at your arrival, just send me a buzz or text me and i will let you in!

Please dont hesitat to ask me futher questions!  Untill then!

OBS!! ONLY GIRLS! 

Cheers! / Maria

name: central studio appartment
summary: Cosy studio appartment in the coolest area in Stockholm.
space: Small and cozy studio appartment of 35 square meters in Mariatorget. 2nd floor with lift. Central area of Södermalm and close to other areas such as Slussen, Zinkensdamm and Hornstull which all offer a wide selection of restaurants, bars, small shops,  second hand shops, clubs- there is something for everyone here. The area also has 2 parks; Tanto and Skinnarviksparken. And one of the greatest views in town at monteliusvägen (50 meters from the appartment). Walking distance to metro station and inner city buses. 2 metro stations away from The Royal Castle and the Old City. Banks, pharmacies, supermarkets all around the corner. The appartment has a kitchenette with all utensils, oven, hob, refrigerator, boiler etc. Shower and toilette with towels. combined bedroom/livingroom.  Sofa/bed of 130 cm wide 210 cm long  2 wardrobes.  Facilities include: Plasma tv with 12 channels. host_about:
Hello I am a 38 year old guy from Stockholm.
I love traveling and i am a citylover.
I am often abroad and therefore i rent out my place quite often.
I have a small apartment in Södermalm (the coolest and most populated area of Stockholms neighbourghoods)
Im very easy gooing, broad minded and have a passion for food, wine and nature.
I speak swedish english and spanish.

name: Stylish 63 sqm in Röda Bergen/Vasastan
summary: Two room apartment (63m2) in beautiful house. Apartment at the top with light inlet from two directions. The building is a cultural heritage house from 1925. The house is located in the district of Röda Bergen, which is like a small village in the middle of Vasastaden. The neighborhood is quiet and extremely charming, the houses are colorful and the streets almost look like a movie scene.
space: The apartment (63m2) has a kitchen that is fully equipped and room for a small dinner table. Dishwasher and washing machine in the kitchen. Large and spacious bedroom, the bed is 180 cm. In the living room there is a larger dinner table and also a sofa set and TV. The apartment is kept together by a spacious hall. Modern bathroom with shower and heated towel rail. Sonos soundsystem in three rooms, which helps you play your favourite music in all rooms simultanously. Please make sure to check out my ratings at two earlier ads. I rented my earlier apartment at Södermalm serveras times and with highest possible ratings. Also, I used to rent my summer house at Airbnb, also with high ratings.
description: Two room apartment (63m2) in beautiful house. Apartment at the top with light inlet from two directions. The building is a cultural heritage house from 1925. The house is located in the district of Röda Bergen, which is like a small village in the middle of Vasastaden. The neighborhood is quiet and extremely charming, the houses are colorful and the streets almost look like a movie scene. The apartment (63m2) has a kitchen that is fully equipped and room for a small dinner table. Dishwasher and washing machine in the kitchen. Large and spacious bedroom, the bed is 180 cm. In the living room there is a larger dinner table and also a sofa set and TV. The apartment is kept together by a spacious hall. Modern bathroom with shower and heated towel rail. Sonos soundsystem in three rooms, which helps you play your favourite music in all rooms simultanously. Please make sure to check out my ratings at two earlier ads. I rented my earlier apartment at Södermalm serveras times and with highest p
neighborhood_overview: Genuine neighborhood with a distinct character. All the houses are from the 1920s and are in the same architectural style. The neighborhood is known for its designed entrance doors. Plenty of restaurants and cafes nearby, not least around St Eriksplan which is also the closest subway. It takes 3 minutes to walk to the subway. Instagram: #rödabergen #rörstrandsgatan #hagaparken
notes: We ONLY rent to quiet guests. Completely forbidden with parties, loud music or smoking. We expect the guests to be calm and respectful to the neighbors.
transit: Subway very close, St Eriksplan station is just a few minutes walk away. Large number of buses that run Torsgatan, the main street through the Röda Bergen district. Also close to the Odenplan shuttle station, about 7 minutes walk from the apartment. This commuter train is smart to use from the airport Arlanda. Otherwise, the airport buses stop very close, so it is easy to get to and from the airport Arlanda. It is also easy to park on the streets in the neighborhood.
access: Full access to everything in the apartment, including special place for storage.
interaction: We will probably be away but are always available by phone, text message or email. Always respond quickly and instantly.
house_rules: NO parties or late nights.  We expect calm and respectful guests.
host_about: My name is Erik and I live my girlfriend Hedda in this great apartment in Vasastan, Stockholm.

name: Apt at the best location in charming Vasastan
summary: We want to wish you very welcome to our apt that sleeps 2 adults and 1 baby in the charming district Vasastan close to many popular restaurants and pubs and the popular city park Vasaparken and scenic Hagaparken.  The apt is located in a quiet building from the beginning of the 1900s with many period features including high ceilings, a fire place and wooden floors throughout the apt. The apt is nevertheless modern and fully equipped and has a lovely balcony facing south.
space: Welcome to our charming apt located in a building from the beginning of the 1900s. We are currently renovating the apt so as from the middle of June, the wooden floors in all rooms except the kitchen will be white which will make the apt brighter. The apt 62 Sq meters and has one bedroom, one living room, kitchen one WC and one bathroom. The bedroom sleeps 2 adults and 1 baby. It is also possible to sleep another person in the confy couch in the living room. In addition to the balcony facing south, guests will also have access to a beautiful backyard. If needed, guests can also get access to washing machine and a drying room in the basement of the building. Vasastan is one of the most popular districts in Stockholm and known for its charm and pleasantness. Vasastan is also home for many cozy boutiques as well as traditional and newly opened restaurants, including Tennstopet, Tranan, Wasahof, Lilla Ego, Sushi Sho, Minh Mat, Flippin' Burgers etc. Vasastan is located only a 15 minutes wal

transit: The apt is located a 2 minutes walk from the subways green line, station Odenplan. Parking is available on the street outside the apt. During weekends, parking on the street are free.
access: In addition to the apt, guests will have access to a beautiful backyard and, if needed, to washing machines and a drying room in the basement of the building.
interaction: Do not hesitate to call me, should you have any questions about the apt, the area, good restaurants, Stockholm etc.
house_rules: Pets are not allowed due to allergies. Smoking is not permitted indoors or at the balcony (smoking is though permitted on the backyard). Pay respect to our neighbours! Please keep the noise to a minimum during your stay. It is not permitted to play music after 10 o'clock in the evening. Be careful with our floors! It is not permitted to wear shoes indoors. Please be careful with our apt and the furniture- it is our home.
host_about: Reliable, thoughtful and cleanly female who loves travelling! Married to Klas who also loves travelling. Mother of lovely little baby Agnes.

name: Centrally located one bedroom apartment
summary: Centrally located apartment by Karlaplan. Calm city area with subway and bus stops, cafés, shops, bars, restaurants and beautiful Djurgården (Skansen etc) just around the corner as well as many sightseeing spots, banks, 7-Eleven, several grocery stores and boutiques.
space: Apartment fits two sharing one bed (180 cm) and has a fully equipped kitchen if you do grow tired of the many restaurants in the neighborhood or the rest of Stockholm.  High speed wi-fi internet is included. Welcome to Stockholm
description: Centrally located apartment by Karlaplan. Calm city area with subway and bus stops, cafés, shops, bars, restaurants and beautiful Djurgården (Skansen etc) just around the corner as well as many sightseeing spots, banks, 7-Eleven, several grocery stores and boutiques. Apartment fits two sharing one bed (180 cm) and has a fully equipped kitchen if you do grow tired of the many restaurants in the neighborhood or the rest of Stockholm.  High speed wi-fi internet is included. Welcome to Stockholm I provide comforters and pillows as well as bed linens, bath towels and towels. I will be the one to hand you the keys upon checking in and retrieving them upon checking out. I will not be seen but available on the phone and also just a block away if my assistance would be needed. If I am away on a work trip I will make sure someone else within a block away takes care of the things I would have done during your stay.  Just north of the bustling city centre, Gärdet/Östermalm is a relaxed neighbourho
neighborhood_overview: Just north of the bustling city centre, Gärdet/Östermalm is a relaxed neighbourhood with a healthy smattering of great restaurants, cafés, bars, galleries and shops. Experience the Swedish “fika” tradition at one of the many excellent cafés, and grab your dose of green at Tessinparken. The apartment is also very close to green areas as well as at an ideal central location for enjoying city life as well as sightseeing. Walking distance to Stureplan, The Vasa Museum, the zoo Skansen, Grona Lund amusement Park, The Abba Museum, The Nordic Museum, boat tours to the archipelago and much more.
notes: Check-in is after 5 PM and check-out before 1 PM. The hours are set as a standard. However, if you have needs regarding other hours I will do what I can to accommodate them.
transit: Getting to and from my place is as easy as blueberry pie. Either take the subway (tunnelbana) to Karlaplan, or hop on one of the many buses that pass through Valhallavägen, such as routes 1 or 4. The area is also very biker-friendly, with bike lanes running up and down all major streets. Bikes to rent are available in the block. If you have an address to go to and do not wish to walk, the site (Website hidden by Airbnb) is the best way to find out how to get to the places you want to go by bus, train or subway.
access: I provide comforters and pillows as well as bed linens, bath towels and towels.
interaction: I will be the one to hand you the keys upon checking in and retrieving them upon checking out. I will not be seen but available on the phone and also just a block away if my assistance would be needed. If I am away on a work trip I will make sure someone else within a block away takes care of the things I would have done during your stay.
house_rules: -Strictly no parties! -Pets are allowed but not in furniture. It would ruin my white couch:-(.  -No smoking in the apartment -Keep the volume on a level appropriate considering others in the complex. -The apartment is expected to be in the same condition checking out as it was when checking in. -I will clear out shelves in the fridge and freezer for you to use, but also feel free to use spices and such you find in the cabinets and fridge. -I have chosen not to ask for a deposit in order not to take more than necessary from your vacation budget, even if temporary. I do however want you to have your passport ready to show me upon checking in.
host_about:
I am originally from the very Northern parts of Sweden but have lived in Stockholm for nearly six years now. I am in my forties and my children are grown up and have left the nest. 

For a living, I am in organizational development at the Swedish Migration Board. I have a few trips coming up and am offering my home during that time. At the moment I have only made the days I know I will be away available, but I can probably accommodate guests other dates as well if special requests are made.

I am service minded and my guests are always very well taken care of. My home is my fortress and I take good care of it. I am extremely well organized and like things neat and tidy. Personality wise, I am very balanced, friendly, tolerant and easy to deal with regardless of the issue. 

I CANNOT live without my calendar... my iPhone... my Airbook... I am like most people today. Totally lost without them.

What my interests are and how I spend my time is nowhere near constant over time (I guess that is why it suits me so well working with change). At the present time I spend a lot of time socializing as well as relaxing and enjoying the city. I love the selection of restaurants, theaters, exhibits and so on in Stockholm. When it comes to eating. I love food and everything that enhances the experience of eating! Preparing it, eating it, getting the setting around the eating just right, finding the perfect place. Although I am the first to want to taste anything that is new the Italian cuisine is on top of my list, regardless of whether I am dining out or cooking myself. 

I enjoy long walks at Djurgarden as well as short walks in crowds streets with stops for eating, drinking and shopping. I also love traveling and NY is a city I love while the Caribbean offers the blue waters, white beaches and relaxation mode I also love. I love summer time boat trips in the archipelago. Sailing.... love that too but not on top of it just yet:-).

Nothing endures but change :-)

name: Spacious four room appartment
summary: This 80 M2 3 bedroom appt. with 3,50 to ceiling, on a calm street, 15 min from the city with metro and 5 min walk to beaches, is a great place to spend time in. Works for at least 5 people. 3 bedrooms, open kitchen/ living room and a big balcony.
space: The appartment's high ceiling and open spaces really makes this a super place to stay and hang out in. The house is a former school rebuilt to studio appartments, with only 2 floors, which makes the appartments very unique. We are on the 2nd floor.  The balcony is big and cozy.  You can easily fit 5 people comfortably but depending on your travel party, if there are couples, children etc, we can fit more. There is one double bed in my bedroom, one 120 CM bed in my sons bedroom, one 90 CM loft in a guestroom and a comfy sofa in the living room.  There is floors heating, washing machine and bath tub in the bathroom.
description: This 80 M2 3 bedroom appt. with 3,50 to ceiling, on a calm street, 15 min from the city with metro and 5 min walk to beaches, is a great place to spend time in. You can easily fit 5 people comfortably but depending on your travel party, if there are couples, children etc, we can fit more. There is one double bed in my bedroom, one 120 CM bed in my sons bedroom, one 90 CM loft in a guestroom and a comfy sofa in the living room.  There is floors heating, washing machine and bath tub in the bathroom.  There is beddings for all beds and space in one of the closets for your clothes. I buy breakfast for your first day. The washing m
neighborhood_overview: I have stayed in several suburbs in Stockholm but Bredäng is definately my favourite. It has a small centre with 3 good supermarkets, pharmacy, library,  gym, florist and flea market among other stores. There is lots of park areas,  playgrounds and one of the best things is that it just takes a 5 minute walk to the BEACH Mälarhöjdsbadet that is surrounded by the Nature Reserve Sätraskogen. The historic café Lyran with a view over Mälaren is just 2 minutes away This street is very unique for Stockholm. Cars are only allowed if you live here and the pedestrians go first! So only creep speed which makes this perfect for children.
transit: It takes 2-3 minutes to walk to the metro and then 15 minutes to the city centre with the red line.
access: There is beddings for all beds and space in one of the closets for your clothes. I buy breakfast for your first day. The washing machine is yours to use. There is a free parking space.
interaction: I usually rent out my appartment when I am travelling, which I do alot in my work. So during your stay you are alone in the appartment. If I am not here when you arrive I have a friend that helps me with keys. I use my email in my work all the time so I am quick with answering.
house_rules: I do not allow parties and loud music in my appartment (on a decent level is of course OK). There is alot of families with small children living in the area. I want you to take care of the appartment as if it was your own. I do not allow smoking in the appartment but on the balcony is fine.  I am allergic to cat and dog furs so please do not bring pets.
host_about: Vi är ett par som bor i lägenheten tillsammans med vår 2 1/2 åriga son. Vi arbetar inom musik och nöjesindustrin. Vi älskar att resa och tycker Air BnB är ett perfekt forum för att göra det möjligt för resande människor över hela världen.

Vardagsrummet har en stor skön soffa, TV och dvd. Köket är fullt utrustat med spis, kyl, frys och diskmaskin. Badrummet har toalett, dusch, badkar och tvättmaskin. neighborhood_overview: Lägenheten ligger i trendiga Sofo på Södermalm i Stockholm. Den ligger mitt i området nära intressanta restauranger och spännande butiker. I princip behöver du inte lämna kvarteren för att se mycket av samtida Stockholm.  På bara några meters avstånd ligger restauranger och caféer som Urban Deli, Il Caffe, Stikki Nikki, Pom & Flora, Nytorget 6, Pelikan, Café Nizza, Nook, Punk Royale, Greasy Spoon, Shanti Gossip, Bananas, Lilys Burger, Meatballs, Kvarnen och många mer.  Butiker i närheten är Nudie Jeans, Acne, Swedish Hasbeens, Marimekko, Pärlans konfektyr, Lisa Larssons second hand, Grandpa, APT Atelier, Aesop, Stuttenheim, Jumperfabriken, Mini Rodini, Sneakersnstuff och många fler.  Några minuters promenad finns Fotografiska och många gallerier. Det är lätt att nå resten av Stockholm med bussar eller tunnelbana. T ex går buss 76 ett kvarter från lägenheten till Djurgårdsbron där du bara har en kort promenad till Vasamuseet, Skansen, Abba-museet, Nordiska museet och Gröna Lund. För att
notes: Lägenheten ligger på sjätte våningen. Huset har hiss.
transit: Lägenheten ligger nära bussförbindelser. Några kvarter bort finns tunnelbanans gröna linje. Det går att parkera på gatan även om det kan innebära lite letning efter p-platser.
access: Gästerna har tillgång till ca 70 m2 inklusive fullt utrustat kök. Badrum med badkar, dusch och tvättmaskin. Vardagsrum med TV och DVD. Lägenheten har WiFi.
interaction: De tillfällen vi hyr ut är när vi är bortresta från stan vilket innebär att vi inte är på plats.
house_rules: Rökning och husdjur är inte tillåtna. Det är heller inte tillåtet med hög musik eller liknande som stör våra trevliga grannar.
host_about: Vi är en tvåbarnsfamilj som bor mitt i Sofo, Södermalm. Vissa ledigheter reser vi bort, oftast till vårt fritidshus. Då passar vi på att hyra ut vår lägenhet.

name: Spacious studio apartment + balcony
summary: Comfortable and welcoming apartment for two, equipped with everything you need. Located in a green and calm area about 15-20 minutes south of Stockholms central city life.
space: UPDATE: Since the photos where taken some furniture has been moved around. All furniture are still included except the TV.  Welcome to my one room apartment in Bandhagen! It has a fully equipped kitchen and plenty off surfaces to prepare your cooking on.  In the living room you find a two-person bed, a couch, TV and stereo. 100 mbit/s WiFi is included.  With no neighbors above you can enjoy the open balcony with table and chairs and its summer sunshine from morning to night.  No need to bring towels or bed linnen, fresh ones are included. Shampoo is also available.  The apartment is located on top of a hill, 5-6 minutes walking distance from the subway station. Next to the station you will find a nice little supermarket, a sushi bar and a pizza place (though I would really recommend the one just around the corner by the apartment). While passing by the Globe (Globen), going through the cityparts Södermalm and Gamla Stan, the subway takes you to Stockholm Central Station in 18 minutes.

host_about:
A positive and relaxed guy, born and raised in Stockholm. At the moment om only renting out my apartment occasionally. When I do I look forward to meet other travelers from around the globe and to provide with a home worth the price for your stay here in Stockholm. If you have any questions concerning the apartment I'm happily willing to help. 

I've only had positive experiences with AirBnB. When I travel I will make sure to take as good care of your home as if it were my own.

Johannes

space: A central situated apartment in popular Södermalm (SoFO) here you will be close to everything in Stockholm.  Communication is excellent, buses and subway are just a minute from the entrance. name: Bed & Coffe/Tea  (20sqm) Dalagatan  Stockholm
summary: Jag Kerstin, är före detta dansare, driver fortfarande en dansstudio, min man jobbar på Moderna Museet. Fastigheten är byggd 1890, och ligger i en lugn del av Stockholm, med närhet till park och gång avstånd till centrum.  Rummet är c:a 20 kvm, en varm och trevlig miljö. Vi delar badrum, vilket aldrig har varit några problem, vi, min man och jag är snabba i duschen. Våra språk är svenska, engelska och spanska, vi är vana vid att ha gäster i hemmet. Välkomna till vårt hem.

Välkomna till vårt hem. Vasastan är ett lugnt och fridfullt område med tillgång till bra restauranger, mataffärer och massor av cafe'er. Gångavstånd till centrum och de flesta museer och andra sevärdheter. The closest subway station is Odenplan, about 5 minutes walk from here. Outside the building are bus numbers 50, 53 and 61. Apart from this it is walking distance to Old Town, Royal Castle, central station, Airport buses is five minutes from here.

name: Lovely room - great location!
summary: Welcome to my home in central Stockholm! Enjoy this quiet residential area in the middle of the city,  right on Lake Mälaren. Take a walk along the water to the majestic City Hall and to the Old Town or rent a kayak and experience this beautiful city from the water. Enjoy the cozy cafés and restaurants in the neighborhood.
space: The apartment is newly renovated, comfortable and clean. It's modern, yet cozy.
description: Welcome to my home in central Stockholm! Enjoy this quiet residential area in the middle of the city,  right on Lake Mälaren. Take a walk along the water to the majestic City Hall and to the Old Town or rent a kayak and experience this beautiful city from the water. Enjoy the cozy cafés and restaurants in the neighborhood. The apartment is newly renovated, comfortable and clean. It's modern, yet cozy. You will have your own bedroom with a double bed (150x190 cm), and are also welcome to use the living room. There's a shared bathroom, and sheets, towels, shampoo and conditioner are included in the price.  You'll have a shelf in the refrigerator, and are welcome to eat breakfast and take away meals in the kitchen. Unfortunately, I'm not able to accommodate more extensive cooking as the kitchen is right in the middle of the apartment, and ends up being a bit disruptive for me.  Coffee and an assortment of teas provided. I'm happy to offer advice on what to do and see in Stockholm and the
neighborhood_overview: One of the greatest advantages of this location is that it's central yet quiet. So although you're close to the pulse of the city, your sleep won't be disturbed by traffic or other noise.  Lake Mälaren is just across the street so you can easily go for a swim,  run/walk along the shore or enjoy a picnic in the park.
transit: Fridhemsplan is right up the street, and is one of the main public tranportation hubs in Stockholm. There are 2 subway lines and many buses that can take you all over the city.
access: You will have your own bedroom with a double bed (150x190 cm), and are also welcome to use the living room. There's a shared bathroom, and sheets, towels, shampoo and conditioner are included in the price.  You'll have a shelf in the refrigerator, and are welcome to eat breakfast and take away meals in the kitchen. Unfortunately, I'm not able to accommodate more extensive cooking as the kitchen is right in the middle of the apartment, and ends up being a bit disruptive for me.  Coffee and an assortment of teas provided.
interaction: I'm happy to offer advice on what to do and see in Stockholm and the surrounding areas.
house_rules: You are most welcome as a guest in my home, and I will do my best to make your stay a pleasant one.  Please abide by the marvelous Swedish tradition of not wearing shoes indoors - the same shoes that have been walking up and down dirty city streets. No pets, smoking, partying or additional guests are allowed in the apartment.
host_about:
There are loads of things that make me happy, and connecting with people from around the world is certainly right up there at the top of the list. 

I'm used to having visitors in my home, and often hear how welcome they feel. I hope you'll feel that way as well!

Södermalm is a district of small boutiques. space: A wonderful 4 +bedroom apartment from 1932 in the first functionalist building in Stockholm. You can easily sleep up to 8 people. name: Perfect townhouse for a family
summary: Our townhouse of 190 squaremeters in great condition lies near the bus/commuter train to Stockholm Central. The trip takes 25 minutes. It has a large sunny porch where you can enjoy lazy summer days and eat a nice charcoal grill-dinner.
space: Hjärtligt välkommen att ta tillfället i akt och bo i ett mysigt 3-våningsradhus som ger möjligheter att uppleva såväl storstadsliv i Stockholm som avkoppling i trädgården i natursköna Kälvesta. I huset finns bland annat ett "master-bedroom" med sovplats för två personer, två barnrum och ett gästsovrum med sovplats för två personer, ett stort vardagsrum med öppen planlösning mot matplats som rymmer upp till 10 personer. Vidare finns ett rymligt kök med full utrustning inklusive micro, diskmaskin, kaffebryggare, brödrost och spis med induktionshäll. Egen kyl och frys finns till ert förfogande. I källaren finner ni ett nyrenoverat badrum med bastu, tvättmaskin och torktumlare. I källaren finns även en gillestuga med tv.  På framsidan av huset finns en stor altan i söderläge med sol från tidig morgon till sen eftermiddag, där ni får nyttja utemöbler, leksaker och grill. På baksidan finns även där en altan där ni kan avnjuta middagen och se solnedgången bakom tallarna. För de lite kyligare

Vidare finns ett rymligt kök med full utrustning inklusive micro, diskmaskin, kaffebryggare, brödrost och spis med induktionshäll. Egen kyl och frys finns till ert förfogande. I källaren finner ni ett nyrenoverat badrum med bastu, tvättmaskin och torktumlare. I källaren finns även en gillestuga med tv.  På framsidan av huset finns en stor
neighborhood_overview: I närheten finner ni bland annat Hässelby slott och Riddersvik slott samt en rad olika stränder där bad och grillning är möjligt.  I Vällingby finns det shopping och bio. Bussar från Spånga tar er till Kista centrum och Sollentuna centrum.
transit: Ett stenkast från huset finns busshållplats som tar er antingen till Vällingby där tunnelbanans gröna linje går eller till Spånga där pendeltåget tar er snabbt (totalt 25 minuter) in till Stockholms centrum. Gratis parkering finns i området.
access: Ni kommer ha tillgång till ett fullutrustat kök och även en del torrvaror. Det finns många leksaker som passar småbarn och även en del dvd-filmer. 1-2 vuxencyklar samt en barncykelstol finns att låna. Rökning och husdjur är absolut förbjudna på grund av allergi. Fester undanbedes eftersom det är en radhusområde med många barnfamiljer.
interaction: Eftersom vi under sommarhalvåret tillbringar tid på våra landställen kommer ni att bo ensamma i vårt radhus.
house_rules: No smoking or pets. No shoes inside. Check-in and out  Check-in time is 18:00 and check out is at. 12:00. The check-in time can be earlier or later so just communicate with me about it. I'll try to work it out. Flowers Water indoor flowers once per week in the summer during a longer stay. Kitchen and food  Salt, pepper, spices is ok to use when cooking. Other food items are private and may not be used. Fire Hazard  No live candles or other flammable light sources should not be used. There is a fire extinguisher in the basement and a fire blanket in the hallway. Use the charcoal grill outside. Noise  Residential as normal residents allowed, no disturbing noise after 22.00 are allowed.  Smoking and pets Smoking and pets are not allowed indoors due to allergies. Garbage  Household waste is disposed of in garbage chute near the neighborhood parking, placed in a plastic bag and tied together. Glass, steel, metal, plastic, placed in containers under the sink and do not belong in the garbage
host_about: Jag heter Johanna och bor i ett radhus i Kälvesta med min man och mina tre barn. Vi tycker om att umgås med släkt och vänner och spenderar gärna tid på våra landställen, speciellt under sommaren och därför vill vi hyra ut vårt fina radhus, helst till barnfamiljer.

name: Spacious 2-bedroom city apt.
summary: Beautiful and light Scandinavian apartment furnished with an Asian touch in the midst of trendy Södermalm, with immediate access to restaurants, bars, clubs, public parks and other amenities. Children are extra welcome here!
space: This 2-bedroom apartment is situated in an early 20th century building with majestic ceiling height and spacious rooms (100 sqm = 1,076 sq ft total). It ideally fits two adults and 2-3 kids of any age, but can without problem host up to five adults (one king-size bed, one 2-storey bunk bed and one opium bed). We will of course provide towels, bedsheets, detergent and other basic stuff you'd expect in an apartment! We also have lots of toys for kids, as well as a baby cot and a baby chair. You will have access to the entire apartment, in-house shared laundry facilities (in addition to the washer in the apartment), a small "garage" to store strollers of any size and a shared inner courtyard where you can park your bike. The host will be available for questions and advice when needed, but do not intend to stay in the apartment. Södermalm is the trendiest area in Stockholm and houses the coolest restaurants, shops, bars and events. But also traditional wood houses, great parks and inspirin

The host will be available for questions and ad
neighborhood_overview: Södermalm is the trendiest area in Stockholm and houses the coolest restaurants, bars and events. But also traditional wood houses, great parks and inspiring museums. The best viewpoint of the city (Skinnarviksberget) is just a stonethrow away!
notes: Parking is usually available in the same block on Krukmakargatan (or otherwise in the near vicinity). There is a charge of SEK 15/hour 9am-5pm Mon-Fri, while evenings and weekends are free-of-charge. Bicycles can be parked in the house courtyard.
transit: Both public buses and the subway is literally just around the corner. Stockholm is a very bike- and pedestrian-friendly city. The old town is just a 10-minute walk away.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment, in-house shared laundry facilities (in addition to the washer in the apartment), a small "garage" to store strollers of any size and a shared inner courtyard where you can park your bike.
interaction: The host will be available for questions and advice when needed, but do not intend to stay in the apartment.
house_rules: No smoking indoors and no pets. As it is an apartment building, no excessive noise after 10pm on weekdays and 11pm on weekends.
host_about: I live with my wife and two small children in central Stockholm after several years of work and study in East Asia. We travel for work and pleasure quite often and spend the summers in our summer cottage and meanwhile want to share our beautiful apartment with visitors!

name: Center Studio Apartment
summary: Stylish  Centrum located Safely
space: Hello and welcome to my modern studio  apartment.  Design with guest comfort and convenience in mind, this old building has been newly refurbished ( 2013) to an excellent standard of modern living.  The apartment has a great central location. Just one minute walk to Rådmansgatan metro station and Stockholm biggest street Sveavägen. It take just a 5 minutes walk to fancy Stureplan and in close proximity to Stockholm City Library, Stockholm Observatory, Bonniers konsthall, Jewish Museum,Sven-Harrys konstmuseum and beautiful Italian Baroque church of Gustav Vasa Kyrka. There are also many buses in the local area. This building and studio apartment has been refurbished, and finished to a standard one would expect in a boutique hotel. Features include: -Satellite 40"Full HD LED 3D TV,  -Wireless internet and cable broadband Ethernet,  -Private 'Square' communal garden (perfect for BBQ's) -In house 2 wash/dry laundry facilities -Dishwasher  -Hairdryer -Electronic door-entry system -Ice makin

name: Amazing 3 BR.Perfect for families!
summary: Our beautiful apartment in a house from 1906 is newly renovated. We have three large bedrooms, a combined livingroom/kitchen and a bathroom with shower/bathtub. It is situated in the best location on Södermalm, close to shops, restaurants and bars
space: This is a unique apartment in a house built in 1906 that gives you all the comfort you can ask for during your stay in Stockholm . The apartment is 102 squaremetres with 3 really large bedrooms. It has just been renovated and all the woodenfloors are painted white, making the apartment extremely bright. 50 metres from the apartment you can take the train to and from Arlanda Airport (pendeltåg).  5 minutes away you will find the subway (Mariatorget) and outside the door you can catch two different buses that take you downtown and also to the Old Town and the Royal Castle. Another bus takes you straight to Långholmen, a beautiful small island in the middle of Stockholm, perfect for a walk or a swim. If you prefer walking the Old Town/Royal Castle is about 20 minutes away and in about 30 minutes you will have walked downtown. If you want to take the ferry to Djurgården (where you will find The Vasamuseum, Grön Lund, Skansen and more) it is just a 15 minutes walk from the apartment. About
description: Our beautiful apartment in a house from 1906 is newly renovated. We have three large bedrooms, a combined livingroom/kitchen and a bathroom with shower/bathtub. It is situated in the best location on Södermalm, close to shops, restaurants and bars This is a unique apartment in a house built in 1906 that gives you all the comfort you can ask for during your stay in Stockholm . The apartment is 102 squaremetres with 3 really large bedrooms. It has just been renovated and all the woodenfloors are painted white, making the apartment extremely bright. 50 metres from the apartment you can take the train to and from Arlanda Airport (pendeltåg).  5 minutes away you will find the subway (Mariatorget) and outside the door you can catch two different buses that take you downtown and also to the Old Town and the Royal Castle. Another bus takes you straight to Långholmen, a beautiful small island in the middle of Stockholm, perfect for a walk or a swim. If you prefer walking the Old Town/Royal Cast
neighborhood_overview: We love our part of Södermalm and are sure you will do the same. It is close to all the action but at the same time situated in a quiet area and you can take nice walks by the water around all of Södermalm and the rest of Stockholm if you want to. There are lots of different shops, restaurants, museums, pharmacies and also a great market hall close to where we live. During the summertime Södermalm is filled with outdoor dining places where you can have dinner or just a drink. Only a short walk away you will reach Tantolunden and Långholmen where you can go swimming, in the middle of Stockholm, or have a nice picnic in the evening. Our part of Södermalm is extremely childfriendly with several playgrounds just a few minutes away.
notes: Our apartment is perfect if you are travelling with children since two out of the three bedrooms are children´s bedrooms. All of the rooms are very spacious and we can provide comfortable mattresses (maximum 2) if you need extra beds.
transit: Buses, trains and the train to Arlanda is litterally just around the corner. It is really easy to get anywhere you could possibly want to get The apartment is also in perfect location if you would like to walk around our beautiful capital, 20 minutes to Gamla Stan (Old Town) and 30 minutes to get downtown (T-centralen).
access: Fully equiped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, fridge/freezer and oven. Free wifi TV (one in the livingroom and two of the bedrooms also have their own tv) with several channels Hairdryer Bathroom with shower/bathtub Separate toilet
interaction: We are happy to answer all your questions about our home and Stockholm. We can give you tips on what to do, where to eat/drink and where to do the best shopping. We have lived on Södermalm for over 20 years and love both Södermalm and Stockholm.
house_rules: No pets No smoking and most important; feel at home
host_about: Live with husband and two sons. Love travelling and has stayed with airbnb myself. Love it!

name: Charming house close to city centre
summary: Beautiful 4 bedroom house from 1932 in a heritage listed area with lots of charm. Lovely garden. Great walks, lakes, bakery and small shops next door. Upscale neighborhood, only 6 km from the city centre which is  just 15 minutes away by the tube.
space: Our house has 4 well sized bedrooms, a large living room, a big country style kitchen,  2 toilets (1 large bathroom), a hall + a changing room.  It has three floors and a total size of 165  square meters.
description: Beautiful 4 bedroom house from 1932 in a heritage listed area with lots of charm. Lovely garden. Great walks, lakes, bakery and small shops next door. Upscale neighborhood, only 6 km from the city centre which is  just 15 minutes away by the tube.  Our house has 4 well sized bedrooms, a large living room, a big country style kitchen,  2 toilets (1 large bathroom), a hall + a changing room.  It has three floors and a total size of 165  square meters.   Internet: free and very fast wireless Laundry: Free to use in the basement We will do everything we can to help you make your stay as enjoyable and comfortable as possible. Feel free to call/email any questions. We speak Swedish, English, French and a little bit of of Spanish. Bromma,  where we are located, is an upscale, much loved, neighbourhood in Stockholm. It is the nearest residential neighbourhood to the city centre, known as the 'garden area' and is great for walking with parks and forest all within a short walk, as well as a beau
neighborhood_overview: Bromma,  where we are located, is an upscale, much loved, neighbourhood in Stockholm. It is the nearest residential neighbourhood to the city centre, known as the 'garden area' and is great for walking with parks and forest all within a short walk, as well as a beautiful beach and two lakes - great for swimming in the summer. There is also a few charming shops, grocery store and bakery right by.
notes: Our neighbourhood really is one of the top-areas in Stockholm.  The house is is cozy, clean and has lots of charm! We love it and hope you will to! Warm regards, Axel & Sophie
transit: When it comes to communications, it couldn't be better. It's only a 8-minute walk to the subway which takes 15 minutes to the city centre, where the airport bus also stops.  So it is really easy to get to/from the airport!
access: Internet: free and very fast wireless Laundry: Free to use in the basement
interaction: We will do everything we can to help you make your stay as enjoyable and comfortable as possible. Feel free to call/email any questions. We speak Swedish, English, French and a little bit of of Spanish.
house_rules: No smoking in the house. No shoes inside.
host_about: We're a family of five.  Me, my husband Axel, our three children Jonatan, 22, Adam, 20, and Ida, 15.  I work as an editor in chief and my husband as a comissioning editor at Swedish Television.  We both travel a lot in work as well as with the family. We love to discover new places, cultures and meeting new friends.  When at home we spend a lot of time in the kitchen.  We also enjoy reading, music, film, going to the theatre and the outdors. We love our home which is in a truly charming,  part of Stockholm.  We know you will love it too. Welcome!

name: ONE ROOM Södermalm/SOFO
summary: One room in 2 rooms appartment One Japanise bed for 2 people
space: Huset är från 18-talet ligger i ett populärt område på Södermalm/SOFO där många kreativa människor bor. Mycket behaglig, lugn och vänlig atmosfär i området. Lägenheten har 2 rum. Ett rum hyr jag ut till mina gäster. I det andra rummet bor jag själv. Lägenheten är ren, ljus, bekväm och trivsam. Sängen är en japansk bed 160x200, mycket bekväm. Rummet ligger mot en Allé samt ej trafikerat gata.    Jag är säker på att Du kommer att trivas i mitt hem, som dem flesta gäster gör. Lägenhet är inte barnvänlig.
description: One room in 2 rooms appartment One Japanise bed for 2 people
neighborhood_overview: Det är mycket levande område med många kaféer, restauranger gym, Vårdcentral, Shopping Center, Galleria i Skanstull, parker, promenadstigar, motionsspår längst vattnet och allt man behöver, finns i närheten. Man kan promenera till Gamla Stan o se vackra utsikter på vägen ditt. Mycket vatten och mycket grönska på sommaren.
notes: Lägenheten är inte barnvänlig.
transit: Det finns flera busshållplatser i närheten. Bus nr 2 mot Stureplan och bus nr 76 mot Djurgården via Strandvägen. Annars är det 10 min promenad till Tunnelbana, gröna linje vid Medbörgarplatsen. Byte mot röda linje  i Tunelbana i Gamlastan.
access: Badrum och kök delas med värden. Du som gäst får förtur så klart.
interaction: Gäster checkar in enl överenskommelse. checkar ut kl 12.00 eller efter överenskommelse. Jag tar emot mina gäster personligen och lämnar nycklarna och visar runt i lägenheten. Är tillgänglig för mina gäster både personligen och via mobilen. Finns i lägenheten på morgonen eller på kvällen.
house_rules: I Sverige brukar vi ta av oss skorna vid ingången till lägenheten, när vi kommer in. I köket diskar vi våran disk och läger saker på plats efter oss. Gäster plockar sina shopping kassar, kartonger, flaskor efter dricka från rummet och bär det till återvinning som är intill byggnaden. Köket används enbart för frukosten. Gäster checkar ut vid 12am Tack för att Ni tar hänsyn till husets regler. Jag uppskattar rak kommunikation och bryr mig om mina gäster.  Mitt mål är att varje gäst trivs och mår bra hemma hos mig och lämnar Stockhom med fina minnen och underbara upplevelser. Välkomna!
host_about:
Jag är kreatör och bor i ett område där kreativitet blommar, Södermalm/SOFO.

Har rest (nästan) över hela världen och reser fortfarande så mycket jag kan.
Jag tycker om människor från olika länder och kulturer.

Gillar skönhet och allt som orsakar behag och harmoni för själen. 
Tycker om att skapa, dela med mig av mina upplevelser.
Är medveten om hälsan & välbefinnande och använder maten som skapande konstverk.
Vill dela mitt kreativa boände med andra människor som uppskattar det.
Tycker att inspirationen ger kraft och vill gärna dela den med mig. 
Blir inspirerad av möten med andra kreatörer.
WELCOME !

name: Beautiful, central & quiet apartment
summary: A welcoming and nice apartment right in the middle of Stockholm, Vasastan. You'll have walking distance to almost everything and the subway is only 1min away. Despite the central location the area is safe, peaceful and quiet.
space: A welcoming and nice apartment right in the middle of Stockholm, Vasastan. You'll have walking distance to almost everything and the subway is only 1 min away if you don't feel like walking. St Eriksplan is a trendy area with a lot to offer. The reputed street "Rörstrandsgatan" with cosy cafes, great restaurants and small charming shops is just a block away and if you want to hang out in the sun at a nice park "Vasaparken" is just around the corner. Despite the central location the area is safe, peaceful and really quiet (so you can get a good night sleep before you go to explore Stockholm). It's a century shift apartment at the top of the building.  The ceiling height is 3,2 m and it has subtle and modern interior with a lot of free space.

Despite the central location the area is safe, peaceful and really quiet (so you can get a good night sleep before you go to explore Stockholm). It's a century shift apartment at the top of the building.  The ceiling height is 3,2 m and it has subtle and modern interior with a lot of free space. A two room flat of 55m2
transit: You have the subway and busses only a few steps away. It's also walking distance almost everywhere.
access: A two room flat of 55m2. The flat has one big bedroom with a queen size bed.   One big living room with a large sofa, TV and dining table for 6 people. A fully equipped modern kitchen with a dishwasher, washing machine, microwave and refrigerator.  Two separete bathrooms, one with a toilet and one with a bathtub. Several supermarkets about 100-250m away. Bakery and cafe just next to the building entrance.
interaction: We will be on vacation during your stay so we can be in touch by phone or e-mail
house_rules: No pets or smoking allowed.  Quiet after 23.00. No partying allowed. No shoes inside and please be careful with the floor. Do not move around furniture. Do not use dishwasher, oven and washing machine at the same time, the electricity will go off.

host_about:
I love to travel and explore new places and most often prefer to do so in combination with my great interest: dancing tango. I take great interest in what's going on in the world, wanting to learn new things and expand the mind. 

We live in a quiet and calm area and it is the perfect spot for you who like to sleep at night to get the energy to explore the surroundings and the city of Stockholm during daytime.

Hope to see you soon!

name: Cozy apartment at Södermalm
summary: A well planned apartment by Hornstull, Södermalm with a complete kitchen and nice bathroom. Great communications and walking distance to pretty much everything and you find both restaurants, bars and cafes right outside the door.
space: This cozy apartment is very well planned and situated by Hornstull, Södermalm. You'll find everything close by; shopping, cafes, restaurants, bars, supermarkets, water and the big park Tantolunden where it's really nice to stroll around.  The apartment is 33 square meters plus balcony, the bed is 120 centimeters wide so works for two. The apartment also hold a complete kitchen and bathtub. There is also a big sofa that could work as two single beds which  make it possible to stay up to four people in the apartment if you don't mind less space.

transit: You go really easy from Arlanda Airport straight to my apartment by the Airport bus (Flygbussarna) towards Liljeholmen. It departs every 20min during the days and takes you to Hornstull in 50 min.  Only 2 min walk to the metrostop Hornstull where the red linje takes you to Old town (Gamla stan) and the center of Stockholm (T-Centralen) in only 10 min.  Just outside the door you find bus 4 that takes you to Kungsholmen in 10 min and if you go the other way it takes you to Skanstull. Personally I walk everywhere since most things are within walking distance.  There is a parking lot behind the house but you'll have to pay to the maschine;  Mon-Fri 08-18      20 SEK/h Mon-Fri 18-21       10 SEK/h Sat & Sun 08-21   10 SEK/h Holidays   08-21   10 SEK/h
access: Towels, sheets, iron, kitchen, dish washing machine, hairdryer.

house_rules: No smoking allowed in my apartment, if you need to smoke I expect you to respect this rule and step outside.  Please take off your shoes when entering the house, it makes the carpet much happier. Respect my things and leave the place as you found it.  Thank you!
host_about: I'm a girl with a lot of energy living in Stockholm but originally from a town three hours from here. On my spare time I'm quite active with both Crossfit, hunting and hanging out with my friends.

name: Central apartment - incredible view
summary: In our opinion Kungsholmen/Norrmälarstrand is the cities most beautiful, well located, fun and secluded area in the city Stockholm. Our apartment is placed right on the waterfront/boardwalk ca 30 meters from the closest beach and park.
space: The apartment is very central in Stockholm with amazing view. High standard, three bedrooms for total 6 pers, 2 new bathrooms, livingroom with fireplace, dining room and kitchen with a balcony. Very close to parks, beaches, attractions.   In our opinion Kungsholmen/Norrmälarstrand is the cities most beautiful, well located, fun and secluded area in the city Stockholm. Our apartment is placed right on the waterfront/boardwalk ca 30 meters from the closest beach and park. The apartment was built in the early 1900s and has lovely oak parquet in all the living areas. Lots of charm. The view is one of Stockholm's finest, with a wide view over the Stockholm bay as well as Västerbron (bridge) that is lit up in the late evenings. The location is close to local transportation (busses, subway). Situated no more than a short walk to Stockholm's central and all the main attractions. The apartment with big delightful windows make the apartment very light.  The entire apartment of 46 sqm. As guests you have access to free wifi (100Mb/s), kitchen aids and sanitary articles. You also have access to the stove and wood if you like to enjoy some open fire.  You will either meet me or a friend of mine when you arrive in order to get the keys to the apartment. The neighbordhood is a charming and old part of Stockholm with beautiful old houses, a popular bakery with typically Swedish pastries and a couple of second hand stores.

notes: If you have any questions or need any advice, don't hesitate to contact me!

name: Studio at Östermalm
summary: Cozy writer's studio under the roof on a calm street next to the fabulous Gärdet Park. Recently renovated. Great communications. Small pentry underneath the skylight. Perfect for anyone fed up with boring hotel rooms!
space: Charming writer's studio as an cosy atmosphere as a personal alternative to a hotel room.
description: Cozy writer's studio under the roof on a calm street next to the fabulous Gärdet Park. Recently renovated. Great communications. Small pentry underneath the skylight. Perfect for anyone fed up with boring hotel rooms! Charming writer's studio as an cosy atmosphere as a personal alternative to a hotel room. You have your own entrance and the studio to yourself. Fast wifi is available. We live in the apartment on the other side of the wall but do not interact with guests much. Gärdet is a vast green space in the middle of Stockholm and adjacent to Djurgården with loads of beautiful sights and great running tracks. Two of the most frequent bus lines (76 and 4) stops at Radiohuset just outside the building. Two blocks away is Karlaplan (subway "Karlaplan"). To plan your trip in Stockholm, do use (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps. That way you may also get suggestion on how to use the public transport (the SL) the best way possible. We're into sustainability and so most of the bed linen are organic c
neighborhood_overview: Gärdet is a vast green space in the middle of Stockholm and adjacent to Djurgården with loads of beautiful sights and great running tracks.
notes: We're into sustainability and so most of the bed linen are organic cotton and we use environmentally friendly detergents, and as well as green cleaning methods when cleaning the studio. Also, all of the furniture have been sourced on auctions and on second hand markets.  Because why use new resources when you don't have to? That is also why we encourage our guests to take a book from our shelves and replace it with something they have read already. The power in the studio is green and comes from wind and water and there's plenty of recycling opportunities in the building. We'll change the linen and towels whenever you need to. Just let us know and we'll provide you with a new clean set! Regarding trash: All bottles/cans can be recycled by placing hem outside our door (one floor down) and we'll donate them to charity. Everything else goes to trash. As you exit the elevator on the ground floor, turn left and then take the door to your right. Behind second door to your right (big grey one
transit: Two of the most frequent bus lines (76 and 4) stops at Radiohuset just outside the building. Two blocks away is Karlaplan (subway "Karlaplan"). To plan your trip in Stockholm, do use (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps. That way you may also get suggestion on how to use the public transport (the SL) the best way possible.
access: You have your own entrance and the studio to yourself. Fast wifi is available.
interaction: We live in the apartment on the other side of the wall but do not interact with guests much.
house_rules: Behave like you're visiting a really good friend. Take care of our stuff and don't leave the place a mess. Which shouldn't be a problem for you, right? :-)

name: 3R apt close to Södermalm
summary: Charming, light, three-room apt on third floor in quiet area close to City centre. Close to public transportation (metro) which takes you to Södermalm in just a few minutes. Large recreational area (Nackareservatet) close by.
space: The apartment has one large bedroom with a king size bed, and a smaller bedroom with a single bed (not a baby cot anymore like in the picture, however, travel baby cot can be provided when requested). Travel bed (single size) can be provided when needed, or the sofa can be used as a bed if preferred. The kitchen is newly renovated and fully equipped, with microwave oven and dishwasher. The spacious living room has a large dining place, and a comfortable sofa and flat screen TV. The bathroom has a shower. WiFi is available with password provided upon check-in. Towels and bed linen included. Washing machine in the bathroom.
description: Charming, light, three-room apt on third floor in quiet area close to City centre. Close to public transportation (metro) which takes you to Södermalm in just a few minutes. Large recreational area (Nackareservatet) close by. Travel bed (single size) can be provided when needed, or the sofa can be used as a bed if preferred. The kitchen is newly renovated and fully equipped, with microwave oven and dishwasher. The spacious living room has a large dining place, and a comfortable sofa and flat screen TV. The bathroom has a shower. WiFi is available with password provided upon check-in. Towels and bed linen included. Washing machine in the bathroom. - The apartment will only be available for rent when we're out of town, but we will be available to answer any questions by phone, e-mail or tex
neighborhood_overview: Skärmarbrink is just south of Södermalm. It's a quiet area which offers both vicinity to city centre and recreational opportunities. Nackareservatet, a large nature reserve which is available to the public all year around, is close by. Södermalm in its turn, offers a vast array of shops, cafes, restaurants and sights. There are a few convenient stores close by, and small centre with grocery store, 7/11 and restaurants only five minutes away.
transit: Metro station (Skärmarbrink) is a 5 mins walk from the apt. From Skärmarbrink metro stn it takes five minutes to Södermalm, 10-14 mins to the central station (T-centralen). You can also walk to Södermalm in 15 mins.
interaction: The apartment will only be available for rent when we're out of town, but we will be available to answer any questions by phone, e-mail or text message.
house_rules: Non smoking guests only, no pets.  Guests are expected to keep the place in good condition during the stay.

name: Spacious and comfortable room in central Stockholm
summary: Comfortable double room in popular Vasastan! Super easy transfer from Arlanda. City bike card included.
space: Large double room in charming apartment from 1911, nice (but calm) location close to several attractions, walking distance to Gamla stan (30 min), main shooping areas Drottninggatan (15-20 min) and the huge park Hagaparken (5-10 min).  I would love to, if you'd wish, socialise with my guests and share my favourite attractions of my beautiful home town. The public transportation in this city is good and reliable. It's a 7 minutes walk to the metro (Odenplan) and you can easily get to the city busses in just a couple of minutes.
description: Comfortable double room in popular Vasastan! Super easy transfer from Arlanda. City bike card included. Large double room in charming apartment from 1911, nice (but calm) location close to several attractions, walking distance to Gamla stan (30 min), main shooping areas Drottninggatan (15-20 min) and the huge park Hagaparken (5-10 min).  I would love to, if you'd wish, socialise with my guests and share my favourite attractions of my beautiful home town. The public transportation in this city is good and reliable. It's a 7 minutes walk to the metro (Odenplan) and you can easily get to the city busses in just a couple of minutes. I would love to, if you'd wish, share my favourite attractions of this beautiful city. I'd gladly have conversations with you and answer question about Stockholm and Sweden in general. I'd recommend to discover Stockholm by bicycle, the infrastructure for bikes is better than most other european cities.  The public transportation in this city is good and reliab
transit: I'd recommend to discover Stockholm by bicycle, the infrastructure for bikes is better than most other european cities.  The public transportation in this city is good and reliable. It's a 7 minutes walk to the metro (Odenplan) and you can easily get to the city buses, just a couple of minutes of walk.  Use a period card during your stay. Do not pay travel by travel (very expensive!!)
access: Use our kitchen and the essentials (spices, oil, salt, coffee, tea)
interaction: I would love to, if you'd wish, share my favourite attractions of this beautiful city. I'd gladly have conversations with you and answer question about Stockholm and Sweden in general.
house_rules: Good manners and respect, the normal, quiet at 11:00 pm (12:00 fri, sat)
host_about:
I live in this lovely appartment together with my girlfriend Emma.

I work as a vocal coach (speech, singing). I also get my income from acting and singing in a theatre.

Originally I come from the south part of Sweden but moved here fifteen years ago and have never regretted it. 

I'm also interested in bicycle culture and run a blog about it (not competition but transport). Mainly about how bicycles can transform our big cities into more livable and better places. 

I'd like to describe myself as an easygoing, curious, kind and open minded person. 

We want our guests to have great time here, in our home and in this beautiful city, and we will do our best to contribute to it. We are eager to share our best Stockholm experiences with you. 

We are looking forward to a lot of interesting meetings through this great site.

name: Convinient living in Stockholm
summary: On Söder in the middle of Stockholm is this 4 room apt situated. The apt is fully equipped and perfect for families. It's close to all public transportations and there are restaurants and shops in the vicinity as well as parks and seaside walks.
space: Our apt has 4 rooms of which 3 are bedrooms, a big kitchen and a balcony. Built in 1905 the apt has the charm of older days combined with all the modern commodities such as a computer and wifi. It's perfect for families as there is lots of toys and videogames.
description: On Söder in the middle of Stockholm is this 4 room apt situated. The apt is fully equipped and perfect for families. It's close to all public transportations and there are restaurants and shops in the vicinity as well as parks and seaside walks.  Our apt has 4 rooms of which 3 are bedrooms, a big kitchen and a balcony. Built in 1905 the apt has the charm of older days combined with all the modern commodities such as a computer and wifi. It's perfect for families as there is lots of toys and videogames.  The guests will have full access to the apt with dishwasher and washingmachine and fully equipped kitchen. Smoking is not allowed. Also it's not allowed to invite others to the apt. We will not be in town during the time the apartment is subletted. In stead there will be a host that will take care of the guests.
