name: 10 min south of Södermalm -Welcome!
summary: Looking for a peaceful place to recharge your batteries? I find great joy in making guests feel comfortable in my home. The apt is located in a calm subburb 17 min from Sthlm central stn, 10 min from Södermalm & 8 min from Globen - the Globe.Welcome!
space: The apartment is very quiet, spacious and open with green areas right outside.
description: Looking for a peaceful place to recharge your batteries? I find great joy in making guests feel comfortable in my home. The apt is located in a calm subburb 17 min from Sthlm central stn, 10 min from Södermalm & 8 min from Globen - the Globe.Welcome! The apartment is very quiet, spacious and open with green areas right outside. The guests will have access to: -living room  - kitchen -  balcony - high speed WIFI - sheets and towels I respect my guests privacy but I am happy to have a chat over a coffee or tea and I always try to answer whatever questions they may have. I love that it is green and quiet and i like the houses that were built in the mid 50's. The apartment is located a 5-8 min walk from the metro station. There are also buses from the street outside, to the commuter train/Pendeltåg (5 min), to Stockholm international fairs/Stockholmsmässan as well as to IKEA :)

name: Good energy, by the lake!
summary: Enjoy this centrally located apartment. Well equipped kitchen, washing machine, bathtub, and sunny balcony. Minutes away from bakery, brewery, bars, restaurants. Walk by the lake, sunny docks. Great communication; bus, trolly, boat ferry to overall Stockholm very close the apartment.
space: Sunny balcony in south. Quiet bedroom Kingsize hotel-quality bed ( 180x200 cm). Can be divided into two single beds. Spacey kitchen with good energy. Super cozy with all the basic necessities. Well equipped kitchen with squeezer, blender, toaster etc. Dishwasher, refrigerator and freezer. No microwave oven but a real convection oven. Lots of space for resting and relaxing after city walks and activities. Shower and Tub for hot bath. Space and yogamat for meditation and personal training/practice.
description: Enjoy this centrally located apartment. Well equipped kitchen, washing machine, bathtub, and sunny balcony. Minutes away from bakery, brewery, bars, restaurants. Walk by the lake, sunny docks. Great communication; bus, trolly, boat ferry to overall Stockholm very close the apartment. Sunny balcony in south. Quiet bedroom Kingsize hotel-quality bed ( 180x200 cm). Can be divided into two single beds. Spacey kitchen with good energy. Super cozy with all the basic necessities. Well equipped kitchen with squeezer, blender, toaster etc. Dishwasher, refrigerator and freezer. No microwave oven but a real convection oven. Lots of space for resting and relaxing after city walks and activities. Shower and Tub for hot bath. Space and yogamat for meditation and personal training/practice. Access to the whole apartment, balcony and a great washing room (with washing machines and driers). Free use of WIFI 100 mb/s obviously! I'll welcome my guests to a safe, practical yet cosy stay in Stockholm. I'll
neighborhood_overview: A modern neighbourhood with interesting architecture. Lots of Great communication to the rest of the city with ferry (150 mtrs), bus or trolly (right outside the door).  Beautiful surrounding, as to nature walks, canoing, outside gym or running trails in the Nature Reserve Park (entrance 150 mtrs) or just stroll in the nearby harbor along the water and visit local brewery, various local restaurants, cafeterias and quiet a few bakeries.
notes: I always offer clean linnen and towels.  Please feel free to use any of the basics in the kitchen like oil, salt, pepper or other species. Just try to compensate with equally worth stuff whatever that can come to use.
transit: Apartment located just by the trolley station "Sickla Udde", also  buses (71, 74) one block away. The ferries you´ll find very close by the apt. These will take you to Södermalm (SoFo), downtown, Djurgården and Lidingö.  Bikes available for rental at two possible places not far from apt (search on City Bikes Stockholm). This way you will easily get around practically to the greater part of downtown Stockholm in no time.  There are close by connecting buses that take you to the Archipelago in less than an hour. Other option is the ferry (leaves nearby apt) that take you to Nybroplan where boats and ferries take you to the archipelago by sea for a more pleasant day trip or longer visits. There you also find sightseeing taxis that show you Stockholm, Birka and the lake of Mälaren. Car parking on the street below, payment required Mon-Fri, not weekends!
access: Access to the whole apartment, balcony and a great washing room (with washing machines and driers). Free use of WIFI 100 mb/s obviously!
interaction: I'll welcome my guests to a safe, practical yet cosy stay in Stockholm. I'll try to guide you to the best possible experience of Stockholm. You'll be met by the apartment as you arrive as when you leave for exchange of keys and info. You can always contact me for whatever reason by mobile or mail.
house_rules: Please leave the apartment as you entered it. Please just be polite and thoughtful, be careful. Just basic and mutual respect is required :) Please water plants. No animals  No smoking  No partying  No loud music after 9 PM. Please wash linnen and towels if used. Laundry room booked 7-10 am day of departure. If you want/need us to wash your linnen, there's an extra charge of 35 euro, 350 kr. I will charge for cleaning 50 euro, 500 SEK if it requires an extra effort to get it as you found it .
host_about: Svensk mexikan. Lärare i Tai Chi Chi Kung, arbetar som behandlingsterapeut med diverse tekniker inom kroppsarbete. Jag driver driver näringsverksamhet inom turism & friskvårds branschen. Organiserar retreats i kombination med aktiviteter. Ger behandlingar och håller Chi Kung pass på stranden på Fårö, Gotland på sommaren. Tulum, Mexiko el Bali på vintern. Älskar att resa och surfa. Älskar naturen och att vara pappa. Har haft juicebar & yogastudio och tycker om att "hålla space" för andra bara för att, även för andras helande processer.

name: Room close to downtown
summary: Room for two persons in Bagarmossen. The bed is 1.20, if you want there is an extra mattress. It´s quite Close to Södermalm (downtovn) ten minutes with the metro. The stations is Bagarmossen-Skanstull. You can also borrow bikes for free.
space: Our hose is Close to the city but also to the nature. Behind our house is it a big nature reserve with lovley forests and a couple of lakes were you can take a bath, the wather is quite hot in june, juli, august and september. Play golf and jogging is other alternative. The metro is the green line number 17 from T-centralen to Skarpnäck, and your stop is Bagarmossen. You can also take the tube to Skogskyrkogården, line 18, the endstation is Farsta Strand. From Skogskyrkogården there is it bus 161 to Bagarmossen. Your stop is Rusthållarvägen.

host_about: Hejsan ärade gäster. Jag tror mig vara en person med stort hjärta och öppen för andra människor och deras historia och levnadssätt. Är nyfiken på livet och vad som hör det till. Nyinflyttad till Bagarmossen efter att ha bott i stan i trettio år. Längtade efter naturen och dess lugn och ro. Jag lever tillsammans med min man Morgan och en hund vid namn Hugo och två katter, Holger och Lisa. Lev och låt leva.

name: Newly renovated 34 sqm city flat
summary: Modern newly renovated flat with fully equipped kitchen and washing machine in the center of cosy Kungsholmen near Stockholm Central Station. I'm looking for a tenant who can rent my flat for the whole period of 27 june-28 august!!
space: Ljus och fräsch nyrenoverad (2016) 1,5a med stor sovalkov. Badrum med tvättmaskin (inbyggd torktumlare), golvvärme. Alla fönster i sydlig riktning mot en lugn och grönskande innergård. Fullt utrustat kök där det finns stor kyl/frys, ugn med inbyggd micro, induktionshäll, kaffebryggare samt vattenkokare. Lägenheten är möblerad med matbord och 2 stolar, stor rak soffa 250cm, säng 160 cm bred och en 160 cm bred luftmadrass.
description: Modern newly renovated flat with fully equipped kitchen and washing machine in the center of cosy Kungsholmen near Stockholm Central Station. I'm looking for a tenant who can rent my flat for the whole period of 27 june-28 august!!
neighborhood_overview: Lugna och trevliga grannar! Sällan fester eller andra oljud
notes: Större mataffärer såsom Willys, Lidl och Coop ligger vid Fridhemsplan på 5 minuter behagligt promenadavstånd. Vid Fridhemsplan ligger även Västermalmsgallerian som erbjuder många affärer cafeer och restauranger.
transit: 200m till rådhuset t-bana (blå linje) 500m till Fridhemsplan där blåa och gröna tunnelbanelinjerna möts samt ett flertal stora busslinjer passerar så som 1,3 & 4 med flera.  Ca 10-15 min promenad till Stockholms Centralstation.  300m till norr Mälarstrand där det finns ett antal trevliga restauranger. Lugna och gröna kronobergsparken ligger precis utanför dörren. Området är väldigt lugnt och skönt tack vare att polishuset ligger i närheten samt att Bergsgatan är en återvändsgata. 10 min promenad till stadshuset. 20 min promenad till Gamla stan. 20 min promenad till Hötorget/Stureplan
access: Fritt Wifi. Tv med ca 15 tv-kanaler. Xbox med tre handkontroller och diverse spel. Apple-TV.  Handdukar och lakan ingår. Gästerna behöver inte tänka på något annat än sin egen mat och sina egna kläder.
interaction: Jag kommer inte att umgås med mina gäster förutom de obligatoriska mötena som sker ev vid tillträde och "utcheckning"
house_rules: Please leave the apartment in the same condition as you found it on arrival. Please respect the quiet hours which are in effect between 10pm-8am every day. Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the apartment. Please take your shoes off in the hallway.
host_about: 27 year old industrial management student

name: Whole house, 14 min. to Stockholm, cat included!
summary: 2-storey, 3 bedroom terraced house, 119 sqm, newly renovated kitchen and bathrooms. Large living room, sunny garden w/ BBQ. Private parking lot. Quiet, child-friendly area, playground. 10 min. walk to Spånga station, shops, supermarket, restaurants/pub.  Note that our cat Sasha stays in the house and needs someone to fill up his food and water. He uses his cat flap to go out and minds his own business outside, so no cat litter box to take care of.
space: Master bed room with double bed, queen size (160 cm) Second bed room with single bed. Third bed room with child bed. There are two extra folding beds that can be prepared if necessary. Spacious modern kitchen with induction and gas stove, oven, micro, dishwasher, fridge, freezer. Large living room with 32” flatscreen TV, 17 channels (Comhem cable). 100 mbit fiber connection and wifi. Two bathrooms: one smaller with shower, another larger with bath tub. Laundry room with washing machine, tumble dryer and drying cabinet. Sunny garden facing south with patio, garden furniture and large BBQ grill.

notes: Note that our cat Sasha lives in the house. He needs someone to fill up food and water every day, so if you plan to leave the house for several days this rental might not be for you.

interaction: We will be out of town, but can be reached on the phone/sms/Messenger/ (Hidden by Airbnb) / (Hidden by Airbnb) .

I used to work at the tourist office of Stockholm and love showing my guests the best of our beautiful capital. I'm currently in the translation business and speak 5 languages.

name: 4 rooms in the heart of Stockholm
summary: Beautiful, clean, stilish and well planed apartment right in the middle of the hussle and bustle of town, and still very quiet. 5 minutes walking distance to Old Town and central station. 3 bedrooms, two bathroom, big kitchen and a furnished balcony.
space: The apartment has four rooms and a big kitchen. The nice master bedroom with a king size bed, the two bedrooms with TV and Playstation in each one, the living room, all have big windows, hardwood floors and a furnished and quite balcony. The well equipped kitchen. A large fridge/freezer, a stove with a multifunctional oven and a ceramic stove top, a food processor and many other kitchen things will make it a culinary stay. The bathroom has a standing shower and a heated floor, washer and dryer. The living room has a large sofa, where one person can sleep and a dining room table that easily seats 8 - 10 people. There is a 46' flat screen TV and PS3

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the city center 10 meters from the main shopping street of Stockholm. Just 5 minutes walking to the main attractions of town, such as the Old Town, the Royal Castle, the Parliamnet, different city tours on land and water. All public transportation is just around the corner as well as restaurants, bars, nice coffee places, and much more. You can not find anything more central than this.
notes: If you would like to take a bikeride around town there are bikes for rent 10 meters from the door.
house_rules: Pets are welcomed!
host_about:
Hi, 
We are a little family consisting of myself and my two boys, 13 and 15 years old, who love to travel as much as possible to all corners of the world. As we live so central we always have people popping over for dinner or just a cup of coffee.
You are very welcome to!

name: Fun and Vibrant Apartment on Artsy Södermalm Island
summary: Stream a calming playlist on a sound system and choose a book to read in a sunny bay window. Cook in an upscale chef's kitchen and serve dinner at a table for six. Colorful artwork and a display of intriguing curios create a spirited atmosphere.
space: The apartment is convenient for two persons with a dubbel bed and a comfortable sofa. The bathroom is super! The kitchen is fully equipped and you can sit comfortable six people at the table. There is an espresso machine and a Mocca Master for brewing coffee. Outside the kitchen window there is a little round table for two on a exterior corridor. There is TV, Apple TV, Sonos system and wifi 50 mb. It's right on the spot with subway, grocery store, restaurants, shopping, water and nature.
description: Stream a calming playlist on a sound system and choose a book to read in a sunny bay window. Cook in an upscale chef's kitchen and serve dinner at a table for six. Colorful artwork and a display of intriguing curios create a spirited atmosphere.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right in the middle of buzzing Södermalm, a main island in Central Stockholm. It's near parks with beautiful trails and some of the city's best views. Trendy restaurants, bars, and nightlife in Stockholm and Södermalm are close by.
notes: If you want to cook at home, there is a grocery store in the house and a great bakery (Fabrique) right on the street.
transit: Transport is super, you have the subway/bus just around the corner. Old town 5 min walk City Centre 5 min subway/bus Stureplan 10 min subway/bus Mariatorget 5 min walk There is very easy to get from the airport to the apartment.
access: You will have full access to the apartment. - Quiet residential, parties or events not allowed.
interaction: I will check you in/out and see that all is well. I answer questions by mail, sms or telephone. Don't hesitate if you have questions.
house_rules: It's not allowed to smoke inside the apartment. Please don't wear shoes in the apartment. No pets allowed. No partys or extra guests in the apartment.
host_about: Jag tycker om att umgås med mina vänner, familj och barnbarn. Att laga mat från olika länder med goda viner till, är något vi gör ofta och gärna. När vi reser tycker vi om att utforska nya platser till fots, cykel eller bil. Senast cyklade vi från Botswana till Kapstaden och vildkampade längs vägen. Jag älskar havet, naturen och möten med nya människor. Några av mina intressen är cykling, mitt växthus, film, musik, keramik och att baka bröd.

name: Comfortable flat by the water Zone1
summary: My flat is situated centrally and with easy access to the city, in green Gröndal just by the water with swimming and forest jogging/walking area. You have full access to a comfortable, loved and slightly quirky artist home.  Good for 1-4 people.
space: My flat is situated centrally and with easy access to the city, in green Gröndal just by the water and forest jogging/walking area. You don't see the bay, Mörtviken from the windows but its literally two minutes from my house.  And on a nice morning I often walk for an hour by the water towards Mälarhöjden passing several nice little swimming bays and have my morning coffe on the cliffs.
description: My flat is situated centrally and with easy access to the city, in green Gröndal just by the water with swimming and forest jogging/walking area. You have full access to a comfortable, loved and slightly quirky artist home.  Good for 1-4 people. My flat is situated centrally and with easy access to the city, in green Gröndal just by the water and forest jogging/walking area. You don't see the bay, Mörtviken from the windows but its literally two minutes from my house.  And on a nice morning I often walk for an hour by the water towards Mälarhöjden passing several nice little swimming bays and have my morning coffe on the cliffs. You have access to a comfortable and slightly quirky artists home. With plenty of books in the shelves and space for cooking in the kitchen. The flat is very comfortable for two people. But you can stay up to four without problem. Just be clear about this on booking! I am probably out of town during your stay but will meet you and show you around on your arriva
neighborhood_overview: This is a fantastic neighbourhood with several swimming places, very good cafés f ex the garden Café with art exhibitions, Vintervikens Café and two minutes from one of Stockholms best resturants, Winterviken.  Also there is a nearby animal farm and playground center for kids :) with a toddlers pool.  The park is a great place to hang out and people watch and meet some Stockholm folks on a day out with or without children.
notes: Beautiful area to walk and yet its still zone 1.
transit: Buss stop is very close to house.
access: You have access to a comfortable and slightly quirky artists home. With plenty of books in the shelves and space for cooking in the kitchen. The flat is very comfortable for two people. But you can stay up to four without problem. Just be clear about this on booking!
interaction: I am probably out of town during your stay but will meet you and show you around on your arrival. Or my good friend and silver smith, Emma will show you everything. She works in Skansen open air museum, on of many sights that Stockholm has to offer. Whatever your interest area she or I will help you out if you are looking for something in particular! Or come with general suggestions for fun events, good resturants, parks, museums and nightlife.
house_rules: I expect you to treat the place well, take care of neighbours and clean up after your stay.
host_about:
Im an art and food lover who enjoys traveling around both in sweden and abroad. 

Since I lived in many places my attitude to my home is relaxed and I don't mind sharing my space with others. I will do everything I can to make your stay as good it possibly can be, please don't hesitate to ask anything about Stockholm or Sweden in general!

name: Charming apartment, in city centre.
summary: Our bright clean 50 squaremeter apartment is situated right in the city centre. In the middle of the buzzing town, but still in a very calm/safe area.
space: Newly renovated studio with generous ceiling height decorated with lots of designer furniture. Located on a quiet street with instant access to public transport. Take advantage of the fully equipped kitchen.  Nice bright quiet bedroom facing the courtyard, with a luxury kingsize bed.  Sheets and towels are included.
description: Our bright clean 50 squaremeter apartment is situated right in the city centre. In the middle of the buzzing town, but still in a very calm/safe area.  Newly renovated studio with generous ceiling height decorated with lots of designer furniture. Located on a quiet street with instant access to public transport. Take advantage of the fully equipped kitchen.  Nice bright quiet bedroom facing the courtyard, with a luxury kingsize bed.  Sheets and towels are included. In the neighborhood you’ll find some of Stockholm's most popular cafés, restaurants, bars, shopping and some of the most beautiful parks and strolling areas. You'll also find great grocery stores and laundry service within 1 minute walk. Subway and buses to take you around the city is within a 1 minute walk. Also airport buses stops just 15 min walk from the apartment. host_about:
Hi, 

Im a traveller from Sweden, with roots in Poland. I usually travel with my husband Lars. We both live in Stockholm and right now I'm working in a hospital delivering babies into the world. 
I love to travel and in the last year i've been to Budapest, Portugal, France, Japan, Italy and some more. 
Another passion in life is photography.

All the best and hope to hear from you soon.
Paula

name: Apartment in the heart of Stockholm
summary: Fully furnished apartment located in the middle of Vasastan in central Stockholm, 10-15 minutes walking distance from Stureplan.  Metro and busses just around the corner, the area provides a lot of nice restaurants, coffee shops, bars, supermarkets.
space: On the second floor of this building you will find this spaceious two bedroom apartment with high ceiling and large windows allowing beautiful light to shine in. A smart partition with windows in the living room create a separate bedroom. Spacious and open living room with 3-seat sofa and armchair, coffee table and a smart TV.  Bright and quiet bedroom with a 160cm continental bed. You can find an extra matress thats 90cm or an extra air-matress that is 160cm.  Kitchen with dining area for 4 people equipped with stove with oven, fan, washing machine, combined refrigerator and freezer, microwave, nespresso machine, kettle and toaster.  You will find a bathroom with sink in the bedroom and the toilet with sink can be found separately in the hall.

neighborhood_overview: Located in attractive neighborhoods where Vasastan and Östermalm meet, live close to both nature and the city's pulse. The area has an extensive range of restaurants, cafes, entertainment and shopping. Nearby are also pleasant parks with jogging tracks.
transit: Excellent communications by metro, buses and Roslagsbanan, just around the corner.
access: See description above
interaction: We are happy to help our guests with questions regarding their stay in Stockholm.
house_rules: 1. ONLY PAYING GUESTS  The apartment is suitable for 2 persons. Air-bed and matrass available for 1 person for an additional fee of 300 kr/person. Only guests paying for their stay are allowed in the flat during the rental period. If you want to invite more be honest about it and ask before your arrival! Guests breaking this rule will be fined 500 euro. 2. NO SMOKING  Smoking is NOT allowed inside the apartment nor the building, under any circumstances. Smokers are asked to smoke outside, in front of the entrance of the building. Remember that you are responsible for taking care of your smoked cigarette and throwing it in the nearast bin by yourself. 3. NO PETS 4. STATUS QUO  As a guest, you are expected to keep the apartment in the same condition as you received it. The apartment will be cleaned after your stay but that does not mean that you e.g. can leave dishes unwashed or food left on a plate.  5. NO HIGH NOISE  As a guest you will have free access to WIFI. name: 3 rooms by Mariatorget, Södermalm.
summary: A light & airy apt on the 4th floor. Spacious balcony. Two big rooms with 160& 120 cm beds. The livingroom: a single bed, a sofa and a chair. In the kitchen there´s room for 6 by the table. No dishwasher. Separate toilet & bathroom w washingmachine.
space: It´s a calm place on the fourth floor with a balcony in an attractive area. Two big sleeping rooms with a double bed (160 cm) in one and a bed (120 cm) in the other. In the living room there´s a single bed, a sofa etc. In the kitchen there is room for 6 at the table.

The apartment is situated in a very nice, popular and attractive area in the south center of Stockholm, Söder. In walking distance to the old town, to parks and beautiful sights, museums, cafés and restaurants. The metro station is 2 minutes away, there´s a bus stop outside the house. Abou
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a very nice, popular and attractive area in the south center of Stockholm, Söder. In walking distance to the old town, to parks and beautiful sights, museums, cafés and restaurants.
notes: I have a cat living part time during the year so if you´re allergic to cats this is not a place for you. (The cat will not be here when you are, of course.)
transit: The metro station is 2 minutes away, there´s a bus stop outside the house. About 6 minutes with the metro to the Central station.
access: Wireless Wifi, washingmachine (no dishwasher).
interaction: If I have the chance I´ll meet you when you come. Otherwise a friend of mine will meet up and show you around. You can always reach me by phone.
house_rules: I´d like you to feel at home and follow rules as: no smoking inside and not play music after 23.00 or make noise that will disturb the neighbours. Also,  I don´t want more than 5 people living here.
host_about: I like traveling and nature, cultural experiences and friends.

name: Cosy flat close to city and forest
summary: Here is a unique  and cool flat for those who love both the city and the forest. With a big field below the balcony you can meet the suns first rays with an amazing view.  Perfect for two or for a family.
space: The flat is very light and you feel close to nature, we call it the Treehouse! You will find a lot of forest animals in the flat (no worries none is alive). There is a free pool open 10-18 everyday just behind the building with lots of playing opportunities and a kids pool. The field/park is a very popular space for people to hang out so sometimes you can hear parties going on but they never last to long.
description: Here is a unique  and cool flat for those who love both the city and the forest. With a big field below the balcony you can meet the suns first rays with an amazing view.  Perfect for two or for a family. The flat is very light and you feel close to nature, we call it the Treehouse! You will find a lot of forest animals in the flat (no worries none is alive). There is a free pool open (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) everyday just behind the building with lots of playing opportunities and a kids pool. The field/park is a very popular space for people to hang out so sometimes you can hear parties going on but they never last to long. This flat is the home of me and my son so we keep all our private things here but there will be space to store clothes. The area is a typical one built in the 50's with only three storys high apartment buildings. There are trees everywhere and a skiing slope 10 minutes away by foot! Its a calm area without bars and shops dominated by families and couples. Mo
neighborhood_overview: The area is a typical one built in the 50's with only three storys high apartment buildings. There are trees everywhere and a skiing slope 10 minutes away by foot! Its a calm area without bars and shops dominated by families and couples. Most people that live here love outdoors life since it is so close to a nature reserve, lake and skiing opportunities.  There are a few pubs in the area but not in the blocks close to the house.
notes: We will be out travelling so we wont be able to meet you. I will be available for questions via telephone and e-mail and a contact person nearby will be able to help you in case it is needed.
transit: A tube station is 7 min away by foot but due to maintenance during summer (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) the trip to the city involves two changes and will not take 15 min as before. You can park on the street for a fee that you pay for with an app. (Website hidden by Airbnb)  There are three food shops in the area.
access: This flat is the home of me and my son so we keep all our private things here but there will be space to store clothes.

name: 10 min walk to Stockholm city.
summary: 108 m2, 3 bedrooms, big bathroom, living room with open connection to the kitchen (brand new). Quite area and only 5 10minutes to walk to the city centre. Situated on the entrance floor. Quite strret with little traffic bedrooms towards courtyard.
space: The appartment is originally built in 1880. We recently moved the kitchen to one of the livingrooms and therefore we now have 3 separate bedrooms. One of the bedrroms have no real door that can be closed, only a curtain (suitable for a child ). We have four beds, but it is possible to sleep on one of the couches. If you need I will offer you an additional extra bed. You will get all the bedsheets and towels you need.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is nice with a lot of small shops, good restaurants, pubs and cafés. Several nice, green parks, large city churches, sub-way stations and grocery stores. Only 5 min. walk to the big square where they sell flowers, vegetables and fruit. Your children can enjoy playing in several nice parks only 5-15 minutes walk away.
notes: You can call me any time during your stay if you have any questions or need help to contact a doctor.
transit: From the airport (Arlanda) you pay about 550 sek. For a taxi to the appartment. You can also take the airport-train (240 sek/person) or the bus (about 110/person) . It is only 10 walking distance to the central station where you arrive by train or bus.  You can walk to the middle of the city in 5 minutes from the appartment. After walking 15-20 minutes you reach the old town and the Royal palace. Most of the museums are situated in the city centre. There is several subway stations close to the appartment.
access: Internet, maps over the city, Guide books, hair dryer, some toys, TV, radio, Just ask me and I will try to provide whatever you need :)
interaction: I will meet you when you arrive and if you like I can pick you up at the central station with my car on arrival. You will have the whole appartment to yourselfe. I will provide you with a map and make a folder where you find the information you need about the appartment and about the city and the neighborhood.
house_rules: No party is allowed and please no smoking. You have to be reasonably quite after 22:00. Do not leave garbage outside the entrance door. You cannot allow more people to stay in the apartment than expressly authorised, nor can you change the makeup of the party during your stay in the apartment.   You agree to keep and leave the apartment in good condition.  Wash up dirty dishes, take away garbage and empty the fridge and freezer Final cleaning fee is an option (500 sek). If you choose not to pay for final cleaning, you are expected to vacumclean the floors, remove the bedsheets, and  to clean the bathroom and separate toilet.  You agree to take all necessary steps to safeguard your personal property. No liability to you is accepted in respect of damage to or loss of such property, except where the damage or loss is caused by our negligence. You agree to ensure that each member of your party is covered by comprehensive travel insurance (including cancellation, flight delays, loss and dam
host_about: I´m a painting conservator working in Stockholm. I am married and have two children (12 and 9 years). I like to travel, to sew, to read and to listen to the Swedish public service radio. I am addicted to vintage-shopping and there are several good vintage shops close to my home (I will make a map for you if you are interested). I enjoy to live in one of the worlds most beautiful cities - Stockholm. The city is easy and safe to visit and the many museums and cafes are nice to visit. Swedish people are friendly. I enjoy this city and so will you!

I'm a easy going person and think that life is a gift. I intend to take every day and every chains as it is the last one. I enjoy meeting people from all over the world and travel by myself a lot. Cities, beaches, djungle, mountains etc. Every place is a new experience. Working as a bar and restaurant manager and love food, good wine, beers and a nice cocktail. My friends think I'm a beer geek, which probably is true.. Traveling around the world gives you the opportunity to meet different cultures and different food. 

Don't take life to seriously. 
It's not like you going to get out a live anyway..

name: Great location with balcony
summary: Renovated, charming, spacious apartment in building from 1920's with all amenities and balcony. Centrally located, close to shops, restaurants, green areas and public transport.
space: Welcome to our home! We love to share our beloved apartment in the summertime when we are at our summerhouse. We hope you will like it as much as we do! Spacious 85 sqm apartment with 2 bedrooms in trendy Södermalm.  This 2-bedroom apartment is situated in an early 1920s building with all the charm from the era, parquet floor, high ceiling and nice details. It ideally fits two adults and 2-3 kids of any age, but can without problem host up to six adults.  There is on king size bed (180 cm) in the master bedroom. In the other bedroom there is a bunkbed fit for grownups with a wide lower bed (120 cm) and a standard upper bed (90 cm). Both with extra mattresses for extra comfort.  We can also put in an extra folded bed in the same room plus there's also a big sofa. We will of course provide towels, bedsheets, detergent and other basic stuff you'd expect in an apartment! Lots of toys available for the younger kids if needed. All modern amenities that you need, such as dishwasher and washin

Welcome to our home! We love to share our beloved apartment in the summertime when we are at our summerhouse. We hope you will like it as much as we do! neighborhood_overview: Very popular and lively area. Lots of trendy shops and restaurants. 150 meters to subway. Close to park and water (Tantolunden). 3 subwaystops to city center. Lots of independent fashion and interior design stores, such as Our Legacy, Nitty Gritty, L'Homme Rouge, NN07, Brandstationen, Herr Judit etc. Also a lot of nice restaurants, bars and cafes.
transit: 150 meters to the subway, and maybe 30 meters to closest busstop.  From Stockholm Arlanda Airport, just take the express train to Stockholm Central Station, and then take the subway 3 stops.
house_rules: Have a great time, you are on vacation. Just respect our stuff and the neighbours, and smoke on the balcony. :)
host_about:
My name is Louis, and I live together with my wife Josefin and 2 kids, Edward and Iselin.
We are a family who like to share our beloved hometown with out of town guests!

We both have a big interest in music, film and photography, both privately and in our professional life. We look forward to have you as our guests! :)

name: Charming 4-bedroom apt Sthlm City
summary: Gourgeous apt 5 min walking distance from Central Station/Express train to Arlanda airport/Metro.  Close to all that happens in Stockholm - still calm area.  160 m². Huge kitchen, 2 bathrooms (shower/tub), 2 WC.  4 bedrooms. Free Internet.
space: Our apartment is a typical 1920's apartment.  It’s airy with old charm and the ceiling is high. The apartment is completely renovated. It has a fireplace in the library, kitchen with modern conveniences and two bathrooms with toilets in both. One bedroom has a balcony facing the courtyard and a 160 cm wide double bed. Two bedrooms have 120 cm wide beds and the nursery has bunk beds, 90 cm wide. From the living room there is a small balcony with sun from morning to early evening. On the balcony it is possible to smoke. Inside the apartment, smoking is however not allowed. The kitchen is spacious with comfortable seating for at least eight people. We usually recommend the apartment for six people, though. Stockholm is nice to go cycling and if you wish you can use our bicycles. Cars can be parked on the street outside. Summertime there is plenty of space for cars.
description: Gourgeous apt 5 min walking distance from Central Station/Express train to Arlanda airport/Metro.  Close to all that happens in Stockholm - still calm area.  160 m². One bedroom has a balcony facing the courtyard and a 160 cm wide double bed. Two bedrooms have 120 cm wide beds and the nursery has bunk beds, 90 cm wide. The kitchen is spacious with comfortable seating for at least eight people. We usually recommend the apartment for six people, though. Stockholm is nice to go cycling and if you wish
neighborhood_overview: This part of Stockholm is called lower Norrmalm. It is the most central area in Stockholm, possible to live undisturbed and still just a stone’s throw from restaurants, bars, coffee shops, theatres and shopping. It’s a five minutes walk to Kungsgatan, Sveavägen and Drottninggatan, three of the major arteries through Stockholm. It is also close to several parks and museums, such as the Strindberg Museum in the "Blue Tower". It's walking distance to the Old Town, the medieval part of Stockholm with the Royal Castle and a lot of shopping. 200 meters away, at Norra Bantorget, there is a huge outdoor terrace in summer with restaurants and bars. A nice place for evening hangouts.   And don't miss the chance to experience the archipelago. There are fantastic opportunities to make a day trip around the beautiful water landscape of Stockholm by boat. Or spend an evening on one of the old steamboats that also offers an excellent dinner in their traditional dining rooms while you can watch the St
notes: We always give our guests a compilation of hints that can be of use. There are suggestions for restaurants we like as well as attractions in the surroundings - museums, architecture, recreation etc. But also web pages that give good suggestions for activities. And if you from any reason should be in need of medical treatment, you will find information on how to get in touch with a doctor.
transit: Easiest way to get around in Stockholm is to walk, bike or take a bus or the subway. There are several buses just two minutes away that, among others, will take you directly to the archipelago boats, to the famous museum of contemporary art, to the Wasa ship museum or to Djurgården, the green recreation area. Taxi works as well, of course, but it is important to use one of the major taxi companies. There are some "rogue taxis" that try to rip off tourists with expensive trips in the city as well as from the airport. The fastest way to go from the airport is the train, Arlanda Express. It will take 20 minutes to the Central Station. From there it’s a five minutes walk to the apartment. If you wish, you can borrow bicycles from us. And if you bring a car, it can be parked on the street outside our house. In summertime it is plenty of space.
access: We have a well-equipped kitchen with modern household appliances. Inductionrange, microwave and dishwasher.  Television is available in two of the bedrooms, in the living room and in the kitchen. Our international channel is BBC World. There is Wi-Fi and free Internet connection. Towels and bed linen are included in the rent as well as basic products such as shampoo, dish soap, paper towels, spices, etc . There is also a washing machine, free to use.
interaction: We meet guests on arrival, for information about practical details; delivery of keys etc. We can also be reached by phone if something should happen or if it just involves a piece of information.
house_rules: We have no rules other than that we appreciate our guests taking care of our home in the best way during their time with us. Look after what is here and take into account that it is a private home and not a place for partying. We have great neighbours and would like them to remain happy and not disturbed by late nightlife. We don’t allow pets, due to the fact that a lot of people can be allergic and smoking is not allowed inhouse, but possible on the balconies.
host_about:
We are a family of five, with three children still living at home.
We have an appartment in Stockholm City Centre and one summerhouse in the Stockholm archipelago. 
We let them both now and then, due to our own needs. 

We have very simple rules for our guests. 
Of respect to neighbours that easily can get disturbed - please no parties! 
And after 22.00 - keep sound on a low level.
Normal noise from a family is of course acceptable. 
And these are private homes - so please be careful with estate as well as movables.
If you wish, of course you can read books and papers, watch TV and films, play games etc. etc.

If this sounds OK - you are very welcome!

name: Room 18 minutes from the city.

space: The room is equipped with the Essentials: A 120 cm wide bed, a large closet, a small desk and a chair.

Shops, gyms and transportation is 2-3 minutes walk from the house. The room is equipped with the Essentials: A 120 cm wide bed, a large closet, a small desk and a chair. Guests will have acces to, except for the room itself, a small toiliet just outside the room. For showers you can share our bathroom down the hall. The kitchen is avaliable for breakfast. To get to Högdalen´s subway station you walk for 4-5 minutes from the apartment. The subway takes 12 minutes to Skanstull and 18 minutes to the Centralstation.  In Högdalen center you also have buses connecting you to different parts of Southern Stockholm. For example, the bus to Stockholmsmässan /Stockholm Exhibition) in Älvsjö is just a 10 minute bus ride away.

notes: Airport transfers can be arranged at certain hours per day for an additional sum of 500 SEK. If it's a desire please ask before making any reservations.

The shopping street Drottninggatan (Queen street) is nearby, about 10 minutes walking. There is also a very big Supermarket which is located 4 minutes away. The airport bus stops at St Eriksplan and the Arlanda express train stops at Vasagatan, both are near to the apartment.

neighborhood_overview: The location on Östermalm allows for easy access to Stureplan and the center. Just behind KTH you will find the large green area Liljansskogen connected to Djurgården offering lovely walks. You are also a couple of minutes away from vibrant Vastastan, Odengatan and its restaurants and shops. In the evening there a some good restaurants  just down on the street for affordable and good take out food as well as night open convenience stores.
transit: A range of public transport nearby the house, the subway red line, (a two minute ride away from T-centralen and Gamla stan) buses going all over the city and outside, the commuter train Roslagsbanan and Östra Station. You can also easily walk down to the center in 10-15 minutes.

name: Charmigt hus 10 min från Centrum
summary: Från mitt charmiga hus tar ni er lika snabbt till Stockholms city som till badsjöar och Drottningholms slott. När ni inte vill upptäcka Stockholms fina kvällsliv kan ni njuta i den mysiga trädgården. Nära tunnelbana som tar 10 min till innerstaden.
space: Från mitt charmig hus tar ni er lika snabbt till Stockholms city som till badsjöar och Drottningholms slott. När ni inte vill upptäcka Stockholms fina kvällsliv kan ni njuta i den mysiga trädgården. Nära tunnelbana som tar 10 min till innerstaden.  Huset ligger i mycket fina och gröna omgivningar nära flera badsjöar. Nära till affärer, lekparker, annan service och restauranger. Huset är ljust och alla bekvämligheter finns. Grill finns i trädgården. Gästerna får full tillgång till hela huset. Värden bor inte i huset. Grannskapet är lugnt. Flera naturområden med promenadstigar och löpspår finns i närheten. Likaså badsjöar. Det är nära till flera lekparker.  Drottningsholms slottspark ligger endast några kilometer iväg. Likaså Solvalla för den travintresserade.  Det tar 6-7 minuter att gå till tunnelbanan som tar cirka 10 minuter in till centrala Stockholm.

name: Central and comfortable 1BR apt
summary: A clean and convenient apartment located in Gärdet, area is calm and nice with 10 minute walk to shopping! Walk everywhere!  Subway, buses that run 24/7 outside building and taxis just around the corner.
space: 1BR tastefully decorated, perfect for a couple, small family or friends and fully equipped.
description: A clean and convenient apartment located in Gärdet, area is calm and nice with 10 minute walk to shopping! Walk everywhere!  Subway, buses that run 24/7 outside building and taxis just around the corner. 1BR tastefully decorated, perfect for a couple, small family or friends and fully equipped. You will have access to everything the apartment has to offer; high speed wifi, fully equipped kitchen, bath tub, great sound system speakers that you can connect to your phone or computer (we have pretty chilled neighbors, so feel free to listen to music! Within reason of course :) We do NOT have a TV, go out an live! (we do have a projector you can hook up to your computer with great sound system) Clean towels, bed sheets, there's a communal laundry room in the building that's free of charge and easy to book and use. Depending on if we're traveling or not we'll be available to meet you upon arrival, either way we will make sure to be very easy to get hold of, in case you wonder anything. We ca
neighborhood_overview: Gärdet is a part of Stockholm east and northeast of Östermalm. It is renowned for its large number of modernist apartments and the closeness to museums and a lot of film studios and the office of the Swedish film institute.  The immediate area is mainly residential and a few blocks away you can find all it has to offer. It's calm but not boring; you can access a popular field behind the building, it's packed during the summer with sunbathers, joggers and kids running around with ice cream. On one side of the building you're a 5 minute walk to Djurgården (museums, scenery, nature, water) and the other side a 10 walk to shopping centre Fältöversten and 5 minutes from Fältöversten you're at Stureplan with a great night life and shopping.  On our street you have a couple of restaurants, great nature to jog in, grocery stores etc.
notes: We love pets - but some pets are unfortunately not allowed due to allergies. Please contact us if you want to bring your pet.
transit: Situated in the heart of the city, all destinations are easily reached by close communications or promenades. Bus runs 24h all week and metro from early morning to late night and 24h during weekends.  Subway station 5 min walk and buses for all destinations stop outside the building. Easiest and cheapest way to get to and from Arlanda airport is to take "Flygbussarna" (airport shuttle) and getting off at the Liljeholmen stop where you access the subway line "röda linjen" towards Ropsten and get off at Gärdet. If you're traveling in a company of 3 the easiest and cheapest then will actually be a taxi. I'll sort you with details once you've booked. Simply put: there's a lot of communication depending on where you're going. I will give you further details once you've booked our apartment. * Also beware that taxi companies operate under no regulation in Sweden, meaning there is a lot of scamming and overcharging going on if you're not careful. I can suggest reliable companies for you, thou
access: You will have access to everything the apartment has to offer; high speed wifi, fully equipped kitchen, bath tub, great sound system speakers that you can connect to your phone or computer (we have pretty chilled neighbors, so feel free to listen to music! Within reason of course :) We do NOT have a TV, go out an live! (we do have a projector you can hook up to your computer with great sound system) Clean towels, bed sheets, there's a communal laundry room in the building that's free of charge and easy to book and use.
interaction: Depending on if we're traveling or not we'll be available to meet you upon arrival, either way we will make sure to be very easy to get hold of, in case you wonder anything. We can arrange recommendations for restaurants, bars, museums, shopping, nightclubs etc, just ask and we'll sort you out :)
house_rules: Treat our lovely home as if your own :)
host_about:
Stockholm, Sweden
Sales Manager Levi's
Well traveled, social, happy and love music.
Speaks English, German and a bit of French.

name: Stockholm, SOFO; near Old Town.
summary: Our friendly and bright apartement is 106 m2 in a house built 1927 in Sofo/Stockholm. The apartement is filled with old original details. Our area is filled with coffeshops, artgalleries, small restaurants, beatiful parcs and easy going people.
space: A beatiful old apartement (106 m2) in a friendly and trendy area in the heart of Stockholm/Södermalm. The building is from 1927 and there is lots of old and beatiful details in the apartement. The flat has four  and half rooms and a balcony. There is two real bedrooms but the space is big so you could decide a bit by yourself how you prefer to sleep, We also have a small junior bed. Around the house you have lots of local buses and subways close by. The building is surrounded by beatiful parcs, coffe shops, small boutiques, galleries, simple and fancy restaurants. We live on the third floor with a great wiew over lots off threes. Close to everything in the best part of Stockholm!' If you have children their is toys to play with.

neighborhood_overview: Calm, safe area. Parcs, restaurants, buses, subways, food stores, coffe shops, cinema, churches and much more! Friendly and trendy. Lot's of artists. Good for children as well with many parcs close by. Fancy restaurants and cheap restaurants very close by. A very nice bar/restaurant in our building. If you are in to jogging you can run in the beatiful parcs all around or by the water 5 minutes walk away. There is also an outdoor swimingpool and outdoor gym 15 minutes walk away.
notes: You can go on a free boats to the great area Hammarby Sjöstad (10 minutes walk to the boat) There is huge outdoors swimingpools and training 15 minutes walk away. There is a mingolf across the street etc etc!
transit: 2 minutes to several buses that will bring you to the city heart, the Old Town, boats in 10 minutes. Subways are a 5 minut walk from the apartment
access: Wifi, washingmachine, light, space, beatiful wiew from the apartment. Nice evening sun on the balcony..
interaction: We'll do our very best to make your stay a good experience.
house_rules: No smoking or animals in the apartement. We really care about our neighbours so no loud music. Things can break, if they do try to replace it with something simular. Please don't wear shoes inside the apartement. Enjoy Stockholm's beauty!
host_about:
We are a little family living in Stockholm/Sweden.
Our son is 12 years old and our daughter 4 years old.

We work with arts (film/writing/music) and love to travel.
During the last years we have had very good experiences in
renting out our apartment and renting other peoples places on airbnb.
What a great site!!!!

We think we are easy people top deal with and we'll try to help you as much as we can so you'll have  a nice stay in Stockholm.

Best regards!

Philo, Lars and the kids

name: Big charming retro style room
summary: Set in a quiet neighbourhood in Södermalm Stockholm, this comfortable flat is perfect for a single traveller or a couple.  Around the corner is the bohemian SoFo district. Walking distance to great shopping, galleries, beautiful parks and Shul.
space: My lovely spacious room is perfect for a single traveller or a couple. It is furnished with a mix of Swedish vintage and retro furniture. The apartment  also consists of a big kitchen,  a hallway ,a bathroom with shower and toilet, and a big  room/bedroom with a single/double bed solution, a sofa/couch. I'm not at home summertime, so you will have the flat all to yourself june/july 2016. My kids will not be around when I have airbnb guests:)
description: Set in a quiet neighbourhood in Södermalm Stockholm, this comfortable flat is perfect for a single traveller or a couple.  Around the corner is the bohemian SoFo district. Walking distance to great shopping, galleries, beautiful parks and Shul.
neighborhood_overview: Located in a calm and peaceful neighbourhood, only a few minutes walk to an outdoor swimming pool,  many lovely parks, plenty of  fun shopping and of course Stockholms pulsating night life. Walking distance to  the many art galleries on Hornsgatan, a multitude of bars and restaurant in all price ranges, the Old Town and the Royal Palace.
notes: Summertime the guest will have the whole house to him/herself. Since I will be visiting family, me and the kids won't be staying in the house, Holiday times:)
transit: You also have easy access to numerous communications: - Subway station  - Inner city buses  - City buses  - “Stockholms Södra Station”, the train and commuter station with easy transport to north of Stockholm (i.e. Uppsala) and south of Stockholm (i.e. Nynäshamn and Älsvjö/“Stockholmsmässan”, the Stockholm International Fairs and Congress Centre)
access: - Heating, water and electricity  -  Wi-Fi - Fully equipped kitchen with seating for up to 4 people - Bed linen and towels  - Iron and ironing board  - Bathroom with bath tub/shower
interaction: I will meet guests upon arrival, if I am not available  to do so because of work, my cousin will do the meet and greeting!
house_rules: No smoking  No pets No loud music  No pork/meat or seafood in the house  and Leave the Place like you found it!
host_about: I have lived in my lovely house for more than 20 years. Excellent neighbours and  beautiful surroundings. It has been a comfortable place to return to between my many travels all over the World. I lived in South Africa and India for quite a few years, so I know from own experience what makes for a comfortable stay in a foreign place. I love to meet new people and  I work in the service industry. Diversity and Tolerance of differences are important concepts to me.  I love travelling, watching movies go to fleamarkets, eating spicy food and hangout with my friends. I am fluent in English, know  some German and French and understand basic Hebrew.

name: 2 rooms, top floor, beautiful view!
summary: This fully equipped two room apartment is located on a hill in one of Södermalm's most beautiful and trendy areas. The view over Stockholm from the balcony is stunning. Bars, restaurants, shopping are close by as well as green parks and water.
space: The apartment is 52 m2 has two rooms (bed room and living room), a fully equipped kitchen as well as a bathroom and a fantastic balcony with and amazing view over Stockholm. There is one bed for two persons (1,60 m wide) and two extra beds for additional persons. A nice little garden belongs to the housing association with barbeque possibilities
description: This fully equipped two room apartment is located on a hill in one of Södermalm's most beautiful and trendy areas. The view over Stockholm from the balcony is stunning. Bars, restaurants, shopping are close by as well as green parks and water.
neighborhood_overview: Södermalm is a very nice part of Stockholm with a great blend of green areas, water and city life. From the apartment there is walking distance to Tantolunden, Långholmen and Reimers holme where there are bathing possibilities and lovely running/walking paths. Several nice bars, coffee places and restaurants are close by as well as food (Coop, Hemköp, ICA) and liquor stores (Systembolaget).
notes: NN
transit: It takes five minutes to get to the metro which will take you to the city center in six minutes. There are also busses within five minutes walking distance and commuter train 15 minutes away. A journy planner is available online, please visit(website hidden)!ajax=yes!&
access: You will have access to the whole apartment. Towels, sheets, blankets and pillows for 4 persons will be included. There are shared washing facilities available in the basement.
interaction: If urgent, I preferably interact by text messages (phone). I will not be in the apartment when let out.
house_rules: No partying till late night is allowed. Please respect my neighbors and take care of my apartment as if it was your own.  The kitchen fan has to be turned off when not in use. The kitchen fan can also be used to ventilate the bathroom after showering. Please, do that.  Smoking is not allowed, neither are pets. We have waste sorting in the basement of the opposite building (plastic, glass, metal, paper board) combustible waste should be thrown in the yellow waste bins just outside of the yard and newspaper waste in the yellow bins placed on the yard.

name: Seaview from a flat close to city
summary: Min ljusa lägenhet ligger precis vid Mälaren och ett naturreservat. Ta ett morgondopp och åk sedan tunnelbanan i 20 minuter för att nå Stockholms centrum, som har allt: shopping, restauranger, kulturliv och nattliv!
space: A welcoming, newly built and comfortable flat, right by the sea, but still close to the subway and to the center of Stockholm. And if you rent this place you will also get two lovely cats! That's why the rent is quite low – they need food and their toilet box need to be taken care of now and then.  This cozy flat is located in Bromma, in a calm and quiet area just by the sea. Start the day with a walk in the forest or a swim in the sea. There are a grocery shop nearby, and you have the subway that takes you to the center of Stockholm within fifteen minutes.  Stroll around in the Old town, have nice meals at restaurants, and enjoy the beautiful city of Stockholm. And when you're back in the apartment, you have big barbecues just outside if you want to prepare a dinner outside. There is also furnitures outside. Modern kitchen with everything you need. Two bedrooms and a big bed sofa in the living room.  Free WiFi and cable TV  One bathroom with bathtub 1 bed, that is 140 cm.  1 bed, 80 c

name: Spacious villa, close to Stockholm center
summary: The spacious villa from 1915 is build in romantic style. The living area is open and designed for welcoming friends. A fully equipped kitchen with lounge and bar a big dining room, and cosy TV room makes an unique opportunity for a stay in Stockholm. 4 bedrooms with total 7 beds. The villa is personal and beautiful decorated.

An outdoor kitchen with barbecue beside the pool. Just outside the center of Stockholm and close to natural beach in the lake Mälaren.

Just outside the center of Stockholm and close to natural beach in the lake Mälaren. Entrance floor: A big and fully equipment kitchen with fireplace. Lounge with piano and dining room for up to 15 persons also with a fireplace. TV room. Second floor: Master bedroom with double bed and walk in closet. Guest room with 160 cm bed and baby-bed . Guest room with 140 cm bed. Atic: Bedroom with a double bed. You will have the house and the poolside
neighborhood_overview: Äppelviken is the oldest part of Bromma, from around 1915. All houses are build in the same period and are big and beautiful. The houses are surrounded by beautiful gardens. It's close to the center of Stockholm, but the surrounding are perfect for long walks and swimming in the lake Mälaren.
notes: The standard of the villa is high and it's decorated in a classic way. Spacious and beautiful villa from 1915 with 4 bedrooms, kitchen and dining room with fireplace. Heated swimming pool and sauna with outdoor shower. Just outside the center of Stockholm and close to natural beach in the lake Mälaren.
transit: It is 5 minutes to the tram or you can walk 10 minutes to the subway in Alvik. The subway takes 20 minutes to Central Station. You can rent bikes in Alvik and ride into the city in about 30 minutes. On the street outside our house there is parking available but you need to buy a ticket.
access: Entrance floor: A big and fully equipment kitchen with fireplace. Lounge with piano and dining room for up to 15 persons also with a fireplace. TV room. Second floor: Master bedroom with double bed and walk in closet. Guest room with 160 cm bed and baby-bed . Guest room with 140 cm bed. Atic: Bedroom with a double bed.
interaction: You will have the house and the poolside for yourselves. We have a permanent lease taker in the basement that might be at home but they live separately from us.
house_rules: We'd like our guests to really live and use our house and home. It's our absolute goal that you will love to stay here and really enjoy visiting Stockholm. Nevertheless we need the guest to respect that they are living in our home. To make it comfortable for the guests we will remove some personal belongings. Due to allergiker we can't allow pets in the house, sorry for that, we love dogs.

name: 2 BR city apartment, 2 balconies
summary: The 3,5 room flat is situated in a house built 1880. The location, Vasastan, is a very popular area in central Stockholm – it is a vibrant, trendy and relaxed part, with lots of green park areas, bars and cafés, playgrounds and bout
space: The 89 square meters, 3,5 room flat is situated in a house built 1880. The apartment has modern high standard combined with details typical for 1880 such as high ceilings, deep windows etc. It is located in the courtyard house meaning it is very quiet. The apartment is situated on floor 3 of 4, the building has an elevator. You will have access to both our balconies – one with morning and midday sun and one with afternoon sun. Both equipped with nice chairs (one of them has sunbeds) and small tables for your munchies. In the green courtyard you find BBQ facilities and a sitting area.

neighborhood_overview: The location, Vasastan, is a very popular area in central Stockholm – it is a vibrant, trendy and relaxed part, with lots of green park areas, bars and cafés, playgrounds and boutiques. You reach the Stockholm city center in 20 minutes by foot, five minutes by tube or ten minutes by bus.
notes: Before booking: please contact us and describe yours stay and your company.  We prefer guests with longer stays. Minimum stay four days. Our guests need to be over the age of 25 (as long as they are not children).
transit: * 1 minute to closest subway station * 10 minutes from main nightlife area * 5 minutes from main shopping street
access: Facts about the apartment •Hallway with lots of hangers. Exit to balcony. Security door. •Living room - big screen TV including basic cable channels a sofa for four people and a dining area for approx. 8.  •Kitchen with dishwasher, microwave etc. •Two bedrooms  One master bedroom with double bed (“Hästens” brand). Exit to larger balcony. One room with bunk bed (90cm)  •One smaller toilet •One bathroom with bathtub •Wooden floors in all rooms except toilet and bathroom which have heated tile floors •Laundry facilities in apartment. •Free Wi/Fi, 100 MB internet. Wireless: Information upon arrival. •Smoking is allowed on the balconies but not inside the apartment. •Bicycles can be arranged to borrow if there is interest in that. The same with pushchair. •If desired, linen and towels can be served for.  •As we have children, there are one high chair, one crib and one changing table available. There are cats in the household (away at your stay of course). Feel free to use everything in our
interaction: We are of course willing to help you with recommendations of what to do and were to go. We assure that you will feel most welcome on your trip to the great capital of Sweden and to our very nice apartment.
house_rules: This probably goes without saying, but this is our home and not a hotel. We have a strict no illegal drugs, no loud music/TV and no party policy. We like to keep the noise level to a minimum as we care about our neighbors. And never leave the apartment without ensuring that the door is locked. If in need there are smoke alarms and an extinguisher. We keep a very clean apartment, and we would love for our guests to be respectful to that. Please keep it as clean as possible and please be respectful of our personal belongings. And as typical swedes we have a no-shoe policy. Keys/check in/out: The check in time is agreed on individually according to arrival. We will meet you at the apartment, give you the key and show you how everything works. The checkout time is 11:00 in the morning, unless otherwise agreed. Someone will meet you in the apartment and get the keys from you. ENJOY YOUR STAY!
host_about: Thirty-something, mother of two daughters, five and two years old. Married to high school sweet heart. Professionally working with internal communications. Interested in vintage and second hand. A lot of time is spent in our cottage in the northern Stockholm archipelago.

name: Amazing flat in central Stockholm
summary: My amazing top floor flat with period features is situated in central Stockholm with walking distance to basically everywhere. Quiet street and lots of restaurants nearby, less than 5 minutes to the tube. Check it out!
space: This cool 65 sqm apartment is situated in the heart of inner-city area Vasastan.  Five large windows gives this top floor flat plenty of light all day. It's located about 5 minutes walk from tube stations Odenplan, Radmansgatan and Central Station.  There is one bedroom with a really comfy king size bed, the sofa is surprisingly comfy as well. The living room is large with a big sofa and armchairs. A dining table that can seat 6 persons. Flat screen TV and Hi-Fi stereo with Apple Airplay. 100 Mbit Internet with WiFI in the whole apartment. The kitchen is equipped with a gas stove, microwave and dishwasher and everything else you need. Bed linens and towels are included. Bathroom with shower, communal washing machine is available in the basement.  The landlord request a refundable security deposit of 3000 SEK for the apartment. No smoking or shoes inside the apartment. Cleaning is available.

notes: Do not expect be pick up you at the metro near to my house. PRINT the map and my address how to get to my house bf you leave home, please come direct to  my door. transit: Some more information: From the Arlanda airport to Central Stockholm - you can choose bus or Arlanda Express High speed train to/from Stockholm Arlanda Airport  takes only 20 minutes check out the Arlanda Express website for buy your tickets and more info. Buses operate to/from Arlanda Airport to the City Terminal near the Central Station in Stockholm about every 10 min throughout the day. The journey takes around 45 min  Save your time book tickets online and print it. From: Stockholm Skavsta Airport Airport buses link all Ryanair arrivals/departures at Stockholm (Skavsta) Airport with the Stockholm City Terminal. Journey time: 1hr 10min.  Save your time book tickets online and print it. Free WiFi for guests is very common in cafes in Stockholm. For example coffee chains like Waynes Coffee, Espresso House and Pressbyrån, Mcdonalds check visitstockholm the official guide for more inform.

Please you do not come home drunk, or anything like this, do not drink at home because the smell please. Please do not take any drugs or even medication that can change your behavior or personality. If you speak or walk around when you sleep, please get your own private room,  high farts in the bed while sleep, need respiration mask while sleep, noises in the bed. If you know you are a person with special needs, get your own room at the hostel. These things will not be acceptable, and I will be ask you to leave to a hostel. You are a very respectful, serious and clean after you, calm and discrete person to a family environment.
host_about:
Bonjour,
I love to travel,  meet new people. I used to travel a lot before and share the room with friends (boys and girls) so I am use to share with people. 
So it’s important for me that you also is use to share. Special if you a guy you use to share with females.  

I  also like fashion and arts. 
Right now I  a mom have my little family and take care my baby.  I travel to Sweden as often I can. I am also finish my master degree in technology of  media and graphic design,  so I studying most online. Also I studied language science in the Stockholm University. 
I like things to be clean and organized.

summary: Great location in Stockholm, (Kungsholmen) by the water and the popular bay walk, this is ideal for vacation or business. space: Located on Kungsholmen and the prestigious adress "Norr Mälarstrand". The house is a 7 story newly renovated building and our condo is also newly renovated. neighborhood_overview: Vasastan is mostly a residential area, just north of the central business district in Stockholm. In the middle of the area, and just around the corner from the apartment, is the green and always busy Vasa Park. Here couples will have pick nicks, Kids will play soccer (or hockey in the winter), and you can always find something interesting in the antiques stores surrounding the park. A good "fika" is always available in the many cafés in the area, and many of Stockholm's hottest restaurants are located in the area.
transit: The apartment is located very close to Sankt Eriksplan where you can catch several buses and the subway, The central station is only 15 minutes walk away, and Karlbergs commuter train station is just five minutes from the apartment. A stroll to the central business district will take you some 20 minutes.
access: Smoking in the apartment is forbidden.
interaction: We will meet up with you at arrival and give you the key and show you to the apartment. If we are out of town, a friend will meet up and take care of you.

space: Spacious, newly refurbished, cosy apartment in top location. If you'd like to have some of Stockholm's best Indian food, grab a beer and some grub at a mexican style taqueria or sip coffee at a local french bistro, it is all available closer than two blocks from the apartment. The wider area around Hornstull is the trendiest part of Stockholm with unmatched variety of restaurants, cafés, bars and nightclubs. Dont miss the food truck festival at Hornstull's Strand on Sundays in the summer!

name: Historic house in central Stockholm
summary: A one of a kind historic country house located on the island of Djurgården, the Royal central park of Stockholm. A quiet exclusive getaway, yet only 20 minutes by transportation, to the core of the city. Enjoy walks, the nature and the ocean view.
space: The house is an old historic house, recently remodelled, finished in 2014. Close to town, yet out in the country at the same time. Perfect for small families and older couples, or just people who enjoy an active life in nature. Lots of walking trails close off just out the door.  The house is only available for 7 days or more.
description: A one of a kind historic country house located on the island of Djurgården, the Royal central park of Stockholm. Private garden with sun deck, bbq and trampoline Modern luxury kitchen Rustic country style living Old refurbished cast iron bath tub Open fireplace  Price include towels, schampoo and cleaning upon departure I will always be available by phone, or mail at worst if not around. Should i be out of town, you will be given contact information in case of emergency. Djurgården is awesome. The "Kings Island" is known for it´s
neighborhood_overview: Djurgården is awesome. The "Kings Island" is known for it´s nature and walking trails along the shoreline. here you will find great restaurants, bars and cafes as well as the city zoo Skansen, the amusement park Gröna Lund, museums and many other famous attractions. There is something for everyone.
notes: For those who might be allergic to animals, we have two small dogs living in the house.  In general we do not accept pets, but should you have a small dog, we can accept this for an additional separate deposit. The open fireplace may not be used May- Sept, as it is then too warm outside for the chimney to work properly.
transit: 3 minutes to the local bus line 69. It passes Djurgårdsbron where you can access the tram, then continues on beautiful high street Strandvägen, continuing into the city´s high end shopping district. Should you get bored of the local surroundings, we recommend a trip into Old Town, area around Stureplan or Södermalm, for shopping, bars and restaurants. It takes 25 minutes to/ from T-Centralen, where you have connections to the city´s subway system, as well as Arlanda Express.  Taxi straight to/ from Arlanda takes about 55minutes. We recommend Taxi Stockholm for this.

interaction: I will always be available by phone, or mail at worst if not around. Should i be out of town, you will be given contact information in case of emergency.

The house is located in a reclusive residence neighbourhood, who all live close to each other, so please respect our neighbours and keep volume down to a respectable level. Parties are not allowed.
host_about: Im a family man, love cooking, music and movies, hanging out with my family and two dogs. Love travelling and enjoying good times with friends.

I live with my husband and three daughters in the beautiful city of Stockholm in Sweden.

We are open minded and like getting to know people, to interact with them. But we also like our privacy and respect others. My husband and I are known as a fun and generous couple. We both enjoy music, movies and arts, and my husband really loves cooking (which I enjoy eating!). Our daughters are really sweet and social, curious about meeting new and friendly people.

We also love traveling, and have used airbnb many times during our stays around the world!

name: Rooftop Apartment with Amazing View
summary: A unique penthouse apartment right in the heart of Stockholm, just a 5 minute walk from central station. Featuring a 23m² terrace, from where you have a skyline view of the entire city. Ideal place to experience all of what Stockholm has to offer.  Awnings, infra-red heating and dining+couch available on the terrace.
space: The flat is 70 m², featuring a 23 m² balcony. Not visible in the photos is: a 46' Samsung TV, new sofa, wardrobe and a large double bed (180X220cm).  Please note that all the furniture you see in the livingroom have been replaced with new modern furniture, including the bed.

You will be staying in on
neighborhood_overview: Just a 5 minute walk from central station. Most of Stockholm’s attractions are at walking distance from here. You will be staying in one of the trendiest neighbourhoods in town. Renowned restaurants, bakeries, grocery stores, gyms and parks are just around corner. The famous street of Rörstrandsgatan, a few minutes away, is said to have the most restaurants per meter in Stockholm. You'll be living one block away from where there the famous author August Strindberg had his apartment on Drottninggatan.  Just north of the bustling city centre, Vasastan/Birkastan is a relaxed neighbourhood with a healthy smattering of great restaurants, cafés, bars, galleries and shops. Experience the Swedish “fika” tradition at one of the many excellent cafés, and grab your dose of green at Vasaparken (The Vasa Park). Ask anyone working on Rörstrandsgatan in Birkastan and they’ll tell you that the street has a distinct European flair, which is why it has earned the nickname “Little Paris” after the restau
notes: You will find all the necessary info such as passwords etc. in a handwritten manual in the apartment. For those who want to be active, I can recommend:  - A walk in the Haga Park  - A bike ride around Kungsholmen  - A swim at Hornsbergs Strand  - A walk to Djurgården and visit the Gröna Lund, Rosendal and Museums
transit: 5-8 minutes walking distance from T-Centralen, central station, to address. Nearest Metro station is: Rådmansgatan and is about 4 minutes walk distance. 2 Busses 53 & 69 are passing the flat from Central station & it's 3:d stop at Wallingatan around the corner at Dalagatan.
access: Fully equipped kitchen, balcony, washer, dish-washer, cabel TV and high speed WiFi (100mb).
interaction: I will be the one to hand you the keys upon checking in and retrieving them upon checking out. If I am away I'll make sure someone else within a block away takes care of things.

I love traveling and surfing, preferably to faraway exotic and wild places. 
Work as an online marketing professional, running a digital agency and several IT Startups.
