name: Perfect area, light and spacious.
summary: Best of Stockholm! The perfect apartment for a family or couple.  Light, cozy, peaceful flat in green area close to city. Spacious and comfortable, everything you need is two steps away. Suits 3 grownups + 3 children. (Two beds are child size.)
space: Welcome to my area and my apartment. I live in the best area Stockholm has to offer, yes really. Especially if you travel as a family. Gröndal has a lovely small town feeling and is one of Stockholms nicest and most authentic neighborhoods, but it's still only a quick walk from trendy Södermalm or a 15 min train ride to city. I could not be happier.  The flat is charming, peaceful and light. It's built in 1924 and is newly renovated and has a induction stove kitchen and a fresh bathroom with bathtub. There is one double bed (160 cm wide) and 3 children's beds (each 160 cm tall.) There is also a comfortable sofa bed in the living room where one adult can sleep. This means you can fit 3 adult sized people and 3 child sized people in the apartment. My decoration philosophy is "bohemian but clean" - My place is super cozy and a bit quirky but fresh. I want you to feel relaxed and welcomed so on your arrival the place will be tidy and fresh. There will be plenty of clean towels and tp for y
description: Best of Stockholm! The perfect apartment for a family or couple.  Light, cozy, peaceful flat in green area close to city. Spacious and comfortable, everything you need is two steps away. Suits 3 grownups + 3 children. (Two beds are child size.) Welcome to my area and my apartment. I live in the best area Stockholm has to offer, yes really. Especially if you travel as a family. Gröndal has a lovely small town feeling and is one of Stockholms nicest and most authentic neighborhoods, but it's still only a quick walk from trendy Södermalm or a 15 min train ride to city. I could not be happier.  The flat is charming, peaceful and light. It's built in 1924 and is newly renovated and has a induction stove kitchen and a fresh bathroom with bathtub. There is one double bed (160 cm wide) and 3 children's beds (each 160 cm tall.) There is also a comfortable sofa bed in the living room where one adult can sleep. This means you can fit 3 adult sized people and 3 child sized people in the apartment.
neighborhood_overview: Everything is great. Gröndal is truly the best neighbourhood. Peaceful, central, high standard, beautiful, lots of nature around. In summer you can swim in about 3 places within a ten minutes walk - two for grown ups and one beach for toddlers. Great food store next door, as well as pharmacy, deli, fast food places and bakery. If you have small kids it's a dream, playgrounds and green areas everywhere. You get to the city center in 15 minutes by a perfectly well working public transport system. ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) You can also walk to trendy Hornstull just ten minutes away, and from there you continue all over Södermalm. This area is perfectly safe and people walk everywhere.
notes: Great front yard for hanging out in the afternoon with shared tables and afternoon sun.
transit: Public transport (tram to subway and buses) is 100 meters away. You walk to Hornstull in 15 minutes and to Slussen/ Old town area in about 40. There is a convenient airport shuttle bus from Liljeholmen which is only a ten minutes walk from the house. There will most likely be bikes to rent just below my window.
access: You have acess to everything. You have a big clothes cabinet for you to use and a bathroom cabinet.  Free fast wifi. Well equipped kitchen, plenty of English books to rea and on top of it a children's room with tons of toys suitable for a 2-5 year olds. There is free parking on the street and you can go by public transport very easily, the tram stop is only 100 meters away. There will likely by a bike rental service just around the corner in summer.
interaction: I will provide you with keys and am happy to give you all the information you need. Please ask for anything particular and I'll be happy to give you recommendations or help you find what you ask for.  I will likely not be in town, so we might not meet but if so, I have good systems for providing keys. You will not be locked out. :)
house_rules: All neighbors in my house know each other (and me) quite well and we care about the house, so please behave. No indoor smoking, keep it clean, be nice.
host_about: I'm a designer and researcher living with my two small daughters in an absolutely wonderful part of town. I travel a lot to interview people all over the world and this means my apartment is free for long periods once in a while. I sincerely enjoy having guests and I try to make sure that my guests will  have the best time possible in beutiful Stockholm. I'm happy to provide tips, maps, recommendations and help out with whatever I can. I know alot about the cultural scene as well as where to go for a day trip, and I am happy to share the gems I have.

name: Urban/Nature Stockholm
summary: This is the perfect combination of nice living in a very green area, you live like in a park next to a lake, but still only ten minutes beautiful walk in the forest to the underground station. Then another ten minutes and you are in the city centre.
space: Its a really nice spacious flat with great view over Stockholm. Note: minimum stay is two nights. The lower bed is 120 cm and the top bed is 80 cm. In the nearby Liljeholmen center you have the underground, only five stops to T-Centralen, and about 50 shops and restaurants where you can find anything you need. Just cross the bridge and you are in the hip Hornstull, Södermalm with plenty of cool bars and restaurants.
description: This is the perfect combination of nice living in a very green area, you live like in a park next to a lake, but still only ten minutes beautiful walk in the forest to the underground station. Then another ten minutes and you are in the city centre. Its a really nice spacious flat with great view over Stockholm. Note: minimum stay is two nights. The lower bed is 120 cm and the top bed is 80 cm. In the nearby Liljeholmen center you have the underground, only five stops to T-Centralen, and about 50 shops and restaurants where you can find anything you need. Just cross the bridge and you are in the hip Hornstull, Södermalm with plenty of cool bars and restaurants. You can use the living room, kitchen and balcony as you feel like. Feel free to make yourself a coffee or a tea or have a juice. There is also bread, cheese, musli, yoghurt – all you need for a breakfast. There is no specific rules. Up to everyone to do as he or she please. Gröndal is in my opion very special. One of the nicest
neighborhood_overview: Gröndal is in my opion very special. One of the nicest areas in Stockholm I would say. That’s way I live here. Especillay good if you appreciate architecture and nature. But maybe the best is that you have central Stockholm just around the corner.
notes: There is some really nice “attractions” in Gröndal. Here is a list of them in my opinion. 1. Trekanten beach, just outside the house 2. Vinterviken Garden, with great ecological restaurant/café and 3. Winterviken Café, Alfred Nobels (the man who invented the Nobel price) old dynamite factory that been transformed to a top class restaurant/café with decent prices. 4. Gröndal, rocky beach that overlooking Stockholm. Great place for a picknick or just sit and read a book and enjoy the view. 5. ICA Liljeholmen. One of the best food stores in Stockholm is actually only 10 minutes walk from the house. 6. Hornstull. Nearby area with bars, rock club, and much more.  7. You can rent City Bikes in nearby Liljeholmen.
transit: 10 minutes walk to Liljeholmen underground/metro station. Then only 4-5 stops to the heart of Stockholm. Thats 10 minutes as well. Super convenient.
access: You can use the living room, kitchen and balcony as you feel like. Feel free to make yourself a coffee or a tea or have a juice. There is also bread, cheese, musli, yoghurt – all you need for a breakfast.
interaction: There is no specific rules. Up to everyone to do as he or she please.
house_rules: Note: minimum stay for one person is three nights. No smoking. No shoes indoors. You can keep your things in your room. If you need more space there is a closet in the living room that you can use.
host_about: I’m a graphic designer and enjoy meeting people from other countries. I love to travel myself and usually prefer to rent something rather than stay in a hotel. Its more fun and interesting.

name: Unique Houseboat in Stockholm city
summary: Live on-board a house boat in the middle of central Stockholm with a 35 sqm Sundeck/Terrass with beautiful views over the water of Stockholm.   The house boat is to a high standard. It is suitable for 1-2 families. Minimum 3 days rental.
space: The big sundeck gives you the possibility of socializing, bbq-ing , sunbathing, fishing or a quick dive into the blue sea from the boat! Stay in bed a little while longer in the morning and listen to the charming sound of water clucking against the boat or watch the reflection of the sun in the ceiling before the morning swim.   Enjoy a breakfast in peace with beautiful views of Stockholm. Later on in the day you can spend the afternoon enjoy a cool drink in the sun why doing some fishing, relaxing in the sun chairs or reading in the hammock.  The sundeck is exposed to sun from morning to late afternoon so it’s a perfect place to have breakfast and dinner. From the roof terrace you have a magic view over Stockholm city! The house boat is 160 sqm over two floors. Entrance floor Open layout where the hallway leads you to the modern sized kitchen/lounge. The dinner table seats up to 12 people. The lounge area has an open fire place and TV (Apple TV and DVD-player). On the entrance floor t
description: Live on-board a house boat in the middle of central Stockholm with a 35 sqm Sundeck/Terrass with beautiful views over the water of Stockholm.   The house boat is to a high standard. It is suitable for 1-2 families. Minimum 3 days rental.
neighborhood_overview: The house boat is located on the historical island of Långholmen, right in the middle of the city!  Close to Långholmen is trendy Hornstull and Södermalm. There is a huge range of restaurants, and interesting, modern stores for fashion, design, interiors and vintage. If you like fashion and design, you can definitely find something unique here! The house boat is also located close to walking/jogging paths and soccer field.
notes: Cleaning is available on request for 900 sek. Bed linen 150 sek/person and 2 extra beds for 200 sek/each can be arranged.
transit: Wherever you wish to go there are easy connections. Tunnelbanan (the tube) takes you to the T-centralen in 10 min. Flygbussarna (Airport busses) takes you to Arlanda airport in 45 min.
house_rules: No Smoking indoors and pets are not allowed.

host_about:
Hi and welcome to my ad.
The subway Axelsbergs Station is 2 minutes walk from the apartment and goes every 5 min. 15 min to centralstation. 
We have 300mb/s broadband strong wireless network.
New fresh bathroom and extra toilet and a big kitchen and fresh stdent rooms
I Mats from Sweden is a guy working part-time as a computer technician in my 
own company. I have rented out rooms for over 4 year now on Airbnb. 
And a total of 8 years by various universities and other sites like Qasa and being a host for Stockholms universitie and KTHfor long term rentals for student´s.
In average it is around 2-3 students living here.
It is a large 5 bedroom apartment at the top 8 floor. 4 minutes walk to the Lake Mälaren with nice green areas where you can walk or run along the lake or sit on the hill and watch the sunset or enjoy a barbecue on one of the barbeque facilities or have a picnic with her friends in the grass. 
Lidl low pris supermarket is 4 min away by subway u pass it on the way home.

South as it is called, and is the southern part of Stockholm with all the outdoor cafes and bars is only 8 minutes away by subway. 
There is a center in Axelsberg 1 min away with ICA foodstore supermarket and Restaurant Bar Pizzeria and with a Video Candy Store and newsagent like Seveneleven in the station and a small sushi takeaway. 
Have a nice day. 
 Best regards
Mats Liden Hägersten ( (Hidden by Airbnb) )

name: Studio with panoramic view over bustling square
summary: Our great studio with panoramic windows faces a picturesque square. Centrally located in the heart of the artistic area in Stockholm, Södermalm. Recently named the coolest neighborhood in Europe by Vogue.
space: A good living should offer comfort, a view and access to everything one might need. This studio does all that.  Just outside the door you will find the most popular cafes and restaurants and the sights are only minutes away. Old town and the castle is a 10 minutes walk. Behind the house you will find a hill with a panoramic view over the city. Especially beautiful when the sun sets, of course. Here you will definitely be able to have the ultimate Stockholm experience. Parking is easy to find close to the apartment, and it's free of charge weekdays 7 pm to 7 am and all day weekends.

Travel a lot and will n
neighborhood_overview: Bars, restaurants, opera, theaters, parks, trendy cafes, cinemas are all around the corner. Södermalm is the cultural capital of Scandinavia. Conference center Münchenbryggeriet is just behind the block, a 2 min walk.
transit: Subway a block away and busses outside the door. You can travel anywhere in the city within minutes. Subway from central station is 6 minutes. Fast train from central station to airport (Arlanda Express) is 20 minutes. From the front door to the airport is approx a half hour trip. Taxi, the most reliable fare is Taxi Stockholm, about 500 kr from Arlanda (look out for expensive copycats).
access: Wifi Wine cooler Coffee machine Iron & Iron board Please note that there are sun blinds but no blackout curtains. If one is sensitive to light summer nights I recommend a sleep mask.
interaction: Travel a lot and will not be in town when I rent out.
house_rules: Lev och njut av lägenheten så långt vettet tillåter. Jag uppskattar en ren fräsch lägenhet utan röklukt och hår, fjädrar eller annat som både djur och människa kan tänkas efterlämna. Lämna lägenheten som du fann den så blir alla glada!
host_about:
I would describe myself as a man that tries to have a normal but exciting life. Stability and routine mixed with an interesting occupation, openminded friends and lots of good food.
I like my home, but enjoy traveling for the exchange of mindsets and temperature.
I am a well organized person and so is my apartment. No difficulties or worries, everything is prepared for my guests to have a great visit.
Have a good one!

summary: Large room in a modern apartment with stunning seaviews in quiet area of Kungsholmen. Near the metro, bus and swimmingarea. 10 min away from Central Station. Amazing sunset in the evening. Free Wifi. Living here with my 4.5 years son every other week.
space: Singelbed in the room to rent.  Light, modern, unique apartment with amazing seaview in a calm part of Kungsholmen. Bedlinen and towels included. Easy car parking in the street.

summary: Oasis near the water, close to the city centre in quiet and family friendly neighbourhood. "Small village"-feeling in Bromma, the closest villa suburb to Stockholm. The house is close the water, beaches, restaurants, cafes, ice cream shops, shops, playgrounds, public transportation and close to the city center: 12 min by tram to nearest subway station where you go downtown in 5-10 min.
space: 4 bedrooms, new kitchen, garden for play and relaxation and barbecue, large terrace with sun from lunch to sunset, quick walk down to a swim in the sea, a couple of minutes to the tram that takes you into the city.

name: Beautiful apartment in city centre
summary: Located in the historic area of Mosebacke in the inner city centre, within 5 minutes walk from the water, the old city (Gamla stan), city buses and tourist boats to Djurgarden. The area is full of historic landmarks, cafees, restaurants, bars, parks.
space: The apartment is from the 1890-s with high ceilings, double doors, large windows and tile stove (kakelugn). It was designed by architects (the owners). Renovation was completed in 2013. The area is full of historic landmarks, cafees, restaurants, bars, parks, theatres and shops. Nearest subway stop is Slussen, with all subway line connections as well as most city buses. Within 5 minutes there are also boats to Djurgarden and Finland.

name: Room with bnb in Sofo, Södermalm
summary: A room in a famous functionalistic building from 1936, in the cool area at Söder called Sofo. Design and vintage boutiques, cafés, restaurants and laid-back atmosphere, within walking distance to the Old Town and the ferry-boats to Djurgården.
space: The building is by a well known architect called Reinius, built in the 1930´s in functionalistic style. It is situated in a popular area called Sofo with design and vintage boutiques, cafés and restaurants, with parks and friendly relaxed atmosphere. The Katarina and Sofia Church surrounded by parks are close by. I would describe the style in my home as modern and classic Scandinavian.
description: A room in a famous functionalistic building from 1936, in the cool area at Söder called Sofo. Design and vintage boutiques, cafés, restaurants and laid-back atmosphere, within walking distance to the Old Town and the ferry-boats to Djurgården. The building is by a well known architect called Reinius, built in the 1930´s in functionalistic style. It is situated in a popular area called Sofo with design and vintage boutiques, cafés and restaurants, with parks and friendly relaxed atmosphere. The Katarina and Sofia Church surrounded by parks are close by. I would describe the style in my home as modern and classic Scandinavian. I prefer that you book at least 3 nights! You will be served an ecological breakfast with bread, veg spreads and marmelade with tea or coffee. So bed and breakfast only! Maybe you will have dinners at restaurants during your stay or buy ready food, if so only vegetarian in my kitchen! The bathroom is available to you, with shower, towels and hairdryer.  The room ha
neighborhood_overview: Sofo at Söder is a unique mixture of friendly laid-back atmosphere, trendy boutiques and lifestyle expressions. Be it food, design, fashion,  all display in this area. Step out in the street and be entertained! If you feel like swimming Eriksdalsbadet is nearby or even a swim in the lake Mälaren during summertime. There are boats, busses or Saltsjöbanan nearby if you want to take a trip out to the archipelago.
notes: I´ll have a friend staying in my apartment while I´m away from 9th to the 22nd of January 2017. Ketty will help you to feel at home and adjust to the household rules. When you arrive in town I suggest that you by a ticket for the local transport system at Centralen where you most certainly arrive. You can buy tickets valid for a certain period and they can be used on the subway, on city busses and on the ferry-boat to Djurgården. You find them at any Pressbyrå or on the SL-center. When you decide to book I will let you know the details of how to enter the apartment house. I live on 5 floors and there is an elevator.
transit: Walking around Sofo or stretching out to the Old Town, Gamla Stan via the pedestrian Götgatsbacken. It´s all in walking distance. If you´re moving quicker or further away there are busses 3, 2, 76, 59 and 66 or t-bana/metro close-by. The closest metro station is Medborgarplatsen about 5 min walk from my home.
access: I prefer that you book at least 3 nights! You will be served an ecological breakfast with bread, veg spreads and marmelade with tea or coffee. So bed and breakfast only! Maybe you will have dinners at restaurants during your stay or buy ready food, if so only vegetarian in my kitchen! The bathroom is available to you, with shower, towels and hairdryer.  The room has a 120 cm/3 ft 11,3 inch/ bed and if you are two friends who don´t want to share bed there is an extra mattress I can install. Please let me know the circumstances! The wifi is turned off during night time.
interaction: I follow the bed-and-breakfast rules with check out at 10am and check in at 5pm every day. The first day´s check in can be from 4 pm. If you need to leave luggage while arriving please ask and if my schedule permits we can figure this out. For your departure I recommend the lockers at the Central Station or if you are continuing your travel by boat towards Åland or Finland, at the Viking Line terminal not far from my place.
house_rules: I follow bed and breakfast rules since I work in my home and follow routines with my dance and movement practice. I need my space between 10 am and 5 pm. Please ask if you have special needs, if possible I try to adjust! Though storing luggage after checking out your day of travel does´t work! Since I live so central it´s tempting to ask, I do understand, but it isn´t ok. Instead I recommend lockers at the Central Station or at Viking Line not far away!  Of course no smoking in my home!
host_about:
I´m a retired dancer and choreographer, still active, interested in art, culture and internationality. I speak fluent English and some French, German and Japanese.
Since I work at home, I follow the bed-and-breakfast rules during your stay with checking out every morning at 10am and checking in at 5pm, hoping you're enjoying the environments during your stay! Do let me know special needs! Your evenings are free to spend as you wish, as long as you respekt a sleepy hostess when coming home! I´ll be serving a traditional, ecological breakfast with bread, jam and spreads and tea or coffee according to your wishes. 
I myself love Stockholm and it´s surroundings and my wish is that you will discover the beauty and variety of the city. Welcome!

name: Charming 3-room apartment
summary: Our lovely, spacious 3-room apartment is now possible to rent! Situated close both to Vasaparken, on a quiet yet lively street, and central Stockholm you can have it all! The subway station St Eriksplan is just a minute´s walk away.
space: Our apartment is situated in a building from the late 19th century. It has 2 bedrooms and one livingroom. Big windows lets in loads of light and, due to the height (over 3 meters) and white walls, gives the place a very spacious feel! The balcony becomes an extra room in the summer.  There is one large bed (180) in the master bedroom, and one smaller double bed in the small room (140).  The apartment is situated on the 3rd floor and there is an elevator. Just around the corner is the lovely park - Vasaparken,  subway station St Eriksplan (green line), grocery stores, restaurants, bars, cafes and boutiques.
description: Our lovely, spacious 3-room apartment is now possible to rent! Situated close both to Vasaparken, on a quiet yet lively street, and central Stockholm you can have it all! The subway station St Eriksplan is just a minute´s walk away. Due to reports of inappropriate use of airbnb apartments in Stockholm, we have set up a neighbourhood watch system to ensure there is no such use.
neighborhood_overview: We love the atmosphere in Vasastan - the architecture, all the restaurants and bars, the closeness to the city centre but also the many parks (Vasaparken, Hagaparken and Karlberg) and the vicinity to the sea (check out Hornsberg strand). The neighborhood is ideal for a family with children but also people with no kids.
notes: Due to reports of inappropriate use of airbnb apartments in Stockholm, we have set up a neighbourhood watch system to ensure there is no such use.
transit: It is closest to the subway station St Eriksplan, but Odenplan (green line) and many buses are also nearby.
access: As our guest, you will be able to use our wireless internet, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer, stereo and bathtub!
house_rules: We expect you to treat our apartment as if it was your own home. If you smoke you do it on the balcony or in the yard, not inside.

To Gamla Stan, the old town in 7 minutes. This property truly is amazing and such a rare opportunity to book such a luxurious 2 bedroom apartment of this size, at this prce.

Hornstull is a great area to spend some time. Just below the apartment is a big park (Tantolunden). There you can hang out, work out at the outside gym, take a swim, play minigolf, volleyball or soccer and check out some graffiti at the legal wall that is set up there. If you are travelling with kids there is a great playground as well. neighborhood_overview: Hornstull is a great area to spend some time. Just below the apartment is a big park (Tantolunden). There you can hang out, work out at the outside gym, take a swim, play minigolf, volleyball or soccer and check out some graffiti at the legal wall that is set up there. If you are travelling with kids there is a great playground as well. Or just take a walk along the waterfront toward Skanstull or head up the hill in the middle of the park and admire the beautiful gardens and small houses there (so called "koloniträdgård" in Swedish). In the summer months (from May to September) there is a street market on Saturdays and Sundays in Hornstull, by Bergsunds strand. There they sell second hand stuff and there are a lot of great food trucks parked there. Another nice area to walk around is Långholmen. In Hornstull (5 min walk from the apartment) there is a shopping mall and many restaurants and bars. Here you will find among other things a big grocery store/supermarket called Hemköp. There i
transit: The metro station "Hornstull" is very close by. Bus 4 stops on Hornsgatan, right outside the apartment, and is a great way to get around town as well. Bus to/from the airport also stops at Hornstull ((SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Flygbussarna). If you go by taxi make sure to only use Taxi Stockholm, Taxi Kurir or Taxi 020. There is a big problem with taxis ripping tourists off, but these three companies are safe to use. Beware of taxis that try to look like Taxi Stockholm, using similar name and logo. All taxis need to have a yellow sign on the one of the back windows stating a so called "comparative price". This price should not exceed 350 kr if it is a serious taxi company.

name: Attractive location at Södermalm
summary: Experience the genuine Stockholm in an apartment situated on one of the most popular inner-city Islands of Stockholm; Södermalm. Right around the corner you find the waterfront, personalized coffee houses and pubs run by locals. 2 min walk to metro or direct busses to the Airport. The appartment is right in the middle of Hornstull, one of the most trendy Stockholm areas. The place is the perfect base to explore Stockholm on foot or by public transport, also very connected to further destinations
space: The location is highly attractive in Stockholm, close to metro, restaurants, coffee houses, shops and pubs. Vogue magazin has rated the island of Södermalm in Stockholm as the 3rd coolest in the World!  The apartment has one main room, that serves as bedroom and living room. It contains 2 beds with possibility to set up an extra bed (but then it gets tight!). The  kitchen is modernly equipped and has a table for 2-3 persons.

Clean bedlinen and towels i
neighborhood_overview: The vibe in the streets of Södermalm is relaxed, creative and trendy. This neighborhood offers a myriad of Swedish fashion, small vintage stores, galleries and design stores, mixed with thematic restaurants in all price categories.  In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , Södermalm got elected as coolest neighbourhood of Europe by Vogue Magazine: see what some locals that were interviewed, are saying about it: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Our part of Södermalm, Hornstull, attracts Stockholmers from other islands for weekend strolls - the nearby parks, a small boat harbor mixed with specialized coffee houses and pubs run by locals creates a genuine atmosphere. It is as far away from chains as Starbucks and McDonalds you can get in a city.  During weekends, a market is held along the waterfront called “The Street”, only 2 minutes walk from the apartment. Many of the merchants at the market sell their own individual fashion designs and creations, as well as organic and fair trade goods.  5 mi
notes: The apartment is on the 2:nd floor. There is an elevator in the house.
transit: The metro (in Swedish: T-bana) is just 1 min walk from the flat.  Direct buss, "Flygbussarna" from Arlanda Airport stops a 2 min walk away from apartment. The busses go every 15-30 minutes, most of the time.  Car Parking on the street is allowed for a fee. Note that every street has one weekday when parking is not allowed.
access: Wifi, TV and a modernly equipped kitchen. Clean bedlinen and towels is always in place for every new guest.
interaction: I will be available for any questions regarding the apartement, and if suitable, also meet the guest for key hand over first day.
house_rules: The building is built in late 1800, but with its old charm comes poor sound isolation. Therefore, we kindly ask our guest to not host parties nor play loud music; for the sake of our neighbors.
host_about:
I live in Stockholm since 30 years, but I'm originally from Turku in Finland. I work with industrial Insurance in one of the major Nordic Insurance companies. I love cross country skiing, hiking as well as traveling in Europe.  

I wish to share my lovely city and apartment with you, and respect your privacy during your stay. However, in case things would not work out for any reason, I'm easy to get in contact with and pleased to help out.

I området finns massor med bra restauranger och bara en kort promenad bort Drottninggatan, Hötorget och Stureplan.  Tunnelbanan runt husknuten gör att det är enkelt att ta sig till andra platser. host_about:
Not much of a traveler, but I love my home town!
From my apartement, in central Stockholm, you could easy reach the most interesting places in the capital - and in the same time, having a good time.
I'll be happy to give you advice about restaurants, bars, sightseeing and sports. 
When you're here, you could call me or my girlfriend any time. I'll be happy to help out.
My apartement: 
- four room with 1,5 bathroom
- well equipped kitchen and a courtyard
- garage included
- located central Stockholm - only two subway stations or 15 min walk away from the central train/bus station . 
- perfect place for a visiting family or a group of friends.

I live here together with my girlfriend and two children, so - of course - I also can help you organize nice family activities in the capital.

name: Idyllic apartment in Stockholm!
summary: Live in this fabulous apartment - first come, first served!
space: A beautiful spacious apartment (40 sqm) from 1937 with big terrace and big windows. The bedroom is rather small but cosy with a full size bed. The kitchen is fully equipped. The living room has a big and comfortable sofa, Stereo and WIFI is provided. The metro is within 7 min walking distance to Liljeholmen as well as a big grocery store and pharmacy. In Gröndal you have the city as well as nature close by. 5 minutes away with the metro (red line) you’ll find the hip and vibrant neighbourhood Södermalm. Södermalm offers small boutiques, second hand shops, galleries and lots of nice restaurants, pubs and clubs. Gröndal is a newly built area with small restaurants right by the water side. Down the hill you’ll also find where you can have your morning swim in the summer. You are most welcome to my place and I’ll be happy to show you my wonderful city! Please respect the check-in/out hours:  Check-in: 12.00 am  Check-out before: 10.00 am

summary: Swedish red house, located in Bromma/Drottningholm, 8 km from Stockholm city center, by the lake Mälaren. Traditional wooden cottage, Beautiful view, big garden, terrass on the water, private beach and dock. Cosy atsmophere with lots of light. Perfect for couples and families with children. Perfect summertime and wintertime

space: It only takes 10 minutes to downtown by car/underground or 15 minutes by bycycle. The room are bright because of big windows with blinds and curtains. The room have an quality bunkbed (with an comfortable doublebed at the bottom and a single bed on the top), writing desk, armchair, floor lamp, large wardrobe and storage shelves. Toilet, shower and kitchen are not far away from the room.

name: Sunny and spacious in city centre
summary: Bright apartment with 2 rooms in Östermalm. Best location possible! Located in a central yet quiet neighborhood. Next to Karlaplan Metro station and close to Stureplan and the Royal island of Djurgården.  Fire place and huge windows.
space: The apartment is located in an beautiful building next to Karlaplan Subway station. It´s a nice area with a lot of shopping and restaurants and it´s just 10 minutes by foot to Stureplan or the island of Djurgården.  The apartment is built in a turn of the century style with high ceilings and is contemporary furnished. It has two huge windows in the living room and one in the bedroom that let in a lot of sunshine. There is plenty of storage space in the bedroom as it has two wardrobes and a three meter high bookshelf. There is a large and comfortable double bed for two.  The living room is large and has both a dining table with 6 chairs and a sofa that is large enough to accommodate a third visitor. A 60" TV guarantees great movie nights. There is also a fireplace for cosy evenings in the autumn and winter. The kitchen is conveniently located in the corridor and equipped with a fridge, stove, dishwasher and microwave/oven.

neighborhood_overview: Östermalm is Stockholm upmarket neighborhood with old buildings . It is very close the the royal island-park of Djurgården with trendy restaurants, the amusement park of gröna lund and much more. There is only one subway stop or 10 min walking distance to the absolute city centre of Stockholm.
transit: The apartment is just 50 m from the subway station of Karlaplan and a lot of different busses.
host_about: I am a 22 year old studying Business and economics at Stockholm School of Economics and Law and Stockholm university. I have been living I Stockholm during three years and know most things about the city.  I am happy to share tips about everything from great restaurants to night clubs and museums.

name: Nice family flat with patio 10-15 min to C!
summary: Our flat is located in peaceful Björkhagen, 3 min walk to the metro and then 10-15 min by metro to the center of Stockholm. Björkhagen is located right by a large nature reserve, Nackareservatet, which includes lovely nature, lakes and restaurants!
space: The apartment is perfect for a family with 3 children, possibly 4 if a child is in the crib. We have both a cot and high chairs if needed. The flats have a communal  sandpit and lawn for children to play in and in the vicinity are many fine playgrounds. There is a bbq to borrow, so after a long day in town, you can enjoy the tranquility and the patio in the evening. There is a store that has just about everything, about 5 min walk from the apartment and a bakery 3 min walk from the apartment where you can "snack" or buy fresh morning bread. 50 m from the apartment there is also a mini-market which also sells ice cream. About 10 mins walk there is an outdoor swimming facility, Nytorp bath, with a slightly larger pool and a baby pool. Free admission.  INTERNET: We have high speed WiFi in the apartment that you can use as much as you like. PARKING: We have a parking lot right outside the apartment. It is included in the price of the apartment. BEDROOM 1: There are two comfortable beds 90

house_rules: Cleaning: We expect you to leave the place in the same condition you found it when you got there. Hence, cleaning is not included, we expect you to wash up your dishes and throw away your trash. If you have a tight schedule and don't have time for cleaning, just talk to us and we'll work something out. Smoking: NO smoking inside. Smoking on the patio is ok. Pets: Send a message and tell us what pet you have and maybe we can work it out. Checkout: Checkout is at 12 if nothing else is agreed upon. Always use sheets in the beds.  We hope you treat the apartment as if it was your own!
host_about:
We are a swedish/danish couple with two children. We live here in Stockholm since five years and before that we have been staying in the French Alps and in Denmark.

We love everything you can do in nature, skiing, hiking, kayaking, etc.

Sanna is a trained nurse, but currently reading French at university. Lasse is working with whisky and other liquids.

We love to travel to see new places and meet new people. And we love to spend as much time in our summer house in the Stockholm archipelago as possible.

Our motto is: If it makes you happy.. Then do it!

Welcome to Stockholm and our apartment!

name: Modern apt close to city and nature!
summary: Live the life of a Stockholmer! Our luxurious apartment in Hammarby Sjöstad is simply an excellent choice for everybody who would like to explore Sweden’s capital Stockholm and its beautiful surroundings.
space: Our apartment We offer you a luxurious and modern apartment with all the stuff you need nowadays. The apartment itself is 52,5m2, open plan and a cozy balcony with morning sun. The open plan means the living room and kitchen are in the same space, which is quite practical. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, a fridge, kitchen stove, microwave and oven.  The sleeping room has a spacious double bed. In the bathroom you will find a shower, toilet, floor heating, towel dryer washing machine and a tumble dryer.
description: Live the life of a Stockholmer! Our luxurious apartment in Hammarby Sjöstad is simply an excellent choice for everybody who would like to explore Sweden’s capital Stockholm and its beautiful surroundings. Our apartment We offer you a luxurious and modern apartment with all the stuff you need nowadays. The apartment itself is 52,5m2, open plan and a cozy balcony with morning sun. The open plan means the living room and kitchen are in the same space, which is quite practical. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, a fridge, kitchen stove, microwave and oven.  The sleeping room has a spacious double bed. In the bathroom you will find a shower, toilet, floor heating, towel dryer washing machine and a tumble dryer.
neighborhood_overview: You will find our modern apartment in Hammarby Sjöstad – an exciting new and eco-friendly part of town.  Hammarby Sjöstad is a modern, young and peaceful area and forms your perfect base for further explorations of Stockholm and experiencing city life. On sunny days the locals love to sit in the sun, read a book, hang out with friends, take a picnic or a drink along the waterside.  If you are more of a sportive person, you should definitely go for a run or walk around the harbor or in the nearby forest!
notes: •Convenience store around the corner •Restaurants & bars •Take swim in one of the lakes nearby •Visit Hellasgården - Stockholm´s nearest and largest outdoor activity center in Nacka's nature reserve
transit: With good access to public transport you are in town within 10 minutes. Busses, train, tram and a ferry are accessible on a short walking distance from our apartment. Do you want to take a bike into town? Then just rent one of the City Bikes offered across the street!
house_rules: We offer you the opportunity to experience the city as a Stockholmer. Everything is relatively close by, but you must be willing to grab the opportunities, explore and lose yourself to Stockholm's city life. Of course we are willing to help you with this during our short introduction. We will guide you around in our apartment and tell you how everything works, what you can use and what is private, so we make sure that you will feel at home and that we leave our apartment in good hands. If you during your stay have any questions regarding the apartment, then we'll be available by phone. Some of our rules: - No shoes indoors - No pets - Smoking only allowed on the balcony
host_about:
Hi! 
I am a 30 year old optometrist with a passion for diving and travelling. My whole life I have lived in the beautiful surroundings of Stockholm. When I'm away travelling I welcome you to stay in my lovely appartment in Stockholm so you can explore the city and get yourself a fantastic experience!

space: Lägenheten är fullt utrustad och har gratis Wifi. Sängkläder och handdukar ingår. En klädkammare kommer att vara låst med våra personliga tillhörigheter.

name: Central and trendy Södermalm, 1-2p
summary: With its lovely placement in the young and vivid part of Stockholm (just under SoFo in Södermalm) you wouldn't be able to find a better starting point for your vacation here in Stockholm!
space: This is a great and open apartment (36m2) right in the cool Södermalm-district of Stockholm (Also called SoFo). This apartment offers a fully equipped kitchen, bar table, WiFi (10Mbit), modern bathroom and a King size loft bed (160cm x 200cm)! There are Loads of cool restaurants in the very close area called Medborgarplatsen, also known for being Crowded with outdoor restaurants/bars all over the square coming alive in the summer! There is an iron and iron board, a spacious closet and of course towels and sheets included for you.  No smoking inside. I have lived in Stockholm all my life and would be happy to offer you great recommendations for activities, night life and the hidden gems of restaurants and bars in the area.  Södermalm is in the middle of everything. The closest subway is Skanstull (5 minute walk) and from there the central station is only about 5 minutes away. Im looking forward to welcoming you to my flat!

name: Unique House Boat - in the heart of Stockholm
summary: Live on-board a house boat in the middle of central Stockholm with a 35 sum Sundeck an a roof terrace (25 sum) with beautiful views over the water and the city of Stockholm.   The house boat is to a high standard. It is suitable for 1-2 families.  A kajak is included!
space: The big sundeck gives you the possibility of socializing, bbq-ing , sunbathing, fishing or a quick dive into the blue sea from the boat! Stay in bed a little while longer in the morning and listen to the charming sound of water clucking against the boat or watch the reflection of the sun in the ceiling before the morning swim.   Enjoy a breakfast in peace with beautiful views of Stockholm. Later on in the day you can spend the afternoon enjoy a cool drink in the sun why doing some fishing, relaxing in the sun chairs or reading in the hammock.  The sun terrace is exposed to sun from morning to late afternoon so it’s a perfect place to have breakfast and dinner. From the roof terrace you have the best view in Stockholm! House Boat Layout ( see pictures for layout) The house boat is 16o sqm over two floors.   Entrance floor Open layout where the hallway leads you to the modern sized kitchin/lounge. The dinner table seats up to 12 people. The lounge area has a sofa, an open fire place and

neighborhood_overview: The house boat is located on the historical island of Långholmen, in the heart of the city. Långholmen is a popular recreation area in the city, with green areas, walking- and running paths and also a large football field nearby.  Långholmen is close to trendy Hornstull and Södermalm. There is a huge range of restaurants, and interesting, modern stores for fashion, design, interiors and vintage. If you like fashion and design, you can definitely find something unique here!
notes: Cleaning is available on request (900 sek). Bed linen (150 sek/person) and 2 extra beds for (200 sek/each) can be arranged.
transit: Wherever you wish to go there are easy connections. Tunnelbanan (the tube) takes you to the T-centralen in 10 min. Flygbussarna (Airport buses) stops just a couple of hundreds of meters from the boat, and takes you to Arlanda airport in 45 min. . Good parking possibilities (Free) A kajak is available on the house boat and can take you around all the canals and waters of Stockholm.
access: Our guest will have access to the whole house boat during the stay.
interaction: We are primary available on the phone. But i requested by the guests, we can meet up in person on the house boat.

space: En ljus och luftig 40-tals lägenhet med balkong som vätter mot en stor park. Insynsskyddat läge. Huset är beläget i ett lugnt område med närhet till Södermalm. Plats för barn, spjälsäng barnstol och skötbord finns samt leksaker och barnböcker. I sovrummet finns en dubbelsäng samt en spjälsäng. Det finns en extra dubbelmadrass som lätt kan läggas ut på vardagsrumsgolvet. Utanför finns promenadvägar ner till Årstaviken där även utegym är tillgängliga . Matbutik Coop Nära finns endast några minuter bort. Här finns snabbt trådlöst internet men tv saknas helt.  Efter en lång dag i stan eller en brännbollsmatch på gräsmattan kan du koppla av i ett bad i badrummet. Rökning eller husdjur är inte tillåtet i lägenheten. Vid in och utcheckning finns vi eller en vän till hands. Här finner du en stor grön park med plats för lek, picknick och grillning samt en lekplats för barnen. Alldeles nedanför breder Årstaviken ut sig med gångstråk och solbryggor. 40 minuters promenad längs med vattnet och du ä
description: Enjoy this light apartment close to nature as well as the city with a balcony looking over the park and the nere by playground. With plenty of space for children to play as well as room for cooking your own dinner. Bathroom with  bathtub to relax in.
house_rules: Vi hoppas att du kommer att trivas och njuta av denna årstaboning lika mycket som vi gör. Rökning och husdjur undanbedes i lägenheten.
host_about: Under mina resor har jag ofta mötts av varma och välkomnande människor som visat mig sitt hem och sin vardag, sin gästfrihet. Framför allt då jag rest och bott i  i latin och sydamerika. Jag har ett stort förtroende för mellanmänskliga relationer.

name: Beautiful house close to city
summary: Our house has the arcitecural design funcionalism. It is fully renovated and lies in a very secluded suberb of Stockholm with 5 minutes walk to the subway and 20 minutes away from the city. Within walking distance you have restaurants, a beach, playgrounds, parks and forests.
space: Södra Ängby is one of the most beautiful areas in Stockholm renowned for its arcitecture. The whole area is architecturally protected and cannot be changed. When we bought the house 20 years ago we had looked at another 30 houses but knew as soom as we came in to the living room that we could stop looking! The ambiance of the functionalism with its 1930's styling is fantastic! On the first floor of the house there is a spacious living room with a dining area. It has access to a balcony with table, nice for lunches. Then there is a spacious kitchen with an eating area. Fully equiped and modern utilities. Through the kitchen you have access to the terrace and the garden.    The house has all in all 4 bedrooms. On the top floor there are 3 bedrooms:  - a master bedroom with a double bed - two bedrooms with a single bed and.  There is also a TV room as well on the top floor with a sofabed that can fold out to a doublebed. In the basement there is one more bedroom with a single bed. In addi

neighborhood_overview: Surrounding the area you have two forestlike parks and the large lake Mälaren so after a busy day in the city you walk down to the beach for a refreshing swim. In the area we also have several restaurants, one down by the beach.  Withing 15 minutes by car you have the second Royal Palace (where the royal family actually live) and its beautiful gardens. Great for a relaxing day if you do not want the bustle of the city.
notes: We have a cat normally in the house if you are alergic.
transit: Within 5 minutes walk you are at the subway station and in the middle of the city in another 20-30 minutes depending of where you want to go.
access: You will have access to the house (except the separate apartment in the basement) and its garden.
interaction: Our tenant in the basement apartment is doing the house keeping and will be at hand if you need any help. You can also reach us on the phone.
house_rules: No smoking inside the house. We prefer that you take off your shoes inside.
host_about: We are a family of five with international experience. We lived 3 years in England and 5 years in the US. During the summer we go sailing in the archipelago and therefore do not need our house. Better that someone is looking after it.

Located in central Stockholm in a beautiful park where you can have a picnic from spring to autumn. Close to the University, KTH and Sophiahemmet. Walking distance to City, shopp
neighborhood_overview: Located in central Stockholm in a beautiful park where you can have a picnic from spring to autumn. Close to the University, KTH and Sophiahemmet. Walking distance to City, shopping and culture and an excellent location for both business and sightseeing. All kinds of transportation nearby, Underground Bus Bike. Great for walking and shopping, excellent variety of restaurants. Culture of all kinds, art gallery and museums in the neighborhood. Walking distance to Djurgården and Stureplan.
transit: Access to transportation via bus and Underground less than 5 min walking distance, boats 20 min and bikes for rent less than 5 min. Parking for a fee on the street during weekdays, free on weekends. For the airport it's cheap and close to take bus no 4 and change at St Eriksplan for the airport coach to Arlanda.Or metro red line no 14 and Arlanda Express. Airport coaches available for Skavsta, Västerås and Bromma airports as well.
access: Private WC and shared shower.
interaction: At breakfast, I will be glad to give you information and recommendations. There are also written updated information with recommendations and guide books for you in the room.
house_rules: I am sorry but you can't have meals in the room, apart from fruit or light snacks, biscuits, chocolate bar and the likes. I provide a cup of tea and a biscuit for you as well as water. There are plenty of all kinds of restaurants with different kind of food and price levels in the neighborhood where you will be able to have a really nice meal.  No smoking, drugs or alcohol. No animals.
host_about: I am a traveller myself and find it rewarding to welcome travellers in my home. Economist, reader and interested in politics, art, literature, opera, movies and other cultural expressions. Family and friends are close to me and important.

name: Lovely apt in Sofo, Södermalm
summary: Come spend your summer at Stockholm's best spot - Sofo! Trendy restaurants and bars, bohemian cafés, cool shops and beautiful parks just around the corner. Our cozy and renovated apt of 74 spacious sqm has all you need for a convenient stay!
space: Our apt welcomes you with a spacious hallway from which you enter the other rooms. The fully equipped stylish kitchen with dishwasher is in open plan with the cozy living area and the room has three pair of windows. The bathroom is equipped with washing machine and bathtub. The bedroom has a 160cm newly bought bed and if your staying three persons one of our three sofas in the living room makes a really confy bed! The area offers great communications (bus stop outside the door and Metro station Skanstull 5 min walk). We will prepare a map with our favorite spots in Stockholm for you!

name: Big lovely apt Södermalm
summary: 4-rm,beautiful 112m2, b 1890, best location, high ceiling, wooden floors, 3 brms, bath, sep wc, 4 fireplaces, balcony, best rest/bars/charming trendy shops in combi w proxy green areas! Södermalm the place to be! 2 min U-bahn Medborgarplatsen
space: Our beautiful, charming, four room flat of 112 m2 with new kitchen 2013, new bathroom 2011, built 1890.  In the very hearth of pulsating central Stockholm - Södermalm - where all the trendy small, individual shops, bars, bistros, pedestrian friendly streets connecting green areas are. We are four people living here but it is comfartable to sleep five using our sofa in the living room. Our flat is in a small house with a calm and cool backyard where you can relax after a sunny day out. Why not use the house´s Bbq-facilites for an easy dinner? Our balcony facing the backyard has morning sun. From here you are free to discover entire Stockholm - it is all within easy reach.
description: 4-rm,beautiful 112m2, b 1890, best location, high ceiling, wooden floors, 3 brms, bath, sep wc, 4 fireplaces, balcony, best rest/bars/charming trendy shops in combi w proxy green areas! Södermalm the place to be! 2 min U-bahn Medborgarplatsen Our beautiful, charming, four room flat of 112 m2 with new kitchen 2013, new bathroom 2011, built 1890.  In the very hearth of pulsating central Stockholm - Södermalm - where all the trendy small, individual shops, bars, bistros, pedestrian friendly streets connecting green areas are. We are four people living here but it is comfartable to sleep five using our sofa in the living room. Our flat is in a small house with a calm and cool backyard where you can relax after a sunny day out. Why not use the house´s Bbq-facilites for an easy dinner? Our balcony facing the backyard has morning sun. From here you are free to discover entire Stockholm - it is all within easy reach. You can use the entire apartment except two wardrobes that will be sealed.. S
neighborhood_overview: We live in the best part of Stockholm, Södermalm, and the best part of Södermalm, Medborgarplatsen. The name means "the place for this towns citizens", which of course indicates the overall feeling of inclusion. Across our house behind the park is the only Mosque serving in the city center. To the right is our church and to the left is the major Catholic church situated. In between, and honestly dominating, are the restaurants, bars, pubs and small, personal restaurants. Around the corner from us lies former Skatteskrapan, now a high building with a "skyskraper bar". Perfect for a night cap with a panoramic view of Stockholm. Don´t miss out Mosebacke Torg and Etablissemang, with outdoor food and bar and a theatre venues. From there, you should pay a visit to restaurant and pub Gondolen, originally an elevator taking people up from Slussen to the heights of Södermalm without having to climb to much.  On a warm day, you should walk down Götgatan towards Skanstull, cross the street and en
transit: We live 2 minutes from U-station Medborgarplatsen, 1 minute by train or 5 minutes walk to U-station Slussen where all trains and busses for Stockholm connect.  If you are a walking person you´ll love this place. Walking downtown (Kungsträdgården) takes you 15 minutes.  Arriving from the airport is easy. Take the ArlandaExpress (20 minutes) and arrive at Central station (T-centralen) where you go down and take any green line (U-station) southbound to Medborgarplatsen (third stop from T-centralen). Exit exit Björns Trädgård if you have heavy luggage. Exit Medborgarplatsen, Götgatan is equally close, but means a few stairs and no escalator.
access: You can use the entire apartment except two wardrobes that will be sealed.. Should you have an extra guest at some point, our living room sofa sleeps one person nicely. We supply you with a set of fresh linen and towels, and there is a washing machine in the main bathroom, and a larger, well equipped laundry room that you enter from backyard. We have a large library with over 3000 books in various languages - please feel free to read what you want and just make sure you put it back!  Björns Trädgård and Medborgarplatsen is right outside waiting for you, with a great mix of people. Take your lunch in the mosques restaurant and your evening drink at Babylon, just opposit our house. Go to the movies, walk down to the great out door pool just down Götgatan, or walk down to the waterline for a swim - the water in central Stockholm is clean. By underground you´ll reach city center in 6 minutes, and Old Town is walking distance. Please refrain from smoking in the apartment.
interaction: I prefer to get to know the person(s) intending to stay in our home, that I, my husband, our two children as well as our ragdoll cat Moody love and care for. We are staying in our summer house close to Stockholm, some days commuting for work in the city. We are always close to you in case you need support.
house_rules: We live in a small house with only 13 flats thus we all know each other very well. It is a calm house where we share a sauna as well as a laundry room in the basement. There you can also find gears for grilling and it is fine to use this for a nice evening, although sharing means that one cannot demand to do the grilling every night a week.  We appreciate that you appreciate both common and personal area to be kept and left the way you like to find it.  This is a non-smoking house, you can smoke in the backyard and on the balcony, but please make sure you keep cigarette butts away as there are small children playing.  We have a cat living here and a cat would be fine, but please do not bring a dog.
host_about: Former CEO for the Swedish Performing Arts Association for Employers, now dividing my professional life between co-ordinating three movie theatres in Gothenburg, Helsingborg and Malmö, owned by Folkets hus och Parker, and Scenit Produktion AB offering senior management support for projects within the arts and affiliated events, preferably performing arts and film.

name: Elegant and cozy flat in city
summary: Located in trendy neighborhood Vasastan, close to popular Odenplan, you will find this lovely one room apartment. This is the perfect place to stay if you are going to explore the city.
space: Located in trendy neighborhood Vasastan, close to popular Odenplan, you will find this lovely and newly renovated one room apartment. This is the perfect place to stay if you are going to explore the city with only a few minutes of walking distance to various public transportations.  The apartment is very enjoyable and it is facing the quiet courtyard. The room is furnished with one full size bed (120cm), two one-seat sofas, one coffee table and a 42’’-flat screen TV. Free Wi-Fi. The kitchen is equipped with a stove, combined oven/microwave, fridge and freezer, Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, mixer and additional kitchenware. The bathroom is equipped with a combined washer and dryer, underfloor heating and hairdryer. Beddings and towels are provided.

access: Home appliances The kitchen are equipped with a stove, a combined microwave/oven and a fridge and freezer. In the bathroom, there is a combined washer, dryer.  How to use the stove To put on, press the on/off button to the left. Choose which hotplate you like to use by press either the button to the left or right of the “middle line”. Choose the level of temperature by slide your finger of the “middle line”, from left to right. NOTE! You must have placed a pot or a pan on the hotplate you like to use, otherwise the stove wont start (security reasons).  How to use the microwave/oven Mircowave: The easiest way to put on the microwave is to press the second button from your left. One press gives you 30 second at 1000 W. Press the same button to increase the time. The micro will start automatically.  Oven: Choose the programme by pressing the up and down arrows on the right side. Then, choose time or temperature with the up and down arrows on the left side and increase or decrease by press
interaction: If you need anything during your stay, please let me know and I will either provide you with it or help you find it.
house_rules: I really want to stress that this is a shoe-free home; I do not want dirt from outside to land on my floors and carpets. Please do not disturb our neighbours. I expect kindness and respect, no loud music at night. Absolutely no smoking inside. If someone wants to smoke, smoking outside the building is fine. Over all, I expect general thoughtfulness. Just do as you would have others do in your own home, and leave the place as clean and tidy as you found it when you arrived. In a serious emergency or fire, call 112!
host_about:
Hi, my name is David. I’m born and raised in Stockholm, but is currently living in Los Angeles where I’m studying Graphic Design. 

I like to help my guest as much as I can, so if you have any questions about the apartment, Stockholm or me, don’t hesitate to ask! I will try to answer you as soon as possible.

name: Charmig lägenhet, nära natur & stad
summary: Vår stora femma i 50-talsstil har öppen spis, balkong i söderläge och ett stort matbord med plats för minst 6 personer!  Det tar 2 minuter till både tunnelbana och naturreservat så du kan turista i stan och bada i barnvänlig natursjö på samma dag!
space: I vår lägenhet finns rum för många. Vår femma är på 105 kvm och lämpar sig bra för en stor familj eller två mindre familjer. Matsalsbordet rymmer 6 personer utan iläggsskiva och vi har två barnstolar. När det gäller sovplatser så har vi ett stort sovrum med en 210 cm bred säng (king size) och en spjälsäng. I ett kombinerat TV-rum/sovrum finns en bäddsoffa som är 140 cm bred. I ett mindre sovrum finns en justerbar barnsäng som är 90 cm bred. Vi har även ett arbetsrum som också kan användas som sovrum om behov finns. Slutligen så har vi även en extra spjälsäng om det finns fler småbarn.

Vi kommer att var bortresta under vår
neighborhood_overview: Kärrtorp är en charmig närförort till Stockholm med mycket kultur (både en teater och biograf finns i centrum), och det är nära till både stan och till orörd natur i Nackareservatet. Vi rekommenderar en promenad ner till den populära badsjön, Söderbysjön som ligger 10 minuters cykeltur in i naturreservatet.
notes: Priset för att hyra vår lägenhet är lågt nu i början eftersom vi precis börjat använda Airbnb och gärna vill hyra ut lägenheten så snart som möjligt.
transit: Det tar två minuter att gå till Kärrtorps tunnelbanestation från lägenheten. Fri parkering finns på gatorna i området. Reser ni med flyg finns tåg med Arlanda express eller flygbussar som båda går till Stockholm central där tunnelbanan mot Skarpnäck tar er till Kärrtorp på en kvart.
access: Vi har trådlöst internet, Netflix på TV:n och en trevlig balkong. Eldning i eldstaden är förbjudet om inte annat avtalats.
interaction: Vi kommer att var bortresta under våra gästers vistelse. Men vi rekommenderar gärna sevärdheter, utflyktsmål och annat som efterfrågas.
house_rules: I vårt hem (liksom hos de flesta i Sverige) så tar vi av oss skorna inomhus. Vi önskar ej ha husdjur då vi är allergiska. Rökning ej tillåten i lägenheten. Normal hänsyn till våra grannar förväntas.
host_about:
Jag gillar att cykla snabbt, dansa, upptäcka nya saker och att träffa inspirerande människor. TV-serier som jag uppskatter är bland annat The Wire och Twin Peaks.
Ett bra citat är:
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Arthur Ashe

name: Very central and cosy apartment!
summary: Rent my apartment for the week! (available from 19-26 of July). The apartment is very central, located at Kungsholmen. It´s about 15 min walk to the Central station or 5 min by the tube. The apartment has all you need, including Wifi.
space: I have a fully furnished private flat in the urban centre of Stockholm, Kungsholmen (only 10 minutes walking from the City Terminal / Central Station).  To nearest subway station (Fridhemsplan) is only 4 minutes away. Also there is a bus just outside the house (nr 52) which takes you to the city centre in aprox 5 minutes. The house is located at a quiet street, very close to the water and the beautiful Norr Mälarstrand (you can see the water from the window). There are many nice restaurants and bars in the area as well.   The apartment is 28 m2 large and has it's private entrance, private shower/wc and a small kitchenette with limited cooking ability with  oven, coffee peculator, fridge, stove, double bed (140cm wide), desk, armchairs, TV, wireless Internet. Suitable accommodation for visits to Stockholm for 1 - 2 persons who wants to stay in a quiet place in the middle of the city centre. The price includes cleaning and change of bedlinen and towels once a week. Welcome!

name: Studio near Mariatorget, Södermalm
summary: In between Mariatorget and Medborgarplatsen you'll find this newly renovated studio. As central as you can get at Södermalm you're at walking distance from Old Town, City centre, Götgatan, Hornstull and Nytorget.
description: In between Mariatorget and Medborgarplatsen you'll find this newly renovated studio. As central as you can get at Södermalm you're at walking distance from Old Town, City centre, Götgatan, Hornstull and Nytorget. Down the street you'll find Johan & Nyström with great coffee. Götagatan is just around the corner with great shopping. Cozy cafés, bars and restaurants can be found at Mariatorget and Hornsgatan, just a 5 minute walk from the apartment! Mariatorget subway station is a two minute walk from the apartment. There you can take the red line into the city centre. Central station is 3 stations away, approximately 8 minutes ride.  Green line is a 8 min walk, at Medborgarplatsen.  If you need to go by commuter train, Södra Station is within 5 minute walking distance.

name: Bright and central apartment
summary: Bright and modern apartment in turn of the century building. Comfortable and calm living overlooking big park. Five minutes walk to central Stockholm! Well equipped kitchen with dishwasher, newvly renovated bathroom with washing machine. Balcony!
space: The apartment is centrally located in the heart of Stockholm, only five minutes walking distance to the central station.  The building is a turn of the century house with all its charming details. The apartment itself is though modern with newvly renovated kitchen and bathrooms. It consists of three bedrooms; one single and two double, a big living room, a reading room and a huge kitchen with a balcony, facing the calm inner yard. There is also two bathrooms; one with a shower and a double zink and one guest toilet.  It is possible to use the living room for one extra sleeping guest (a comfortable mattress is available upon request).

name: Cosy flat with fantastic view 57sqm
summary: Modern, fully equipt, two rooms apartment with a balcony and a magnificent view over Stockholm.  Located in a quiet and green area near to the International Fair in Älvsjö, commuter train, buses and Telefonplan metro. Welcome!
space: Our two rooms apartment is located on the 7:th floor of a newly built apartement-building. The view is breathtaking, the flat is very clean, light (with huge windows) and spacious.  There is an exclusive king size bed and a wardrobe in the bedroom. In the living room there is a big soffa which is usually used as an extra bed for 1 person. Besides that we can offer two thick comfortable madrasses as sleeping places. So you can get 5 sleeping places if needed. Bed linnen and towels are provided.
description: Modern, fully equipt, two rooms apartment with a balcony and a magnificent view over Stockholm.  Located in a quiet and green area near to the International Fair in Älvsjö, commuter train, buses and Telefonplan metro. Welcome!
neighborhood_overview: The surrounding area is green, peacefull and offers all the necessary service. There is a green park nearby with a playing ground for children and suitable for morning jogging. It takes 10 min to walk to the commuter train station Älvsjö and it takes only 2-3 stops to the city center (7-10 min), depending on which part of Stockholm you would like to see. You can also take a buss to the metro station Telefonplan, buss-stop is exactly in front of the house. At Telefonplan you can find several well-known restaurants as Landet and Svenska Sushiköket.
transit: If you enjoy the puls and vibration of the city but you prefer to stay a bit outside the city center, in a peacfull and quite area but on a short distance to the city, then this flat is a perfect match for you! Welcome!
access: In the kitchen you will find all you might need as refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, coffemaker etc. We will provide you with the basic articles such as coffe, tea and milk. Enjoy your breakfast or dinner with a view over Stockholm at the balcony, which is protected by glass in case of rain and wind. The grosery shop is in front of the house, 2 min walk. A big well-assorted food market is located by the train station, 10 min walk.  The bathroom is equiped with a bathtub, washing machine and a tumbler.  In the living room there is a TV, stereo, dvd. Wifi is also available in the flat.  Free parking is allowed all around the area. If you arrive to Arlanda, the Stockholm international Airport, you can take a commuter train directly to Älvsjö where the apartment is. The train goes every 30 min.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed in the flat! If you smoke on the balcony, please, close the balcony door! Please, keep reasonably quiet in the flat especially in the evenings! It is not allowed to play music or use washing machine after 10 pm out of respect to the neighbours. Thank you!
host_about: Welcome to Stockholm and my appartment! I will be happy to share my knowledge of Stockholm and my favourite places of interest with you!

name: 19th Century 2BD at hip Mariatorget
summary: This spacious 2BD gem (100sqm) in the heart of Södermalm, is a perfectly located getaway and genuine Stockholm experience. A mix of tradition and style with a large balcony, working fireplaces and fully equipped kitchen. One block from subway.
space: This stylish and charming apartment is located on the top floor of a beautiful building, in the heart of hip and bohemian Södermalm area Mariatorget.  The house was built in 1892 and the tall wooden doors and dark marble stairway leading up to the top floor apt (4th floor), and inside, the 2 tiled fireplaces and kitchen iron stove, all bear witness of the beauty of historic Stockholm.  Note: This classic building does not have an elevator - hence wheelchair access is limited and larger babystrollers can be parked on the entrance floor. The 100 sqm is divided into one large and one smaller bedroom, a kitchen with dining area adjacent to the living room. You there exit to a large balcony w afternoon and evening sun. The fireplaces/tiled stoves are not needed for the house heating, but are fully functioning.  KITCHEN Fully equipped kitchen and dining area, including dishwasher, juicer, blender, induction stove and seats up to 6 people. Baby chair for the dinner table available upon reques
description: This spacious 2BD gem (100sqm) in the heart of Södermalm, is a perfectly located getaway and genuine Stockholm experience. A mix of tradition and style with a large balcony, working fireplaces and fully equipped kitchen. One block from subway. This stylish and charming apartment is located on the top floor of a beautiful building, in the heart of hip and bohemian Södermalm area Mariatorget.  The house was built in 1892 and the tall wooden doors and dark marble stairway leading up to the top floor apt (4th floor), and inside, the 2 tiled fireplaces and kitchen iron stove, all bear witness of the beauty of historic Stockholm. The fireplaces/tiled stoves are
neighborhood_overview: Mariatorget, a part of Södermalm that a few decades back was a bit shady  and rough, is nowadays the most exclusive Södermalm area. The green and Parisian Mariatorget square (steps away from the apt), is a great place to start exploring Stockholm, with metro hub Slussen, buses, Gamla Stan (Old Town) and ferries to Djurgården within a ten minute walking distance. At the same time, this is where many locals come to have their Sunday brunch, shop and hangout at one of the many cafés, bars or restaurants. As you arrive, don't miss walking up the hill on the other side of the square: crossing Bastugatan will lead you to the spectacular views of Monteliusvägen, a small walkway along on top of Mariaberget hill with panoramic outlook of Riddarfjärden, Gamla stan, Kungsholmen, landmark City Hall and the inner city skyline. Sneak behind the wooden fence into the quiet park of iconic writer Ivar Lo, and have a picnic as you map out which part of the view you'll be visiting first. Welcome to Stock
transit: This apartment is perfectly situated to explore the city in all directions: One block/ 1 min walk from subway station on the red line, 5 mins walk to Slussen subway station with access to all of Stockholm's major subway lines, as well as buses and boats to the archipelago. 10 min walk to Gamla stan, as well as to ferries to Djurgården and Skeppsholmen. Nearby buses can take you around Södermalm, although the area is perfect for walks and bike rides.
interaction: We will of course always be available by phone and email during your stay, to answer any question that might come up.
house_rules: No smoking, no pets, no parties please.
host_about: Film director. Traveller. Dad.

It’s not aloud to have party’s in the apartment during you’re stay at any time. . No loud noises after 10pm . No smoking inside the apartment on the balcony and by the entrance of the house. . Maximum 4 people are aloud in the apartment during you’re stay. . No shoes inside. . Check in, not before 2 pm . Check out time, not later then 12 midday This is because we have another guest checking in at 2 pm so we have time to prepare the apartment for the next guest. Leave the apartment as clean as possible. I hope you agree to this rules and can respect them. If not I have to cancel the reservation.  If any of this rules not followed during you’re stay I have to cancel the reservation and you

name: Charmigt med det bästa läget!
summary: Välkommen att bo lugnt och samtidigt så trendigt och centralt man kan på Söder. Lägenheten är på 120 kvm, byggd i mitten av 1800-talet, ljus och luftig. Närområdet kantas av alla slags affärer, kaféer, restauranger, bageri mm. Toppen, helt enkelt!
space: Mitt i vimlet men ändå mycket lugnt ligger denna stora, ljusa och charmiga lägenhet. Fyra rum, varav ett används som matsal. Lägenheten ligger på två trappor (ej hiss). Huset vetter mot Repslagargatan och över den vackra gården ligger Götgatsbackens puls. Allt finns i närområdet och det är promenadavstånd till det mesta (t ex 5 min till Gamla Stan).
description: Välkommen att bo lugnt och samtidigt så trendigt och centralt man kan på Söder. Lägenheten är på 120 kvm, byggd i mitten av 1800-talet, ljus och luftig. Närområdet kantas av alla slags affärer, kaféer, restauranger, bageri mm. Toppen, helt enkelt! Mitt i vimlet men ändå mycket lugnt ligger denna stora, ljusa och charmiga lägenhet. Fyra rum, varav ett används som matsal. Lägenheten ligger på två trappor (ej hiss). Huset vetter mot Repslagargatan och över den vackra gården ligger Götgatsbackens puls. Allt finns i närområdet och det är promenadavstånd till det mesta (t ex 5 min till Gamla Stan). Som gäst har man tillgång till lakan, handdukar, tvål och toalettpapper. Givetvis också tv. Jag finns tillgänglig så mycket som behövs. Det bästa med det här boendet är att det dels är lugnt och samtidigt finns ett vimmel av folkliv, affärer och restauranger så nära. Franska tidsskriften Vogue utsåg nyligen Södermalm till det tredje coolaste området i världen! Lägenheten i sig är underbart charmig
neighborhood_overview: Det bästa med det här boendet är att det dels är lugnt och samtidigt finns ett vimmel av folkliv, affärer och restauranger så nära. Franska tidsskriften Vogue utsåg nyligen Södermalm till det tredje coolaste området i världen! Lägenheten i sig är underbart charmig och stor och gården är unik med kullersten och en fantastisk trädgård med utemöbler!
transit: Det är mycket nära till kollektivtrafik. Tvärs över Götgatan ligger tunnelbanan och vid Slussen går ett antal bussar till nästan alla stadsdelar. Vid Skeppsbron (strax nedanför Slussen) går färjor över till Djurgården.
access: Som gäst har man tillgång till lakan, handdukar, tvål och toalettpapper. Givetvis också tv.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment has an ideal and very central location in Stockholm, with easy access to most attractions. It's situated at Skanstull on Sodermalm, a very popular neighborhood with a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars. Its near to several great playgrounds and great walking and running paths by the water a few minutes away. Perfect for a picnic with the family. 5 minutes walk to indoor adventure bath and in summer outdoor pools at Eriksdalsbadet. In summer you can also take a short walk to Tantobadet. A beach in the centre of Stockholm! We love our neighborhood and our apartment, and hope you will too!
transit: You will find a well connected bus stop just down the block, where you can easily catch direct buses to many places in the city (unless you prefer the subway - Skanstull) There is also a City-bike pick-up stand at Skanstull.
interaction: I will meet you when you arrive if possible and you will receive good instructions and tips about the neighborhood.
house_rules: No pets due to allergy. Smoking outside.
host_about: I´m a Art Director living with the Librarian Leo and our two kids at the best place in Stockholm - Södermalm. We´d love to share our apartment and surroundings with other people and families.

Hope you like our apartment!

name: Oasis by the lake, 10 min from central Stockholm
summary: Welcome to your house with a view over lake Mälaren. A house made for many with 8 beds for all generations. 10-15 min from downtown Stockholm by subway or if you prefer to bike or walk, there are roads and paths for that too. The area is peaceful, the terrace made for relaxing or barbecuing and a balcony with sunshine. Welcome home!
space: Our house is a unique townhouse for 8 people with five bed rooms and a spacious living room and a big kitchen. It has both a balcony and a big terrace for up to 15 people.  The house is made in the 70s situated south of the city, just outside central Stockholm in a very peaceful environment. The exterior is listed for its historic value.
