neighborhood_overview: The house is situated in the area of Axelsberg/Mälarhöjden south of Stockholm,  It is a very peaceful area and you can take long walks by the lake from down town Stockholm to more southern suburbs.
notes: A cleaning fee is added to the price so you don't have to think about cleaning after your stay. The house is always cleaned in advance.
transit: The subway five minutes away takes you to the city centre in only 15 min. Only 5-10 minutes from the lovely Södermalm and bohemian chic Hornstull area. You can easily bike to down town Stockholm. The area has an advanced infrastructure for bikes.
access: As our guest you will have access to all the basic things you need in a house in order for you to feel completely at home. Ask me questions and I will support you in the best way I can. A weber charcoal bbg is available. Wifi is free.
interaction: The interaction with you as my guests depends on the weeks you choose to come. My family and I are living elsewhere during your stay. I might get some help from my friends our neighbours to deliver the keys. I will never be more far away than a phone call, sms or an email.
house_rules: I take care of the houses I rent and expect my guests to do the same. I want to feel at home when I travel and I want you to feel at home. Welcome!
host_about: I'm a curious person who love to travel, watch people and share stories about big and small things. I live with Peter and we have four children, my own and step childs, living with us. I also value time with myself, movies and good music. I take care of the homes I live in and expect you to do the same with mine. Love to connect!

summary: On the edge of the city’s restaurant and bar district, on famous Södermalm, but on a very quiet street. The building has a large enclosed garden. Subway, 4 mins walk. Bus, 1 min walk. Walks along the water, 3 mins. Subway to city center, 7 mins. It is a studio apartment with kitchen and one bathroom. In the room there is one Queen size bed and one very comfortable couch that you can sleep on. There is a laundry room in the building where you can book a slot of 4 hours at a time.

It is a studio apartment with kitchen and one bathroom. In the room there is one Queen size bed and one very comfortable couch that you can sleep on. neighborhood_overview: You are very close to everything that you might want to see and do. Museums, culture of any kind, live music, shopping, bars and restaurants. 70 kilometers from Stockholm (easy access by train) you can visit the ancient university city Uppsala. You can take boat trips in the archipelago, rent kayaks, just walk along the water and many other things.
transit: You are situated close to every kind of transport, subway, busses, trains and boats. If you need to take a taxi, be carful, there are some not so serious drivers out there. Only use the companies Taxi Stockholm, Taxi Kurir or Taxi 020 or Uber. There are also boat taxis. You can also rent a bike. They are everywhere.
interaction: Someone will meet you, give you keys and explain how everything works.
house_rules: Always show respect for your neighbours. Say hello, and try not to disturb them, especially after 10 o'clock in the evening.
host_about: I am a teacher, translator, journalist and musician. I would like you to feel welcome in my home and in my city, when I am away visiting someone else.

name: Beautiful perfectly located flat
summary: We have a beautiful 102 m2 apartment located in a building dated from 1900, 10 minutes walk from Stockholm's central station.  3 bedrooms, balcony, fully equipped kitchen. Calm area with many nice restaurants, shops and cafes.
space: We have a beautiful 102 m2 apartment located in a building dated from 1900, 10 minutes walk from Stockholm's central station.  Fully equipped kitchen with dish washer and more machinery than you probably need.  Master bedroom with double bed and desk. Child room one: one child bed (165 cm), a convertible sofa (sleeps 2 adults) and two additional loft beds for children (approx. 165 cm each). Not to forget, lots of toys! Child room two: baby cot, and loft for adult where an inflatable mattress can be put. Living room with balcony facing the inner garden and Stockholm's biggest mural (protected), "the garden party".  Bathroom with bath tub. Washing machine, dryer. Elevator. Wi-fi. Modern design mixed with classics. Not to forget loads of books in nine different languages... Enjoy this lovely apartment with 3,30 m ceilings with central Stockholm at your doorstep! NB: We moved here in October 2014, so reviews before that date are from our previous apartment which we also rented out via airb
description: We have a beautiful 102 m2 apartment located in a building dated from 1900, 10 minutes walk from Stockholm's central station.  3 bedrooms, balcony, fully equipped kitchen. Calm area with many nice restaurants, shops and cafes.     We have a beautiful 102 m2 apartment located in a building dated from 1900, 10 minutes walk from Stockholm's central station.  Fully equipped kitchen with dish washer and more machinery than you probably need.  Master bedroom with double bed and desk. Child room one: one child bed (165 cm), a convertible sofa (sleeps 2 adults) and two additional loft beds for children (approx. 165 cm each). Not to forget, lots of toys! Child room two: baby cot, and loft for adult where an inflatable mattress can be put. Living room with balcony facing the inner garden and Stockholm's biggest mural (protected), "the garden party".  Bathroom with bath tub. Washing machine, dryer. Elevator. Wi-fi. Modern design mixed with classics. Not to forget loads of books in nine differ
neighborhood_overview: Really nice area with many cosy cafes, trendy restaurants and small shops. 3 minutes walk to Norr Mälarstrand, one of the most popular water front walks in central Stockholm, along the water - walk for ten minutes and you are at the townhall for the Nobel prize party! We have a bus and subway close by - but you really can walk everywhere. Alternatively, hire a bike about 2 blocks from our apartment. Several parks close-by, you can go swimming (city beach at 15 minutes walk) or maybe kayaking? Sail boats can also be rented or you can go fishing just by the parliament, 15 minutes walk from our apartment - quite cool for being in the center of a European capital. All of (central) Stockholm is very safe.
transit: Two blocks from the subway stop rådhuset, and 3 buses stop one block up. Still, with this location you can walk everywhere.
interaction: We rent out the entire apartment.
house_rules: Welcome to our home, - No shoes inside. - No pets allowed. - No smoking allowed. - Keep all locks locked, and windows closed when you are away. - Turn off the lights when away. - Do not refurnish the apartment. - Keep the noise down after 22:00 - 7:00 - The floors are sensitive, please don't drag bags, or chairs on the floor. - Please keep the apartment clean, as you would like to find it yourself.
host_about:
We, Anna and Justus, are a Swedish-Dutch couple who met in Brazil - needless to say that we love travelling! 
Anna is an engineer and Justus works as an Operations Manager with at a large consulting company. We have two daughters born in September 2011 and October 2013, and a third surprise coming up fall 2016.

 We really like sports and being outdoors, and even if we live in the middle of the city, we can easily practise our interests with this location. We are also both members of the voloneer organisation AFS. Anna is obsessed with cooking. Justus is mainly into eating.

name: 1 bedroom apartment on Kungsholmen
summary: My apt is located in central Stockholm on a small island, it’s 32sqm in size, well planned, clean, bright with lots of plants, large alcove bed and a french balcony. Quiet, chilled building with a green square outside. 3 min walk to the bus station!
space: My apartment is located in central Stockholm on a small island called Lilla Essingen, part of the area Kungsholmen. The apartment itself is about 32 sqm in size, well planned, clean and bright with lots of plants, holds a large alcove bed (two people can sleep here with ease), a french balcony, all mod cons, shower, wifi and washer/dryer in the building. Comfy couch, a big flat screen TV and a big marble desk if you need space to work. If you like music I have two record players and a mixer too. It's a quiet and chilled building with a small green square located outside. I'm part of the co op board so if there's anything you'd like to know - just ask. I've had the apartment for about 4 years, love it and the location, hopefully you will too.
description: My apt is located in central Stockholm on a small island, it’s 32sqm in size, well planned, clean, bright with lots of plants, large alcove bed and a french balcony. neighborhood_overview: Lilla Essingen is a lovely small island, takes you about 20 minutes to walk around it, a lot of nature and if you're lucky and it's still warm in early September - you can swim from two spots of the island. There's a few places to eat and small corner shops on the island too.
notes: I would prefer to rent out my flat for as long as possible to the same guest/s if possible. Also, I'm part of the co-op board, so I know the building well if there's anything you'd like to know.
transit: It's very easy to get to Stockholm city by bus route 1, and the stop is 3 minutes from the apartment. The 1 bus goes every 6-7 minutes and it takes about 15 minutes to get to the center of the city (the Central Station, Stureplan). If you need to catch the subway, you can take the bus three stops to Fridhemsplan and take the green line there.
access: Everything (apart from my storage, I guess that would be pretty boring...)
interaction: I will be traveling but of course available by phone and email - we will set up everything you need to know and need beforehand. If there's anything urgent, my best buddy lives in the same building.
house_rules: Enjoy it! (just don't trash it) I like to find it as clean as I leave it, no dirt bags please :---)
host_about: I am a 33 yo creative who love to travel, this is of course why I'm on here... Eating, drinking, dj'ing and hanging out with good friends is on my list. Hopefully we can work something out with my place here in Stockholm whilst I'm away during this time!

name: Penthouse in central Stockholm
summary: A welcoming and spacious flat on the top floor, located at the heart of Östermalm neighborhood, one of the city's more pleasant and luxurious enclaves.
space: A welcoming and spacious flat on the top floor, located at the heart of Östermalm neighborhood, one of the city's more pleasant and luxurious enclaves.  The flat is within walking distance of Stureplan offering the city's best shopping, a rich nightlife and a hotspot for great cafes, bars and restaurants like Berns, Nosh & Chow, Sturehof and my own favorite place Nybrogatan 38. It's only a few minutes away from just about all sights in Stockholm, including the Royal Castle, and a short stroll from the green and tree-filled expanse of Humlegården and the beautiful Djurgården, with the museum and zoo of Skansen and the amusement park Gröna Lund.  Just around the corner, you will also find the nearest subway stop and buses. Despite the central location, the area is safe, pleasant and quiet. The apartment is 145 square meters with a spacious and light livingroom with wooden ceiling beams, large windows in both directions, flat screen TV and dining table in Swedish pine wood for up to 10 pe

name: Beautiful room with private bathroom
summary: My beautiful apartment is located in a house from the 1881, on third floor. Its a quiet area, but only a few steps from the pulse of the city. Walking distance to the Old Town. 8 minutes by tube to the Ericsson Globe.
space: I live in a 4 room apartment of 110 square metres. You will have the guestroom with your own bathroom; WC and shower. The guestroom have twin beds that can be combined to a double bed depending on preference. Suitable for both friends and couples. There is two big closets in the room.  The room is about 20 square metre.

The room is about 20 square metre. You have of course access to the living room and kitchen. The apartment is on 3th floor, no elevator. Wifi. Cleaning is included. Bedlinen and towels are included in the price. There is a washing machine in the apartment you can use. The area Södermalm is not touristy and has many trendy restaurants and shops in the immediate neighborhood.  Södermalm is home to a multitude of unusual, interesting and contemporary boutiques for fashion, design, interior déc
neighborhood_overview: The area Södermalm is not touristy and has many trendy restaurants and shops in the immediate neighborhood.  Södermalm is home to a multitude of unusual, interesting and contemporary boutiques for fashion, design, interior décor, vintage merchandise and curios, at the same time it is an old working-class area. In general the selection on Södermalm is trendier, younger and more bohemian than in downtown.  Söder is the home for the caracters in Stieg Larsson’s novels, The Millennium.
notes: (URL HIDDEN)
transit: Excellent connections with the entire subways and bus systems. You have walking distance to the Old town with the Royal Palace. Closest subway station is Slussen or Medborgarplatsen. 8 minutes to the Ericsson Globe. From Old town you can take a ferry, Djurgårdsfärjan, to many interesting sights, such as Vasa museum and ABBA The Museum.
access: You have of course access to the living room and kitchen. The apartment is on 3th floor, no elevator. Wifi.
interaction: Cleaning is included. Bedlinen and towels are included in the price. There is a washing machine in the apartment you can use.
house_rules: This is my home and I hope you will like it as much as I do. Please note that the apartment is smoke free and that I have cats.
host_about: I consider myself as proper and reliable, non smoking cat owner. I love my home and I hope you also will like it.

name: Secluded loft in central Stockholm
summary: Welcome to our little apartment in the very heart of Södermalm. A 40m² loft in a culturally marked building from 1852, the apartment is bright, neat and charmingly decorated. A quiet living space, yet only 5 mins from the buzzing street of Götgatan.
space: Welcome to our little apartment in the very heart of Södermalm. A 40m² loft in a culturally marked building from 1852, the apartment is bright, neat and charmingly decorated. A quiet living space, yet only 5 mins from the buzzing street of Götgatan. A petite 2 rooms apartment! The loft is on the 3rd floor of the building with 6 roof windows that fills the interior space with fresh air and light. The apartment is perfect for 2 and comfortable to accommodate 1 to 2 more with the sofa bed in the living room. For those who enjoy a cup of good quality coffee and pastry, there are cafes and bakeries just downstairs and around the corners. Hi-speed internet Wifi, TV, hair dryer, radio, bed linens and towels. I am traveling from time to time, available by phone and emails for questions, if I happen to be abroad, my boyfriend, Thomas, will be there to help you with all your curiosity about Stockholm. We love to share our tips and experience with our guests, so don't hesitate with your questions
description: Welcome to our little apartment in the very heart of Södermalm. A 40m² loft in a culturally marked building from 1852, the apartment is bright, neat and charmingly decorated. I am traveling from time to time, avail
neighborhood_overview: A very charming part of Södermalm, where you find yourself in the older part of this island. On the same street, you find a beautiful brick building, Södra Latins gymnasium, as well as Maria Magdalena church. The vibe in the streets of Södermalm is relaxed, creative and trendy. This neighborhood offers a myriad of vintage stores, shops, Swedish fashion, galleries and design stores, mixed with an abundance of places to eat and drink.
transit: The apartment is located in the middle of 2 subway stations, 'Slussen' and 'Mariatorget', they are both about 5 mins walking distance.  You can get around easily with walking, e.g. to 'Old town' (Gamla Stan) is about 10 mins walk. Subway is not the only mean of transport around, bus, SJ train and SL tram stations are also close to home! Getting to the Central Station* from Arlanda Airport is easy. You have two options: • Arlanda Express train ~20 min, 260kr • Flygbussarna bus ~50 min, 105kr  And • Fixed price cab to the apartment ~40 min, about 500kr, price deviates with different taxi company. *Central Station is 2 stops away from Slussen
access: Hi-speed internet Wifi, TV, hair dryer, radio, bed linens and towels.
interaction: I am traveling from time to time, available by phone and emails for questions, if I happen to be abroad, my boyfriend, Thomas, will be there to help you with all your curiosity about Stockholm. We love to share our tips and experience with our guests, so don't hesitate with your questions. Enjoy your stay!
house_rules: No parties, no loud music, no smoking indoors, no pets.  A special care for our kitchen if you cook. Please take good care of the white kitchen top. Colourant food, e.g. tomato sauce, coffee, tea leaf can leave a stain on the sink or the kitchen top that cannot be removed, so simply clean and wipe off after cooking.
host_about: Lived in many different countries, love cultures, food, sports and many more! Currently living in the beautiful city of Stockholm and work as an industrial designer.

name: Artistic Studio, Central Stockholm
summary: Charming studio apartment right in the center of Stockholm, the Södermalm area.  Close to subway, cafés, restaurants, shops and parks. A cosy park just outside, with an amazing view of Stockholm.
space: The studio fits the comfortable queen (160cm width) bed and livingroom in the same space. It´s bright and cosy. A perfect summer stay while exploring the city. This is my home, please be mindful of that and the neighbors. And as I have some plants I really care for I would appreciate if you can water them if needed during your stay.  Thank you!

There is no access to laundry facilities during your stay.

host_about:
I work as a director within films. Based in Stockholm in Sweden. Alongside that I also work as a DJ so music is a major part of my life as well. 
I mostly travel the world either through my work or for surfing. My major passion and what takes me to the most amazing places on this planet. 

I am very respectful of the homes I rent, as I myself have rented my place out at times. 

Any questions or concerns please don't hesitate to ask.

space: Here you have a large kitchen. And a nice bathroom. You will have a 120 cm wide bed. Extra mattress is available on request. There is no traffic outside the window. Parking outside on the street. The room is 13m2 large.

house_rules: Syftet med husreglerna är att alla gäster skall få en trevlig vistelse i min lägenhet.  Rökning i lägenheten eller direkt utanför byggnaden är inte tillåtet.  Husdjur är inte tillåtna i lägenheten.  Använd helst inte starka parfymer. Noggrann och ansvarsfull användning av lägenheten och dess innehåll efterfrågas.  Gästen är ombedd att behandla lägenheten och dess innehåll med samma omsorg som om det var hans / hennes egen.  Mellan kl 22:00 och 07: 00 ombeds gästerna att upprätthålla lugn och ro med hänsyn till andra boenden i trappuppgången.  Olyckor händer, men gästen har ansvaret för att betala för skador som orsakats genom vårdslöshet, avsiktlig förstörelse eller genom oavsiktlig användning av möbler eller annat innehåll i lägenheten. (Exempel är brännskador, skador eller nedsmutsning av möbler eller textilier, inklusive brott av glas och tallrikar, eller förlorade nycklar etc.)

name: Central 65m2 in SoFo with park view
summary: Well planned newly renovated apt of 65 sqm, centrally located with a beautiful view over a park and the Sofia church. Modern bathroom and kitchen. Family friendly. Quiet area in SoFo, 5 min from the hip Nytorget square.
space: Quiet yet a very central spot in a trendy area. Spacious kitchen, newly renovated with a dishwasher and induction hob. The bathroom is also newly renovated with a luxurious rain shower. The bedroom has a kingsize double bed (180x200cm) with a window towards a leafy courtyard. Two more guests can sleep on mattresses in the living room (one is inflatable).
description: Well planned newly renovated apt of 65 sqm, centrally located with a beautiful view over a park and the Sofia church. Modern bathroom and kitchen. Family friendly. Quiet area in SoFo, 5 min from the hip Nytorget square. Quiet yet a very central spot in a trendy area. Spacious kitchen, newly renovated with a dishwasher and induction hob. The bathroom is also newly renovated with a luxurious rain shower. The bedroom has a kingsize double bed (180x200cm) with a window towards a leafy courtyard. Two more guests can sleep on mattresses in the living room (one is inflatable). Acess to dishwasher, induction hob, oven, microwave, refrigerator, freezer, mixer, coffee brewer and all our other cookware. In the bathroom you may use our towel dryer. In the living room we have a flatscreen HDTV, Playstation 4 and a hifi stereo. You have access to the courtyard where you can barbecue and pick fresh herbs, or just relax a little. You have access to a laundry room in the basement. Smoking and pets are
neighborhood_overview: Just outside the house is the large and leafy Vitabergsparken where there are beautiful preserved 19th century cottages, and in the center the magnificient Sofia church. We recommend to bring a picnic basket and sit down in the grass beside the church for a spectacular view over the rooftops of Södermalm. Don't miss the Park Theatre that has free concerts and shows during the summer. If you are bringing children there is a popular playground here inside the park. It's 100 meters to the local Coop foodstore that has a deli. There are several pubs, bars and resturants very close to the house, but we recommend that you walk 500 meters to Nytorget with its many trendy bars, clothing stores, cafe's and an amazing icecream store. Södermalm is a very hip neighbourhood with a rich cultural life, several bathing spots in the fresh waters surrounding our island, cinemas, theathers, and many, I mean MANY resturants and bars, you can find it all here.
notes: If you love nature, do visit Nackareservatet, (take bus 401 towards Älta) and do a hike in the protected wilderness. If you wish to go jogging there are many trails you can take from our house, either jog through Hammarby Sjöstad towards Hammarbybacken (the ski hill you see from our window), or why not run to the old prison island Långholmen where there is a very nice little beach for swimming.  There are several other bathing spots on Södermalm. Tantolunden, Årstaviken are two others we recommend. Stockholm has very clean water so you can actually swim in the middle of the city.  If you wish to go shopping instead, there are a lot of trendy stores within just 5 minutes walking distance. Our favourite restaurant in the neighbourhood is the japanese restaurant Blue Light Yokohama, where you need to book a table. We also recommend you visit the skybar "Och himlen därtill" which is on the top floor of Skrapan very close to Medborgarplatsen (T); they have amazing drinks here. If you are a
transit: From Arlanda, take the Arlanda express or the local commuter train to Stockholm C, at Stockholm C take bus 53 and get off at Ersta Sjukhus. If you take the local commuter train you may also get off at Stockholm södra and switch to bus 66; get off at Erstagatan if you do this. You can also park in the neighbourhood  if you can find a spot. From the apartment there's 100 m to bus 2 which is one of the four blue buses of Stockholm. The blue buses leaves around every third minute during daytime, and this bus will take you to Slussen, Old town, Stureplan etc. You have around 200 meters to bus 53 which will take you to the Central station and bus 71 that will take you to Slussen. If you walk down from the mountain (a seven minute walk but it's a beautiful panoramic walk among small cottages) you end up at Londonviadukten where you can access the buses to the islands east of Stockholm and here is also the ferry terminal to Finland.
access: Acess to dishwasher, induction hob, oven, microwave, refrigerator, freezer, mixer, coffee brewer and all our other cookware. In the bathroom you may use our towel dryer. In the living room we have a flatscreen HDTV, Playstation 4 and a hifi stereo. You have access to the courtyard where you can barbecue and pick fresh herbs, or just relax a little. You have access to a laundry room in the basement. Smoking and pets are not allowed.
interaction: You will reccieve the key from us or another person.
house_rules: Pets and smoking is not allowed, please respect the neighbours and don't play music after 10 PM. Be gentle with the plants in the courtyard. Cleaning is mandatory upon departure. Leave the apartment in the condition that you yourself would like to find it in.
host_about: Hi! I really like the concept of Airbnb. I'm a very social, outgoing person, married to Magnus. I am an entrepreneur and I love to create new solutions to old problems. I enjoy meeting new people and hearing their stories, learning new things and seeing new places. I cannot live without nature; I love hiking, jogging, gardening, being in the wilderness... I used to be a DJ and my favorite genres are alternative rock, indie, synth, electro and anything retro. Love the sight of vinyl records. One of my favorite authors is John Steinbeck. Jim Jarmusch and Ingmar Bergman has made many great movies. So have the Coen brothers. I follow True Blood, Girls and MadMen. I seldom watch TV. I love smoothies and premium food which we cook from natural organic ingredients. My mission is to make guests feel that this was the best holiday in a long time. I want our home to be comfortable, tidy and visitor friendly. Why not read one of our books if you have a rainy / lazy day? I hope that this description gave you a hint of who I am.

Mitt boende passar par, ensamäventyrare, affärsresenärer, familjer (med barn) och fyrbenta vänner (husdjur). Hela lägenheten Vi finns alltid per telefon och kan snabbt komma om det uppstår någon situation. Lägenheten ligger praktiskt taget på Odenplan, där pulsen och utelivet är närvarande samtidigt som du kan koppla av skönt i lägenheten och stänga dig ute från myllret. Om du vill se och utforska Stockholm tar du dig lätt med diverse kommunikationsmedel till olika delar av staden. Vi rekommenderar varmt att upptäcka alla härliga restauranger runt vårt kvarter, Sven Harrys, Vasaparken om ni har barn och Hagaparken för en skön promenad i kunglig anda. När det gäller lokaltrafik bor ni i navet och tar er lätt till olika platser i staden med t-banan, bussar och snart pendeltåget.

neighborhood_overview: Outside on Tomtebogatan 53 is calm and quiet as it is a dead-end street, but you are close to just about everything you need and want and more. The things that makes Birkastan (also called little Paris) so special and popular are the large and varied range of restaurants, cafes and small bakeries. On Rörstrandsgatan you always smell fresh coffee and the atmosphere is friendly and relaxed. Summertime the side-walks fills up when the outdoor terraces are brought out. There are also grocery stores, 7-Eleven, dry cleaners, cobblers, and a number of trendy clothing stores, several cozy cafés and other small, quaint shops. Karlbergskanalen with its sparkling waters with in a few minutes of walking distance of the house offers good jogging tracks for those who enjoy early runs or even a cosy evening walk a long the channel. Transport links in the area are also good.  From S:T Eriksplan you can take the green tube line, several city buses and airport buses and Karlberg station offers another c

summary: Modern and stylish one-bedroom apartment located in Stockholm's trendiest area, Hornstull on Södermalm.
space: Modern and stylish one-bedroom apartment located in Stockholm's trendiest area, Hornstull on Södermalm. Hornstull was recently featured in a New York Times article as Stockholm's trendiest and hippest neighborhood. Our apartment measures 43 square meters and was recently renovated. The bed is 140 cm. There is also a sofa. The bathroom features heated tile floor and a shower. The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, oven, coffee maker, toaster, and all the utensils you might need to cook a great meal! The living room has a sofa that will sleep one person comfortably. The living room is spacious. Our place is located 5 min from Hornstull's underground station which will take you to the city centre in less than 10 minutes. Located close by you will also find excellent grocery stores, pharmacies, Systemblaget (state-run liquor store for wine, beer, etc.) and all other services you migh need.  Finally, Hornstull boast several of Stockholm's hippest bars and restaurants, just outside your d

name: A charming studio in Södermalm
summary: Welcome to this comfortable and artistic 1 bedroom studio with kitchen and bathroom in the heart of south Stockholm. Double bed, a romantic view over a quiet yard and all you need of shopping, nightlife, culture and parks nearby.
space: A charming 1 bedroom studio with kitchen and bathroom. Very artistic & creative environment in the south of Stockholm. Double bed and a romantic view. You are close to shopping, bars, restaurants, culture and parks. Subway is Skanstull - 3 minutes from the house.

Double bed, a romantic view over a quiet yard and all you need of shopping, nightlife, culture and parks nearby. A charming 1 bedroom studio with kitchen and bathroom. Very artistic & creative environment in the south of Stockholm. Double bed and a romantic view. You are close to shopping, bars, restaurants, culture and parks. Subway is Skanstull - 3 minutes from the house. If you wish I can give you a lot of ideas of what to do in Stockholm. The whole Södermalm (south) of Stockholm is a very nice area with lots of things to see and do. It is one of the oldest parts of Stockholm and the genuine atmosphere is very inspiring, whatever the purpose of your stay. Subway station is Skanstull, there are also lot of buses if you wish. You can of course also walk, Södermalm is close to the center of Stockholm and the historical Old Town (Gamla Stan)

name: Martin's place
summary: Bright, spacious & quiet room only 3-12 min away from Södermalm, Old Town and City center. Only 4 min walk  from subway station. Located on 4th floor in nice & calm Aspudden. Two single beds together/apart. Nearby, a supermarket, pharmacy and several restaurants/cafés,  yoga studio etc. 5 min walk to lake Mälaren and the beautiful park Vinterviken. Lovely nature, garden café/restaurant, art gallery, minizoo and areas for walking, sunbathing or a swim makes it an attractive part of Stockhom.
space: The room is on the 4th floor facing east with a lot of light and direct sunlight in the morning.  Bright, clean and with plenty of space for cloths and other things. Two single beds together or apart. Possible to lock the door. Fast 4G Wifi, but at the moment limited to 2 Gb per day.
description: Bright, spacious & quiet room only 3-12 min away from Södermalm, Old Town and City center. Only 4 min walk  from subway station. Located on 4th floor in nice & calm Aspudden. Two single beds together/apart. Nearby, a supermarket, pharmacy and several restaurants/cafés,  yoga studio etc. 5 min walk to lake Mälaren and the beautiful park Vinterviken. Lovely nature, garden café/restaurant, art gallery, minizoo and areas for walking, sunbathing or a swim makes it an attractive part of Stockhom. The room is on the 4th floor facing east with a lot of light and direct sunlight in the morning.  Bright, clean and with plenty of space for cloths and other things. Two single beds together or apart. Possible to lock the door. Fast 4G Wifi, but at the moment limited to 2 Gb per day. We share kitchen and bathroom.  Livingroom and balcony can be used when host is not at home or after agreement. I'm a social and calm person. Don't hesitate to ask me if you need anything. I hope you'll enjoy your stay
neighborhood_overview: Aspudden is a calm, historical, trendy and close vicinity to central Stockholm. Nature is around the corner and the city center just 3-12 min away with the subway depending on where you want to go. In the neighbourhood you'll find supermarkets, pharmacy, restaurants/cafés, yoga studio, mini zoo, book shop and even a mini golf with café. A few min walk to lake Mälaren and the beautiful park Vinterviken. Lovely nature, garden café/rest, art gallery, temporary events and nice areas for walking, sunbathing or a swim makes it an attractive part of Stockhom to hang out the whole day.  It was also here Alfred Nobel, the inventor of dynamite, did his experiments in the building that is now a café/restaurant and art gallery.
notes: Fast 4G Wifi, but at the moment limited to 2 Gb per day.
transit: Quickest way to get into town is by subway. Just a few minutes from my place. Then only 10-12 min to Old Town or City center. And only 3 min to the beautiful island of Södermalm, one of the city center islands with a laid back atmosphere. About public transportation   (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Or why not a nice walk in a mix of nature, urban life and water into town. FROM ARLANDA AIRPORT Airport buses to either the City center (40 min) or Liljeholmen (40 min). Liljeholmen is just one subway station away from Aspudden, which is the station closest to my place.  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  You can also take the airport train, Arlanda Express, to the city center. FROM SKAVSTA AIRPORT Bus to city center. Then public transportation.  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  FROM CENTRAL TRAIN STATION Public transportation  PUBLIC TRANSPORTION  From the city center (T-centralen) or Liljeholmen, take the subway (red line 13) towards Norsborg.  Get off at station Aspudden. There is just one exit to the s

Social, calm and curious person that enjoys culture, nature and nice chats with  friendly people. I work within the educational area. 

Among other things, I like kayaking, yoga, violin, salsa, sailing, hiking, motorbiking, and enjoy different kinds of art and discussions about all aspects of this big happening called life...

I'm also renting out a room in my flat, so please feel free to check it out. And hopefully you would like to stay a night  or two. I'm calm and easy going.

name: A modern three bedroom flat near water
summary: The flat is roomy, quiet and sunny. Besides the large livingroom/kitchen area there are three proper bedrooms provide good sleep for everyone! Close to the beautiful water area of Stockholm city - Mälaren, strolls along the water and close to nightlife and shopping at Hornstull. Child friendly area.
space: A flat in a 6 story building, built in 2004 so yes, modern, clean and quiet. Three bedrooms and an open area with kitchen, dining table and livingroomarea ( sofa and flat screen) There is a nice balcony facing south, for a breakfast in the sun and sun through to five o.clock. A masterbedroom (two comfy beds, possible to slide apart to two single beds, 90 cm wide each)  and two smaller but capacious bedrooms ( each with a single, comy bed, 90 cm wide)  Fully equipped kitchen (oven, fridge, freezer and a modern stovetop). Open plan, light and nice connection between kitchen, dining area and living room. A nice and peaceful area near water, restaurants, cafes, bakery, dry clean, takeaways. Beautiful green surroundings along the waterfront. Perfect for walks and jogging. Ten minutes walk to the nearst Subway station, but you can also catch a bus or the tram. Close to lively hot Hornstull (Brooklyn of Stockholm!) and Stockholm city.  Cable, netflix, wi fi Upplev närheten till vattnet i den

name: Studio apartment
summary: Comfortable and spacious studio apartment for two. Located close to Södermalm, this apartment has a modern vibe in a vintage 1930s building.

description: Comfortable and spacious studio apartment for two. Located close to Södermalm, this apartment has a modern vibe in a vintage 1930s building. The studio is modern, newly renovated and very comfortable. High ceiling, clean and airy. It fits two people perfectly!  You will have access to a full kitchen, perfect if you want to prepare a nice breakfast or your favorite dish! Bathroom includes a shower. In the basement there is a washing room for clothes, be sure to book it a couple of days in advance. You will be able to reach me when you want to during your stay via phone or e-mail. I will meet you on your arrival to hand over the key. Quiet housing area with good communications. Södermalm with its stores and bars is only a ten minute walk away and at nearby Gullmarsplan you will find convenient stores, restaurants, a 24-hour open store and the Swedish wine store Systembolaget. You will also be quite close to the green area of Nackareservatet and some good spots for taking a swim at the ne
neighborhood_overview: Quiet housing area with good communications. Södermalm with its stores and bars is only a ten minute walk away and at nearby Gullmarsplan you will find convenient stores, restaurants, a 24-hour open store and the Swedish wine store Systembolaget. You will also be quite close to the green area of Nackareservatet and some good spots for taking a swim at the nearby open-air Eriksdalsbadet.
transit: Just a two-minute walk away at Gullmarsplan you will find the metro which will take you to the city centre in just ten minutes. There are also buses and a tram line to take you further south, east and west.
access: You will have access to a full kitchen, perfect if you want to prepare a nice breakfast or your favorite dish! Bathroom includes a shower. In the basement there is a washing room for clothes, be sure to book it a couple of days in advance.
interaction: You will be able to reach me when you want to during your stay via phone or e-mail. I will meet you on your arrival to hand over the key.
house_rules: No shoes allowed indoors except for in the hallway. No smoking allowed.
host_about: I'm a musician and sound mixer for tv and film and I've lived in Stockholm since 2001. I'm originally from the north of Sweden but I enjoy Sthlm so much that it will probably be my hometown for the rest of my life. I like to travel and meet new people and I think airbnb is a good way to accommodate yourself when traveling, because it's affordable and it's more fun to stay in an original apartment instead of your standard hotel. And you also get to meet interesting and friendly people thru it. Welcome!

name: Central apartment in green area
summary: Located on a small island of Stockholm. Close to the center, quiet and green area  with surrounding water. 5 min walking to restaurants, cafés, grocery store and boutiques. Clean and comfortable place with balcony and garden, for 1-3 people.
space: The apartment is located on one of Stockholm’s smaller islands, Stora Essingen. It is perfect for a couple, a group of friends or a small family. It has one separate bedroom with a bed for 1-2 people (120 cm) and a comfortable sofa for an adult or child to sleep on.  The apartment has windows facing two directions and a big balcony with double doors, which brings a lot of light. The balcony is big enough for 4 people or more to sit on. Why not enjoy your morning coffee or evening dinner while watching the sun set from the balcony. The building also has a shared garden with a big BBQ that is free to use. Either relax in the garden or let the children play here. In a walking distance of 5 min you will find a square with restaurants, cafés, a grocery store and boutiques. There is a beach within 5 min walking and other more adventurous places to go swimming. There is a walking trail around the island of about 5 km for the more sporty one. If you have children there are several playgrounds
description: Located on a small island of Stockholm. Close to the center, quiet and green area  with surrounding water. 5 min walking to restaurants, cafés, grocery store and boutiques. Clean and comfortable place with balcony and garden, for 1-3 people. The apartment is located on one of Stockholm’s smaller islands, Stora Essingen. It is perfect for a couple, a group of friends or a small family. It has one separate bedroom with a bed for 1-2 people (120 cm) and a comfortable sofa for an adult or child to sleep on.  The apartment has windows facing two directions and a big balcony with double doors, which brings a lot of light. The balcony is big enough for 4 people or more to sit on. Why not enjoy your morning coffee or evening dinner while watching the sun set from the balcony. The building also has a shared garden with a big BBQ that is free to use. Either relax in the garden or let the children play here. In a walking distance of 5 min you will find a square with restaurants, cafés, a grocery
neighborhood_overview: Stora Essingen used to be the place where the rich people of Stockholm had their summer houses. As the city has grown it is now part of the city centre, but still has a mix of big villas and apartment buildings. Since the island is small, there are plenty of green spaces and swimming possibilities. It is quite and safe, with a proud local community. It has the city's only French speaking school, so you are very likely to hear French in the streets.
transit: The apartment is well contacted with public transportation. The city center busses go all night and also the tram (Tvärbanan). Bus nr 1 takes 10 min to Fridhemsplan which is a big commuting hub (2 metro lines – green and blue - and busses including the airport shuttle). The tram takes 10 min to Liljeholmen, another commuting hub (1 metro line – red – and busses including the airport shuttle). In the summer time boats go from the islands to the royal Drottningholm Palace.
access: The living room is spacious with a table for 4-6 people. An extra table from the kitchen can be added to fit more people. There is also a comfortable sofa that can be used as a bed, bookcase, TV and balcony.
interaction: I will be there to hand over the keys. In some cases a friend of mine will be there to meet you instead. I’d be happy to tell you everything there is to know about the area and if there is anything in particular you’d like to know about Stockholm.
house_rules: Feel free to use the place as if it was your home! Tidy up and through the garbage in the bin by the entrance of the house when you leave. Please water the flowers. If they die I will be very sad.
host_about: I love travelling, therefore my apartment is free to rent from time to time. Otherwise, I work full time and do amateur boxing. I also love cooking vegetarian food, swimming in the summer, running in the forest, drinking coffee and reading.

name: Comfortable in central Södermalm
summary: A comfortable and cosy three bedroom apartment in the middle of Södermalm - close to shopping and entertainment as well as water, city beach and cafés along Årstaviken.  Communication and local services in the neighbourhood. Södermalm is also best area in town for familys with children due to the large variety of parks, play grounds and family activities.
space: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) spacious bedrooms and a large, fully equipped kitchen if you like to cook. Dishwasher and micro. Washing machine & tub in the bathroom. Laundry room, bicycle storage and stroller storage in the house. For the family with children, please feel free to use all our equipment: crib, two high chairs, potty, toys etc.

(Phone number hidden by Airbnb) spacious bedrooms and a large, fully equipped kitchen if you like to cook. Dishwasher and micro. Washing machine & tub in the bathroom. Best possible location right in the middle of Södermalm. Just as close to the water at Årstaviken as it is to Nytorget and all the ente
neighborhood_overview: Best possible location right in the middle of Södermalm. Just as close to the water at Årstaviken as it is to Nytorget and all the entertainment that Söder has to offer in between. The apartment  is surrounded by two parks on a quiet and calm street. A small "private" park at the back of the house (Blekingetäppan) where the residents sunbathe, barbecue and socialize, and a larger park with play ground, ice cream and café in the front of the house (Rosenlundsparken). About 10 minutes walk to Nytorget, or 5 minutes to shopping center Skrapan or Ringen. Lots of restaurants, bars, cafes and shops within walking distance but Hallandsgatan itself is a calm and quiet street. About 10-15 minutes walk to Årstaviken with walking paths along the water all around Södermalm. Årstaviken has a lot to offer in terms of beatiful paths, food and cafés, mini golf, boule and of course Tanto Strandbad with sandy beach, jetties, jumping tower etc. 10 minutes by car to the city, or 15 minutes by metro. Three
notes: We have no tv, but wireless wifi for wathing telly at the computer
transit: The nearest metro stations are Medborgarplatsen or Skanstull (the green line). Also pretty close to Mariatorget (the red line). Approximately four minutes walk to bus no. 3 & 4. Bus stop for no. 57 passing through Kungsträdgården is located right outside the house. Also close to the commuter train at Södra Station. Usually no problems at all to find a parking space in the neighborhood.

house_rules: We live an easy family Life and we expect the same from You! Please don´t be careless, messy or disturb the neighbours.

name: Remodelled central yoga studio
summary: You'll feel real close to Stockholm sleeping in this unique spacious apartment. Surrounded by great restaurants and cafés and a two minute walk to the subway is just a few of the perks that comes with this remodelled yoga studio.
space: In Stockholm, it's more common that companies move into old apartments than people moving into flats that's actually old stores or studios. That makes this old yoga studio the best planned 36 square meters I've ever seen.  It's really spacious and you have everything you'll need in the same big room.

name: Central 3-room flat
summary: Central flat with great transportations nearby. 85 m2 apartment consisting of 3 rooms (2 bedrooms and a living room area) + kitchen and bathroom (with bathtub). Dishwasher in the kitchen, a barbeque area and playground in secluded inner yard.
space: The apartment is only a 10-15 min walk away from the Central station, with great transportation options available to all areas of Stockholm. It is a light and spacious 1920's building, with lovely original features. We live 2 adults and two small children in the space, but it can accommodate more people (depending on your requirements regarding standard). We have one large double-bed in the main bedroom, which will accommodate 2 adults. There is also a junior bed and a baby crib available, as well as a mattress on the floor in the other bedroom which can be used by 1 or 2 adults to sleep on. This means that the apartment can house up to 4 adults and 2 smaller children (or 2 adults and 2 teens + 2 smaller children), depending on your needs and requirements. If you have any questios or concerns, please ask before booking.
description: Central flat with great transportations nearby. 85 m2 apartment consisting of 3 rooms (2 bedrooms and a living room area) + kitchen and bathroom (with bathtub). Dishwasher in the kitchen, a barbeque area and playground in secluded inner yard. The apartment is only a 10-15 min walk away from the Central station, with great transportation options available to all areas of Stockholm. It is a light and spacious 1920's building, with lovely original features. We live 2 adults and two small children in the space, but it can accommodate more people (depending on your requirements regarding standard). We have one large double-bed in the main bedroom, which will accommodate 2 adults. There is also a junior bed and a baby crib available, as well as a mattress on the floor in the other bedroom which can be used by 1 or 2 adults to sleep on. This means that the apartment can house up to 4 adults and 2 smaller children (or 2 adults and 2 teens + 2 smaller children), depending on your needs and requ
neighborhood_overview: Nearby are several lovely parks with outdoor gyms, playground areas etc: Kronobergsparken (1 min away by foot), Rålambshovsparken (5-8 min away by foot), Vasaparken (10 min away by foot). There are also bathing oportunities at Smedsuddsbadet (near Rålambshovsparken), where one can rent kajaks and canoes etc. In Rålambshovsparken there's also a boule café, an amphitheater, a public playground,and more. The apartment is close to several restaurants ans cafés, as well as shops and food stores. The Central station is only a short walk away down Fleminggatan (10-15 mins by foot). City Hall is equally close, if you walk down either Hantverkargatan or Norr Mälarstrand (a lovely boardwalk overlooking Mälaren). 30 seconds from the apartment is also Kungsholmsstrand - another lovely boardwalk, moving alongside Barnhusviken and Karlbergssjön).
transit: Subway (green and/or blue line), buses (blue buses 1,3 and 4, as well as several other red line buses).
access: Shared amenities: barbeque are, playground area, laundry.
interaction: We will be glad to answer any questions you might have, but will not be present at the listing during the stay itself (however, guests will always be able to reach us via e-mail or mobile phone).
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment and no pets. No loud music or loud, disruptive behaviour after 10 PM (general rules for all tenants in the building). Guests should provide their own expendable items (suchs as soap, schampoo, groceries etc), but may use our detergents and cleaning materials (incuding washing-up liquid and washing tablets for the dishwasher).
host_about: We are a family of four living in central Stockholm, Sweden. Hélène works as an administator at the Karolinska Institute and enjoys painting, drawing and experiencing both cities and nature by foot. Martin works as a language consultant and likes fishing, reading and spending time with friends and family. Signe is one and a half years old and loves to dance, take baths and cuddle with her little brother Viggo who is one month old. Aside from eating and sleeping, Viggo seems to like the company of his family.

name: 3 room apartment with park view
summary: This lovely 3 room apartment with a balcony and park view is located on a quiet street in the most central part of Kungsholmen. It's new renovated and has a full-equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower, washing machine and tumble dryer.
space: This lovly 3 room, 84 sqm, new renovated apartment on the 4th floor, is located on a quiet street with a park wiew in the most central part of Kungsholmen. The building itself is from 1898 and the apartment has high ceilings with beatuful big windows. Kitchen and living room with a open spacious layout with dinnertable, a big sofa and a fireplace that can be used. A 46 inch wide screen TV with cable channels and surrond system. The sofa is so big that 1 person can sleep there. It's 2 bedroom. A master bedroom with one 180 cm wide bed and access to the balcony. A second small bedroom with one 140 cm wide bed. Full-equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower, washing machine and tumble dryer.
description: This lovely 3 room apartment with a balcony and park view is located on a quiet street in the most central part of Kungsholmen. It's new renovated and has a full-equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower, washing machine and tumble dryer. This lovly 3 room, 84 sqm, new renovated apartment on the 4th floor, is located on a quiet street with a park wiew in the most central part of Kungsholmen. The building itself is from 1898 and the apartment has high ceilings with beatuful big windows. Kitchen and living room with a open spacious layout with dinnertable, a big sofa and a fireplace that can be used. A 46 inch wide screen TV with cable channels and surrond system. The sofa is so big that 1 person can sleep there. It's 2 bedroom. A master bedroom with one 180 cm wide bed and access to the balcony. A second small bedroom with one 140 cm wide bed. Full-equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower, washing machine and tumble dryer. You have access to the entire apartment and its only yo
neighborhood_overview: The area has plenty of resturants, cafés and shops. Exellent walking facilitis along the waterfront. Large parks, one with a sandy beach and boats/cayacs for rent. It's walking distance to many  resturants, shops, supermarkets. Close to City Hall and popular boardwald, Norrmälarstrand with nice resturants. 10 min walk to center of Stockholm where you can find a lot's of stores as NK, Åhlens, Svenskt Tenn etc.
notes: Linens and towels are included in the price.
transit: Just around the corner you find the blue bus to city. It's 200 meter walk to Fridhemsplan where you can find buses and the metro wich will take you to most parts of Stockholm. It's a 8 minute walk to the metro station T-centralen and Central train station.
access: You have access to the entire apartment and its only you and your travel companions staying in the apartment, no one else.
interaction: I'll welcome you and hand over the keys and make sure you get setled. I will be there when you check out.
house_rules: No smoking and pets. No parties. No loud music after 10 pm. Don't wear shoes inside. Please respect the neighbours, who are calm and quiet, I expect you to be the same. Leave the apartment as it was when you arrived. You break it, you pay for it (common sense).

host_about:
Hi and welcome to my appartment!

PS. Hör av dig om du vill ha något översatt till svenska. 

Have been living in Stockholm since 1993 and work within sales and marketing. I love to travel and meet new people and since I have used Airbnb as a tenant before, I would now like to extend the service to you who would like to visit and explore beautiful Stockholm. 

I am a responsible and tidy person that always make sure I take good care of the places I rent as well as my own appartment and therefore I appreciate and expect you to have the same attitude. 

I'll be happy to help out and supply you with tips and practical information about Stockholm, its surroundings, things to see and do etc. 

I look forward to hearing from you! 

All the best 
Anna

PS2: If you would like any references, I will provide that upon request.

name: Pride people look over here!
summary: Am renting out my central loft apartment in Stockholm City Centre through summer 2015, specifically for Stockholm Pride Week. I want to make sure that worldwide pride people get to have a great week in Stockholm during this special occasion!
space: The apartment is placed by the beautiful Mariatorget square, full of bars, restaurants, supermarket and garden. The apartment is 50 m2 but well structured with two double beds for two couples or close friends. You will have full access to everything in the apartment and I will work at pride, so if you have any questions I will be able to come around and show you.  The red tube line will take you directly from Mariatorget to Pride Park, if you dare you can borrow my bike. I have done (website hidden) many times before and you can check me out there for references.  If you like to I can show you the best places in town, if you don't, I will stay away! :) The neighbourhood is great with the beautiful park Mariatorget just outside the main entrance. My building is next to Hotel Rival which Benny

name: Beautiful house right by the lake
summary: Beautiful family home close to the lake Mälaren in the Stockholm suburb of Bromma. 3 balconies, big kitchen and dining room and 2 TV rooms. Less than 30 minutes by public transportation to Stockholm city and many activities close by.
space: Beautiful house close to the lake Mälaren in the Stockholm suburb of Bromma.  Our house is a three story house with a backyard facing the water. It has four bedrooms and comfortably sleeps 6 people. The entrance floor has a big kitchen with all necessities and a big dining table seating 8. In connection is a spacious living area with piano and couch.    The top floor has a library with comfy chairs and a 48'' flatscreen HD SMART TV with access to Netflix and HBO. 2 bedrooms, one master bedroom with a king size bed and one bedroom with a double bed. A large bathroom with shower and bathtub.  The bottom floor has its own entrance, 2 bedrooms with queen size beds, one bathroom, sauna, pingpong table, two couches, a TV with DVD and Nintento Wii and a fireplace.  Each floor has a big balcony with outdoor furniture and a view over the lake, Mälaren. You will have access to the whole house and its garden. Parking available. Each bedroom has empty storage areas for clothes. Clean linens and to
description: Beautiful family home close to the lake Mälaren in the Stockholm suburb of Bromma. 3 balconies, big kitchen and dining room and 2 TV rooms. Less than 30 minutes by public transportation to Stockholm city and many activities close by.  Beautiful house close to the lake Mälaren in the Stockholm suburb of Bromma.  Our house is a three story house with a backyard facing the water. It has four bedrooms and comfortably sleeps 6 people. The entrance floor has a big kitchen with all necessities and a big dining table seating 8. In connection is a spacious living area with piano and couch.    The top floor has a library with comfy chairs and a 48'' flatscreen HD SMART TV with access to Netflix and HBO. 2 bedrooms, one master bedroom with a king size bed and one bedroom with a double bed. A large bathroom with shower and bathtub.  The bottom floor has its own entrance, 2 bedrooms with queen size beds, one bathroom, sauna, pingpong table, two couches, a TV with DVD and Nintento Wii and a fireplac
neighborhood_overview: Bromma is one of the most beautiful suburbs surrounding the city. It is very green and right by the lake. The lake has a small beach right by the house and a big swimming dock just a minute walk. It is connected to a nice walking or running trail. Withing walking distance you will find a cozy town center with café, bakery, grocery store, small restaurant and a few shops. Walking 20 min you will reach a forest with a running trail and one of Brommas most beautiful sand beaches. There are also tennis courts, a playground and mini golf.
notes: It is in a quiet neighborhood with friendly neighbors, and we expect our guests to behave there after.
transit: Driving into Stockholm city center takes about 20 min. If you want to take the public transportation, the cable car is 7 min walking distance from the house. The cable car takes you to the subway within 10 min, and the subway into town is less than 10 min more. The subway will take you anywhere in the Stockholm area!  10 min by car you will find yourself by the royal palace and its gardens. Here you can walk around in the gardens, go on tours, take a boat trip or have a coffee in the sun.
access: You will have access to the whole house and its garden. Parking available.
interaction: We live close by and will be available by phone if you have any questions! Would be glad to help with recommendations around the house or Stockholm.
house_rules: No smoking and no pets are allowed.
host_about:
Hello!
We are a big friendly family from Sweden with 4 children of the ages 11 to 28. We love to travel, spend time at our summer house and being outdoors.

name: Modern bright apartment, Södermalm
summary: I welcome you to a modern one-bedroom apartment at Södermalm, Stockholm. It is bright, nicely furnished, newly built and sound proof. The décor is a stylish mixture of vintage and modern design.
space: The apartment is 54 square meters big. It has a balcony and a fully equipped modern kitchen. Wifi, TV, Netflix, Playstation 3, Nespresso, coffee machine, dishwasher and a microwave oven. can all be found in the apartment. The bedroom is furnished with a double bed (160x200cm) and you’ll find a big air mattress (140x200cm) for an extra person/children in the living room (although it’s worth mentioning that it can get a little bit crammed in the living room if the mattress is placed there). Bedding and towels are naturally included in the rent. There is a bathtub and hairdryer in the bathroom.

neighborhood_overview: Mariatorget, the vibrant Hornstull and the chic SOFO are just a short walk away. If you are looking for great shopping, restaurants and nightclubs you’ll find it nearby on Götgatan. Public transport will take you to the city center in 5-10 minutes. Included in the rent is two City Bikes cards that allow you to discover the city by bike. There are two City Bikes stations close to the apartment (read more about (Email hidden by Airbnb)
notes: If you come during the warmer months of the year a swim is just a 5-minute walk away. Both the beautiful beach promenade of Årstaviken and one of Södermalms biggest parks, Tanto, are situated close to the apartment. There are several grocery stores within close reach.
transit: We are happy to recommend you things to see and discover both within and outside the city. Suitable for friends and couples. It’s very easy to get around and many place are within walking distance from the apartment. Don’t hesitate to try out City Bikes.
house_rules: Guest are expected to leave apartment in the same way as on arrival. Things should be put back in the same place as found. Smoking is not allowed in the apartment, but is just fine on the balcony. Things that are broken will be deducted from the caution. As this is a residential building, "normal" house rules apply and noice should be kept at a minimum after 10 pm.

The best thing is though that you can walk to most places. (Old town 4 min). The tram station is close (2 min) which takes you to Stockholmsmässan in Älvsjö in just 10 min. It also takes you to Arlanda Airport in 45 min.

By the way, you have a discount if you rent my apartment! :D I know the best places to visit here since I have lived here for almost 40 years now. So just ask and I´ll reveal the jewels of Stockholm.

summary: Charming house located on the fringe of Stockholm city centre. Södermalm is just 5 min away by subway train or 15 min by bicycle. The house is near the Globe area. A green and green and fun area with nice restaurants/bakery/stores and fun!
space: You are welcome to my place! Here you can stay in a comfortable bed in your own bedroom. The house has lots of common space including two neat terraces, a dining room, a kitchen, and a refurbished penthouse. There is a bathroom with tub and toilet for you next to your room. There is also a high speed wireless internet I keep breakfast items for guests including coffee, tea, Swedish knäckebröd, cheese, yoghurt, et cetera. Overall, the house is modern, spacious and with lots of common space where you can relax. You are free to use kitchen according to your needs on a self-service basis.

neighborhood_overview: The area is quite, peaceful and friendly. At the same time the new large entertainment area around the Globe and new Tele 2 Arena is just a brief walk away with lots of restaurants and shopping and also fun things like boule, bowling, and minigolf, not to mention the events and concerts and the largest(!) night club in Stockholm. It takes 2 minutes walk to the subway Enskede Garden (Enskede Gård) (green line direction to Hagsätra) and 10 minutes to Blåsut metro station (green line direction to Farsta Strand) and 10 minutes to walk to the Globe subway or tvärbanan Globe train stations. If you are here to visit the Stockholm International Fair (Stockholmsmässan), you can reach the fair in 15-20 minutes by buses directly or go by subway/commuter train, I will assist If you have a car. Parking is free on the streets in the area. I have a parking space you can rent too. Also, we highly recommend exploring the city by bicycle during the warm period. We have bicycles for rent if you wish.
notes: *** high speed wlan *** House supplied with high speed wireless internet. *** pets and allergies *** No pets have been in the house or are allowed in the house. *** coffee *** Free coffee! And tea of course...
transit: The house is strategically located in south Stockholm next to the Globe area 2 min from the underground just 3 stops (5 min) from Södermalm (city centre). *** Stockholmsmässan *** (English: Stockholm International Fairs and Congress Centre) Quick and reliable public transportation to the large Stockholm trade fair "Stockholmsmässan" in Älvsjö (address Mässvägen 1, Älvsjö, Sweden). Travel time door to door approximately 15-20 min by either direct bus or subway and bus.
access: All parts except other bedrooms and my own bathroom.
interaction: I have thorough knowledge of the surrounding area as I have lived in Stockholm for more than 40 years. Cycling is recommended and there is opportunity to visit both green areas and old forests or go on an urban cycle tour directly into the heart of Stockholm.
house_rules: *** Checkout *** Checkout is always 12:00 on the day of departure unless otherwise agreed beforehand! It is of course ok to leave a bag or similar or hang in the common areas but I often want to make the bedroom in order in the afternoon. *** pets and allergies ***  Guests are not allowed to bring pets to the house for allergy reasons. *** roof/ceiling windows ***  Never open the roof/ceiling windows in the penthouse ***  No smoking ***  No smoking is allowed inside the house. No pets are allowed in the house. *** vistors/guests *** No visitors or guests are allowed in the house *** outdoor shoes ***  Please leave outdoor shoes inside the front door and put on socks or indoor shoes when walking inside the house. *** kitchen ***  Use the kitchen but on a self-service basis, e.g. used plates and other items are put in the dish washer and items not possible to put in the dish washer are washed and the kitchen is to be kept tidy. Additional guests must be approved beforehand. If approved t

name: Charming flat in beautiful Old Town
summary: Located in the beautiful medieval Old Town within a stone’s throw of the Royal Palace, the apartment has kept its genuine charm from the 17th century. It is situated on the first floor with a little art gallery below.
space: The apartment is suitable for 3 with a comfortable bed big enough for a couple (120cm wide) in the bedroom and a big single bed (105cm) in the living room.  The flat also features a lovely spacious kitchen, living room and a cute but very basic toilet/shower room.
description: Located in the beautiful medieval Old Town within a stone’s throw of the Royal Palace, the apartment has kept its genuine charm from the 17th century. It is situated on the first floor with a little art gallery below. The apartment is suitable for 3 with a comfortable bed big enough for a couple (120cm wide) in the bedroom and a big single bed (105cm) in the living room.  The flat also features a lovely spacious kitchen, living room and a cute but very basic toilet/shower room. The whole apartement The Old Town in Stockholm is the original city centre dating back to the 12th century.  Houses are covered in beautiful pastel colors, the sun finds its way and drowns the small alleys in golden splendor. Old Town allows you to stroll along its tiny cobbled streets and breathe in the scent of chestnut trees in a delicate blend with the aroma of freshly cooked food from small nice restaurants. If the atmosphere of Old Town, as a living museum in itself, wets your appetite for culture experien
neighborhood_overview: The Old Town in Stockholm is the original city centre dating back to the 12th century.  Houses are covered in beautiful pastel colors, the sun finds its way and drowns the small alleys in golden splendor. Old Town allows you to stroll along its tiny cobbled streets and breathe in the scent of chestnut trees in a delicate blend with the aroma of freshly cooked food from small nice restaurants. If the atmosphere of Old Town, as a living museum in itself, wets your appetite for culture experiences, you have dozens of Museums to explore within walking distance.
transit: Bus station: Slottsbacken: (30seconds away) line 2, line 53, line 76, line 59. Metro: Gamla Stan: (5-10min away) green line and red line in all directions. Boat Slussen: Djurgårdsfärjan  (5min away) Hop on hop off boats: 1 min away on Skeppsbron, just down the street. Central station: busses and trains to all nearby airports are a 15min walk away.
access: The whole apartement
house_rules: No smoking indoors please,  No parties
host_about:
Hi there! Me and my parents Erik and Monica are running this airbnb together. 
We look forward to show you this lovely part of old town in Stockholm. 
Kind regards
Maria

name: Old town with great view
summary: In the best possible location, two steps from the old town underground station, this 3 room apartment with a magnificent view and fantastic light situation from 6 tall windows offers comfort, original wooden floors polished soft for the best bare feet sensation, great space and planning, carefully chosen vintage design in a historic building, modern bathroom and kitchen with all amenities, walking distance to opera, main museums, some of the best restaurants minutes away.
space: High ceilings with stucco, sanded wooden floors in living, dining and bedroom, carreaux de ciment floors in kitchen and hallway, tiled modern bathroom with a comfortable shower. Exceptional lighting situation from 6 tall windows and a beautiful view towards the water, bridges, turrets and towers of Södermalm. As well as a separate dining room that sits eight there is a dining area in the kitchen that sits four. The kitchen has all amenities and offers good space for anyone interested in cooking. The bedroom has a king size bed as well as a mezzanine where a child could sleep. There is a large high quality flat screen television in the bedroom with cable and a high quality sound system in the living room. The style of the flat is a mix of art nouveau, classical, modernistic, post-modern, Oriental, French, Italian and Scandinavian furniture and art.
description: In the best possible location, two steps from the old town underground station, this 3 room apartment with a magnificent view and fantastic light situation from 6 tall windows offers comfort, original wooden floors polished soft for the best bare feet sensation, great space and planning, carefully chosen vintage design in a historic building, modern bathroom and kitchen with all amenities, walking distance to opera, main museums, some of the best restaurants minutes away. High ceilings with stucco, sanded wooden floors in living, dining and bedroom, carreaux de ciment floors in kitchen and hallway, tiled modern bathroom with a comfortable shower. The bedroom has a king
neighborhood_overview: The old town with cobbled narrow streets, church towers and some of Stockholms best restaurants has not changed much in appearance since the 1600s. The underground, flower market, fruit market, fish market, great bakery, convenience store, wine bars, great restaurants all within the same block. The royal castle, city hall, the house of lords, the royal opera, the Nobel museum, the parliament, three cathedrals within 5 minutes walking distance from the flat. All the main islands, Södermalm, Östermalm, Norrmalm, Kungsholmen are within walking distance.  The area is beautiful and there is no better location if you want to visit Stockholm.
transit: The apartment is located in the Old Town which is the central island which means that every part of Stockholm is easily accessible by foot and if you prefer the underground the main lines pass through here. The underground station is less than a minute away, taxis stop outside the door and you have boat services to Djurgården, Drottningholm and the archipelago within 5 minutes by foot. The central station with express train service to the airport is 10 minutes by foot or two minutes with the underground.
access: Good storage space for hanging your clothes etc, ironing board, Netflix, HBO, DVDs, washing machine, dish washer, china, pots and pans.

name: A great location and a good vibe
summary: *Feel at home in Stockholm* Located in the heart of Stockholm and in the popular Sofo-district my place is a perfect base for day and evening activities. Here you are close to bars, restaurants, parks, beaches, museums, galleries, boutiques and shops. The best Stockholm Island to live on!
space: Here you are close to bars, restaurants, parks, beaches, museums, galleries, boutiques, shops and grocery stores. All accessible by foot, public transport, or for the best summer experience, by bicycle!  My place is 62 m'2.  It has one bedroom and one living-room that is partly open to the kitchen.  The bedroom has a comfortable double bed (160 cm) and a  balcony out towards a courtyard.  The bathroom has a shower but no bathtub.  There is a typical Swedish style laundry room in the building that you share with the rest of the house. This you have to book in advance and I am glad to show or book a time for you.  You will have access to wifi, television, and a fully equipped kitchen. Towels and bed sheets and hair dryer are provided. As for parties and noise. It is customary in Sweden to keep all loud noise down to a minimum after 10PM especially on weekdays. Please no parties and be respectful to my neighbours.  This is my home and I live here, so please also respect my things and plan

name: Modern lägenhet mitt i villaidyllen, Stockholm
summary: En modern och ljus lägenhet med villakänsla. Lugnt område ca 10 minuter från Södermalm. Buss och tunnelbana i enkel anslutning. Ett stort och ett mindre sovrum med plats för hela familjen. Det finns en stor trädgård där man kan grilla eller leka med barnen. Många fina parker, caféer, restaurager i närheten. En promenad på ca 30 min hittar ni Söderbysjön men bad för familjen! En cykel finns för utlåning.
space: Välkommen till vår lägenhet! Perfekt planerad lägenhet för ett par eller den lilla familjen. Ni är välkomna att använda allt inomhus, så som tvättmaskin, Sonos-högtalarsystem, tv  (med apple-tv), i köket finns all utrustning du kan behöva, leksaker till barnen m. Till lägenheten hör också en gemensam trädgård som känns som en villaträdgård med syrenbuskar, fruktträd, utemöbler, grill.

Till lägenheten hör också en gemensam trädgård som känns som en villaträdgård med syrenbuskar, fruktträd, utemöbler, grill. Hela lägenheten är till ert förfogande. Tvättmaskin samt torkställning finns i lägenheten. Vill man tvätta lite mer finns tillgång till tvättstuga med tvättmaskin, torktumlare och torkskåp, denna måste doc
neighborhood_overview: I samma kvarter finns det en liten affär där du kan köpa nästan allting du behöver och allt är ekologiskt! Det finns också en Coop och Ica i närheten, ca 10 minuters gångväg. Promenerar du 30 minuter in i Nackareservatet hittar du både fin natur och Söderbysjön. Hellasgården kan du nå på en lite längre promenad. En pizzeria, thai och indisk restaurang finns också inom gångavstånd.
notes: Kod för att komma in i porten, jag lämnar all information om detta när ni har bokat och är på väg!
transit: Bästa sättet att resa om du inte kommer med bil är med tunnelbana. Lägenheten ligger mellan två tunnelbanestationer, Skogskyrkogården och Kärrtorp, på två olika linjer, linje 17 och 18. Det tar ca 10 minuter att promenera till båda.  Det finns också en busstation (linje 816) ca 2 min från lägenheten som tar dig till Gullmarsplan, där ifrån kan du åka linje 17, 18 och 19 in mot stan.  Parkering finns på gatan mot en daglig kostnad. Best way to travel is with the subway. The apartment lays between two stations on two different train lines 18 and 17. It takes almost the same time to both of them approximately 8 min to walk.  There is a bus station 2 min away from the apartment. The bus will take you to Gullmarsplan where all the trains in the green line passes. It’s bus 816 to Gullmarsplan, don’t go the wrong way :-)  Parking outside on the street for a Daily fee.
access: Hela lägenheten är till ert förfogande. Tvättmaskin samt torkställning finns i lägenheten. Vill man tvätta lite mer finns tillgång till tvättstuga med tvättmaskin, torktumlare och torkskåp, denna måste dock bokas. I anslutning till lägenheten finns en stor trädgård med utemöbler och grill i källaren, denna delas dock med andra boende så vid fint väder är det först till kvarn. Eller så tar man med sig en picknick-filt ut. Hoppas ni ska trivas!

name: Beautiful turn of the century ap.
summary: Beautiful apartment with balcony in a house from 1890s, near popular Mariatorget on hip Södermalm. 10 min walk to Old Town. Lots of cafes, bars and restaurants nearby. Wired internet. Kitchen and bathroom. Fresh bed covers, bed sheets, towels.
space: The apartment is situated right between Mariatorget and Slussen on Södermalm. In the center of the hip island, and still on a quiet street. The neighborhood is safe. Everything is close by: bars, restaurants, galleries, stores, parks. 5 minute walk to all subway lines. The ap is a beautiful place in a charming turn of the century building. The living room is on street level (people passing can't see in) and on the other side the master bedroom is on the third floor (the house is sort of built on a slope) with a lovely balcony. There is also a kitchen with space to eat, a small bathroom and another small room with shower. Some might say that the apartment is bohemic, I don´t know, I would say its decourated with love and warmth. We love art and music and literature and we have lots of books and records that you may read and listen to, if you want.

name: Sunny, trendy apartment with patio
summary: Live like a Stockholm hipster! Located in Hornstull, the epicenter of Swedish trendiness, this bright apartment will put you close to cozy cafes, buzzling bars and beautiful nature. Big windows fill this clean, spacious apartment with light.
space: The apartment is 45m2 and was recently renovated. It consists of a spacious, bright common room with kitchen, dinner table and a cozy corner with a sofa and computer that we use as TV. The bedroom has a small working space and closet storage. One of our favorite things with the place is the private entrance and the small patio where you can enjoy your morning coffee if the weather allows. It gives you a sense of secludedness right in the middle of the city.  The apartment is best suited for a couple that share bed (160 cm wide), but the sofa is also an option if you are a company of three. We live here with a daughter of four months, so you'll find all the conveniences you need if you are traveling with a baby.  In the kitchen you'll find all the equiment you'll need. We have dishwasher, microwave oven, induction stove, oven, refrigerator, freezer and washing machine. Feel free to use staple foods from the pantry. Do note: for a long-term stay (a month) we offer you a considerable affo
