neighborhood_overview: Hornstull is a rapidly growing trendy area. The Williamsbourgh  You'll find some of the coolest cafes and bars that Stockholm has to offer in these hoods. You'll also be very close to the water in all directions. The island Långholmen offers the best quiet evening walks. Everything you need (food stores, metro, buses, cafés, bars restaurants) can be found within 5 minutes walking distance.
notes: We have a dog. She will of course not be in the apartment when you visit,  but if you are very allergic this might not be the apartment for you.
transit: The red line on the metro takes you to the city center in 10-15 minutes. Biking is a great way to get around. Getting to the city center takes about the same time as with the public transportation.
access: The place is all yours. Feel at home!
interaction: We are traveling in March and will probably not see you ourselves. A friend of ours will meet you help you get settled in.
house_rules: Normal house rules. Respect the neighbors, don't smoke inside. Ask about pets. Feel free to have friends over, but preferably no big parties.
host_about:
I'm a journalist by profession and run a small freelance agency specialized on data visualization and analysis. By non-profession I'm a marathon runner, Lindy hop dancer and culture consumer. 

I was an active couchsurfer a few years ago and love the idea of inviting travelers and being invited as a traveler. I'm fairly new at Air bnb, but check out my couchsurf page for references (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

I live with my girlfriend Sofia in Stockholm. She works as a product manager at a Swedish e-commerce company. If you want to strike up a conversation with her you could choose potbellied pigs, indie pop or flee markets as your topic.

name: City/Room20sqm/Bed4sqm/Balcony5sqm
summary: When you stay here includes fresh linen, towels, soap, shampoo, breakfast and 2 bicycles. A large light bedroom for 1-2 inherent with private bathroom and balcony.  I wonder if there is a more comfortable and pleasant offer?
space: Attic characteristic property built 1906 and refurbished 2013 situated in the center of Stockholm, within walking distance from both the city center, old town and large green parks such as Haga Park, home of the Princess Royal with the family.  The flat is located in the heart of the Vasastan neighborhood, one of the city’s more pleasant enclaves. Just around the corner is Vasaparken, a Stockholm hotspot for youth and families with great cafes, bars and restaurants like Vasahof (easy-going french bistro), Tennstopet (traditional swedish), Sven Harrys art museum, Bonniers art gallery and Mellqvist (great coffee shop).  The apt has four bedrooms three upstairs and one Room20sqm queen size bed with private bathroom and shared kitchen downstairs. Furnished in modern style at top floor and more old-fashioned downstairs. Fully equipped kitchen and 2 bathrooms. The apartment is on the fourth and last floor without elevator. Spacious 115 sqm additional 22 sqm floor area with terrace on the roo

The apt has four bedrooms three upstairs and one Room20sqm queen size bed with private bathroom and shared kitchen downstairs. Furnished in modern st
neighborhood_overview: Friendly, safe and quiet neighborhood with restaurants, shops, leisure activities and Karlberg Castle. The closest supermarket is 100 meters away. A lot of art galleries nearby and kid-friendly "Vasaparken" within 5 min walk. Easy access to public transport e.g. subway S:t Eriksplan, shuttle station Karlberg and good parking conditions. Use Stockholm Public Transport (website hidden) You can go by buss 69 to the Royal Djurgården and visit a lot of museums as The Vasa Museum, ABBA the museum, Skansen open-air museum or just stroll around (website hidden). Nearby 10 min walk you have the Karolinska Institutet and the Karolinska Hospital. Really, this is one of the best locations for a visit to Stockholm, regardless of whether you are interested in culture or nature or both. And if you're a runner you can easily do anything between 5-15 km along the waterfront daily. If you need more information of what to do check my Guidebook.
notes: Fast wireless internet (wifi), electricity etc is all included. Access to a big kitchen and private bathroom, as well as to the laundry room down in the basement. All kitchen utensils, ironing board etc is of course available for you to use freely! To inquirers interested in staying long term: send me an inquiry and perhaps we can come to an agreement.
transit: You have easy access to public transportation in the neighborhood. Getting around can't be easier. Use a period card during your stay. Do not pay travel by travel (very expensive!!). Many places are walking distance away from the apartment. Don't hesitate to try out the City Bikes! Closest metro is "S:t Eriksplan", green line (3 min walking). Closest train station is "Karlberg station" (1 min walking). Bus 42, 72 and 507 stop just across the street. From the Arlanda airport a taxi will cost you around 500 SEK(40min). SL Shuttle train(departure every 30 min, about 12 USD pp (kids under 18 free), 30 min travel time, jump off at Karlberg Station is a favorite though. The airport coach(40min). A ticket is 120 SEK, get off at S:t Eriksplan, which is only 6 min walking to the apartment. In only 20 minutes, Arlanda Express will take you to Central Station, from where you can catch the train to Karlberg Station, one stop away. A one way ride with Arlanda Express is 240 SEK. If you would like t
access: Comfortable twin beds that can be combined to a double bed depending on preference. Suitable for both friends and couples. You have access downstairs to the private Room20sqm, private bathroom, private balcony 5sqm and our common large(35sqm) kitchen. It will be no other inherent except family members during your stay. These spaces are a part of our present home and we would like you to take care and respect it as it would be your own home. We take for granted that you follow our house rules such as smoking outside, no events and party.
interaction: We are available for a quick introduction to the  room and shared kitchen. We interact with our inherent on a person by person basis; if you want to hang, we'll hang. If you just want a central, nice place to stay and be on your own, we'll stay out of your way :) Please e-mail me a few lines about yourself and your trip when requesting a booking and also please read our house rules. We would like you as the site recommend to require certain verifications before making a reservation request.  Welcome to enjoy your Stockholm accommodation at its best.
house_rules: • Please respect the general Swedish house rule of quiet in the house between 10 pm and 6 am. • No events and party. • However my guestroom and flat is not your partycentral, drugs, drunken and disorderly behavior is not wellcome (obviously). Should you invite a visitor in the room, understand that you are personally responsable for any consequences. • No pets are allowed due to allergies.  • Never let anyone through the main entrance if that person does not have a code. If they ask you to open for them just say they have to call the person they are to visit/work for. There should be no workers coming into this flat unless you have been informed so by us. • The door and must be locked and windows closed at all times whenever guests are not present. Losing the keys is not an option. • No smoking indoors. No throwing of cigarette waste out of balcony. • The balcony is a nice spot in the summer and serves as an “extra room” from early in the morning. If you find flowers dry, we appreciate
host_about:
Family father with two kids and a lovely wife. We work as metal designer and graphic designer. I like to learn new things, travel to Italy, listen at Daft Punk, play with my kids, and hunt for mushrooms in an endless forest. Straightforward and present. Here and now. If there is a problem it is to be solved. Use your gut feeling and brain.
Greetings,
Christian

name: A bright kingdom close to Globen
summary: Fresh and spacious apartment! Hammarbyhöjden is a flourishing neighbourhood with lots of nature, running tracks and beautiful scenery with lakes you can swim in. It's a short 3 minute walk from the metro and a nice 20 minutes walk to Globen.
space: Fresh, bright and green! A lot of nature, running tracks and easy access to Metro and city. Perfect distance for bicycling to the city and an easy 20 minute walk to Globen Arena. The surroundings are green, spacious and calm, next to the famous "Hammarbybacken" where you can ski during the winters - Yet very close to the city center and even closer to Södermalm, which is the best, relaxed and fun place to spend your time in Stockholm  The metro goes 2 minutes away all day and all weekends.
description: Fresh and spacious apartment! Hammarbyhöjden is a flourishing neighbourhood with lots of nature, running tracks and beautiful scenery with lakes you can swim in. Everything except for the closets, which are filled with our clothings When you arrive and leave the place we give you the tour, during your stay you can call us and we will assist you! It's green, spacious and calm, yet very close to the hottest are of Stockholm
neighborhood_overview: It's green, spacious and calm, yet very close to the hottest are of Stockholm, Södermalm - which is the best, relaxed and fun place to spend your time in Stockholm.
notes: You can easily park on the street, however you need to download an app to pay for the parking. On Thursdays it's "cleaning day" on the street outside my house and not allowed to park, its easy to find a nearby street to park on. Download "Betala P" on your phone. Choose "Taxa 4" or "4" as the zone and enter your car's license plate. Then specify for how long you wish to park and press "Starta parkering" to start. You will need to enter your credit card details to pay for the parking and you will receive a digital invoice. 10 kronor / hour, between kl 7 - 19 (mon-friday) 10 kronor / hour, between kl 11 - 17 (Saturday and day before red day) Sundays and red-day free parking Read more here: (URL HIDDEN)
transit: The metro goes 2 minutes away all days and weekends - free parking on the streets if you have a car, and Stockholm is great for biking!
access: Everything except for the closets, which are filled with our clothings
interaction: When you arrive and leave the place we give you the tour, during your stay you can call us and we will assist you!
house_rules: We are generous! We share everything, please do so too, you can eat and use everything we have in our home, if something runs out, please buy some more. Garbage, Swedes are crazy about nature and we sort our garbage in Glass, Plastic, Metal, Food and Paper. Things like batteries, lamps, computers we sort as Electronics. I know, it's a mess in the beginning, and you can drink the water in most of our lakes and fish in central Stockholm.. awesome! :-) And please also give care to our plants, they will love you for it.
host_about:
I am an entrepreneur in fintech and blockchain. I love nature, running, swimming and the Swedish summer.

I have a cabin i visit when I host my guest, which is a perfect way for me to get out more in the nature, so thank you for helping me with that :-)

name: Flat in Södermalm nearby the water.
space: My apartment has a queen-size bed which fits two people. Then there is my sofa in the living room, but it's not perfect for sleeping. But I've tried it and several of my friends as well. It works fine. I have two desks but one of them can be turned in to a dining table, it's very large. I have a chair in the ceiling. I just wanted to say that. The whole apartment will be for my guests disposal. Even keys will be given (when asked for it) for the laundry room. I will meet up and give you the keys and show you the apartment.  The nature, the water and all the nearby cafés and restaurants. And not to mention the two islands nearby that are perfect for morning walks.  The subway station "Hornstull" are 7 minutes walk from the apartment. It takes you to the city on 8 minutes.  There are also several buses nearby. Blue bus (#4) takes you to Kungsholmen on 7 minutes. If you are vegan or vegetarian there are lots of different restaurants and cafés nearby that serves great dishes. Specially Vur

name: Helles, gemütliches Zimmer in ruhiger Lage
summary: Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, die Lage, die Ruhe, die Nähe zur Natur und die gute Verkehrsverbindungen. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende abenteurer.
description: Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, die Lage, die Ruhe, die Nähe zur Natur und die gute Verkehrsverbindungen. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende abenteurer. Nah am Globen, Skogskyrkogården und Tyresta Naturschutzgebiet Nah an zwei U-Bahnlinien, Busshaltestelle befindet sich 50 m vom Haus. 20 Minuten vom Hauptbahnhof. Währen Wintermonaten werde ich nur selten anwesend sein.

notes: Währen Wintermonaten werde ich nur selten anwesend sein.

host_about:
I am a multicultural European with Scandinavian roots. Travelling is one of my hobbies, as well as for instance litterature, good films, opera, classic music, outdoor life and biking. I have been travelling since I was a child and I just love Italy and especially Venice. Good food and good wine is a part of my life.
I also love adventure, but I take no risks. I suppose I can describe myself as a humble person with a great respect for other people. There are some luxuries that according to me are (sometimes) almost necessary, but I am actually quite happy with simple life - that is also my way to travel. I enjoy the company of nice people, but I feel totally OK alone. I am curious and keen on learning new things - in the very moment I am studying at the university, because I have to change my profession (engineer). I am humorous, honest, reliable and social. No matter my age, I have  a very young outlook on life. I speak English, German, Italian - and my "northern" languages Swedish and Finnish. 
"Carpe diem" is a leading life motto for me, the other one is "chi cerca, trova". Not to forget "It will be fine in the end, if not, then it is not the end...."

name: Lantligt & lugnt nära Älvsjömässan
summary: Vårt lilla hus ligger i en typisk villaförort för barnfamiljer och alla som vill bo nära storstaden men ändå i lugn och ro bortom buller och trafik. I närheten finns en stor lekpark, en skog med 4 km joggingslinga och det är nära till buss och tåg.
description: Vårt lilla hus ligger i en typisk villaförort för barnfamiljer och alla som vill bo nära storstaden men ändå i lugn och ro bortom buller och trafik. I närheten finns en stor lekpark, en skog med 4 km joggingslinga och det är nära till buss och tåg. Gäster kommer att tillgång till ett dubbelrum och vardagsrum med dubbelsäng. I båda rummen finns riktiga bekväma dubbelsängar. Köket är modernt med varmlufts- och mikrovågsugn, diskmaskin och kyl-och frys. Viktigt! Alla sopor sorteras noggrant, till och med allmatfall läggs separat. Ett badrum med dusch samt en toalett. En stor trädgård. Tvättmaskin finns från 1. maj.

host_location: Stockholm, Stockholm County, Kingdom of Sweden
host_about: I am a teacher and interested in travelling abroad to Spain/Germany/Switzerland etc ad speak foreign languages. I have room for up to five people in my house, the smallest room costs less, the bigger ones more. I have had Spanish, German, English and Japanese even Finnish guests and many more =). I enjoy my life in Sweden in the winter by dancing rock´nd roll, skiing in the north, hiking in the surroundings and athletics. I can always introduce my guests to my gym, one time Free!  I go to gardening fairs in Scania, love cooking and do it together my guests as well. I enjoy films (have you seen W.E?) or the Swedish "Sunes sommar"not to talk about Bergman´s Fanny and Alexander or Stieg Larssons trilogy, comedies and music- at the moment the becoming European contest, My interest in shopping is focused on vintage. I prefer jogging and nature, riding is for my daughter, climbing for my son and design and museums, cafés are on my list and I would like to show you Stockholm if you are looking for a guide or perhaps just company during your visit to our beautiful Old Town. My life motto is everything is possible. I welcome you to join to stay in our house! It is a great pleasure for me!

host_about:
Jag tror mig vara en social och utåtriktad person. Jag har lätt att lära mig nya saker och trivs i miljöer och sammanhang med hög aktivitet. Allmänt sett kan jag anses vara en god ”lagspelare”.

Jag är född 1990 och bor på Kungsholmen. Jag är svensk medborgare med rötter i Portugal. På fritiden är jag oftast på fotbollsplan eftersom jag tillhör ett Stockholmslag (division 2). Överhuvudtaget är sport mitt stora intresse, vilket innebär att jag gärna styrketränar, åker slalom och spelar tennis. Den tid som blir över är jag helst med mina vänner.

name: Roomy Apt in the Heart of Hornstull
summary: A clean, roomy, 39kvm, 1.5 bedroom apartment in the center of Hornstull / Södermalm. Very close to great cafés and clubs/bars like Debaser Strand, Judit & Bertil, Vurma, Copacabana, Tjoget and more. Also close to the other center-parts of Stockholm.
space: Minimal, clean, roomy 39kvm apartment on the 2nd floor in the, what is agreed by many, the coolest and nicest area in Stockholm - includes WiFi-internet, a nice relaxing bathtub, washing/dryer access in the top of apartment-building, and cozy balcony facing a cool inner-yard, a very comfortable bed with good room for 2, a big kitchen and close distance to almost anything of interest in the city.

neighborhood_overview: It's safe, popular, cool with amazing bars, cafés and clubs. Super-close to different other parts of the city (Mariatorget, SoFo, Skanstull, T-Centralen, Slussen and the cool outside places like Telefonplan and Midsommarkransen). An amazing place to just walk around in and to experience the best of Stockholm from.
transit: Yes, buses like number 4 and 66 will take you around Södermalm and to the center of the city. The red-subway line (with the stop Hornstull being the closest) will take you to all the popular subway-stops within 5-15 minutes. The bus and subway-stop is within a 30 second walk from the apartment.
access: The guests will have access to the whole apartment and to everything that is in it (the fridge/freezer, the balcony, the bed, bathroom/bathtub, internet and more). Some drawers/closets might be closed for personal storing.

house_rules: Responsible, with a lot of respect to the neighbors which are a bunch of very kind and gentle people from the ages of 40 and up. A clean and caring relationship to the apartment itself too.
host_about: A 29-year old Swedish male working as an artist (photography/drawing). Used to live for 5-years in New York but moved to Hornstull / Stockholm in 2013.

host_about: I am born in the south of Sweden and moved to Stockholm 2010 after I graduated from University of Amsterdam with a Master in Business Studies. In Stockholm I started to work at Deloitte as an IT consultant. I decided to transfer to another location during 2013 and from then until now I'm working as a Manager at the Deloitte office in New York City.

name: Charming and bright apartement in trendy Hornstull
summary: My apartement is located in the new and upcoming district of Stockholm, Hornstull, also called little Brooklyn. You will have the perfect combination of city pulse with many cool bars and also extreme calmness from the surrounding water and greenareas of Tanto and Riddarholmen. The flat has two rooms with one double bed and one comfy sofa and is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers as well as  smaller families (with kids).  Welcome to my Hornstull, the hidden gem of Stockholm
description: My apartement is located in the new and upcoming district of Stockholm, Hornstull, also called little Brooklyn. You will have the perfect combination of city pulse with many cool bars and also extreme calmness from the surrounding water and greenareas of Tanto and Riddarholmen. The flat has two rooms with one double bed and one comfy sofa and is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers as well as  smaller families (with kids).  Welcome to my Hornstull, the hidden gem of Stockholm I am happy to help out with tips on what to do in the neighbourhood and in Stockholm. Where to find the best sucuk wraps, when you can do real bargain at the cosy Hornstull market, where to take the best morning swim or which local beer is the best.. I can help out with whatever you like. Just ask me and I will try to guide you! The flat is close to the commute. The bus stop is litterary right outside the door and the tube is just around the corner.

host_about:
Hejsan!
Jag är en inflyttad göteborska som turligt nog lyckades springa på detta härliga smultronställe i Stockholm, som jag nu hyr ut. Som värd hjälper jag gärna till så mycket jag bara kan för att ni ska få en så härlig upplevelse av staden som det bara går. Ställ frågor så ska jag försöka hjälpa er! 
En stor del av mitt liv består i att uppleva häftiga ställen, god mat och nya kulturer. Stockholm är bra på så vis, då det ständigt öppnar nya krogar och kulturlivet är så rikt att jag ständigt går med dåligt samvete då jag borde gå på fler föreställningar. Jag reser tillsammans med min sambo så ofta vi har möjlighet och gillar att ta resedagarna lite som de kommer. Förutom härliga Istanbul som är en av mina favoritstäder är favoritresemålet Thailand. Vad är väl bättre än att njuta av en schysst nudelsoppa vid vägkanten i myllriga Bangkok?

name: Stunning seaviews 15 mins from city
summary: Our cozy and comfortable 225 sqm villa offers truly stunning views and the proximity to the lake, to forests and Stockholm city center. It is the perfect place from which to discover Stockholm and its surroundings, including the archipelago.
space: Description of the rooms: - On the upper floor, which is where the main entrance is located, you will find:  * A hallway with plenty of space for storing shoes and coats * Three bedrooms (one child room with a single 90cm bed, one child room with a 120 cm bed, the master bedroom with a king size bed and access to a large terrace overlooking the lake). In the child bedroom with a 120cm bed, there is a small sofa that can convert into a bed and be used as an additional child bed. * An open space with an open fire and a desk and shelves (office), with direct access to the terrace * A shower room with toilets and a double washing basin On the ground floor: * A bedroom with a 140 cm comfortable, recent, sofa bed * A bathroom with a deep bathtub, a small washing basin, a toilet, and an adjacent sauna. * A large L shape living room/dining room with a classic Swedish stove and plunging views onto the lake * A modern and well equipped kitchen directly connected to the dining/living area * A uti

neighborhood_overview: We love our neighborhood, which is very safe, quiet, friendly and so close to lake Mälaren and nature, while being conveniently connected to the city by subway. Our neighborhood, Mälarhöjden, is a sought after suburb of Stockholm, nested in the forests along lake Mälaren. A 5 minute walk from our house, you will find, around the metro station, a small supermarket with a nice selection of food, a coffee shop, a pizzeria and a nice gift and clothes shop.  From our home, you can go for long, wonderful bike rides, walks or run along the lake. There are two traditional Swedish cafés in the vicinity, offering a nice aim for a small walk, and there is a lovely public animal farm for the children, which offers poney riding closeby. The closest tube station, "Mälarhöjden", is a 5 minute walk from our home. The tube takes you to Södermalm (Hornstull) in 9 minutes, and to the central station (T-Centralen) in 17 minutes. Very convenient!
notes: You can be assured we will make you feel more like a true guest than a tenant! Our house is not adapted for people with limited mobility, as it is located below the street, and is accessed by a flight of stairs.
transit: The closest subway station is a 5 min walk from our house, and since there is a small supermarket by the station, and a larger one at the station just before ours when coming from Stockholm, so you do not need a car!  We only use ours occasionally for big shopping or to go to the archipelago - but even the archipelago is very easily accessible by metro + ferry boat from downtown Stockholm. You can also take the public ferry boat from the pier just below our house and reach Stockholm city center (Stadshuset) in 40 minutes, it is a beautiful ride.
access: Guests have access to the entire house, besides the two cellars, one of is accessible from outside only.
interaction: We are happy to answer all your questions and will do our best to facilitate and make your stay as enjoyable as possible, and if you wish, we will be happy to help you find ideas for outings and activities, we will be happy to help you book restaurants, etc. We will leave you a house guide which provides lots of information on the neighborhood and on Stockholm.
house_rules: We expect that you will treat our house and  belongings with care.  As this is our main residence, our house's cupboards are not empty as in a traditional house rental, but contain our clothes and food. We are counting on our guests to respect our belongings, and depending on the length of your stay, or if it is something important for you, we will be happy to make some space in our closets for you. In the kitchen, you are welcome to make occasional use of basic foods such as oil and vinegar, salt, sugar, flour and spices, as long as  you replace anything that you have finished, and in equivalent quality (organic, if the original product was organic, for example) Please do not use shoes in the house. We prefer to not rent to families with children between 1 and 5. We love animals, but not in our house, so we do not accept pets. No smoking inside the house.

name: Top apartment - heart of Stockholm
summary: 1000m from Centralstation. 450m to Hötorget 600m to Stureplan
space: There are not many apartments located in this area which makes this apartment a bit unique.
description: 1000m from Centralstation. 450m to Hötorget 600m to Stureplan There are not many apartments located in this area which makes this apartment a bit unique.  The apartment is 89 square meters big and located on 4th floor. The building has got a small elevator if you don't feel like using the stairs. I have got two bikes in the basement that can be accessible if you want to bike around the city. I will try to welcome you and give you keys and briefly show you the apartment. If you need any advice for Stockholm just let me know. I can always recommend some restaurants, shops or attractions to see and do. The apartment is located in a very quiet and charming area of Stockholm even though it is in the middle of the city. From the livingroom window you see Johannes church and form the bedroom window you see Adolf Fredriks church.  It is only 100 meters away from Hötorget subway station. The apartment has got a wireless superfast broadband.

name: Wonderful apartment close to city
summary: Only 10 minutes away from the city centre you find this cozy apartment perfect for two, but with room for three guests. Many green areas nearby and walking distance to Globen and Tele2 arena. 15 min from T-Centralen.
space: This wonderful one bedroom apartment is situated in an area called Årsta, very popular for its perfect location close to the city centre and close to green areas.  Communication to the city centre of Stockholm is easy accessible – the metro station Gullmarsplan (8 min to T-Centralen) is a 10 minute or 2 minute bus ride away. You will reach the very popular neighborhood called Södermalm in 10 minutes. The apartment itself has a cozy bedroom with corner windows towards a green area and a king size bed, perfect for two people. There is also a smaller room today used as an office, that fits an airbed should you need it (there is an airbed available).  The bathroom is newly renovated. The kitchen is not, but still very cozy with its retro-style. The living room offers a sofa, a tv screen to plug in your laptop into, and an expandable dinner table.  We only sublet this apartment for the entire period of 2nd-30th of March, and we need to sign a contract beforehand.
description: Only 10 minutes away from the city centre you find this cozy apartment perfect for two, but with room for three guests. Many green areas nearby and walking distance to Globen and Tele2 arena. 15 min from T-Centralen. neighborhood_overview: Årsta is an amazing area, lots of green areas nearby and a short walk away from Årstaviken, with Södermalm on the other side of the water. The area is beautiful for walks or running. There are also a few restaurants in the area - Chinese, Greek, Kebab, Nepalese, Pizzerias, cafés, and so on. There is a small supermarket a 3 min walk away, open until 10pm.
transit: To get to the city centre you have several options. The easiest one is to walk to Gullmarsplan, 10 minutes away, and then take the metro north (2 minutes to Medborgarplatsen, 8 minutes to T-centralen). As mentioned, you can also take the bus to Gullmarsplan.
access: The apartment is about 55 square meters big, with a small bedroom, a spacious living room, an office, a bathroom with a shower and a kitchen with a lot of working space, fridge and freezer, stove and oven, microwave, etc. The apartment also has a balcony facing a green area, wonderful for breakfasts or dinners in the sunshine. The living room has a comfortable sofa, a flat screen tv and a dining table perfect for four.  I have no specific rules, other than that you should use common sense. Don't be too loud too late, don't break things, and so on. If you happen to break a glass or so I won't mind, but if more valuable things gets broken we have to come to some kind of arrangement.
interaction: I will be available for questions and try to make your stay as perfect as possible, but I will not be in the apartment during your stay.

name: Charismatic 110m² apartment
summary: Feel at home in my spacious 1920s apartment located in beautiful Norrmalm; the very centre of Stockholm city!
space: This is a three bedroom bright and spacious 1920s apartment, which comes with high ceilings, large windows and parquet floors. The apartment also has a beautiful original fireplace made out of marble. In the living room you can enjoy cable TV, the kitchen is fully equipped and there's a separate bathroom (with bathtub) and WC. Of course there is wifi. If there's anything you need or if there's anything you want to know about Stockholm do not hesitate to ask!  The neighborhood is quiet and family oriented with a lot of green areas and playgrounds. But it also has a great deal of restaurants and bars, especially in the areas around Odenplan or St:Eriksplan, which is a 10 min walk from the apartment.  For example there is restaurant Tranan who is considered to serve the best swedish meatballs in town, but also has a very popular bar with different guest djs each weekend. It is only 7 min with the metro to the Central station where all of the big department stores such as 'Nordiska Kompani

Our home is designed in a creative way with a different style in each room. All furniture's are second hand and have high personality of its own. We believe that unsymmetrical and playful design is better for your mind and love the light from three directions in the apartment. Hope you will too!

host_about:
I am a multicultural European with Scandinavian roots. Travelling is one of my hobbies, as well as for instance litterature, good films, opera, classic music, outdoor life and biking. I have been travelling since I was a child and I just love Italy and especially Venice. Good food and good wine is a part of my life.
I also love adventure, but I take no risks. I suppose I can describe myself as a humble person with a great respect for other people. There are some luxuries that according to me are (sometimes) almost necessary, but I am actually quite happy with simple life - that is also my way to travel. I enjoy the company of nice people, but I feel totally OK alone. I am curious and keen on learning new things - in the very moment I am studying at the university, because I have to change my profession (engineer). I am humorous, honest, reliable and social. No matter my age, I have  a very young outlook on life. I speak English, German, Italian - and my "northern" languages Swedish and Finnish. 
"Carpe diem" is a leading life motto for me, the other one is "chi cerca, trova". Not to forget "It will be fine in the end, if not, then it is not the end...."

name: Comfortable large apartment in SOFO
summary: Large and spacious family-friendly apartment with with three rooms of 86 square metres and balcony in the heart of popular SOFO, Södermalm.  The apartment goes with a large courtyard including a playground.
space: The apartment has two large bedrooms. One with a queen size bed, the other with two children's beds (160x70cm). We also have two foldable extra beds (200x80cm) and also an extra matress (200x80). Crib also available. The couch is comfy if you are not to tall. Very family friendly building with a large courtyard with a playground.

space: As I have only lived here for 1,5 year, many furnitures etc. are bought in the same period and very new! All necesities available as super fast Internet, TV, dishwasher, new washing machine, rice cooker, microwave, new juice machine, water heater, fully equipped and renovated kitchen with cutlery for you to cook!  Bathroom with floor heating makes it comfortable during cold days... I am always reachable through mobile and I will meet up as you arrive. Let me know what you like and I will give you suitable recommendations!

host_about: I am a swedish girl with chinese origin raised and grown up in Stockholm. Love to travel and want to share my apt to others that want to visit one of the most beautiful capitals in the world :-) I am working with international marketing and will be abroad from time to time so it gives a perfect opportunity to rent out my cosey flat. Since I have 5 gym in the neighboorhood, I really love to go to the gym and exercise a lot, either after work with friends or during weekends. Closeness to restaurants, cafes and parks is wonderful for meeting friends and best of all, just a walk away!

name: Cozy flat in the heart of Sodermalm SoFo area
summary: Our cousy 3 room apartment with high ceilings in a charming house built 1909 is located in the most popular "Sofo" area in Södermalm, Stockholm. You find some of the best bars, cafés, restaurants and shops just around the corner. Believe me, this is the area you want to hang out in! The bus stop (several lines) is 50 meters away and the Metro station Skanstull is only a four minutes walk from home.

name: Top floor - balcony and fireplace (1.259 ft2)
summary: In a building from 1879 you will find this 4 room apartment/117 sqm2, nicely decorated with midmodern original furniture. There are two regular bedrooms. When there are 4 persons staying i usually place a third bed in the library (or if three persons wishes to have separate bedrooms). The beds are 160, 105 and 80 cm's wide. On the balcony you have sun from around 15:00 until late in the evening in summer. Not perfectly suitable for people with disabilities (no elevator).
space: Recommend by Time Out Magazine (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Original vintage furniture (mainly midcentury modern), books and cd's. Please use coasters on the table in the living room and even more importantly on the side board (also in the living room).  When sleeping in the library pull down the blinds before going to bed. It gets really sunny in the morning.

neighborhood_overview: There are quite a few nice restaurants on Nybrogatan and also a good supermarket called Ica Esplanad just across the road. I highly recommend a walk around the beautiful island Djurgården which is really close. Also please let me know if you need to borrow a bike.
notes: There is a communal washing room. Please let me know if you plan to use it and I will try to explain how the system works.
transit: Just next to the Stadion underground station (the red line) and the buss line number 1.  But me I basically walk and ride my bike everywhere. Stockholm is only semi big so most places are in an easy walking distance - and that way you see more of the city.
access: This is my home but you are welcome to read my books and use whatever you can find in the fridge etc. There will of course be clean towels and bed linens etc.
interaction: I will try to meet up most guests in person if I'm not away travelling myself. Also my neighbour Lisa is often around to help you out.
house_rules: - No parties but of course you are allowed to enjoy yourself. Smoking on the balcony is ok. The evening sun on the balcony is lovely but it also here that you might disturb neighbours.
host_about: I'm a 45 year old music loving vintage furniture freak. Please let me know if you've got anything you need help with during your stay in Stockholm.

name: Cosy central apartment for two!
summary: Welcome to stay in my two room apartment with a 15 minute walk to the very popular Södermalm area and a five minute walk to the Subway (Skärmarbrink) which takes you to the city center in about 15 minutes. If you like the nature and walks the huge recreation area "Nackareservatet" is really close by as well.
description: Welcome to stay in my two room apartment with a 15 minute walk to the very popular Södermalm area and a five minute walk to the Subway (Skärmarbrink) which takes you to the city center in about 15 minutes. If you like the nature and walks the huge recreation area "Nackareservatet" is really close by as well. The apartment is on the third floor and there is no elevator. Fully equipped kitchen and the guests can feel free too use all the kitchen tools. The bedroom has ha 1,2 m wide bed and a clothing wrack. The two wardrobes are not available for the guests since I use it as storage. In the living room there is a sofa which easily can be transformed to a second bed. The balcony is really nice to relax at if it's a sunny day and has an amazing view over the famous building Globen! There is also a bathroom with a shower and WC. I will be available on my phone if there is any questions about your stay in my apartment. There is a 5 minute walk to the closest subway station (Skärmarbrink) whi
neighborhood_overview: Lägenheten ligger perfekt oavsett vilka intressen du som gäst har. Skärmarbrinkområdet ligger nära båda nackareservatet för skogspromenader, utegym eller ett bad i sicklasjön samtidigt som det endast är en 15 minuters promenad till skanstull och det populära Södermalm för mat&dryck eller kulturupplevelser. dessutom är det gångavstånd till Globen och slakthusområdet för nattliv, sportevenemang och konserter.
notes: There is no elevator in the building and the apartment is on the third floor.
transit: There is a 5 minute walk to the closest subway station (Skärmarbrink) which takes you to the city center in about 15 minutes. 5 minutes to the closest convenience store (Tempo!) and about a 15 minute walk to the very popular södermalm area which has a lot of nice resturantes and bars as well as the famous night club Trädgården.

neighborhood_overview: Hammarby Sjöstad is a calm modern and fashionable part of Stockholm with lots of restaurants, great connections to the city center. You are next to wide nature and yet close to the center of Stockholm. You live on the seashore,  The hood is an example of contemporary green architecture.
notes: There are always fresh Fruit, basic food dry food to the left of fridge and coffee beens for your day of arrival. There is space for you in left fridge/freaser and wardrobes (mark "guest"). TV: is a 50" screen. For TV-chanels over Webb.  You must connect your computer to TV (hdmi etc) or use it with our player cd/dvd.  The flat has some thick walls. Therfore  our WLAN use 2 wifi-senders: VilhelmNetwork (bedroom & guest room) & VilhelmAccess (kitchen, hall, room)
transit: From Sickla Udde at housentrance you can take train/metro & busses  to all parts of Stockholm and outscirts. There is a free ferry over the water to Downtown Södermalm. You can check out (Website hidden by Airbnb) to plan your trip. Start from Sickla Udde.

interaction: I am an architect always available on the phone, email or through the airbnb app. If I am in town I am happy to meet you, tell you about architecture in Stockholm and answer any questions you might have. Wonderful Pooya and his wife are every day in Hammarby Livs 70 meters from our entrance. They have the key, they know the flat and they are helpful.
house_rules: You may not smoke in the flat or terrass. Please keep quite after 10pm. Bring your own trash as you leave and try to leave the place as you found it. You can leave linnen in beds, used towels on floor.
host_about: I am an architect with my own company. I have two lovely sons 31 and 28. My main hobby is my work and dancing (Tango, salsa, WCS). name: A great space in Stockholm
summary: My apartment is located with the perfect balance between big city and nature. Only 15 min by metro to the city centre and 8-10 minutes to the wonderful neighbourhood of Södermalm and a nature perserve just outside the door. Charming quiet neighborhood with grocery stores and restaurants and walking distance to Globen.
space: An apartment comfortable for 2 but also great for 4 people. Full kitchen with dishwasher and bathroom with everything you could possibly need with shower and laundry machine. The apartment has a TV, radio, wifi and a balcony with sun exposéer from arround 1 PM to sunset. A great place to finish your day. There is one big double bed (180 cm), a big sofa great for sleeping in and also an extra foldable bed if you would need one.
description: My apartment is located with the perfect balance between big city and nature. Only 15 min by metro to the city centre and 8-10 minutes to the wonderful neighbourhood of Södermalm and a nature perserve just outside the door. Charming quiet neighborhood with grocery stores and restaurants and walking distance to Globen. An apartment comfortable for 2 but also great for 4 people. Full kitchen with dishwasher and bathroom with everything you could possibly need with shower and laundry machine. The apartment has a TV, radio, wifi and a balcony with sun exposéer from arround 1 PM to sunset. A great place to finish your day. There is one big double bed (180 cm), a big sofa great for sleeping in and also an extra foldable bed if you would need one. As a guest in my apartment you will have access to the whole apartement. I will not be in Stockholm so the apartment will be all yours and we will have contact via mail or phone and there will be friends of mine there to meet you when you arrive and
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood Kärrtorp is a great place, very charming and quiet but with all the things you need. 2 grocery stores, restaurants with thaifood, pizza and sushi, a small movie theatre and a regular theatre. There is a great bakery/coffee shop called Santa Fe just  a few steps down the street from my apartment and walking distance to the famous Globen with shops and restaurants. There is also a community pool nearby and a nature preserve with a lake, 20 min away by foot, great for swimming in the summer and very nice nature trails.
transit: It´s a 7 minute walk to the nearest metro station, then it will take 8 minutes to Södermalm and about 15 minutes to the Central Station where you can take bus or train to the airport, both Arlanda and Skavsta.
access: As a guest in my apartment you will have access to the whole apartement.
interaction: I will not be in Stockholm so the apartment will be all yours and we will have contact via mail or phone and there will be friends of mine there to meet you when you arrive and give you all the help necessary for you to feel welcomed.
house_rules: No pets or animals of any kind. No parties. No smoking indoors.
host_about:
I live in Stockholm and work as a television editor and really love what I do. When I´m not working, my favorite thing to do is to travel and I will happily rent out my wonderful apartment while I´m away. It´s filled with other things that I like; books, boardgames and colors. 
And I will of course treat your place with the same care that I do my own and hope that you do the same.

summary: A clean, light, quiet and beautiful apartment just 10 minutes walk from Stureplan. 3 min to Spotify HQ! Lots of restaurants in the neighbourhood - Bar Central, Phil's Burger & Babs, to name a few. Pharmacy and bakery next door.
space: You will enter a light and spacious hall with an open fire. Big living room, big bedroom with a 140cm bed, an office and a kitchen that hosts up to 10 people for dinner. Fresh bathroom with shower, washing machine and dryer.
description: A clean, light, quiet and beautiful apartment just 10 minutes walk from Stureplan. 3 min to Spotify HQ! Lots of restaurants in the neighbourhood - Bar Central, Phil's Burger & Babs, to name a few. Pharmacy and bakery next door. You will enter a light and spacious hall with an open fire. Big living room, big bedroom with a 140cm bed, an office and a kitchen that hosts up to 10 people for dinner. Fresh bathroom with shower, washing machine and dryer. You will have access to everything except my storage.  If I'm not around, I have hired a company to make sure that you have a pleasant stay and someone to ask. Very nice and quiet house with friendly neighbours. Around the corner you'll have the best breakfast in Sthlm at Saturnus - a local café run by a French family, always full with people. There's also a lovely bakery across the street! Easy to get hold of taxis at Birger Jarlsgatan, a bus stop just outside the door will take you straight to Stureplan (one stop) and Södermalm. High speed

name: Heart of Sofo
summary: Great location - calm street close to the action.  With Nytorget and Vitabergsparken around the block, the metro stations of Slussen and Medborgarplatsen, aswell as the Old City within walking distance - my place is the perfect base for Stockholm exploration.  Plenty of great restaurants nearby: Indio, Punk Royale, Urban Deli, Bar Central, FLFL, Deli di Luca, Greasy Spoon, Soldaten Svejk, Chokladfabriken among others.  Quiet, tasteful and well equipped. Perfect for couples and solo travelers!

name: Superb home near Stockholm city
summary: Newly renovated house, great planning. The villa is situated in Aspudden south of city central with great communications (underground, busses) and also a cozy and hipp suburb area. Perfect stay for families with own garden and big balcony/patio
space: A unique accommodation in a private house in the trendy Aspudden with its own garden . The house is completely renovated on two levels with social areas on the upper level and bedroom on the lower . Large balcony 30 m2 with afternoon and evening sun. Patio in the pleasant garden with morning sun . Play equipment like swings , sandpit and slide in the garden for toddlers. Ideal for the visiting families with children. Driveway with free parking for up to two cars . Upper level consists of entrance , toilet, fully equipped kitchen , dining area , fireplace and living room and study / guest bedroom with a bed of high standard. Lower level has service entrance , large bathroom with tub and exclusive sauna, TV room , three bedrooms including a master bedroom with double high quality bed ( 210cm ) . The other two bedrooms are children's room with crib and junior bed . Ability to put the mattress on the floor in both rooms.

Upper level consists of entrance , toilet, fully equipped kitchen , dining area , fireplace and living room and study / guest bedroom with a bed of high standard. Lower level has service entrance , large bathroom with tub and exclusive sauna, TV room , three bedrooms including a master
neighborhood_overview: The area is quiet and nice surrounded by greenery in trendy Aspudden . The center is located a few minutes away there are grocery store , shops, restaurants and libraries , pharmacies . For those who like city near the natural area is ideal , close to the beautiful Vinterviken and Gröndal with lake Trekanten. For those who like shopping are new trendy Liljeholmstorget mall in walking distance. Also the hipp area Midsommarkransen is close to Aspudden (walking distance).
notes: Free Wi-fi connection. Mattresses are available . Both a 120 cm foam mattress and an inflatable mattress , if desired.
transit: Approximately two-three minutes walking distance to the subway (station Aspudden ) which takes about three-four minutes to Södermalm and eight to city central. Even buses to Gröndal and south locations.
access: The entire house except the garage is available . Wireless Wifi Internet Two LCD TVs ( 50 " and 46 " ) with the basic range of television channels , as well as Apple TV and Netflix . Playstation 3 with DVD and Blueray Bed linen and towels Washing machine with integrated dryer Books and CDs. Highchairs for both babies and older children Bibs, spoons , plates etc. for children children's Toys Party Games etc.
interaction: You will be sent a instruction folder with practical information, we often travel by ourselves when we rent out the house but we are available during your stay via phone and email for questions.
house_rules: No smoking indoors. OK outside on the balcony and garden of cigarette butts collected outside. Pets prohibited. Leave the house as you found it with all fixtures intact . Cleaning fee will be added as needed. Using sheets and towels left in the washing machine. Respect for the neighborhood! Please consider the environment and use sparingly with energy, hot water etc . Check-in and out by appointment.
host_about: Trebarnspappa som tycker set är dumt att vårt fina hus står tomt när vi själva är bortresta. Jobbar med vattenfrågor på en teknikkonsultfirma. Är författare till boken: Bygg en förmögenhet - Fixa familjens ekonomi.

name: Awesome apartment in Södermalm
summary: This is an amazing three room apartment located in the heart of Södermalm. It's newly renovated and very fresh with all facilities needed. The balcony is fantastic and you will have a nice and comfy stay.
space: This is an amazing three room apartment at Södermalm. It's newly renovated and very fresh with all facilities needed. The balcony is fantastic and you will have a nice and comfy stay. It's a calm neighbourhood with walking distance to all nice and hip areas. The water along Tantolunden, Reimers Holme, Långholmen and Old Town. The hip bars in Hornstull and in trendy SoFo/Nytorget. If you wish, we have an "allocation guide" to help you avoid tourist traps :) It include bars, lunch/dining, cool stores, Swedish brands, shopping malls etc. covering both Södermalm and the city center.

neighborhood_overview: What we love most in the neighbourhood is that it's walking distance to everything as the apartment is located in the middle of Södermalm. It's hip and trendy and the enviroment and the people are varm and friendly. Whatever you wish for, a walk along he water, food, cafés, shopping, arcitecture, bars, clubs, you can walk there.  I'ts a very calm area around the house with a park in the backside and a dead-end street in the front.
transit: The commuter train stop right around the corner (Södra station) with a 4 minutes ride to/from the Central station. Perfect if you travel with luggage. It's 5 minutes walk to the Red Line (Mariatorget) and 9 minutes walk to the Green Line (Medborgarplatsen.) We would recommend the rental bikes which are places in stands all around the city, as Stockolm is perfect to see by bike!
access: The whole apartment of 67sqm is for use. Just ask if you want to borrow some of our adventure gear. A cozy livingroom connected to the balcony and the open kitchen. 40" TV with TivoBox. Also possible to connect you mobile via Chromecast. The newly renovated kitchen has all facilities needed, including dishwasher, micro wave, sodastreamer and coffee machine. The balcony just got decorated with new furnitures, carpet and green plants. Perfect for breakfast, dining or just chill evening wine. It is facing a park and beautiful houses, so the surroundings are very green and peaceful. In the big bedroom you´ll meet a very comfortable bed for rest and sleep. The bedroom is new and very fresh.
house_rules: Treat our home as it was your own :) We expect you to leave the apartment in the same condition as you received it. No smoking or animals.

name: Retro flat in heart of Södermalm
summary: A perfect apartment for 1 to 2 persons who wants to enjoy the hippest part of Stockholm and also have a cozy home to return to. Located right next to popular streets Hornsgatan and Ringvägen, the flat is on the calm Brännkyrkagatan with low traffic.
space: Besides being located right in the heart of Södermalm, where you will find all the best second hands, restaurants and cafés, you will be neighbor with Skinnarviksparken. It's a beautiful park with one of the best views of Stockholms skyline. Right outside of the apartment you have great restaurant Pane Vino if you are craving a really good gourmet pizza. Why not take a three minute walk on lively Hornsgatan to Bysistorget and have a cup of java at Mellqvist, home to local record label INGRID (founded by Lykke Li, Peter Björn and John, Miike Snow)? You'll love their coffee. In the apartment you'll find, apart from the good atmosphere; • A nice 120cm bed • Free Wifi • Newly renovated kitchen with dishwasher • Fresh bathroom • Nice sofa and living room space • Windows facing leafy inner garden  • Outdoor cortyard with tables and bookable firewood oven  I'm happy to welcome my guests and, if you like, give tips and tricks on the best local places to go. Though since I'm a touring musician,

house_rules: I expect you to treat my home with love like you would treat yours.  Please don't play on the piano which is very precious to me, and also because I have special arrangements made with my neighbours about it. No smoking indoors and no pets. In respect of the neighbours, please don't make excessive noise after 10pm. I expect you to leave the apartment as you found it.
host_about: My name is Pierre and I'm a happy musician living and working in Södermalm.

name: Top location on Södermalm!
summary: Newly renovated appartment located between Nytorget & Mosebacke.  Perfect location on Södermalm in a quiet oasis, surrounded by nice cafés, bars, restaurants, green areas and great hangouts.  38 m2
space: Newly renovated apartment located between Nytorget & Mosebacke. The area is very quiet and nice with good communications. Approx. 3 min walk to Nytorget / Medborgarplatsen / Götgatsbacken.  Perfect location on Södermalm in a quiet oasis, surrounded by nice cafés, bars, restaurants, green areas and great hangouts. Reall The apartment is newly renovated, -14 with high standards.  I would say it is suitable for two guests, but one guest can sleep on the sofa (240 cm long). However, if you are in for comfort would recommend it for two.  Short details on each room: Kitchen; Sits 4-6 people (depending on level of comfort!); Complete kitchen including: Gas Cooker; Steam/Convection owen; Coffe grinder; Espresso machine. Dishwasher. Balcony: Comes with furniture, sits 4 people. Living room: Fully furnished, however no TV; Stereo (AUX-input available) Bedroom 160 cm bed; Large wardrobe. Bathroom Shower, All tiled with marble on floor.  There are two shared terraces in the building, respectively

neighborhood_overview: Södermalm is a very nice and somewhat vibrant area, make sure to visit Nytorget, Götgatan, SoFo. You will find a lot of restaurants, cafees, bars etc. Ill be happy to give some tips (also outside Södermalm) depending on your preferences. Make sure to take a walk around to enjoy the green areas and enjoy the view over Stockholm!
notes: Please contact me with any inquiries, ill be happy to tailor some tips around your stay!
transit: No private parking available but it is usually OK to find a parking space close to the appt.  Good communications with metro (red & green line) within 5 mins walk, also frequent bus departures from Tjärhovsplan & Slussen (Both approx. 5 min) If you arrive to Arlanda, would suggest taking a train from Arlanda to T-Centralen. Depending on how light you travel take a taxi from there (However, be sure to watch the taxi prices!) I would recommend Taxi Stockholm, Kurir, Uber or 020.
access: As my guests, you will have access to the whole apartment. Some personal and cleaning devices will be left, but hopefully nothing you will find disturbing. There is a lot a space in the warderobe for you to use and the kitchen is well equipped. I also have piano, which you are free to use - but please respect the neighbours!  There are some dry goods in the pantry which you are free to use, but please replace with something similar.  In the event of long-term rent, access can be given to the laundry room. But for short term leases access to the laundry will probably not be possible as it usually is really busy and hard to get slots if you don’t book in advance.
interaction: As i currently live abroad, a friend will handle the ground service - but i will make sure to give you a call and / or send an email prior to your arrival and make sure that you will have a good stay!
house_rules: Please consider that this is my home, ill expect that you will treat it with respect, care and make sure to feel at home. Some rules, apart from a general good judgement. No Smoking indoors. Please respect the neighbours, it is supposed to be quiet at 23 - but subject to good judgement that could be challenged. I try not to use the piano before 10 and after 21 as a know this disturbs the neighbours.  No pets, if you have a small and calm dog - that could be discussed.
host_about:
Hi,  

Im 28 years old living. Have been living on Södermalm for approx 6 months, but a couple of years in Stockholm in total. I love music, cooking, travelling and to hang out with my friends. 

I think you will find me to be a good host and guest, i will try my best to make sure to give you some nice recommendations and to get the most out of your stay.

name: Charming villa in perfect spot
summary: Large 20th century villa in exclusive suburb Äppelviken with beds for 6 people and plenty of room. Surrounded by a large garden, within walking distance of Lake Mälaren and only 15 minutes by metro to downtown Stockholm the house is ideally situated.
space: This cosy large house has a generous social area on the bottom floor with kitchen, dining room and living room. On the second floor there are 4 bedrooms, of which one is a baby room but can easily fit an extra bed if neccessary. On the top floor is an additional bedroom and working area. The area is elegant, quiet, family friendly with playgrounds and green areas yet very close to the city. Swimming in lake Mälaren is within walking distance.

host_about: I am a single mother and our home is perfect for spending time together, play, cook, our everyday life. Restaurants, cafes, cinemas, and library just around the corner are other reasons why we feel so at home and enjoy our hood in Stockholm.

summary: Located in the middle of downtown Stockholm (Norrmalm), this 2 room apartment is a great place to stay if you want to explore the city. Walking distance: Gamla Stan(Old Town), Drottninggatan, Metro, trains, airport coaches and nightlife (Stureplan).
space: The flat is located in the center of Stockholm, walking distance to shopping, restaurants and the best night life Stockholm has to offer (Stureplan).  It's a (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) apartment with 2 rooms (a king-sized bed in the bedroom). Also there is an extra air-bed if needed. The apartment is on the third floor and there is a lift. The apartments outdoor entrance have an entry code so no one who is not living in the building can come in. Great and fully equipped kitchen suitable for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

notes: Bed linnen and 2 towels are included.

host_about:
Hi, I'm Kavian. 

I'm more than happy to welcome you to our beautiful city and give you tips on where to eat, drink the best cocktails and which attractions to see.

I grew up in Stockholm but have also lived in London and in Hong Kong. I'm into travel,sports, design and love good food. I've studied at Örebro University and The Chines University of Hong Kong majoring in Business and Economics. Work as a Financial Auditor in central Stockholm.

Came up with the idea to rent out my flat after that I used AirBnB when I was in Berlin.

summary: En stor och hemtrevlig lägenhet i Hammarby Sjöstad nära till vatten, skidbacke, affärer, restauranger, caféer, friluftsområden och härliga Södermalm. Lägenheten har tre sovrum med plats för fyra vuxna, två badrum, öppen planlösning mellan kök, matplats & vardagsrum.

notes: Härliga grannar som ska respekteras såklart. Tänk på dem på kvällen och tidiga morgnar. Det här är vårt boende som vi älskar så ta hand om det på bästa sätt.

interaction: Gästerna kan nå mig under vistelsen vid frågor. Vid in -och utcheckning är jag på plats i lägenheten.
house_rules: Ingen rökning är tillåten, inomhus eller på balkongen, inte heller husdjur pga allergier. Tänk på grannarna. Jag vill att gästerna känner sig hemma och tar ansvar, det är mitt hem som de är välkomna till och tar hand om. Ta hand om mitt hem så som du vill att jag ska ta hand om ditt. Ta av ytterskorna vid dörren. Tack!
host_about: När jag och min familj är ute och reser så bokar vi alltid vårt boende via Airbnb. Vi vet därför vad som är viktigt, vad som uppskattas och vad som gör boendet till det perfekta. Välkomna hem till oss och vi lovar att ni kommer att trivas och känna er som hemma.

name: Bed & breakfast in the city centre!
summary: My apartment is located on lovely Reimersholme, 12 min from metro station Hornstull  1100 meters), a hip area with cafes, restaurants, cinema, shopping, a beach, running trails. I offer B&B.   Flygbussarna (Buses) from Arlanda to Liljeholmen stops at Hornstull. Arrivals at City terminal (from Skavsta) can take bus 54 straight to Reimersholme!
space: Reimersholme offers closeness to the water, green areas, wild animals and city life at the same time! You'll get fresh sheets, a towel, toilet paper, schampoo, soap and toothpaste.  There's a small supermarket on the island. Open between 9am-9pm.  I live in a small 3-room-apartment and you'll stay in the livingroom (a 20 m2 private separate room) with access to the balcony. Note! You cannot smoke on the balcony nor in the apartment. In the summer I will sometimes pass through the room to have access to the balcony, but not when you're in it! Or, not without your permission.  Note! I have a limited internet connection. You can check your mail etc. and surf for information. You cannot stream films nor music, nor download anything. Please respect that. Breakfast is very basic. It consists of coffee or tea, homemade bread (often made the night before, but not always), butter, cheese and marmalade.  I'm very flexible about check-in and check-out, but please tell me in your request about at
description: My apartment is located on lovely Reimersholme, 12 min from metro station Hornstull  1100 meters), a hip area with cafes, restaurants, cinema, shopping, a beach, running trails. I offer B&B.   Flygbussarna (Buses) from Arlanda to Liljeholmen stops at Hornstull. Arrivals at City terminal (from Skavsta) can take bus 54 straight to Reimersholme! Reimersholme offers closeness to the water, green areas, wild animals and city life at the same time! You'll get fresh sheets, a towel, toilet paper, schampoo, soap and toothpaste.  There's a small supermarket on the island. Open between 9am-9pm.  I live in a small 3-room-apartment and you'll stay in the livingroom (a 20 m2 private separate room) with access to the balcony. Note! You cannot smoke on the balcony nor in the apartment. In the summer I will sometimes pass through the room to have access to the balcony, but not when you're in it! Or, not without your permission.  Note! I have a limited internet connection. You can check your mail etc.
neighborhood_overview: Reimersholme is definitely considered to be in the city center. In fact, many fun events take place at Hornstull, my metro station. It takes 8 minutes to go to the Central Station from Hornstull by metro. But honestly, who wants to hang out in that area? At night it's a mostly a dead commercial neighbourhood. From my house you'll have a lovely waterfront walk to The Old town (40 min).  There's a bus 2 min from my house that'll take you to Sofo in 20 minutes.  I love the fact that I have close access to jogging next to the water (bring running shoes!), swimming in the lake, skiing, going to the movies, nice restaurants and cafés while being in the city centre.  On the island Långholmen (which is one big park), 5 minutes away, you can rent canoes in the summer. There's also a beach. If you don't like swimming, running or canoeing, you can just sit on a rock by the water and watch the boats going by.  There's also an awesome second-hand store one subway stop away :-).
notes: If your departure is late your last day and you would like to leave the luggage in the apartment until the evening, it's usually not a problem. BUT, if you plan to cook a last meal, or hang out in the afternoon, please ask in advance. It might not suit my schedule that day.
transit: There are two buses (2 minutes away) on the island that'll take you to Hornstull metro station or around the city. To walk to the metro station takes about 12 minutes, 15 if you have a lot of luggage.   If you take a taxi, only use Taxi Stockholm.
access: My guests will share the bathroom and the kitchen with me (and occasionally my daughter OR boyfriend). You will most likely be left alone in the apartment at least one night, especially on weekends. Also, on weekdays I leave as early as 6.20 and my daughter at about 8am, so there's a lot of privacy.  Please let me know in advance if you would like to use the kitchen to cook. It's much smoother that way, we can take turns :-). There's a great gas stove and an electric oven.  No heavy or greasy cooking, please.
interaction: I like talking to my guests, if I have the time. I work full-time as a teacher, so I can be a little tired. Please, no offence, I'm not a night-person. I go to bed at 9 pm on weeknights. However, I don't expect my guests to go to bed that early though :-). And I'm super quiet in the morning.
house_rules: You cannot smoke inside. No pets because my daughter is very allergic to any animal.  I prefer not to receive guests after 10 pm, but once you have your own key, you can come and go as you want.  You cannot make a lot of noise after 10pm, my neighbours won't like it.  No other people allowed on the premises.
host_about:
I'm a friendly and open person who likes to meet new people. I'm a teacher in English and Spanish. I'm interested in society, social issues, the environment, politics and literature. I like knitting, biking and running. I also like watching, films, World Cup football. I like the simple things in life, a good cup of coffee, sharing a meal with friends, or riding my bike on a sunny day. 

I have lived in the US, Ecuador and Spain, but mostly in Sweden. I used to be a couch surfing host for seven years before starting with Airbnb. I really like receiving people from all over the world.

name: Cute Appartment, Hip Area !
summary: A great cute Appartment on Odenplan Stockholm, a 2 minute walk to subway and bus station that will take you in 5 minutes to the different attractions in Stockholm. Supermarket, 7 eleven and gym is across the street. Enjoy! PS. Dog used to live here
space: Built in the 1800s, this classic apartment is located in vasastan. There is natural lighting throughout the entire place thanks to the high ceilings and tall windows. The living room is equiped with a couche, dining table. There is also a huge TV.  Bedroom is fully equiped with great closet space and a queen size bed, with comfy matress.  Kitchen is also fully equiped with everything you need including a dishwasher. Attention: I sometimes have a dog living in the apartment. Important to know for those of you who are allergic.

name: Charming apartment at Södermalm
space: Our cool and cozy apartment has a big airy room that comfortably fits 1-2 guests. The apartment is centrally located in the center of Södermalm. Enjoy the bars, restaurants, clubs, vintage shops and coffee places, all located nearby. Easy access to both commuter train, bus and underground. Bedroom: The room has a comfortable bed, 220 cm wide, and 220 cm long, two night desks and much of space.
description: Our cool and cozy apartment has a big airy room that comfortably fits 1-2 guests. The apartment is centrally located in the center of Södermalm. Enjoy the bars, restaurants, clubs, vintage shops and coffee places, all located nearby. Easy access to both commuter train, bus and underground. Bedroom: The room has a comfortable bed, 220 cm wide, and 220 cm long, two night desks and much of space. Facilities: - Bedlinen, covers, pillows etc. - Clean bathroom, with bathtub.  - Towels, toilet paper. - Shampoo, conditioner.  - Washer and dryer inside the apartment.  - Internet and WiFi. - TV - Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher.  - Dining area. - Living room. Very close to many bars, coffee bars, restaurant and shops (including popular vintage shops such as Judit's Second Hand). The grocery store Hemköp is nearby and open every day 7-23. Please have a look at the airbnb guide I have set up with ideas about what to do in the area. Transportation: Underground, takes 4 min from the city cent
neighborhood_overview: Very close to many bars, coffee bars, restaurant and shops (including popular vintage shops such as Judit's Second Hand). The grocery store Hemköp is nearby and open every day 7-23. Please have a look at the airbnb guide I have set up with ideas about what to do in the area.
notes: I would be more than happy to host you. Feel free to ask me anything, if you have questions! Checking out is before 11:00 (am). It could be possible to check-out later, or to leave some luggage in the living room. Please ask before! Welcome!
transit: Transportation: Underground, takes 4 min from the city center, go off: "Mariatorget" (3 stops). Commuter train, takes 3 min from the city center, go off: "Stockholms södra". (1 stop).  Walking distance to the apartment from the station: 3 min from "Mariatorget" and 8 min from "Stockholms södra". Parking is quite expensive, but there are several parking opportunities close to the apartment.   The location is perfect as it's right in the middle of Stockholm. The underground is running frequently (and all night Fridays and Saturdays) which makes it very convenient to stay here.
access: Facilities: - Bedlinen, covers, pillows etc. - Clean bathroom, with bathtub.  - Towels, toilet paper. - Shampoo, conditioner.  - Washer and dryer inside the apartment.  - Internet and WiFi. - TV - Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher.  - Dining area. - Living room.
house_rules: House rules; - Be respectful. - Clean up after yourself.  - No smoking inside the apartment. - "Quiet" after 22:00.
host_about:
I'm living together with 2 of my 3 children (10 & 17 years old).  The apartment is built in the 1920s and has a great decor, is cozy and is situated in the middle of the pulse of Stockholm city. The surrounding area offers a lot of cafés, bars, restaurants and shopping as well as some nice walking paths and parks. 

I work as a mid wife and we (the family) love to travel and we visit both cities, and are having a thing for the beaches in Thailand. I like go to the gym, spending time with family, go out with friends eating/chatting and spending time with my boyfriend and our families. 

We are social and respectful and we welcome all kinds of people to stay at our place. We hope you are having the same values.

name: Lovely room in central apartment
summary: High ceilings, plants, wood and white linens. Calm yet central area. Bathtub. 2 bikes to take you to the royal park, galleries, antique stores and restaurants within 5 min.
space: Spaceous, renovated appartment with high ceilings and large windows in a building from 1906. Perfect for singles or couples.
description: High ceilings, plants, wood and white linens. Calm yet central area. Bathtub. 2 bikes to take you to the royal park, galleries, antique stores and restaurants within 5 min. Spaceous, renovated appartment with high ceilings and large windows in a building from 1906. Perfect for singles or couples. Shared access to fully equiped kitchen and bathroom with a tub. Hallway separates bedrooms. Wifi access. Free laundry service can be booked in the basement. I work mostly from home, my living room serves as atelier. I respect my guests privacy but will of course try to answer any questions. Close to the beautiful royal Haga park wonderful for walks or picnics by the lake. A block away you find Vanadislunden, a small oasis in the midst of the city with a great view over Stockholm. Deli and grocery store around the corner, lots of restaurants and cafés. The neighborhood hosts a number of antique stores and contemporary art galleries. Short walk to the library Stadsbiblioteket, famous for its arc
neighborhood_overview: Close to the beautiful royal Haga park wonderful for walks or picnics by the lake. A block away you find Vanadislunden, a small oasis in the midst of the city with a great view over Stockholm. Deli and grocery store around the corner, lots of restaurants and cafés. The neighborhood hosts a number of antique stores and contemporary art galleries. Short walk to the library Stadsbiblioteket, famous for its architecture and the atelier museum of the sculptor Carl Eldh.
notes: I only accept guests that are non-smokers. The door code for the building has changed to #5362
transit: 10 min walk to airport shuttle (bus stop Norra stationsgatan). 5 min to bus no. 2, 515 and others. 10 min walk to Odenplan, a central hub of public transportation, subway, etc.
access: Shared access to fully equiped kitchen and bathroom with a tub. Hallway separates bedrooms. Wifi access. Free laundry service can be booked in the basement.
interaction: I work mostly from home, my living room serves as atelier. I respect my guests privacy but will of course try to answer any questions.
house_rules: No shoes indoor. No smoking. No pets. No parties. No guests.
host_about:
I'm studying ceramic art in another town so my dear friend Carl will host you on site. He works as a software developer, is very easy going, helpful and kind.
My amazing cat does not live in the Stockholm apartment all the time but it would anyway be good to know if you are allergic for when she does.
On our shared time we watch movies, plays and exhibitions. Enjoy the company of loud laughing friends and good food.

name: Spacious penthouse in top location
summary: Spacious penthouse located at Humlegården central park. Chic and calm neighborhood with short walking distance to Stockholm prime restaurants, culture and shopping. Architected-designed, 5 room (170 Sqm/1800Sqf) apartment, renovated in 2015. Housekeeping every second day is included.
space: In an elegant and stylish turn of the century building, this newly renovated loft style apartment provides you with modern luxuries while retaining it’s charm. Throughout the 170 square meters you will find hardwood floors, wall-to-wall carpets, large windows with views over Stockholm, crown molding, deep window sills and high ceilings. Large, welcoming hallway with sliding wardrobes and guest WC, as well as a bedroom with 180 studio couch. The apartment has a social area of a 50 Sqm living room with a connected dining room and a semi-open upscale kitchen. Separate private wing with living quarters including master bedroom, media room/bedroom and bathroom.

access: 100mb fiber + wifi  Flat screen cable TV Netflix, Viasat etc. Sonos wireless Hifi system Laundry room Kitchen amenities includes; Gaggenau Conventional/Micro/Steam oven, Nespresso coffee, Soda stream, Slow juicer etc. For families with young children we can arrange; Stroller (Bugaboo Cameleon 3, Car seat (Maxi Cosi), Highchair, Toys. name: Studio for 1-3 people in beautiful Hornstull
summary: Cozy studio apartment just by the water in trendy Hornstull in Södermalm. A 5 minute walk from public transports, subway and buses. A spacious loft bed and a convertible sofa bed that will comfortably house two people. Equipped with full kitchen and bathroom.
space: The apartment faces the water and has a french balcony

The apartment faces the water and has a french balcony If you need to use the laundry room for washing your clothes, let me know and we can arrange for that. I will most likely be available to help you out with any inquiries or needs you have during your stay. Hornstull is a vibrant and trendy part of Södermalm in Stockholm, central but still a bit calmer than the inner city. Lots of bars, restaurants with food from all over the world, and cool cafés are found in the area mixed with beautiful nature, water, boat life and Långholmen within minutes from the apartment. The apartment is walking distance from metro and buses, taking you around town to wherever you want to go. Just outside the door, bus 54 and 66 stops.

notes: Axelsberg/Örnsberg karaktäriseras av en charmig småstadskänsla. Här finns mysiga caféer, livsmedelsbutiker, apotek, småbutiker samt restauranger. Här bor du nära natursköna grönområden och Mälaren. I närheten ligger vackra Vinterviken med kolonilotter och Vintervikens Trädgårdscafé som på sommaren har matservering och temakvällar. Här finns även företaget Winterviken som har café med uteservering på sommaren, festvåning och konferenser. Nere vid Mälaren finns välbesökta platser för promenader, bad och fina klipphällar som kan avnjutas med solnedgång. På kort gångavstånd ligger även sjön Trekanten med badplats, på vintern plogas isen för skridskoåkning. I närområdet ligger Liljeholmens centrum med stor galleria med gott om utbud med affärer och restauranger. Goda kommunikationer och närhet till City. För barnfamiljer finns Arken parken och den mycket populära Aspuddsparken med olika djur att titta på, minigolf och utmaningar i klätterställningarna m.m. På helgerna finns möjlighet till k

summary: Our charming terrace house is situated close to a big nature reserve with a lot of jogging-/ski tracks and two lakes.  And it´s just 10 min with the Underground to the Central Station. In walking distance you have the popular area of Södermalm.

The bathroom is in the upper floor and in the basement there is a toilet. We think that our house is brightly coloured and beautiful!
