name: Centrally located 1 bedroom
summary: Centrally located one bedroom flat in the area of Gärdet with walking distance to central Stockholm and Djurgården. The flat has a balcony with furtniture and is equiped with dish washer and washing machine. The flat is suitable for 2 persons with one double bed in the bed room.
description: Centrally located one bedroom flat in the area of Gärdet with walking distance to central Stockholm and Djurgården. The flat has a balcony with furtniture and is equiped with dish washer and washing machine. The flat is suitable for 2 persons with one double bed in the bed room.
host_about:
I work in a lawfirm and live in a cozy flat centrally located and also near green areas such as Djurgården. It is walking distance to central Stockholm and also Djurgården. Karlaplan tube station is 2 minutes walking distance from the flat with 2 stops to Central Station.

I love travelling and go abroad as often as I can. Favourite destinations are Florida, Malaysia, Vietnam, south of France and south of Spain.

I live by myself without kids and have a big social network. I go out socialising with friends a lot and can give you great recommendations of restaurants and bars in the close vicinity.

host_about:
I’m a positive and curious person that loves to travel and meet new people. I love spending time with my friends eating good food, talking and having fun. Ask me about museums in Stockholm! I know them all and can give you great tips. I work as a PR Director at a Advertising and PR agency.

My apartment is centrally located in Zinkensdamm, Södermalm, Stockholm. The street is quiet, but just a few minutes walk away you find Mariatorget or Hornstull: Both great places in Stockholm to enjoy restaurants, cafes, bars and clubs. Hornsgatan, one of Stockholm's best streets for vintage and second hand shopping is just around the corner. At Zinkensdamm you find the nearest subway stop (100 metres from the apartment) and buses. Despite its central location, the area is safe, peaceful and quiet. The apartment is 34 sqm, is very well planned and is spacious and  bright.

One block away is Skinnarviksparken, a park that gives you one the most beautiful views in Stockholm, overlooking the City Hall and Old Town.

You also find outdoor gyms just 2 kilometers away.

You'll be close to everything, with a 10 minute walk to the central station, 20 minute walk to Old town, yet still a very calm neighbourhood with nothing that disturbs during the night. name: 3-bedroom top-floor apartment by City Hall
summary: Up the road from the iconic City Hall, home of the Nobel gala, our 3-bedroom apartment is minutes from the Central Station. A lovely walk along the water leads to the Old Town, Royal Palace, Royal Opera House and everything else the city has to offer.
space: The City Hall (Stadshuset) is the jewel in Kungsholmen's crown. Home to the Nobel ceremony, the City Hall's famous tower is often used as the symbol for Stockholm. This is the sight that will greet you as you step outside our building.  Our apartment is on the top floor of a building dated from 1911, with elevator access. There are charming features such as high ceilings, hardwood floors and large bay windows. The space has been renovated but with care to retain its original character. We have decorated the apartment with a mix of classic Scandinavian pieces as well as antique and travel finds. This is our family home and it is set up for all ages. The adults will appreciate the fully equipped kitchen, flat-screen TV with Chromecast, and fast WiFi. And there are plenty of toys and games to keep the little ones amused. At 100 sqm (1,076 sq feet), our apartment has 3 bedrooms and can sleep up to 6 people. Bedroom 1: King-size bed  Bedroom 2: Double bed Bedroom 3: 1 bunk bed
description: Up the road from the iconic City Hall, home of the Nobel gala, our 3-bedroom apartment is minutes from the Central Station. A lovely walk along the water leads to the Old Town, Royal Palace, Royal Opera House and everything else the city has to offer. The City Hall (Stadshuset) is the jewel in Kungsholmen's crown. Home to the Nobel ceremony, the City Hall's famous tower is often used as the symbol for Stockholm. This is the sight that will greet you as you step outside our building.  Our apartment is on the top floor of a building dated from 1911, with elevator access. There are charming features such as high ceilings, hardwood floors and large bay windows. The space has been renovated but with care to retain its original character. We have decorated the apartment with a mix of classic Scandinavian pieces as well as antique and travel finds. This is our family home and it is set up for all ages. The adults will appreciate the fully equipped kitchen, flat-screen TV with Chromecast, and
neighborhood_overview: Lower Kungsholmen enjoys the best of both worlds. It is a stone's throw from the Central Station but unlike the area immediately around the station, which is dominated by office blocks that empty out when the workers head home, ours is a vibrant neighbourhood. Here you will get a feel for how Stockholmers live, away from the tourist traps and souvenir shops. Kungsholmen also benefits from being a small island, so you are never far from the water. The Norr Mälarstrand waterfront is a lovely place for a walk, offering stunning views of the colourful façades that dot the Old Town and Södermalm.  In summer the waters around Kungsholmen is a popular kayaking and swimming destination. In winter it often freezes over, making it possible to skate on. Our street is called Hantverkargatan, Craftsmen's Street in English. It lives up to its name and the street is lined with lots of small family-run shops and businesses.  Our neighbourhood is called Lower Kungsholmen (Nedre Kungsholmen) and you wil
transit: On our doorstep, you will find Rådhuset subway station (just one stop from Central station), several bus stops, local restaurants and boutique shops. Our apartment is the ideal base for you to explore Stockholm. If you fancy checking out IKEA, the free shuttle bus even drops you off opposite our building!
access: Fresh bed linen and towels are included
interaction: I respond quickly to emails. Let me know if I can help in any way with your trip. I adore Stockholm and I am here to help you plan an unforgettable holiday.  Have a look at our local recommendations for a better feel of our lovely neighbourhood. We are really lucky to be in such a prime location!
house_rules: We have wonderful neighbours and have a great relationship with them. It is very important that our guests keep the noise level down, especially after 9pm and while in the stairwell outside the apartment. The apartment is for the sole use of the renting guests. No outside visitors in the apartment and no parties.  Please remove your shoes when you enter the apartment. No smoking and no pets in the apartment. Guests are more than welcome to use items from our stocked pantry. We kindly ask that finished items be replaced.
host_about: I have been living in Stockholm for more than 10 years now, having settled here with my wife and our children. We have made Stockholm our home, having fallen in love with the city's vibrancy and easy charm. It's a stunning place and we are keen to show it off.

neighborhood_overview: It is centric yet calm. This is because it is parallel to Kungsgatan, but a secondary "uphill" street, so people casually walking by would usually go through a flatter/bigger one. It is also only at 3 streets from Sergelstorg. It is just a few minutes walking from Drottinggatan, Gallerian, Stockholm Mood and other Shopping malls, so you'll have easy access to cover your needs.
notes: Don't hesitate to ask if you have any question.
transit: Metro ------- Just 3 streets away from T-Centralen tunnelbanan (metro) station, where all 3 metro line stations (red, green and blue) merge together.  Tram ------ At Sergelstorg there is also a tram that brings you straight to the beautiful island of Djurgården. Train ------ From the metro station walking down a couple more streets you are where most train lines converge. Bus ---- I don't use it (enough with other transportation methods). There are several stops around, though. Longer connections ------------------------ Adjacent to T-Centralen's train station there is direct connection with different bus companies that go straight to Arlanda and Skavsta airports (e.g. Flygbussarna) for about 100 SEK.  There is also Arlanda Express, a 200kmph train (with wifi) that brings you to Arlanda airport in ~20 minutes. Maps ------- I'll leave some 2015 city maps and tourist information on the small table next to the sofa (put it back once you are done with them). PS: You don't need public trans
access: That's a long list. I am going to split it room-wise so it's easier to grasp: Everywhere ========= - Cable internet (high-speed comhem-provided with ethernet +wifi 50mb/10mb) Kitchen-living room =============== The kitchen is spacious and is merged with the living room, creating an ample area. Heaters are placed in the wall below the windows. The temperature level can be adjusted. ###Lightning - 3x: 1-meter wide * 1.80-meter tall windows with curtains. - 2x: powerful 1500+ lumens CFL lamps (1 ceiling, on top of the dinnig table, 1 desktop). Eco-friendly - 1x: super bright 2200+ lumens halogen lamp (1 ceiling) - 3x: medium brightness lamps (1 ceiling, 2 kitchen) Kitchen ---------- All kitchen appliances are high end, new and well-conserved, as you can clearly see in the pictures. ###Stove - 4 disk electrical induction stove - 2 frying pans (28cm and 24cm) - 3 boiling pans (1 liter, 2 liters and 5 liters) ###Dishes - 1 full-size 2-layered Dish washer - 2 full-size sinks - 3 full set of k
interaction: All the apartment for you, I usually reply to e-mails promptly if any problem/request/need arises.
house_rules: No smoking and no pets (sorry, non-negotiable). Besides that, don't do anything you wouldn't like a guest to do at your home (i.e. be reasonably well-mannered/civilised).  E.g. don't misuse and break things, leave everything relatively in place and clean when you leave, etc.  And if there is an issue, please contact me ASAP
host_about:
I develop software for fun and profit at a hot startup in Stockholm. Therefore, when I go to my parents home in Barcelona for Christmas and summer vacations I give other people a chance to stay at my awesome apartment.

I love retro computer games. There are many references of that in my apartment, you can see some in my pictures listing.

name: 2 bedroom apt with large balcony
summary: Welcome to our lovely apartment in Vasastan!  The apartment is located in a newly built block in a very quiet, but yet central area. It is a spacious place ideal for 4 people, but there is room for 6 people if you don't mind a little crowding :)
space: The apartment is located on the fourth level, and it is often very bright due to large windows in two directions. The building was built in 2008 so everything is very modern and the heating/cooling works perfectly - the temperature is great all year round. The apartment is 80 sqm big.  Beds: Master bedroom: very comfortable queen size bed that fits 2. Size 160 cm. Small bedroom: sofa bed that is very comfortable for 2 persons to sleep in, it is just as good as a regular double bed. Size 140 cm. Extra beds: we have a big inflatable bed for 1-2 persons, and a sofa large enough for 1-2 persons to sleep on as well - if you choose the air bed or the sofa is up to you. The living room does not have blackout curtains, so we suggest that you bring sleeping masks if you use our extra beds. Living room: large room with TV and two sofas that fits many people. Kitchen: fully equipped with large fridge and freezer, dish washer, oven, stove, microwave, and utilities for many people. The table can be

The living room does not have blackout curtains, so we suggest that you bring slee
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very quiet, but yet very central. There are a lot of good restaurants and a few nice bars within just a couple of minutes' walk, and the best grocery shop in Vasastan is just around the corner. The apartment is located next to the nice park Vasaparken - it is very popular for children, sports, and for picknicks in the summer.
transit: Stockholm is a really nice city to walk around in, and you can walk to most places in the inner city from our apartment. For example; you can walk to the main shopping district in 15 minutes, to Stureplan in 25 minutes and to Gamla Stan in 30 minutes. You can also rent bikes if you want to get around a bit faster!  The access to public transportation is very good. It is a 5 minute walk to metro stations Odenplan and St Eriksplan, where the airport bus stops. It is a 15 minute walk to Stockholm City Central where the airport train stops.
access: Guests will have access to all our equipment, including TV, sound system (one good sound system in the living room and a smaller speaker in the kitchen), WiFi, dish washer, washing machine, iron with ironing board and hair dryer.
interaction: We know a lot about Stockholm, and we will gladly recommend restaurants, shopping districts, bars, night clubs, activities, and more!
host_about:
Me and my fiancé are both born and raised in Stockholm. We love to travel and to meet new people, and we have both visited many places around the world. 

If you choose to stay at our place, we will gladly give you our recommendations and help you with anything before and during your stay in Stockholm!

host_about:
I am curious and open to new people, new things and new perspectives. This makes me like meeting new people. My partner has described me by saying that I either like to be really active, both psysically, through hiking or sports, and mentally, through creative processes, or really passive, through meditation, yoga or walks. Although I'm originally a lawyer I have recently left that profession to follow my dreams as a social entrepreneur.

My two main interests are hiking and music. Being out in the nature always calms me down. I also like meeting people, personal development and creativity.

name: 40-talsfunkis i trendiga Gröndal
summary: Bo lugnt och lummigt mitt i stan! Gröndal, söder om Stockholms innerstad, känns som en mysig småstad. 2:an i det k-märkta Stjärnhusen är ljus och fräsch med härlig retrokänsla och passar även dig med barn. Njut av Stockholms magiska julatmosfär i år!
space: Mysig 2:a med hemtrevlig atmosfär och utsikt mot parken med sjöglimt såväl som de vackra sekelskifteshusen längs Gröndalsvägen. Stjärnhusen är ett kvarter färglada kulturmärkta funkishus ifrån 40-talet belägna i en liten park mellan Mälaren och Gröndals centrum. Husen är kända för sin arkitektur och lägenheten har det vackra 40-talsköket välbevarat vilket ger en härlig retrokänsla! Gröndal är lummigt och lugnt, fullt av parker, natur och vatten, och har karaktären av en egen liten småstad, precis söder om Hornstull. Du tar dig lätt och snabbt till innerstaden med spårvagn, buss, eller tunnelbanan. På 15 minuter promenerar du in till trendiga Hornstull där Stockholms hetaste restauranger och nattliv, mysigaste caféer och biograf och coolaste shopping väntar på dig! Lägenheten ligger en trappa upp, är 58kvm, ljus och luftigt möblerad, trägolv i alla rum och med balkong. Stor säng (140cm) plus bäddbar soffa och uppblåsbar dubbelsäng. Trådlöst bredband, (1000Mbit/s), diskmaskin och fullt u

Njut av Stockholms magiska julatmosfär i år! Mysig 2:a med hemtrevlig atmosfär och utsikt mot parken med sjöglimt såväl som de vackra sekelskifteshusen längs Gröndalsvägen. neighborhood_overview: Vackra och lummiga Gröndal bjuder på såväl naturupplevelser som uteliv. Promenera på bryggan längs Mälaren och njut av Stockholms siluett, gå längs kolonilotterna i vinterviken för att komma till stjärnkocken Marcus Aujalays café och restaurang eller ta en joggingtur kring vackra sjön Trekanten. Gröndal erbjuder även indiskt, sushi, kinamat, pizza, persisk deli och unika caféer såsom prisbelönta 50-talsfiket Lundbergs Konditori och eko/vegan-haket Whakapapa. Nära till Liljeholmens stora utbud av service och shopping.
transit: 1 minuts promenad till tvärbanan och flertalet bussar, som tar dig till Liljeholmen på 3 minuter. Promenad till Liljeholmen längs vackra sjön Trekanten tar 10 minuter. Vill man till trendiga Hornstull på Södermalm kan man gå på 15 minuter.
access: Det minsta rummet kommer vi att förvara vår saker i vilket gör att 6 kvm av de 58 kvm inte kommer att vara tillgängligt. Därför har vi skrivit att lägenheten är en 2:a trots att det egentligen är en 2,5:a.
interaction: Eftersom vi reser bort en längre tid kommer vi inte vara hemma.
house_rules: Ej rökning.

name: Lägenhet i villa nära Telefonplan
summary: Centralt boende i tvårumslägenhet med pentry i fristående villa i lugnt område med stort badrum med bastu. Utmärkta kommunikationer. 7 min promenad till trendiga Telefonplan och dess T bana, buss runt hörnet till Telefonplan eller Liljeholmens T bana. Fri/privat parkering ingår.
space: Lägenhet i undervåning på villa med egen ingång i fristående villa med centralt  läge med utmärkta kommunikationer i lugn villmiljö. Boendet är perfekt för den lilla familjen eller paret som vill bo i ett lugnt villa område men centralt. Ett separat sovrum med två sängar ( 1 är 105cm bred och 1 är 90 cm bred) samt bäddsoffa i storstugan. Som gäst har man tillgång till ett litet kök och en fullt utrustad badrum med dusch, bubbelbadkar och bastu. Värdparet bor på övervåningen i huset och kommer mest troligt vara hemma under er vistelse.  Värdparet står gärna till tjänst med tips, vägledning så att gästen/gästerna får ut max av sin vistelse. Tillgång till uteplats i trädgården utanför ingången med utemöbler och ev grill ( on request)
description: Centralt boende i tvårumslägenhet med pentry i fristående villa i lugnt område med stort badrum med bastu. Utmärkta kommunikationer. 7 min promenad till trendiga Telefonplan och dess T bana, buss runt hörnet till Telefonplan eller Liljeholmens T bana. Fri/privat parkering ingår. Lägenhet i undervåning på villa med egen ingång i fristående villa med centralt  läge med utmärkta kommunikationer i lugn villmiljö. Boendet är perfekt för den lilla familjen eller paret som vill bo i ett lugnt villa område men centralt. Ett separat sovrum med två sängar ( 1 är 105cm bred och 1 är 90 cm bred) samt bäddsoffa i storstugan. Som gäst har man tillgång till ett litet kök och en fullt utrustad badrum med dusch, bubbelbadkar och bastu. Värdparet bor på övervåningen i huset och kommer mest troligt vara hemma under er vistelse.  Värdparet står gärna till tjänst med tips, vägledning så att gästen/gästerna får ut max av sin vistelse. name: Celebrate christmas in Sweden!
summary: Clean and cozy newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment with extra bed in living room, well equipped kitchen and bathroom. Ten minutes from town, your stay will be easy and fun here in the hip and charming area of Telefonplan!
space: Welcome to Telefonplan! A twelve minute subway ride from the city center and five minutes from hipster Södermalm lies my 50 square meter apartment hosting a bedroom, a living room with an extra bed, a kitchen and a bathroom.  The apartment is situated in a calm and charming 3-stories residential area. Up to five people can stay here if you apart from the two beds also use the couch and the extra matress in the basement. You have the entire flat to yourself!
description: Clean and cozy newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment with extra bed in living room, well equipped kitchen and bathroom. Ten minutes from town, your stay will be easy and fun here in the hip and charming area of Telefonplan! Welcome to Telefonplan! A twelve minute subway ride from the city center and five minutes from hipster Södermalm lies my 50 square meter apartment hosting a bedroom, a living room with an extra bed, a kitchen and a bathroom.  The apartment is situated in a calm and charming 3-stories residential area. Up to five people can stay here if you apart from the two beds also use the couch and the extra matress in the basement. You have the entire flat to yourself! Bed linens, towels and shampoo and are provided for all guests.  There is access to a hair dryer and an ironing board. You’re welcome to use what you can find in the kitchen (spices, cooking oil, pasta etc.). There is lot’s of closet space. I will available to answer any questions about the apartment or about what
neighborhood_overview: During spring and summer neighbors use the yard to barbeque and hang out, and there are several smaller playgrounds in the surrounding yards. On the five minute walk to the Telefonplan subway station you pass by an athletic field and if you’re into indoor climbing there’s a climbing complex and a gym near by. There’s a grocery store by the subway station, as well as a restaurant, a pharmacy, a library, a suchi restaurant and a pizzeria, but a four minute walk in the opposite direction from the apartment takes you to my favorite low price supermarket Coop Forum. Telefonplan was built to accommodate the worker’s of the LM Ericsson telephone factories situated here, hence the name. My apartment, today part of the cultural heritage of Sweden(“K-märkt”), was built for this purpose in 1944. In 2012 it was tastefully renovated, giving it it’s simple but elegant atmosphere. Telefonplan is part of the up and coming part of Stockholm known as Hägersten. The old telephone factory now hosts the po
notes: My previous room mate had cats so if you're allergic this might not be the place for you.
access: Bed linens, towels and shampoo and are provided for all guests.  There is access to a hair dryer and an ironing board. You’re welcome to use what you can find in the kitchen (spices, cooking oil, pasta etc.). There is lot’s of closet space.
interaction: I will available to answer any questions about the apartment or about what to do in Stockholm throughout your stay. I want you to enjoy your stay here and I will do whatever I can to make it a good one!
house_rules: No smoking inside please. I'm not charging a cleaning fee but I appreciate if you leave the apartment tidy :)
host_about: I'm a 30-year old political science student who grew up in here in Stockholm but I've also spent a lot of time in the states where my dad lives. I enjoy dancing, reading, travelling and of course, spending time with my friends. I look forward to meeting interesting people from all over the world. I am an active host and I will do whatever I can to make your stay here as nice as possible!

name: Beautiful two room apt in Hornstull
summary: apartment in trendy Hornstull, Södermalm. Has everything you need! It comfortably fits two or three. Quiet bedroom with an amazing and luxurious 160 cm double bed. Combined living room & kitchen made for socialising and cooking together. Windows to a green backyard. Full size dish washer :) Welcome!
space: Lovely apartment with everything around the corner! Located on the third floor with a view over the beautiful green inner yard + rooftops. The building is from 1913 with original wooden floors and 3 m to the ceiling. Modern, warm and newly renovated for the perfect authentic Stockholm feeling!  The bed is from Carpe Diem, wonderful, soft, luxurious and 160 cm wide. It is also possible to sleep in the large sofa, thus possible to stay three people. (It is not a sofa bed, but big enough anyway.)  The kitchen table is expandable and fits 6-8 people. I am sure you will feel right at home and have a very comfortable stay.

neighborhood_overview: Trendy Hornstull is a part of Södermalm, the hip area in Stockholm often compared with Williamsburg/Brooklyn in NYC. Nice cafés, restaurants, bars, nightclubs, second hand shops and various grocery stores are close by as well as gyms, yoga studios etc. The mall Hornstulls Galleria is around the corner. Södermalm is also the perfect place to be if you are into vegan/vegetarian/raw/organic food - loads of options close by. Only 5 mins walk to the island Långholmen where you can go for a walk or run in the nature with a view of the Stockholm skyline. Neighbour with the pretty park; Högalidsparken. 7 mins walk to Tantolunden + Årstaviken where you can also go for a walk/run along the water side, or have a picnic/go swimming in the summer time.
transit: The apartment is located very close to the subway station Hornstull, only 10 mins away from Stockholm Central Station. Great communications by bus, subway and close enough to walk/bike to the city centre. (5 km) Excellent communications From Arlanda Airport:  Option 1: Flygbussarna. w(URL HIDDEN)  Line; Arlanda-Liljeholmen. The bus takes approx 45 mins and stops in Hornstull. 5 mins walk to my apartment.  Option 2: Flygbussarna. w(URL HIDDEN) Line; Arlanda-Stockholm Central. The bus takes approx 45 mins and stops at the Stockholm Central Station. From there red subway line towards Liljeholmen/Norsborg/Fruängen, 5 stops to Hornstull. 5 mins walk to my apartment.  Option 3: Arlanda Express speed train to Stockholm Central. The train takes approx 20 mins. From there red subway line towards Liljeholmen/Norsborg/Fruängen, 5 stops to Hornstull. 5 mins walk to my apartment.  Option 4: Taxi. Costs approx 470 SEK and takes 40 mins. There are plenty of taxis outside Arlanda. Pre-book on (URL HID

name: Cosy flat with lots of plants, Stockholm
summary: 40m2 flat at Södermalm in central Stockholm.  The flat is situated at Nytorget where you find many bars, restaurants, coffee-shops as well as shopping. In the summer time you can also take a swim 15 minutes walk away.
space: 40m2 flat at Södermalm in central Stockholm.  120 cm bed in separate half-room, mattress + extra sheets available to be place in living room. Big living room with 3- seat sofa, loads of plants and big windows towards inner court facing south. Full equipped kitchen with dish washer, table and chairs for four. All possibilities to cook and use as your own kitchen.  Bathroom with toilet, shower, sink and washing machine. Towels and washing powder included. There is a shared balcony in the stair-well to be used if you want to sit outside or smoke. The flat is very quiet since it's not facing the street outside.  It is the perfect flat to rent if you want to feel at home during a business trip. I usually work from home and the flat is perfect for that.

I am Josefin, a curious and adventurous person who love to travel as well as be at home, having my everyday routine. 

While I do enjoy big cities, it’s in the wild nature my heart is set. I enjoy being an Airbnb host just as much as being the guest. And I love the feeling of being at home.

name: Modern and comfortable 1BR apt
summary: A clean and convenient apartment located in Liljeholmen. Building built in 2012 with elevator, balcony, all-modern furnitures and fixtures. Area is calm and nice. Subway, tram, shuttle train and bus all within less than 10 min walking distance.
space: The apartment has one bedroom, with a bed that fits two people (140 cm in width = slightly smaller than a Queen size bed). If you're more than 2 people we can place a thick, comfortable 140 cm wide bed mattress in the living room. Then there's always the couch in case you want to fit in a 5th person.
description: A clean and convenient apartment located in Liljeholmen. Building built in 2012 with elevator, balcony, all-modern furnitures and fixtures. Area is calm and nice. Subway, tram, shuttle train and bus all within less than 10 min walking distance.  The apartment has one bedroom, with a bed that fits two people (140 cm in width = slightly smaller than a Queen size bed). If you're more than 2 people we can place a thick, comfortable 140 cm wide bed mattress in the living room. Then there's always the couch in case you want to fit in a 5th person. You will have access to everything the apartment has to offer; high speed wifi, fully equipped kitchen including dish washer, bath tub, decent speakers with an smartphone chord (we have pretty chilled neighbors, so feel free to listen to music! Within reason of course :), HDMI adapter for Mac in case you feel like staying in. We're 420 friendly but tobacco has to be smoked outside on the balcony. Usually me and/or my partner Cristian will meet you
neighborhood_overview: Liljeholmen, or more precisely Årstadal, is located right south of Södermalm and is considered an 'up and coming' area of Stockholm. The whole neighborhood is newly built, so it's very clean and gives a great introduction to modern Scandinavian architecture. The immediate area is mainly residential and consists of young families and young professionals. It's calm but not boring; you can access a popular boardwalk next to the water within 3 minute walking from the apartment. It's packed during the summer with sunbathers, joggers and kids running around with ice cream. You can also find a grocery store, restaurants and coffee shops adjoining the boardwalk, and from there you'll see the trendy area Hornstull right across the water. If you want to reach Hornstull you can walk across the bridge and enjoy a beautiful 360° view of Stockholm inner city skyline.
notes: I feel like I have to point this out; they've just built a new building right outside our windows so our view doesn't consist of much more than a wall. You can still see the road from the balcony, and if you turn your head 90° to the left when you're on the balcony you can peep the water. It's actually kinda cute, haha. + The sofa in the picture has been changed to a more stylish, grey one. + Beware there is no washing opportunities. If washing your clothes while you're visiting Stockholm is important to you - then I suggest you find another apartment.  + There is no hairdryer. I only have one and I usually bring it with me :)
transit: Easiest and cheapest way to get to and from Arlanda airport is to take "Flygbussarna" (airport shuttle) and getting off at the Liljeholmen stop. Assuming you have luggage the most comfortable way during winter time (it can be very snowy) is to take a taxi* the last bit to our apartment. But you can also take a bus for 3 stops too. I'll sort you with details once you've booked. To get around town: There's a bus stop 1 min up the road from our building, taking you to Liljeholmen subway station in 5 min. Or you can just walk to Liljeholmen subway station, that takes about 10-15 min depending on how fast or slow you walk :) Then there's "tvärbanan" 5-7 min away which is a tram that connects the red and green subway line, that's useful if you want to travel east-to-west rather than south-to-north, and reach Globen as an example. And then there's "pendeltåget" 5-7 min away, and that's useful if you want to reach the central station or further stops along the commuter lines. Simply put: there
access: You will have access to everything the apartment has to offer; high speed wifi, fully equipped kitchen including dish washer, bath tub, decent speakers with an smartphone chord (we have pretty chilled neighbors, so feel free to listen to music! Within reason of course :), HDMI adapter for Mac in case you feel like staying in. We're 420 friendly but tobacco has to be smoked outside on the balcony.
interaction: Usually me and/or my partner Cristian will meet you at the apartment to give you the keys but sometimes we're traveling ourselves and might not be able to meet you. If that's the case I will make sure to be very easy to get hold of, in case you wonder anything. This doesn't affect the check-in/check-out, it'll be handled as smoothly as possible for each guest.
house_rules: Feel comfortable and treat my home as if it was your home :) As long as you leave it clean and tidy I'm all good!
host_about:
I'm 28 years old, Swedish/Iranian and I work with music. I love traveling, meeting new people, discussing politics and eating vegetarian food. 

Oh, and beside Swedish and English- I speak fluent Farsi and a broken school-taught Spanish. And I know a lot of bad words in Lebanese Arabic and how to count endlessly in German :)

name: Middle of city centre
summary: Spacious room in unique 19th century apartment in the middle of the city centre of Stockholm.
space: The location is extremely attractive in the hip S:t Johannes area, just around the corner to cafés, bars, museums, shops and everything else Stockholm has to offer. Stureplan's nightlife and the central station is only a few hundred meters by feet. The apartment is 19th century style with spacious rooms, high ceilings and a fireplace for cozy evenings. In the summer you can enjoy a barbeque or a game of boule in the courtyard.  I have a little dog called Tyra, so you will have to be ok with dogs. She is very friendly.
description: Spacious room in unique 19th century apartment in the middle of the city centre of Stockholm. The location is extremely attractive in the hip S:t Johannes area, just around the corner to cafés, bars, museums, shops and everything else Stockholm has to offer. Stureplan's nightlife and the central station is only a few hundred meters by feet. The apartment is 19th century style with spacious rooms, high ceilings and a fireplace for cozy evenings. Your bedroom will be the master bedroom facing the quiet courtyard, consisting a comfortable double bed. You will have access to the newly renovated bathroom and the fully equipped kitchen. You will be sharing the apartment with my 22 year old son who's bedroom is at the opposite side of the apartment, so you will for sure have your privacy. I am happy to welcome you, give you so
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is absolutely beautiful. It is quiet despite its central location. The street is facing the beautiful old church "Johanneskyrkan", with its surrounding green churchyard, which is always nice for a stroll.
transit: I personally prefer to walk by feet, but there's a 5 minute walk to subway station Rådmansgatan. Airportbuses and Arlanda Express stops at central station which is only a 15 minute walk from the apartement or two stops with the subway.
access: Your bedroom will be the master bedroom facing the quiet courtyard, consisting a comfortable double bed. You will have access to the newly renovated bathroom and the fully equipped kitchen. You will be sharing the apartment with my 22 year old son who's bedroom is at the opposite side of the apartment, so you will for sure have your privacy.
interaction: I am happy to welcome you, give you some tips about Stockholm, and also share a coffee or a glass of wine if you like. I will not always be at the apartment though since I am also staying at my boyfriend's place.
house_rules: No smoking. No parties.
host_about:
Hello,

My name is Mona, I am an easygoing and social person who loves travelling and exploring the world. I've been travelling since I was a little girl since my mother worked for the Scandinavian Airlines. I've got five grown up children who I used to travel with, mainly to France which is my favourite destination. I speak fluent french and ok english. Nowadays I mainly travel with my partner. I like to enjoy life with good wine and food.
I have a small dog , Tyra.
Warm Regards
Mona

host_about:
Hi! 

My name is Emil and I live in Stockholm together with my wife Sarah (who moved in from Berlin) and our newly arrived twin boys. 
We love unorganized and spontaneous travelling and always buy too expensive tickets just a few days in advanced. Another interest is spending time in nature and we know all about hiking in Scandinavia. 
People wonder if we shouldn’t move to a bigger place now when we are 4. We tried but it wasn't possible to leave this beautiful place.

name: Cozy flat in the heart of Södermalm
summary: Charming 1 room+kitchen-apartment built in 1906 - situated in the cultural quarters of Södermalm. Just around the corner you find vintage shops, cafés, night life and green parks. The apartment is quiet, overlooking a green and lush courtyard. Friendly neighbors!
space: Charming 1 room+kitchen-apartment built in 1900 - situated in the cultural quarters of Södermalm. Just around the corner you find vintage shops, cafés, night life and green parks. The apartment is quiet, overlooking a courtyard. Friendly neighbors!

Just around the corner you find vintage shops, cafés, night life and green parks. The apartment is quiet, overlooking a courtyard. Friendly neighbors! Enjoy a cute little kitchen, fully equipped with gas stove, a large fridge and dinner table for three. On weekends you can buy fresh bread from the bakery nearby and enjoy the newspaper (in swedish). You'll sleep in the cosy loft bed (120 cm), or, if you prefer – a smaller folding bed (80 cm). Please let me know in advance if you need the folding bed since it's not in the appartment!  About the loft bed: Some people might think it's a bit scary to sleep up there, since there is no b
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the heart of Södermalm. Very convenient if you prefer to explore the city by foot, since it's walking distance to all the amazing restaurants, cafés, bars, shops, museums and green parks in the area.  For example: Eat breakfast at lovely Drop Coffee, enjoy a yoga class at Inbalance Yoga, grab lunch take away from 8T8 and enjoy it while strolling in the green areas of Mariatorget, do some shopping at Nitty Gritty and Judits Second Hand, head over to Papercut for magazines. In the evening start with a romantic dinner over at Delikatessen Bistro and drinks at Morfar Ginko or Häktet and then end your evening with some real club adventures in the cellar at Marie Laveau – it's all situated max 10 minutes away by foot.
notes: The apartment is situated on the first floor overlooking a quiet courtyard. Please note there is some insight (and no curtains).  About the loft bed: Some people might think it's a bit scary to sleep up there, since there is no bed rail. I sleep up there all the time with my boyfriend and are perfectly fine with it – but if you are afraid of heights you might consider another stay.
transit: If you prefer to explore the city by public transport - there is a bus stop literally just outside the house and commute trains just around the corner (that take you easily to Stockholm C within 5 minutes). The metro "Mariatorget" is 5 minute walking distance from the house.
access: Enjoy a cute little kitchen, fully equipped with gas stove, a large fridge and dinner table for three. Please let me know in advance if you need the folding bed since it's not in the appartment!  About the loft bed: Some people might think it's a bit scary to sleep up there, since there is no bed rail. interaction: I travel a lot and might not be at home while you visit (but of course I'll arrange the key for you). You can always call, e-mail or text me if you need anything and i'll do my very best to provide it for you.
house_rules: Please respect the home and my friendly neighbors. No smoking in the house. Please leave your pets at home since I'm allergic. And no parties/loud music.
host_about: Female journalist born and rased in Malmö, Sweden who beside my work loves to travel, practise yoga, spin records and visit art exhibitions. 4 years ago I moved to Stockholm to work in television and media and fell in love with the city. I've been using airbnb a lot while traveling the world, and now I want to welcome people to my home in Stockholm.

summary: Bilderna är tagna på vintern.  1, 5 rummare med perfekt location! Nyrenoverad lägenhet med balkong över en vacker innegård. Wifi, tv, stereo, gåavstånd till t-bana, pendeltåg och buss. Bageri och gym precis utanför.  Inga fester i lägenheten! Endast lugna gäster.

name: Tasteful room in trendy Södermalm
summary: Room in a tasteful, elegant flat, comfortably accommodating 2 ppl. Business or leisure.  One step from Mariatorget, in the heart of the city. 5th floor, balcony towards garden. Walking distance to everything you need.Guests over 15 years are welcome.
space: Newly tastefully renovated, charming room for 1 or 2 people at the 5th floor (elevator) with walnut wooden flooring.  The flat is a 1 bedroom apartment with balcony. Sunny days you may want to relax on the private balcony with sun all day towards the garden. The collective garden is available if you want to eat outside. There is a school on the other side of the garden so Monday-Friday from 8.00 there is children playing. Not during holidays nor weekends though.

The collective garden is available if you want to eat outside. There is a school on the other side of the garden so Monday-Friday from 8.00 there is children playing. Not during holidays nor weekends though. Washing machine in the bathroom.  Bathtub (installed in May 2016).  Free Wifi and cable TV.  Free coffee and tea. (Moccamaster coffe machine) Im always interested in meeting new people and take a chat over a cup of tea or coffee. If time is and you prefer it.  This accommodation is
neighborhood_overview: You will be staying in one of the trendiest, progressive neighborhoods in Stockholm. Right next to celebrated restaurants, cheese delicates, bakeries, gyms and parks. You have three major grocery stores with generous opening hours just around the corner and a 24hrs 7Eleven 2 minutes away. Södermalm offers great shopping, nice restaurants and bars, all within walking distance from the flat. Södermalm is well known as the artist/actor area of Stockholm.
notes: The new off-white pulldown-curtain keeps light out very effectively if you want to sleep in.  They were just installed and takes some gentle handling (I'll show you)
transit: You are 3 minutes away from subwaystation T-Mariatorget. Several buses stops just outside the flat. It's 10 minutes walk from Gamla Stan (Old town) with the Royal Castle). Getting around can't be easier. Many places are walking distance away from the apartment.  Don't hesitate to try out the City Bikes as well!
access: Washing machine in the bathroom.  Bathtub (installed in May 2016).  Free Wifi and cable TV.  Free coffee and tea. (Moccamaster coffe machine)
interaction: Im always interested in meeting new people and take a chat over a cup of tea or coffee. If time is and you prefer it.  This accommodation is suitable both for business and leisure travelers.
house_rules: No smoking, no pets and no parties.  Normal consideration towards our nice neighbours. Guests over 15 years of age are welcome.
host_about:
I am a proud super host!

////PLEASE NOTE: I only accept guests with multiple satisfying recommendations. And I have have a French bulldog puppy named Frank in the family too.///

I'm a life-loving entrepreneur in my mid-thirties who love to travel. 
Me and Frank live in a beautiful and tranquil apartment in the heart of Stockholm, at Mariatorget/Södermalm. 

Some of my best trips so far is Petra - for the epic walk before the old city reviled it self through the passage (Jordan), Kauai (Hawaii) for the extraordinary landscape, beautiful energy and green experience, Kraków - for the history (Poland), Anthony's Keys - for the most genuine dolphin experience so far (Honduras), Laguna Beach - for the memorable stay at host Korey's house with the marvelous view (California), Kawaguchico - for the breath taking close-up view over Mt Fuji (Japan). 

I love good food and tea. I prefer clean, pure and tasty food. I love the vast range of great restaurants, diners and Inn's in Stockholm, especially around Södermalm/Mariatorget, where I live. I have a gluten-free and refined sugar-free diet and don't eat that much meat.

I appreciate cleanness, and open non-messy spaces in a home.

Airbnb is a really nice way to meet new people, for renting out my apartment and also to find nice places to stay when traveling myself. I just love the concept and sometimes prefer to be staying in a home rather than in a hotel and to get a sense of being a citizen for a short while in the city/place Im visiting. 

I would be happy to see you, either during a trip or during your stay in my charming apartment.

I have hosted over a hundred guests so far, and I love it.  

I look forward in meeting you!

Warmly,
Gunilla

name: Central, modern & cozy apartment
summary: My apartment, for up to 3 ppl, located 10min from about anything in Sthlm will give you a perfect retreat from the city life while providing easy access and great comfort in style (new mixed w/ old, design w/ rustic, wood to go w/ industrial details)
space: I've just finished the renovation and even all the details are now in place! 41m2 (separate bed room, living room with adjoining kitchen and a small office) It is perfect for a couple (w/ an optional plus 1), but can also work for two friends or a family with a child since I have an inflatable mattress (or hammock if preferred).  There is a washer and a dryer in the attic for everyone in the building to use. Ironing board in one of the closets. Wi-Fi and HTPC

neighborhood_overview: It is located on one of the islands of downtown Stockholm, just 2 blocks from the waterfront, and with a park around the corner.
notes: When you dispose of a garbage bag (done outside the apartment door), it is EXTREMELY important to tie it of properly so it wont open, if that happen it might get stuck in the garbage dispenser. Nothing that doesn't fit easily in a tied up plastic bag are to be put in e.g. pizza boxes (we have had more of those stuck than we can count). There is a washer and a dryer in the attic for everyone in the building to use and I have my own in the bathroom. Ironing board in the closet next to the bathroom.
transit: It is within 2 min from the subway and 10 min from central station (20 by foot with luggage), but away from all the traffic and stress. There is a bus stop just around the corner (catering to busses nr. 3, 54 and 50).
access: The whole apartment (except one closet that will contain my clothes etc). The yard and BBQ area (check the small board by the door to the yard for reservations)
interaction: I will be traveling during this period but can be reached digitally
house_rules: I expect you to treat my jewel with the same respect as you would your own apartment (given that you care for your home), I put most of my savings into it last year... No shoes indoors (I've recently restored the original 1930s-floor) No smoking please.   The stone bench in the kitchen can take almost anything except temperatures over 90 degrees C. Please keep in mind.
host_about:
I'm here because I love traveling! (doh)

I finally got around to buy my own place (and not spend every penny on trips and camera/sporting gear for the trips) - now I find myself with more bills but with this lovely flat that I just remodeled instead :P

I'm into details and modest design (no minimalism really)...

ABOUT THE APARTMENT
What kind of home would you find yourself in at my place?
- ART, both old pieces and modern photography
- BALANCE, between romantic and design (rustic tables, neoclassical console table and mirror, industrial kitchen with brick wall and naked bulbs, design lamps and photography art, meters of old leather books)
- COMFORT, electrical appliances (dish machine, microwave, 46'' plasma, Home theater), Wi-Fi 100Mbits, indoor hammock, double bed (with top of the line duck down and satin)
- SPACE, separate bedroom, inflatable mattress available, small office with a workstation  
- LOCATION, about as central as it gets while not being in an office area (Kungsholmen)
- FRESH, it's been renovated completely Q4 2014

ABOUT ME
I'm not really a high risk person, though a lot of people do think so, but I'm a - Sensation Seeker -

I try a lot of stuff! Albeit I'm getting pickier with age...

You might find (Website hidden by Airbnb) the climbing gym or a wall on Kalymnos
..kitesurfing outside Stockholm or in Turkey
..playing beachvolleyboll at our local court or wherever I find myself traveling
..dancing pole or salsa
..(trying) to play the guitar or ocarina
..reading on my kindle in my hammock
..hiding behind my camera
..socializing over whatever beer I can find or taking a yoga class

Why settle for one life motto?
1. You only live once
2. Will that matter in a year, or a month or even a day?
3. Don't be a stranger ;)

name: Apartment close to city and nature.
summary: This charmy flat is located just five minutes away from Skanstull, were trendy Sofo is. Next door to the flat is a big natural reserve with beautiful hiking area. Most likely you will see roe deer outside the kitchen window.
space: This lovely apartment will offer you a great stay in Stockholm!  It's a cozy, modern and fresh apartment with all facilities you'll need, located on the south side of Stockholm. The apartment is located just a two minute walk from the subway station Hammarbyhöjden. It takes five minutes with the subway and ten minutes with a bike to the inner city (Södermalm), were trendy Sofo is located. There you'll find restaurants, shops, theaters, bars and cafés.
description: This charmy flat is located just five minutes away from Skanstull, were trendy Sofo is. Next door to the flat is a big natural reserve with beautiful hiking area. Most likely you will see roe deer outside the kitchen window. This lovely apartment will offer you a great stay in Stockholm!  It's a cozy, modern and fresh apartment with all facilities you'll need, located on the south side of Stockholm. The apartment is located just a two minute walk from the subway station Hammarbyhöjden. It takes five minutes with the subway and ten minutes with a bike to the inner city (Södermalm), were trendy Sofo is located. There you'll find restaurants, shops, theaters, bars and cafés. The apartment is from the 1940th and it's located on the first floor. It's pretty common to see wild roe deer outside the kitchen window. The apartment has a comfy king size bed. In the living room there is a new 47 inch wide screen full HD TV. Free WiFi is included. The kitchen is fully equipped and has everything yo
neighborhood_overview: Next door to the apartment is a big natural reserve with wild nature and beautiful hiking area. There is great opportunities to go for a run and do exercise in the open air gym in the forest. Hammarby ski slope is just around the corner and Stockholm Globe arenas are a short walk away. If you want to buy groceries it is just a five minutes walk to the supermarket.
notes: If you want to live close to the city in a calm area with the nature close - this apartment is the perfect choice!
transit: The closest subway station is 2 min away. From there you can go to the inner city, Södermalm (Skanstull), in 5 minutes and 14 minutes to Stockholm central station. It takes about 10-15 minutes to the inner city by bike.
access: The apartment is from the 1940th and it's located on the first floor. It's pretty common to see wild roe deer outside the kitchen window. The apartment has a comfy king size bed. In the living room there is a new 47 inch wide screen full HD TV. Free WiFi is included. The kitchen is fully equipped and has everything you need to cook a nice meal and breakfast. And of course I'll provide clean bed linen and towels.
interaction: I want my guests to feel at home and will not disturb during your stay. You may always contact me whenever you have a question or need assistance of any kind.
house_rules: No smoking, no pets, no party. Leave the flat as it was when you checked in, clean and in order. Taking the shoes off at the entrance.
host_about: I'm a graphic designer from Stockholm, Sweden. I love to travel, see new places and to meet interesting people all around the world. My last trip was a surfing trip to Costa Rica and my next will be to Hossegor, France. I love both trekking in the nature and the pulse in big cities. Interior design is also one of my big passions.

name: Townhouse by the waterfront
summary: This unique waterfront Townhose with 4 beedrooms is modern, airy and has a large terrace with fantastic views of water. Hammarby seaport is one of Stockholm's newest neighborhoods. It is a vibrant neighborhood.
space: The Townhouse has a private entrance from the street and a fantastic balcony facing the main water inlet to Stockholm. - 4 bedrooms with 2x160 cm, 2x90 cm, and 1x120cm.   - 1 fully equipped kitchen  - 2 bathrooms one with washing machine  - WiFi  - 6 flatscreen TV all bedrooms and livingroom  1st floor is the entrance with kitchen, living room and a bathroom with wc, washing machine and spectacular seaview.  2nd floor with 4 bedrooms and a bathroom with wc, bathtub and shower.  Bedroom 1 with a 160 cm doublebed  Bedroom 2 with 2x90 cm bed (childroom)  Bedroom 3 with 160cm doublebed Bedroom4 with 1x120cm bed Bedroom5 now used as study  The apartement is perfect for the extended family,  for a family of 2 adults and 2-4 kids or 2 families? neighborhood_overview: We just love our neighborhood and everybody who lives in Hammarby Sjöstad is a part of an eco-cycle :)  We love the architecture, the urban lifestyle, the nature and Stockholms best ski slope just around the corner with its amazing view, all the lovely walks, cozy cafes and a lot of shopping along the waterfront.  Anything that You might need is in this lovely neighborhood! Hammarby Sjöstad has:  50 restaurants and cafés  3 Supermarkets (Lidl, Coop, ICA)  1 liquor store  2 drugstores  2 health centers  8 fitness centers  shops with clothes, interior design, jewelry, vintage, houseware, toys, furnishing, bike shops, sports etc. Wintertime:  Stockholms best ski slope, Hammarby backen within 5 minutes walk. It offers a unique opportunity to ski whilst enjoying a fantastic view of Stockholm city.  Hammarby seaport is one of Stockholm's newest neighborhoods. It is a vibrant neighborhood where the modern city life combined with proximity to nature. A developed environmental awareness has fro
notes: If you are a group of friends looking to party in Stockholm,  unfortunately our home is not the right place for you. Hope you will respect that we are looking for neat and calm companies or families.
transit: You have the  free of charge boat that takes you to trendy SoFo in Södermalm (5min), only 50 meters from the Townhouse. You can also take M/S Emilie to city center or Djurgården. Then there are buses and the tram only 200m away. You can  take the tram / Tvärbana to Gullmarsplan or Globen to accessthe  subway systems, taking you to city (T-centralen)  in about 25 min door to door.
access: A fully equiped home including washing machine, bedclothes and towels. (included in the price)
interaction: Available if needed.
house_rules: Non Smoking. No pets. No music after 10.00 pm. No other people in the apartment-no guests. No entrance to the balcony after 09.00 pm.

name: Perfekt läge för Citysemestern!
summary: Från ena sidan av lägenheten breder Vitabergs parken, med Sofia kyrka, ut sig och från den andra kan ni beskåda utsikten över Södermalms takåsar. Helt fritt läge utan insyn där ni i lugn kan njuta av hela Stockholm utbud!
space: Från ena sidan av lägenheten breder Vitabergs parken, med Sofia kyrka, ut sig och från den andra kan ni beskåda utsikten över Södermalms takåsar. Helt fritt läge utan insyn där ni i lugn kan njuta av hela Stockholm utbud!  Lägenheten består av 3 sovrum och ett stort öppet kök/vardagsrum där hela familjen kan umgås. I anslutning till parken finner ni en ljuvlig liten gård där ni kan slappna av med en kopp morgonkaffe. Mängder av trevliga restauranger och butiker i en avspänd stadsdel. Museum, gallerier, natur och bad samt mycket annat. Både barn och vuxna kan hitta det lilla extra här! Utanför porten går buss 3 och 76, dessa går ner till Slussen där man kan ta Tbanan, alt fortsätta till fots ner till stan. Cykeluthyrning finns längre ned på Renstiernas gata.

name: Family friendly apt close to center
summary: Two bedroom apartment right next to one of Stockholm's biggest parks. Quiet and child-friendly, it sports big windows, a cozy balcony and is just a stone's throw away from Södermalm - named one of the 15 coolest neighborhoods in the world by Vogue!
space: Large apartment (70m2/750sq ft) with open kitchen and living room and two bedrooms. The kitchen part is big with appliances including filter coffee maker, espresso machine, microwave, stove/oven, fridge/freezer, toaster, electric kettle, juicer, blender and coffee grinder. Dinner table can seat 8ppl. The living room is cozy with a large couch, foot stools and armchair and has a 40" flat-screen TV with Chromecast making it possible to stream HD-video from all devices connected to the wireless internet. Couch in the living room folds out to a comfortable double bed. Bathroom with large bath tub. The small bedroom has a fold-out arm chair and another fold-out bed can be arranged if necessary. The large bedroom has a queen-sized bed with a moveable baby cot ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) in) next to it.
description: Two bedroom apartment right next to one of Stockholm's biggest parks. Quiet and child-friendly, it sports big windows, a cozy balcony and is just a stone's throw away from Södermalm - named one of the 15 coolest neighborhoods in the world by Vogue! Large apartment (70m2/750sq ft) with open kitchen and living room and two bedrooms. The kitchen part is big with appliances including filter coffee maker, espresso machine, microwave, stove/oven, fridge/freezer, toaster, electric kettle, juicer, blender and coffee grinder. Dinner table can seat 8ppl. The living room is cozy with a large couch, foot stools and armchair and has a 40" flat-screen TV with Chromecast making it possible to stream HD-video from all devices connected to the wireless internet. Couch in the living room folds out to a comfortable double bed. Bathroom with large bath tub. The small bedroom has a fold-out arm chair and another fold-out bed can be arranged if necessary. The large bedroom has a queen-sized bed with a movea
neighborhood_overview: Pretty much in our back yard there is a large park perfect for strolls or grilling. It also has quite an interesting stretch of abandoned highway that is great for photography! The small center a few minutes walk away has two convenience stores, a pharmacy and several restaurants, cafés and bars as well as a preserved 50's neighborhood center square (a big thing in Sweden back then) with movie theater and library. There is also quite a nice second-hand store! Globen (famous landmark and concert hall) is two tram stops away.
transit: Traveling here from Arlanda airport is very simple - just take the SL train to Årstaberg (two stops past Stockholm Central) where you either change to the tram that gets you here in one stop or walk 900m. Getting into the city center from us takes 10-15 minutes at most depending on where you want to go. The suburban SL train (the same that you take from the airport) from Årstaberg takes you to Södermalm in 1 stop and to the central station in 2 stops. Right outside of the house we have a bus that goes to Södermalm.  There is also a tram stop 2 mins walk away that in three stops can take you either to Liljeholmen (a metro/bus hub and mall to the west) or Gullmarsplan (metro/bus hub to the east) from where you can take the subway a few stops into the city.  There is night traffic every night of the week to a bus stop 5mins away from the house. From Skavsta the best option is to get to the city center by bus and then get here by subway/SL train/tram.
house_rules: We love animals but as one of us is very allergic we do not allow them to stay in the apartment. If you would happen to get a furry visitor that's OK, though - just please make sure to vacuum clean afterwards! Smoking is allowed outside on the balcony but not inside. Our neighbors are quite nice and easy-going but loud parties on weekday evenings might be frowned upon.
host_about: We want to make this world a better place. To make people happy. To give you and ourselves the opportunity to have a wonderful adventure.

name: Lovely home in quiet green oasis
summary: Four room flat in small house in the middle of green Bromma, just 20 minutes from city center but close to water, beach, forest and parks. Ideal for family with children. Own balcony and big backyard with BBQ shared with neighbors.
space: Three bedrooms, kitchen and livingroom in light, beautiful apartment. Balcony with garden view from master bedroom with king-size bed. Childrens room with bunkbed (160cm long) and plenty of toys for little girls. Third bedroom with single bed. Fully equiped kitchen with enough space to even bigger family. Airy livingroom with TV and comfortable sofa.  Bathroom with washingmachine and tumbler.
description: Four room flat in small house in the middle of green Bromma, just 20 minutes from city center but close to water, beach, forest and parks. Ideal for family with children. Own balcony and big backyard with BBQ shared with neighbors.
neighborhood_overview: Äppelviken is beautiful green neighbourhood with a feeling of small village with cafe and little shops. It is by the lake Mälaren, surrounded by forests and parks. Ideal for families as there are several playgrounds and a clean shallow beach. 5min walk to Alviks torg with metro station, supermarket, restaurants, pharmacy and cafes. From Alviks metro station it takes only 15min to Stockholms centrum with green line.
transit: 5 min walk to Alviks metrostation, from there 20minutes to Stockholm city center.

Christian_gustavsson

name: cosy apartment in trendy SoFo
summary: Looking for a cosy place to stay over in Stockholm? Quiet location right at a little park located in the hip SoFo area, close to to the nicest bars, trendy restaurants, three supermarkets and subway 5min away.
space: We usually rent just a room but this time we have the entire place :) The apartment has two rooms, one bathroom and one kitchen. Bed 1: The small sleeping room has around 15 sqm and a nice 140x200cm bed, enough for two.  Bed 2: We have a very nice high self-inflatable 90cm or 140cm wide airbed which can be put up in the living room. The living room also has a cozy couch if needed.  The place is perfect for a couple but works as well if you travel with friends. You only need to decide who gets to sleep on the air madress. But trust us they are very large and comfy! :) Both rooms have doors to the small kitchen, which has a bar table and 2 chairs to enjoy breakfast. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need, except for a dish washer (not yet..!) We just recently did some renovations. So we would like to ask our guests to be extra cautious in the apartment. Especially the Parkett floor in the kitchen is newly polished and quite sensitive. Please take off shoes at all times when ent

The kitchen is equipped with everything you need, except for a dish washer (not yet..!) We just recently did some ren
neighborhood_overview: SoFo It has everything: parks, trendy bars, restaurants ranging from Ethiopian, Indian, Thai, French, Italian; hip cafés and stores, such as second-hand shops, veggie-ecological, clothing etc. All you need right there and also close to the city center and old town.
notes: - remember to bring adapters if you're coming from the UK or outside Europe.
transit: Buses go around the corner, but the best way is to use the subway 4min away from our place. Otherwise walk around Södermalm, the island you'll be living in :) The hipster recently reinvented southern island in Stockholm. Everything you need is right here.
access: Everything basically. - Keys will be arranged depending on your time of arrival. Our handiest strategy is to keep the set of keys in a magazine outside our apartment door. - Bed sheets, linen and towels  - There is a common laundry facility in the building that you can use (wash and dry), but you do need to tell me in advance so I can book it for you. Otherwise there are services nearby with OK prices.
interaction: Well, we won't be there, but we will be available when any needs show up.
house_rules: Our place is freshly renovated. We ask for extra caution with the apartment, especially the newly oiled wooden floor. If you spill something don't panic, but please clean it up as soon as possible. We don't want to risk that the floor gets any marks. Please be careful with everything else in the apartment. if you break something, no worries. we will fix it. but please let us know as soon as possible! we can arrange how to fix it. :)
host_about:
Hi! 
I am an open minded and creative person that loves to meet new people from all over the world. I am very interested in Science, music and art.

I am a Scientist and entrepreneur. I have a PhD in molecular medicine from Uppsala university and work in a young startup company in Stockholm. I am doing research on new methods for disease diagnosis. I hope some of the things I work on will eventually end up in a hospital and help humans one day!

summary: This two room apartment furnished in a combination of Swedish folklore and Scandinavian design from the 1960s offers a silent refuge in the heart of busy Stockholm. Located within a short walk from popular Hornstull and good communications.
space: The apartment offers one king-size bed in a separate bedroom. Two additional people could sleep on an inflatable extra bed in the living room.   The bathroom is small but clean and completely renovated during 2013. It offers no bathtub but a shower.

Only by telephone and/or email. Depending on our convenience we may be able to greet the guest upon their arrival and/or departure. name: SOFO Södermalm  cozy  apartment
summary: Cozy 2.5: a 70 sqm in SOFO. The house was built in 1930. The apartment has beds for 6 people.
space: Cozy apartment of 70 square meters in SOFO. The apartment has two bedrooms, a larger one with a double bed (2 * 90 beds) and a smaller bedroom with a queen bed (140 cm). The living room has a sofa bed for 2 people, so a total of 6 adults can sleep in the apartment. I also have a cot and babychair on request. 6 adults and 1 baby. Fitted kitchen with hob, oven, microwave, fridge / freezer, coffee etc. The living room has a TV and the apartment also has wireless internet and computer. In the apartment I have Netflex so you can see movies.

transit: Nearest metro station is Medborgarplatsen (5min). Parking facilities are available at the cross street Åsögatan. From Arlanda is easiest to take a taxi from the company Taxi020 (yellow cars), fixed price 470 crowns to the apartment. You can also take the Arlanda Express ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) to the central station and then take the Metro Green Line to Medborgarplatsen and from there go to the apartment. Folkungagatan until Östgötagatan and there turn right into it and continue until Östgötagatan 32. The apartment is located opposite Stalands Möbler (furniture)

host_about:
I am a man of 51 years living in Stockholm and working with people. In my spare time, I enjoy going to the gym, jogging, diving and meditation. but most of all trips with my girlfriend happy to warmer climates. When it comes to food, I eat primarily Asian.
I am a happy and open person who likes to help other people.
My motto is treat others as you wish to be treated yourself.

name: Lovely studio in Lärkstaden
summary: This amazingly situated apartment is perfect for the solo traveller, who wants to be close to everything without being in the midst of it.  Take a walk downtown or to Hagaparken - if you wish to go further, the subway and bus is around the corner!
space: This is a very unique neighborhood in Stockholm, planned by Per Olof Hallman in the early 1900's. The apartment is on a quiet street, with an amazing view, wooden floors and nicely furnished.
description: This amazingly situated apartment is perfect for the solo traveller, who wants to be close to everything without being in the midst of it.  Take a walk downtown or to Hagaparken - if you wish to go further, the subway and bus is around the corner! This is a very unique neighborhood in Stockholm, planned by Per Olof Hallman in the early 1900's. The apartment is on a quiet street, with an amazing view, wooden floors and nicely furnished. Guests will rent the whole apartment as it is. I will great you upon arrival and will be able to assist you
neighborhood_overview: My apartment is right on the border of Östermalm/Norrmalm/Vasastaden and there is so much to do within walking distance! The area has really blossomed lately - especially if you’re into food (who isn’t?) and I’d love to give you recommendations based on your personal preferences.  It’s a 10 minute walk to Stureplan, Karlaplan, Östermalmstorg and Odenplan! If you need some nature, a forrest run or take a swim - Hagaparken and Brunnsviken are also just a 10 minutes walk away.
notes: This is my own home that I only rent out when I’m away travelling for longer periods of time. Therefore I won’t accept more than one guest in my home - please respect that.
transit: I’ve got a city bike stand around the corner and the subway stop Tekniska Högskolan one block away.  If you prefer to stay over ground both bus 2 and 4 have stops here! My favorite way to explore is by foot, and you’re in walking distance of a lot of areas here!
access: Guests will rent the whole apartment as it is.
interaction: I will great you upon arrival and will be able to assist you
house_rules: Please respect that I only accept solo travellers since this is my private home. In order to not disturb my neighbours, house guests and loud music isn't allowed.
host_about: DJ and fitness instructor from Stockholm, Sweden, who loves to travel! Enjoys music, art, culture, wellness and food. Pescetarian, wine lover and a non-smoker! Super social, tidy and easy going.

name: Near city centre and Djurgården
summary: Really nice "funkis" apartment at Östermalm with walking distance to both city centre and beautiful, unique Djurgården. 71 sq meter, room for 4. Next door to one of Stockholm's best bakeries. Possible to go cross country skiing 100 m from front door at winder or swimming and stroll at Djurgården during summer.
space: The apartment features a truly laid back ambiance and has an open feel to it.  Me and my two children live in this apartment year round. We want it to feel open and welcoming, and you to think of it as a home away from home :) The apartment has two rooms with, one of them being a vey large one with huge windows and beautiful light and one of two balconies. In the big room there is also a separate part where a double bed is placed. It's a fully equipped kitchen including Nespresso machine. The apartment has TV, radio, and quick wifi.  Should you have the need, you can book the common washing machine just a staircase down. There are three machines, tumbler and drying room.  You will receive the keys from either my cleaning company, myself or from a friend/relative. I’ll be available via phone should you have any question or need, and I’ll make sure that you will be able to receive adequate local assistance should you need. Something that we feel is one of our very favorite aspects of our
description: Really nice "funkis" apartment at Östermalm with walking distance to both city centre and beautiful, unique Djurgården. 71 sq meter, room for 4. Next door to one of Stockholm's best bakeries. Possible to go cross country skiing 100 m from front door at winder or swimming and stroll at Djurgården during summer.
neighborhood_overview: Really nice, very safe and beautiful part of Stockholm.
notes: Fast wifi, TV, gas, hot water and electricity is all included. In the house one we have one of Stockholm's best and award winning bakeries located, where you can pick up fresh bread, croissants, buns, etc every morning. A truly nice feature! Close to food stores and everything else you might require during your stay.
transit: Close to buses, tube and by foot you are at the very city centre within 10 minutes.  Easy to park in the streets outside. Standard rates apply. Very easy to access from airport via airport bus or express train and then bus or tube.
access: You will have access to everything and be the only one in the apartment - so it's as if this was your permanent home. All wardrobes will be empty too.
interaction: I will be available almost daily on e-mail or phone.  I will not be there during the letting period but you can contact me or a friend of mine who can help out if needed.
house_rules: Please treat the home as if it was your own. I live g´here permanently with my two daughters aged 12 and 8 and we love our home.  No smoking inside please.

name: Oasis just outside the city centre
summary: My uncluttered and calm 2-room apartment is located in an area that has a vibe of a small town within the city. You may enjoy cute cafés, bookshops, antique shops as well as green spaces with five minutes to the water and running/walking trails.
space: The flat is painted in bright colours and is decorated in a simple but homey way. It underwent an extensive renovation finishing in December 2014 following a water damage. Due to the damage I had to get rid of many of my things, and so therefore the place is sparsly furnished. However, the flat has all the commodities necessary for total comfort. The brand new kitchen has a fridge, freezer, a gas stove and there's a full range of high-quality cookware.
description: My uncluttered and calm 2-room apartment is located in an area that has a vibe of a small town within the city. You may enjoy cute cafés, bookshops, antique shops as well as green spaces with five minutes to the water and running/walking trails.  The flat is painted in bright colours and is decorated in a simple but homey way. It underwent an extensive renovation finishing in December 2014 following a water damage. Due to the damage I had to get rid of many of my things, and so therefore the place is sparsly furnished. However, the flat has all the commodities necessary for total comfort. The brand new kitchen has a fridge, freezer, a gas stove and there's a full range of high-quality cookware.   I will have two closets closed off for personal storage, as well as a few cupboards in the kitchen, but aside from that, the entire flat will be at your disposal!  I will be travelling most of the time, and so I won't be seeing you for check-in, although a good friend of mine will welcome you
neighborhood_overview: Located only 14 minutes on the subway from the central station, and with even fewer stops to the cool shopping, cafés and bars of Södermalm, the neighbourhood of Aspudden is a fantastic mix of tranquil residential with young families, and creativity and art with little galleries and antique shops. The big art's college is only 15 minutes away on foot, that regularly arranges markets and showings. The district boasts many nature areas with the water only minutes away as well as cafés, bars and restaurants with poetry readings and language cafés, and a performance space featuring both dance and theatre (SITE).  As for supermarkets, there is both Coop, Ica and Netto, all within 5-minute range of the flat. Here you can buy all your basic food, hygiene products and some medical products. There is a farmacy by the Aspudden metro stop (one stop before Örnsberg, 5-min walk), or you can walk 20 mins or two stops on the metro towards the centre to Liljeholmen, where you will find a big shopping
notes: There is a laundry room in the basement, with a booking system. Let me know upon arrival if you will need to use it, and I will happily show you how it's done.
transit: Getting here is easy as a breeze, taking only 14 minutes from T-Centralen, the central point for Stockholm's subway. Simply take line 13 south to Örnsberg, and from there it's a mere two-minute walk to the apartment.
access: I will have two closets closed off for personal storage, as well as a few cupboards in the kitchen, but aside from that, the entire flat will be at your disposal!
interaction: I will be travelling most of the time, and so I won't be seeing you for check-in, although a good friend of mine will welcome you and help you with anything you need. If I am in town I will be there to greet you and get you settled in the flat.
house_rules: The neighbours are very respectful and never make noise at night, and of course wish for you to do the same.  No parties will be allowed in the flat, no exceptions. No smoking and no pets are also rules to abide by. No shoes indoors and no loud music/noise after 10pm or before 8am.
host_about:
I'm an artist working as a contemporary dancer and yoga teacher. Travelling, good food, cool & fun people, books, dance, music, acting/theatre, languages and arts in general are things that interest and intrigue me. 

Je parle français. 
Hablo español. 
Ich spreche Deutsch.
Falo português. 
Jag talar svenska.

neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood Location:  Bromma is a very exclusive and quite area with Swedish traditional houses. Barbecue/Beach/Parks/Sport courts around and Free Outdoor Gym. Why: The area is one of the cleanest in Stockholm and most suitable for taking walks in the nearby parks/forests, climb on highlands and watch the view from above.  Beach:  The small clean and intimate beach is great for stay under the sun, have a bath or exercise at the Free Outdoor Gym. (Hidden by Airbnb) for Solviksbadet or Solviksbadet Gym. Architecture: Mainly composed of traditional villas and a few small apartment buildings. A romantic plaza at Ålsten for coffee,  pizza and one of the best gelato ice cream in Stockholm.
notes: NO SMOKING! Smoking is strictly forbidden inside the apartment or outside on the terrace. Guests are fully responsible of any damages or loses due to incidents, imprudence, theft or other unpleasant events during their stay as booked through Airbnb.com
transit: Public transportation: 3-5 min to bus/tube.
access: What to you get access to: Full apartment, fully equipped kitchen, laundry, terrace, entertainment center, backyard, barbecue. Optional: 1 big + 1 medium + 1 small bicycle available with separate safety deposit.  Basketball and football / free courts just across the street.
interaction: How do we communicate: We will not be in the apartment while you are there but we can always keep in touch (telephone, messenger, e-mail, airbnb) during the period and also provide valuable information about what to do and where to go. We or a contact person will be there for check-in and check-out.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment, or outside on the terrace.  No parties. No loud talking outside after 10PM No loud music inside or outside.  Guests are fully responsible of any damages or loses due to incidents, imprudence, theft or other unpleasant events during their stay as booked through Airbnb.com
host_about:
We are family with 2 boys, Teo and Mat and love to have fun together. Most of all, we like traveling playing football or training ourselves to be in a good shape. We like good books, movies and music, so whenever time allows us to enjoy one of them it feels just great. 
Cooking is great and it's fun! We like cooking all sort of international dishes but most we like Mediterranean recipes. Italian, Greek, French or Spanish foods are simply delicious. There is a real chance you find something good in the fridge. :)
He loves SCI and Tech
She loves People and Hairstyle
