name: Charming Apartment in Good Location
summary: This modern light apartment has 2 bedrooms and a very open layout, where living room, dining area and kitchen are all connected. The living room has large windows in three directions, which gives you a nice view to the adjacent park.
space: This is a great apartment for 2 adults and 2 kids in a very nice area just outside Stockholm city with good communications. It has 2 bedrooms and a very open layout, where living room, dining area and kitchen are all connected. The living room has large windows in three directions, which gives you a nice view to the adjacent park. A glass door takes you out to the balcony facing south west where you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun from 2-8 pm. Since on the 4th of 5 floors, you are surrounded by tree tops and have a nice view of the garden below. The apartment has all the facilities you need: a fully furnished and equipped kitchen, living room, bathroom, etc.

You live in a more quiet and green neighborhood on Sickla Udde, but there are still plenty of facilities and services around like restaurants, grocery stores and a very good public transportation to down town Stockholm. There is also a boat leaving from Hammarby Sjöstad to take you directly to Djurgården and Nybroviken in the center of Stockholm.

space: 30sqm. The apartment is very well planned. A separate kitchen with dining space for two and a large combined living room / bedroom. The bed is queen size, 120cm wide.

I will meet you at Hornstull or Zinkensdamm metro station (5 min walking) and walk you to my place to give you the keys. If I'm not here myself I will arrange for someone else to greet you. neighborhood_overview: This is one of Södermalm's prime locations. The surroundings are lush and beautiful and the apartment building is well protected against city noise. Södermalm's heights are well known for the beauty and charm. Personally, I find the area from Slussen to Hornstull, where this apartment is located, to be one of the greatest in Europe. Everything you might possibly need (except Ikea) can be found within a 10 min walking distance.
transit: Five minutes walk to Hornstull and Zinkensdamm metro stations. 2 min walk to bus 66 (goes across Södermalm) and 4 min walk to buss 4 that runs through the whole city.

name: Fashionable Södermalm apartment
summary: This is a light and airy apartment on the top floor of a beautiful building built in 1897. The three room apartment is 80 square meters, has a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom (with shower). If the weather allows a balcony facing west offers
space: This is a light and airy apartment on the top floor of a beautiful building built in 1897. The three room apartment is 80 square meters, has a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom (with shower). If the weather allows a balcony facing west offers a nice place to dine in the evening sun.  In its standard setup, the apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 dining room/library and 1 living room. However, the dining room/library can easily be rearranged into a bedroom with 1-3 beds. The apartment is recently renovated and has modern yet cosy furnishings.

Just as close is the Vitabergsparken park, Mosebacke square and Fjällgatan street that offers some of the most beautiful views of Stockholm.
transit: Around the corner is Tjärhovsplan,  a hub for city buses. Bus line 2, 3, 76 and 53 will conveniantly take you almost everywhere within inner city Stockholm in 5-20 minutes. If you prefer taking the metro, The Medborgarplatsen station is a 5-10 min walk away.

name: Short term, March-May, 2 bdr apt
summary: Our lovely apt, with influences from the 60s and 70s, is perfect for couples and friends who want to visit or live in Stockholm.
space: With a fairly large dining area (it seats 6-8 people) and a fully equipped kitchen you can have amazing cook outs!  The living room is big, with enough space for  two inflatable mattresses, dancing or rolling out the yoga mat. There is a bluetooth sound system for connecting any device (plz, keep quiet after 11 pm) and a flat screen, cabel-TV.  Through the living room you'll find the balcony - with sun light from early morning until late afternoon. The bathroom is fully equipped, with a very large tub (yes, it fits 2 people), shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, towels etc. Sleeping arrangements: The bedroom has a kingsize bed with a mattress that is built for gods. The living room has one couch. And there is room for 2 inflatable mattresses (120 cm wide each).
description: Our lovely apt, with influences from the 60s and 70s, is perfect for couples and friends who want to visit or live in Stockholm.
neighborhood_overview: It's a quiet and safe neighborhood -  it has become really popular among young people and hip families. The apt is located very close to the subway (150 m). From here you take the green subway  line, which takes 3 min to Södermalm/10 min to the old city/12 min to the city/central station).  Also, if you like to be outdoor, the apt is right by one of Stockholm's most popular national reserves, called "Sickla naturreservat" - here you have great running tracks and swimming options. The neighborhood has two supermarkets and a couple of nice restaurants and plenty of cheap take out-restaurants (pizza, Indian, Chinese, Thai, Italian) etc.
transit: 200 meters to the closest subway station (Hammarbyhöjden) - it's the Green line that takes you to Södermalm, Gamla stan (old city), city center, Kungsholmen, Vasastan etc.  It leaves every 4-10 min - depending on what time of day.
access: Fully equipped kitchen (with a crazy good gas stove)  Linens Towels Subway card
interaction: If I'll be in Stockholm I'd love to hang out!
house_rules: 1. No smoking indoors (use the balcony). 2. No party's. 3. Enjoy every moment of your stay.

Vegan

name: Beautiful 2 room apt with big porch
summary: Welcome to our modern & charming apartment located in one of the cosiest and hip neighborhoods, Aspudden, just outside Stockholm city center. One bedroom, fully equipped kitchen and an amazing porch. 12 mins to central station with the metro and 1 stop away from where the airport coach arrives (Liljeholmen).
space: The apartment is located 7 minutes walk from the subway, in a quiet and cozy area. You'll stay close to beautiful Vinterviken where you can eat great food and have a coffee if you'd like. It is 12 mins with the metro to the central station and 1 stop away from where the airport coach arrives (Liljeholmen). The apartment is totally renovated in 2012 so it's very modern and equipped with everything you might need during your stay!  The apartment is perfect for two persons but absolutely fine for four. The large bed in the bedroom is 160cm and suitable for two persons. If you're three our four persons coming we'll put an large "airbed" in the living room and one person will sleep on the sofa.
description: Welcome to our modern & charming apartment located in one of the cosiest and hip neighborhoods, Aspudden, just outside Stockholm city center. The large bed in the bedroom is 160cm and suitable for two persons. If you're three our four persons coming we'll put an large "airbed" in the living room and one person will sleep on t
neighborhood_overview: Aspudden is a very beautiful and hip suburb close to Södermalm and just outside Stockholm city. Here you have everything you need within 10 minutes walk from the apartment. Supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and a pharmacy.  If you bring kids we would suggest you walk 200 meters to the beautiful park "Aspuddsparken" where you find a large swimming pool for the kids and lots of animals, e.g horses, pigs and rabbits.  If you walk 200 meters in the other direction you will find Vinterviken, a beautiful area by the water with coffee shops, restaurants and amazing views.
transit: Perfect location close to the metro station "Aspudden" which takes you to Stockholm Central (T-centralen) in 12 minutes and to Hornstull on Södermalm in 4. In Hornstull there are lots of great restaurants, bars and cafes. Ask us and we would love to share some tips!
access: During your stay you'll have access to free wi-fi, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer and a fully equipped kitchen. If there is anything special you might need during your stay, just let us know and we'll try to fix it!
interaction: It depends whether we are home or not but if we are we would love to meet our guests! However we will always be available on phone for questions, help and advice during your stay.
house_rules: You can use things in the kitchen as you like and feel like home! Pets can't unfortunately be allowed since Gustav is allergic. By the same reason smoking is strictly forbidden inside the apartment.
host_about: We are a young couple living in a modern flat in Aspudden, 5 minutes with the subway from Södermalm. We love cooking and eating and therefore often invite our friends to loud and happy dinners at our place. Klara is a real breakfast-junkie and Gustav loves to build things. Check out his home made 3D-printer during your stay at us!

There are many reputable restaurants and clubs in the area, such as Grill, Köttbaren, Rolfs kök,  Gastropub Queens Head, Hattori Sushi Devil and restaurant Supper. Drottninggatan is lined with stores for shopping.  Hötorget/ Hötorgshallen, filmstaden and royal hall is located a short walk away. name: Studio/house (room kitchen shower)
summary: 10 min from city. Walking distance to Sthlm Globe and Tele2 Arena. 15 min drive from Stockholmsmässan. Newly renovated studio for up to 4 pers, equipped kitchen, floor heating and shower with heated marble floor. Access to garden, close to subway.
space: The main house is built 1909 and is located in Gamla Enskede just south of Stockholm City. The studio is a separate building in the garden (approx. 25m2), newly renovated with floor heating and a shower with heated marble floor. Sleeping area with a queen size bed (120 cm) and a sofa bed in the living room gives space for up to 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children.
description: 10 min from city. Walking distance to Sthlm Globe and Tele2 Arena. 15 min drive from Stockholmsmässan. Newly renovated studio for up to 4 pers, equipped kitchen, floor heating and shower with heated marble floor. Access to garden, close to subway. The main house is built 1909 and is located in Gamla Enskede just south of Stockholm City. The studio is a separate building in the garden (approx. 25m2), newly renovated with floor heating and a shower with heated marble floor. Sleeping area with a queen size bed (120 cm) and a sofa bed in the living room gives space for up to 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children. The kitchen is fully equipped (stove, oven/micro, refrigerator/freezer), toilet, shower, dining table for 4. A washing machine in the basement of the main house can be used. Free Wi-Fi. Highchair is available. We live in the main house and will be available to answer any questions. We gladly give tips on restaurants, museums and excursions. We have two children and can provide lots
neighborhood_overview: Gamla Enskede is Sweden’s first garden city and was planned and built in 1907. Villas in flowering gardens and picturesque townhouses in English style make a cozy yet lively suburb. One of Stockholm’s best bakeries is just around the corner and the local restaurant Gamla Enskede Matbod serves a French bistro-menu just 3 minutes from the house. The Unesco World Heritage Skogskyrkogården, (The Woodland Cemetery) is just 10 min walk away. A 10 minute ride by subway and you’re at Södermalm – the hip southern part of Stockholm city, with plenty restaurants, shopping and events. For the sport interested there is a big range of possibilities with Stockholm Globe, Tele2 Arena, Hovet and even a skiing slope in the close surroundings.
notes: Gym, swimming pools, outdoor running and such are available in the area.
transit: 12 minutes drive or subway ride from Stockholm city.  Walking distance (800 meters) to Stockholm Globe and Tele2 Arena.  15 min drive to Stockholmsmässan (the grand exhibition hall).  Close to subway station Sandsborg (400 m).
access: The kitchen is fully equipped (stove, oven/micro, refrigerator/freezer), toilet, shower, dining table for 4. A washing machine in the basement of the main house can be used. Free Wi-Fi. Highchair is available.
interaction: We live in the main house and will be available to answer any questions. We gladly give tips on restaurants, museums and excursions. We have two children and can provide lots of suggestions suitable for kids.
house_rules: No animals allowed due to allergies. No smoking indoors or in the garden.  No parties. No sleep over guests.
host_about:
Hedvig and Patrik Bruckner, both advertisers (Copywriter and Art Director) from Stockholm. We have two children, a girl and a boy. 

Love travelling, eating out and exploring new cities.

name: Sekelskiftspärla i Hornstull
summary: I trendiga Hornstull, med kaféer, restauranger, butiker och vinbarer runt hörnet ligger denna sekelskiftespärla. Tre minuter till t-banan, och fem minuter till vackert klippbad. Här finns en härlig mix av vacker natur och myllrande storstadsliv!
space: Lägenheten, en etta på fjärde våningen, 42 kvm med kök, är i typisk sekelskiftsstil med högt i tak, trägolv och en fungerande kakelugn. På balkongen kan man sitta och äta frukost med utsikt över Hornstulls folkliv. Bara runt hörnet finns några av Stockholms bästa restauranger och jag tipsar er gärna om mina favoriter.
description: I trendiga Hornstull, med kaféer, restauranger, butiker och vinbarer runt hörnet ligger denna sekelskiftespärla. Tre minuter till t-banan, och fem minuter till vackert klippbad. På balkongen kan man sitta och äta frukost med utsikt över Hornstulls folkliv. Bara runt hörnet finns några av Stockholms bästa restauranger och jag tipsar er gärna om mina favoriter. Gasspis, elugn, mikro, tv, trådlöst internet, tvättstuga i huset, diskmaskin, kastruller och porslin, sängkläder, handdukar, välsorterad matbutik runt hörnet i gallerian där det också finns systembolag, apotek och butiker. Jag tar emot gästerna och överlämnar nyckeln, och om jag inte är hemma kommer min bror att göra det. Jag är bortrest från den 6 april men finns hela tiden på mejl och sms. Hornstull på Södermalm är den trendigas
neighborhood_overview: Hornstull på Södermalm är den trendigaste stadsdelen i Stockholm. Det finns vackra klippbad och stränder bara fem minuter från lägenheten och fem minuter åt andra hållet finns allt man kan önska av en storstad.
notes: Det finns en stor dubbelsäng samt en soffa, och vid behov hjälper jag gärna till att hämta en madrass om det behövs fler sovplatser.
transit: Bussar och t-bana bara tre minuter från lägenheten.

neighborhood_overview: The best bakery in town is Valhallabageriet: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Also check out Fältöversten with their range of stores: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  If you want to have a quick dinner or lunch, Phils Burger on "Sandhamnsgatan 1" : (Website hidden by Airbnb)
transit: The metro station is just a few minutes walk from the apartment, the bus "1" leaves from the connecting street and takes you straight to Stureplan in just  10 minutes.  If you want to park your car there´s parking spaces just outside the apartment, for free on weekends a for a fee monday-friday We have a varie of taxi companies, I recommend Taxi Stockholm (Website hidden by Airbnb)  For communal transportation, check out (Website hidden by Airbnb)
access: The apartment is 60m2 and has a separate bedroom with one bed (160 cm wide). It has a small kitchen, (no dishwasher) and a bathroom with a toilet and a shower. There is also a small balcony with a view over the park.  You will have access to the whole apartment.
interaction: I will be available for questions or queries during your visit, and will be living just 30 minutes away. If you need recommendations for restaurants or such feel free to ask me :)
house_rules: - Max 2 guests at the time. - Please respect the neighbours.  - Please take off your shoes before entering the apartment. - The elevator has two doors, make sure you close both of them. - In Sweden it is important that you don't make loud noises after 11.00 pm. - If you are a smoker, please do so on the balcony. - Do not use the open fire, it is allowed to have tea-lights but nothing else. - Leave the apartment in a way you would like to find it.
host_about: Hi! My name is Caroline, from Stockholm. I work at H&M marketing department. I like shopping, traveling and vegetarian food. Stockholm is my home town so feel free to ask me if you need any sorts of recommendations.

name: Cozy and charming studio to share
summary: This apartment will give you a authentic Stockholm experience with an italian touch. The location is only 10 min from the city center and close to the office area of Lindhagen if you are here for work. I’m a very open and social person and would like to share the room with people who need an emergency location, are here for an interview or would like just to visit Stockholm and having a friendly host. I love making food and I'm looking forward to share my breakfast or dinner with the guest.
space: I’m the room there is a bunk bed and a 120cm wide bed that I use as sofa when I’m alone. The apt is 21 Sqm but very well planned and  newly renovated with hotel feeling: compact kitchen and bathroom  with white marble finishes. The building itself has that Swedish 20’s charm and a very nice inner court for chilling when it is nice weather. This apartment is very central and flexible. It is close to the city, and it also gives you the possibility to experience the wonderful nature in Stockholm. Hornsbergs Strand, Kristineberg, City Hall, Rålambshovsparken and Drottningholm are only a few mentioned  hot spots in the area which are easily accessed from this apartment.  One of Stockholms biggest supermarkets is located in walking distance to the apartment. Here you can buy everything you need, both your everyday nessessties as well as Swedish specialities. We recommend the salty choclate or "inlagd sild"! There is also many restaurants in the area for every taste. Try Thai food around the

neighborhood_overview: In Fruängen all services are within walking distance! Grocery stores, hairdressers, opticians, bank, liquor store and about thirty other stores 2 minutes walking from the apartment. You can also find nice lunch restaurants and cafes. For example, the well-known Ersson's Seafood & Deli and cozy café Kaffekoppen. Nearby are also the award-winning chocolate shop Handgjort.  In Fruängen there are plenty of activities for young and old, for example Långbro Park with its famous restaurant Långbro Wärdshus (I LOVE IT!) and green areas. There is also a youth center, sports hall and gym. Communications are very good, with the Metro Red Line and several bus lines.
notes: For those of you who are traveling with children, we can offer our five year daughter's little room with all her toys and books. Ask us when you book us for more information!
transit: It takes 2 minutes to walk to Fruängen where the Metro will take you to Stockholm Central Station in 18 minutes.
access: There is a recycling station for garbage in the yard. The whole property and surrounding area is smoke free for everyone living in the property, determined by the landlord. It is forbidden to smoke in the apartment, on the balcony or in the yard.
interaction: Apartment owners will not be present during your stay. Keys retrieved by the contact person.
house_rules: We wish us calm, adult guests. No pets are allowed.
host_about:
Ida, 33 year old mother to daughter April 7 y/o and wife to Toki. Born in the swedish island Gotland,  moved to Stockholm 15 years ago, this city is amazing.

I love food, music, red wine, the sun and nice people. My favorite travel destinations are fun citys with my friends or chill beaches with my family.

I think as a guest and host I'm very relaxed, well organized and reliable! When I travel I like to explore, see as much as I can and then take the last day or couple days to do absolutely nothing and let everything I've seen and experienced sink in.

name: Nice room in apt with all you need facilities
summary: A nice two room apartment in Blackeberg. Close to subway station that takes you into central Stockholm. 10 min walk to the sea Mälaren. Easy acces to Bromma airport through bus. The apartment has washing machine, dishwasher and a nice balcony. The kitchen is newly renovated. Internet is very fast and WiFi is available.
space: A nice large apartment with a Queen bed. With view against the inner yard. The bed can fit two persons without any problem. Nice kitchen with all you need and a good livingroom (I will use the living room for sleeping in the night)
description: A nice two room apartment in Blackeberg. Close to subway station that takes you into central Stockholm. 10 min walk to the sea Mälaren. Easy acces to Bromma airport through bus. The apartment has washing machine, dishwasher and a nice balcony. The kitchen is newly renovated. Internet is very fast and WiFi is available. A nice large apartment with a Queen bed. With view against the inner yard. The bed can fit two persons without any problem. Nice kitchen with all you need and a good livingroom (I will use the living room for sleeping in the night) Fully equiped kitchen with all the basic equipment you need for cooking. Bathroom with free showergel/schampoo and toothpaste. Forgot your toothbrush? No problem! I will adapt to your needs. I am social and helpful and I will live try to help out with any questions you might have. Where I live its really close to the sea and nature. Also only 3 min to the subway makes it easy to go around. We have the basic food shop, pharmacy, resaturant etc

Master bedroom with king size bed, second bedroom with queen size bed and third bedroom with kids bunk bed (bed length 178 cm). We can also provide an inflatable mattress for the living room for two more persons.

neighborhood_overview: This area of Stockholm, called Sodermalm  is relaxed, creative and trendy, especially in the "SoFo" area (meaning 'South of Folkungagatan') which is only a 5-10 min walk from my flat. The neighbourhood is well famous for it's second hand shops and offers a lot of vintage stores, eclectic shops, Swedish fashion, galleries and design stores, mixed with an abundance of restaurants, pubs and clubs where you can eat, drink, dance and enjoy live music. Two of the best viewpoints in the city are located on Södermalm ca 10-15 min walk from my flat. One is Fjällgatan and another is Monteliusvägen with well-preserved wooden buildings from the 1600s and 1700s. Other close interesting sights are the viewpoint from Café Fåfängan and another is Skinnarviksberget.  If you like art galleries there are many nestled shoulder to shoulder on Hornsgatspuckeln at Maria Torget. The closest foodstore is located ca 100 m from the flat and can supply you with vegetables, fruit, bread, dairies, meat, fish and al
notes: Please! Do contact me right away and during your stay if you experience any kind of problems in my flat.  The check in is between 14 to 20 (2pm to 8pm). Please note that if no special agreement has been done with me no check in is possible after outside this time. The subway station 'Skanstull' shown on the map is the closest station. The flat is situated at about 10 minutes walk from 'Skanstull'. All the contact is via Airbnb mail, (Hidden by Airbnb) or viber. Make sure you can contact me when you are in Sweden to have info and directions. I have wifi in the flat and cannot guarantee a 24 hrs connection. If you want a 24 hours stable connection please bring or buy in Sweden an applicable PC or Apple standard network cable connection.
transit: The flat is close to subway, suburban trains, busses and water ferries. Only 4 subway stops or ca 5 - 10 min travel time to Downtown and the Central Station. Walking takes ca 20 min to Old Town and ca 30 min to Down Town.
access: Guests have access to the whole flat. Bathroom, small kitchenette (about 1mq), bedroom and balcony.
interaction: All the contact is via Airbnb mail, (Hidden by Airbnb) or viber. Make sure you can contact me when you are in Sweden to have info and directions.

Make sure you can contact me when you are in Sweden to have info and directions. I have wifi in the flat and cannot guarantee a 24 hrs connection. Don't forget to text me by mail or sms when you have landed at Arlanda airport so I know when to expect you to arrive to my flat and then I'll give you detailed instructions how to get in to my flat and get the key.  About laundry times please let me know at least two weeks
host_about:
I am a joyful and friendly family man who love Stockholm and also really enjoy to travel. I've been to China, Brazil, Tatarstan, New Zealand, Mexico, Russia, USA, Canada, India, Turkey and Saudi Arabia. I like movies, reading books, work out, team sports, long walks in the forrest and taking my small open boat through the water channels of Stockholm. I really recommend to see Stockholm from the waterside which is a fantastic experience.
I have two lovely kids and we like to swim, play football, sing and make our own music videos for fun. I am the fifth generation of my family born in Stockholm so I really know this beautiful watertown by heart and love to share my best sights, restaurants, pubs etc with my guests.

name: Trendy Apartment in Telefonplan
summary: Stay in a cosy apartment in one of the most attractive areas for younger people. Here you will live in a a wonderful apartment with a modern kitchen, cool decor and high speed internet! Just a 10 min ride with the Metro from the center of Stockholm
space: Here you will live in a a wonderful apartment with a modern, newly renovated kitchen. The flat is roomy and has a bedroom with a big double bed as well as a good sized sofa for an extra person. There is free parking on the road outside the flat.
description: Stay in a cosy apartment in one of the most attractive areas for younger people. Here you will live in a a wonderful apartment with a modern kitchen, cool decor and high speed internet! Just a 10 min ride with the Metro from the center of Stockholm Here you will live in a a wonderful apartment with a modern, newly renovated kitchen. The flat is roomy and has a bedroom with a big double bed as well as a good sized sofa for an extra person. There is free parking on the road outside the flat. There's a TV connected to Apple tv. Wifi with high-speed internet (50 Mbit/s), perfect if you need to work or upload your photos and videos. There will be coffee and tea for you to use and of course a fully equipped kitchen for you if you like cooking. Clean bed linen and towels are provided as well as eco friendly shampoo and shower gel. As a guest you will have access to the whole flat for yourself. Me or my boyfriend are available for questions during your stay. We will support you in the best way
neighborhood_overview: Hägersten is an up and coming part of Stockholm where Telefonplan is one of the most popular areas. Since Konstfack Art School opened up at Telefonplan it suddenly became one of the most attractive areas for younger people and it's still growing in popularity with restaurants, bars, concert venues and cafés opening up as a result.  Hägersten is a quite and safe area, close to nature and parks for walks or the water for summer swims. I'll give you my personal favorite spots in the area when you arrive :)
notes: I keep my apartment very clean, however if you are allergic to dogs this might not be the place for you since my little dog Hedda (a Schipperke) lives here with me. She's with me when renting out the apartment :)
transit: It's a 7 min walk from the apartment to Telefonplan Metro Station. Telefonplan is just a 10 min ride with the Metro from the center of Stockholm (Old Town, Södermalm, Central Station etc).  The Airport Coaches stops at Liljeholmen and Stockholm City. From Liljeholmen or Stockholm City you can take the Metro to Telefonplan. You can also take a bus from Liljeholmen that stops just outside the apartment.
access: There's a TV connected to Apple tv. Wifi with high-speed internet (50 Mbit/s), perfect if you need to work or upload your photos and videos. There will be coffee and tea for you to use and of course a fully equipped kitchen for you if you like cooking. Clean bed linen and towels are provided as well as eco friendly shampoo and shower gel.
interaction: As a guest you will have access to the whole flat for yourself. Me or my boyfriend are available for questions during your stay. We will support you in the best way we can :) I might get some help from my boyfriend or my friends to deliver the keys depending on the days you stay.
house_rules: No smoking and no partys. Please don't leave water on the wooden desks in the kitchen.  Welcome!

Nespresso machine with coffee is also available. You can also use the various spices that are in the kitchen. Centrally located, near great bars and restaurants. Metro and buses are within a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Easy access to all parts of the city, as well as boats and buses to explore the outer city. Apartment faces busy block of the city. name: Charming 66m² flat in cozy Apsudden
summary: Welcome to this bright 2 bedroom apartment in wonderful Aspudden, Stockholm. We love it here and hope you will to. It is a spacious open apartment with a modern kitchen, a balcony with an amazing view and a great atmosphere in general.
space: Welcome to our lovely apartment. There is one big bedroom with a king size bed (180 cm wide). A home study that works as a second bedroom with a foldable extra bed, a baby crib or room for both. A kitchen, living room and one bathroom. If you are four guests the sofa in the living room can also be used as sleeping space when needed, although it is not a sofa bed.  The flat is fully furnished and equipped with sheets and towels, wifi, TV and dishwasher. You will have the flat all to yourself. Usually we meet up at the flat so that I can answer any question you have and give you the keys. Walking distance from the apartment there is a lot of nature to experience. Have a swim in the nearby lake, grab a coffee in the community garden or visit the animals in the nearby park.  Aspudden is one of the most popular areas in the larger city region. It is perfectly safe during all times of the day. The subway is very close and from there you reach Stockholm central in 12 minutes. By the subway yo

name: GREAT ROOM, very heart of Stockholm
summary: Nicely furnished room (12 sqm big) with an extremely comfy double bed in one of the top areas in the absolute heart of Stockholm City. (Door-to-door commuter train from Arlanda!) Access to a brand new kitchen and two bathrooms!
space: The location on the 4th floor right at The Southern Station (where you can go directly by commuter train from Arlanda airport) is perfect with the city pulse right outside the house. Nearly everything is within walking distance and practically every means of public transportation can be reached within minutes. The beautiful old town (Gamla Stan) with The Royal Castle is only a short walk away, and there are many cafés, restaurants, shops and inner city green areas surrounding our home.  As Södermalm is one of the islands that make up the absolute heart of Stockholm, the amazing water that the city is famous for is of course only a few minutes walk away from the house.

host_about:
Hi, I am a 57-years old lady/girl/women, choose what feels right.  I live alone since my daughter moved to an appartment of her own a couple of years ago. 
I like to travel and I like to meet new people, that´s why AirBnb is a nice thing for me.
I love to read and to go to cinemas and I am a big collector of Elephants - even though  I never met one IRL yet. I like to sing, but I don´t do it so often at home while I have guests (sometimes I can forget my self and sing, I hope you can stand it!)
The most important part in your visit at my place is that you feel welcome and at home when you arrive.

name: Nice house close to Stockholm City
summary: In the calm suburb to Stockholm you will find this cosy and typical Swedish wooden semi-detached house with four bedrooms and your own private garden. It is close to beautiful nature and the city of Stockholm at the same time.
space: On the first floor there is a fully equipt kitchen and a cosy livingroom.  The kitchen is for example equipt with a washing machine, microwave own and both a nespresso and a regular coffe machine.  In the livingroom you will find the TV and a nice fireplace. On the second floor there are two bedrooms, one master bedroom and a single bedroom. There is also a bathroom with wc and shower. The bathroom also includes a baby nursing table.In the basement you will find the family room that includes a bedsofa and a bathroom. The bathroom in the basement has wc, bathtub, washing machine and a tumble dryer. In the attic you will find another single bedroom. The house has a nice and private, children friendly green garden. If you like you can eat outside with tables and chairs for 6-10 persons. A barbeque grill is also available.  In the garden there is a private parking place and a shed where you can park your bicycles and strolleys.

neighborhood_overview: About 300 meters away from the house you will find the Nacka nature reserve, one of Stockholms largest recreation areas. Within this area you´ll have the possibilty to go for a run, use the outdoor gym, go golfing or take a swim in the lake.
notes: If necessary, an extra folding bed and a baby crib are available.  A baby strolley is available if needed.  Free Wi-Fi is included.
transit: If you want to go to Stockholm City, it’s only a six minutes walk to the closest metro that will take you to Stockholm Central Station in 17 minutes.  If you need tips about what to see and do in Stockholm we are more than happy to help with information. The area where the house is placed is calm.
house_rules: We love our house and hope you will to! Please treat it as if it was your own. No pets and no smoking inside the house. We provide bed linen and towels but kindle ask you to put the linen and the towels in the washing machine and tumble dryer before leaving.

name: New production apartment of 60 sqm  in Kungsholmen
summary: Välkommen till denna nyproducerade lägenhet med bra planlösning, stor balkong, påkostade materialval och spännande arkitektur.  New production apartment 2 room of 60 sqm with proximity to both water, nature and inner city. The apartment is fully furnished with stylish design and has a fantastic balcony. Hornsberg is a newly produced area in an expansive phase. There are both restaurants, cafes and Ica Maxi (Supermarket) within walking distance of about 3 minutes.
space: Bright and charming apartment at the top with several of the older parts preserved as parquet floors, wooden floors and mullioned windows. Living room facing the street and bedroom towards the quiet courtyard. Plans balcony facing south towards the farm. The apartment was renovated in 2014.

space: Charming apartment with great location in the characteristic neighbourhood at Mariaberget/Mariatorget in Södermalm. The apartment is 28 m2 on the top floor of the building (4th) with a french balcony facing the yard, wooden floors and personal interior. It has a fully equipped separate kitchen with seating for two people. Dining area in the room seats 4 people. Bathroom with small but fully functional shower.  The bed is 110 cm wide, comfortable for one person, or two people if you don't mind sleeping a bit tight. Extra separate bed available.  Bedlinen and towels included. Unfortunately there is no wifi in the apartment. However there is cafés within two minutes from the house that offers free wifi.

name: City center with sunny balcony
summary: Comfortable one bedroom apartment with a sunny balcony and fireplace! Comfortably fits two, centrally located on a quiet street. Enjoy a fully fitted kitchen, easy access public transportation and walking distance to most of Stockholm.
space: Set in the vibrant Vasastan district of central Stockholm, our one-bedroom apartment is perfect for a couple or single traveler. Walking distance to countless sights. Our cosy apartment consists of a private entrance hall, a bathroom with shower and toilet, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with a dining table sofa and fireplace, a large balcony for lazy summer days, and a bedroom with a large wardrobe and double bed. Please send a message before booking to make sure the apartment is available, no matter if it says it available or not, I might be able to help out!

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood "Siberia" sits between trendy Vasastan and upper-class Östermalm. There are restaurants such as the burger bar "Prime Burger", the cocktail and fine dining restaurant "Svartengrens", bistro-like "Chez Betty", and wine bar "Babette" - all within a 3 minute walk. In addition there are several cafés and bars close by. The city center with clubs, restaurants, and shopping is just a 10 minute walk away.
transit: Closest subway: Tekniska högskolan Several subway stations within walking distance from the apartment, green and red lines, and even closer to buses to anywhere in the city. The Central station, which is the hub of all transportation networks, takes about 20 minutes to walk to. The Arlanda Express train and the shuttle buses from the airports all depart and arrive at the Central station.

name: Bright two room apt. w. balcony
summary: Great location, hip neighborhood with many restaurants and parks, sunny balcony looking over the calm backyard.
space: Our two room apartment is a perfect place to stay while your visiting the beautiful city of Stockholm. The apartment is divided in three equally large rooms: kitchen, living room and bedroom. The bedroom includes a nice king size bed (180 cm) directly connected to the balcony which is overlooking the back yard. In the living room you can relax in the sofa enjoying the TV or the fireplace. The large windows gives the apartment a lot of natural light. The kitchen is fully equipped with a gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher, fridge, freezer and a large dining table and all necessary kitchenware.  The apartment has wireless internet. Vasastan is one of the trendiest spots in Stockholm and have a lot to offer. You have plenty of restaurants, bars, green parks, cafes, design and vintage shops just around the corner.

neighborhood_overview: Södermalm is the best area in Stockholm no doubt! Hornstull is the new hip place to hang out with loads of restaurants, bars and cafés. It's also close to Långohlmen which is a lovely island in the middle of Stockholm! Mariatorget is a ten minutes walk away. Mariatorget is also very popoular, especially in the summer, with lots of places to sit outside to enjoy the sun.  Södermalm also hosts several museums; for xample Fotografiska.
transit: The communications in this area are great. The tube takes about five minutes in to the city central. The busstop is around the corner. The tube station is a five minute walk away.

A 32 year old young professional living in Hornstull, Stockholm. I am working as a lawyer and a yoga teacher. I would be happy to give you tips and advice on Stockholm!

I love traveling and been using airbnb many times. I really like staying at a home rather than a hotel when I travel - it gives you more of a feeling for the new place you're in. 

I also love healthy food. And dogs!

name: 165 sqm in central Stockholm
summary: This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Stockholm within walking distance to shopping, attractions and nightlife areas.
space: This  classical, high-ceiling apartment is located on the fifth floor in the heart of the city in Vasastan/Norrmalm, close to everything you could possibly need and want. The address is ideal for enjoying attractions and nightlife.   Within 100 meters you have  supermarkets, bakeries, cafés and restaurants. Several buses stop within 50 meters and the closest subway stations is Tekniska högskolan  ( 2 minutes walk). Within 15 minutes walk you have all the major central shopping areas and the night life around Stureplan. From the 165 square meter apartment you have access to 5 out of 5 rooms with two bathrooms, three bedrooms, living room, dining room and kitchen.   Linen and towels provided. Welcome!

name: Cozy 2 room apt, amazingly central!
summary: My fabulous apartment is located in the very heart of Stockholm: Vasastan. Close to some of Stockholms best restaurants, bars, nightclubs and cafes. The metro station is within 200meters at Odenplan, where you also find buses to all parts of the city
space: My cozy apartment is on the 4th floor in a restored building from the 19th century. It is 60 m2 big with three windows. The living room is big with a comfortable sofa, TV, and a big dining table with room for about 6 people. The bedroom is a little smaller but still enough room for a kingsize bed and a window with proper blinds. The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, oven, dishwasher and microwave. The bathroom is newly renovated with a modern shower. I have decorated the apartment in my own style as cozy as possible with rugs, lamps and pictures on the walls. I think it fits to the charming impression that the apartment gives with high ceiling and details from 19th century!
description: My fabulous apartment is located in the very heart of Stockholm: Vasastan. Close to some of Stockholms best restaurants, bars, nightclubs and cafes. The metro station is within 200meters at Odenplan, where you also find buses to all parts of the city My cozy apartment is on the 4th floor in a restored building from the 19th century. It is 60 m2 big with three windows. The living room is big with a comfortable sofa, TV, and a big dining table with room for about 6 people. The bedroom is a little smaller but still enough room for a kingsize bed and a window with proper blinds. The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, oven, dishwasher and microwave. The bathroom is newly renovated with a modern shower. I have decorated the apartment in my own style as cozy as possible with rugs, lamps and pictures on the walls. I think it fits to the charming impression that the apartment gives with high ceiling and details from 19th century!  You will have access to TV, DVD, music player, free WiFi, big
neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located in a neighbourhood called Vasastan. Vasastan have it all! Cozy cafés, some of the best restaurants in Stockholm, cool nightclubs, shopping (a lot of vintage stores especially on my street), supermarkets, parks, beautiful churches and old buildings, all within 2-10 min walk! According to the high demand in housing in Vasastan, this neighbourhood is the most popular part of Stockholm right now. People appreciate the lively quarters and the easy access to everything but also the closeness to nature such as Hagaparken.
notes: I live with cats
transit: I live superclose to the metro and all kinds of busses! I live at Odenplan, 2 min walk to the metrostation and busstops. Odenplan is on the green metro line and only 4 stops away from Stockholm central station. There are several busses that stop at Odenplan, busses to all parts of the city. From Arlanda you can take airport shuttle (bus), airport train, taxi or commuter train. The airport shuttle takes about 40 min and costs about 100 SEK. Get off at the stop "St Eriksplan" and then it is a 10 min walk to my apartment. The airport train takes 20 min and costs 280 SEK for 2 persons (it is a discount if you buy two tickets at the same time). It stops at central station and then you have to take the metro to Odenplan (5 min). Taxi costs 360-520 SEK and takes about 45 min. The commuter train is the cheapest way but also the longest way! First you have to take a bus to the train station (Märsta) and then the commuter train to central station and then the metro to Odenplan. The whole trip wi
access: You will have access to TV, DVD, music player, free WiFi, big closet and fully equipped kitchen. I will of course provide you with clean sheets, towels, schampoo, conditioner, shower gel, toilet paper, coffee for the coffee machine, tablets for the dishwasher and staple parts like cooking oil and spices. I have a city bike and if you have a special request, you can rent it for a small fee. Just let me know!
house_rules: Shoes not allowed indoors
host_about: I am 25 years old, study medicine and love to dance salsa! I also like to travel whenever I have time and money for it! I like to meet new people and have hosted guests before. I live with my two cats (which of course won't be home during your stay!) and my boyfriend who currently lives in a different city. I like to read books, and feel free to lend any of my books during your stay! I also like to cook and bake, my specialty is pie! I hope you will have a great stay in my lovely apartment, I have furnished it with care!

name: Premium apartment with sea view
summary: This unique apartment is located in an old school building converted to homes. The apartment is located at the top of the house and overlooks the water.
space: The house is in a quiet neighborhood with many green spaces in the surrounding area. Only 200 meters from the house is a public bathing pier. Outside the gate there is a soccer field that can be used by everyone and, in the winter, is turned into a skating rink. Despite the quiet neighborhood, it is close to trendy and popular SOFO with its lively cafe, restaurant and barlife, as well as creative shops. The apartment is recently renovated and in top condition. Suitable for four adults or a family of children. We have a double bed and two single beds and also a cot if desired. You can also sleep on the soft sofa if you prefer. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you would expect. There is a dishwasher, washing machine, tumble dryer and spacious fridge and freezer. The bathroom is spacious and offers both bath and shower, underfloor heating and heated towel rail.

notes: We of course help with sheets, towels, soaps, detergents and toilet paper. Welcome to an experience beyond the usual if you choose to spend your Stockholm vacation in this hidden gem in Södermalm!

host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Lovisa and I live with my fiancé Mattias and our daughter at Södermalm in Stockholm. I work as a medical doctor and Mattias as an architect.

I enjoy family and friends, food and drinks, sailing, music and singing, running and of course travelling. So far I've stayed with Airbnb in Los Angeles, Barcelona, Beijing, South Africa and Costa Brava. I think is the perfect way to stay while you're travelling!

A couple of years ago I rented out my former smaller apartment as you can see in my profile, therefor is it said to be suitable for 1 or 2 persons. We have stayed in our current apartment since fall 2017 and rent our beloved apartment out when we are on vacation.

Hope you like this Södermalm pearl as much as we do :)

name: Stort lyxigt rum 15 min till city
summary: Välkommen till ett stort lyxigt rum (30 m2) på eget våningsplan i en fin villa! Ni har tillgång till ett eget rum med en soffa, dubbelsäng, tv, garderob etc. Lugnt villaområdet 5 min från t-banan, 18 min in till city. Det finns parkeringsmöjlighet.
space: Detta är ett av två rum som vi hyr ut på eget våningsplan endast för gäster. Rummet är ca 30 kvm med en soffa, säng och TV. Tillgång till kitchenette för enklare matlagning med kokplatta, micro, vattenkokare och liten kyl. Allt är på en enskild våning så ni får en känsla av att ni har ert eget boende. Vi tillhandahåller lakan, handduk och hårtork.  Huset är beläget i ett väldigt lugnt, säkert och naturnära område men ändå bara 18 minuter med tunnelbana in till city. Tunnelbanan är endast en kort 5-min promenad från bostaden. Som gäst har ni även möjlighet till att parkera er bil utan någon extra kostnad. Två personer bor mycket bekvämt i detta rum.
description: Välkommen till ett stort lyxigt rum (30 m2) på eget våningsplan i en fin villa! Ni har tillgång till ett eget rum med en soffa, dubbelsäng, tv, garderob etc. Lugnt villaområdet 5 min från t-banan, 18 min in till city. Det finns parkeringsmöjlighet.
neighborhood_overview: Vårt hus ligger i ett väldigt lugnt och naturnära område nära till vattnet (Mälaren). Många fina områden där man kan motionera. Nära till välsorterad mataffär samt till ett par trevliga lokala restauranger och kaféer. Det tar endast en 18 minuter att åka till city med tunnelbana, 10-15 min med bil. Om man gillar långpromenader så kan man även  gå in till Stockholm city (ca 100 min)
transit: Till Centralstationen tar det en 18 minuter med tunnelbana.  Parkering finns att tillgå. Enkelt att ta sig till E4an om man har bil. Från Arlanda kan man ta Arlanda-express + tunnelbana (tar ca 45 min).
interaction: Vi är väldigt sociala personer men respekterar våra gästers privatliv samt lämnar gästerna ifred på den våningen där de bor. Vi är måna om att våra gäster känner att de trivs och att de får en trevlig upplevelse hos oss.
house_rules: Inga ytterskor inomhus. Inga våta handdukar på möbler eller i sängen. Hålla rent och snyggt på rummet och gemensamma utrymmen. Hög ljudnivå ej tillåtet efter kl 22.00. No guests allowed.
host_about:
Är en person som älskar god mat, resa, äventyr samt att tillbringa många härliga timmar med mina vänner och min familj.
Mitt motto är att upplevelser förgyller vardagen.

name: Spacious two-level apartment, nearby the water.
summary: Maybe you and your family want to spend a couple of summerweeks in Stockholm?  The sun is your friend in this beautiful and bright apartment at Södermalm. Take a stroll along the water or enjoy the city life at Götgatan just minutes away!
space: The apartment is from the funkis era, 1933, and we have just renovated it in style. The heart of the apartment is the bright and spacious living room/kitchen, where you have lots of space for cooking, dining and being together. The room also have a balcony with a nice view over the water and Stockholm Globe. Downstairs you also find the master bedroom, with a comfy  king size bed, two bathrooms and a working area. On the top floor there are three cosy bedrooms and a TV-room, in which it is  possible to convert the sofa into a bed for two persons.

We are happy to answer all your ques

This flat also gives you direct access to the parks and the water. We just love to go jogging along the lake, and after that - a swim!
transit: Transport communications are excellent. Bus 3 and 4 are located nearby and will take you into the city via Slussen. It is also walking distance to the metro station "Skanstull" wich is only five minutes to the central station.
access: The kitchen is fully equipped and has everything you need to cook a nice meal or breakfast. Dish washer, oven, microwave, blender. You are of course free to use our wi-fi.
interaction: We are happy to answer all your questions about our home and Stockholm via e-mail or telephone.
house_rules: Please don´t smoke in the apartment, since we have a baby girl (and three older sons). Please don´t bring a cat, due to allergy.
host_about: We´re from Stockholm, Sweden - Anna works as a culture journalist and Adam is an art director. We have four kids and love music, theatre, long distance running and spend a lot of time in the nature and by the sea.

name: Bright, modern family-friendly flat with balcony
summary: Our large, fully equipped, downtown flat is close to a big park and water and has high ceilings, big windows and a nice open-plan living space. The two spacious bedrooms have queen-sized beds (and one crib), making it perfect for a family or two couples.
space: Big open-space floor plan.
description: Our large, fully equipped, downtown flat is close to a big park and water and has high ceilings, big windows and a nice open-plan living space. The two spacious bedrooms have queen-sized beds (and one crib), making it perfect for a family or two couples. Big open-space floor plan. A balcony with lots of morning sun, wifi and a giant park at the end of our block. I'll do my best to get back to you within an hour, unless I'm catching some zzzzzzs! Fabulous location near Lake Mälaren, a big park, major subway and bus lines.  A block away from the blue and green subway lines, and blue buses 1, 3 and 4. There is also a direct bus which runs to and from Arlanda airport, taking 45 minutes. Our flat is family friendly and also works great for business travelers, especially those commuting out to northern Stockholm suburbs such as Kista. We are one block from the blue and green metro lines.
neighborhood_overview: Fabulous location near Lake Mälaren, a big park, major subway and bus lines.
notes: Our flat is family friendly and also works great for business travelers, especially those commuting out to northern Stockholm suburbs such as Kista. We are one block from the blue and green metro lines.

interaction: I'll do my best to get back to you within an hour, unless I'm catching some zzzzzzs!
house_rules: Our apartment is pretty sound proof but we ask you to keep noise levels down after midnight. Non-smokers preferred but if you must, please pollute yourself on the balcony! :-)
host_about: I am a California girl (with Taiwanese roots) living in Dallas with my Swedish husband and toddler son. I am an avid traveler, a journalist and a foodie. I avoid tourist traps and seek out local flavor anywhere I go. I love the spirit of Airbnb and have met many great people in this space so I look forward to hearing from you!

name: Flat in central & cosy Mariaberget
summary: Perfectly located in Södermalm, the south part of central Stockholm, I hope you will appreciate the atmosphere of our flat as much as we do. Cosy cafés, trendy shops and pittoresques neighbourhood are just around the corner of the street. Welcome home!
space: Located on the 4th floor, the flat is about 62 sqm and enjoys a pleasant light all day long. The open plan gives a very nice sense of space. You will sleep in a cosy double bed and get to see the stars from there through a roof window. After a day of visiting the city, the place is perfect to feel back home and rest towards a quiet neighborhood. In the morning, you can prepare your own smoothie and enjoy a breakfast with a very nice nordic light.
description: Perfectly located in Södermalm, the south part of central Stockholm, I hope you will appreciate the atmosphere of our flat as much as we do. You will sleep in a cosy double bed and get to see the stars from there through a roof window. After a day of visiting the city, the place is perfect to feel back home and rest towards a quiet neighborhood. In the morning, you can prepare your own smoothie and enjoy a breakfast with a very nice nordic light. Feel free to contact me by mail.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is ideal: right in the middle of the city but remote as it is situated on a hill. Don’t miss hidden pocket parks and amazing views on Mariaberget.
notes: We have a lot of plants home so please take care of them if you stay for a long period.
transit: From the airport take a taxi or Arlanda Express or bus to central station & Metro to Mariatorget. During your stay, we’d recommend biking ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) boats (sl.se) or walking!
access: Please enjoy the very nice courtyard to get a hint of Swedish lifestyle.
interaction: Feel free to contact me by mail.
host_about:
I am a young french architect. I like design and good atmosphere. 
You are very welcome to my home.

As central as it gets in Kista, 5 min walk to the subway station and the busses, 10 min walk to Sony Ericsson and all the other IT companies in Kista, 5 minutes walk to Kista gallerian, a huge mall full of all sorts of shops, restaurants, fitness centers and boutiques. Kista is called Silicon Valley of Scandinavia due to the fact that a huge number of IT companies have their headquarters there. It is one of the most vibrant, quickest expanding parts of Stockholm. Next door you also have the 'Järvafältet', one of Stockholm's biggest and most beautiful nature reserves, which is made for long walks and bike rides.

name: Charming place in central Stockholm
summary: This 60 sqm apartment (1 bedroom, living room, kitchen) with a south facing balcony is located in a quiet and wonderful part of Vasastan, a few steps from Vasaparken and with direct access to Stockholm's best coffee shops, restaurants and public transportation. It is the part-time home of an architect and a musician so if you enjoy a cultural atmosphere you've found the right place!
description: This 60 sqm apartment (1 bedroom, living room, kitchen) with a south facing balcony is located in a quiet and wonderful part of Vasastan, a few steps from Vasaparken and with direct access to Stockholm's best coffee shops, restaurants and public transportation. It is the part-time home of an architect and a musician so if you enjoy a cultural atmosphere you've found the right place! The neighbourhood boasts a great selection of restaurants, cafés, bars and shops as well as a beautiful park. The airport shuttle bus stops very close to our building so getting to and from Arlanda is quick and easy! You'll also have direct access to public transit, both subway and buses. The fastest way of getting to and from S:t Eriksplan is by using the staircase or elevator at the end of Vulcanusgatan. There is an additional staircase at the end of Völundsgatan.

neighborhood_overview: Vårt hus ligger i ett väldigt lugnt och naturnära område nära till vattnet (Mälaren). Många fina områden där man kan motionera. Nära till välsorterad mataffär samt till ett par trevliga lokala restauranger och ett kafé. Det tar endast en 18 minuter att åka till city med tunnelbana, 10-15 min med bil. Om man gillar långpromenader så kan man även gå in till Stockholm city (ca 100 min)
transit: Till Centralstationen tar det en 18 minuter med tunnelbana.  Parkering finns att tillgå Enkelt att ta sig till E4an om man har bil. Från Arlanda kan man ta Arlanda-express + tunnelbana (tar ca 45 min).
access: Eget badrum för gäster.  Parkering. Köket på övre våningen kan användas någon enstaka gång efter avstämning med oss
interaction: Vi är väldigt sociala personer men respekterar våra gästers privatliv samt lämnar gästerna ifred på den våningen där de bor. Vi är måna om att våra gäster känner att de trivs och att de får en trevlig upplevelse hos oss.
house_rules: Inga ytterskor inomhus. Inga våta handdukar på möbler eller i sängen. Hög ljudnivå ej tillåtet efter kl 22.00. Hålla snyggt och rent på rummet och gemensamma utrymmen. No guests allowed.
host_about:
Är en person som älskar god mat, resa, äventyr samt att tillbringa många härliga timmar med mina vänner och min familj.
Mitt motto är att upplevelser förgyller vardagen.

name: Spacious 3BR in central Stockholm!
summary: Our home is situated on Sodermalm in the beautiful heart of Stockholm! Only minutes away you find green parks, beautiful waters, restaurants, shops, cinemas and bars, as well as public transportation.  Available July 25-August 8!
space: Our apartment is spacious (90 sqm) and light with a large living room, a modern kitchen with dining space, one big bathroom with bathtub and washing possibilities and one small bathroom. The master bedroom has a king-sized bed and the child's bedroom has a full size bed.  The third bedroom is an office/guest room with computers with internet access and a foldout sofa bed.  There is plenty of space to set up extra beds if needed.  Balcony from child's bedroom facing a wonderful green yard.

There is plenty of space to set up extra beds if needed.  Balcony from child's bedroom facing a wonderful green yard. Please, feel free to use all our household utilities, soap, shampoo, food, anything you need!  We want you to feel right at home! neighborhood_overview: Our home is situated on Sodermalm in the beautiful heart of Stockholm! Only minutes away you find green parks, beautiful waters, restaurants, shops, cinemas and bars, as well as public transportation.
notes: NOTE  Due to renovations of the building facades we keep a low price.  Our building will finish in June, but the work will continue on the neighbouring buildings and our yard will not be available for barbecues this summer. The children's playground is still intact though!
transit: The nearest 3 subway stops (Mariatorget, Medborgarplatsen, Skanstull) are only at 5 min walking distance and city buses even closer. Outside our door is a nice park with playground and pic-nic opportunities. From Stockholm it's always easy to take a boat trip within the city or why not a 24 hour trip to Finland!
access: Please, feel free to use all our household utilities, soap, shampoo, food, anything you need!  We want you to feel right at home!
house_rules: Visiting guests will be responsible for tidying up and leaving the home in the same condition as when they arrived, including taking off dirty sheets from all used beds. No thorough cleaning necessary.
host_about:
Hello! 
We are a professional couple with a wonderful 10-year old daughter, Wilma. 
Nevil (44) is an IT manager and Katrin (43) is a social worker. 
Like most people we like to spend time with family and friends, and of course we love to travel the world. 
We love living in Stockholm and would like to share our beautiful capital with you!

summary: Room with comfortable bed 140x200 in a very unique 2-room cultural apt in a house built 1761. access to the whole apartment incl TV, wifi, fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher and bath. You will have access to the whole apartment but be private only in the bedroom that you rent. If I am not at home, day or night, you will have the whole space. I will be happy to assist with ideas what to see and do in Stockholm, and how to get there. If you miss to take a free map at the SL-Center when you buy your bus/metro/ferry pass, I will give you one. I love the ancient atmosphere and tranquility of the old houses and cobble stoned street up here on the hills of City South.  Peace and quiet in the liv
neighborhood_overview: I love the ancient atmosphere and tranquility of the old houses and cobble stoned street up here on the hills of City South.  Peace and quiet in the living area and full speed commerce, bars, cafes and restaurants just three minutes down the hill! Also I like that we have a very nice Pub up here on the other side of my block. And another just down the hill.
notes: Walk my city and enjoy beautiful and well kept buildings everywhere in town. Take a boat trip under Stockholm bridges and out in our famous archipelago with guiding - don't miss it! Also enjoy the Changing of the Guards at the Royal Castle in the Old Town, every day at 12.15.
transit: It is very Close to buses and the metro. Super communications.
access: You will have access to the whole apartment but be private only in the bedroom that you rent. If I am not at home, day or night, you will have the whole space.
interaction: I will be happy to assist with ideas what to see and do in Stockholm, and how to get there. If you miss to take a free map at the SL-Center when you buy your bus/metro/ferry pass, I will give you one.
house_rules: Polite and friendly, hopefully also curious! No animals or small children.
host_about:
Jag heter Siw men kallas för Siwa som även icke-svenskar kan säga utan problem, född o uppvuxen i Stockholm. Mitt hem är en unik charmig kulturmärkt tvåa på Mariaberget i Stockholm med tre mindre etage inne. Jag har egen vacker ingång direkt från kullerstenarna, mörkgrön/brun dubbel trädörr med två runda kajutafönster.

Förutom argentinsk tango är mina härliga två sondöttrar livets stora plus. Skidåkning utför, matlagning, cykla, bio, läsa, lösa knepiga korsord, resa etc. Nu höftopererad och time out från tango och skidåkning ett tag.

Jag sover i bäddsoffan utanför sovrummet. 
Om det känns obekvämt och mycket högre grad av integritet är viktig,  rekommenderar jag att boka ett större boende eller en lägenhet!

Mitt boende ligger på ett berg, alltså gående uppför från huvudgata, kommers och alla kommunikationer. Dessutom leder en trappa med 13 steg upp till min lilla gränd och min dörr. Inne i lägenheten leder fyra trappsteg ner till v-rum och angränsande uthyrningsrum. Till toalett och badrum är det sex trappsteg ner! 
OBS! Ej barn- eller handikappvänligt alltså!

Jag kommer att göra allt för att mina gäster ska ha det bekvämt och känna sig hemma och få bästa möjliga utbyte av sitt besök i min vackra stad.
Keep an open mind and live in the moment!
Siwa

neighborhood_overview: Södermalm, often shortened as “Söder” (South), is the liveliest district of central Stockholm with a vibrant nightlife. It is full of restaurants, bars and cafés.  And music for all tastes;  Debaser and Strand with the latest, Folkoperan and Göta Lejon with musicals, jazz at the restaurant Louis and last but not least Mosebacke with its wide variety of music and theatre and a large open-air café, just to mention a few popular places. There are also many art galleries, cinemas, theatres, museums as well as a wide range of small and big shops. You can walk along the water or up on the mountain side while enjoying the fabulous view of the city and the harbour. Needless to say, Söder is a popular place to live. Many artists and actors, politicians and business people populate this district, as well as many other great and creative people. In total there are ov (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) habitants.

summary: Longer term rental offered for the coming year on bright and airy full furnished studio sized room (20 plus square meters) with plenty of room for the work space and dining table, its own balcony facing south and west, a separate fully equipped kitchen, free wifi and fiberoptic internet, printer, hardwood floors throughout,  bath with tub, spacious communal laundry just down the stairs, garden and pic nic area out back... Close to town and to nature! Lovely balcony facing southwest gets sunlight all day long.  Furnished with leather sofa and easy chair, writing desk, printer, etc... Kitchen, bathroom, laundry facilities, barbecue in the yard... As much or as little interaction as you like.  I rent out this room when I am out of town.  The other flatmate in the place is also often out of town, but she is a friendly person who speaks english and french as well as swedish and likes meeting travellers.  She is the one who recommended to me that we do this listing. It is close to the city,
neighborhood_overview: It is close to the city, but it is also close to the country.  All the local shops you need (supermarket, pharmacy, 7-11, pizzeria and even a 24 hour sport club...) are two minutes walk away, but so are the woods which lead into the huge Nacka Reserve, the largest natural reserve in the area.   And, this is one of those areas where progressive minded, friendly people live, the kind of people you can talk to in line at the local market.
transit: Yes, the tunnelbarna or metro station is three minutes walk from your doorstep.  It is then five minutes to Södermalm, the hip district, and another five to downtown.
access: Kitchen, bathroom, laundry facilities, barbecue in the yard...
interaction: As much or as little interaction as you like.  I rent out this room when I am out of town.  The other flatmate in the place is also often out of town, but she is a friendly person who speaks english and french as well as swedish and likes meeting travellers.  She is the one who recommended to me that we do this listing.
house_rules: Be nice and don't trash the place.  When the part time house mate is in town for a week or 10 days at a time, be nice to him and don't leave dirty dishes or pots and pans lying around overnight.
host_about: I am an american who divides his time between my two favorite cities in Europe, Paris and Stockholm.  I have a two room apartment in both towns and, in order to keep them both, I have a roommate in each town.  And, when I am away from either town, I make my room available for short term rentals.  I am an actor, a singer (lyric tenor), and a sometime consultant in performance skills for the business community.  So, I do what I can to get by.  Both of my places are lovely spots.  The Stockholm apartment is a little more in nature in a part of town where many artists and progressive type people live because it is close to town but still affordable.  The Paris apartment is right in a busy central Paris district so you are right in the heart of town and feel its pulse.  I am always available on (Hidden by Airbnb) if ever any problems come up, but you also usually have a nice roommate down the hall to give you any advice you need about navigating either of these two fabulous cities to live in.

neighborhood_overview: Near to Djurgården, Östemalm and Karlaplan. There is a large air-open museum and zoo in Djurgården, called Skansen. There is also a royal residence (Rosendal Palace) built for King Karl XIV Johan, is an outstanding example of Swedish Empire style. The Östermalm is a very heart of the Stockholm with tons of restaurants, museum, shopping and of course nightlife.
transit: 1 minute to the bus station (buss 1), 10 minutes to subway station (Gärdet). By buss it takes 5 mintutes to Karlaplan, 10 minutes to Stureplan and 15 minutes to Cityterminalen. By subway it takes just 7 minutes to T-Centralen.
access: Spacious and sunny 56 m2 apartment in the Gärdet. 3rd floor with 2 elevators. A large kitchen with all utensils, oven, hob, refrigerator, boiler, microwave etc. Shower and toilette with towels.  Bedroom with king size (200cm x 160cm) bed and 3 wardrobes.  Living room with 42-Inch 1080p TV. Facilities include:  Internet, 100 Mbit Wi-Fi. Bed linen and towels. Flat iron, hairdryer and all other stuff (contact us if you need something specific). There is a free of charge laundry room in the building next door. There are a two washing machines, two drying cabinets and a drying machine.
interaction: Contact us, whenever you have any questions.
house_rules: No special rules except for smoking (smoking is forbidden), just  leave the apartment in move-in condition, so common sense will do :)
host_about: I am a civil engineer. I love to travel, to meet other people and to learn other cultures.  I am a very social person who like to take contact with new people.

name: Modern 2 bedroom apt in Hornstull
summary: Welcome to our home in the heart of trendy Hornstull! The apartment is suitable for up to six guests.  It has one large bed for two and a day-bed that can turn into a single or double bed. There is also an inflatable bed for two and a crib.
space: Welcome to our home in the heart of Hornstull! The apartment is suitable for up to four guests but can accommodate six if necessary. It has one large bed for two and a day-bed that can turn into a single or double bed. There is also an inflatable bed for two that can be used in the living room. In addition, there is a crib bed which makes your stay here very comfortable if you bring small children. There is a nice work space with a computer you can use and a comfortable chair. The apartment offers 70 nicely furnished square meters with a balcony and a fully equipped kitchen that includes amenities such as; regular oven, microwave oven, dishwasher (tablets included), toaster, kettle, blender, coffee maker, nespresso machine etc. The dining area can easily fit six people. The bathroom is top notch and has a bath tub. It is also equipped with both washing machine and tumble-drier.  Throughout the apartment you can access free WiFi. The area of Hornstull, located on the island of Södermalm

name: 2 bedroom apt in trendy Södermalm
summary: Take a morning swim before exploring trendy Södermalm or Stockholms most famous places. My home has the perfect location for both. 200 meter to beach, 1 min to bus, 4 min to Metro, 3 min to City line/Commuter train. Welcome to my cozy comfortable home.
space: You´ll find a 78 sqm apartment white and bright - perfect located home. 2 bedrooms with comfortable beds (master bedroom bed 125 cm, second bedroom 110 cm bed), kitchen and living room in an open solution, sunny balcony, big bathroom  (washing machine and tumble dryer, bathtub) – altogether a perfect retreat close to nature, beach, communications and citylife! Explore Stockholm and trendy Södermalm - and rest your legs in my comfortable home and just some blocks away you´ll find popular cafées, shops and restaurants.  In fact you can take a morning swim 2 min away at newly renovated Tantobadet, (Tanto beach)  or a morning run on the seaside before you enter the busy citylife and all exciting things to explore in Stockholm. The apartment is fully furnished and has everything you may need.  The kitchen has dishwashing machine.  Everything is well kept. The apartment, situated on the 3rd floor, with elevator, is located in a quiet area – and still you can take the bus outside the house, d
description: Take a morning swim before exploring trendy Södermalm or Stockholms most famous places. My home has the perfect location for both. 200 meter to beach, 1 min to bus, 4 min to Metro, 3 min to City line/Commuter train. Welcome to my cozy comfortable home. You´ll find a 78 sqm apartment white and bright - perfect located home. 2 bedrooms with comfortable beds (master bedroom bed 125 cm, second bedroom 110 cm bed), kitchen and living room in an open solution, sunny balcony, big bathroom  (washing machine and tumble dryer, bathtub) – altogether a perfect retreat close to nature, beach, communications and citylife! Explore Stockholm and trendy Södermalm - and rest your legs in my comfortable home and just some blocks away you´ll find popular cafées, shops and restaurants.  In fact you can take a morning swim 2 min away at newly renovated Tantobadet, (Tanto beach)  or a morning run on the seaside before you enter the busy citylife and all exciting things to explore in Stockholm. The apartment
neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect. Quiet and relaxed. Close to perfect morningrun at the seaside and maybe a short swim at the beach - and then all transportation just around the corner! You´ll find so many popular designer shops and bars just some blocks away - or downtown citylife with busstop outside the house, or Metro some blocks away...
notes: Two of my grown up daughters lives opposite the street and would there be any problem they can be helpful to find a solution, so can my son who also lives in Stockholm.
transit: Busstop outside the house (Bus 55 takes around 15 min to downtown Stockholm), Commuter train station Södra station (Stockholm South) is 2-3 min  walk away, Metro Zinkensdamm, 4 min walk away. And Commuter train takes you directly to Arlanda - and from. Just walk 3 blocks to my home from station Stockholm Södra! Easy and cheapest way to and from the airport.  When arriving on Terminal 5 - just go (a short walk) to Sky City/Terminal 4 and to the desk for tickets for Commuter Train - and 45 minutes later you´re at Stockholms Södra - and just some blocks from my home!
access: Wifi  One block away You can lend Stockholm City Bikes - for free,  during 3 hours! And hire them for more days for a low cost. Now also electric bikes. You also have access to a wonderful sunny courtyard.
interaction: Living in central Stockholm for many years makes me hopefully to a good guide to different places worth visiting and being a frequent traveller myself I know how valuable it is to get really good advices from "natives"!
house_rules: No smoking (not even on balcony because of neighbours), no parties and no pets. No music after 10 pm. No shoes on my white floors! Leave them at the doorstep.
host_about:
I´m a journalist specialised on design, culture & philosophy of life. I am also producing films, writing books and feature for magazines.
I like to travel, both in my work and privately. My latest job journey was to Burma where I spent a month. I´va also done job journeys to countries like Kongo-Kinshasa, Burkina Faso and Kenya.
Summertime I never travel! – and  always spend in Smögen, an idyllic little island in the famous Swedish Westcoast Archipelago.  I love everything connected to the Sea – kayaking and sailing for example.
Wintertime I do longskating on the lakes, if possible – just as many stockholmers! And cross country skiing.
I´m a very social person who likes to do things together with friends, my grown-up children and nowadays grandchildren! I´m also active in NGO´s who fight xenophobia.
Persons who visit my home will notice the trace of my job journeys around the world. All these things reminds me of fantastic people I met!
Welcome!

Jag är journalist med fokus på livsåskådning, design och kultur. Jag producerar också filmer, skriver böcker och gör magasin.
Jag tycker om att resa, både i jobbet och privat. Har senast varit en månad i Burma/Myanmar och skriver nu om det. Gjort reportageresor i t ex Kongo-Kinshasa, Burkina Faso och Kenya.
Sommartid tillbringar jag alltid på Smögen, en idyllisk skärgårdsö på västkusten. Älskar allt som har med hav att göra. Paddlar gärna kajak och seglar. 
Vintertid åker jag gärna långfärdsskridskor – liksom väldigt många i Stockholm. Och skidor.
Är en aktiv person med vänner, barn och barnbarn – och engagerad i allt som motverkar främlingsfientlighet. 
Den som kommer hem till mig kommer se hur mina resor i världen satt sina spår i saker och ting. Och de påminner mig om fantastiska människor jag mött. 
Välkommen!

With just a 10 minute walk from the central station, the shopping street "Drottninggatan" and just Västermalmsgallerian round the corner. There are restaurants on every corner from every kitchen in the world.
