name: Apartment of 55 sqm on Kungsholmen!
summary: This apartment is located in Fredhäll, Kungsholmen. The apartment is equipped with a terrass bathing in sun from morning to evening. The lake Mälaren where you can swim is just nearby.
space: The apartment has a size of 55 square meters and contains a bedroom and a kitchen which is combined with a dining and TV area. The separate bedroom is adjacent to the terrace where you can sunbathe and eat your breakfast. The bed is 160 centimeter wide and comfortably fits 2. I also have two extra mattresses so the apartment can give room for 4 people in total. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher including. There is also a bathroom with shower.
description: This apartment is located in Fredhäll, Kungsholmen. The apartment is equipped with a terrass bathing in sun from morning to evening. The lake Mälaren where you can swim is just nearby. The apartment has a size of 55 square meters and contains a bedroom and a kitchen which is combined with a dining and TV area. The separate bedroom is adjacent to the terrace where you can sunbathe and eat your breakfast. The bed is 160 centimeter wide and comfortably fits 2. I also have two extra mattresses so the apartment can give room for 4 people in total. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher including. There is also a bathroom with shower. Internet access. Sheets and shampoo will be available but bring your own bath towel. The accommodation is fully provided for you. I will not be there except when I leave the key for you. I gladly recommend restaurants, bars, shops, second hand stores and other activities nearby and around town if you ask.  The area is located just near the heart of Sto
neighborhood_overview: The area is located just near the heart of Stockholm and is close to parks, beach and subway. The neighborhood is beautiful, quiet and green. The lake Mälaren where you can swim just around the corner. One of Stockholm's largest parks is 10 minutes walking distance away. There you can barbecue and drink beer, work out at the outdoor gym and play boules.  I have very nice neighbors, but they do not like loud music late at night or very early in the morning.
notes: You can buy metro card at all subway stations. The card gives you access to the entire subway system and all busses in town. 100 SEK is about 4 trips/person.
transit: It's quick and easy to get to the city center by subway. It takes 6 minutes to walk to the nearest station and 10 minutes by subway into town. There are also buses and rental bikes. If you want you can also have a nice walk by the lake to the southern parts of town, (Södermalm) in 15 minutes. From the Airport: Arlanda - Buss or train takes you to the city center. There you switch to the subway, Green Line, and jumps off at Kristineberg, which is 7 stops. Skavsta - Bus to the city center and them the same subway as above.
access: Internet access. Sheets and shampoo will be available but bring your own bath towel.
interaction: The accommodation is fully provided for you. I will not be there except when I leave the key for you. I gladly recommend restaurants, bars, shops, second hand stores and other activities nearby and around town if you ask.
house_rules: Please do not smoke inside the apartment but as much as you want on the terrace if you keep clean!
host_about:
From Stockholm.
I like strolling around and love to eat good food.

name: Airy studio with balcony in Soho
summary: Airy apartment in the heart of Stockholm Soho 100 m from to the best bars, designer stores and coffee shops! 15 minutes walk to Gamla Stan towards the city center. 5 minutes walk to the the water, great for swiming or running! 50 m to closest park!
space: The kitchen is great for hanging out cooking together and the balcony will offer you evening sun while enjoying a glass of wine!  The space is perfect for sharing 2 people (120 cm bed) but also works perfectly fine for 3 people while using the bed-sofa (90 cm bed) The flat was totally renovated 2012 and everything holds a top standard!

The kitchen is great for hanging out cooking together and the balcony will offer you evening sun while enjoying a glass of wine! Next/close to: -  Nytorget (bars, restaurant, designer shops) -  Maria Torget (bars, restaurants) - Medborgarplatsen (food market/flowers) - Globen (15 min walk, 5 min metro) - Fotografiska (biggest photo museum)   - Royal Castle (3km meters) - The Old City (3km meters) SUPERMARKET There are several big supermarkets close by with fair prices and long opening hours.  EATING OUT 100 meters in any direction you
neighborhood_overview: Next/close to: -  Nytorget (bars, restaurant, designer shops) -  Maria Torget (bars, restaurants) - Medborgarplatsen (food market/flowers) - Globen (15 min walk, 5 min metro) - Fotografiska (biggest photo museum)   - Royal Castle (3km meters) - The Old City (3km meters) SUPERMARKET There are several big supermarkets close by with fair prices and long opening hours.  EATING OUT 100 meters in any direction you will find both cosy and luxurious restaurants and bars and a lot of ecological/raw food places!  SHOPPING (within 0-5 minutes) - Soho (designer shops and markets) - Götgatan (big shopping street) (0 min walk) - Ringen (bigger stores like H&M etc)  SHOPPING CLOSE BY - Old town (souvenirs) (15 minutes walk) - "NK" (luxurious mall, international brands)  (10 minutes metro, green line)  - "Gallerian" (big mall) (10 minutes metro, green line)  - Bibliotkesgatan (COS, Filippa K, Acne etc) (15 minutes metro, red line)
notes: There is no washing machine in the flat. There is a dry cleaner just across the house for longer stays.
transit: 500 meter to Slussen, one of the biggest connection points for all Stockholm traffic. Also the place for taking a boat ride to Djurgåren or busses anywhere!  The apartment is 4 stops from the central station where you are easily connected to airport-busses/trains or international buslines as well as trains!
access: The guests are welcome to use the full flat and balcony. The building does not have any extra shared areas unfortunately.
interaction: As a guest you are very welcome to contact me for any questions or tips for the city! I will love to tell you my favorite restaurants or museums or other things to see in the city that is in your interest.  Don't hesitate to contact me also for practical things such as buying tickets, I am always available by phone and ready to help!
house_rules: - no pets - no smoking - no parties  - no unannounced guests (please ask me)
host_about:
I love travelling and I prefer to choose Airbnb for staying all over the world! I have been living and working in Stockholm since 2013 and was previosuly living in Barcelona and Buenos Aires! 

I am currently working as the Head of Production at a Swedish fashion brand after 3 years studies in Borås at the Swedish School of Textiles. 

On top of that I love hanging out with friends from different cultures and preferably cooking together! I really welcome you to enjoy my kitchen along with the rest of the apartment! 

CIAO!

name: Family house 35 min from center
summary: Our house is located 35 minutes by metro from "Gamla Stan" the historical center of Stockholm. The capacity is 7 people (+ air bed)
space: The surface of the house is around 160 m2: three bedrooms, a large living room  kitchen and a second living room used as "Movie room" and extra bedroom. The large bedroom at the first flour with a 160x200 cm wide bed and a baby cot (foldable). The room/office of the ground floor is having a 90x200 cm bed but there is the possibility of adding an extra air bed. There is a 200x200 cm bed in the room downstairs. Finally, there is a bed sofa of 140x200 cm in the "Cinema Room" (it's no the most confortable one).
description: Our house is located 35 minutes by metro from "Gamla Stan" the historical center of Stockholm. The capacity is 7 people (+ air bed) The surface of the house is around 160 m2: three bedrooms, a large living room  kitchen and a second living room used as "Movie room" and extra bedroom. The large bedroom at the first flour with a 160x200 cm wide bed and a baby cot (foldable). The room/office of the ground floor is having a 90x200 cm bed but there is the possibility of adding an extra air bed. There is a 200x200 cm bed in the room downstairs. Finally, there is a bed sofa of 140x200 cm in the "Cinema Room" (it's no the most confortable one). Guests have access to the entire house and its equipment, but also the barbecue. We offer our home when we are travelling ourselves but off course you will be greeted by our friends/neighbors for the delivery of the keys and the inventory. The neighborhood is very quiet and has three small groups of houses . Each group is composed of about 12 houses. Th
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very quiet and has three small groups of houses . Each group is composed of about 12 houses. The car park is located at the entrance of the residence (and there is a sign marked as private). It is possible to come and park temporarily in front of the house to unload luggage for exemple.
transit: Gamla Stan ( the Old Town ) is located 14 km away from the house . As in all large cities, it's better to use communal transportation. You can get a travel which cost 330 kr for a full week included all buss, metro and even some boats in Stockholm and the surrounding (840 for a month). If you prefer the car , the city center is 20 minutes by car and you will find parking place (a little bit expensive). There is an entry fee to enter and leave the city (automatic camera, not weekends). The nearest metro station is "Vårberg" and is located 7 minutes walking. The direction to the city is " Ropsten ." To return , take the red line 13 towards " Norsborg ."
access: Guests have access to the entire house and its equipment, but also the barbecue.
interaction: We offer our home when we are travelling ourselves but off course you will be greeted by our friends/neighbors for the delivery of the keys and the inventory.
house_rules: As Airbnb is mainly based on trust between hosts and guests, it is important to make that the house is clean for those who come after your visit . Thank you for telling me quickly if you find that something is not working or is degraded . We provide linen, towels but we will kindly ask you to wash them before you leave if other visitors are coming before we are back. The laundry is of course available for your personal washing as well.
host_about:
We live in Stockholm, Sweden and we really love this city. We have a son who was born i June 2011 and a second one born in November 2014. They are so lovely. We like to travel and we are using Airbnb on a regular base. 
You are welcome to visite our studio in La Ciotat or our house in Stockholm!

name: Bright one room-flat near centre
summary: My cozy apartment is situated right next to the famous Ericsson Globe - only 10 minutes away from the city centre by metro. This is a calm area where the flat is located between the metro stations Globen (2 minutes by walk) and Gullmarsplan (5 min by walk) where you can find supermarkets, shopping and bus communications to all of Stockholm.
space: In my first floor apartment you'll find a substantial kitchen and a living room with bright light intake. You will sleep in the bedroom cubicle that functions as a separate room. You can find an extra bed under the cubicle if needed. My flat is LGBT and vegan friendly.
description: My cozy apartment is situated right next to the famous Ericsson Globe - only 10 minutes away from the city centre by metro. This is a calm area where the flat is located between the metro stations Globen (2 minutes by walk) and Gullmarsplan (5 min by walk) where you can find supermarkets, shopping and bus communications to all of Stockholm. In my first floor apartment you'll find a substantial kitchen and a living room with bright light intake. You will sleep in the bedroom cubicle that functions as a separate room. You can find an extra bed under the cubicle if needed. My flat is LGBT and vegan friendly. WIFI is included. ! Message me if you need access to a sauna, laundry or a bigger storage when you are booking ! A calm green territory that's close (5 minutes by walk) to both Ericsson Globe and Gullmarsplan where you can find everything you need - supermarkets, shopping, restaurants, pharmacies and entertainment (maybe your favorite artist is playing in the Globe while you're stayin

name: Charming, soulful house Stockholm city Älvsjö fair
summary: Charmig villa i Stockholm nära city. Lugna kvarter och bra kommunikationer. Närhet till badsjö, lekparker och skogen.  Trädgård med damm Det finns ett stort kök/allrum (40m) där alla kan umgås och ha det bra tillsammans.  Nära Älvsjömässan
space: En rymlig och charmig villa i Älvsjö som är byggt 1911 och har haft en kontinuerlig renovering under de senaste åren. Badrum, hall och kök/vardagsrum har golvvärme. Vi har bott i huset sedan 1993 och trivs verkligen, både i huset och i omgivningarna och med närhet till innerstaden. 200 meter från huset finns en fin skog med motionsspår och mer vild natur. 1 km från huset finns en underbar badsjö, både med sandstrand, bryggor och klippor. Lekparker mataffärer och caféer finns i området. Huset har ett stort gemensamt kök/allrum (40 m2) samt 3 sovrum och plats för 5 sängar. Trädgården är sommarens uterum och här finns det grill, utekök och en damm med en vattentrappa. Guestrecommendations: Niklas et sa famille sont des h¥tes charmants, aidants et attentifs. Leur maison est tr®s jolie et tr®s agr©able. Elle est spacieuse (chambres, salon, cuisine) et a un mignon jardin. Le quartier est bien desservi par les transports en commun. Nous sommes ravies de notre s©jour chez eux. Nous recommandon

name: Charming house with heated pool
summary: Nice and large house close to Globen, Södermalm and Stockholm city.  Suitable for families. Many bedrooms, bathrooms and large social areas.   Nice garden with pool, next to the forest and still only 14 minutes by subway to Stockholm Central station.
space: The house has 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (one with sauna and jacuzzi), large social areas such as a living room (45 sqm) with sofas, TV, a grand piano and a fireplace, and a big kitchen. Four of the bedrooms are situated on the top floor. Situated at the end of the street, next to the forest, you will feel like beeing on the countryside, even though it's close to everything. After a 10 minutes walk to the subway station (Sockenplan), it takes 14 minutes to the central station. The garden is perfect for both adults and kids with several terraces, flat lawn, a pool (with roof which you can open), trampoline, table tennis, a small outdoor gym, etc.
description: Nice and large house close to Globen, Södermalm and Stockholm city.  Suitable for families. Many bedrooms, bathrooms and large social areas. neighborhood_overview: Vi är 2 vuxna och 3 barn (nu 9, 13 och 14 år) som bor i huset. Vi har bott här sedan 2008. Vi älskar både vårt hus och området! Grannarna är trevliga och hjälpsamma, det är grönt och lummigt, lugnt och skönt och ändå när till allt.
notes: Ingen rökning eller husdjur tillåts. När pooltaket är stängt behöver man inte vara orolig för barnen.  Taket stängs och öppnas med nyckel. Taktdelarna är lätta för vuxna att dra åt sidan, men för tunga för barn. Lakan och handdukar kostar 200 kr per person. Ingen kostnad för bokningar på mer än 7 dagar.
transit: Parking for 2 cars.  Close to the subway to go to city. 10-15 min by bike to Södermalm.
access: Stor trädgård med uppvärmd pool, lek/klätter/gymställning. Skyddat läge mot skogen.
interaction: Telefon, sms och e-post. Ibland på plats personligen, annars möter någon annan upp vid in- och utcheckning.
house_rules: No shoes inside!  When you’re wet from the pool, use the entrance downstairs to the bathroom.

name: Charming Apt in Heart of Stockholm
summary: A quiet oasis in trendy Södermalm from the 1800s: turn-of-the-century details and charm including a private 28 m2 outdoor area for lazy summer evenings, and a wood-burning stove to cozy up to in winter.  Shopping and entertainment outside front door.
space: A beautiful oasis in trendy Södermalm from the 1800s with turn-of-the-century details and charm including a private 28 m2 outdoor area for lazy summer evenings, and a wood-burning stove to cozy up to in winter.  Shopping and entertainment around the corner and a pedestrian walkway outside the front-door. We are a family of four who love it here and believe that you will, too! We love travel and have both lived and worked in West Africa, South East Asia, the Near East and Europe before moving to Stockholm 6 years ago. One of us is even brought up in a Bead and Breakfast in Montreal :). The apartment is equipped with free-Wifi and a TV. The kitchen is fully equipped. Laundry is done in a pre-booking laundry room one floor down. Layout: Total 68 m2 (minus one room that will be closed off). A large living room with a large dining area and sofa/lounging area. There is a double bedroom with a double-bed and ample clothes-storage. The other room is a single room with one single-bed. One bathr

neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood Our Oasis is centrally located in Södermalm, voted as a top destination for travel in 2014 by the Financial Times. Södermalm is an island in the middle of Stockholm that is very hip and known as the setting for the popular Millennium trilogies by Stieg Larsson. Södermalm even has its own beach and also hilled-areas to go to for picnics and beautiful views of the entire city. Södermalm is great for people who enjoy outdoor concerts, food from around the world (and great meatballs, too, of course ;)), picnics, wandering, adventure, playgrounds… Around the corner are: Mosebacke Park with delicious weekend jazz-brunches, evening concerts and theatre inside and out; Medborgarplatsen with numerous outdoor restaurants and bars,  Götgatsbacken - a pedestrian road lined with cafes and shops and street-musicians. Our oasis is also a 5-minute walk to Slussen, which is a transportation-hub and where boats can be taken out to the archipelago. Gamla Stan (‘the Old City’), is an enjo
transit: Public transportation: Medborgarplatsen; less than one walk minute away. Slussen; a 3 minute walk away to Slussens bus-terminal, commuter-trains and boats. Bicycles:  A rent-a-bike station is a one-minute walk away. Boat:  10 minute walk to boats that go out to the Archipelago and also to  Skepssholmen, where the Architecture Museum and Modern Museum and to Djurgården, home of: famous ‘Gröna Lund’ amusement park, the open air museum/zoo Skansen, the Wasa museum, the National History Museum, and especially loved by children…Pippi Longstocking’s creator Astrid Lindgren museum ‘Junibacken’. Foot:  We include this because we are so central and Stockholm really is a city to be enjoyed while walking or on a boat!
access: You will have access to the entire apartment apart from one smaller room where our stuff will be placed to be out of your way!
interaction: We will not be here during your stay. You will of course have everything promised waiting for you when you arrive.
house_rules: House Rules We are pretty easy-going and like the idea of people enjoying our home and the city. However, the booking will be considered cancelled by you immediately if any of the following rules are not followed: We have a cat that we have adjusted the price of rental for. We expect therefore the cat to be fed and treated well! No smoking inside at all. If you smoke in the outdoor area you must pick up after yourself and not leave cigarette buts on the ground/in plants. No pets. No parties or loud noises/volume after 22hr (10pm).  No additional guests or social gatherings/parties in the property unless otherwise agreed. You will leave the Property in good condition. Final cleaning is included in the price, but you are expected to strip beds, wash up dirty dishes, take away garbage etc. If essential repairs are needed during your stay, us or a representative of ours will have access to the apartment at any reasonable time.
host_about: Living in Sweden and like to travel with my family :)!

name: Two large rooms close to subway
summary: Large bright rooms in a 155 sqm 6 room apartment right by the subway . 9 minutes ride to the trendy Södermalm district, 17 minutes to the central station . Restaurants and local amenities on your doorstep.
space: At the top of this three-story house built 1954 is this spacious old vicarage with a square in front of the house and lush trees behind . Three minutes walk behind the house leads to a huge park with plenty of playgrounds for children of all ages. You get your own toilet, but will have to take showers/baths in the familys bathroom. During the summer, we are almost always at our country house which is only half an hour away from home . From April to November, we are usually there even on the weekends. Very quiet apartment but the closeness to the subway makes you hear it when it passes by.

Du kommer att älska mitt ställe på grund av utsikten, läget, utrymmet utomhus, närhet till puls men i lugnt parkområde. Närheten till Götgatan och hippa Nytorget i kombination till lugnet och grönskan i trevliga Rosenlundsparken gör detta boende unikt. Alla ytor i lägenheten med full köksutrustning och möjlighet att tvätta kläder i badrummet. 1 garderob för upphängning av kläder är tillgänglig medan resterande garderober är privat. Enkel och smidig kommunikation då det endast är ett par minuters promenad till tunnelbanan/busshållplats/pendeltågsstation.  Möjlighet till parkering är god då det alltid finns platser lediga i princip utanför porten, avgift mellan 09:00 - 17:00 vardagar.

name: Modern apartment in Stockholm
summary: New modern apartment with high living standards. Open spaces in rooms and luxurios designs. Great view to wake up to from the balcony where you can enjoy a morning coffe looking out at kista "silicon valley"
space: A nice room in a newly built apt. with high standards in Kista a.k.a. "silicon valley". Great view  from balcony and close to city(16min with subway)
description: New modern apartment with high living standards. Open spaces in rooms and luxurios designs. Great view to wake up to from the balcony where you can enjoy a morning coffe looking out at kista "silicon valley"
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful parks with great walking areas. Lovely neighbours. 5min walk to one of sweden's biggest malls, "kista galleria". In the mall you can find: -an amzing food court with food from all corners of the world -a huge cinema -go cart indoors -hundred's of clothes shops and shoe stores -many different cafė's -parking garage -gym's You can also find universities and it-companies all around the area.  With a 5 minute walk from the apartment you get to the subway that takes you to the city (T-centralen) in 16 minutes.
notes: You can rent a room and share apartment with me for a few days. ;)
transit: 25min drive to airport, Arlanda. 5min walk from house to subway or the mall. 16min with subway to the city.
access: Furnished apt. Kitchen utilities. Washing machine for clothes. Wifi, tv, and all other utilities.
interaction: I am very easy going and socialize with my guests if they want to. I am open to having interesting conversations but also respect your privacy if you wish. Either way you will have a pleasant stay here ;)
house_rules: Keep it clean and enjoy your stay :)
host_about: I am working in sales at a company called Telenor AB. I live in Sweden's "silicon valley" called Kista. It is 16minutes with subway to the central. I love to travel and I train a lot of martial arts such as mma, bjj and boxing. I am 34 years old and love life, love to enjoy time with friends and family and gain new experiences in life.

name: Big room in central Stockholm
summary: This cozy room is located nicely close to Fridhemsplan on Kungsholmen. There is a wide range of restaurants and shopping areas close by. A lot of tourist attractions like city hall is on a walking distance.
space: This big and cozy room is one of three in a big apartment of 86 sqm. The apartment is nicely located right next to Fridhemsplan on Kungsholmen, in the very central Stockholm. We are a little family with a few months old baby. As experienced hosts and travelers we have met people from all over the world. Our ambition is to offer you a stay as nice as we would have wanted for ourselves.  The apartment is located in a quiet, central, part of Kungsholmen. My neighborhood is famous for great outdoor areas alongside the water, where you can go for a swim or sunbathe in the summer, or take a nice walk in the winter time. Down the street you can find bars (surprisingly cheap for Sweden), a shopping mall with shops and 3 big supermarkets, charming cafés, restaurants and enjoy a beautiful view over the city. In the surroundings are also sightseeing spots like city hall, where the Nobel price is handed out. This spacious room has three separate beds, 2x90 cm and one slightly bigger 120 cm wide. T

neighborhood_overview: Kungsholmen/Fridhemsplan is a busy area however this apartment is located on a quiet street.
notes: Check in is from 12. Check out is at latest 11.30. If you check out very early you can leave the key in the mailbox.
transit: Public transport is excellent with two subway lines (blue and green) in 5-10 min walking distance, a lot of buses and walking distance to Odenplan pendeltåg (tram) station. It takes about 25 minutes by foot to Stockholm Central station where you find trains and long distance buses.
access: Shared bathroom and kitchen. Wifi.
interaction: We live in the apartment and can help out with any questions.
house_rules: Lungt efter kl 22. Ingen hög musik.
host_about:
Airbnb host since about a year and a half and I love it! Ive met wonderful people from all over the world. I love giving my guest a home away from home. I appreciate friendly and curious guests and I do my best to offer you a nice stay in Stockholm. In return I expect you to keep the apartment clean and be respectful. In the same way I would try my best to do the same if I visit your home. I use airbnb myself when I travel.

I love to do yoga, go for a run and eat good food. My biggest hobby is to travel and Im happy to share my experiences and learn more about your home countries and travels.

name: Best central location, cool and spacious apartment
summary: In the middle of Södermalm neighborhood.   Cool,spacious and comfortable apartment, Two bedrooms, big living room and a very efficient kitchen. Easy access to public transportation including 3 diffrerent metro lines. Very close to the most known bars and restaurants in Stockholm.
space: Letteraly everything is close by. and in case you want to use the public transpotation then you'll have 3 different metro lines a few minutes from the apartment.
description: In the middle of Södermalm neighborhood.   Cool,spacious and comfortable apartment, Two bedrooms, big living room and a very efficient kitchen. Easy access to public transportation including 3 diffrerent metro lines. Very close to the most known bars and restaurants in Stockholm. Letteraly everything is close by. and in case you want to use the public transpotation then you'll have 3 different metro lines a few minutes from the apartment. You'll have access to all the apartment. I'll keep two closets locked for my own personal stuff. But you'll have enough closets for your own stuff! I'll most probably be around the city during your stay. You can always give me a call when you need something. Even if you need touristic tips! Well according to Vogue magazine, Södermalm is top 3 coolest neighborhood  in the world. In this day and age, “Cool” and “Stockholm” are essentially synonymous. Think: Acne Studios, long-lit summer nights, minimalistic armchairs. Imagine, then, how hip its coolest
neighborhood_overview: Well according to Vogue magazine, Södermalm is top 3 coolest neighborhood  in the world. In this day and age, “Cool” and “Stockholm” are essentially synonymous. Think: Acne Studios, long-lit summer nights, minimalistic armchairs. Imagine, then, how hip its coolest neighborhood must be.
notes: The neighbours must NOT be disturbed. If you meet anyone just tell them you're visiting Dost. I’m not charging you for cleaning. So I’m expecting you to keep the house clean and tidy. Don’t leave any food outside the fridge and throw your garbage.
transit: Enter Södermalm, an island just to the south of the city’s center, where one can find top-notch vintage boutiques like Grandpa (which also sells Swedish labels including Rodebjer and Dagmar) to a comprehensive 'zine shop, cheekily named Papercut. Young parents: be sure to stop by the buzzy Mini Rodini outpost on Nytorgsgatan, famed for its funky children’s wear.
access: You'll have access to all the apartment. I'll keep two closets locked for my own personal stuff. But you'll have enough closets for your own stuff!
interaction: I'll most probably be around the city during your stay. You can always give me a call when you need something. Even if you need touristic tips!
house_rules: - No noise or events or parties - No shoes inside - You must keep the house clean and tidy before you leave since I’m not charging you for cleaning.
host_about:
Hi, I am Dost. Living in Stockholm and working as an architect.
I am a travel lover
I always use airbnb when I travel and I thought it will be a good idea to rent out my place for people visiting Stockholm. I hope you'll find comfurt in my place and hopfully see you soon :)
Dost

name: A small but cozy 1 room apartment!
summary: Hello travelers and explorers!  A cozy and fresh 1 room apartment located 10 minutes with train from the city center(Stockholm), and just a few minute walking distance from restaurants and bars in the beautiful Sundbyberg, located just by the water! There is one regular bed, 105 cm, and one flatable if you are two persons. No couch, but a dining table with chairs.
description: Hello travelers and explorers!  A cozy and fresh 1 room apartment located 10 minutes with train from the city center(Stockholm), and just a few minute walking distance from restaurants and bars in the beautiful Sundbyberg, located just by the water! There is one regular bed, 105 cm, and one flatable if you are two persons. No couch, but a dining table with chairs. Depends on. Ask me if i am available during your visit. The apartment is located in a very quiet area, but if you want more pulse Sundbyberg is just a 3 minute walk away. From Sundbyberg you can go with the commuter train to Stockholm City, which will take you about 10 minutes. Buses, trams, commuter train and subway is only a few minutes away from the apt. There is also certain boat rides around Stockholm City that are included in your SL-card(metro card).  A 24-hour card will cost you about 13 USD or 12 Euro.   A 72-hour card will cost you about  26 USD or 24 Euro.

name: Exclusive 4 bedroom apt top location
summary: The apartment
space: Welcome to this beautiful 128-sqm apartment in the centre of Stockholm with high ceiling, wooden floors and two open fireplaces. The apartment is situated in the heart of charming Birkastan with its large variety of restaurants, bars, coffee shops and boutiques. Walking distance to city centre, great communications and green parks. The apartment placed on the third floor is very light and has a great view overlooking the picturesque surroundings. Open planning with three bedrooms and a TV-room with a big sofa bed. The bedrooms consist of a master bedroom with a kingsize bed from Carpe Diem, a second and a third bedroom with 120 cm beds. There is also a very comfortable 140 cm wide sofa bed in the TV-room. Full equipped kitchen with fireplace and lots of space for cooking and socializing. Smeg gas stove, full size fridge, ice making machine, dishwasher, espresso machine etc. Living room with fantastic atmosphere, fireplace, two comfortable sofas and television, One Bathroom with WC and
description: The apartment Welcome to this beautiful 128-sqm apartment in the centre of Stockholm with high ceiling, wooden floors and two open fireplaces. The apartment is situated in the heart of charming Birkastan with its large variety of restaurants, bars, coffee shops and boutiques. Walking distance to city centre, great communications and green parks. The apartment placed on the third floor is very light and has a great view overlooking the picturesque surroundings. Open planning with three bedrooms and a TV-room with a big sofa bed. The bedrooms consist of a master bedroom with a kingsize bed from Carpe Diem, a second and a third bedroom with 120 cm beds. There is also a very comfortable 140 cm wide sofa bed in the TV-room. Full equipped kitchen with fireplace and lots of space for cooking and socializing. Smeg gas stove, full size fridge, ice making machine, dishwasher, espresso machine etc. Living room with fantastic atmosphere, fireplace, two comfortable sofas and television, One Bathroo
neighborhood_overview: Birkastan is one of Stockholms most vibrant areas with lots of things going on all the time. In this apartment you have everything just around the corner; shopping, nightlife, arts, museums, theaters, great restaurants and bars, good coffee places, Systembolaget (liquor store), gym, spa, bowling, playgrounds, Seven Eleven and much much more. 3 minutes walk to Vasaparken with great facilities for children: soccer field, large playground and cafés. You can take a 5 minute long bike ride to Hagaparken where you can play tennis, swim, run, and also look at the crown princess castle - Haga Slott. City bikes for rent only 200 meters away.
transit: 50 meters to subway (green line). Buss stations to take you around town just outside the door. Parking is possible in the streets outside and is free of charge during the night. City Bikes can be rented at Sankt Eriksplan, just two blocks away.
access: There is also a nice backyard, with swings, sandbox, bbq, furniture to relax in and in the cellar there is a well equipped gym. A popular café and bakery, with fresh baked bread every morning, is situated in the bottom of the building.
interaction: You will be met either by us or a family friend and introduced to the facilities of the apartment. We are happy to recommend restaurants, cafes and places to visit. We are usually away for the whole stay, but can meet up with you if you wish. We are always available on telephone or e-mail if you have any questions.
house_rules: We have really nice neighbours but parties and loud music after 10.30 pm is not very popular. No smoking inside the apartment

name: Charming flat in trendy Vasastan!
summary: Welcome! If you are looking for a cozy getaway in the heart of Vasastan, this is the place for you! The apartment (40sqm) is situated in a charming building from 1896. Enjoy your morning coffee at the sunny balcony before discovering Stockholm!
space: This charming apartment contains memories from all over the world!  Hong Kong, New York and Paris treasures meet with Scandinavian old charm and creates a unique atmosphere.  The balcony overlooks a green yard and the sun stays until noon.
description: Welcome! If you are looking for a cozy getaway in the heart of Vasastan, this is the place for you! The apartment (40sqm) is situated in a charming building from 1896. Enjoy your morning coffee at the sunny balcony before discovering Stockholm! This charming apartment contains memories from all over the world!  Hong Kong, New York and Paris treasures meet with Scandinavian old charm and creates a unique atmosphere.  The balcony overlooks a green yard and the sun stays until noon. Vasastan is located in the heart of Stockholm and is a vibriant neighbourhood with trendy shops, bars, restos and cafés.  With the beautiful  green parc, Vasaparken, down the street you can pic up a delicious basket of charceturie from the corner deli or just bring your book.  Walking distance to the city center as well as the royal Hagaparken or vidid St Eriksplan where Mellqvist's serve the best coffee! Enjoy! Bus 4, 70, 42 and 69 just around the corner (1 min walk).  Metro Odenplan (4 min walk) and St Eriks
neighborhood_overview: Vasastan is located in the heart of Stockholm and is a vibriant neighbourhood with trendy shops, bars, restos and cafés.  With the beautiful  green parc, Vasaparken, down the street you can pic up a delicious basket of charceturie from the corner deli or just bring your book.  Walking distance to the city center as well as the royal Hagaparken or vidid St Eriksplan where Mellqvist's serve the best coffee! Enjoy!
transit: Bus 4, 70, 42 and 69 just around the corner (1 min walk).  Metro Odenplan (4 min walk) and St Eriksplan (5 min walk). Two stops to the Central station with the green line - it passes by Rådmansgatan and Hötorget, before arriving at the Central Station. If you continue you will reach the Old Town as well as Södermalm. Super! Stockholm City Bikes (nearest pick up/drop off station is at Karlbergsvägen). Great way to enjoy Stockholm! The Airport Buses "Flygbussarna" stops very conviniently at St Eriksplan and departs every 10-15 min to Arlanda Airport.
house_rules: Warmth, care and common sense. No smoking, please.

name: Romantic apartment in an old building, city center
summary: 2 1/2-room apartment, kitchen living-dinning, bathroom, approx. 80 m² in Södermalm. High ceilings partly with stucco decor. The rooms are airy, bright, and spacious, simple and easy to maintain.
space: The apartment is located in the middle of the cultural and designer quarter with the famous Vita Bergsparken around the corner. 5 minutes' walk to the subway and to the sea and 15 minute's walk to the old town. The apartment consists of a bedroom with two beds, and in the living room there is a sofa bed 1.40 m x 2.00 m. There is also an additional folding bed.  Bed linen is not included in the price, but can be provided at an extra charge of € 20 per person.   The easy final clean-up must be carried out by the guest.

name: Two floors in the heart of SOFO
summary: Welcome to a beautifully designed two-floor apartment just one block from Nytorget in the heart of SOFO. You'll enjoy plenty of sunlight, and plenty of space (71sqm). There's a piano, a small fireplace, and great cafés/restaurants in every direction.
space: Simply put, I love this place, and I hope you will too. Don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions.
description: Welcome to a beautifully designed two-floor apartment just one block from Nytorget in the heart of SOFO. You'll enjoy plenty of sunlight, and plenty of space (71sqm). description: This nice spacious 42 square meter apartment is perfect for vacation i  Stockholm. Situated in the popular area of Södermalm  called Sofo where there are restaurants and bars in every corner, but still a cool relaxed atmosphere. Close to public transportation and easy access to all parts to Stockholm. I'm always just a phonecall/text away. name: Unique loft apartment near metro
summary: Two-storey loft apartment in the heart of southern Stockholm. Ideal for two families with children or a group of up to 7 friends. Situated in beautiful Midsommarkransen, 50 metres from the metro station, close to both the city and scenic nature.
space: The apartment occupies the two top floors of a historically preserved building from 1912. Its 120 square metres are divided into four bedrooms, two fully equipped bathrooms, a large living room and a spacious kitchen/dining area seating 6-8 people. Located 30 seconds from the metro station and 1 minute from the nearest grocery store. A 5 minute train ride brings you straight to the city centre, while a 15 minute walk takes you to scenic Lake Mälaren. A perfect base for exploring Stockholm – both the busy city and the lovely nature around it.
description: Two-storey loft apartment in the heart of southern Stockholm. Ideal for two families with children or a group of up to 7 friends. neighborhood_overview: Midsommarkransen is one of Stockholm's most popular neighbourhoods and a bohemian outpost on the fringes of the city centre. Known for its many vintage stores, small local restaurants and a lovely cinema-café from the 1920's, it attracts a community of creators and artists as well as young families with children.
transit: TRANSPORTATION & ACTIVITIES · 50 metres from the metro station · 4 minutes by train to popular Hornstull · 15 minutes to the Central Station · Close to Liljeholmen & the bus transfer to/from Arlanda Airport · Close to Stockholm International Fair & Congress Centre (Älvsjömässan) · Free parking anywhere on the street · Several parks in the neighbourhood · 15 minutes from Lake Mälaren with its beautiful surroundings, ideal for swimming, running, biking or having a picnic. · Nearest grocery store is only 1 minute away and open 08-23 every day.
access: ACCOMODATION · King size bed · Queen size bed · Single size bed · Sofa bed (double) · Children's bed (up to 3 years) · Additional mattress at request KITCHEN AMENITIES · Coffee machine (amazing) · Water boiler · Toaster · Mixer · Baking machine · Ice cream maker · Kitchen utensils · Oils, spices & seasonings · Fridge & freezer · Stove & oven · Dishwasher · Stokke Tripp Trapp chair TECHNOLOGY & MUSIC · Free wifi (100 mbit/s) · Stereo with wireless speakers (Airplay) · Piano (go ahead, the neighbours don't mind) PERSONAL ITEMS · Bed linen & towels · Hair dryer · Soap & schampoo · Baby dressing-table if required · Two empty wardrobes · Iron & ironing board · Washing machine & dryer · Cleaning is included
interaction: We will be out of town, but easy to get in touch with. We also have family and friends nearby that will happily help out if you need anything.
house_rules: Welcome to our building! The housing cooperative has a Airbnb policy with house rules for the comfort and safety of both tenants and guests.  – Guests must have a valid home insurance and travel insurance, covering accidental damages during their stay. – The host must inform guests on the location of the fire extinguisher and have a functioning fire alarm. – Smoking guests are kindly asked to do it outside, using the entrance towards the street. – The courtyard is for tenants only. However, there is a beautiful park only minutes away – simply follow the streets Vattenledningsvägen or Tegelbruksvägen to Svandammsparken. – Also, no parties. Thanks!
host_about: Live and work in Stockholm with Maja (34), Malcolm (14) and Aldo (3).

host_about:
I'm 34 year old world traveler living in Stockholm and in Helsinki. I have studied in 4 different universities in 4 different countries and I've been working within executive search, IT sector and currently I'm a Nordic Brand Manager at LEGO. I love traveling. During my travels I've lived in bungalows, hostels, hotels, couchsurfing, Airbnb etc. I'm very tidy guest and will take care of your place as if it was mine. 

I can speak Finnish, Swedish, French, Italian and English. I understand Spanish, but I have forgotten how to speak it. So you can contact me in any of these languages...

notes: The room only fits one person. No restrictions in time of arrival.
transit: A short walk will take you to both green and blue metro line, which will transport you to the downtown area in just a few minutes.  In 30 minutes, your feet has taken you to basically anywhere in central Stockholm.
access: Access to kitchen, living room and bathroom. Kitchen has all needed equipment. The guest also has access to washing machine and ironing if needed. In the summer, the inner garden is perfect for relaxing! Selfserved coffe and tea included.
interaction: We will be sleeping in the apartment as well, if not on vacation. Feel free to ask us anything about Stockholm or the apartment. We will happily help you and make your stay as pleasant as possible.
house_rules: Since it is an old building and the walls are thin, any noise (like loud music etc.) after 10 pm is not allowed. No pets. No smoking.
host_about:
Hello!

Welcome to Elin's place in the heart of Stockholm! 

My boyfriend and I is a couple in our early thirties, and originally from the western parts of Sweden. Been living in Stockholm since 2012, and love it so far. Besides work, we like to have an active lifestyle, and try to travel as often as we can. 

Welcome to enjoy Stockholm from our oasis in the city.

name: Central and cosy studio in hip Sofo
space: Welcome to a cozy, unique 1,5 apartment in trendy Södermalm. This is one of the best areas in Stockholm. There’s excellent communications with the subway and several buses a few minutes away, from here you can easily go anywhere in the city. The central station is four stops away, either with subway or bus. Theres also a night bus if you happen to stay out late. Sofo has a lot to offer, there’s loads of great restaurants, bars, coffee shops, stores, shopping centers. You also have grocery stores and Systembolaget (these stores are the only places in Sweden apart from bars, restaurants and night-clubs where strong alcoholic beverages can be purchased). During the summer it’s amazing to walk along Årstaviken, it’s a promenade alongside the water – here you can also go swimming. It's about a 15 minute walk/3 stops with the subway to the Old City. It’s walking distance everywhere and I will provide you with a map of my favorite places in the area.  The apartment itself is about 36 sqm with

name: Beautiful classic apt. with balcony
summary: Spacious classic three room apartment with all the facilities needed. The apartment is located at the heart of Vasastan, 2 minutes away from one of the most popular and restaurant filled streets of Stockholm.
space: Spacious classic three room apartment with all the facilities needed. The apartment is located at the heart of Vasastan, 2 minutes away from one of the most popular and restaurant filled streets of Stockholm. The apartment is three room 76sqm with a large sunny balcony. The bedroom holds a comfortable 180cm bed. One bathroom with shower cabin. Fully equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances. The neighborhood of Vasastan is bustling with restaurants and cafes, yet is still quite and safe. The apartment is conveniently located within short distance of St Eriksplan metro station with subway and many buses. Within 2 minutes, pendeltåg station is located which allows for quick access to the city center and Arlanda airport. The apartment is located within walking distance to beautiful parks and walking areas.

name: Eco-Village B&B 12min to city centre
summary: 12 minutes by metro from historical Stockholm city centre and with a large forested nature reserve with a system of lakes  next to it, this charming bed-and-breakfast residence in an ecological village provides a calm and unique combination of city and  countryside.
space: This is a delightful Eco-Village house,  surrounded by trees. Next to it is a large nature reserve  where you can walk, run, swim (15 minutes away on foot), fish and use the sauna at one of the lakes. With the bicycles of the house you can reach the inner city of Stockholm in 20 minutes. The double bed is easily converted to two single beds. A comfortable extra bed allows for 3 persons in total.  The houses in the Eco-Village have ecological materials, lots of wood, solar panels and  ground source heating from the rock formation below the ground.
description: 12 minutes by metro from historical Stockholm city centre and with a large forested nature reserve with a system of lakes  next to it, this charming bed-and-breakfast residence in an ecological village provides a calm and unique combination of city and  countryside. This is a delightful Eco-Village house,  surrounded by trees. Next to it is a large nature reserve  where you can walk, run, swim (15 minutes away on foot), fish and use the sauna at one of the lakes. With the bicycles of the house you can reach the inner city of Stockholm in 20 minutes. The double bed is easily converted to two single beds. A comfortable extra bed allows for 3 persons in total.  The houses in the Eco-Village have ecological materials, lots of wood, solar panels and  ground source heating from the rock formation below the ground. Guests have access to the fully equipped kitchen and can cook meals there, a shower and separate toilet with wash-basin next door,  a fully equipped bath-room with a washing machin
neighborhood_overview: A nice, calm neighbourhood, surrounded by the nature reserve. Seven minutes away, at the metro-station, there is a food store open until 10 pm every evening of the week and a small restaurant.
notes: Detailed information will be provided about how to to get from Arlanda and Skavsta airports to the house, how to get travel cards for the public transport, and about parking.  There is no cost for children under four sleeping in their parents´ bed.  If he is free and not in rush hours, the host will be glad to fetch you at Arlanda airport for 500 SEK, but cheaper car options  will be detailed among the various travel options from that airport.
transit: From T-centralen (city centre station, where the buses arrive from both airports) take the green line with end station "Skarpnäck" and get off at Björkhagen metro station; it´s a 15-minute ride. Then a 7-minute walk to the house. The Eco-Village is car-free, but you may drive up to the house if to leave your luggage. Parking is available on the street 100 metres away, on weekdays there is a cost 10 SEK per hour 7 am - 7 pm and on Saturdays 11 am - 5 pm.
access: Guests have access to the fully equipped kitchen and can cook meals there, a shower and separate toilet with wash-basin next door,  a fully equipped bath-room with a washing machine downstairs, outdoor furniture on both sides of the house one of them on a patio the other on grass, four bicycles, free wifi. A full breakfast is included on a self-service basis. Coffee, tea and chocolate is always available.
interaction: The host lives in the house. He respects the privacy of his guests but is generally available for help or guidance.  If the guests like and if he is free he will cook a Swedish dinner with elk from his forest for them (no cost).
house_rules: Smoking only outdoors on the patio where an ash-tray is provided. No pets. Quiet during the night. Indoor slippers are provided - we follow the Swedish custom of taking off our shoes when we enter the house.
host_about:
Aside from my family, my great passion has been conservation of tropical rain forests and I still do this part-time with a project in Brazil. I like being busy and started running a B&B, which has given a good extra flavour to my life. I live in the house, but occasionally stay at my lady´s place a 7-minute bike ride away.  I run this B&B together with my son. My daughter lives in Stockholm too. 
I always try to do my best and am on the look-out for improvements in all major aspects of my life.  I like reading and understanding changing trends in society, travelling in particular to places where I can  meet people, making an annual trip with my children, having dinner with friends I often eat out, staying mentally and physically fit with choice of foods, meditation,  exercise (I love the gym and bicycle frequently all year to the city).  
I enjoy conversation with guests who like that, when time permits, because I can be quite busy at  my home office in the living-room.   When my guests need help or advice I will always make time for this.

name: Beautiful apartment with balcony
summary: A beautiful newly renovated two room apartment (54 m2) with lovely balcony located at Fridhemsplan in the central Kungsholmen neighbourhood. Excellent connection spot to get around the city and perfect for couples, friends or small families.
space: A beautiful and newly renovated two room apartment with lovely balcony located at Fridhemsplan in the central Kungsholmen neighbourhood.  Excellent connection spot to get around Stockholm with both metro (closest station Fridhemsplan, 450 m) and buses easily taking you to different areas of the city, such as Södermalm, Vasastan and Djurgården. The flight bus from Arlanda Airport and Bromma Airport stops just five minutes from the apartment. Located on a quiet street yet right by vibrant restaurants, bars and shopping. Why not take a stroll by the water on beautiful Kungsholms strand or have a coffee at the Italian coffee place located in the same building. Or maybe enjoy a drink at popular Mälarpaviljongen located right by the water at Norr Mälarstrand?  The apartment is perfect for couples, friends or small families and accommodates 4 persons (one double bed 180 cm + one couch + one "double bed" mattress). A lovely top renovated kitchen with table for three persons and modern kitchen
description: A beautiful newly renovated two room apartment (54 m2) with lovely balcony located at Fridhemsplan in the central Kungsholmen neighbourhood. Excellent connection spot to get around the city and perfect for couples, friends or small families. I would be happy to provide recomendations of places to eat and see. Great negihbours and quiet area. Super good communications with both subway and buses 5 min from the apartment. From the Airport: bus (45-55 min and approx 12-15 euros) or taxi (45 minutes, approx 50-55 euros)

host_about:
Hi! 

I grew up just outside of Stockholm but nowadays live on Kungsholmen, being just in the centre of Stockholm. I am a lawyer and have been working as a consultant the past 6 years. In my spare time I usually hang out with friends, love traveling and exercise a lot. I am new here on Airbbnb, but hoping to find some great apartments to rent when I travel next time, and also get in contact with persons looking for a beautiful two bedroom apartment to rent in Stockholm. Have a great day!

transit: From T-centralen (city centre station, where the buses arrive from both airports) take the green line with end station "Skarpnäck" and get off at Björkhagen metro station; it´s a 15-minute ride. Then a 7-minute walk to the house. The Eco-Village is car-free, but you can drive up to the house to leave your luggage. Parking is available on the street 100 metres away, on weekdays there is a cost 10 SEK per hour 7 am - 7 pm and Saturdays 11 am - 5 pm.
access: Guests have access to the fully equipped kitchen and can cook meals there, a shower and separate toilet with wash-basin next door,  a bath-room with washing machine downstairs, outdoor furniture on both sides of the house one of them on a patio the other on grass, four bicycles, free wifi. Breakfast is included on a self-service basis. Coffee, tea and chocolate is always available.
interaction: The host lives in the house. He respects the privacy of his guests but is generally available for help or guidance.  If the guests like and if he is free he will cook a Swedish dinner with elk from his forest for them (no cost).
house_rules: Smoking only outdoors on the patio where an ash-tray is provided. No pets.  Quiet during the night. Indoor slippers are provided - we follow the Swedish custom of taking off our shoes when we enter the house.
host_about:
Aside from my family, my great passion has been conservation of tropical rain forests and I still do this part-time with a project in Brazil. I like being busy and started running a B&B, which has given a good extra flavour to my life. I live in the house, but occasionally stay at my lady´s place a 7-minute bike ride away.  I run this B&B together with my son. My daughter lives in Stockholm too. 
I always try to do my best and am on the look-out for improvements in all major aspects of my life.  I like reading and understanding changing trends in society, travelling in particular to places where I can  meet people, making an annual trip with my children, having dinner with friends I often eat out, staying mentally and physically fit with choice of foods, meditation,  exercise (I love the gym and bicycle frequently all year to the city).  
I enjoy conversation with guests who like that, when time permits, because I can be quite busy at  my home office in the living-room.   When my guests need help or advice I will always make time for this.

name: Eco-Village room B&B 12min to  city centre
summary: 12 minutes from historical Stockholm city centre and with a large forested nature reserve with several lakes next to it, this detached room with bed-and-breakfast in a charming ecological village provides a unique combination of city and restful countryside.
space: This is a delightful Eco-Village house, surrounded by trees.  Next to it is a large nature reserve where you can walk, run, swim (15 minutes away on foot), fish and use the sauna at one of the lakes. With the bicycles of the house you can reach the inner city of Stockholm in 20 minutes. An extra bed allows for 3 persons in total; it will be a bit crowded then.    The houses in the Eco-Village have ecological materials, lots of wood, solar panels and  ground source heating from the rock formation below the ground.  .

summary: Located only five minutes from Central station with public transport (commuter train). Walking distance (15-20 min ) to Stockholms Palace, Old Town and the ferryboat to Skansen. The price is per/rum.
space: Södermalm is trendy and hip with a lot of shops, restaurants, bars and cafes. name: Cozy bedroom/kitchen suite
summary: A lovely light and airy bedroom, fully furnished with double bed, desk, cupboards and big closet, with adjoining kitchen and semi-private access on a quiet street in one of Stockholm's most charming neighborhoods - hip and heavenly Hammarby Höjden...
space: A cozy bedroom with a lovely view of this pleasant hamlet on the edge of town, with adjoining kitchen that forms a little suite of its own in the apartment, accessible directly from the front door without passing through any other rooms.  Light, airy, comfortable, with a little writing or study nook and lots of storage space.  Very nice for a couple for a short stay of a weekend to a week, but more suitable to a single person or a student for longer periods.
description: A lovely light and airy bedroom, fully furnished with double bed, desk, cupboards and big closet, with adjoining kitchen and semi-private access on a quiet street in one of Stockholm's most charming neighborhoods - hip and heavenly Hammarby Höjden... A cozy bedroom with a lovely view of this pleasant hamlet on the edge of town, with adjoining kitchen that forms a little suite of its own in the apartment, accessible directly from the front door without passing through any other rooms.  Light, airy, comfortable, with a little writing or study nook and lots of storage space.  Very nice for a couple for a short stay of a weekend to a week, but more suitable to a single person or a student for longer periods. Kitchen, bathroom with tub and common hallways, yard out back with stone barbecure installation, pic nic tables, and laundry room just down the steps from the apartment. Well, you can have as much or as little as you like.  We speak Swedish, French and English here, so you have a choic
neighborhood_overview: Hammarby Höjden is a quiet, hip, green little community on the edge of Stockholm.  It is close to the city, but it is also close to the country.   The streets are quiet, with only local traffic, so you only see a car once or twice an hour, if that.  From your window and the kitchen window you will see, instead, people out walking their dogs, pushing a baby carriage, jogging, or cycling.  All the local shops you need (supermarket, pharmacy, 7-11, pizzeria and even a 24 hour sport club...) are two minutes walk away, but so are the woods which lead into the huge Nacka Reserve, the largest natural reserve in the area. And, this is one of those areas where progressive minded, friendly people live, the kind of people you can talk to in line at the local market.
notes: There are two of us in this apartment, John and Emmanuelle.  I'm an american, who lives and works between Stockholm and Paris, and Emmanuelle is part Swedish, part French.  We both follow artistic pursuits in life...  When one or the other of us is going to be away for awhile, we rent out that room, as neither of us has the kind of high paying career where the financial help would not be needed...
transit: Yes, the tunnelbarna or metro station is three minutes walk from your doorstep. It is then five minutes to Södermalm, the hip district, and another two minutes to the old town, and another minute or two to downtown and then the upscale neighborhoods of the east side of Stockholm.  It is also an easy area to for taking a bicycle into town and there is a separate bridge which people use for that....  We are also right on the edge of the woods which lead into the Nacka Nature Reserve, so there are footbaths and bikepaths in there where you can basically wander around endlessly if you feel like it....
access: Kitchen, bathroom with tub and common hallways, yard out back with stone barbecure installation, pic nic tables, and laundry room just down the steps from the apartment.
interaction: Well, you can have as much or as little as you like.  We speak Swedish, French and English here, so you have a choice of how you may wish to communicate.
house_rules: Well, this is not a noisy or heavy party type building, so it would be good not to be blasting music very loud after a certain point at night.  Other than that, please wash your dishes after you use them so no one else has to do so!
host_about: I am an american who divides his time between my two favorite cities in Europe, Paris and Stockholm.  I have a two room apartment in both towns and, in order to keep them both, I have a roommate in each town.  And, when I am away from either town, I make my room available for short term rentals.  I am an actor, a singer (lyric tenor), and a sometime consultant in performance skills for the business community.  So, I do what I can to get by.  Both of my places are lovely spots.  The Stockholm apartment is a little more in nature in a part of town where many artists and progressive type people live because it is close to town but still affordable.  The Paris apartment is right in a busy central Paris district so you are right in the heart of town and feel its pulse.  I am always available on (Hidden by Airbnb) if ever any problems come up, but you also usually have a nice roommate down the hall to give you any advice you need about navigating either of these two fabulous cities to live in.

name: Hip apartment on Södermalm
summary: A newly renovated Scandinavian style apartment conveniently located right in the middle of Södermalm in Stockholm! Just 2 minutes walk from subway, busses and boats, our place has 2 double bedrooms and is even ideal for a family with children.
space: Our recently renovated apartment has two good-sized bedrooms - bedroom 1 comes with a queen size bed (160x200cm), bedroom 2 has a comfortable double bed sofa (140x200cm) as well as a triple bunk bed with junior mattresses - upper and middle bunk are 70x160cm and the lowest bunk 70x140cm. The kitchen is equipped with an induction stove, oven and microwave and has seating space for 6+ people. There's a furnished south-facing balcony off the kitchen. The bathroom has a bathtub and a washer/dryer combo. We have high-speed internet and a basic cable TV package, as well as lots of books and magazines to lend.

We're always available via phone or email if you need anything. We live on a quiet side street parallel to one of the main streets on Södermalm b
neighborhood_overview: We live on a quiet side street parallel to one of the main streets on Södermalm boasting with coffee shops, bars and boutiques. You can reach a lot of the sights of Stockholm on foot - Gamlastan (the old town) for example is a 5-minute walk away - or just spend a day on Södermalm discovering vintage boutiques, Swedish design and having an obligatory "fika" (coffee & something sweet) at one of the many coffee shops. There are some top restaurants closeby as well as some comfy pubs.
notes: We have small children so our apartment is fairly child-proof, we have highchairs available and there is a changing table in the bathroom. There is a safety gate to the balcony. Your kids are welcome to use the toys and books in the 2nd bedroom.
transit: The apartment is a couple of minutes walk from both Slussen and Medborgarplatsen underground stations. At Slussen you can catch both the red and the green underground lines, many busses and also boats. Stockholm central station is 2 stops away on the underground.
interaction: We're always available via phone or email if you need anything.
house_rules: This is our home. Enjoy it but take good care of it!  If you break something, please be honest and let us know.  No smoking in the apartment or on the balcony/at the windows.  No pets allowed.  Please take your shoes off when you come in. Be kind to our neighbours and don't be noisy after hours, on the balcony or in the hallway.  Thank you! :)
host_about: Travel-loving mom of three kids living in Stockholm.

neighborhood_overview: Bagarmossen is an upcoming trendy part of town accommodating lots of artists, activists and entrepreneurs. Bagarmossen offer several restaurants and cafes, two groceries, a pharmacy etc, all located around a town square four minutes from the apartment by foot. The neighbourhood is beautifully situated right next to a large forest and a lake where you can swim summertime. The forest is a three minute walk away and the lake 15 minutes by foot. The apartment is also close to Globen, which holds big sports and cultural events, including the Eurovision Song Contest.
transit: Seven minute walk to the metro. 15-18 minutes by metro downtown. Metro leaves about every 10 minutes (every 7 minutes rush hours). There is a direct bicycle lane to town, approximately 20-30 minutes of biking.

neighborhood_overview: Södermalm, often shortened to "Söder", is a district in central Stockholm. It covers the large island of the same name (formerly called "Åsön"). With a population of 99,685 (December 2008) it is one of the most densely populated districts of Scandinavia. Although Södermalm usually is considered an island, water to both its north and south does not flow freely but passes through locks. My apartment is close to Maria Torget and Medborgarplatsen subway and from here you can easyily access whole Stockholm with public transport. Gamla Stan (old town) is just a 10 min walk from my door, it's a must for a first visit to Stockholm. The area around Maria Torget and Slussen (Götgatan, Götstreet) have many cool bars, café and good shopping.
access: Bed linen, towels, etc. are included.
interaction: I interact with guest before arrival, how to access apartment, how to get from airport fastest, cheapest and so on.  I meet with guest in apartment and show them how to use kitchen and wi-fi etc.
house_rules: 1. Always take off shoes upon entering the apartment in the area assigned for the shoes in the entry hallway. This is to keep it clean and help the cleaning process go smoother. 2. No smoking in the apartment or hallways. 3. No Pets. 4. No Parties! Don’t bring other guests to the apt! We are not responsible for other people. 5.
